comments:
el piso es muy bonito, nos dejaron unos detalles de cocacolas, agua, una botella de vino, te y capsulas de café. es muy confortable el piso y al llegar tenía la calefacción puesta y se estaba muy bien. lo que si hemos echado en falta son perchas en los armarios por lo demás todo genial. esta a 2 minutos andando de una zona de bares y restaurantes y justo enfrente hay un supermercado Día. Repetiría sin duda!This is a great flat! There are restaurants and shops around, also metro stations.This place is stylishly designed and very centrally located in one of the great neighborhoods. It's on the road but still pretty quiet. You can walk to all the main attractions, gets tapas and drinks at the 100s of restaurants close by or simply just wander around la Latina. My only compliant would be the check-in procedure (apps to download, poor communication and late replies) our apartment was still being clean when we checked in and was not ready for another hour and there was no apologies. 
Otherwise a good stayExcelente atención y apartamento hermosoAppartamento eccezionale per posizione e arredamento. Tutto funzionante. Molto gentili e disponibili. Mi hanno fatto trovare anche una culla con cuscini, lenzuola per il bimbo.Très bel appartement, idealement situé dans ce quartier authentique et magnifique de la Latina !! Il se situe a quelques pas de la station de métro.
L’appartement est moderne, très spacieux et surtout très propre. L’acceuil a été très chaleureux et tout a etait fait pour rendre notre sejour à madrid mémorable.
Vous pouvez choisir cette adresse les yeux fermés pour votre city trip au coeur de MadridBel appartement bien situé à proximité du centre ville. Parfait pour 4 avec 2 chambres indépendantes. Equipement de la maison complet.Would totally recommend this place to anyone looking to stay in Madrid. It's beautiful, very comfortable, spacious and the location is so convenient and walkable around Madrid's centro.really nice spot in the centre of MadridNice apartment in a busy area, not far from the royal p6and the pedestrian areas. Main issue with having a car: got 60euros ticket for late at parkmeter.
Very expensive car parks...The apartment was nicely kitted out, clean, comfortable and in a great locationI couldn‘t hope for a better place for my stay. Great apartment in a fantastic location.not sure, will try you guys once more before I can recommend..Apartamento muy bonito y bien ubicado. Muy recomendable.This was a wonderful rental and a great neighborhood. There was a little grocery store right across the street which made snacking and small meal preparation very easy.  We used the public parking three blocks away and a great public market up at the other end of the street as well. The apartment was very comfortable and we enjoyed everything about it.Buena ubicación con los servicios necesarios para pasar una buena estadía en Madrid.

amenities: {TV,Wifi,"Air conditioning",Kitchen,"Paid parking off premises","Smoking allowed",Elevator,Heating,"Family/kid friendly",Washer,"First aid kit",Essentials,Shampoo,"Hair dryer",Iron,"Laptop friendly workspace","Hot water","Bed linens","Extra pillows and blankets",Microwave,"Coffee maker",Refrigerator,"Dishes and silverware","Cooking basics",Oven,Stove,"Luggage dropoff allowed",Other,"Paid parking on premises"}
comments:
A nice little place in lovely lavapies neighborhood. Good for singles and  no more than a couple. Although quite small, it was perfect for a short stay. The apartment was well kept and quiet at night. The bed and couch were a bit on the firm side but still comfortable. Thanks!Nice place great location 
 Clean 
Highly recommandedTodo genial!I was in Madrid with my girlfriend for a couple of days. Ana is a very kind and helpful host. She left breakfast for us and food. Always in touch with us even if she was abroad. She send me back the money I forgotten into the apartment. I really apreciated that! Thanks Ana!!!Logement très bien situé pour un court séjour.It was convenient to cook.It was convenient because the street was not bad and the market was near, but the bathroom was too narrow and the water was running over. The electricity was turned off so often that it was inconvenient.Ana's apartment is located in a very nice area, between Lavapies and Anton Martin. Ana was very communicative before the arrival and I could reach the flat without problem. The apartment was as on the pictures, very cosy and clean. Totally recommended for a weekend in Madrid!Nos encantó el departamento de Ana. Es pequeñito pero tiene todo y está en una ubicación inmejorable, andando a todos las atracciones de Madrid y en un barrio con mucho encanto.El departamento de Ana es muy lindo y cómodo para una pareja. La ubicación es perfecta, es un edificio muy tranquilo pero rodeado de lugares para comer y tomar algo, además de estar muy cerca de varias estaciones de Metro. Ana se comunicó muy fácilmente con nosotros y nos dejó su departamento con elementos para desayunar y estar muy cómodos. La calefacción es muy buena y el departamento tiene muy buena luz.
Súper recomendable para todo tipo de estadías, cortas o más largas.Comunicación con Ana inmejorable, muy buena ubicación del apartamento, que aunque es pequeñito es muy acogedor. La limpieza perfecta. Muy contenta de haber estado en el apartamento. Ana es una anfitriona perfecta.Ótima hospedagem!!
Tudo limpo e a Ana respondia minhas mensagens bem rapidamente. Ótima localização.Todo correcto, buena localización, anfitriona atenta, pasamos un buen fin de semanaThanks Ana for your place, it was perfect for a couple for a couple of days! The location is amazing, and communication with you was as easy as possible.La,ubicación es muy buena en el histórico barrio de Lavapies. El piso es pequeño, pero funciona muy bien e para una o dos personas. No es nada lujoso, pero es funcional. Ana es una anfitriona atenta y preocupada.Ana ha estado muy atenta en todo momento. Ha sido flexible con el horario por lo que le damos las gracias. El apartamento muy silencioso y limpio, acogedor y cómodo. La ubicación muy buena, cerca del metro lavapies y la zona estupenda para el ocio. Volveríamos sin duda.

amenities: {TV,Wifi,"Free street parking",Heating,Essentials,Shampoo,"Lock on bedroom door",Hangers,"Hair dryer","Hot water","Bed linens","Extra pillows and blankets","Long term stays allowed"}
comments:
Todo estupendo no esta muy céntrico pero esta bien comunicadoUna habitación perfecta para dos y muy buena hospitalidad. Alojamiento muy recomendable.Para ser la primera vez que estoy en un alojamiento turístico. Muy buena experiencia.Personalmente solo coincidimos con la madre de la anfitriona. Mujer maja, predispuesta y muy hospitalaria. La anfitriona en si. No tardaba nada en contestarnos y muy maja dándonos las indicaciones correctas para llegar al alojamiento. Piso enteramente reformado y limpio.Muy atentos, la habitacion muy limpia y cómoda!The room and the bathroom we were allowed to use were very clean, tidy and comfortable. The hosts were kind enough to even let us use their kitchen for heating up food, making coffee/tea etc. But what struck us most is how welcoming and caring the hosts were. They left us little surprises like candy, juice or cake for breakfast, helped us make our way through the city etc, just overall were very very kind to us, which made us feel comfortable in this room. We also had to book ASAP, less than 24 hours before arrival, so it was also very kind of them to accept us in such a short notice.Всё понравилось. Чистая уютная комната с телевизором. Кухня не входит в стоимость. Елена сразу нам отвечала. Были одну ночь. Рекомендуем.Elena ha sido accesible y hospitalaria. La habitación limpia y equipada. La ubicación no es céntrica pero cercana.Este viaje ha sido maravilloso, la estancia ha sido genial, muy bonita la habitacion, bien situada y los anfitriones son geniales.  Recomiendo 100% este alojamiento.Elena y su novio son súper amables y accesibles!! El departamento muy bien ubicado cerca del metro! Sin duda alguna regresaremos!!Located in a nice middle class, safe, walkable neighborhood. 15 min via Uber to airport, 60 via Metro. Elena’s great!Elena was great! My boyfriend and I arrived late evening and she still went out of her way to make us feel welcome. The apartment was very clean and we had our own bathroom. The bed was on the smaller side but worked perfect for two weary travelers. As long as you are comfortable with the subway system, the location is great (only a 6 min walk).Es recomendable. 
Porque es una zona tranquila. 
Yo lo pasé genial.Elena's room lived up to its good reviews. As others have said the bed is a small double . Elena was a delightful host and this place suited our needs perfectly, 5 mins walk from elipa metro station . Oh yeh and we won the European cup, again !!!! Perfect weekend.Elena was very kind and helpful. We checked in earlier. She was responding to our messages on time, and was there for anything we needed. Recommend staying at her place!Experiencia TOP ! Elena es muy simpática, amable  y nos ha facilitado la hora de entrada en la medida de lo posible a pesar de haber reservado con poca antelación,  su casa es muy acogedora. Totalmente recomendable.Excelente elección, hermosa casa e impecableUna persona exceptional, muy acogedora, siempre a disposición con muchas atenciones. Recomiendo a 100%Überragend gastfreundlich und sehr sauber!Elena, la anfitriona inmejorable.Elena's apartment is very comfortable and clean with a good shower. Elena comes across as very friendly and helpful. The apartment easy accessible from the centre and from the airport using la Elipa stop on the underground and then a 5 minute walk in a nice, clean and safe neighbourhood, Madrid is up there as one of the Best cities I have visited, great atmosphereExcelente anfitriona, muy amable y atenta, todo muy limpio y arreglado, ubicación favorable, la cama quizas un poco incomoda para mi gusto, pero eso es relativo a cada persona, me dio mucha confianza y tranquilidad, hizo que el viaje fuera muy ameno, definitivamente la recomiendo. Gracias por todo Elena.La habitación está impecable y todo excelente. Lo que más vale la pena es la hospitalidad de Elena y su novio. Muy agradecida con las atenciones! :)Ich habe mich direkt sehr wohl und sehr willkommen gefühlt. Obwohl wir nicht die gleiche Sprache gesprochen haben lief die Kommunikation reibungslos. Insgesamt fand ich den Aufenthalt sehr schön! Vielen DankElena es súper amable y está siempre súper atenta a lo que necesites. La hospitalidad en su piso 100% recomendado! Definitivamente volvería a repetir.Elena es una persona muy amable y sociable. El apartamento está muy bien decorado y limpio. Lo recomendamosMuy amables y serviciales para todo lo que necesitamos.Todo muy bien! nos recibieron con jugos y chocolates! muy limpio el lugar!Tanto Elena como si chico son súper simpáticos y te ayudan con cualquier duda.
La habitación es muy cómoda y tranquila, no se oye ningún ruido uy la localización está muy bien.
Sin duda repetiremos en caso de volver a Madrid :D

amenities: {TV,Wifi,"Air conditioning",Kitchen,"Paid parking off premises",Heating,"Family/kid friendly",Washer,"Fire extinguisher",Essentials,Shampoo,Hangers,"Hair dryer",Iron,"Laptop friendly workspace","Private entrance","Hot water","Bed linens",Microwave,"Coffee maker",Refrigerator,Dishwasher,"Dishes and silverware","Cooking basics",Oven,Stove,"Host greets you"}
comments:
The place is very central, in the heart of Madrid but there are some shady people in the neighborhood. We appreciated the help from the host regarding the WiFi setup and we communicated very well. On the downside, the floor was quite dusty and we had to clean it ourselves, there was no trash can, which was a bit odd and the host suggested that we should buy some plastic bags. Also there's a strong smell in the kitchen from the gas tank. Overall, the experience was ok but there are things to improve.El apartamento está muy bien, cómodo, perfecto para dos personas y cerca de todos los puestos turísticos de Madrid.The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.Gut gelegen und schnelle, sowie auch nette Kommunikation mit dem Gastgeber. Vollkommen in Ordnung für den Preis. Tolles Quartier - man kommt aus der Tür und ist mittendrin...nice location, very central. a lot of dailylight.A clean apartment in a great location, considering how reasonable the price was!Todo correcto. Sin ningún problemait's a beautiful place in the middle of lavapies, clean, useful and pretty! 
the communication was amazing with the host, very recommended. 
as everywhere in lavapies during weekend there is some noise.
but overview amazing place.Ubicación perfecta
Piso muy limpio y comodoVery nice place, great hospitality. Fantastic located, really close to city center.不错的房子,晚上偶尔有点吵el departamento esta muy bien ubicado y cerca del centro, la atencion muy buena durante la estancia. :DThis is a clean, very basic but comfortable and convenient  appartament well worth the price and Abdul is a friendly host!
It is a very lively and noisy neighbourhood but feels safe and has a lot of nice, delicious and funky cafees and restaurants! We look forward to returning!!Un sitio muy céntrico para conocer lo más importante de madridTutto perfetto! Lo consiglio a tutti ! :)Great place! Perfect for a couple people, and great location! Walkable to everythingbel appartement,bien éclairé et situé dans un quartier animé et sympathique.La estuvo estuvo buenísima. Muy centralizado! Lo recomiendo!!Muy buena opción para pasar una temporada en Madrid. Increíble locación, cerca del centro y con muchos lugares que explotar. El piso es acogedor, cómodo y en muy buen estado. Realmente una buena opción para disfrutar de la capital.Logement confortable pour 4 personnes et très bien situé à côté la Plaza Mayor !Todo de acuerdo a lo conversado previamente, no tuvimos ningún inconvenienteEs un lugar muy cómodo, accesible, muy limpio, y nos apoyaron en todo. En general me gusto mucho, para mi próximo viaje, volveré a este lugar.L appartement est très situé. Un peu bruyant la nuit... vive la vie à Madrid !!Good location. 
Easy to access from both subway and renfe. 
The room is comfortable. 
Check-in had a polite explanation. 
The host is good. 
Message is polite and safe. 
It is recommended.Alojamiento económico y cercano al centro de Madrid, aunque algo ruidoso por la noche.The location is near everything just the street where the appartment is a little bit not safe at nightFantastic place! Very cozy and bright. Big windows overlooking a square outside. Lots of light and sky. Close to the metro and many small shops, cafes, and bars in a very multicultural neighborhood. We had a perfect time.Es war alles in Ordnung, so wie auf den Bildern zu sehen. Sehr zentral gelegen und alle öffentliche Verkehrsmittel in wenige Minuten zu erreichen. Würde ich jederzeit wieder buchen.Прекрасная квартира. Расположение 10 минут до плаза Майор. Отличный магазин продуктов ДИА. Спасибо за встречу. Всем рекомендую. Хотелось бы вернуться.Le logement présente l'avantage d'être à 10 mn à pied de tous les sites. Lit (petit) et canapé confortables salle de bain ok. A savoir, la chambre donne sur le salon par une petite fenêtre, pas de lumière du jour. Les équipements cuisine sont réduits au minimum 1 seule petite cuillère, pas de bol, de sopalin, peu d'assiettes, poignée faitout cassée, quasi absence de denrées genre thé, café... Attention, bcp de monde dehors sur la place face au logement donc bcp de bruit jusqu'à 2-3h du matin. Par contre communication avec les proprios ok. Et Madrid est une ville magnifique.Great small apartment in a fun and fab neighborhood.alojamiento perfecto para pasar unos dias por madridThe apartment itself is ok. Communication was great. A few fixtures were lovely. Towels and soaps were provided. However,  it unfortunately does not have many conveniences, smelt a bit, and was incredibly tight quarters. There is a kitchen but it is difficult to use. There is a washer but it is difficult to access as the door is jammed by the fridge. It is also not in an area that I would recommend for families. The host was great about altering the length of our stay once we realized it was not suitable to us. And they are easy to reach and their staff are very nice.Le séjour dans cet appartement était agréable car il est dans le centre ville et à 2 min à pied du métro " Lavapies". L'appartement et spacieux et lumineux dans le salon avec une clim réglable qui permet de chauffer ou refroidir la pièce.
Les seuls défauts de ce logement sont: la chaudière ( plutôt dangereuse car une petite flamme peut sortir si on insiste trop au moment de démarrer le système ) et de plus elle ne fonctionne pas très bien car l eau de la douche est à peine tiède la plupart du temps ce qui est un peu embêtant quand il fait froid. 
L appartement a des équipements modernes et propres mais il manque un peu de chaleurosité.The appartement is situated in a multicultural part of Madrid, so maybe not the best to stay in for young girls. Other wise it is really close to everything and has a lot of cute cafés next to it. The appartement was clean and nicely decorated but didn't really have hot water. Other wise the hosts were really nice and waited for us !Appartement très bien pour une famille de 4, grand, propre.
Situé dans un quartier animé.Es un lugar céntrico , muy ruidoso, el vecino de arriba se puso con el taladro a las 00:30.Casa pequeña pero acogedora y práctica, tal y como se describe en el anuncio, no engaña.logement conforme aux photos et à la description.
Emplacement parfait pour visiter le centre de Madrid.
Equipement de la cuisine à améliorer.Muy buen lugar para conocer el centro de Madrid, como en todo lugar el centro suele ser mas transitado y congestionado, existe diversidad de culturas lo cual es muy bueno, el barrio puede resultar un poco convulsionado, el apartamento esta bien equipado, la limpieza impecable y la comunicación muy buena, siempre pendiente en todo momento de las necesidades.Convenient to public transportation , supermarkets and some attractions are walking  distance away like the Royal Palace.Todo tal y como se describía. El apartamento está muy bien y un trato súper amable y hospitalario. Gracias!

amenities: {Wifi,Washer}
comments:
The apatment is conveniently located, metro and buses just a few steps from the door, lot of bars, restaurants and markets very close. Facing a large street it's not quiet but I could sleep. Kitchen is very basic. I have to say blankets and covers not very clean. Check in and replies from Rachel very fast and professional, plus a lot of info and tips. Her sister was very kind too.We had a great stay in this spacious apartment in Madrid. Although Raquel wasn't in town, her sister met us at the apartment and showed us around. It is just up on the first floor of the building, so very few stairs. Although there were a couple of bedrooms, we were the only ones there at the time, and we made excellent use of the sprawling space.

The large living room with television was appreciated, and the kitchen had just about every utensil we could think of, let alone need.

There is a metro stop VERY close, so getting to the main sights in Madrid was extremely easy.awesome room (or should i say house?), Raquel wasn't there so i couldn't meet her, but she informed her sister Rosana, and she was the one who met us.

It was a pleasant and cosy room, with everything i needed. extremely close to the subway station and a few bus stops so we could go everywhere from there.

i must say, when i return to madrid i would love to stay here again!Raquel was very nice and welcoming. She was very flexible and gave tipps for eating etc. The flat is as close to the metro as it gets, metro in Madrid is very well established, you can get to Sol in about 10 minutes (or less) and take it from there.  All in all a very nice experience!Nice comfortable beds and room. Very close to the metro- central location for madrid. Nice stay overall. Only negative- there is a strict 10 am checkout, which is too early for holidays.Staying in this apartment has been amazing. Both Raquel and her sister, Rosana, were wonderful hosts and always very accommodating. The place itself was great. The kitchen and sala are well designed and very spacious. It's near a metro line, so it's easy to go around Madrid. If you like walking, you can even reach the city center by foot (around 25 to 30 minutes). The neighborhood is complete - a church, numerous supermarkets, a wet market, printing shops, anything you need. I highly recommend staying here. :)Raquel's flat was really great! Comfortable bed, good shower/kitchen/living room facilities. Close enough to the city centre to get there by bus/metro in about 15 minutes but it is a 30 minute uphill walk... However, overall it was a nice place and I would stay there again! Raquel was a very sweet host and we had a great experience. The metro line connects to the city center although there are several stops to get there. The area is quite active and also during night. Supermarkets, tapas, cafes, and all services nearby. The flat has all of the essentials and the host was very good. Overall a positive experience. I went with my girlfriend and was a good way to sight see and be more independent in Madrid.Raquel was very sweet and very helpful. She provided us with a great tips. She was also very accommodating and helped us with a mistake we made with our Metro tickets. The apartment was roomy and cozy and the place was very near the Metro so it was very convenient to go to different places. Thank you Raquel!Very well located in town. Close to public transportation . Raquel was so sweet and helpful from beginning to end. Gave us tones of information, advices, ... A pleasure to meet ! Nice flat right next to the metro. Plus the host was very helpful and made me feel right at home.The apartment was perfect! Everything was like in the description, the most important thing for me was that the room was really very clean!!! It was very cozy, beds were with very good mattreses, that is very important as we could rest during the night after the whole day spent in the capital of this wonderful country! 

The location was excellent, very close to the city center, so close that we almost did not use the metro. But if you'd like to use it, the metro station is 20 meters far from the house!

Of course, I cannot but say that Raquel is a very good person, communicative, kind and nice! She met us with a smile on her face, and we immediately felt like at home! It was a great pleasure to get acquainted with such a hospitable lady!

I would recommend everybody to stay in the apartment of Raquel, if they want to visit Madrid!

Everything was great! Thanks a lot! Minha passagem por Madrid foi ótima. Agradeço a Rozana e a Raquel pela atenção dispensada. Foi minha primeira experiência no às irbnb e posso dizer que foi muito boa.Очень понравилось, ЧИСТО!, комфортно, рядом с метро. Правда нужно прочитать много правил. Есть полотенца! 
Very clean and comfortable apartement, close to metro! Clean towels are offered+! I would advise it to everyone who needs a good place to stay in Madrid. But before you need to read a long liste of rules! Good value for Madrid, well located.
The street very near is a bit noisy.My first experience with airbnb could not be better. I stayed with my mother's apartment Rachel and loved. The apartment is well located, a few meters from the subway, things are very well organized and clean.
Thanks Rachel for the excellent service. I recommend.
Vitor JustinianoCheap and near the Metro. Just right for my quick stay. Didnt get to meet Raquel but someone was there to receive me when i arrived.She was there when I got there. The place was clean. She was very nice and welcoming. Right by a metro stop. Pretty much as described. A great experience!Todo muy bien.Muy buena persona y ambiente!Very disappointed. Far from the airport. Stairs not lighted, was told to start moving so light will come on. Went up 3flights of stairs. The apartment had a strong smell of paint. Had to open the windows to let some fresh air, and had to bear with the noisy traffic below the whole night. There was also a musty odor, bothered my husband who has asthma. The àpartment is an old building. Kitchen disorganized, bathroom not clean, bedroom door did not lock, front door key was a struggle. We left first thing in the morning.Raquel was very anxious in doing everything alright. 
The rooms could not be closed and the look was broken, so the door was not easy to close too. 
Finally for two nights absolutely okay. I stayed for a week in this apartment.  Whilst it is quite basic, it is clean, convenient (one minute from the Metro station - 10-15 minutes to the centre of the city), and gave me access to a kitchen and living room.

If you are not used to street noises, this may not be for you.  But for anyone else, the busy street sounds were no more disruptive than what I am used (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication with Raquel was clear and her sister welcomed me on arrival to let me have the keys and show me around.

All those who have reviewed this negatively don't seem to be familiar with the concept of getting what you pay for.  They seem to expect luxury for a tiny fraction of the usual price of luxury!Racquel and her sister Rosanna are great Air bnb hosts. From the initial booking to check-in, it all went very easily and pleasantly. The apartment itself in a great location right beside the Urgel metro stop and many local amenities. They even juggled some bookings around and allowed us extend our stay by another night, for which we we're very appreciative. We have no problems recommending this stay to other travellers. Thanks againLa habitación muy tranquila y cómoda. Gracias Raquel por la excelente estancia.This place is amazing to stay at ! The house is furnished lovely and is so neat and clean! We loved our stay 
Very close to metro. Literally just across the street and easy to get in and out of city! 
Our time wouldn't have been the same if we stayed anywhere else it was just too lovely and welcoming :) 
The location is good for touring Madrid.Muy mal olor en la habitación. Mama muy buena! Económica.The house in cold in winter but cheap and colse to the downtown ( with metro)A friend and I stayed here for almost 2 weeks. It is located right next to the bus and the metro which makes for easy access to anywhere you want to go. The apartment (in January) is a little chilly, but if you don't mind bundling up it's not to bad. Also, it is a pretty noisy area, but if you are used to the commotion it shouldn't be a problem. 

Raquel and her sister were absolutely amazing. They let us stay an extra two nights on the last minute, answered any questions we had, and made us feel right at home. I enjoyed my stay here and would recommend this place to anyone looking for an inexpensive place to stay!The flat was easy to find, near metro station to get to the city center. For staying 2 days it was worth it - cheap, use of the kitchen possible and Raquel was friendly.

I would not recommend to stay there intrhe winter, because the kitchen and the living room were very could in january.El apartamento está muy bien, a solo 7 paradas de metro del centro y la parada de metro a 100 metros del portalNice, clean place, not in the best area of Madrid but easy to get around as the metro is just outside the door.Fue agradable, para pasar la noche sin muchas expectativas esta bien. La anfitriona es muy atenta. Se toma muy en serio en Check in y Check out, que no lo estoy criticando, pero les aviso a los próximos anfitriones para que estén atentos. Buen espacio, no super lindo y agradable, pero aceptable. Mucho frió para invierno y mucho calor para verano, gracias a dios estuve en un clima medio primaveral. Lo recomiendo a quienes no sean muy exigentes. Ah, cuenta con una buena sala para ver TV y compartir.Friendly and hepful hostes - the room does the job. The proximity to the tube station is another plus.Room is very big ,
Nice room, very close to the metro station.Raquel's house was a great, cheap place for my friend and I to stay in Madrid. В итоге домой мы попали только благодаря нашим друзьям-испанцам примерно пол первого ночи только. Чем думает хозяйка - не известно. Наверное, если приехать  не ночью, вас все устроит, но ночью приезжать не советую. Короче, все равно все очень странно было и я бы не советовала к этой хозяйке ехать.Sehr gute Lage und ein sehr gutes Preisleistungsverhältnis. Die Wohnung beinhaltet alles man braucht und die Lage ist sehr Zentru (Hidden by Airbnb) ah. Zudem sind einige Sehenswürdigkeiten leicht zu Fuß zu erreichen. Die Kommunikation mit dem Gastgeber funktionierte super! Würde die Wohnung jederzeit wieder buchen!Всё было замечательноRaquel's place is in a great neighbourhood in Madrid, about a 40 minute walk away from the centre but quicker on the metro. however during our trip the metro was out of service so we had to walk it which wasn't bad because it is a lovely walk. 
The bathroom wasn't as good quality as we would have hoped; the shower is tricky as it the head is falling off but not too much of a problem. It was clean and there was a fan in the bedroom which was very useful as there is no air conditioning, yet it was still very hot in the night. The Room has hardly any street noise during the nights as it is on the other side of the apartment. Overall an excellent value for money room in Madrid.We had trouble getting a hold of the host to get in. Once in we had the whole place to ourselves, we never actually met the host. The bathroom was less than ideal, but good enough for what we needed.La habitación es tal cual se ve en las fotos, cuenta con estaciones de metro muy cercanas así como gran cantidad de comercio.The detailed information that Raquel sent us about how to reach the apartment and other stuff was really beneficial. 
The location of the apartment is perfect. Close to the metro line 5 and you have some good shops around you. But in Winter it’s not a good idea to book this room, no heating system and it was already cold! We were there in November and the room was really cold. The apartment has the facilities that you need to cook as well. Recommended in Summer but not when the temperature is below 20 degrees.The location of Raquel’s apartment is perfect, it is close to the metro station or around 40 minutes walk to the city centre. The apartment was really clean but there is no heating. Everything was fine, it is great value for the money.Matching the description: Very close to the Metro and direct bus to the center, clean, fully equipped (hairdryer, kitchen stuff, microwave&oven) It is very minimal but very very good price !! There even is a lounge with cosy couch&tv where you can relax after your day. To put on the heater you must fill in the petrol and push for a few seconds the white button ;) For info we didn’t meet Raquel in person, only her neighbor who didn’t speak English but it wasn’t a problem.Awesome locationLocation is convenient since the flat is right in front of Metro Urgel. Perhaps the place is quite cold for Winter. Could not figure out how to use the portable heater (the flat does not have regular heaters), but there were plenty duvet covers to sleep warm. The price is fair considering the location.Para el precio está muy bien, la ubicación excelente, con una cocina buena y el apartamento tiene mucho espacio. Ya lo dicen en el perfil que no tienen califacción, entonces no nos vino de sorpresa pero por eso no repetiera quedarme en ese alojamiento mientras haga frio porque tuvimos muchisímo frio. Además todo muy bien.AWFUL! The address provided does not include apartment number or floor, so I couldn't buzz in to get in to apartment. On top of that Raquel was at work not answering her phone. Finally, after two hours of waiting outside someone walked in the complex and I asked them if they knew Raquel. Long story short her dad was waiting to check us in, but this was Never communicated. She said her phone died, but it was ringing. Next, the kitchen floor was covered in water, and the dad did nothing to help us clean it up. Also, Urgel is very far from everything and not in the best area of Madrid. Only good thing about it was we had the place to ourselves! Lastly, if you do decide to stay here go to grill kebab just down the street. Best food at very good prices!Nuestra estancia en Madrid fue muy buena. La habitación de Raquel es práctica y tiene todo lo que necesitas para un viaje corto. La comunicación con Raquel fue buena y nos respondió rápidamente siempre. La ubicación del depto también es ideal porque el metro está justo en frente y es muy fácil llegar al centro de Madrid.Raquel has a nice place near the center of Madrid. The metro station is just around the corner so it only takes about 10 min to get to the center. The house is clean and the common space has everything we needed.The place is quite spacious and comfy and, most importantly, very well connected with the center. There is a metro station literally outside the front door, but you can also go downtown on foot - it's a brisk 30-min walk through a beautiful neighborhood. The kitchen is well-equipped, the Wi-Fi is stable and the beds comfortable. The only drawback is poor isolation, so it can be a bit noisy and coldish, but I heard it's the same everywhere in Madrid - they don't expect the weather to be an issue. The heater is a bit tricky to use, but once you figure it out, it's no big deal (turn the knob all the way to the right, GENTLY push the white button and hold until the flame starts burning). The host is really kind and helpful and gave us all the information we needed and even advised us on some cool places to visit. Overall, we felt like home and thoroughly enjoyed our stay, so I would definitely recommend it. A great value for money, too.Great place to stay for a couple of nights. It’s not super new, but clean, nice and really close to metro station. Raquel has been a very helpful host.Un  bon séjour dans un appartement très bien relié au centre. Nous avons été seuls presque toute la semaine (sauf une nuit). 
Attention l'isolation est très faible et les bruits de la rue peuvent gêner si vous avec le sommeil difficile. La communication sur place (à l'accueil) est restreinte à de brefs mots échangés (seulement en espagnol) 
Malgré ces petits points (qui ne nous ont personnellement pas dérangés) nous avons passé une agréable semaine dans cet appartement que je recommande si vous chercher un endroit où séjourner à 2 dans Madrid pour un prix bas.AWFUL!!!! I would never want my children, siblings, or friends staying in this location. It is one of the highest crime areas. The neighborhood is very rough and not a safe area. The house had not been touched for over five years it was dirty and needed many repairs! The host took forever to respond for check in and never responded when we couldn’t get the key to work. She was not kind nor did she want to help. It also states she speaks English and this was not the case. This place was close to the Metro but however was not close to anything else. I would never stay here again nor would I advice anyone else to.Very nice for what you pay. The location is right next to the public transportation and about 15 minutes to central part of town. The only minor pitfalls are the bathroom is old and the street the apartment is on can be noisy. Would definitely stay again.Raqul非常的友好｡房间很整洁,但是晚上会有一些吵｡离地铁站非常的近시내와 떨어져 있지만 그래도 가깝고 조용하고 잘지내다 갑니다The environment was very welcoming, in general was clean, spacious and full privace. The highlight of this apartment is its location, very close to the subwayGreat place, well located relatively close to the centre but surrounded by public transport. Kind host and helpful people, then there is the price, would highly recommend. El hogar está bien ubicado, el metro está a una cuadra que conecta al centro de madrid. La casa es antigua, en mi experiencia personal tuve un inconveniente que Raquel solucionó muy rápidamente y estuvo atenta todo el momento. Respondió siempre muy rápido los mensajes y la comunicación fue excelente. Una buena persona. The Flat is very close to metro station and has the best connections to all the touristic places. You can find supermarket and many places to eat. It’s the best place for hassle free Madrid travel.We had some trouble getting into the room, since we were told to ring the bell somewhere else and they know what to do. We rang the bell 5 times before someone opened the door and a woman came to us asking us in spanish what we want (i guess, since we don't speak spanish). After about half an hour she got called and let us into the room, where she started cleaning then for another half hour. We didnt know what to do at that time and were waiting to get the keys. It felt like we were not expected to come.

The rooms itself were kinda ok except the bathroom... Wasnt very clean at all and we had to find a solution to take a shower. The area around was good since we could eat there and take the Metro.Very well located place,  just right next to the Urgel metro station, many shops and restaurants around. Place was very clean and tidy.Well located, and with lots of transport options, but expect it to look a little more run down than the photos suggest. Just to fill in some details that are missing from the description - the apartment is on the first floor and there is no lift in the building. It's also located on a main road, so noise comes in from the street through the common areas and bedroom throughout the night. A good place to stay if you need somewhere only to sleep that won't cost you an arm and a leg.Emplacement bien situé car c'est près du centre de Madrid et métro à porté de main.Очень удобное расположение, прямо у метро. Квартира хорошо оснащена, много посуды, есть моющие средства. Хозяйка помогла с возникшей проблемой, за что мы ей очень благодарны)Una linda experiencia,pensamos volver!ｺｽﾊﾟが最高です｡Gostei muito da minha estadia em Madrid, apesar de não ter mais ninguém no apartamento para conversar e dar dicas de locais pra visitar. Fui bem recebida, espaço limpo, charmoso, muito próximo a estação de metrô.. muito comércio no entorno e fácil acesso!! Muito bom, recomendo !!Por el precio que tiene la habitación no esperábamos ningún palacio, pero aún así nos decepcionó un poco ver que la habitación no tenía cerrojo y la puerta no cierra bien. Aunque no hubo nadie en el piso, no nos gustaba la idea de dejar nuestras cosas sin protección. 
Además, hubo detalles que no acabaron de gustarnos, como que no había papel higiénico en el baño y que al llegar no se nos informó de nada.
Por último, nos pusimos en contacto con Raquel para una pequeña consulta y no obtuvimos respuesta.
Por estos detalles, yo no volvería a alojarme aquí.The host canceled this reservation 23 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.The host canceled this reservation 50 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.We were expecting to have company daily, but ended up having the whole apartment to ourselves 9/11 days. The area is nice and nearby the central. The apartment was in ok condition, it was little bit chilly indoors but we had a heater in our room. We enjoyed our stay and it was better than we expected. Affordable and functional option! :)ubicación perfectaWe loved staying here.we ended up having the apartment to ourselves most of the time.great amenities nearby and easy access to metro which then only took 10 minutes to reach Madrid centre.Excelente lugar para hospedarse, una buena oferta para quien busca hospedarse en madrid por un precio razonable!This is a good place for the price. Very easy to locate. A quick means to everywhere in the city of Madrid. Internet and few other thing for light cooking are readily available. I recommend here for anyone who like privacy and quiet environment.Place is exactly as shown in the images. Feels very cozy. Raquel is amazing and gave us many tips of where to go and what to do. Was helpful and very quick to respond!Fue muy fácil llegar, estaba todo limpio y tal cual como se describe, me gustó especialmente la privacidad.Perfecto !Muy bienPiso muy limpio y muy bueno en relación calidad-precio.

comments:
The room is very good, with all necessary for an enjoyable stay, with also a good parfum in it. The bathrooms are okay. In conclusion, I advice this option for who wants to stay in Madrid for holidayEl apartamento está "super". Justo al lado de la estación para coger tren. Todo limpio y recién pintado. Me recordó los cuartos de hotel que solía utilizar.Hola Alberto muy lindo el piso, limpio y cómodo lugar. Ustedes nos atendieron muy bien !.. volveremos !!!Los anfitriones son muy amables y atentos y la ubicación es perfecta. Gracias!Tiene una muy buena ubicación, el apartamento es muy agradable y muy ordenado!Este lugar es cómodo,Alberto and Paula are the loveliest folks and their apartment is beautiful. It’s obvious that they care a lot about providing an amazing experience for their guests :)Excelente ubicación, hermoso departamento,  cómodo y limpio.
Y Alberto y Paula fueron muy gentiles con ciertas cuestiones que solicitamos y fuerom muy amables y serviciales.Muy buen ubicado y muy limpio. Alberto gave us very detailed instructions to find the building. The room was comfortable and everything was clean. The wifi worked great and the spacious shower had plenty of hot water.Nuestra experiencia ha sido muy recomendable. Alberto y Paula son muy amables, nos hemos sentido como en casa. El apartamento estaba impecable y agradecemos los pequeños detalles, como las toallas o las mantas que nos han proporcionado. Aunque solo hemos estado una noche, solo podemos comentar aspectos positivos de nuestra estancia. Pensamos repetir.Alberto and Paula are great! They are extremely welcoming and take fully care of you and all your needs! Will definitely stay with them again if I come back to Madrid!Paula y Alberto fueron muy buenos hosts. El lugar está bien céntrico, bonito y cómodo.Alberto is a super host. He receives you like one of his friends. His hospitality has no price.  I would stay here again next time. Room is excellent as well as the whole appartment and area. Totally satisfied.Alberto es un host muy amable, genera confianza al primer contacto y se respira un aire muy tranquilo en su casa. El transporte público y regional desde allí es excelente. 100% recomendable.Recomiendo la casa de Alberto sin lugar a dudas, destacar la hospitalidad, acogida y amabilidad, a pesar de la hora de llegada, que era una hora fuera de lo que se considera normal, la estancia y  limpieza inmejorable. y la ubicación no podía ser mejor, frente a la estación de atocha. Un diez para Alberto, pienso volver si el lo acepta, ya que fui yo la que cometió imprudencias....Un abrazo Alberto.Demasiado recomendado, Alberto fué un host increíble estuvo pendiente de mi llegada incluso desde que salí de Colombia, su apartamento es demasiado aseado y acogedor, estuvo solucionando nuestras dudas a cerca de la ciudad y aparte de todo los tenía preparados mapas para hacer más fácil nuestro recorrido por la ciudad. A demás de todo lo anterior la ubicación es demasiado central y a 2 minutos está la estación de trenAlberto ha sido super hospitalario! Repetiría sin duda!!Alberto ha sido muy amable y todo ha ido a la perfección. A destacar su manera de gestionar los residuos, que más gente debería de haber como ellos, y la proximidad con Atocha, sin duda repetiremos.Alberto y Paula fueron muy amables! Se adaptaron a nuestros horarios. Son muy detallistas y nos dejaron bebida, chocolatitos y mapas en la habitación. También disponíamos de café, te, shampoo y jabón de ducha. Altamente recomendable!!Amazing choice by atocha. Would recommend it to anyone passing by!Me he sentido genial en casa de Alberto! Todo super limpio y ordenado. Alberto es muy atento y simpático te hace sentir totalmente como en casa! Buenísima ubicación justo al lado de la Estación de Atocha. Ojalá poder volver en mis futuros viajes a Madrid!Wonderful hosts and clean, quiet room that is centrally locates!Todo estupendo con el alojamiento de Alberto, situado en un muy buen sitio de Madrid, cerca de todo donde se puede ir andando y muy buen comunicado con metro, bus, cercanías y alta velocidad. Muy limpio y con detalles a la llegada. Alberto se adaptó a la hora de mi llegada y de mi partida. Un 10 para Alberto!!Alberto and Paula's place is really nice! We couldn't have been luckier to find it!
The room is really cozy, clean and warm. We had everything we need, such as access to the kitchen, the living room, and a good bathroom. It's close to the Atocha station, so really easy to go anywhere you want in the city and to the airport too. You can also go to many touristic places by foot - the Reina Sofia museum and the Prado museum are really close!
Besides all that, we had a great time with Alberto, who helped us with everything and showed us good spots to visit, eat and drink! We recommend it strongly! :)
Thank you so much for the stay! Obrigada, te esperamos no Brasil!Alberto es una persona super agradable y hace todo lo que este a su alcance para que tengas una excelente estadía. El lugar está muy limpio y es muy cómodo. La ubicación es inmejorable. Super recomendableAlberto was very responsive and helpful. The place is quiet, spacious and located in a very convenient central suburb, just a stone throw from the train station. Very good value for moneyExcelente!

comments:
Muy recomendable. Sin dudas volvería. Ideal para una pareja o para un viaje de negocios.  Saludos.Amazing, thank you!A very nice studio located in a very quite street, very close to supermarkets, restaurants and malls.  A perfect place for couples. I definitely recommend this place for your upcoming trip.Great location and price. Perfect for sightseeing as an option to hotels.Gabriel. Persona muy atenta dispuesta a responder todas tus inquietudes a tiempo 
El piso muy bien ubicado a 2 cuadras de la estación del metro lista, Goya la zona de Salamanca es insuperable por sus restaurantes, tiendas, y sitios  nocturnos súper seguro, el piso limpio tranquilo seguro con todo lo que se necesita. Recomendado 100%Perfect stay for my parents who were visiting. Hosts made sure there were no problems and the apartment is in an ideal location to see all Madrid's main attractions.Aceptable, graciasL’appartamento rispetta in pieno la descrizione, spazio piccolo ma ben utilizzato, silenzioso, situato in un bel quartiere ben servito dal trasporto pubblico con molti ristoranti, locali vari, negozi etc. da mettere nella lista dei preferiti.The location seemed good, we found it quite easy to move about by metro and walking and there were a few bars in the area if you didn’t want to go too far.

For us the apartment was a little on the small side even for two people, and the amenities were a little more basic than I expected from the photos so not such a cosy relaxing place, but it was ok as a base to visit the city if you intend to be out most of the time. Clever use of such a small space divided into seating, kitchen, bed and bathroom areas (no windows with any outside view) but looked bigger in the photos. 

Comfortable bed (but be aware there is hardly any room around the bed to move about and yet lots of wardrobe space which maybe isn’t necessary if people only visit for a few days mostly), functional and clean bathroom and small kitchen area to do the basics. 

Communication prior to the stay was good, and there was a housekeeper there to let us in which in some ways is a personal touch but she could not speak English so there was no real benefit to that (but then we cannot speak Spanish so perhaps the fault is ours).

The apartment performs ok, no real issues just small niggles, it’s clean and safe and it is ok as a base.

comments: Buena ubicación, al lado del Retiro, y al mismo tiempo muy tranquila. La casa es muy grande y de lujo. Muy confortable. Repetiremos sin dudarlo.NGreat place to stay in and close to pretty much everything. 100% recommended.Just perfectThe place was clean, stylish and the host was superbWe spent 22 days in Federicos’s place.  The apartment is very spacious, confortable and located in an excellent, and perhaps the best, area of Madrid.  The number of stores, restaurants, pastry shops is incredible and the quality excellent.  In addition, numerous buses and subway connect you easily to any other district in Madrid.  Federico was an excellent host and responded very quickly to a few issues that we had.  I would recommend this apartment when visiting Madrid.

comments:
La habitación estaba muy sucia y todo en general muy descuidado. Los únicos puntos positivos que vi fue que el sitio es céntrico y el perro es muy simpático y tranquilo. Uno de los grades inconvenientes que vi es que no me dio las llaves y me estuvo llamando porque se iba a ir a dormir. Eso hizo que limitara mucho mi disfrute en Madrid.Muy amable y cordial. Gracias!!Ekaterina y Beethoven son excelentes anfitriones, el lugar con excelente ubicación , cerca del corazón madrileño y a un precio muy razonable. La habitación muy adecuada para una estancia breve, todo limpio y  adecuado.
La recomiendo 100%El alojamiento de ekaterina es excelente para un solo viajero, puede ser pequeña la habitación pero lo compensa con creces el hecho de que queda a minutos de caminata de todas las cosas buenas de Madrid 

No tuve que usar el metro más que cuando ya me aburría de caminar 

Su perro es hermoso y recomiendo ampliamente su hospedajeun piso céntrico, amable anfitriona y calidad precioAlojamiento muy recomendable !!!Muchas gracias por acojerme la pasada noche! Pase poco tiempo en casa de Ekaterina, pero todo ok. Muy maja. No tuve ningún problema! La zona inmejorable, y el precio también genial. Lo único que le recomendaría es que pusiese un somier un poco más largo.Fue un placer alojarme en el departamento de Ekaterina. A pesar de estar saliendo de una intervención quirúrgica, Ekaterina estuvo pendiente y atenta para que mi estadía pudiera ser excelente. La ubicación es perfecta y la relación costo-beneficio es inmejorable.Fui por visita a Madrid y me hospede en casa de Ekaterina. Muy buena comunicación desde antes de llegar, atenta y dispuesta a ayudarte o informarte en lo necesario. Me sentí muy a gusto en su casa. Es muy simpática y Beethoven es un encanto, se porto genial. Recomendable 100%.Katerina was one of the most friendly people I have ever met...perfect host and I would definitely recommend and stay on my return to MadridSitio minúsculo para ir a dormir, muy céntrico, pero sin salón ni buenas condiciones en la cocina. Baño grande y limpio. Ekaterina es agradableGood person and good dog.Una persona inmejorable, junto a su amiguito de 4 patas!La anfitriona muy maja y con buena conversación. La habitación justita como en la foto pero para dormir suficiente. La limpieza se puede mejorar. Beethoven, su perro muy dócil y silencioso.Ekaterina es una anfitriona estupenda. Te hace sentir como si estuvieras en tu propia casa, con total libertad, pero a la vez estando totalmente disponible y recibiéndote como la mejor de sus visitas.
Ha sido un auténtico acierto reservar con ella.
Muchas gracias por todo, Ekaterina.
Y un abrazo enorme a Beethoven Muy bien situado parada de metro de chueca al ladoUna persona muy atenta y muy agradable es una gran anfitriona, la recomiendoPiso muy bien situado y anfitriona muy majaEncantada con mi estancia! Súper amable, muy cercana, espero volver pronto! Gracias!!Отличное расположение.Квартира находится рядом с центральной улицей ГРАН-ВИА.Все основные достопримечательности в пешей доступности.Екатерина очень доброжелательна и гостеприимна.Estupenda ubicación y maravillosa hospitalidad de Ekaterina.La habitación es exactamente como se pinta, ni más ni menos. La atención que recibí de Ekaterina fue muy buena, Bethoven es un chico muy educado y la ubicación está inmejorable. Ekaterina y Netjoven me acompañaron por la mañana a tomar el autobus para el aeropuerto y me recomendó lugares para visitar.La hospitalidad de Ekaterina y Beethoven fue inmejorable, no tengo ninguna queja.The room is exactly as advertised. The check-in process was easy and was even allowed to do so a few hours early due to my flight time. The dog Beethoven was one of the highlights of the stay as he was very friendly. The room is good for a solo traveller and includes everything you might need such as soap, maps, towels, etc. The only aspect I would say needs any improvement would be the cleanliness as there was some dog hair on the comforter but not a big issue as is to be expected with a dog. Would highly recommend to anyone staying in Madrid!Aunque no pasé mucho tiempo en la habitación de Ekaterina, fue todo lo que necesito. El apartamento está ubicado en un barrio muy interesante y divertido para explorar y el perro Beethoven es genial!

Although I didn't stay very long at Ekaterina's place, it was everything I needed. The apartment is located in a very interesting and fun to explore neighborhood, and I loved her dog Beethoven!Gracias Ekaterina y a Bethoven por compartir su casa conmigo.Es una habitación coqueta, bien cuidada, con acceso al baño justo enfrente.  Muy céntrico.Situado en Chueca, barrio muy animado, pero en una calle muy tranquila a sólo un paso de la zona más activa, cerquísima del metro Chueca y no muy lejos caminando  del centro de Madrid.
Ekaterina es muy maja y su mascota un cielo,  un perro muy tranquilo, aunque eso sí, de pelo largo que despelucha mucho.
La habitación es pequeñita, para una persona, lo justo para dormir y poco más. Decorada con personalidad.
Las zonas comunes también son menudas, la cocina chiquitita y con poco espacio si quieres comer allí, pero la oferta de restauración en la zona es muy variada y Ekaterina te sugerírá algún sitio bueno y económico.
Hay que tener presente que está situado dentro de una zona de fuerte restricción de entrada y circulación de vehículos, Madrid Central (la almendra de Madrid).Ekaterina era la anfitriona perfecta. Y Beethoven es una preciosidad. La habitacion es perfecta para un viajero que quiera una estancia tranquila en el corazon de Madrid. La ubicacion es inmejorable. 

Ekaterina is the perfect hostess and her companion Beethoven is beautiful. The room is perfect for a single traveller who wants a quiet room in the very heart of Madrid. The beds were great and we loved the heated floors.  It is on the second floor but there is an elevator available.  There is a full kitchen- we made several dinners and daily breakfast.  There is a large grocery store just 50 yards down the street in the lower level of the El Cortes Ingles. However  there are plenty of amazing restaurants in the area.  The apartment is located in the heart of Old Madrid easily with walking distances of most major tourist attractions.  We had an amazing view of the Puerta del Sol for the show and fireworks on New Year's Eve.  There is some street noise but actually is very low considering how close you are to the street.  The blinds and shutters can jeep out the street lights at night.  Neither noise or light kept us from sleeping well. The apartment is in a pedestrian zone so you will have to coordinate a pick up point with any drivers or tours out of the city.  If you do have a car there is an underground parking lot just a block away.  This apartment provided a great living space for our family of 6.  There are 4 TVs, Wifi, and a Sonos system throughout the house. I also have to thank our host Juan Garcia, who waited 2hours to meet us as we had some travel delays.  I would highly recommend this apartment.L'appartement est magnifique et très bien situé à Madrid. Nous avons énormément apprécié notre séjour. Notre hôte était toujours disponible et très serviable. The home was well designed and beautifully laid out. 

We had 5 females in one home and it met all of our needs.This was the best Airbnb experience we have ever had. Every single aspect of this place exceeded our expectations. For our family of for( with 2 teenagers) it was the perfect location. Easy access to everything. 

First and foremost, the place had a very modern design, while feeling historic at the same time. Every single outlet had USB outlets as well. Every room had its own sonos speaker and tablet. Every room had TVs (although we never turned them on), the kitchen was well stocked and had coffee, tea, milk and biscuits. The bathrooms had all toiletries, as well as bath sheets. The amenities and touches made this better than a 5 star hotel.  I have never had that level of service before.

We communicated well and were met on time. We were also told that we could access the team at any time for recommendations, help, anything we needed. 

What we loved most was being able to open the doors and hear the music from the street below. This might not be for everyone, but one morning, it was a 7 piece orchestra, another time, a man with a guitar, another time, a trio playing traditional Spanish songs. It made for a highly musical and magical adventure.

Another part that was brilliant was our proximity to Plaza del Sol and all of the restaurants, transportation, and sites within a stones throw.

房间装修非常时尚､现代,居家想要的一切全都有,冷暖空调､保险箱､洗烘干一体机､胶囊咖啡机､洗碗机､音响､烧水壶､各种锅具碗碟,足够中国老母亲做一顿丰盛的中国餐,调料品自己去商场买就可以｡卫浴设施很赞,浴缸没用上,淋雨出水量大温度舒服,洗漱用品是tous牌子,瓶盖上都是小熊造型｡房东赠送的胶囊咖啡和纯净水很有心｡Best ai (Website hidden by Airbnb) have ever experienced! comments:
L'appartamento é cosí come appare in foto: praticamente nuovo, molto accogliete e pulito inoltre molto centrale; a pochi minuti da gran via. Antonio é stato puntuale e di grande aiuto per le indicazioni sulla città. Lo raccomando sicuramente!L’appartement d’Antonio est idéalement situé, nous avons tout pu faire à pied. Pour venir de l’aéroport, l’arrêt de métro est également tout proche.
Le quartier est très vivement mais malgré cela l’appartement est au calme. Les équipements sont neufs et très fonctionnels.
Nous vous recommandons l’appartement d’Antonio pour votre séjour à Madrid !È la seconda volta che alloggio a Los Flamencos, e confermo che è un appartamento perfetto sia per la posizione ( molto centrale a 2 minuti da Gran Via ) sia per lo stile dell’arredamento ( molto caldo e accogliente ) quanto per l’accoglienza ricevuta.
TOTALMENTE CONSIGLIATO, merita!è la terza volta che alloggio in questa casa, tutto perfetto come sempre!
totalmente consigliato!ogni volta che viaggio a Madrid per lavoro soggiorno in questo appartamento.
tutto perfetto come sempre: accogliente, pulito e molto centrale!Perfect place, near to “Gran Via”. The house is nice and confortable. Cleaning and hospitality were exceptional. The house had all that we need. Thank you AntonioPrecioso alojamiento y excelentes anfitriones. Todo estaba super limpio, muy bien decorado . Cuidado al mínimo detalle, incluso nos habían dejado unas cápsulas para el café  y unos caramelitos ( también había en un armario azucar, sal, aceite, vinagre y diversas especias) . Nos hicieron nuestra estancia muy cómoda, responden al momento y hasta nos dejaron salir más tarde de las 12. La verdad que para nosotros han estado de 10! Estamos deseando repetir!!! un saludo!perfetto come sempre!O apartamento de Antonio fica localizado no melhor lugar da cidade de Madrid para quem pretende comhecer os principais pontos turísticos e também o centro de Madrid, o apartamento fica numa rua paralela à gran via ao lado da Primark, foi a melhor escolha que fiz.

Repetiré cada vez que tenga que ir a Madrid. ExcelenteEmpiezo por lo malo: Simplemente un detalle, tan fácil de evitar, pero que por alguna razón algunos host... La comunicación es terriblemente mala. Les escribí por airbnb 2 horas antes de llegar, y no respondieron sino hasta 3 horas después. Los detalles de la ubicación y clave de entrada no estaban actualizados, y tampoco respondían por (Hidden by Airbnb) , así que por fortuna me quedaba saldo suficiente para una llamada y (luego de insistir varias veces) contestaron la llamada y me logré ubicar. La clave no era la actual, así que por fortuna alguien me dejó entrar al edificio, y luego otro hospedado me dejó entrar luego de mostrarle mi reserva. En fin, pésima comunicación, les escribí directamente sobre eso, y aún no han respondido jajajaja....

Lo positivo: Excelente ubicación, mejor por ese precio difícil. Apto para el que quiere solo descansar por descubrir MadridIt's a very simple place. However, it's fantastic. Why? It's clean and safe. You are in the middle of Madrid. Everything you do is on foot. The place is very cheap. It worth the price. Madrid hotels, nowadays, are very expensive. Dark side: my room was very hot and with no natural ventilation. Sometimes, other guests are noisy and it bothers. Must climb stairs. Pay attention to the description. They are not hidden anything. It's perfect to lay your boddy after hours and hours walking and having fun through out the city. Last thing: it's a "mocozinho" or a "cafofo". If you are a kind of luxury tourist, you won't like it. Have fun!!!Precio y ubicación excelentes. Perfecto para solamente dormir. Proceso de entrada y salida sumamente sencillo.La ubicación es buena ya que esta muy céntrico y puedes ir a todos lados caminando, tienen la cortesía de ofrecer todo el tiempo que quieras galletas, té y café. Tiene un refrigerador donde puedes guardar tus alimentos y también una pequeña zona de cocina donde hay cubiertos y platos para tus alimentos. El lugar es limpio y cómodo porque te da libertad. Lo único malo es que yo fui  en verano y en mi habitación hacia demasiado calor, teníamos que estar siempre con la puerta abierta. Pero todo lo demás estuvo bien.hubo un malentendido con la asignación de habitación, reservamos una con cama doble y hemos estado cuatro días durmiendo en literas. La ausencia de ventanas hacía el ambiente cargado y muy caluroso. La gestión del error me ha parecido mala ya que no nos ofrecieron solución válida alguna pero bueno, la ubicación es inmejorable así que salvando algunos detalles merece la pena la reserva (si no te cambian la cama claro )Buena estancia para unos días perfecta ubicación para conocer madrid.It’s a hostel set up right in the middle of town and it’s great. Location can’t be beat and the bathrooms are so clean and nice. Also the complementary coffee biscuits!! sooo good! The only only warning  would be that private room K gets reeaallyyy hot. The summer and heat wave going on rn obv don’t help but we had to keep the fan on and door open most of the time to try and cool it down. Other than that, everything else was amazing. I’d stay here again, just in a diff room.Esta super bien ubicado, pero en verano se calienta demasiado la habitacion.Emplacement en plein centre de Madrid, mais en été la chaleur est insupportable à l'intérieur des chambres double, impossible de fermer la porte car ils n'existent pas des fenêtresDie Zimmer haben keine Fenster, deshalb wird es wirklich sehr warm und sticking im Zimmer. Ansonsten kann man für den Preis wirklich nichts sagen. Guter Aufenthalt!Excelente ubicación, excelente limpieza, muy recomendado,sin duda volvería.Bien ubicado. Deberían recibirte el equipaje al menos para guardarlo en un depósito previo al checkin o el día que te vas también poder dejarlo como en cualquier hospedaje..  a las 11am prácticamente nos echaron ni en el pasillo podíamos estar .....Better than most hostels/pensions. Cheap, clean, greatly located. Much better than I expected.Really great location! If you are looking for a place just in the city centre go for it. And as a bonus great price.Nos ofrecieron cama matrimonial, pero no había eso, había un camarote de dos camas, cuarto muy caliente, el sitio muy bien de aseo y con una ubicación inmejorable cerca a todo, para pasar una noche está bienExcelente ubicación, justo para disfrutar de la ciudadDie Lage ist wirklich top! Zentraler geht's eigentlich nicht. Dem Zimmer fehlt halt einfach ein Fenster, aber das weiß man ja vorher. Stattdessen gibt es aber einen Ventilator das ist gut. Check in und out verliefen super und sehr unkompliziert. Besonders erfreulich war die bereitgestellte Auswahl an Teesorten :DMala higieneGreat location, close to subway.  Room smelled molde, my friend and I didn't feel well. Bathrooms are located outside the room. In this accommodation there are other rooms, we were able to count 10 rooms. There are only 2 bathrooms to be shared. We think bathrooms were not clean.Literal la foto. Solo que dice es cama matrimonial y es litera. Más que airbnb esto es un hostal, tienen muchísimas camas A-K y en la mayoría son dobles o más. Solo son dos baños para tantísima gente por lo que tienes que esperar frecuentemente. La habitación como dice no tiene ventanas y es súper caliente que el ventilador que tienen no es suficiente, SUPER CALIENTE. La única área en común, no tiene donde sentarte pero si muchas galletitas y cositas para té y café.  Súper céntrico y fácil acceso.If you do not have any expectation for the room's quality no problem, cause the position of the apartment is great, but the room is very small, and without windows if you want to change the air you have to leave the door open, and basically be in front of everyone that arrives in the apartmentBuenas condiciones, ubicación excelente y mucha veracidad.Everything as described. The location is FANTASTIC!Bien pero al no tener ningún tipo de ventilación en mi habitación y tener q secar las toallas dentro olia a humedad.Super bien ubicado!! 
Precio accesible. Puedes visitar los principales lugares turísticos caminando.Buen sitio y excelente ubicación.El lugar es sencillo tal y cual lo comenta la publicación, excelente ubicaciónSuper clean, quiet and very good located. Our room had a little lake of air (no windows) but it had a fan anyway.El alojamiento está muy bien ubicado. La habitación es tal y como indica la descripción. Genial para un fin de semana. La única pega es que como se comparte el baño no siempre estaba tan limpio como me hubiera gustado al final del día. Se les olvidó dejarnos toallas pero nos lo solucionaron lo antes posible y contestaron muy rápido a los mensajes. Así que en general buen lugar para alojarse en el centro de Madrid a buen precio.Muy buena ubicación para una noche perfecto.Absolument pas ce que j’avais louée ! J’ai réservée une chambre privée avec un lit double et je me suis retrouvée avec un lit superposée, il a fallut négocier 1h30 pour être remboursée car il n’y avait pas d’autre solution. 
A 19h il a fallut trouver un autre logement ! 
L’hôte m’a soutenue coûte que coûte que c’était ce qui était dit des le départ! Heureusement j’ai gardée le reçut avec la preuve de ma location! 
Il y a déjà eu pas mal de pb à ce que j’ai pu lire. 
Alors un conseil méfiez vous, de plus ça ressemble plus à une auberge de jeunesse qu’un airbnb. 
Après bonne emplacement非常に良い立地です｡We loved it here! Amazing location, great ammenities with coffee, tea and biscuits and no noise from the loud streets at night!Muy bien ubicada.Alojamiento de acuerdo con las fotos, buena ubicación y con muchos servicios cercanos.
Todo de acuerdo con lo requerido y muy buen trato.La ubicación es espectacular,  inmejorable! Y el precio muy bueno. Si no eres exigente y quieres pasar un par de días baratos en Madrid esta bien. Ahora si, la habitación en la que estuvimos olía bastante mal (falta de ventilacion) y algunas partes del alojamiento no están muy cuidadas (especialanente el portal y el baño). La limpieza bien.Perfeita localização. Espaço agradável, ótimo x custo benefício. Amamos o café com biscoitinhos a qualquer hora. Banheiro apesar de compartilhado, sempre estava limpo. O únco ponto negativo é que o quarto é bem quente, fui no outono, mas a experiência no verão pode não ser boa no quarto em que ficamos, mas tem outros quartos que parecem melhores.Respetuoso, limpio y muy centralNuestra habitación era muy pequeñita y sin ventanas, pero bueno tal cual se ve en la foto. Estuvimos un par de días, creo que es lo justo para estar allí. La posición espectacular, en la plaza del sol! Si vas a estar todo el día por ahí y vienes para pocos días está bien el alojamiento

amenities: {TV,Wifi,Kitchen,Elevator,"Free street parking","Hot tub",Heating,Washer,Essentials,Hangers,"Laptop friendly workspace","Private entrance","Hot water","Coffee maker",Refrigerator,"Dishes and silverware","Cooking basics"}
comments: Vanesa was a great host! She made check-in super easy even when I arrived later than expected due to train delay and difficulty getting a cab at the station. The apartment is beyond adorable and huge! The pictures do not do it enough justice. The location was great. Plenty of restaurants/bars within walking distance and some great ones on the same street- including a Michelin reviewed restaurant just a few doors dows. The location is also within easy walking distance to the Bernabeu stadium (about 20-30 minutes), a definite plus for any Real Madrid fans. Overall it was a GREAT stay and I would absolutely look forward to staying there again if ever in Madrid again.This is a rare instance where the apartment is actually better in reality than the description or the pictures on AirBNB. It is stylish,  comfortable and almost perfect condition - the living room is artfully decorated and airy with two nice balcony windows - a fully equipped kitchen,  and a comfortable work niche (perfect for business travelers like me). The bedroom was actually Quiet - windows on an inner courtyard - and graced with a relaxing jacuzzi that was a welcome respite at end of day. I slept better here than I have in weeks. The apartment is located in a “good” building in an area of the city that’s like Madrid’s  “upper west side” - but with the more funky Latina area as well as the major museums only a  20 minute metro away by metro. But don’t get me wrong  - there are plenty of swank bars, restaurants and cafes right nearby, including a great Italian restaurant just outside the building door. For travelers that appreciate being in the center of the city but want a bit more comfort and space, this is perfect - and Vanessa was a great host too! Thanks Vanessa!Amazing place in a perfect location and with a lovely owner! The apartment is very stylish with a beautiful furniture and a perfect bath!! It is placed in a street full of restaurants and bars whereas very well isolated from the outside noises. At the same time, the Madrid opera is 6 minutes by tube and the city center is at arm’s reach. Moreover, Vanesa is super welcoming and moves mountains to accommodate you. Her communication is swift and smile from ear to ear. Overall, highly recommended, especially, for work and probably couples!Excelente alojamiento,, lo recomiendoVery large. high ceilings, and well lit living room (large balcony windows), with very comfortable couch and stylish decoration. The  neighborhood is great. Lively yet safe, with tons of restaurants and bars to enjoy tapas. Having the jacuzzi/shower in the bedroom was interesting. Definitely a plus for couples staying at the place. I would definitely return!

comments:
muy bien el lugar, graciasThe host canceled this reservation 176 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.It was a wonderful stay and close to all attractionsMuy bien situado, cerca de la boca de metro, acogedor y cómodo y muy buen trato de los anfitriones. Muy contenta, volvería sin duda!!Cozy little apartment walk-close to the center of Madrid. Communication with the host was good, however they don’t speak English there was no problem. The place was sparkling clean and worth the trip.Buena ubicación, limpio, trato agradable directo y rápido. El único pero (aunque pequeñito) es que es un tercer piso sin ascensor (eso no descalifica para nada el alojamiento). Buenísima relación calidad precio.El piso se encuentra en Lavapiés, muy cerca del merto, además de tener varias opciones para salir a comer / tomar algo. El piso está ásmuy bien cuidado y limpio.  Además tiene un aire acondicionado en cada habitación, muy recomendab.leThe stay was perfect. The flat is very clean and very close to the city centre. Highly recommended if you are looking for a flat for a few days stay in Madrid.Super Lage! zu bestem Preis! Sehr sauber und modern. Zu zweit perfekt. Ausziehcouch für zwei weitere Personen nicht bequem zum Schlafen. Sehr ruhig obwohl zentrale Lage!Esperaba un alojamiento en un hospedaje familiar y no un alquiler de piso despersonalizado, nunca conocimos al dueño, nos entregó la llave la mujer que hace la limpieza y a nuestra salida simplemente recibimos un mensaje para dejar las llaves en la sala.  
Dos días antes de llegar, recibí un mensaje de cambio de dirección, a una cuadra del original, porque supuestamente hubo un error en el sistema de registro.  
El piso estuvo bastante bien en cuanto a limpieza y espacio (aunque la ducha es realmente pequeña) pero si resultó una molestia la cercanía de otros inquilinos en el mismo inmueble por la bulla en las noches y el olor de la comida que preparabanNice place to stay, near the center.Very clean and Perfect localisation near to everythingVery near to Lavapiés metro station and most tourist places are quite near. But be careful, the place is quite small compared to the picture and only enough for 2 people max.Отличная квартира в самом центре мадрида. Идеальное сочетание цена/качество. Апартаменты маленькие но очень емкие и продуманные в деталях: в каждой комнате сплит, стиралка, микроволновая печ/духовка, приятный запах и чистота. Входную дверь в апартаменты толкать от себя при открытии, может заклинивать.Excellent! Thank you Polaris ☺️房间很小｡卫生间洗澡快转不开身了｡冰箱灶台极其紧凑｡客厅摊开二个行李箱就快没富余地儿了｡房东不出现,被罩枕套需自己现套｡无备用手纸｡洗衣机不干净｡楼下有点儿吵｡电水壶不工作｡有毛巾但没有备用卫生纸｡Great quiet apartment in the heart of Madrid. Metro, grocery stores, attractions nearby. Would stay again!Our family enjoyed the stay. The apartment is good value for money. Very clean and the apartment is well equipped with kitchen utensils and linen. Bonus is the washing machine.Excelentes anfitriones en todo momento siempre estuvieron a nuestra disposicion para resolver el problema ajeno a su voluntad que se género en el apartamento.
Muy preocupados y con buena atención nos consiguieron otro apartamento para terminar nuestra estadía, por fuera de Airbnb porque ésta no nos dió una pronta solución al problema .
Nos sentimos descepcionados con Airbnb y muy agradecidos con nuestros anfitriones.La stanza è carina e pulita. I proprietari gentili e disponibili.
Però è al terzo piano e senza ascensore, la scala di legno è consumata ed irregolare e dopo una giornata a piedi si fa sentire.
L’appartamento e piccolo, va bene per due persone . Noi in tre eravamo un po’ sacrificati. 
Il bagno è più piccolo ancora e privo di bidet. 
Colazione non compresa.
Nel complesso ci sta, il prezzo pagato era più basso della media. Comunque lo consiglio a chi vuole risparmiareEs un apartamento pequeño, perfecto para dos personas. Muy cómodo y céntrico, que es lo que se busca en cualquier viaje a Madrid. Estupendo trato de los anfitriones. Sin duda, para repetir.
