comments:
buenísima ubicación centro madrid, buen recibimiento de Pedro, piso espacioso que no le falta nada, metro, restaurantes, de todo.El piso corresponde con la descripción perfectamente.
La limpieza y la ubicación son perfectas.
Pedro como anfitrión me resolvió todas las dudas
Gracias, volveré a utilizarlo en mi próxima visita a Madrid.L'appartement de Pedro est formidable. Il est idéalement situé en plein centre de Madrid, à la plaza Provincia tout près de la Plaza Mayor, 5 mn de la Puerta del sol, toutes les visites peuvent se faire à pied et pour faire des visites plus loin metro et bus à côté.
L'appartement correspond parfaitement à la description, décoration vintage et d'une propreté irréprochable.
Pedro ne  sais quoi faire pour satisfaire ses visiteurs, il nous a donné pleins d'excellents conseils.
Adresse à retenir pour tous ceux qui veulent visiter Madrid.
Merci encore Pedro pour ton accueil chaleureuxВ 2016 году в первую неделю января мы посетили Мадрид. Из многих предложений выбрали Piso Plaza Mayor-Sol и остались очень довольны. Отличная квартира из 4 комнат с отдельными кухней и ванной на 4 этаже старинного дома, входящего в исторический комплекс Plaza Mayor. Вид из окна замечательный на plaza Provincia. Гостеприимный и радушный хозяин квартиры Педро ждал нас у подъезда, помог донести чемоданы, приготовил продукты для завтрака, угостил вином и фруктами. Кухня полностью оборудована для приготовления пищи. В квартире очень чисто, красиво, все полностью соответствует описанию. После обеда Педро провел с нами прогулку по центру  Мадрида, подробно рассказал об исторических местах. В дальнейшем всегда был на связи и был готов помочь и ответить на любой вопрос. Квартира удобно расположена в самом центре в 5 минутах от метро Sol, рядом с Puerta de Sol, откуда можно попасть на центральные улицы города и где останавливаются два маршрута туристического автобуса, кварталом La Latina и другими достопримечательностями. Мы хотели бы еще раз вернуться сюда и рекомендуем эту квартиру и ее замечательного хозяина Педро.Pedro es un magnífico anfitrión. El apartamento tiene una situación perfecta, a un minuto de la plaza mayor y a tres minutos de la puerta del Sol. El piso es muy espacioso (70 metros cuadrados) y todo muy límpio. Pedro nos estaba esperando en la puerta y tenía preparado para nosotros como obsequio de bienvenida una botella de vino, botellas de agua para llevar y una fuente de fruta. ¡Todo un detalle! Y sin olvidar que tenía todo lo necesario para un buen desayuno. Muy recomendable y sin duda, la próxima vez que vengamos a Madrid volveremos a alojarnos en el piso de Pedro.
Muchas gracias por todo.I'd like to say that it is a very lovely flat. Its location is very great, which enables you to reach most of famous tourist spots, and it is also big, clean, warm and good decorated enough. However, the best thing is that Pedro is very kind and generous. He has prepared bread, coffee, water (big bottle for drinking in house and small ones for going out), chocolate powder, juice, wine and fruits for his guests, which really can't be more thoughtful. In one word, Pedro's house is the best during the whole journey of us in Spanish.Fantastic! Very liked this place! Unique view from the window, the best location in the middle of all sightseeing, beautiful house and comfortable flat with original design) Pedro is very good, friendly and polite person! He welcomed us with present (bottle of Spanish wine) it was good surprise!!! We will come back!We had a lovely weekend in Pedro's attractive apartment - in a perfect central location. Pedro was a lovely, warm host who helped us out with bag storage, directions and even a much appreciated bottle of wine! We had a wonderful time staying in Pedro's apartment. He waited for us in the square in order to show us to the place and had a bottle of wine waiting for us as a welcome gift. The apartment is in a prime location and is situated directly beyond Plaza Mayor and is walking distance to many of the major attractions such as the Royal Palace, the San Miguel Market and the Temple of Debod. The apartment had all of the necessary amenities. I would definitely recommend this place when visiting Madrid. We had a very special experience at Pedro's place. We were greeted enthusiastically and shown local information and given a tour of this unique flat. A generous supply of breakfast goodies and a bottle of wine were  set out. The location and views from this flat are superb. Pedro is a great host and I would recommend this flat for anyone wanting a vibrant Madrid experience.spent the weekend in madrid and stayed at pedros 's apartment -
the apartment is lovely and has everything you would need, the balcony overlooks the small plaza and the spanish foreign office,
it is idealy located 50m from plaza mayor and a short walk from
puerto del sol  station, easy walking to the royal palace and the cathedral to the west and the museums prada ,thyssen to the east
it is on the 4th floor with staircase access so bear that in mind if you are not fit 
pedro is the perfect host - he kept us informed of everything we needed before the trip and meeting arrangements 
when we arrived madrid was having a rare rain downpour but he was waiting in the plaza as arranged, he provided a welcome pack of a bottle of wine, with some fruit, cake, bread milk, bottled water etc there is also coffee tea fruit juice butter etc
so if you arrive in the evening and the shops are shut you wont be in need of anything
pedro is a really really charming man who obviously loves his city and wants his guests and visitors to make the most of it.
we could not recommend him as a host more highly  


Our stay in Pedro's "museum"-apartment was fantastic. We enjoyed to discover all the little details in this tidy and neat flat and of course the bottle of wine offered by Pedro. Perfectly located, everything is within reach of a short walk (plaza Mayor, market San Miguel, Puerta del Sol, Latina). Gracias, Pedro. Hasta la próxima!El apartamento es excelente, situado en pleno centro histórico de Madrid, junto a la Plaza Mayor; el lugar perfecto para una visita cultural a la ciudad: Madrid de los Austrias, Palacio Real, Puerta del Sol y también perfecto si quieres aprovechar para hacer unas compras o ir al teatro, pues está a dos pasos del eje comercial y de ocio de Plaza de España/Gran Vía/Callao.

Es además espacioso, acogedor y está decorado con originalidad. Pedro nos lo entregó totalmente limpio.

El propietario es un magnífico anfitrión, que nos recibió con una botella de vino. Y en la cocina, nos dejó fruta, zumo, leche y todo lo necesario para el desayuno.

Sin duda, el apartamento de Pedro lo recomendaré a todos mis amigos.El apartamento de Pedro es perfecto para visitar el centro de Madrid y todos los monumentos importantes de la ciudad: Plaza Mayor casi en la puerta, Palacio Real a un paseo de pocos minutos, la Gran Vía a 5 minutos...

Llegamos perfectamente con sus indicaciones a la Estación de Metro de Sol, que está a menos de 100 metros del piso.

Cuando llegamos nos recibió Pedro con una botella de vino de rioja. En la cocina teníamos todo lo necesario para el desayuno, zumo y fruta.

La limpieza es muy importante para nosotros y el piso estaba realmente limpio. Perfecto.

Pedro nos ayudó en todas nuestras dudas y nos hizo recomendaciones para que nuestro día en Madrid fuera perfecto.

Recomiendo a todo el mundo tanto este apartamento como  a Pedro como anfitriónPedro a été un hôte formidable. Nous avons découvert un appartement plein de charme avec une belle bouteille de vin en guise de bienvenue. Il nous a recommandé les meilleurs adresses de Madrid que ce soit pour profiter de la gastronomie ou de la culture. Pedro a fait tout son possible pour que notre séjour soit parfait et ca a été le cas. L'appartement est comme décrit, très porpre, espacieux avec une jolie décoration et une vue magnifique. Le quartier est parfait pour un séjour à Madrid, plein centre.

Nous reviendrons avec plaisir et je vous recommande l'appartement de Pedro.Pedro  and his place were excellent for our stay in Madrid. He met us right out of the taxi when we arrived and greeted us off when we left. His place is in an excellent location for visiting Madrid, and is very large, clean, modern and comfortable. He welcomes questions about how he can improve your stay or I'd you need advice on where to go or what to do. Pedro's apartment is about the best value for your money you will find in Madrid.This was maybe the best experience I've ever had on airbnb! The apartment was beautiful, clean, with a fantastic, charming view of a small plaza, and in a great location near Plaza del Sol. Pedro greeted me outside the building and helped me upstairs, where coffee and fruit was waiting! The booking process was also super easy - Pedro responded quickly to my booking request and was super communicative. 

Lastly, I will always be grateful to Pedro - I left my purse with my wallet inside in the apartment, and by the next morning he had it shipped overnight to my next destination. Best host ever! Don't even think about staying anywhere else in Madrid!Muy buena ubicación en Madrid centro, con todas las comodidades y Pedro ha sido un excelente anfitrión! Two friends and I have stayed in Pedro’s flat for 3 nights and everything was really great.

First of all, the location can’t be better – in the heart of the city center and in the same time really quiet, which is awesome after a long Spanish fiesta :)
Pedro welcomed us, as we were old friends. The flat was perfectly clean and we had everything we needed (including even coffee!) 

The apartment is lovely – authentic Spanish style, very light and sunny…it really feels like home.

Thank you Pedro for this warm welcome! We will definitely come back soon! :)

The three princesses, 

Kamila, Thais & Vanina

Pedro was a fantastic host, he was always really quick to reply to messages, gave some great suggestions of things to see/do in Madrid and provided a really warm welcome to Madrid. He was really flexible with our early flight time and was able to let us check in early - much appreciated! The apartment is lovely, really clean, comfortable and with a brilliant view into the quiet square. Overall a great experience. Here is the note I sent to Pedro, the owner of the apartment, in whose place we stayed in Madrid:

Pedro,

You and your apartment provided the ultimate Spanish
 experience for us. We had travelled to Barcelona, San Sebastian, Sevilla, Ronda, and then to Madrid. Your apartment and hospitality topped all others. 

I have posted photos of your quaint and central apartment, and the views out the window onto the square, on my (Hidden by Airbnb) page. (Website hidden by Airbnb)  

I loved that you were so helpful from the start. You gave us great suggestions for what to do in Madrid by email, even 
before we  arrived. You left us a bottle of wine (the best) in the apartment, croissants, coffee, and a stocked refrigerator.  Who could ask for more? 

The apartment was clean beyond what we would have ever expected. 

To be so close to Plaza Mayor, on our own little square, with a view of Ministerio de Asuntos Exteriores,
was the so very cool. 

The apartment was incredibly lovely -- it was difficult to experience the view from the window onto the square day and night, and not venture down into the vibrant city of Madrid.

We could walk from the apartment to all sites we wanted to visit with no problem. While Museo del Prado was not our cup of tea, nor was Puerto del Sol, Reina Sofia spoke to us. So close.

We loved exploring all the little alleyways around the apartment and discovered the Plaza Mayor, the Mercado San Miguel, and Las Cuevas De Luis Candelas amazing. We loved Leon V, downstairs. We loved La Mallorquina for pastries, which you told us about. There was a place, a sports bar, on Calle Mayor that had the best paella we had in all of Spain. They made it while we waited, 25 minutes. For anyone who comes to Spain and doesn't eat pork, shellfish, etc. (like me), the chicken paella was the best. I found non-"kosher" dishes nowhere else in Spain.

Pedro, you made us feel so very welcome. I will happily recommend you to anyone  and everyone I know travelling to Madrid.

But really what gave it that extra 'specialness' was Pedro himself. Pedro was extremely communicative, reaching out to me very soon after i booked to ensure everything went smoothly. He made sure we could find the apartment easily, and everything went according to plan. When meeting him at the apartment, he was so kind and helpful, with wonderful information about the local area / getting around, and ensuring we had everything we needed for a comfortable stay. Upon leaving, Pedro met us again, and was just incredibly warm and left such a nice impression with us. Tout est fourni dans l'appart : gel douche, serviettes, shampoing, nécessaire pour petit-déjeuner, 2 jeux de clés et informations touristiques avec plan de la ville, ce qui est très pratique, même s'il y a un office du tourisme à 5 minutes à pied. 
Merci Pedro et peut être à une prochaine fois!非常棒的公寓｡马德里是我们欧洲最后一站｡看到Pedro的公寓我们都想在马德里再呆几天｡非常精致的公寓,Pedro还特地来楼下等我们,送了牛奶和水｡离有名的市场步行5分钟｡值得推荐Pedro is a very attentive host. The best thing is it was right by San Miguel Marcado, which let me warn you, can  cause you to just walk around and eat for half the day... otherwise the amenities are like an old traditional Spanish home, with a view that is just perfect for (Hidden by Airbnb) . Outr family of four arrived on Thursday at 2PM, Pedro allowed us to pick the meeting time.  We parked in the Plaza Mayor garage at his suggestion, using the entrance off from Calle de Atocha.  Unable to use (Hidden by Airbnb) maps in the parking garage, we followed the "Salida" signs and stepped outside and realized we are in the middle of Plaza Mayor.  Just 200 yards away we found Pedro waiting for us outside of his apartment.  He was a warm and genrous host.  After showing us around the apartment, he higlighted sights on a map, and gave us local tips for restaurants.  We also appreciatd the drinks and snacks that he provided.  We found everything in good working order.  This is not a empty hotel room it is a furnished home authentic and lived in that won't appeal to everyone but it worked well for us.  The balcony view of Plaza de la Provincia is stunning as this apartment is on the 4th floor and its location giving access to everything the city has to offer is unparalleled.Pedro was awesome and super nice.His hosting and place were just perfect. Excellent location in th ecentre of the old city right next to the Plaza Mayor with a fantastic view of the Plaza Provincia..Pedro’s apartment was absolutely lovely. It is right in the center of downtown and you can easily return home to it in the middle of the day for a little siesta or to drop things off. Upon reserving the home, Pedro quickly sent us information on the house, how to get there, and recommendations for things to do in the area. There were 4 of us staying there and we did not feel on top of each other in the apartment. At the beginning of the stay, our flight was cancelled leading the 2 of us who had made the reservation unable to get there on the day of check-in. Pedro was very flexible and accommodating in allowing our friends who were already in the country to easily communicate with him and check in for all of us. The kitchen has all of the basic supplies you need for cooking, and Pedro left us a lovely bottle of wine during check-in. As noted in his description, there are a lot of stairs to the apartment, though they were wide enough to easily drag our suitcases up them. Thank you!We were only at Pedro’s for one day. The entrance to the apartment is actually on the Plaza Provisencial plaza. I wasn’t super clear so it took me a while to find. 

When Pedro says stairs, he means stairs. People with big or lots of baggage be warned, the stairs are narrow and many. 

The apartment itself was quaint. I enjoyed the location and space. The apartment itself is older and some of its amenities are dated which I guess is typical of an apartment this near to plaza mayor except that I stayed at an apartment across the street last year which was bigger and with newer features. 

Overall everything was good. The only true complaint i have is that there is an odd smell from what I can assume is the restaurants below. Because of the way the AC is situated, the smell does get into the apartment. Wasn’t a problem after they closed but during opening you can definitely smell the odor.Centrally located & great host!!!Excelente departamento! La ubicación es inmejorable y manejado por una gran personaPedro, es uno de los mejores anfitriones que hemos tenido. 
Lo bueno: El check in fue muy facil, nos esperaba en el departamento y aunque llegamos temprano, nos permitio entrar al departamento ya que estaba disponible. Nos dio consejos para disfrutar nuestra visita en Madrid, a donde ir, donde comer y las precauciones que debiamos tomar.  Nos dejo una botella de vino, folletos de informacion,   los panes, cafe, etc. y hasta nos dio recomendaciones para encontrar un doctor.
Los 2 aires acondicionados que tiene mantuvieron la temperatura del departamento muy agradable mientras la temperatura afuera estaba MUY CALIENTE. 
Cocinamos y tenia todo lo necesario. 
Usamos la lavadora y no tuvimos problemas colgando la ropa en los tendederos que tenia.
La ubicacion del departamento es ideal, esta pegado a la Plaza Mayor y es posible caminar a todas partes desde ahi y aunque esta en un lugar centrico no hay problemas de ruido.

Lo no tan bueno: Tuvimos algunos problemas ajustando la temperatura del agua de la ducha, aunque seguimos las instrucciones de la pared. Cuando creiamos que el agua estaba en la temperatura correcta se volvia o muy fria o muy caliente. Tal vez se afecta si algun vecino esta sacando agua?  
No hay elevador. El departamento esta en el 4to piso pero en realidad es el 5to, porque se cuenta la planta baja y luego empieza con el 1er piso, 2do, etc. Si no te importa subir escaleras, no hay problema. Siendo un edificio historico, no pueden poner elevador.
En general para nosotros lo bueno supera por mucho los detalles problematicos.
Sin duda un excelente experiencia.房子的地理位置很好｡房东也人不错,很热情｡房屋没电梯要搬这一点有点辛苦｡房间的清洁度不够｡Great host of a nice clean spacious apartment in a great location, adjacent to Plaza MayorGreat location just steps away from plaza mayor. Pedro was wonderful from beginning to end.Great location, lots of space and an air conditioner!위치가 너무좋았어요 계단올라가는게 조금힘들긴했지만 대체적으로 만족스러웠습니다We had a wonderful stay in this centrally located Apartment.  I was very surprised and insulted to get a return comment that I was a bad tenant.

Pedro did not like that I touch his books on the book shelf, we had left coins in the laundry and left dirt on the bathroom floor.
He thought I was a lovely lady but thought otherwise after I left.  
He made good $ with us  staying 5 nights.  His expectations are just too high for a tired apartment up 78 steps.The location of this apartment is incredible! It is located right next to Plaza Mayor. comments:
Fantastic place to stay so central to everything you want to see in Madrid 
Check price of a taxi as surprised us it was cheaper to get a taxi back to the airport than struggling with our cases on the metro. Will definitely be back xPros: 

- Great location 
- Apartment is newly renovated - so looks in good shape. Appliances looked almost new. 
- Grocery store is very close - 5 mins walk 
- You can walk to major tourist places from this place and shopping areas. 
- It is great for bachelors who just want to go around the city all day. 
- AC in the apartment works good. 


Cons: 

- Apartment is very small. 
- We felt it wasn’t great value for money. 
- Bathrooms are tiny - if one person goes in - you cannot take kids to change even. 
- No sunlight comes - no windows - there is one which looks to the parking garage. 
- It was not very clean and did not have paper towels. 
- Not for families 
- We travelled with young kids and it wasn’t great experience. 
- We did not know who communicates with us and the person who gave us keys or to whom we returned keys. Or the person who responds on Airbnb. They are all different.We were not allowed to use the main room. Trize tried to get the owner to open it, but after 2 days I went to Airbnb to organise a partial refund. Apart from that the apartment was nice enough.The place was listed as entire apartment and that was the reason I've picked this place but when I arrived to the flat, they told me I will only have one room. So you should double check what are you getting before renting this place. By the way, there is a lot of noise coming from the street, impossible to sleep during the weekend. There is no mirror anywhere in the apartment (including bathroom). All in all, you can find way cheaper options in the same area.Genial apartamento! Grande, limpio, céntrico, ...Appartement très bien situé en plein coeur de Madrid mais chambre côté rue bruyantePara ser honesto, te dicen que son tres habitaciones y son dos. En nuestro caso pagamos por tres y nos falto una habitación, saquen sus propias conclusiones. El lugar estratégico porque está a dos cuadras del Km 0 de Madrid, si llegan a entrar en verano seguro pasarán calor de los tres aires funciona uno. La entrada es por un garaje y si existe una puerta de entrada al edificio. Por qué la persona mayor que te recibe se le ocurre no dar la llave del edificio in intolerante total. 
Bueno saquen sus propias conclusiones.The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.El apartamento está en un lugar privilegiado,cerca de lo más importante de ver en madrid.Ademas de limpio,cómodo,respuestas rápidas del anfitrión para cualquier duda.Volveremos!!Este piso es ideal para visitar Madrid porque está muy bien comunicado pero solo si se va a pernoctar en el puesto que para hacer vida de diario en mi opinión es un poco incómodo

comments: El alojamiento es céntrico, en una zona muy linda, cerca de restaurantes, tiendas y algunos teatros, aunque de noche es muy tranquilo. La zona no es ruidosa. Juan es un anfitrión estupendo y cumple todo lo que ofrece. El huesped siente total independencia. Muy recomendado!The host canceled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.Todo muy buen... piso tranquilo y centricoJuan was very accommodating and helpful. He put up an extra mattress in the room as per my request. Apartment is in  a nice neighborhood and at walking distance to metro, cafes and bars. Room was nice and clean!Juan ha sido un huésped atento y muy agradable. Del apartamento destacar la ubicación y la calidad-precio para dormir en Madrid.This room is awesome. It's in the residential area where all the universities are nearby, so it's pretty quiet, safe, and lively. The house is clean and cozy. It's convenient to go around. Besides, there are two subways stations nearby if you don't feel like walking. The hosts, Juan is the bonus, who is very friendly, helpful and responsible. He speaks English well and always responds to my messages in seconds . Everything went smoothly throughout my stay, and I'd recommend this place to anyone who comes to Madrid. comments:
Muy recomendable! Natalia encantadora, en todo momento estuvo pendiente de nosotros y se preocupo porque nuestra estancia fuera agradable,  el piso tiene todo lo necesario, perfecto para pasar unos dias por Madrid.Logement très sympa, lumineux et assez spacieux.The only good thing this "studio" had, was the view of Madrid and the communication with Natalia. But I have never seen her because I took the keys from the reception. Everything else was awful. First of all this was not an apartment in a house but a hotel room and we reached without knowing it. Everything was dusty. I do not recommend it for people with allergies. All the forks and spoons etc were really dirty and unproperly '' washed'' (ie dried sauce on a "clean"  spoon") and the drawers smelled terrible. The WiFi signal was really really pour almost non existent.  This studio is SO NOT  worth its money.This apartment is very well located, you can access easily by subway, the neighborhood is very safe and quiet, there is a supermarket 15 minutes away walking
The place is very comfortable, clean and the Internet works perfectly, the apartment has all the necessary for a wonderful stay 
Natalia is very friendly and she is always ready to help in case you need somethingLindo estudio, bien cuidado e ideal para ir de paso. La anfitriona muy amable y preocupada en todo momento, se agradece la cercanía.Todo bien y conforme a lo q se anunciaUn alojamiento muy bueno recomiendo muchísimo la anfitriona un encanto para repetirThanks Natalia! I had a great stay in your flat in Madrid. I loved the place; it is a welcoming and peaceful studio close to everything. I would definitely recommend the place to my relatives and friends who usually go to Madrid.
Place is suitable for families, couples and even short group of friends.
I will have to go back in summer as I had a look to the swimming pool and i imagine the sunset on the roof terrace.No hay division en habitacionesRecomendable, muy buena relación calidad-precio. Y la anfitriona es un 10, estuvo muy pendiente de nuestra comodidad durante la estancia.El apartamento es acogedor, ideal para grupos de amigos. Muy recomendable, especialmente si está la piscina abierta. El haber podido disfrutar de la piscina, y las vistas desde arriba de toda la ciudad, ha sido todo un privilegio. No pudimos conocer en persona a Natalia pero estuvo muy pendiente de nosotros en todo momento, lo cual se agradece. El depto es cerca de una estación de subte. Se puede llegar un poco mas tarde gracias a que te puede recibir el portero. Tiene una vista genial desde la terraza y hay pileta. El depto es pequeño y no tiene TV, pero está bien para dos personas que piensan salir mucho. Natalia es muy agradable y se comunicó siempre. Recomendable!El apartamento totalmente equipado, a escasos 5 minutos del metro Metropolitano (salida Juan XXIII).
Las vistas desde el apartamento y la piscina preciosas.
Me alojé para asistir a un examen y no hubo problemas en atrasar la salida del apartamento. 
Para repetir!  
Tiene jna piscina en el ultimo piso con bonitas vistas. Cocina con todo lo necesario. No tiene tv y la wifi no funciono en ningun momentoApartamento en una zona tranquila y residencial. Muy cerca de la parada de metropolitano, a 10mins en metro del centro. 
Lo mejor de todo la piscina en lo alto del edificio! 
Natalia ha sido muy servicial, siempre ayudándonos en todo. 
Buena experiencia en general. L'appartement est conforme à la description (il est au 15ème étage). Très bien pour un couple qui souhaite visiter Madrid. Le plus étant la piscine sur le toit avec sa vue magnifique en 360° de Madrid (ouverte de 12h à 21h). Le quartier est très calme(en ce mois d'août, quartier universitaire), ce qui permet également de se reposer. Le seul point négatif étant de trouver une place pour se garer gratuitement à proximité (Madrid met en place des zones payantes dans tous les quartiers du centre). Un grand merci à Natalia pour sa gentillesse , sa disponibilité et pour le service apporté.Limpio y cómodo. Lo califico con un 10.Excelente experiencia! El departamento muy cómodo, tranquilidad absoluta, impecable! Y Natalia una anfitriona increíble! Totalmente recomendado!Bonne accueil , près du centre ville de madrid seul hic les places de parking sont toutes payantes .Piso ideal para dos, cerca de la parada de metro y con unas vistas estupendas, además tiene piscina en la terrazaNatalia's apartment is in a great location...just a few minutes walk to the metro. The roof terrace of this apartment is amazing. It has view to one side of the mountains, to the other side the city...simply stunning. The apartment is equipped with everything you need and was very comfortable.With Jennifer you get exactly what you are promised. I was not disappointed with one single thing. The communication was very good and super friendly. The bed is very comfortable:) I can recommend this flat to everyone:)Todo genial y con atención a los detalles.Aunque todo es pequeño es extremadamente acogedor. Las vistas espectaculares.Jennifer es una magnífica anfitriona. Estuvo pendiente de mí en todo momento. La casa está impecable, en un lugar silencioso y con unas vistas espectaculares. Además tiene muy buena comunicación de metro a escasos 3 minutos de la boca de metro de Metropolitano. En los alrededores hay cafetería/restaurante y farmacia. Sin duda volvería a hospedarme aquí.La casa está espectacular para pasar 1 o 2 días de visita en Madrid. Bien comunicada con una boca de metro al lado y en una zona residencial de calidad.Apartamento pequeño, pero limpio y ordenado.Pequeño apartamento, muy limpio y seguro, con portero 24 horas.
Muy bueno para estar en la zona universitaria.
Al llegar las llaves las tenía el portero, así que no hizo falta quedar con la anfitriona para entrar y dejarlas el último día. Rápida respuesta con las dudasEstudio perfecto para dos o incluso tres personas. Cama muy cómoda, cocina pequeñita pero equipada con lo necesario. En principio me parecía que la ubicación era un poco apartada, pero casi se agradece la tranquilidad y luego está muy bien comunicado, llegamos muy bien a todas partes. En definitiva, muy recomendable, y supongo que en verano, con la piscina aún mejor jeje, nosotros agradecimos más la calefacción! La comunicación siempre fluida y al haber portero las 24 horas es muy práctico para llegar a cualquier hora y recoger las llaves.In our abscence a light in the bathroom fell down, maybe due to air pressure. Jenny was thanking me to inform her. I was very happy about the general communication with Jenny and I can defineteley recommend that place. Bonus: The view is amazing!!!Es un sitio muy acogedor con todo lo necesario para una estancia relajada y cómoda. Jennifer está siempre disponible para solucionar cualquier duda.
Hay portero 24 horas, lo cual se agradece, y es muy atento.
El apartamento esta a 3 minutos del metro, y la zona es muy tranquila.
Cuando vuelva repetiré sin dudar.Close to public transport, clean and comfortable. Has all you need for your stay in Madrid. Natalia&Jennifer are easy to communicate and very quick to respond.El estudio está genial, muy tranquilo, muy cómodo, con una gama grande y con unas vistas increíbles, sobre todo desde la maravillosa piscina de la azotea. 
La comunicación y la atención inmejorables.
100% recomendadoL'appartement est très bien situé (230m de la station de métro "Métropolitano" - ligne 6 qui relie les autres lignes très rapidement), il est propre et agréable! Le quartier est sécurisant et l'immeuble sécurisé.

Jennifer est une hôte réactive, arrangeant, tout est à disposition dans l'appartement !

¡Gracias!Great place. Amazing view on the rooftop. 24 hours reception, tea and fridge available at the apartment. Supermarket at 7 minutes walking. Recomendable 100%.Séjour très agréable dans un appartement bien équipé, la piscine étant un vrai plus, dans un quartier calme et à proximité du métro .. je recommande +++ ce studio pour 2 personnesA great advantage for staying at this apartment is a pool located at the roof of the building with the beautiful view of Madrid! It is located in a quiet area of Madrid and only 30 minutes away from the city centre. A bus stop and subway are also very close to the apartment. Apartment is quite small with old furniture and old small TV and a really tiny kitchen. Another great advantage - a window shutter, so if you feel like having a nap during the day, you may pull the shutters down making the room completely dark. However, I would not recommend this apartment to non-smokers and families with children. As soon as you turn a ventilation on, a cigarette smoke will get pumped into your apartment making your stay unbearable and toxic to you and your children. Unfortunately, I would not consider staying at that apartment again exactly because of the problem with the cigarette smoke smell as I am a non-smoker but if you smoke and don’t care about smelling cigarette smoke, then I believe you should be fine. A host is friendly, willing to help and easy to communicate with – so no problems with that.Buen lugar, limpio y con todo lo que necesitas para pasar tus días en Madrid. Muy Cerca del metro.

comments:
Meine Freundin und ich haben den Aufenthalt in Brians wunderschönen Apartment wirklich sehr genossen.
Herausragend für uns waren die Sauberkeit, die Lage und die Freundlichkeit der Gastgeber. In unseren Augen wurde der Sinn von airbnb komplett erfüllt. Neben einem schönem Platz zum wohnen, haben wir auch gute Gesprächspartner am Abend gefunden. 
Alles in allem war es für uns ein sehr gelungener Aufenthalt in Madrid. Wir werden auf jeden Fall noch einmal zurückkommen!Appartement très bien situé avec tout le confort moderne. Décoration tendance. Chambre très confortable avec un accueil très sympathique. Brian est très ouvert et aime partager sa passion pour Madrid. Très belle expérience que nous referons!Nice, clean room, centrally located in Madrid. We really enjoined staying at Brian’s. While the room and apartment is spacious, please note that the apartment also houses another Airbnb room. This wasn’t a problem for us, however. We can highly recommend this flat.About Brian:
Brian is a wonderful and friendly person with lots of fun interesting conversations to be had with him. Having lived in Madrid for a few years he has a lot of tips and suggestions of fun places and activities to do while there. 
He was kind enough to introduce me to his friends and  took the time to discuss his wonderful work idea he has stayed with them. I wish them all the best 

About the flat:
The flat is in a great location central Madrid, very convenient close to public transportation, walking distance to lots of fun places in the city.
I found the whole flat to be impeccably clean and tidy. 
Definitely a place worth staying at.Ich hatte einen sehr schönen und angenehmen Aufenthalt bei Brian und Dulcemaria. Die beiden sind tolle Gastgeber und sie waren sehr bemüht, dass ich mich gleich wohlfühlte. Das Zimmer und die Wohnung sind genau wie abgebildet und angegeben - alles ist sehr stilvoll und geschmackvoll eingerichtet und angenehm sauber. Die Lage ist top, die Wohnung liegt im Zentrum und alles ist zu Fuß erreichbar. Brian und Dulcemaria kann man als Host nur empfehlen!
Gracias por tu hospitalidad Brian y Dulcemaria!nice comfortable and cleanGreat spot and location. Brian was very helpful and an interesting person to chat to..Beautiful place... everything with great design :) Brian’s place is lovely. Super clean, modern and comfortable. Brian is very sweet and helpful. The location is perfect for exploring Madrid.I really recommend staying here, the flat is beautiful right in the centre of Madrid and in walking distance of everything. On Sunday you get el Rastro just at your door steps :). The flat is nicely decorated. Brian was a fantastic host.I had a great time at Brian’s beautiful apartment and in Madrid. The apartment is super nice, comfortable and very clean. The location is perfect for exploring the city, in a great neighbourhood. Brian was extremely nice, friendly and  interesting person, he was very helpful and available. Thanks a lot!Brian est très accueillant et pleins de bons conseils. Le quartier est très sympa, l’appartement très bien décoré, le tout est parfait pour s’imprégner de l’ambiance madrilène.Perfect location and a beautiful place with an extremely comfortable bed and fast WiFi! Brian is a wonderful host. I had a great, relaxing stay in Madrid. Thanks!Great hospitality from Brian.
Really enjoyed staying with him in his apartment. Very well situated, clean and comfortable.It was really great to spend few days in the flat of Brian and Dulce. The are really nice host and the district is perfect with full of possibilities.Alles war Top! Keine bösen Überraschungen!Brian & Dulce are really nice people. The welcome was nice with some beers and some Mexican sweets. The apartment is clean and tidy, bed is comfortable, bathroom is also very clean, the kitchen is well equipped and important for me there was a good coffee machine!! Thank you for your hospitality.Newly renovated space a stone's throw from La Latina. Top notch bed with memory foam mattress and pillows. All white...regardless of your taste in decor, it does assure you of cleanliness. Bathroom was cleaned daily. 1st night, Brian and Dulce shared their pizza with the other guest and me. Brian is a talented guitarist and will likely play for you. At variance from the photo, there is a home office in the living room that is very often in use.My best stay with airbnb ever. Nice room, clean, super fast internet.Brian & Dulce are very nice hosts, easy to communicate and very welcoming. They have a stylish place, and the location is very good, you can walk everywhere by foot. Their hospitality is so great! They helped us and gave us useful suggestions and recommendations. We stayed at the room closer to the street. Just a note that if you would like a quiter room make sure to check out their other room. Since our room is close to the street there were unavoidably noises, but I personally did not mind. Also there are other guests in the house, so expect that we all have to share some common space. Overall we had a really nice time, thank you so much Brian & Dulce! :)SUPER clean, centrally located (walk anywhere and everywhere), great hosts, and a stylish place. Stay here, folks!You ever have those gut feelings on where you should stay? This place had that for me. I was so confident this was the best place to stay in Madrid I canceled my first reservation to stay with Brian and Dulce. When you stay with Airbnb, you stay with the hosts. At the end of the day all the towels and blankets are the same. It’s the hosts that separate the memorable experiences from the mediocre. 

When I arrived, Brian and Dulce immediately offered me coffee and food accompanied with conversations about their neighborhood, La Latina. They did not hold any advice back throughout my stay. For the 3 days we were there, they showed me the places only the locals are aware of. 

I have never felt so confident to recommend an Airbnb to someone. Coming from previous experience hosting, these guys are the best I have ever seen. They went above and beyond any opportunity they had. I am proud I went with my gut feeling and even more proud to have met this amazing couple.L’appartamento è moderno , pulito e arredato con cura maniacale;i letti sono comodissimi. I padroni di casa sono disponibili , gentili e simpaticissimi. Insomma, 10 e lode a tutto. Non vedo l’ora di tornare a Madrid e soggiornare nuovamente da Brian e Dulce . :)Very clean and neat!This is the best Airbnb that I have ever been at! Dulce & Brian are really lovely and they make everything super easy. The apartment is amazing, very well located, super comfortable and beautiful, spotless clean and has a great energy. They really make you feel like home. If you are in Madrid, don’t doubt, this place is a gem, they are a gem Brian & Dulce are true AirBnB hosts! Staying with them was the best choice I could have made in Madrid. Great place and even greater people. Hope to be back soon. :)"Mi casa es tu casa" at its finest! Dulce & Brian let me feel at home at their place so that I didn't want to leave and extended my stay for two more nights! The place is lovely, spoiled with lots of light and thoughtful chic design, perfectly situated and very clean. I will always try to book and stay at Dulce & Brian's place when coming back to Madrid, and will recommend it to my friends & family. THANK YOU!!Dulce & Brian sont très accueillants, savent nous mettre à l'aise et surtout partager leurs excellentes adresses ! L'appartement est très bien situé, propre et avec beaucoup de charme. Un logement à choisir sans hésitation pour (re)découvrir Madrid ! Gracias !Great stay! I had such a great time in Madrid.  Brian&Dulce were so easy to talk to. smooth check in and check out. The place is in a great Location 5 min walk to metro station. 1. Live map to tell where to eat and visit
2. Fantastic coffee maker to offer you fantastic Lattee.
3. You home just moved to Madrid!Amazing Place :)Thank Brian and Dulce for your hospitality. Your home is lovely and very very  clean. I very much enjoyed my stay in Madrid!Excellent hosts, in a beautiful clean apartment in a cool part of the city.
Couldn't ask for more.
Thanks!Brian and Dulce have a beautiful place that is well represented by the pictures in their listing. Everything was clean and well maintained. The linens and towels were good quality and the bed was comfortable. The walk in shower was luxurious, great water pressure and a very nice shower head. 

Most importantly, Dulce and Brian are both lovely people who made us feel very welcome and comfortable in their home. If we go back to Madrid, we would definitely stay there again.Me and my boyfriend had a wonderful stay and Brian's + Dulce's apartment. They were super sweet, welcoming and providing us with loads of tips. The apartment is super clean, the bathroom was cleaned every day and we felt super welcome. The atmosphere was nice and totally relaxing. It's a nice neighborhood and the flat looks like in the pictures, maybe a litte smaller than expected but that's all. We would definitely recommend this apartment and the hosts who were really lovely. Don't think about it twice, just book! You won't regret it.Appartement bien situé. Dans un quartier dynamique et populaire. Literie de qualité et appartement ayant du caractère. Brian et Dulce sont de plus très sympathique.My daughter and I stayed at Brian and Dulce’s place for four nights when she got all set to start her summer job in Madrid. The place was super clean and spacious.   Brian and Dulce were very helpful pointing out important tips for our stay. 
The location is great as so many great sites are so close. The street get busy on Sunday with the open market.Bright and lovely room in a charming apartment. Brian and Dulce are terrific hosts, easy to communicate with and a pleasure to be around. There is a market that sets up on Sunday's right outside so don't expect to sleep in too late that morning!Brian and Dulce are excellent hosts! The location is exceptionally clean and they are friendly people. They've been in Spain for some time and generally great to hangout with or get some drinks.That is a great place with nice location and very kind hosts. I lived there for 1 month and was absolutely satisfied. The location is only a brick throw from Plaza Mayor, but still not so noisy. I am very greatful to Brian and Dulce and thank them for warm hospitality. I really recommend not to hesitate to speak with them, aside to  know a lot of things to do in Madrid,  they are generally, good interlocutors ; )This place is beautiful in design, cleanliness, and has very kind and helpful hosts. It's in the middle of the centre and still not noisy. We would recommend it to everyone and would love to come again.Very cool and pleasant place to stay. Location is great for being near everything so you can walk almost everywhere. Also some great coffee cafes, bars and restaurants right beside the apartment. Bryan and Dulcie are so laid back and easy to get on with! I will definitely be back!

Y cerca de ML y buses.Lida è stata molto gentile e simpatica. Grazie dell’ospitalità!Experiencia 10Excellent room.Ha sido una estancia íntima y acogedora. Ha estado fenomenal.The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.Lida es muy amable, el apartamento es muy bonito, nuevo y en una zona muy tranquila. La habitación cómoda y acogedoraLida fue muy amable al abrirme la salida del conjunto habitacional con lluvia y viento a las 3:30 am.No responde nuestra solicitudLa casa de Lida es muy amplia y confortable. Los chicos que se estaban alojando allí eran muy amables, y Lida también. Sin dudas me alojaría nuevamente.unfortunately light vas broken and a little bit darkTodo bien.Lida es muy atenta y amable, te ayuda en todo momento y la casa es impecable.

amenities: {TV,Wifi,Pool,Kitchen,"Free parking on premises",Gym,Elevator,Heating,Washer,Essentials,Shampoo,Hangers,"Hair dryer",Iron,Bathtub,"Children’s books and toys","Hot water","Bed linens"}
comments:
La casa de Juan es muy acogedora, familiar. Estuvo muy atento en todo momento de que no nos faltase de nada y que no tuviéramos ningún problema para llegar. Horarios flexibles y muy buena comunicación. Un auténtico placer!Juan es un anfitrión excepcional. Aunque no tratamos con él personalmente, lo dejó todo dispuesto para que nuestra entrada en su casa fuera super cómoda. La comunicación muy fluida antes, durante y después de la estancia. La casa fantástica, mucho mejor que en las fotografías. Muy cómoda y acogedora. En un barrio muy tranquilo y muy bien comunicado. Volvería a repetir sin dudarlo.Very very nice house in a great location. Juan’s house makes you really feel home from the very first moment you get in. A great value for money. I strongly recommend and will certainly book it again once back to Madrid in the future. Thank you Juan!Muy recomendable, buen trato y facilidades. casa completamnete equipada.Juan es un excelente anfitrión que se preocupó en todo momento por nuestra estancia. Nos propuso planes alternativos para esquivar el mal tiempo que nos ha tocado sufrir esta 
Semana Santa. A la llegada el conserje nos entregó las llaves como habíamos acordado sin ningún tipo de problema.
La casa, y la urbanización en general están muy bien preparada para ir con niños, muy buena zona si disponéis de coche para desplazaros.Piso muy acogedor y familiar, bien localizado y equipado, con todo tipo de facilidades por parte de los hostsJuan was a fantastic host and his apartment was ideal for us. Not only did he kindly pick us up from the airport but also took us for a beer in the local bar and gave us some great recommendations for places to go during our stay here. Really good apartment for a family. Highly recommendedPerfecto si vas solo o con niños. Juan ha estado pendiente de nosotros en todo momento. Repetiríamos sin dudarlo!Es una vivienda más grande de lo que parece en las fotos. La piscina y zonas deportivas y de recreo están geniales. Es una urbanización tranquila y respetuosa.Casa impresionante y cuidadaTodo genial. Recomendado 100%El dpto está muy bien. Es de una familia, por lo tanto encontrarás sus cosas en el departamento. Juan fue muy amable desde el principio, como llegamos muy tarde nos dejó cosas para el desayuno del dia siguiente. Le rescato esta actitud y su disposición todos los dias. El dpto es completo, tiene conserje abajo las 24hs. Un taxi al aeropuerto nos salió 20 euros. El metro hacia los lugares turísticos está como a 15 minutos a pie, pero muy fácil. Lo recomiendo y repetiríaPiso totalmente  equipado y acogedor,  nos sentimos  como en casa. El barrio muy tranquilo y cómodo con todo lo necesario de comercio y restauración.
La parada de metro de Torre Arias está a 10 min. Dejar el coche en casa y moverte en metro por Madrid es muy cómodo.
Juan fue solícito, amable y comunicativo antes, durante  y después  de la estancia resolviendo  todas las dudas y demostrando una gran generosidad.
Repetiríamos y recomendamos sin duda.Juan's house was lovely and near to the airport.  We had a wonderful stay at Juan's apartment. It had everything we needed and we felt right at home. The area is a great and proper residential area with a pleasantly peaceful atmosphere. Many supermarkets are very nearby to the apartment.  Not very far from the city center and has easy access to nearby places to Madrid. 

Juan responds very quickly,  cool person and made the whole process super easy and joyful!Хорошее место для недорого отдыха в столице. Рядом метро, супермаркет.

comments:
Hernando is just an amazing guy!
he helped me a lots.... took me to many places... recommended a lovely places to visit.
As for the flat, it is a nice place to spend holidays! very quite place, the flat spotless 24/7 :)   and the most important thing it's very close to the heart of Madrid, fairly easy to reach the centre by either Metro or buses. People who I shared the flat with super cool!  
I have had a fabulous month there. All I can say highly recommended.
Once again the host lovely guy!

Ali
June 2015
        We had a great experience staying at his places. Even though he was not present due to study reasons, he was always asking if we were doing ok or if we needed any kind of help.
The place is good located and has good connection with the city.
you can either take the metro or walk for around 45 mins and you will get to most central places like: retiro park, sol, gran via, Prado museum, Reina sofia museum etc.Hernán es un tío muy majete, estuvo el día que llegue y me me explico lo necesario, siempre pendiente de mi comodidad y de mi adaptación. El piso es muy tranquilo y me toco compañeros de piso muy respetuosos y todo fenomenal. El piso esta muy bien situado, pocos minutos desde Atocha y líneas de autobuses , bares y plazas cercano, estaba cerca del río Manzanares y me vino bien. Viví 30 días y lo repetiría.The room was ok the location though was amazing but if I may suggest something is change the bed is so unconfortable and makes so much noice is so hard to sleep in, but the rest of the apartment is very nice as is on the pictures and very clean and even I was not able to meet hernando for the price the place its greatLa habitación lamentablemente no tiene nada de linda, es pequeña y muy sucia. Colchon muy viejo, sabanas viejas, ausencia de toallas... Tiene un wc aceptable y la gente es buena onda. Localización a 10 min del metro y los taxistas siempre quieren pasar el puente para dar otra gran vuelta y dejarte en el portal. Muy mejorable en varios aspectos. No repetiré.Hernan's flat such an amazing place to spend holidays, and this is why I did pay a visit two times in one year!
Location it'is well-connected to Madrid centre, Buses, Metro and even walking just around 25 min,  the room is decent, bathroom and the flat always spotless!
Guys there are fabs!
Highly recommended!

Ali  
DecemberFijne kamer, dichtbij het centrum voor al bij de bezienswaardigheden. 
Ik heb lekker geslapen in het nieuwe bed met een goed matras. 
Er wonen 2 jongens maar ze spreken helaas geen engels. 
Ik heb mijn eigen dingen gedaan en ben maar 2 nachten gebleven voor mij was het prima. Dankje!Хозяин - очень заботливый гостеприимный и вежливый. Помогал со всеми вопросами по Мадриду. Всегда на связи, хоть и не живёт в этом доме. Соседи - тактичные молодые люди , никогда не мешали пребыванию в квартире и за 18 дней я их вообще увидела три раза. 
Описание квартиры и фотографии  в точности соответствуют действительности.
Очень удачно выбран район. Радовалась все время. Центр- пешком дойти до музеев. Прадо 15-20 минут.
 В соседнем доме большой супермаркет. 
И кто , как я , часто будет ездить в Толедо, то 15-20 минут пешком от дома автовокзал. The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.El barrio es seguro a todas horas, y la gente muy agradable. Se necesita mucho mantenimiento para poder disfrutar esta experiencia.Piso bastante acogedor donde pasar varios días para conocer la ciudad resulta perfecto. Ni tan lejos para usar el metro constantemente, ni tan cerca para caminar todos los días. La verdad es que Hernando fue bastante amable desde el principio y aunque hubiera estado bien haberlo conocido en persona fue un detalle tanto las condiciones en las que estaba en la casa como la información facilitada para moverse por la ciudad. Sólo tuve un par de problemas con algún objeto de la habitación y al llegar para poder acceder al piso en la casa pero por el resto fue perfecto. Totalmente recomendable.Buen lugar, atención del anfitrión para cualquier eventualidad, buena zona (muy tranquila), el lugar corresponde a las fotos y es bastante cómodo, he pasado 38 días y ha sido muy grato, lo recomiendo  Todo bien.... cómodo y accesibleIt's apartment is really good! The localization is great and Hernando e the others people at leaving in the house are amazing!!! The only problem is the space at the room, it's small to two people! But the other qualities of the place made our stay almost perfectAppartement très bien situé, propre, salle de bains convenable, cuisine parfaite, chambre pour 1 personneMuy buena relación calidad-precio.This is a very nice,quite but convenient place.People are nice n friendly.easy to got things n food,have 24/7store in downstairs.這非常方便,樓下事加油站及便宜食堂還有超市;安全而安靜,價錢又合宜,非常建議來馬德里市中心的人住(離市中心Sol4站走路30分而已)Small cozy room with good location, especially if you have a car (free parking in a street 15 mins walking away). There are big stores nearby.
Hernando is very quick to answer and open to negotiations.Nice room to spend time in Madrid, I would repeat it!Muy céntrico y bien ubicado, excelente precio.The room was exactly as advertised and Hernando was always available if I needed any help. It was a good stay, I would recommend it for the solo traveler.Buena ubicación y colchón pésimoEspaço aconchegante e privativo.  Aconsho.Por el precio el hospedaje en si es lo que promete. El mayor problema fue el incumplimiento del check in por parte del anfitrión, que 10 minutos antes nos avisa que hasta 4 horas más tarde no había nadie que nos abra la puerta. Por suerte otros huéspedes nos pudieron abrir a la hora y media de estar esperando en la calle. Eso es una falta de respeto, y por muy barato que sea el alojamiento no tiene por qué suceder.all good for my sister and her friend. good position. amenities: they found a single bed and a sofa and not two single bed or one double bed as described.
thank you Hernando.No cumplió con la hora de llegada al piso. 
La ubicación no está mal.
Si no quieres dormir en las sábanas donde durmió el huésped anterior tráete las tuyas.Buona posizione ma il ragazzo che vive nella casa parla solo spagnolo ed è stato difficile capirsi.La habitación corresponde a la descripción y el piso está bien ubicado. Sin lujos pero si buscáis algo económico la relación calidad precio está bastante bien. Pero no llegué a sentirme cómoda en el piso por una de las personas que vivía en el y no paraba de hacerme comentarios fuera de lugar.Todo fue muy bueno! :) Hernando es dueño estupendo y responde muy rapido para todos uunas preguntas. La habitacion es un poco pequeño pero la casa es limpio y bonito y organizado. Este piso está cerca de Centro y es bueno comunicado con centro. Yo puedo recommendar! Gracias para hospitalidad magnifica :)Das Zimmer ist super gelegen. Zum Zentrum sind es zu Fuß ca 20-30min, wem dass zuviel ist kann zur nächsten Metrostation ca 10min gehen. Wir haben Hernando nicht kennengelernt aber er war immer zu erreichen. Tolles Zimmer für einen kurztrip nach Madrid!L'appartamento è ben ubicato, è a una decina di minuti a piedi da "Puerta Atocha" e c'è una fermata degli autobus sotto casa e un supermercato vicino. 
Ci aspettavamo un letto abbastanza grande per due persone ma c'erano invece un letto e una branda, senza cuscino. 
Appena arrivate ci ha accolto una signora molto gentile ma che parlava solo spagnolo e non ci è sembrato che le nostre lenzuola fossero state cambiate. Il nostro host non si è presentato e ci siamo sentite come delle estranee per tutto il soggiorno, visto che non sapevamo nemmeno chi avremmo trovato in casa con noi e perché. 
Gli spazi comuni erano comunque molto puliti. 
Consigliato per chi vuole spendere poco e riesce ad adattarsi!Hernando fue muy atento y respodió rápidamente siempre. La habitación es muy bonita y el departamento está bien situadl, sobre todo para quienes buscan estar tranquilos y llegar fácilmente a los museos o al parque del Retiro. Está muy cerca de la estación P. De Aragó y bien conectada con el aeropuerto. Lo recomiendo.Bien en general  屋主很好人,面对疑问和寻求帮助都会回应帮助你,房间通风明亮干净,离地铁站不算远,整体来说还不错｡(PS:屋主私人房间里养的暹罗猫很可爱,很想跟它玩可惜它怕生哈哈哈哈The price match the place,not so bad for a short time ,but there are too many people living in the houseПриехав на место, дверь нам открыл странный человек, не особо понимавший, что в этой квартире ждут гостей. Он позвал другого человека, который позвонил хозяину и дал нам трубку. Как оказалась, два этих товарища – это друзья владельца, которые здесь живут. Хозяин – Эрнандо предложил нам оставить вещи и погулять час, пока эти двое уберут в квартире. При этом, из квартиры шел не очень приятный запах. Вещи мы не оставили, а провели этот час в подъезде. Ожидания были не самые лучшие. Но вернувшись в квартиру, обнаружили, что у нас хорошая комната, чистое белье, чистая ванна с туалетом, а также кухня, в которой все есть. Пока мы здесь жили (3 дня) здесь также проживали эти два товарища, также к ним захаживала дама. Но вели они себя тихо и мы практически не пересекались. С хозяином так и не пообщались, уезжая передали ключи одному из проживающих здесь.
Квартира находится в пешей доступности от центра, рядом отличный супермаркет, все понравилось.Cheap room with very good localization, freindly and helpful host:)The place was very nice and really close to all the important places we wanted to visit (walking distance). The bed unfortunately wasn’t very comfortable and big enough for two people so if you have a bad back, it might be a bad idea to sleep in it. The only other ‘problem’ was the lack of soap in the bathroom, but we bought one for cheap (so if you see a green Cien soap, you’re welcome). I would definitely recommend the place for the price and the proximity to all the important locations.Très bon emplacement ! Je recommande vivementNo cumple la hora de llegada y no está al tanto de tu estancia, sin embargo las personas que te reciben son muy amablesIt is a good place, it's near to the center and it's good for the the money that you pay to the service you get, but if I'll g back again to Madrid I'll not go there again. Está cerca a metro , bares , supermercado. Lo recomiendo bastante , la limpieza del baño excelente .Nous avions un rendez-vous avec l’hôte et nous avons attendu 1:30 sans aucune réponse malgré la tentative de le rejoindre a plusieurs reprise par téléphone et par texto. Nous avons du prendre le taxi et aller dans une auberge de jeunesse à la dernière minute. Il nous a répondu quelques heures plus tard en disant qu’il n’avait pas son cell avec lui ce qui est très plate car selon moi quand tu as un rendez-vous et que tu as un imprévu c’est important d’en faire part au gens qui arrive chez toi. Très déçu.As a host, Hernando was quick to answer when we needed him. But I actually never met him as it was someone else who lived there. This person was nice and welcoming. 
The apartment was clean. On the other hand, the bed was not for two people, but for one and a half 1.20meters I think), and most of all the  mattress was really slim. 
As for the location, you will need to walk for the subway but the bus is close. 
For the most part, if you just need a bedroom to sleep, this apartment will be okay. We had only 2 problems staying in this apartments. There was no conditioner, only fan and it was really hot. Second thing was that Hernando was not in the city, there was Alex, who didnt understand English. Nevertheless we understood each other and staying there was really good. Location was perfect for us) El cuarto está un poco pequeño pero acogedor, un poco lejos de las estaciones del tren si no te gusta caminar, todo lo demás está muy bienKind and available host: he is always ready to help with any issue.Hernando his place was perfect near everything very hood location. Super host. Thank you ;)host molto gentile ma poco controllo
degli spaziExactamente como en la foto, un lugar muy bueno para hospedarse lo único fue el check in que termino siendo a las 6:00 pm en vez de las 3 lo que ocasionó inconvenientes, por demás muy recomendable, muy buen precioLa habitación es buena si no encuentras algo más, al llegar nos tuvieron esperando porque estaban limpiando el área (5 pm), la persona que nos atendió (no Hernando) fue desatenta y no explicó nada hasta que nos vio un poco molestas, el metro está a unos 12 min caminando, bastante ruidoso por la noche (tal vez se debe a las fechas), había 3 bultos grandes a la entrada que nadie se molestó por quitar (duraron el día y la noche).El lugar está a media hora andando del centro, está limpio y la persona que nos recibió fue muy amable con nosotrosThe host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.Check-in and communication with Hernando worked well. We had one problem with the bed sheets but Hernando immediately helped us solve the issue. Location of the flat is quite good. Not the most beautiful apartment, no toilet paper, and a small bed... But for that price, still good for 1-2 nights.I have enjoyed my stay here, nice location and good value for money!La habitación es pequeña pero es adecuada. Todo muy simple y limpio. La región es de fácil acceso, cerca de supermercados, farmacias y casi todo que se necesita. Estoy satisfecha :)Good stay, clean. ThanksEstá bien el lugar. Limpio.buenoEs necesaria una mayor responsabilidad de parte de los dueños, hubo problemas con las llaves, suciedad en la habitación de huéspuedes anteriores, malos olores en el baño. Sin embargo el lugar es tranquilo, seguro y las personas que se alojan son muy simpáticas y amables, solo deberían preocuparse un poco más del aseo y orden para quienes se alojan.No repetiría. No se presentó, nos abrieron la puerta los inquilinos del apartamento que no sabían nada de nuestra visita. La cama estaba sucia, con las sábanas de los anteriores sin limpiar. No lo recomiendoIt wasn't as described.
The host doesn't live there. There are someone else in the appartement but very hard to talk with. To understand if she lives here or if she is with Airbnb... .

It should have been double bed, but it was single bed for 2 person, in a room you can't even but the mattress on the ground because it is too small.

Our host, by text message, then propose to use the sofa (that is in the living room, not in a private room). And obviously, didn't visit the place in a while because the sofa was however not accessible as this corner seemed to be more a storage room... .

If you are a single person looking for a bed only it can be interesting, if not we advise to find somewhere else.Lugar muy cómodo, limpio, tranquilo y buena ubicación.La habitación es súper fresca ideal para el verano... El lugar está muy bien ubicado, relativamente cerca al centro y al comercio... El apartamento es muy tranquilo y a nuestra llegada estuvo siempre impecable. Hernando tenía todo listo a nuestra llegada y previo acuerdo nos facilitó llegar antes por lo cual estamos muy agradecidos... Y volvería sin pensarlo.... Gracias Hernando.Lo que yo alquilé se ajustó en ese momento a mis necesidades, que estaban relacionadas con el precio y cercanía a la UC3M. Los espacios en común con el resto de inquilinos son la sala-comedor, baño y cocina.Aceptable, aunque no era lo que me esperabaMuy céntrico el lugar y la llegada es muy fácil; lo recomiendoEs un sitio pequeño pero hernando es una persona amable que te ayuda con lo que te haga faltaEsperábamos por lo menos el mínimo (cama de verdad, y sábanas limpias). La habitación era muy pequeña y hay muchas diferencias entre las fotos del anuncio y la verdad. No hemos visto a Hernando pero a pesar de eso, siempre ha contestado cuando lo necesitaba.
No repetiría.Una habitacion muy poco cuidada, hospitalidad zero, higiene mala.The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.Muy bueno!!! Solo me queda decir muchas gracias
Volvería sin pensarloExcelente. Liberdade total, quarto espaçoso e fui muito bem tratado.Really nice place. He was really helpful to allow me checkin at 3 am. Ive been indeed grateful, especially for immediate answer.Falta mayor compromiso y seriedad. Sobretodo en la logísticaLa casa llena de pintura, olía fatal. Tuvimos que reservar un hotel de última hora, era imposible quedarse ahí! FATAAALCerca a las estaciones de Metro y a Plaza Eliptica si es que van a Toledo. Lugar muy limpio y con todo lo necesario. Muy flexible con los horarios. Muy agradecidos por lo ofrecido y hasta nuestra próxima visita.

amenities: {TV,"Cable TV",Wifi,"Wheelchair accessible",Kitchen,Doorman,Breakfast,Elevator,"Buzzer/wireless intercom",Heating,"Family/kid friendly",Washer,Dryer,Essentials,Shampoo,Hangers,"Hair dryer"}
comments:
Kate es encantadora, muy buena anfitriona y su familia también, me he sentido muy agusto. La habitación tiene baño propio lo que le da mucha intimidad. La cama cómoda y a pesar de ser verano la habitación es fresca. Todo muy bien.Una habitacion excelente con baño privado tambien excelente.
Muy bonita amplia y limpia.
El trato inmejorable, sin duda repetiria estancia una y mil veces.
No tiene nada que envidiar a muchos hoteles, sin duda me lleve una grata sorpresa.
Gracias Kate.A bit far from the centre, but best of best. !!!

comments: Muy buena estancia, bonito piso, cama cómoda, buen desayuno. Todo muy bien, agradecer a Belén y su compañera la hospitalidad.La estancia fue inmejorable. Belen fue amable y simpática, siempre atenta a todo lo que necesitaba. Además la casa es preciosa, el cuerto es muy acojedor y la cama es muy cómoda. Sin duda lo recomiendo.Very clean and quite place, apartment is splendid with great terrace full sun exposition. Belén y su compañera son muy simpáticas y acogedoras. La casa es muy bonita, moderna y limpia. Me encantó. Recomiendo mucho. Very helpful and communicative host. The apartment is nice, silent and extremely well located (5 minutes walk from two metro stations). Definitely a good option in Madrid.Son encantadoras, está todo limpio y la terraza es increíble. 100% recomendablePiso como en el anuncio, muy luminoso y con amplia terraza. La anfitriona Belén muy atenta y pendiente en todo momento de mis dudas. Ella y su compañera de piso son personas muy agradables, que hacen muy cómoda y fácil  la estancia.  La casa estaba limpia, y bien situada para  usar el transporte publico.  Todo perfecto!Great apartment, good host, and good airbnb room. Good value for your money.La habitación es tal cual como se ve en las fotos, tiene todo lo necesario para una estancia confortable. El departamento es muy lindo y luminoso. Belén y Silvia son excelentes hosts, dispuestas a ayudar y colaborar en lo que sea necesario. Gracias!La estancia ha sido muy agradable. Todo muy limpio. El ático es muy bonito. Belén ha estado atenta en todo momento ayudándome también con algunas ubicaciones de Madrid. Repetiría sin dudarlo. Gracias!

amenities: {Internet,Wifi,Kitchen,"Smoking allowed","Pets allowed",Elevator,Heating,Washer,Essentials,"24-hour check-in",Crib}
comments:
El anuncio y más fotos apenas se asemeja al apartamento. Es mucho más pequeño de lo esperado y no caben 5 personas en el. Huele un poco malThe apartment itself is good. It’s very accurate, the photos depict it quite well. My only grievance was the bathroom. I could not sit on the toilet comfortably, as the wall was too close. I also wouldn’t recommend more than 3 people to stay here at once, as it’s quite small. The company doesn’t message through the app, they call you, which I found to be irritating. The check in process is quite good, as they will meet you in person.

This may not apply to you, but while I was here the water did not work half of the time. They had groups of people come into the apartment for hours at a time to fix it, but to no avail. I had to brush my teeth with water from a water bottle. 

I would only advise booking this place if you don’t have many options.It’s a decent but very small apartment in need of some paintwork and new floor.

The flat is perfect, located in the heart of the city and with a beautiful rooftop view.

Next time I'll come to Madrid, I will come again in your apartment for sure.

I recommend it to everyone, you won't be disappointed.

A bientôt Carlos.Piso muy acogedor,nos sentimos como en casa. Carlos es un encanto y muy atento. Recomiendo su piso.Merci a Carlos pour son hospitalité, très bonnes informations sur les endroits a visiter sur Madrid.
Rien à dire sur l'appartement, très spacieux et proche du centre.

A la proxima
FodiéCarlos var en exemplarisk värd! Vi anlände efter midnatt och fick ett mycket trevligt bemötande av honom i lägnehetn. Han delade med sig många bra tips om Madrid och var mycket hjälpsam. Lägenheten är precis som det ser ut på bilderna och den stora balkongen var ett stort bonus. Jag rekommenderar varmt denna lägenhet och kommer definitivt att stanna där igen näst gång jag har vägarna förbi Madrid=)The host canceled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.Carlos has a comfortable, clean and spacious apartment. We particularly enjoyed overlooking the beautiful city of Madrid on his large terrace. The location was convenient; perfect for us on our first visit to Madrid. We also appreciated Carlos's recommendations for our itinerary. Our stay couldn't have been any better! We would love to stay again. Wonderfull house, Amazing experience... 
we stayed at Carlo's place twice, at the beginning of our trip and at the end again.especially on our second stay  we felt like we were back  home.. it was like our own place.
i could not meet Carlos in person but he was very kind and nice during our communication.he  arranged the check in and check out perfectly at each time although he was not in Madrid. 
i can gladly recommend staying at this house.
The location  AND the appartement were perfect !! Evening sun on the rooftop appartement. Very close to Puerto de Toledo and all connections to the centre of Madrid. Carlos i a very nice and correct host. Really to recommend if you want to visit the city of Madrid. Thx CarlosWe had a wonderful time in Madrid and really enjoyed staying in Carlos' apartment. The location is great and it is very easy to get around Madrid from the apartment. The apartment was spotless and very light and spacious and Carlos was a really wonderful host. Thanks so much Carlos! Carlos was there to meet us and made us feel very welcome. He helpfully left a guide to the city and gave a useful description of the area. Carlos has a wonderful apartment - centrally located and with a great terrace. He is also a welcome host. All the sights are in a walking distance and HoHo bus stops nearby.Carlos is very sweet and informative. Very beautiful and comfortable apt looking over Madrid. I needed to make a change to my reservation and he was flexible with accommodating my wishes. My family and I felt at home. I would highly recommend. I promise you wont be disappointed. Thank you Carlos. My girlfriend and I enjoyed staying at Carlos' apartment during our trip to Madrid. He was welcoming on the first night and kept in touch with us throughout the stay. He speaks better English than we do. The apartment was spotless and as you can see from the photos, has a wonderful view of Madrid and is comfortable. The washing machine  made it easy to keep our clothes clean and there's a dishwasher to help keep the kitchen clean. The living room has a wonderful and relaxing view of the city and mountains. The main bedroom is facing a courtyard, so it is nice and quiet enough to sleep despite us being in a large city. There are restaurants and grocery stores nearby as well as a train and bus stop. Taxis are plentiful. It is a short walk to the El Rastro street market and the Plaza Mayor. We would stay here again and recommend staying here to anyone visiting Madrid. Carlos is a really nice guy. He was very helpful and welcoming from the first e-mail conversation onwards. When we got to the place he was very nice and stayed in touch with us over e-mail during the stay. Whenever we had a question he responded instantly and was relaxed and accommodating about any request. 5 Star host:)

The place is super nice. Great location and incredible view over Madrid and the mountains. We really enjoyed our stay here and would wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone. The apartment was a few blocks away from a metro station and along the way were some small cafes for breakfast, which was very convenient. The terrace has a great view, but we didn't really use it since it was a bit cold.Carlos's place is quite amazing - great view and enough space to comfortably accommodate me and my two friend. It also has an awesome kitchen and patio. Check in was a breeze even when Carlos is out of town. I'd definitely go back again if I have a chance.Apartamento situado en una zona tranquila pero perfectamente conectado con el centro a unas pocas paradas de metro o bus. Realmente fácil y rápido ir o volver del centro.
La estancia fue muy agradable, en parte por el estado de la vivienda que hace muy confortable la estancia, y en parte por la disposición de Carlos en todo momento para facilitar la visita a Madrid. La casa está totalmente equipada.
Tengo que decir que quedamos encantados con el anfitrión y con su apartamento.
Y como plus, disponía de aparcamiento en la vivienda, lo que nos vino de maravilla para salir con el coche y volver al final del día directamente a la vivienda, lo que se agradece mucho viniendo con niños pequeños.Carlos, molto cordiale e gentile e sempre preciso e rapido nelle comunicazioni, dopo averci dato tutte le indicazioni sulla casa, ci ha fornito alcune informazioni sui locali ed i negozi della zona. L'appartamento situato in prossimità di Porta Toledo si trova vicino al centro di Madrid. C'è una fermata dell'autobus proprio davanti al palazzo e la metropolitana a 5 minuti dall'appartamento, l'ideale per chi vuole visitare la città in pochi giorni. La casa molto pulita, ben arredata, con due stanze da letto, un grande salone, una terrazza ed una cucina attrezzatissima. Ci siamo sentiti come a casa nostra. Ringraziamo Carlos per la sua disponibilità e per la guida su Madeira (scritta da lui) che ha voluto donarci. Raccomando a tutti questo alloggio.Carlos met us at the apartment with perfect directions on how to get there. The location was fantastic with an awesome terrace view! The metro was a 5 minute walk away. The place was perfect and had everything we needed. Would definitely consider staying here again if I come back to Madrid.Espectacular apartamento en una zona tranquila pero muy bien ubicada de madrid.  El apartamento cuanta con todo lo necesario para que te sientas como en casa, o incluso mejor que en ella. Sentado en el sofa de la casa y Desde el salon, puedes ver toda la sierra nevada sobresalir al fondo, por encima del resto de tejados. Con estas vistas, No querrás ni encender la television.  
Yo sinceramente no me quiero ir! 
Es perfecto para conocer Madrid, a un paso del barrio de la Latina, Madrid Rio, o el Vicente Calderon.  
Ademas Carlos no podría haber sido más amable y nos ha atendido genial. Nos hizo un mapa para explicar como entrar al garaje, nos explico todo con minuciosidad y exactitud... 
Fue todo estupendo...  Gracias Carlos! All was perfect, thanks again!Hemos pasado una semana estupenda en casa de Carlos. La casa es igual o mejor que en las fotos y te sientes como en tu propia casa. 
Carlos nos recibió a la llegada y nos enseñó la casa. Nos dijo planes para poder hacer con los niños. 
El barrio es muy tranquilo y muy cerca del centro de Madrid y con la ventaja de estar en un ático con unas vistas espectaculares. Tienes todos los servicios necesarios muy cerca. 
Si podemos volveremos a repetir. 
Gracias Carlos
 Carlos was very nice before and after our trip. He spent a lot of time answering all our questions and prepared a lot of nice things for us in the apartment. The apartment is really nice in a perfect location with easy access to anywhere. We really have a wonderful time in Madrid. Highly recommended place and host. Carlos is a friendly host who welcomed us with a drink at the terrace of his apartment. He gave us some good suggestions for our stay. 
From the terrace you have a great view over the city and the Sierra de Guadarrama. 
The apartment lived up to our expectations we felt really at home. The situation is perfect close to a metro station and the old city is only a short walk (about 10 minutes) away. José Luis, the friendly hall-porter, is a bonus. He is always up for a little chat and willing to help you out when you have a question.
Carlos was a great host, answering all of our questions before the trip. Carlos greeted us when we arrived, giving us an overview of the apartment and providing us with a number of ideas for activities to do during our stay (much appreciated and quite helpful!). We stayed in contact during the duration of our trip, allowing for any questions to be quickly answered. Regarding the apartment, it is absolutely lovely-- I would not hesitate to book this place again! The photos provide ample indication of the apartment. We especially enjoyed sitting in the living room and/or on the terrace, enjoying the view out towards the mountains. The closest metro is a 5 minute walk, La Latina about 15 min, and museum area about 25-30 min (depending on how leisurely you walk and the route). Truly, a wonderful experience from start to finish. Many thanks again Carlos for hosting us!Carlos is an excellent host who is very helpful and responsive.  His apartment is in a great location and is as nice as is shown in the pictures.  The terrace is awesome and the view of the city and snow-capped mountains is spectacular.The host canceled this reservation 23 days before arrival. Also very close to the city center.Carlos was a fantastic host, he greeted us late in the evening and was super friendly and informative. Nothing was too much trouble. I stayed here for 4 nights with my parents. We could not have been more comfortable.  The lounge area with air con was perfect for relaxing after a day out in the sun. The terrace is beautiful and the apartment is really well located.  We mostly walked everywhere from here. The apartment is so stylish yet really cosy and we would certainly recommend.  Carlos qui a fait tout son possible pour rendre notre séjour agréable.C'est un hôte attentif et très sympa qui parle français et anglais.
