Le logement est spacieux et confortable, tout y est mis à la disposition de l'hôte, Carlos partage son lieu de vie avec générosité et un très grand sens de l'hospitalité, nous avons pu consulter sa bibliothèque très intéressante et tous les détails ont été prévus de manière à ce que nous nous sentions très indépendants, merci Carlos!Great stay!
If you are planning in visiting Madrid try to stay here. Location is great, close to everything within walking (15min Plaza Mayor). The apartment is perfect, the living room make you feel at home and the view from the living room and terrace is amazing!
There is everything you may have at home, fully equipped kitchen if you want to prepare something quick, small desk, nice dinner table, and a comfortable living room.
The area is nice, safe and quiet. There are many groceries stores around if you need to buy something!
About Carlos, he was so helpful and always in available for any question that we had. Thanks Carlos!
L'accueil de notre hôte, Carlos, a été très chaleureux et serviable. Nous nous sommes  aussitôt sentis très à l' aise dans son bel appartement très lumineux, très confortable, calme et bien situé. Nous ne manquerons pas de recommander cette location.perfect! perfect! perfect!
i cant emphasize enough how perfect this apartment is!
we felt right at home from the minute we walked in. 
amzing apt. looks just as in the pictures. shining clean. very cosy. perfect kitchen with all that you need. very bright and full of light. beautiful balcony with a great view.
10 minutes walk to the center.
3 minutes walk to metro and train.
very quiet neighborhood but still close to all main attractions.
evrything you need for your stay in beautiful Madrid! cant ask for more.
we were a couple staying there but the apt can easily host 5 - 6 people.
Carlos is an amazing host and a special person, left a huge impression on us, we were writing to each other prior to our arriving to Madrid and he gladly answered all of many questions, providing us with all the information needed for our stay, where to go, what to do, what to see and much more. 
he left us maps, guide books, recommendations, instructions, transportation tips and anything we could think of on the living room table.

definitely recomonded and we will return for sure!
Fenomenalnie miejsce jako nocleg w stolicy Hiszpanii. Wszędzie blisko (15-20 minut to centrum), przepiękny widok z tarasu.

Czego chcieć więcej ?Carlos was the best Airbnb host a I've had over the years. I linked up with an buddy in Madrid to start a trip of Andalucia and we stayed at Carlos's flat for 3 nights. He met me at the apartment and gave me a ton of recommendations for things to do in the city.

The bedrooms were perfect, great living area & kitchen. The highlight of course is the terrace. Always great to have a home base to relax at when traveling. Thanks again Carlos and I'll recommend your spot to anyone I know heading to Madrid!!

DanEl piso de Carlos es muy bonito, como las fotos, la terraza preciosa muy agradable todo, limpio con todo lo que puedas necesitar, Carlos es muy amable y nos recibió muy bien, pudimos comunicarnos con el en todo momento. totalmente recomendable!!We had a wonderful stay in Madrid, Carlos was a wonderful host who was extremely accommodating to all of our needs, he provided us with plenty of information on arrival which made planning our holiday very easy. Nothing was too much trouble. The apartment itself is in a fantastic location and all tourist attractions were easily accessible. There was a supermarket close by which allowed us to cook meals in the apartment. The apartment had everything we needed, was very comfortable, clean and homely. Would highly recommend! This apartment is very spacious and well appointed. The bonus  is the balcony which is like another room due to its generous dimensions and terrific view. The location is also good,  slightly away from  the tourist  hustle and bustle but right on public transport and not too long a walk from the three major Madrid art galleries. There's an excellent supermarket nearby as well and a couple of  bars and cafes. And a good Illy coffee shop! Carlos met us on arrival  and had a helpful information list about  Madrid on hand. I would stay in this apartment again.La casa muy acogedora, vistas preciosas, situación buena, cerca del centro sin llegar a ser el agobio del mismo centro urbano.

La comunicación y atención de Carlos genial, muy atento y pendiente de nosotros, dándonos ubicaciones y dejándonos guías para visitar, dándonos opciones para aparcar el vehículo.

Hemos pasado unos días estupendos, como en casa. 

Totalmente aconsejable Bon accueil , bel appartement, belle vue한국인 이용자를 위해 후기 남겨요. 저흰 만 13개월 아기가 있어 숙소 고르는데 신경을 많이 썼어요. 아파트에 머무는 동안 별다른 불편함은 없었어요. 아파트도 깨끗한 편이었고 멋진 베란다 전망이 정말 좋았어요. 호스트인 카를로스는 정말 친절하고 상대방에게 좋은 기운을 주는 사람이에요. 심지어 이웃과 아파트 관리인까지도 친절해요. 다음에 또 스페인 마드리드에 간다면 다시 머물고 싶은 집이에요 ^^ Carlos is an amazing host ! 
He gaves us tips about the city and was very welcoming.
The flat was very clean, pleasant, and the terrace is great !
I highly recommend it !We had a lovely stay in Madrid, The apartment had everything we needed, was very comfortable, clean and homely. There is a terrific view from the apartment and a big balcony which is like another room. The location is good, slightly away from the typical tourist places but right on public transport. There are two excellent supermarkets nearby and a couple of bars and cafes. Carlos is a perfect host. He provided us with all necessary information on arrival and followed up after a couple of days to hear if everything was OK. We would love to come back to this apartment. Carlos es un excelente anfitrión, realmente agradable y muy dispuesto a ayudar.

Su lugar es fantástico, tiene un aire intelectual y cómodo maravilloso. Las fotos no engañan, es muy lindo.

Está súper ubicado, cerca de todo.

The apartment with a balcony that you are able to enjoy the sunshine with fantastic view. Great staying and experience at this trip.

Excepcional ! 100% recomendable. Precioso, 2 habitaciones cómodas y tranquilas, la terraza espectacular. Para ir sólo, en pareja, con amigos... por trabajo o por vacaciones, este apartamento es perfecto, como su dueño.
Gracias ! 

Exceptional! 100% recommendable. Beautiful, 2 comfortable and quiet rooms, spectacular terrace. Walking 15 minutes from the center (Plaza Mayor) in quiet area to rest but well connected to connect with the city center. Carlos a great host. Adapted to the schedules and delays on arrival with a smile. He gave advice and information, guides and his willingness to serve us. To go alone, as a couple, with friends ... for work or vacations, this apartment is perfect, as its owner.
Thank you !Maravillosa estadía en el ático de Carlos! Tiene todo lo necesario y más. Las vistas desde la terraza son hipnóticas. Carlos un 10 como anfitrión...siempre pendiente de todo.
(Del viaje que hemos hecho por varias ciudades de España y otros países, cabe destacar que los mejores anfitriones fueron los 2 de Madrid...)Carlos is a great place to stay, comfortable and clean and well-equipped with easy access to the lovely old city and a nice place to come back and relax after a hard days enjoying central Madrid - FantasticIt's perfect.
You can experience Madrid people' life.
House is cozy and gorgeous.
He prepare everything. You can just enjoy Espanyor life.

Thank you.Carlos.Carlos foi um excelente anfitrião. Nos recebeu muito bem e seu várias dicas de passeios. Carlos is a wonderful host! He went out of his way to make us feel at home and provide us with fantasic tour information. He gave us step by step details of how to get around, historic areas to visit and great restaurants. He takes great care in providing his guests with a one of a kind Madrid experience.We had a great time at Carlos flat, which was more than in line with our needs and expectations. High value for a large terrace when you go there in summertime. Carlos was also very kind when we arrived and gave us many good suggestions how to enjoy Madrid...and we followed them! Overall a very positive experience.Carlos's place was very spacious and comfortable, even for 4 adults and a baby. The Lounge and balcony offer amazing views over the city. It was only a short walk to the river and gardens, which were spectacular. We visited during a heatwave, so the air con in the apartment was very much appreciated! Carlos was very helpful and easy to contact, we had no problems, and he offered good advice on things to do in Madrid in a useful guide. I would definitely stay here again and recommend his place highly. El ático de Carlos es un lugar ideal para pasar unos días y disfrutar de Madrid. El alojamiento esta impecable y muy cuidado, tal y como muestra en las fotos o mejor. Carlos ha sido muy atento con nosotros en todo momento. Cien por cien recomendable.He is very polite and friendly. He greeted us with a bottle of wine and information about the city of Madrid. The view is amazing specially when the sun goes down. Everything is near by. We had a great time at Carlos' apartment. Carlos was very attentive, showed us around and explained how everything worked. He left us a few supplies, like coffee and beer. He had several guides to Madrid, which was helpful, and gave us his phone number in case of any doubts, and answered our messages very quickly. 
The apartment was very nice and spacious, had everything we needed. The roof top was a great addition, perfect for relaxing after a lot of walking around in the city. The subway was less than 10 min away, a light walk up the street. We really enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay there again at another opportunity!Wij verbleven met z’n twee (mijn zoon en ik) in het appartement van Carlos van 8 tot 16 oktober. We hadden schitterend weer waardoor we alle avonden konden genieten  van het grote terras met prachtig uitzicht. Het terras ligt NW waardoor je beschut zit tegen de zon. Voor in de zomer is er een luifel voorzien.
Zijn appartement ligt in een rustige stadsbuurt, 5 min. van het metro station Puerto de Toledo. 20 min te voet van het centrum als je wil stappen, of 2 haltes met de metro. Het appartement is ruim, ook voor 4 personen. De keuken was zeer goed uitgerust; vaatwasser, oven, microgolfoven, wasmachine,...Carlos had zelfs een flesje wijn voorzien. Het appartement staat vol met geschiedenis boeken, dat geeft een warme sfeer!
Wij vinden dit een aanrader als je graag eens naar Madrid wil en na een vermoeiende dag ’s avonds wat rust zoekt.
Carlos wachtte ons op toen we aankwamen en gaf alle nuttige info.Als we nog een keer naar Madrid komen dan hebben we een goed adresje.Bakertje achter de hoek, supermarkt achter andere hoek.



Alles war wunderbar - Carlos ist ein sehr netter,  aufgeschlossener Gastgeber, der alles perfekt vorbereitet hat. 
Die Wohnung ist sehr schön und geschmackvoll eingerichtet. Alles, was die Bilder im Netz versprechen, wird zu 100% gehalten.
Die Wohnung liegt ruhig im siebten Stock und man hat ein schöne Aussicht auf Teile der Stadt und die Berge.
Es sind wirklich nur 10-15 Minuten zu Fuß bis in die Altstadt - und um die Wohnung herum gibt es ausreichende Einkaufsmöglichkeiten und einige Möglichkeiten etwas zu essen und zu trinken. Carlos hat das - und vieles andere -  genau aufgeschrieben und erklärt es auch noch einmal umfassend. 
Schön fanden wir auch den Fluss, der in 5 Minuten zu erreichen ist, an dessen Uferpromenaden man schön gehen kann, um an anderer Stelle wieder in die Stadt zu tauchen.
Zusammengefasst - wir hatten schöne Tage, eine schöne Wohnung und einen sehr netten Gastgeber. Wir können die Unterkunft uneingeschränkt empfehlen und würden selbst wieder gerne dort sein!Carlos place is amazing, super clean and great location. Carlos also took his time and made sure that we knew all the spots to visits and his recommendations did not disappoint. Great place to stay it is breathtaking up there at his rooftop.We stayed for 5 nights in Carlos's apartment, which is spacious, clean and (important for us) quiet, with no noise to disturb your sleep.  The lift to the seventh floor was particularly welcome after a long day visiting the sights.   The kitchen is well equipped when eating in, with ample fridge and freezer space if required.  We were there in November so did not use the outside terrace but could see what a great feature this would be for Summer months!

Whilst the apartment is not centrally located, Plaza Mayor is a 15 minute walk, and Atocha station about 30 minutes.  However, buses to both these locations leave from the bus stop just outside the front door, and single tickets can be purchased on the bus if you don't need to buy a book of 10. Many of the 'must do' sights can be reached via the 41 bus, eg Reina Sofia, Prado, Parque del Retiro and others.

The WiFi worked fine and a phone/MP3 player can be plugged in to the PC speakers in the office, and music on a USB stick can be played on the smart TV and also on the mini hi-fi system in the main bedroom.  Carlos has an extensive library of CDs and travel books for visitors' interest.  There was plenty of visitor literature available too, to help plan your time in Madrid.

We'd recommend visiting a lesser known gem, Museo Cerralbo, which is a delightful little palace, quite close to Palacio Real (which is a 'must do').

We ate out mostly in Pl de Santa Ana and Calle de la Cava Baja in La Latina, where there are plenty of tapas bars and table service restaurants from which to choose.

Thanks Carlos for making our stay in Madrid so enjoyable.Experiencia EXCELENTE en el apartamento de Carlos.

100% recomendable!Carlos' place was a great place for our reunion. Carlos helped to give very clear instructions on how best to get there from the airport by taxi (fixed 30€) or the metro. The flat was easy to find - note that it's the buzzer on the left hand side of the door not the right! It was only a short walk to the metro but we could have walked further to la Latina  easily. The beds were comfy and the flat was warm - the balcony also looked great but a bit too cold and windy! The sofas made a great lounge area to chill in and there were plenty of amenities in the kitchen to cook food. Carlos directed us to the big supermarket left and left again around the corner, but if that was shut there was also a small shop on the immediate right selling most bits. Would recommend!Genial todo la verdad. 100% recomendableLa ubicación es perfecta! Vida de barrio al lado de centro. En apenas 10 -15 min estás en el Palacio Real o en la Plaza Mayor. 
El piso tiene unas vistas impresionantes y aunque no pudimos disfrutar de la terraza.
Soy de madrid pero vivo fuera de España. Seguramente volveré si me cuadran fechasThere is every reason to come stay in Carlos’ apartment!  This beats the 4.5 star hotel on grand Via I stayed at last time in Madrid. The convenience of walking everywhere, the supermarket around the corner, the convenience shop next door that literally opens 24/7, and the view!  most importantly, Carlos’ apartment has a lived-in feel; it has a heart, if you know what I mean. Clean and comfortable. Four of us stayed in Carlos’ apartment for four days and we hung out in the living room a lot, to rest our feet after an intense two week trip to Morocco.We've stayed in a lot of AirBnB's over the past year and you learn to appreciate the hosts that give a little extra and care about their guests.  Carlos is like that.
The place is in a good location to walk to most sites and is convenient to restaurants and groceries.  The view is fantastic.  I wouldn't hesitate to stay there on my next visit to Madrid.Amazing placeCarlos’s apartment is like the pictures that are posted. Location is great and quiet. I felt like at home and enjoyed the views and the natural light throughout the entire place.I agree with many of the positive reviews here. The place is huge. Since there are only two of us, we only used one of the rooms. Amazing view. Superclean. I love all the attention and  details Carlos  has put into it. It is near the supermarket and metro. If you like to walk, it is 15 minutes to the main Plaza. Highly recommend it.Tolle Wohnung mit super Dachterrasse! Ruhig aber doch zentral gelegen - die Innenstadt ist fußläufig zu erreichen, aber auch Metro, Bus und die Hop on Hop off Busse sind in der Nähe. Die Wohnung war sauber und individuell eingerichtet - Carlos' Bibliothek ist sehr beeindruckend! Carlos selbst haben wir leider nicht getroffen, aber es hat alles super geklappt..My friend and I had a great time staying at Carlos's place.  Unfortunately we didn't get to meet him, but his friend was there to show us around the apartment and there was some nice welcoming touches.  The space looks exactly like the photos i.e. great.  Both beds were very comfortable.  The location was perfect, quiet but fairly central.  All in all I don't think you could do better.Carlos's apartment is a wonderful location for visiting Madrid!  It's just outside the city so it's less touristy and quiet, and the balcony has fabulous views of the city and the mountains.  The apartment itself is just like the pictures show - tastefully decorated, spacious and comfortable.  The kitchen is equipped with everything you need to cook meals, and there's heat if you visit when it's cold.   He left coffee, spices and olive for cooking, which is available to use and replace, and even left us a bottle of wine.  The living space has a TV, great views from the large windows and doors to the balcony, a large comfortable couch and dining table. There's an elevator, a washing machine and a dishwasher, and the wireless is fast.  This is an excellent value and we'd love to stay again if we're in Madrid.Carlos’ apartment was great - we could have lived on the balcony alone! Excellent host with great recommendations. Would love to stay again.Super fast reply from Carlos. Usually replied me within few minutes. Very nice, clean and warm apartment. We enjoyed cooking there. He has all the kitchen supplies. Bedrooms and bathrooms are super clean. Carlos even provided us towels. Also, super nice balcony, which we could enjoyed the coffee with a nice view. Convenient and safe location. He has very very friendly and helpful neighbours. I would love to recommend this place to everyone. We had a very good time in Spain!!!! We wish to come back again :)

From Stephanie and TrevorBel appartement, confortable, spacieux, belle terrasse, belle vue. Nous reviendrons avec plaisir.Estuvimos muy bien! Gracias a Carlos y recomendable a todos. Las vistas son mejores en Madrid!!Carlos provided a wonderful space and answered any questions we had.  I would highly recommend staying there.appartement idéalement placé pour visiter Madrid , comme ses alentours grâce à sa proximité des réseaux de transport de tous types. Hôte très cordial. Bien équipé en climatisation et wifi.  Best place to stay. Like a home away from home
Carlos goes out of his way to make you feel welcomed and extremely helpful in everything.
Would not hesitate to stay there again

Notre séjour a été très agréable notamment grâce à la terrasse de l'appartement qui apporte un grand plus à l'ensemble. L'appartement est décoré avec goût et il est fonctionnel. Il est bien situé et permet de profiter des parcs et d'accéder aux principaux monuments emblématiques de Madrid. Carlos est un hôte accueillant et attentionné qui reste très disponible durant le séjour. I have visited Madrid a number of times in the past few years and have stayed in some excellent apartments - but Carlos's apartment is the best place I have stayed in so far. The location was ideal for me as it is close to where my daughter lives - it is also convenient for walking into town and for walks along the river which is close by. The apartment is comfortable, really well equipped and tastefully decorated - in particular the kitchen has every utensil and gadget you could possibly need. I loved the roof terrace which has spectacular views over Madrid and is spacious and gets lots of sun in the afternoon/early evening. Carlos was a great host and allowed me to check in early which was much appreciated. I would love to stay in Carlos's apartment again in the future.The apartment is just as great as the pictures suggest. The terrace was particularly fantastic offering nice views of the city. Carlos is an amazing host as well. He met us at the apartment at check in despite me changing our arrival time several times! He offered us a lot of information about the city and the apartment. Would highly recommend this apartment if staying in MadridAppartement spacieux, très propre, bien situé. La place de mai est accessible en 15 mn à pied. Belle ambiance de quartier.Absolutely fabulous apartment in the perfect location - walking distance to everything that matters in Madrid. Stunning view from the gorgeous terrace. Apartment is Carlos' home and he makes everything available to you. We had a great time there and have no hesitation in recommending this listing to anyone.Carlos est un hôte sympathique, qui nous a laissé plein d'informations sur la ville. Nous avons passé un très bon séjour, dans un appartement confortable (super la terrasse) et bien équipé. Nous recommandons !This apartment has everything a visitor to Madrid could possibly require
Great location
Tastefully decorated apartment
Superb view from roof terrace
Excellently equipped with everything one needs
Carlos was the perfect hostEgy nagyon hangulatos lakás, a tulajdonos láthatóan nagy utazó és szereti a szép tárgyakat amik az utazásaira emlékeztetik. Kis gyerekkel nem biztos, hogy ajánlanám, de felnőtteknek szuper hely.Alloggio ben organizzato! E' come essere ospitati da amici, potete trovarci tutto il  necessario per cucinare e pulire:  ideale per vacanze brevi. E' molto vicino al centro, a 200 mt da Puerta de Toledo (in 3 giorni non abbiamo mai usato mezzi pubblici). Carlos ci ha accolti dandoci tutte le informazioni necessarie per il soggiorno (prendete appunti perchè vi spiegherà tutto con precisione e, se non siete armati di grande memoria, rischierete di dimenticarvi un sacco di consigli utili).Carlos's place is a fantastic home away from home. Great central location, very quick to the metro and short walk from all the main sights and galleries. Plus it has an incredible view! 
Carlos is a responsive and thoughtful host and we would recommend staying here when in Madrid. 
Gracias Carlos!We had a fantastic time while staying at Carlos’ apartment. The view from the balcony is one of the best in the city. Great location about a minute walk from a metro stop and about 5 minutes from a ton of shops and restaurants. 10/10 would recommend. Thanks Carlos!Sehr gute und gemütliche Wohnung mit einem super Blick über Madrid. Gastgeber immer erreichbar.Carlos is very gracious host. He gave us some helpful advices about Madrid attractions. Flat was nice too.  Big with good living room, nice view from the terrace and not so far from main sights.If you want to spend the best time ever in Madrid, Carlos’ place is the key. Everything looks exactly like in the photos and the apartment is basically close to everything. The terrace is one of the best things about it. You have a stunning view where you can enjoy your coffee in the morning, which, by the way, Carlos provides. As per him, I don’t have enough words to describe how he treated us. Our flight has been delayed and we arrived around midnight. He was really thoughtful and reassuring the entire time. He waited for us and gave us amazing tips for our stay in Madrid. 

5 stars are not enough for how everything went. 

Thank you very much for everything, Carlos. You’re a great host and a great person!Carlos is such really great host ! Our flight had 1 hour delayed and then we had such a hard time on getting an uber to leave from the airport so we arrived way latter than i expected and Carlos waited patientely for us and did a late check-in which we really apreciate it. He also let us some food and coffee for breakfast to the following morning, a really thoughtful atention from him, you got all the information you need about the city and transportation as well plus his terrace has an amazing beautiful view and it’s a quiet place, i highly recommend Carlos apartement ! 
Gracias por todo Carlos :)This is a lovely apartment, close to everything, and with all the amenities you might need. Excellent value for money. And Carlos is a lovely guy!The pictures don't do justice how beautiful this apartment is. I couldn't take advantage of balcony because it was cold out (always warm inside thanks to central heating!) but I enjoyed its gorgeous view everyday while sipping a glass of wine on a big comfortable couch. Wifi was fast and stable. Location is just slightly off the center but it's still walkable to most places and there are amazing bars and restaurants nearby that I enjoyed. If you're tired of walking, metro station is a block away too. Carlos was very responsive to my messages and flexible with checkout which I greatly appreciated. perfect location. spacious apartment.  lovely roof terrace. home from home amenities.Nice place, helpful host, nice view. It’s a great place to stay!Nice flat with great view from the terrace. Best connection to public transport, supermarket nearby and situated pretty close to the center. The kitchen offers everything you might need. We can definitely recommend this place and would love to come back.Carlos is a kind thoughtful host who will go the extra mile to make your stay great.  His appartment is very comfortable and has a superlative view.  It is near the metro for convenience and there are shops and bars within  easy walking distance.  Enjoy!The apartment was as good as it looks. We actually spent a lot more time there than at any of the others because it was so nice. It truly was a home away from home.L'alloggio bellissimo con una vista sulla città essendo piano alto veramente splendido .
Molto comodo, vicino la metropolitana e volendo anche a piedi comodo per arrivare in centro.This apartment is just incredible, the view is just amazing! I highly recommend staying at Carlos's Place it will be a experience in itself ! Thank You !Impeccable host. Great place!El apartamento está muy bien, tiene parada de metro cerca y de autobús en la puerta que te llevan a Atocha y Cibeles.Appartement lumineux avec une belle vue en terrasse. Hôte très accueillant (en français en plus). Logement bien équipé et bien situéCarlos was a great host, couldn't have asked for more! 
His apartment was beautiful, amazing view and balcony, great location and well connected to public transport! 
Would definitely stay again!Wonderful central appartment. From this point you can reach every thing easily. A wonderful appartment with a view from the roof top: incredible. We feel very well. Carlos is a really nice person, who welcomed us very heartly. I can only say: we feel at home and when I stay in Madrid, I would really stay in his house.Our stay at Carlos' apartment was perfect from start to finish. The apartment is comfortable, spacious and well designed and offers a great base to explore Madrid. The terrace offers amazing views across the city to the mountains and we loved having our morning coffee/evening drink there.
Carlos was very responsive and made sure everything went right for our trip (including great instructions of how to reach the apartment). Check-in was seamless and we had a brilliant holiday discovering Madrid. There were so many great bars and restaurants for nighttime and if you want a day trip outside of Madrid, we recommend Toledo.

Restaurants to visit in Madrid:
- La Esperanza (incredible tapas in the Lavapies district)
- El Sur (tapas and main dishes - try the beef tenderloin and goats cheese if its on as a special)
- Davanti Food & Market (Italian food -the smoked burrata starter is a must)
(There were loads more but these were the stand-outs for us)

Thanks again to Carlos and Guillermo for being the best hosts, we could not recommend them enough!Lovely apartment in a great location. 5 minute walk to Puerto to Toledo metro station and 10-15 minutes from two or three others. Bus to Plaza Major literally outside the front door. Beautiful terrace with great views over the north west of the city to the Guadarrama mountains. Very well appointed and clean. Good air-conditioning in the living room and both bedrooms. Carlos very helpful. Would definitely recommend.My stay at Carlos' flat was perfect. The apartment is spacious, well equipped and located near the center without the noise that comes from being in the midst of the tourist spots. The terrace was a wonderful oasis to enjoy a coffee in the morning or a drink in the evening. The kitchen was spacious and the nespresso machine was a lovely touch to have in the morning. Carlos was very quick to respond to any of my concerns. One evening I appeared to have overloaded the electricity and Carlos got the issue resolved immediately.Excellent séjour dans cet appartement confortable, calme et très propre. Sa situation est relativement proche du centre à pied et les moyens de transport(bus et métro) sont également à proximité. La terrasse et la clim sont vraiment très agréables. Carlos est un hôte sympathique et réactif.  A recommander sans réserve.Carlo’s apartment is a very comfortable 2 bedroom , 1 bathroom apartment, close to Plaza de Toledo. You can walk to Plaza Mayor within 15-20 minutes from there.
It has an elevator to the 7th floor, after you climb a flight of steps from the main door. It has a very nice terrace overlooking a relatively quiet street, with grocery store around the corner and several restaurants and bars nearby.
The apartment is well equipped with a proper sized kitchen with all utensils, clothes washer, a place to hang clothes to dry , ironing board, iron, coffee maker, toaster, microwave, dishwasher and everyday needs. Carlos left us a bottle of rose wine to welcome us and offered us the use of condiments in his kitchen.
Carlos was very friendly and attentive and welcomed us when we arrived and even came back a few days later with an extra set of keys for us.

We might have overloaded the electric grid which caused a power outage but Carlos had it all back in order within 30 minutes.
I would not hesitate to return .En fräsch och bra lägenhet, lungt och bra läge med närhet till allt. Trevlig balkong, dock lågt räcke om man reser med små barn. Carlos är en fantastisk värd, snabb kommunikation och smidigt mottagande även när vårt flyg var försenat och vi anlände långt efter midnatt.Todo bienThis was the best Airbnb experience I have ever had! Carlos is an exceptional host. My friend and I missed our flight to Madrid and needed to check in a day late, and Carlos was incredibly accommodating and understanding about the situation. His communication was always quick, he provided wonderful local recommendations, and he was incredibly kind overall. His apartment is also phenomenal. The location was perfect, the space was clean and spacious, and the view from the balcony was beautiful (a perfect place for a morning cup of coffee!). I truly can’t express how great the experience was. I recommend that everyone seeking a place to stay in Madrid book this listing! You will not be disappointed!Staying at Carlos' apartment was ther perfect end to a month-long Spain trip.  It is very comfortable - luxurious really - and had everything we needed.  The view is spectacular and the elevator is a very nice amenity after walking several hours each day.  The location is excellent and we were able to comfortably walk everywhere we wanted to go in Madrid.  Carlos has listed many recommendations for restaurants, bars, and tapas and we took advantage of some of these.  Our favorite was his recommendation for the river walk, which can be accessed from near his apartment.  Madrid is a wonderful city and staying at Carlos' made it even better.  We highly recommend this apartment.Very well located, chic and spacious apartment close to many central places worth seeing in Madrid (yet in a quiet area) and very well connected with the public transport. The place  provides a lot of comfort, has a well equipped kitchen and laundry machine, plus a gorgeous terrace overlooking the beautiful hills of Madrid. The apartment could use a refreshment, nevertheless, it is an excellent place to explore the city. Carlos is a wonderful and kind host, who welcomed us with wine and fruits from his parents' orchard and who gave us excellent tips to explore the area. Gracias!It was wonderful and so relaxing staying at Carlos' lovely home and having his warm hospitality and recommendations.  Communications were always well detailed, timely, and warm with lots of recommendations.  His home was so spacious and comfortable for us two with stylish and thoughtful touches, nicely clean, and having all the comforts of "home" to cook and enjoy after long days of exploring.  Location is superb - 10 mins walk to direct train or metro to MAD airport.  We only took the metro when it rained, otherwise walking 30-45 minutes to everywhere we wanted.  There are local markets, pharmacies, cafes, and restaurants - all within walking distance.  We cannot recommend enough Carlos and his home - superb central location to walk or take transit, wonderful "home" away from home, and a warm host!Good location for the price, Carlos is nice and very responsive!Carlos is very helpful in communication and prompt to questions, although we have not met Carlos personally. His friend helped us to get into apartment and gave us practical information. His apartment is at 7th floor and has a roof terrace with good view. You can walk to Plaza Mayor or to Royal Palace about 20 minutes from the apartment.

comments: The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.Ubicacion muy buena en pleno centro, a escasos metros del Museo del Prado. La limpieza se podría mejorar y el sofá cama es recomendable para una sola persona. Mejor apartamento para 3 personas. No hay TVExcelente ubicación, en el corazón de Madrid, todo lo podes hacer a pie. Mucha movida en el barrio. Excelente atención de Solé y máxima flexibilidad para recibirnos fuera de horario, su hospitalidad fue lo mejor. El piso es tal cual se muestra en las fotos. Muy limpio. Con todos los servicios que describe. Ascensor para subir las con las maletas (no es fácil encontrarlo en el centro de Madrid). Hasta nos permitió guardarnos una maleta por unos días. Volveríamos sin dudas. Gracias! Ideal para pasar unos días!! bien ubicado, tiene todo lo necesario para pasar una magnifica estancia.Sole un encanto de chica!!!!en una zona muy céntrica y cerquita de sol, con mucha vida y mucho ritmo, todo pilla cerca, y se descansa fenomenal.Simpatico piso de estudianteSole's place is quite central and is just a short walk from the Retiro park and Gran Via. The house is quite compact and cozy, and ideal for 1 or 2 people. If you are a light sleeper, the street with its bars gets a bit noisy in the night. Overall, its a great place and Sole is an amazing and warm hostess.Muy contento con la experiencia! Muy amables y super atentos en todo momento, dejando mucha flexibilidad en la entrada y salida, cosa que siempre viene bien cuando tienes que hacer trayectos largos... Buenísima ubicación... 100% recomendable

comments:
Nous avons été accueillis à merveille par Amalia qui a pris le temps de nous expliquer le fonctionnement de l'appartement et de nous conseiller sur l'emplacement idéal pour garer notre voiture. L'appartement est charmant, fraîchement nettoyé, fonctionnel, dans un très bel immeuble. Agréable même en plein été car climatisé sur les 2 étages. A 2 minutes à pied de Sol donc en plein centre, nous avons pu profiter pleinement de la vie madrilène. 
Si vous voulez séjourner à Madrid, faites confiance à l'appartement d'Amalia, vous ne serez pas déçus et vous rencontrerez une hôte adorable!! Es un alojamiento increíble,súper limpio y muy céntrico, totalmente recomendable. Amalia es una chica encantadora y que te da todas las facilidades q necesites. RepetiríaAmalia is a very kind host, helpfull and when we arrived we got the sensation everything was ready to welcome us, like in a Hotel but more friendly.
The apartment is WOW! Clean, very clean and with a lot of accessories, only one thing to point out: the wifi is accessible only from one room.
The building is very beautifull, classy and with typicall wooden stairs ( one note: the elevator is small).
The apartment is located in a superb position as described. Thank you very much Amalia, all my travel mates thanks me to have chosen your announce.APARTAMENTEO MUY BONITO , MUY CENTIRCO ; TODO MUY BIEN ; LA DUEÑA MUY ATENTA; TODO GENIALAmalia est parfaite et très a l’écoute de nos demandes. le logement est très propre  et situe au cœur de Madrid. merci beaucoup.Un sitio muy recomendable.Estupendo fin de semana .
Ubicación espectacular y Amalia un cieloPerfect location close to everything. Located on 5th floor so you dont't hear the nightlife in the street that much. But if you have sensible ears it might be annoying. Lovely with two levels with bathroom on each floor. Wifi didn't work when we where there. We arrived past midnight but that was no problem since she lives next door which was very nice. Amalia speaks only little english.Un appartement idéalement situé. Amalia est très sympa et très disponible. Nous avons passé un très agréable séjour.Piso muy acogedor. Estuvimos un grupo de amigas como en nuestra casa. Ideal ubicación para fin de semana por el centro de Madrid.
GRACIAS!!!!Great place and location.Close to many amenities walkable distance.The landlady Amalia is really nice and lovable!
Had a great time here and I will definitely come back!Le logement d 'Amalia est idéalement situé pour profiter de la vie Madrilène.Situé sous les toits d'un très beau bâtiment ( au 5eme avec ascenseur)il est parfait pour se reposer après les visites de la journée,au calme.  Amalia nous a reçu chaleureusement.
Nous la remercions pour son accueil.La situación excepcional, el trato inmejorable y el piso encantador. Volvería a repetir sin duda ninguna.The flat was incredibly comfortable and very clean. It was a cozy place to go to after a long day of sightseeing! The owner Amalia was lovely and very accommodating. I highly recommend staying at this flat you will be in a GREAT location close to shops, restaurants and Plaza Mayor not to mention the iconic Chocolateria San Gines you can glance a view from the living room window! Just a beautiful flat!Una sola parola "ECCEZIONALE"Alojamiento genial, zona inmejorable, y magnifica anfitriona, no se puede pedir mas... gracias por todo Amalia, volveremos...El piso es tal cual se ve en las fotos, muy bonito, bien equipado para la estancia en Madrid, tiene aire acondicionado, y se está muy a gusto en verano. Amalia es una excelente anfitriona, nos ha facilitado la estancia y ayudado en todo. La ubicación del piso es inmejorable, muy céntrico y cómodo para desplazarse a cualquier sitio. Esperamos volver!l'appartement  correspond en tout point à l'annonce.
très bien situé, coquet et Amalia nous a chaleureusement accueilli.
information pour se garer, le parking situé dans la même rue nous a fait un prix quand nous avons précisé que nous étions dans un appartement airbnb (~25€ / jour).Genial!We had a great family Christmas in Amalia's place. It is clean, super cozy  and spacious enough to accommodate 6 guests and a dog. The location is great! It is close to restaurants, shops, Metro and Renfe station, a catholic Church, supermarkets, everything you might need. It is in the middle of the city life and still, it is very quiet inside the apartment.
Amalia is a great host! She solved all our demands, she was very quick in answering and  always with a smile. Super welcoming and attentive. We would recommend her and her place.Amazing home in the heart of Madrid. Lovely host who was very welcoming! Was nice and comfortable for my family of 5 :)Nice space and location was perfect.This is a great location and the host was very helpful. We wish we could have stayed longer.Pros:
- great location. Easy walk to the best chocalateria (San Gines is across the st and is open 24/7), palace, etc
- two rooms and two bathrooms for a cheap price
- elevator (note it is very small)
- clean, however the soap bar was not new when the room was given to us


Cons:
- loud construction all day next door (9am to 6pm)
- loud trash pickup at odd times (2-3am)
- slanted attic roof made it hard to stand straight! Have to be very careful moving around the house. Not ideal for kids or old people for fear of hitting ones head on the ceiling 
- hot water not always reliable if you shower after someone. Perhaps hot water only lasts for 1.5 showers.
- electricity goes out sometimes. Make sure to know how to reset the  breaker. 
- owner asked for a cash-only deposit without any written receipt
- sofa only fits 1 adult and possibly 1 toddler. The bottom portion is tiny and would fit someone under 4 feet 
- charges 7 euros per bag for baggage hold

Final recommendation: choose this place if budget and location supersede comfort (e.g. if construction has not ended)非常棒的公寓,顶楼设计精美Amalia’s place was better than expected. It is a cozy, family friendly place in a great location in the city. Close proximity to plaza mayor, chocolatería San gines, puerta del sol, etc. Easy parking a block up the street for a reasonable price. Would stay here again. Recommended.Piso acogedor,  muy limpio,  muy bien comunicado,  ubicación estupenda, magnifica comunicación  con Amalia. En resumen , estancia genial.  Muchas gracias Amalia.La experiencia en este lugar fue inmejorable! El apartamento de Amalia es tal y como muestran las fotografías que se muestran en la publicación y además ella es un encanto, ya que piensa cada detalle para que la experiencia en Madrid sea inolvidable.
La ubicación es increíble y el lugar conecta con todo para conocer la ciudad en su totalidad.
Recomendaría este lugar mil veces.excellent location with good service. Amlia was very responsive and an excellent host. microwave needs upgrade and fireplace needs some work, other than that everything was to my expectationMaison impeccable, au coeur de Madrid. Amélia a été très disponible et nous a toujours assisté. Merci pour tout un excellent séjour !

Close to everything and sparkling clean!Muy bien ubicado.Piso en una situación genial muy cerca de todo. Limpio, sin ruidos,amplio y cómodo. Para repetir.El apartamento está muy bien situado y acorde a la descripción. comments: Thanks Wendy/Ruben. Perfect room and really nice/friendly people. Would highly recommend!Mi experiencia en el apartamento de Wendy fue muy positiva. Wendy es muy receptiva y simpatica. El apartamento es hermoso, espacioso y muy limpio y moderno. La cama es de buena calidad, y el baño es espacioso y especialmente muy limpio. Fue un placer dormir allí y comunicar con Wendy. Recomiendo mucho los apartamentos de Wendy.Wendy es una excelente anfitriona, la habitación súper cómoda y el piso acogedor. Me sentí como en casa, además la ubicación es excelente! Gracias por todo Wendy la pasé genial!El cuarto es impecable en un piso muy hermoso, muy bien ubicado y realmente en extremo cómodo.

comments: L'appartamento è nel retro di un palazzo e prende luce solo da un cortiletto interno.  È equipaggiato con frigo microonde e cucina a induzione.  Si trova vicino alla stazione la Latina in un quartiere molto vivo e alternativo.  Ottima per un weekend in una zona centrale ma non fighetta.

comments:
Juan is friendly and kind. The place is great, there are food and amenities. It's just a few mins walk away from the Centro. There are many restaurants near. We had a lovely time during our stay. :)Great check in experience. Even though we arrived late at night, we were warmly welcomed.
Really clean and cosy apartment with everything you need, but better for a couple than for friends travelling together. Would definitely stay there again!Our stay at Juan and Fonsi’s place was amazing.
It was really easy to deal with Juan, always responsive.
Juan met us at the apartment for the check in with a bottle of wine.
Everything that we needed this apartment offered it to us, washer, dryer, coffee, drinks, iron, fruits and much more.
The apartment was spotless and really well designed.
The only thing you need to do, it’s to bring your luggage and explore Madrid. 

The location is really convenient, close to everything ( restaurants, public transport, Plaza Mayor, Puerta Del Sol...) It is really handy to have everything close by when you travel with a 3 years old boy. 

We recommend this place for sure, thank you for your warm welcome and your help.Lugar limpo, organizado e novo! Localização estava ótima e pude fazer tudo a pé ou no máximo 1 transporte público, recomendo muito! Un appartement équipé et meublé avec goût. L’emplacement est idéal pour découvrir la ville à pieds. Juan est un hôte extrêmement accueillant et attentionné. Excelente recepción por parte de nuestro anfitrión, la calidad del apartamento es de lo mejor con una ubicación inigualable 
Cómodo acogedor un excelente lugar para compartir en pareja y familia 
Lo recomiendo 100%Very nice and cozy apartment! Everything was clean and the interior charme is great.
Thank you for the lovely stay!Very nice place to stay if you want to visit Madrid! Juan is very friendly and helpful!Fantastic apartment, Juan could not have been more helpful. Good location, if we return to Madrid we would definitely stay againAmazing location - everywhere was walkable. Juan was really friendly leaving us wine, cooking amenities and giving us some local tips too. Slight issues with the shower but Juan came over immediately when we told him and helped us sort it out. A great apartment!Anfitriones encantadores. Lugar recomendable y bien situado.El apartamento es perfecto. Compacto pero con todo lo que necesitas. La cama súper cómoda, la ducha un lujo. El anfitrión inmejorable. Súper amable, súper atento, siempre a la orden. Nuestra estancia en Madrid fue súper contra pero si volvemos definitivamente nos hospedaremos allí.Agradecer la estancia a Fonsi y queríamos destacar la amabilidad y la simpatía de Juan su cool host, todo estaba perfecto y pasamos una noche muy especial en un apartamento muy entrañable, seguro que pronto repetimos. Saludos a los dosGreat place for visiting Madrid, Fonsi and Juan were very helpful and welcoming! I recommand for a couple :-)Great location and close to major sites. Comfortable place to stay and felt safe and secure.Great locationEs un lugar maravilloso para estar en Madrid, la calidez de los anfitriones nos hizo sentir como en casa.
El lugar es tal como se ve en las fotos, muy cómodo y con todo lo necesario y más para una estancia mas que placentera.
Está en un barrio muy agradable con acceso al metro a unos pasos y con lugares para comer y terrazas para tomar algo en las tardes.
La cocina súper equipada y el baño también.
Lo mejor de todo fue la calidez de Juan y Fonsi!!
Un lugar totalmente recomendable, en mis siguientes visitas a Madrid regreso sin duda aquí!Great place to stay! Juan met us as soon as we got off the Uber and was super friendly and explained everything to us in the apartment. Communication was great, and the place was clean as a whistle. Would stay again if I visit Madrid the next time.Very pretty flat in a good location. The place came equipt with everything we needed and Fonsi was very friendly!Juan was there when we arrived, and allowed us to drop our bags off much earlier than the check in time stated, whist he cleaned around our needs. 

The apartment was immaculately clean, and the perfect size for a city weekend break!

Juan’s communication was fast and clear, which from the onset made me feel comfortable that I had a reputable host to deal with!!This apartment is well situated for all of the attractions in Madrid. The apartment is really well equipped and very clean. Juan met us outside when we arrived. He was very warm and friendly and gave us lots of useful local information which we took advantage of, eating at the restaurant he recommended. The bottle of wine on arrival was most welcome as were other items like bottled water and fruit. Our only (very slight) quibble was the lack of natural light  but as we spent most of our time out and about was not real a real issue. This apartment is perfect for using as a base in MadridTrato inmejorable por parte del anfitrion y del gestor. Un piso muy comodo y con todas las necesidades, todo colocado con detalle y perfectamente acondicionado.

Muy recomendable!Juan was highly attentive and responsive. We informed him that the bathroom light had blown on one of the mornings - this was fixed by the time we returned in the evening. This care and attention is highly appreciated.This place was perfect for my wife and me. It is just the right size, in the perfect location for all our excursions, and a great value compared to the hotels in the same area. The host was very responsive and took very good care of us. Oh, and just in case you are wondering, the shower is fantastic and roomy. Highly recommend!!Cozy newly renovated apartment in convient location to museums and train station.  Elevator is a plus. Highly recommended.Appartement très bien aménagé, avec beaucoup de goût. Nous avons passé un week-end à deux et nous avion suffisamment de place. L'appartement est parfaitement situé et tout est à portée de balades.La casa céntrica, limpia, con todos los detalles necesarios para hacer las vacaciones perfectas, la comunicación antes y durante la estancia allí inmejorable, para repetir.Excellent place to stay, great host with easy communication  would recommend to anyone!Diese Wohnung ist absolut zu empfehlen! Die Lage der Wohnung ist super, man kann alle wichtigen Orte zu Fuß erreichen. Auch an der Ausstattung fehlt es an nichts, wir bekamen sogar eine Flasche Rotwein, 2 Dosen Cola und Bier und Toastbrot geschenkt.
Es war alles sauber und praktisch eingerichtet, sodass man sich direkt wohlfühlt. 
Ich kann  jedem, der eine schöne Unterkunft in Madrid sucht, diese Wohnung empfehlen!Vous trouverez dans ce logement tout ce que vous attendez: emplacement idéal, propreté impeccable, super accueil, tout est parfait.
À recommander les yeux fermésFonsi and Juan's apartment is trendy and centrally located. Gracis x todo!Muy buena experiencia! El trato de Juan es espectacular!! Vale mucho la pena la estancia allí. Nos hemos sentido muy cómodos! I really recommend here for everyone!Juan was extremely helpful and nice from the very beginning as he welcomed us in this lovely apartment. the apartment is very functional and practical, decorated with taste and very cosy. Thank you Juan for being the perfect host!Todo genial! Todo fueron facilidades por parte del anfitrión .
El apartamento corresponde con la descripción y fotos. Está muy bien situado para visitar los lugares de interés en Madrid y cuenta con todo lo necesario para una estancia de unos días. 
Todo limpio, muy cuidado y original. Cama súper cómoda. Recomendable 100%Great modern apartment centrally located within major tourist destinations in Madrid. Perfect for a couple. The location allowed us to walk everywhere and we had a great stay here. The bed sleeps particularly well (best we had with Airbnb so far). If there should really be one negative point it would be the lack of direct sunlight. However, as we did not stay in that much this didn't bother us at all. We were met at the property, shown the apartment and how to use the heater and given local tips. There was a guide booklet with information too.

The complimentary wine was a lovely surprise. The property had extra towels and pillows too. 

Washing machine/ dryer was handy once we worked out how to use a combined front loader. 

Overall a great experience and a handy place to stay to see Madrid and all its glory.

Thanks Kim (Australia, March 2019)This was a great space, and the location unbeatable. We were within walking distance of all of the major sites, but off the beaten path enough that we got to explore delicious local restaurants that weren't chock full of tourists, and were just around the corner. The space was very clean, cozy, and nicely decorated. They provide lots of extra touches, including a some useful fridge items and a bottle of wine. Due to the bathroom set up (which can be seen in the pictures), it's probably best for couples; and all the windows look out into courtyards, so there isn't a huge amount of natural light. We'd definitely stay again if we were coming through Madrid.What made this stay truly exceptional was Juan’s hospitality. He personally welcomed me and allowed me to check in early, which I truly appreciated after a long flight. The apartment is well located and has everything you need. Thoughtful touches like the wine, milk, snacks and cooking basics made a massive difference in making me feel at home. The place was spotlessly clean and comfortable in every way. I was also allowed a late check-out, which made a big difference. The hosts are truly gracious and I would love to stay here again. Highly recommended.Todo excelente. Alojamiento impecable, lindo, limpio, muy buena ubicación, hasta te dejaban un vino y unas cervezas para que disfrutes sin cargo. A great place to stay which I would recommend to friends visiting this great city.Sitio encantador. La casa es super silenciosa y está en una zona magnífica. El departamento estuvo perfecto, suficiente para dos personas y bien ubicado,  limpio, zona tranquila. De hecho volveremos!Great place for a short city stay. Very close to everything, would recommend.El piso tiene una ubicación excelente todo es como se anuncia y la atención de primera.The apartment was great and met all of our needs. The host gave us a great tip to use the Cercanías trains from Atocha to get to the Chamartín station and the airport. It was so much easier to travel with luggage that way vs. the metro. Everything is walkable from the apartment, Atocha, Prado, Sol, Plaza Mayor, etc. and the area around the apartment was fun to explore and wasn't as touristy. Metro was also super accesible (Antón Martín). We happened upon some great little panaderías and cafeterias in the neighborhood, and the nearby market for fruits/veggies/etc. was very nice. WiFi was fast, apartment was stocked, and bed was comfy. Would definitely stay again.Ubicación ideal, zona tranquila y cerca de todo. Fonsi à été très arrangeant sur les horaires malgré le retard de notre avion !

We would recommend this apartment.Good location and clean homeFantastic!Nice apartment,very convenient and very thoughtful,we loved it!We really appreciated the friendly welcome & top local tips, especially as we arrived quite late in the evening. 
This was the perfect little apartment to explore Madrid from. Close enough to the centre to make walking easy, but in a quiet residential street. My only moan would be that the sofa bed isn’t the comfiest (the actual bed was great). 
If we return to Madrid I would definitely try to book this apartment again, it had everything at a very reasonable price.Great host. Great apartment. Clean, quiet, cool, and the WiFi was steady & strong compared to our last two AirBnB experiences.Stayed 4 nights. 
A typical (one bed room) city apartment closed all the attractions. 
Comfortable bed. 
Good air conditioner ( it worked very hard during our stay because of heatwave)
Washer worked very well, plenty of line space to dry. ( it is washer/dryer but we didn’t need to use dryer)
We didn’t use kitchen but it looked well equipped. 
Comfortable lounge, there are two TVs. ( One in lounge/kitchen area, the other one in bedroom)
Internet was fast enough to watch Netflix in HD on our laptop.
Special thanks to Juan for letting us check-in much earlier than 3pm. It would have been hard day for him as he had guests checked out in the morning. So thank you very much. Juan was very friendly and helpful.Juan was a great host. We truly enjoyed our stay at this cozy loft. The location was excellent and easily accessible to the metro stations and plenty of plazas nearby to grab great food and drinks. The space was larger than expected and we appreciated all the amenities the space had to offer.O apartamento é muito bem localizado, está equipado com instrumentos que suprem as necessidades de uma viagem rápida e em que se deseja passear. Banho ótimo. Tem supermercados e estações de metrô muito próximas, mas também dá para visitar Madri a pé a partir dali. O edifício é bem antigo, mas tem um elevador, o que facilita muito para levar as malas.Super schönes kleines Apartment im Centrum! Vieles ist zu Fuß zu erreichen. In der Unterkunft ist alles vorhanden, was man für ein paar Tage braucht! Es ist sauber und gemütlich! 
Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt!Stylish apartment very well situated near the centre of Madrid. Helpful info and tips are provided by the hosts upon arrival. Would definitely recommend staying here while visiting MadridLovely place! Fonsi was very kind and accommodating. We only stayed one night in Madrid and it was perfect for our needs. It's about a 15-20 minute walk to the Atocha train station, El Retiro Park, the Prado museum and Plaza Mayor. Check-out was super easy, and we appreciated the small elevator inside the building. Highly recommend!One of the best airbnbs we have ever stayed in. We were welcomed into the apartment and the apartment was well organized and very clean. Cannot ask for better ,clean very well organized in every detail 
GRAZIE well DoneThis apartment is located in Lavapies, a fun, eclectic neighborhood with great food and people from all over the world.  You can walk to most major tourist sites, restaurants, La Latina, and museums from the apartment.  The Anton Martin subway stop is also very close allowing access to any part of Madrid.  The washer and clothesline were a great plus, as well as the full size refrigerator.   The toilet area is rather small, if you are a large person it may be uncomfortable.  The shower is “exposed” and behind the bed, so this space is best for couples.  We stayed in this apartment for nine days and we were completely comfortable.  A home away from home!  
Food notes:  Our favorite restaurant/bar in Madrid turned out to be right around the corner- la Sur- the baby squid salad was amazing!  There is a great Indian restaurant right down the hill on Ave Maria- great Balti!Amazing place, amazing location within walking distance of everything right in the center of the city. Apartment looks amazing, incredibly clean. 11/10 stayCouldn’t recommend this place enough! Outstanding communication leading up to the stay, it’s a beautiful apartment, so clean and in the best location! We walked around Madrid and the furthest distance was 15 mins walking. Really can’t fault anything and we’ll definitely be returning!I had a wonderful stay here. 

It’s within walking distance to most of the major sites, plazas and museums first time visitors would like to visit. The bars, restaurants nearby are also work stopping by, and there are markets big and small to pick things up you might need within a few minutes walking.

The place itself is perfect, spacious even, for a solo traveler like myself. The AC and WiFi worked great. The bed was comfortable. Very well designed.

Juan was also very quick to respond to messages and very easy to communicate with.Great apartment for a couple on vacation! Juan was very helpful and a great host!Great value and very nice place.Disfrutamos cada momento en el Airbnb! De lo mejor que pudimos haber conseguido! Gracias.Great stay in the center of Madrid!  Easy to access the metro, very quiet & private unit, and comfortable.  Highly recommended for solo and couple travellers.El piso se encuentra en excelentes condiciones. Tiene su toque único y es muy acogedor. Juan es muy atento y simpático. Definitivamente recomiendo.Amazing value, a very prime location, and a comfortable place to stay. Couldn’t have asked for a better experience my first time in Madrid, and I would absolutely recommend staying here.Ficamos 5 noites no apartamento de Fonsi e foi a melhor escolha que podíamos ter feito. Atrasamos no check in e ele estava esperando por nós sem problemas e sem reclamar. Não tivemos dificuldade para chegar no local. Utilizamos as instruções de Fonsi e foi tudo certo. A localização é incrível. Fizemos a maioria dos pontos turísticos a pé. Carrefour 24 horas a 300 metros do apartamento. Bares, restaurantes, açougues, cafeterias, farmácias e tudo que vc precisar a poucos passos. A limpeza estava impecável. Chuveiro e cama excelentes. Todos os utensílios de cozinha que vc precisar têm. Uma panela de lava vulcânica maravilhosa que não gruda nada, facilitando a limpeza. Fonsi nos deu todas as dicas de Madri. Conhecemos o terraço do Riu por indicação dele, por sinal maravilhoso. Enfim, melhor estadia da vida!!! Muito obrigada Fonsi por nos receber tão bem.Perfecto para tu viaje a Madrid. The apartment is clean, neat and practically furnished. It is within a radius of about 15 minutes from all beautiful attractions.

Recommended!Super séjour ! Le logement est vraiment très bien décoré et bien aménagé ! Literie excellente ! Douche italienne super agréable ! La qualité de l’équipement et des matériaux utilisés est vraiment impressionnante. Petit point à noter : les toilettes ne sont séparés que par une porte floutée en verre de la chambre. Un petit guide est à notre disposition avec les bonnes adresses ! L’acceuil a été super sympa ! On a eu une bouteille de lambrusco offerte ! L’emplacement est vraiment bien a 5 minutes à pied d’un métro et à 15/30 minutes à pied des principaux sites touristiques ! Attention par contre madrid est une ville en pente :)

I really enjoyed my stay in Madrid!! The Apt is perfect, prettier than the pictures, clean and  very well decorated, we had everything for cooking and coffe for breakfast.
the location is perfect, you could walk everywhere, you have "Plaza santa Ana" very close which has lots of restaurants and bars.

Dan answered all my questions and he gave me a map with all the attractions.
I stayed several times in Madrid but this was the best experience!!!
I recommend Dan´s apt to anyone visiting Madrid!!

The apt is super clean and cozy and have everything we needed from cooking stuff to iron. The location is very central, the street relatively quiet for central Madrid (but remember you are in the middle of a lively city that goes to bed late!). And the bonus was no stairs - having lugged our suitcases up and down various ancient stairwells over the preceding weeks this was a big plus.... :) The apartment was smart, new, clean and with great services. Dan's sister met us with keys - simple, easy and friendly. Great Airbnb experience.Muchísimas gracias por tu hospitalidad y por ayudarnos el día de nuestra salida. The apartment was so comfortable and homely. Bed was so comfortable! It had everything you need for a short stay in Madrid. Local markets for fresh produce close by as well as an abundance of cafes and restaurants. Atocha rail station walking distance (600m) as well as several metro stations within 400m, but the city is so easy to get around on foot. 

A bit of street noise at night as the Madridians don't often go home until after midnight, it may be bothersome to some but it was quite well blocked out by closing the window. 

Would always recommend this apartment and Dan as a host to anyone traveling to Madrid!

Amazing! First time in Madrid and staying in Dan's apartment was a great idea. My husband and I felt like locals. The room is very comfortable and served its purpose perfectly. Dan was an amazing host - great communication, met us at the apartment and gave us great suggestions. He even setup a taxi ride for us both ways ( which I recommend since the driver he uses is also amazing). So happy with our choice and would definitely stay here again. Thanks Dan!!Location was perfect!!! 10 minutes walk from every major attraction in the city.
The apartment was so clean and cosy. 
Dan the owner is super nice, he arranged us a taxi from the airport and waited for us at the apartment. Then, set with us for 30 min to show us on the city map all the good places to visit. He was also very responsive on massages all the time.
We stayed for 4 nights and really didn't want to leave :) 
Just as promised in the ad. Good place.This apartment is truly stylish, very comfortable and in an ideal location for exploring Madrid's amazing sights. Dan was an exceptional host, responding to our inquiry quickly and making sure we were pleased with everything during our stay. The bed was heavenly with plump pillows and soft linens and the lighting on the bedside tables was perfect for reading. The kitchen has all the necessary cooking equipment as well as a washer/dryer and an iron! The bathroom had plenty of hooks and small shelves for toiletries and the towels were plush. Everything was spotless! The neighborhood has small supermarkets with fresh produce and a few bars for a drink. What a wonderful experience we had here and we hope someday to return!Great apartment for two people! Close to sol and prado museum and also to the train station. Very clean and Dan was prompt to help us on real time. Had great time and recommend for others!Very clean cosy apartment within walking distance from the train station. Also a short walk to Sol so you are almost in the heart if Madrid. Dan is the moat attentive host I have had.All was excellent. 

Booking, communication and check in were all superbly handled.

The location was perfect. Good neighbourhood, quiet street, plenty of nearby eating and drinking options, close to transport and attractions.

And the flat itself was superb. VERY comfortable bed. Clean and well equipped bathroom.  Well equipped kitchen. Couldn't fault anything.I had a great stay at Dan's apartment. From the beginning, he would always reply promptly. All the information was clear and accurate.
The apartment is cozy but with everything you need to feel at home. The location is great with 3 metro stations nearby (unfortunately 2 were closed for repairs, but will reopen on Nov 12, 2016) and you can walk to must see places like Plaza Mayor, Plaza del Sol, Mercado de San Miguel, Prado Museum, Royal Botanical Garden. Also, you can find many resturants/tapas bars just steps away, flamenco shows just a couple of blocks away and little grocery stores ("Alimentación") all around if you want to prepare something at home.

The flat is close to tourist areas and convenience stores. It is just cozy but we had everything we need in the apartment. The washing machine/dryer was a huge plus. Excelente ubicacion cerca de todo, metro y centro de la ciudad, plaza el sol y museos, alrededor hay supermecados y lugares donde comer y desayunar, Dan nos estaba esperando y nos dio las indicaciones y recomendaciones de madrid y los alrededores.

Todo súper limpio y muy, muy bonito. Perfecto para Madrid. Um apartamento bem localizado e perto de um estação de metro. Zona calma e sossegada. Muito bom, só pena a água quente não ter chegado para se quiséssemos tomar todos banhos seguidos. 
Fora isso gostamos muito The place is exactly like the pictures and the description. You will find everything you need for a weekend trip to Madrid. The location is very close to the center and around the apartment are many nice places. Dan and Ayelen thank you for staying at the apartment and hope to come back the next time we visit Madrid! This place is adorable and right in the walking distance to most prime attractions in Madrid. Pictures are accurate and Dan made coming and going easy. The neighborhood was fun to explore and very centrally located. A great apartment, a wonderful lively neighborhood and what the Americans call 'southern hospitality'. That's how I would sum up my stay in Dan's apartment. 

The apartment is equipped with all the necessary things and located in the heart of Lavapies, a lively neighborhood of Madrid. The wonderful cinema Cine Dore is around the corner, so is an inside marketplace for fresh produce and there are dozens of restaurants, bars all in walking distance. 

But the highlight of my stay: Dan and his family's hospitality. I  locked myself out at 22:30. Unfortunately Dan was outside Madrid but his sister helped me out and even invited me to have dinner with her and her friends. I had a most glorious evening in a typical Spanish restaurant with three engaging people. And that, for me, is what a holiday is about: unexpected encounters in unexpected places. This apartment was just what my boyfriend and I needed for three nights in Madrid. It was centrally located, close to a Metro stop, making travel within the city easy. There are many restaurants in any direction from the front door. Because it is located on the ground floor, and the bedroom window faces the street, we heard people going by during one of the busier nights in the city. Overall, it was just what we needed, and we would stay there again in the future!Perfect appartment and perfect location in Madrid. We did everything by walk as the appartment is very central. L'appartamento si trova in una posizione molto centrale, le principali mete turistiche sono comodamente raggiungibili a piedi in pochi minuti. Ci è stato consegnato perfettamente pulito e in ordine, completo di stoviglie e pentole e fornito anche di alcuni beni di prima necessita(sapone per piatti e per il corpo,carta igienica, olio, sale, zucchero). И так, все по порядку.

Гостеприимство: инструкции по заселению очень подробные, с эти у нас не возникло никаких проблем. Хозяин Ден быстро реагировал на все наши просьбы, добавил недостающее постельное белье, отвечал оперативно на все письма. И от хозяина у нас осталось только положительное впечатление! Спасибо  Дэн!

Локация: район расположен близко к центру, действительно везде можно дойти пешком, улица тихая. Но из-за близости к вокзалу  и центру в районе много эмигрантов из стран Африки и Ближнего Востока. Достаточно безопасно, но в любом случае стоит иметь ввиду.

Квартира: все соответствует фото, но есть ряд нюансов. 
Квартира расположена на первом этаже. В помещении одно окно, которое заклеена пленкой. В квартире нет центрального отопления, только один электрический обогреватель. Может летом это отличное прохладное место, но зимой это темное помещение, в котором пахнет сыростью. Квартира расположена прям рядом с входом в дом, зукоизоляция в доме практически отсутствует, так что в квартире слышно все, что происходит в подъезде, на улице и у соседей сверху. Мы жители большого города, к городскому шумы привычные, но здесь сложилось впечатление, что спишь на улице, а вокруг тебя ходят люди, ночью вывозят машины мусор, а соседи выгуливают собак прям рядом с кроватью! 
Мебель в квартире соответствует фото, только она уже порядком износилась. У нас была вся необходимая посуда и техника, так что с этим проблем не возникло. На кровати можно комфортно спать, но ее ширина 140 см. Диван есть  и указан как дополнительное спальное место, но он скрипит и продавлен, так что его назвать комфортным сложно. 
Самая большая проблема в квартире - это ванная комната, ремонт в ней просто необходим! Раковина протекает, в душе вода течёт не только их душевой головки, но и из всего шланга, сток в душе забит или плохо работает- вода стекает очень медленно.

Clean, good location. Easy check in/out. Will use again! Thanks.The location is out of city but quiet and convenient. There are supermarket and many kinds of restaurants downstairs. El edificio es tranquilo, familiar, tiene muy cerca un supermercado, una farmacia, parques infantiles y varios bares.

comments:
Appartement agréable et fonctionnel. Literie très confortable. Idéalement situé entre Chueca et Malasana, à proximité de nombreux restaurants. Tout se fait à pied. Attention néanmoins : l'appartement est juste au dessus d'un bar ce qui peut faire un peu de bruit tard le soir. 
Hôte sympathique et réactif.Excelente alojamiento. Muy luminoso, muy bonito y muy limpio y cuidado. Ubicación inmejorableTrès bon endroit et hôte agréable.Victor's apartment was large and comfortable. Two balconies opened out on the lively street below. Despite being above an active bar, rolling down the exterior shutters blocked out all noise and light, ensuring a restful sleep. Communications, such as check-in details, were not as prompt as we would have liked, leaving us a bit unsure how we would check-in. We would still recommend Victor's apartment as a great place to stay.Excelente lugar, ubicación perfecta, servicio inmejorable y limpieza impecableLoved the location and setup of the apartment, in the middle where the party is happening. Fantastic. Thank you!Perfect location and chic design. I will come back for sure Super cute apartment in a great location in Chueca.  Loved it and would definitely go back.Excellent location in the heart of Madrid. Very comfortable and well-furnished apartment.Victor’s apartment is perfectly located for visiting Madrid.  It is above a club, as many other reviews indicate, however this didn’t disturb me or my family, including my 14 year old and my 8 year old.  Both of whom slept very soundly on the comfortable sofa bed.  

The apartment itself is very nicely decorated and stylish as well as comfortable. 

Victor and his friend, who helped us check in, were both very easy to contact and very helpful.  I would stay here again and recommend to friends.Un lugar encantador, en un sitio muy céntrico y con una decoración muy agradable. Fueron muy atentos y el precio realmente económico. Muy recomendable, volveremos sin dudaEl departamento está tal cual las fotos, limpio y súper buena ubicación. Lo único es que si tienes el sueño ligero te despertarán los ruidos del bar de abajo que tampoco cierra tan tarde pero si se puede descansar.El piso es genial , en óptimas condiciones , Victor es muy amable y atento sin duda volvería.Everything was perfect. I wanted to take the bed with me! So comfortable... :)L'appartement de Victor est très fonctionnel et équipé, très bien situé dans le quartier de Chueca, un peu bruyant mais cela ne nous a pas beaucoup dérangé. A recommander !Una ubicación muy buena, apartamento muy bonito y acogedor! 
Recomendable 100%Alojamiento muy recomendable. Todo perfecto.

comments: Absolutely excellent location to all the attractions. Wio and Gaby were great hosts and have extensive knowledge of the area. Easy access to the metro and train station. Plenty of bars and food establishments close by.  I would stay here again on my next visit to this awesome city.Gaby was very friendly, informative and overall a great host!
