comments:
Natalia es una chica genial que me ha tratado muy bien y siempre muy atenta. Yo necesitaba estudiar y descansar y pude hacerlo todo de una manera inmejorable. Su casa es bonita y muuuy limpia. Además la localización es extraordinaria.okNatalia is a fantastic host, with a lovely home. I booked at very short notice, in an emergency, just for somewhere to stay for one night after being let down by another host. Wish I'd just booked with Natalia right away she was lovely (her happy little dog is great too!).

The bed is super-comfy, the room nice and quiet, the location was perfect for my band's gig at Sala Caracol.

Thanks so much Natalia!Just book it!The place is awesome!!!!! Natalia should definitely update a better photo of the room. The place is located close to Reina Sofia museum and walk distance everywhere to the city center.   Natalia is very friendly and she keeps the apartment very clean. There is a private bathroom in the room and the bed is super comfy! I don’t think there is a better place with this price and location in Madrid so just book it!Natalia es muy disponible para que disfrutemos al mejor .

La ubicacion de su apartamento es perfect.


Quiesera regresar y aconsejo a todos su casaNatalia's place was very nice! She was flexible with the check in time and the room was great. The bathroom was clean and modern and the room was a nice size with a really comfortable bed.Natalia was a very kind, fun and relaxed host to stay at. It's a shared apartment with a dedicated shower and bathroom for each room. Everything very clean. She had good tips on where to go out to eat&drink and helped me finding everything I needed. The apartment is in centro de madrid and you can reach everything walking. Definitely a good place to stay!Natalia was able to accommodate a last minute request and late check-in on the same day, which was wonderful! The picture online didn't do the room justice. It was beautiful, super clean, and with a private bathroom and shower.  I'd say this is one of the best places to stay in Madrid!The place is very clean and comfortable. it is also wonderfully located within Madrid and very well connected. The neighborhood is very hip and museums and parks are nearby. Natalia was very quick to respond and an amazing host!GREAT communication- nice, clean, private room in a SWEET part of Madrid.  cool restaurants and street life.  close to everything in city center  and easy arrival (with natalia's help) from airport.Recomiendo el apartamento de Natalia al 100%. El piso esta muy bien situado, y en muy buen estado. Todo muy limpio y ordenado. También mencionar que es muy tranquilo, con lo cual se puede dormir muy bien. Gracias NataliaNatalia’s place was very nice and clean, the bedroom was nice and the bed was very comfy.  It had a very nice bathroom connected to the room.  Though I didn’t use the kitchen or living room they were both nice and organized.   

Natalia was very good at communicating and got me into her place very easily.   I got to meet her adorable puppy Kala and her roommate who works at a cafe not far away. (It has great food). 

      The apartment is right by the Madrid train station (Madrid Atocha Cercanias and the Reina Sofia Museum what a great area to be in when visiting Madrid.  Thanks again Natalia for the hospitality!마드리드 아토차역을 걸어서 10분이내 갈 수있어 렌페 이용하기 매우 편리했습니다 방은 업데이트 되어있는 것보다 훨씬 좋습니다 욕실도 방에 함께 있어 사용이 편리합니다 큰 강아지가 있는데 이 부분만 괜찮다면 완벽한 숙소입니다I was very happy with my stay at Natalia's.  Her apartment is located within a half mile of the Prado and Thyssen museums and just a ten minute walk from Madrid's Atocha train station.  This made it exceptionally convenient for me to tour Madrid on foot and also make my rail connections.  The apartment is situated on a quiet side street and is within a short walk to many restaurants and cafes on the adjacent streets.  The room itself was stylish, clean and comfortable.  I definitely recommend staying there.Muchas gracias! Very beautiful home, very friendly host and gorgeous dog!Muy contento por haber reservado la habitación que ofrece Natalia. ¡No es 100%, sino 110% recomendable! 

La habitación es espaciosa (aparte de la cama dispone de una mesa grande para trabajar), está limpísima, la cama es grande y comodísima. 
El cuarto de baño (totalmente nuevo y privado) es también amplio y muy acogedor. Por supuesto, hay Wi-Fi y todas las facilidades que se puedan imaginar.

Natalia es una perfecta anfitriona. Desde el primer momento te ofrece todas las facilidades del mundo, es muy amable y cercana, con lo cual en todo momento te sientes cómodo.

Volveré, sin duda. Y lo recomendaré también sin duda.RecomendableVery nice atmosphere and everything available that you might need.An incredible experience. Natalia was exceptionally kind and responsive making the check in experience a breeze. This is a beautiful space that I would recommend to everyone.Un piso muy tranquilo en un barrio con mucho ánimo—best of both worlds. El piso es muy limpio, recién renovado con su propia ducha. Viva Madrid!Good location, nice room, fantastic hostess. Recommended.Todo bienExcelente lugar, el cuarto esta muy bien mantenido con su baño privado, Natalia fue muy amable, la ubicación un plus, pues está a muy cerca de las atracciones principales de madrid y está cerca a una calle donde puedes encontrar muy buenos restaurantes y bares, definitivamente recomendado!!Natalia was great! Great communication and everything exceeded expectations. The room has recently been refurbished and the ensuite bathroom is a great plus. The picture doesn't serve justice: the room is big and with a desk area to work on. Super close to the metro station with great spots to eat and 24/7 supermarket. Despite the lively neighbourhood, the room is very quiet. If you're looking for a central place in Madrid, look no further!La habitación estupenda, con un baño super cómodo! Natalia muy amable con su perrita, nos comunicamos para que el check-in nos fuese bien a las dos. Además de tener bano incorporado en perfecto estado. Natalia fue siempre muy amable y comunicativa. Sin duda alguna una muy buena estancia y experiencia.Natalia es encantadora, llegué a Madrid por la noche y nunca me puso ningún problema con la hora del check in. Todo estaba muy limpio. El piso está en una calle tranquila, y a la vez muy cerca de bares y restaurantes. Atocha y el museo Reina Sofía quedan al lado. Muy recomendable!Increíble anfitrión, muy limpio el lugar agradable estanciaNice and clean room in a perfect location close to great food, museums and transit.Located walking distance from  Atocha Station.  Surrounded by Cafes in old town of Lavapies. Easy access to all Madrid sights. Room and adjoining bathroom suite are nicely renovated.  Very nice host.Very close to the Lavapies subway station and near quite a few bars and restaurants. She was a great host and I very much enjoyed my stay.Esta muy céntrico, la cama muy cómoda y la anfitriona muy amable.Natalia's place is in a great location and even more spacious than the pictures indicate. Having a private (and modern) bathroom is an extra that not many rooms in Spanish cities have.  The room is quiet, WIFI works well, the bed is comfortable. Natalia is very nice, even made tea and coffee for me. Her dog is big but very sweet. Overall, the home has a good vibe to it. I would stay here again anytime.Es genial, desde el minuto 1 me hicieron sentir como en casa, una habitación cómoda, amplia y llena de detalles, un baño privado y todo lo que necesitaba.Really clean place, about 20/30 min walk to the shopping area. Few minutes from the metro station, good location.Alojamiento casi privativo, y muy tranquilo, muy cerca de la estación Atocha. Nos ha gustado mucho.Quiet room. No noise from the street. No noise from the flat. Huge room with the best sleep I’ve ever had in Madrid. Really big comfy bed. Really big personal bathroom which you walk into as part of your room. Had a sliding door. Good shower. Toilet. Sink. Plenty of space. Cool colours. Good lighting. Shutters on every window. Desk provided WiFi good. Large selection of lights in room and bathroom each with different switches for perfect control of light. Natalia is instantly relaxing really nice not weird or controlling or awkward in any way like some hosts can be. She has done a truly incredible job with this self contained room and bathroom. It’s basically like a studio. The room is in a bit from the front door then it’s the second floor on the right and you can go in and out the house completely in your own way and having complete independency. Natalia stays at the back of the house where her room is and the living room. You’ve got your complete own private sort of in and out area st the front. The bed was warm and honestly great and big I felt soo comfy. Leather soft headrest at the back of it - a great touch. The room was really high quality and modern not cheap and poorly built but really well built. You feel good, private and safe in there. You can lock the door. Plenty of plug sockets. Wardrobe to hang clothes. Shower wash products provided. The street is really pretty and the location if you know madrid is obviously good because it’s a central one. It’s also a perfect distance from the Retiro for walking there. I booked the place on the day in the evening and Natalia had everything ready in 2 hours which was super awesome. Great stay. Would recommend to business professionals couples independent young people adults or elderly. :)Goed gelegen in levendige wijk Lavapiès, in centrum Madrid. Maar toch een stille, propere, confortabele kamer. Vriendelijke ontvangst door Natalia en haar grote hond.Habitación perfecta para quien busque alojamiento en esta zona de Madrid, quiera tranquilidad y baño privado (impecable). Una excelente anfitriona. Zona llena de bares, pero la casa es muy tranquila. Recomendable.El apartamento está ubicado a unas pocas cuadras de la estación de metro y a unos 10 minutos a pie a Atocha. El baño está impecable y el dormitorio es muy espacioso. Natalia fue muy amable.Schönes Zimmer, jedoch etwas zu kalt, während dieser Jahreszeit.Ubicación muy céntrica cerca de la Estación de Atocha y del Museo Reina Sofia, el alojamiento está perfecto para 2 personas y se puede llegar andando a todas partes.Great stay for recharging after a travel day. Spotlessly clean, ensuite bathroom, great location and very responsive communication. Very friendly dog. Would stay at Natalia's place again.Totalmente recomendado!!! Muy simpática, y el lugar muy acogedor. Excelente ubicación a tan solo una estación de metro del centro de Madrid

comments:
Estuve sumamente comoda y contenta hospedandome en el departamento de Patrick, esta muy centrico a pocos pasos de la estacion de trenes Atocha y a pocos minutos caminando del museo del Prado, su depa esta muy limpio y comodo, me proporciono mapas, informacion por email para disfrutar al maximo la Ciudad y muchos consejos, sin duda recomendaria hospedarse con Patrick.Patrick was an excellent host, he gave me tips for Madrid and was always available and friendly. The apartment is modern, spacious and very clean. Moreover it is located next to Atocha station so very easy to reach and centrally, and Reina Sofia, Prado, Caixa Forum and Retiro Park are in a short walking distance. If you don't mind having a 110cm bed it is also fine for 2 people. Patrick's flat is very close to Puerta Atocha station, and one metro station away from Sol. The flat is clean and lovely. The communication went very well with Patrick. He also took care of situation when giving us the key, even when the time management was difficult. I would definitely recommend this flat, and I also would book his flat again when I visit Madrid next time.Patrick fue muy amable en todo momento. Se preocupa por el bienestar del huésped. Muy recomendable.Patrick was super polite and friendly host. The Flatt is in city center, in a very good area next to museums and Retiro Park. 
The house was clean and cozy, with a full equipped kitchen and all essentials. The room was very comfortable and clean. 
I just had a very good time there. 
It's a high recommended place!Patrick es una persona simpática, amable y educada. Nos ofreció muchos servicios y ayudas. El piso es muy limpio, ordenado con mucha luz. la cocina es grande con todo servicio. Es un piso que me gustaría volver otra vez. Airbnb excelente! Nos quedamos en el piso de Patrick mientras buscaba piso de alquiler. Patrick era muy amable y en cuanto podría nos ayudaba. También nos dio recomendaciones estupendas para ir de tapas y a comer. El piso estaba muy limpio y buen arreglado. Verdaderamente disfrutamos nuestro tiempo en el piso de Patrick.  It was great to stay at Patricks place. It is near of the center and you can walk to all the touristic attractions in Madrid. 
Thank you for everything!Estancia muy agradable. El piso es muy bonito y está muy bien situado. Patrick es un magnífico anfitrión.  Gracias por todo!Many thanks Patrick for your hospitality! Because of your friendly,helpful and invitive attitude we had a great stay at your place. Highly recommended for those who would like to have a nice time in Madrid! Staying at Patrick's place was without a doubt our best airbnb experience in Spain and one of the best in general. The apartment is super clean and cosy, with a bright living room, well equipped kitchen, and spotless bathroom. Our bedroom had a super comfortable bed (actually, it was a struggle to get out of it in the morning ;)) and was situated from the yard side, so it was very quiet at night. The big advantage is definitely the location of the place - it's within less than 10-minute walk from Atocha station or Retiro Park, and many others city attractions (Reina Sofia museum is just round the corner). There is a range of supermarkets and shops around (the best Italian take-away pizzeria is just 5 minutes away from the apartment - in Lavapiés). Above all, Patrick is a truly perfect host! From the beginning he made us feel at home. He was open, hospitable, and generous, always making sure that we enjoy our stay and have everything we need. He created a laid-back, natural atmosphere, and it was always a pleasure to have a short conversation together, either in English or in our (often a bit too slow) Spanish. We are already looking forward to coming back one day!Super! Appart bien situé et très agréable. Propre, bien rangé. Patrick est aux petits soins, si t'as besoin d'info ou quoi que ce soit il est là! Du airbnb comme on aime!Excelente atención y apartamento muy lindo (igual que en las fotos) con ubicación céntrica y tranquila. Patrick es muy atento y da información sobre los lugares que se pueden conocer al quedarse en Madrid. Sin duda, repetiría esa estancia.Excelente lugar para alojar en Madrid. Tuvimos una muy buena estadía en casa de Patrick, está cerca del metro y es caminable a todas partes. El edificio es tranquilo y hay varios supermercados cerca. También hay locales para comer o tomar algo. 
Muchas gracias por todo.Patrick was a very attentive host, always willing to help and give tips on the city. The room is cozy and comfortable just like the rest of the house. It was a very pleasant stay.Apartamento moderno y con un agradable toque personal. El piso era espacioso, limpio y con bastante luminosidad.

Esta situado en una zona rodeada por comercios y supermercados (Dia, Lidl y Mercadona), muy céntrica y bien comunicada.

La hospitalidad de Patrick fue muy buena, nos ofreció su ayuda en todo lo que necesitabamos. Lo recomendamos!Patrick’s appartament was very close to city centre and Atocha railway station, everything you need (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication was excellent from the first day and you have everything you need at location. Great Airbnb experience. Wonderful apartment, fantastic location. Patrick is lovely and very willing to help with any questions or recommendations. Easy check in and check out, would highly recommend!Piso a 2 min del barrio de Lavapies, bien ubicado para explorar la ciudad a pie, muy cerca del metro también. Piso acogedor, limpio y silencioso, hemos estado muy a gusto. La comunicación con Patrick fue excelente. En fin, muy recomendable!Super séjour ! L’appartement est agréable et parfaitement propre. Patrick est un hôte au top, détendu et conciliant; je recommande vivement !Très bon emplacement tout peu se faire à pied
Gare Atocha et entrée de métro très proche de l’appartement
Appartement très propre et fonctionnelle 
Patrick est très sympathique et toujours disponible pour des recommandations (visites, sorties et restaurant)
Nous avons beaucoup aime notre séjour chez Patrick
Je recommande vivementGran anfitrión, muy amable y dispuesto a ayudarte en lo que necesites.Patrick is a great host, and the appartement is very clean and beautiful. The room is nice, location is great and all the services are perfect. We should recommend this place to everybody.This is one of my best Airbnb experiences. The place was very clean and the location is amazing. The host was very helpful with the recommendation for restaurants and what to see in Madrid in two days.Patrick was great! The apartment is at a very comfortable area next to the center and the train station ( we didn’t actually used metro even once).... really recommended place....alojamiento perfecto si es tu primera vez en madrid a 10 minutos del centro y mas cerca aun del paseo del arte.Todo perfecto, patrick es un chico intersante, inteligente y muy simpatico!Patrick si è dimostrato davvero gentilissimo e molto disponibile ad aiutarci. L'alloggio è in un'ottima posizione, è nuovo e pulito. Ineccepibile davvero, consigliato vivamente!Todo genial! La casa es muy linda y Patrick fue 100% flexible con nuestros horarios de entrada y de salida! Lo único negativo es que el colchón era muy blando y nos generó dolor de espalda.Patrick welcomed and directly gave us not only a lot of info for restaurants, bars and other stuff to visit, but also helped with all the arrival and departure organization.
The apartment is simple to reach from the airport and well located so walking around the center is easy. The room was cozy and clean.
We really enjoyed his recommendations and had a great time.Todo Bien ! Alles Super, empfehlenswert ;)Une chambre calme et confortable à dix minutes à pied du centre de Madrid! Le quartier est super sympa et regorge de petits cafés et lieux alternatifs, tout Madrid est accessible à pied et un bus direct pour l'aéroport part de la station d'Atocha toute proche. Patrick n'est pas avare de bonnes adresses, et nous avons dormi facilement 10h par nuit! Parfait pour un long weekend.We had a lovely stay at Patrick's apartment. The apartment has everything for a comfortable stay.  The communication worked very smoothly.  He was very kind and welcoming . One of the best bnb experiences. Highly recommended.Patrick is a very friendly and flexible guy who can easily give you local tips and help you out when you need it. In addition the apartment is well located, very close to the centre, so perfect basis for a short sightseeing trip.Patrick's apartment is the perfect place to stay in Madrid. The location is great as it is very walkable to the city center and train/bus/metro station. The apartment is very clean and Patrick provides you with everything you need. Patrick is also a great host, offering suggestions on places to visit, things to do, and places to eat.Highly recommended place! Very sweet host, comfortable living space, excellent location and neighborhood! And the bed is sooooo comfortable!Fuimos una semana a visitar Madrid. El apartamento está muy bien situado, a 15/20 minutos de las zonas más turísticas (obviamente hay algunas zonas más apartadas pero casi ni cogimos el metro en toda la semana). Patrick muy simpático, habló con nosotros cuando llegamos, nos recomendó algunas zonas para comer, nos preguntó cómo había sido nuestra estancia en su casa, hasta nos ofreció guardar comida en su nevera por si algún día queríamos cocinar. Apartamento muy limpio, también. Únicamente decir que, según el día hacía un poco de frío en la habitación pero todo muy correcto :)The place and the location were great and Patrick was really nice and helpful. The bed was very comfortable and the room has everything you need.Patrick was a great host and the place was really nice, clean and tidy. Would definitely recommend it, was perfect for a short stay in Madrid!Patrick es un excelente anfitrión!!!... fue muy atento y siempre estuvo muy atento a apoyarnos en lo que necesitamos. El alojamiento tiene todo lo necesario para una estancia agradable. La ubicación es muy buena, cerca a la estación de Atocha y con transporte público a una calle del apartamento. Es una excelente opción para quienes quieran visitar Madrid. Gracias por todo!!Muy buena ubicación en el centro, muy limpio y agradable, buena señal de wifi, Patrick nos dió muy buena info de la ciudad y muy hospitalario.Definitivamente volveria, Patrick estuvo pendiente desde el inicio de lo necesario para mi llegada y todo lo necesario para una buena estancia
El apartamento siempre estuvo en condiciones impecables, y se encuentra ubicado en un lugar muy accesible a diferentes tipos de transporte.Patrick is very kind and accomodating!!En la casa de Patrick te sentirás como en tu casa y tendrás toda su ayuda y amabilidad a tu disposición. Todo excelente, impecable, limpio, cómodo, acogedor. Buena ubicación y con rápido acceso a todos los puntos principales de Madrid.Patrick est un excellent hôte, réactif et plein de bonnes adresses ! L'appartement est bien situé et très propre. Tout ce qu'il faut pour passer un bon séjour à Madrid :)Un sitio increible super bien situado. La casa esta perfecta y Patrick es majisimo. Nos ayudo en todo. 
Recomendable 100%Patrick is great! He is very open, smart and kind. The apartment are so clean, well located and cozy, like in a dream. 
He didn’t afraid to host a football fans from Russia, so he is a brave man too  
Thank you, Patrick, for all your advises, we have a great pleasure in our trip!

comments:
The flat is in a great location, close enough to walk to the centre and with lots of cool shops, bars and restaurants surrounding it. The flat itself is bright, clean and very comfortable. It's spacious and perfect for two or three people.

However, one problem we had was that the listing stated a different number to the actual flat. This resulted in us wandering up and down the same street at night until we got a reply with the correct address. Bonita casa y perfecta ubicación. Muy recomendable.The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

comments:
Beautiful and recently refurbished flat right in the city centre of Madrid! We did all the visits by foot which turned out to be very convenient. Host was always available to answer our questions and help organise the weekend before we got there. Great experience I definitely recommend to anybody who wants to visit Madrid!We had a great stay at Catalina's property in Madrid. It's a beautiful flat in a lively area of Madrid. It was easy to get around, within walking distance of many of the main attractions and close several metro stations. The flat wad spacious and clean.  We would highly recommend staying here. Awesome place!Very very very beautiful renovated and decorated apt. Also really comfy for two couples or a family. It has an amazing kitchen with all the things needed and spacious living areas. The host was friendly and made everything easy. Highly recommended!Catalina's place was lovely. It comfortably fitted our large group and was right in the center of Madrid.Great apartment in a great part of the city. Had a great time. Wouls stay there again.Wonderful communication and easy check-in/check-out, VERY central location, clean, great amenities, A/C, and super comfortable beds! Highly recommend.The apartment was well situated and very clean. We were very happy with it, and the location is within walking distance of all the main attractions as well as in a lively neighborhood. The company that assists in the management of the property is a bit slow in responding so make sure you give them plenty of time!We had a perfect stay at her appartment. I can highly recommend her place!Great flat in excellent location - very central but feels like in a smalll very busy town.  Very clean and well equipped flatReally beautiful apartment on a great location! Everything was in order and we had a great time in Madrid. Catalina is a great host, we could arrive early and she replied very quickly to my messages. I would definitely recommend this place!Excelente apartamento, muy bien ubicado, moderno y con todo lo necesario, todas las comodidades, varios aires acondiconados en excelente funcionamiento, camas muy comodas y el sector nos encanto.
Catalina muy atenta a nuestra llegada con sus amigos de Minty Host muy profesionales, Bryan la persona que nos recibio fue muy amable y nos enseño todas las facilidades e indicaciones del sector. Gracias Catalina, 100% recomendadoIt was great for a family of 5.The apartment is exactly what we expected and asked for. We were contacted and kept in the loop at all times. Great value for money in the center of a beautiful city.Excelente ubicación, comunicación y veracidad. Volveríamos sin duda. Muy bien ubicado, cerca de los teatros  de la gran vía y de zonas comerciales, puedes moverte a pie a casi cualquer lugar del centro sin problema.
Amplio, cómodo, moderno y decorado con mucho gusto. El inconveniente principal es que se trata de un bajo a pie de calle y se oye absolutamente todo. La zona es de bastante tránsito y ambiente nocturno con lo cual resulta difícil dormir.Excelente apartamento! Lo recomiendo mucho. Esta muy cerca de la Gran Vía! En todo momento nos sentimos seguros y satisfechos de habernos quedado ahí! Muchas gracias! ❤️We had a great time in Madrid thanks to the great location of our appartment and the very comfortable beds! :) The flat is nicely furnished, it was clean and very spacious. It is on the ground floor so a bit noisy but in the downtown it is not surprising. All in all I can just recommend the place and Catalina, who was always quick to reply and questions we had.

Thanks for everything once more!Le logement est grand et bien équipéRecomendable al 100%. Bien ubicado, cerca deuna zona con bares ycomercios y a un paseo corto a la Gran Vía. La calle es tranquila y cerca hay un aparcamiento público. La decoración y equipamiento del apartamento son muy buenas, fotos reales al 100%. Repetiremos.The apartment was cosy and nicely decorated . Check in was efficient . The host Was very helpful . However the apartment was a bit too hot even when we turned off the heater . The apt is on the first level so it was a bit noisy. People knock at the front door and we can hear it from the bedroom . It was convenient with lots of little supermarket and restaurants .Whg ist klasse. Zentral gelegen- 2min zur U Bahn/ 10 min zur Einkaufsstrasse. Whg ist zur strasse gelegen und daher auch recht lautLa mejor experiencia en Airbnb. El departamente es precioso, tal cual se ve en las fotos, estaba impecable, muy bien localizado, cerca al metro, a miles de restaurantes, tiendas, bodegas. 
Las camas eran muy comodas, la presion de agua y la terma perfectas, la iluminacion, la cocina con todo lo que necesites para cocinar, la lavanderia.
La comunicacion con Catalina siempre muy pronta y precisa. El servicio de Mindy Host perfecto para la entrega del departamento.
Tenia servicio de television por cable y buen internet. . Tambien habia aire acondicionado, que no usamos por ser invierno, y calefactores en cada ambiente.
Muchisimas gracias!!!Emplacement parfait et bel appartement, avec très bon service, mais gros problème de bruit, impossible de dormir, appartement en rez-de-chaussée avec fenêtres absolument pas efficaces, on entend beaucoup les voitures et les gens, toute la nuit. Dommage.Catalina’s place is very well located in Malasaña which is a very hip, happening location. Everything you need is in the area. We even had a small store that was open 24 horas about 3-5 min walk away. It was spacious enough for us 4 - and very stylish and homey. Muchisimas gracias! Encantada!We loved to stay at Catalina’s apartment! It is really beautiful and the beds are great and really comfortable! The kitchen is complete with all things necessary. I definitely recommend it!Catalina's home was the perfect location for exploring Madrid. Easy access to metro and touristic sites. The street the house is on has many little bars and restaurants. If none of those interest you, then you're only a short walk away to hundreds of other places to grab a bite or a drink. The house itself was clean and comfortable, with ample space for a family. I ill say that if you are a light sleeper, then pack some ear plugs. The benefit of it's great location is also it's only downfall if you're a light sleeper. Everything starts late in Madrid, which leads to some noisy folks leaving the bars in the late hours of the mornings. All in all we had a wonderful trip and would definitely look into staying at Catalina's home again! Thank you!Todo muy correctoThis apartment is just as lovely in person as in pictures, a great base to experience Madrid from. Really vibrant neighborhood (especially good for vegan and vegetarian food options nearby). It is true that the location does cause a fair amount of noise and can affect your sleep but it's worth it for the location and although it is on the ground floor it still felt very safe.  
We did experience some small issues that hopefully were one offs and shouldn't affect future stays. The apartment is run by an external company who overall were wonderful in terms of communication- easily in contact with over a (Hidden by Airbnb) group,  quick to reply and very helpful (they were kind enough to help us book our taxi to the airport for our return flight). Unfortunately on arrival the person who was supposed to meet us was not there and their phone was off- so we couldn't get hold of them whatsoever. Thankfully someone else from the (Hidden by Airbnb) group came and let us in but we were waiting for around 40 minutes. 
Inside the flat itself one of the dining chairs must have previously been broken and but left in place because when I sat on it it immediately collapsed beneath me and I fell to the floor.  
I could quite easily have been hurt, especially next to the marble table, and it could have been avoided very easily had the chair been removed before we got there. 
Overall though this apartment was a joy to stay in and I was sad to leave it.Centrally located, walking distance to shopping, great places to eat, and tourist sitesGood: The place is right in the heart of things, but just outside of the really noisy part of the street. It's close to everything and there's lot's to do in the area.
It's a big apartment with two nice bedrooms, two showers and two bathrooms. a nice kitchen and living room. 

The service was great. very responsive and helpful.

Less good: The apartment is on the ground floor, with large windows facing the street, at pedestrian eye level - so if they are open, there's no real privacy. Additionally, there's some noise (not a lot) coming from the street or from the building's main door at night. 

All in all - it's a very good option if you want to be close to the heart of a very vibrant and fun area of the city. We enjoyed our stay there.Do NOT stay here. The bathroom and floors were not clean upon arrival. Despite the apartment being beautiful, and in a lovely neighborhood, the heater was stuck on and the apartment unbearably hot. The host was unresponsive to the heater being broken and our stay was miserable due to the extreme heat. The apartment is on the ground floor of one of the busiest corners in Malasana and so the noise was also intense. We opened every window we could--which made the noise issue worse, and yet that was not enough to combat the heat coming from every heater in each room. When we asked for a refund due to the unfortunate issue with the heater, the host refused. I would have expected that she would have at least met us 1/2 way, or offered some sort of apology. None.We were with a group of four girls and had a wonderfull week in Madrid. Catalina’s appartment is great, very clean and has all the equipments you need. It is very well located in the middle of Malasana, a really nice neighbourhood with a lot of nice restaurants and bars. Highly recommended!The apartment is fabulous! Great location, very clean and modern. We regretted leaving so soon. It looks bigger in the pictures, but you won’t be disappointed.Apartment is in a super hip and fun neighborhood. It was about a 15-25 min walk to go to major areas but was okay because they walk to those areas is very beautiful. Our flight got in late and the host was very gracious and was very understanding with our late arrival. Great apartment!Un piso espectacular, muy cómodo y limpio. La atención muy buena, la comunicación rápida, la ubicación excelente.This apartment was beautiful, it was so clean, comfortable and bright  and the location could not have been better, I would recommend this to anyone. Good location. Good house and cleanCatalina's place was well-appointed and very modern and clean. We really appreciated the lovely updates and cool air-conditioned rooms to enjoy a cozy night's sleep. The common area has a beautiful marble table with seats enough to fit a larger group for a meal and to relax, which isn't something many apartments offer. The washer also serves as a dryer, which is very useful while staying. The surrounding neighborhood is delightful and allowed us to explore a new part of Madrid. We would highly recommend this house to anyone interested in feeling comfortable away from home!The location is very good. The apartment is clean an well equipped. We had a good time here.El departamento de Catalina es muy bien. La ubicación es perfecta—me gusta el barrio y todos los restaurantes y los bares. Todo fue simple and fácil. Gracias!N/aWe were in spain for a friend's wedding with 5 adults (2 couples + friend) and this place suited our needs perfectly. It had a great location close to both tourist and fun, local bars/restaurants. Also helped that the place was like a cave in the mornings so everyone could sleep in nicely after a late night out. Catalina and the management company were very responsive and flexible with us, especially when I needed to extend for 1 night the week before we arrived and when one of the group left Madrid with the extra key! thank you again for a great stay.Excellent location and prompt, helpful communication with the host. Apartment was lovely and had all that we needed for our stay, only issue would be that the flat was on the ground floor therefore could be quite noisy at night. Otherwise, I would recommend this flat to anyone who wants to discover the city of Madrid!ubicación muy cercana del centro, pero a su vez sin el alboroto de hospedarse en pleno centroThe location of this premises is amazing. You are close to lots of eateries, vintage shops, the gran via and all of this makes for an exciting stay. The place is spacious and fresh and when travelling with the family as I was, it was great to be able to have space to unwind. Full cooking and clothes washing facilities also added to our stay. Highly recommend it.I loved the location. I felt like a local. The place was really quaint and stylish.All went very smoothly. Not a ‘traditional ‘ Airbnb, as no actual communications with Catalina after booking. But all was handle smoothly by a medium sized company with offices in the dirty where we were able to leave our bags on last day.
Highly recommend the lovely spacious apartment and great districtnice location, perfect appartment. has everything you needGreat location, and nice and clean apartment!El apartamento es muy bonito y muy cómodo y que en unas de las mejores zonas de Madrid. La atención brindada fue espectacular. Cuando vuelva a Madrid intentaré quedarme en este apartamento de nuevo.Esta muy bien ubicado , es tal cual como esta en las fotos y es muy cómodo y (Website hidden by Airbnb) hay ruidos molestos.El apartamento es fantástico, han estado muy pendientes de nosotras y está genial ubicado, en pleno barrio de Malasaña.Exactamente como las fotos, muy cómodo, amplio y limpio. Todo funcionó a la perfección. La comunicación fue muy fácil y el departamento hizo que nuestra visita a Madrid fuera aun mejor. Recomendado 100%Spacious and modern flat with very good locationThis flat is close to Grand via ( 7-9 mins walk  )  it’s a big plus to three location and  all amenities are close by
House was clean as in the pictures and worth for the price we have gotGreat host. Very easy and quick communication. Place - Perfect.Best location. Metres to cool restaurants, bars, cafes, shops etc Comfortable apartment. Complete facilities. Highly recommendedTodo y que el apartamento estaba muy bien, no ha sido lo que me esperaba. La empresa que lo gestiona ( nada de Catalina) se pierde en los detalles, una pena. Muy inpersonal.Muy cómodas las habitaciones y espacioso. Cerca de restaurantes y el metro.UN BUEN ALOJAMIENTO EN EL MISMISIMO CENTRO DE LA CIUDADGreat location, exceptionally clean & great space! 
Only negative is that it is a little noisy at night, but we knew that and opted to stay as location so good!Good placeOur stay at Catalina’s place couldn’t have been better! It was the perfect location for what we were looking for. She was helpful whenever we needed, and responded quickly. Great value for the price. Would definitely recommend staying here if you’re looking to stay in Malasaña!El Barrio es perfecto. Hay un ambiente alternativo y hay muchas tiendas vintage y buenos bates eclécticas. Todo fue muy fácil. Bien ubicado y buena comunicación. Me quedaría allí sin duda.Tremendous rental.  The apartment and Amenities were just as expected.  The hospitality at check in made me feel as though I was visiting with a friend rather than renting an apartment.  Lovely time!super nice Apartment equipped with all necessitiesThank youGreat location. Very close to restaurants, metro and groceries.This apartment is just as represented.  It’s a great location. Having a W/D was a plus.  Hot water and air conditioner worked great.  This place worked great for us!   The host were super fast with all communications.  Helped us arrange transportation. Allowed us to check in early.  Exceeded all expectations.Place was nice and location was great.Una habitación inmejorable.   Cerca de todos los lugares para turistas.Amazing location, great hosts! They were able to check us in upon arrival which is huge after an 8 hour flight. They made sure we had everything we needed plus more!Location was terrific and the check in easy and any questions we had were answered right away.  It was clean and very comfortable.  Loved having two bathrooms!!Nice and spacious apartment in a great location in Malasana! All the bars and most important sightseeing spots (almost) nearby and in walking distance. 
You see on the pictures what you get in reality. Everything was clean, the beds comfortable. Wifi was working and fast.
Though Malasana is a very lively barrio, the noise level in the apartment was low. We hardly heard the other tenants in the same house other than some music now and then and that was actually pretty nice!
The check-in and check-out procedure through Minty was very professional and convenient including additional information where to eat and what to do/experience in Madrid. Communication with the host was always fast & friendly.  
Thanks Catalina!Thank you for you great hospitality! We really loved our stay at this apartment! It is definitely up to standard!Ubicado en una zona con acceso a todos los servicios y llena de vida. El apartamento es muy bonito y cuenta con toda la comodidad que necesites.Sincerely enjoyed my stay! The apartment was beautiful and the hosts were delightful and helpful. Would definitely stay here again.Very good service and great communication with the host!El apartamento es tal cual las fotos, aunque un poco más oscuro. Está situado estupendamente. Muy bien equipado, la cocina estupenda, wifi perfecta, baños cómodos. La habitación de matrimonio más estrecha que la otra. 
Solo una pequeña pega con el suelo de parqué que está bastante deteriorado, sobretodo en la puerta del baño y hay que tener cuidado. 
El Check-in y check-out perfectos, muy atentos en todo momento. Nos recibieron antes de la hora fijada y pudimos salir 1 hora después. Buen sitio en Madrid que repetiríamos.Thank you for a great stay!Catalina’s place is ideal if you want the whole Madrid experience. Everything was great.Great hospitality, apartment, and location!Buena ubicacion ,limpio  con todo lo necesario para una buena estadiaCatalina's Place was amazing,  it was spotless,  great location,  fantastic communication,  great facilities,  and most of all beautiful people to deal with. We enjoyed our stay with the security of knowing someone was their in needed.Un departamento muy cómodo, estuvimos 5 personas, limpio, en una zona céntrica, junto a la Gran Vía, cerca a estación del metro, totalmente recomendableCatalina’s apartment is amazing. It is located in a great area as it is close to the gran via and there are tons of bars in the Malasaña area. The apartment itself provided plenty of room for 4 people. It was very clean and has a beautiful kitchen. We would definitely recommend!It was great location. Close to all amenities. Catalina place is what I expected. The only down fault we were in the main floor so it is really loud. You can pretty much hear everything especially if you are a light sleeper. Otherwise it was a beautiful place.The apartment was as shown and in a quiet area. Because we are walkers, the location was ideal... we would walk to our destination early in the day and head back later in the day by taxi, which was relatively inexpensive.  The management personnel were certainly helpful, including allowing us to check in early.  We do recommend this apartment Very fast & pleasant communication.The apartment is well located, within walking distance to many restaurants and shops. It looks exactly like the photos, it’s well equipped and very clean. The apartment is on street level and  it can get a little noisy at night. But I certainly recommend this place and would stay there again.Está bien ubicado, junto a la calle San Bernardo.
Buena limpieza.
La persona que nos recibió fue educada y profesional.
Se encuentra en un entresuelo del edificio, a metro y medio de altura respecto de la calle (no en un 1er piso), por lo que no es necesario tomar el ascensor, si hay que subir 2 tramos de escaleras.

Busqué, para hacer la reserva, un espacio con 2 habitaciones y 2 baños.

El alojamiento necesita una mano de pintura, especialmente el techo de uno de los baños totalmente descascarillado.

Al segundo día de estancia vino alguien del seguro de la casa y canceló el uso de la bañera de uno de los baños, y además el lavabo del otro baño estaba atorado, por lo que estuvimos el resto de las estancia sin poder utilizar ni una ducha ni un lavabo. No apareció nadie a solucionar este grave problema.

Tras abandonar la estancia, a mi petición (no a iniciativa de la propiedad) nos reembolsaron el 8% de lo pagado. 
No ha sido una buena estadía. Lástima.TopThe interior is nice and it's a good location. But be for warned if the building is under construction. They said it's not in their control but a warning would have been nice. We woke up every morning to drilling and hammering. We could not open the windows or use the balconies because of it. There were some small aesthetic issues inside that they wanted to fix during our stay and I had to communicate to 3 different people (owner and host reps) to not do this during our stay. We already felt inconvenienced by the eye sore of the LOUD construction. I privately told them about other issues during our stay, I feel confident they will work on it as they were sympathetic to our needs at check in.Un amplio y muy bien cuidado lugar. Una gran ubicación con mucho por hacer y encontrar a sus alrededores. Se puede escuchar algo de ruido de afuera. Pero nada grave.Perfect location, excellent apartment, would definitely stay again.Catalina was waiting for us at the apartment when we arrived from the airport. She was clear in explaining us how everything worked in the apartment.  The place is nice, clean, confortable and the location is superb!  Malasaña neighborhood has tons of options to shop and eat and its walking distance from most important spots in Madrid.  If you are not the kind of “walking persons “, the nearest Metro Station is one  block from the apartment.  The neighborhood could be a little noice during weekend at night.Casa linda limpa e bem localizada amamos e voltaremos mais dias...

comments:
Margarita is a great host! I stayed at her place for 3 days with a friend and i have to say you cant get a better strategically located place than hers. All the major tourist attractions are within walking distance and she even grabbed us a map of Madrid for our vacation. One best thing about her place is that it's always clean. The only problem we had was language barrier as I don't speak Spanish and she can't speak English but hey now there's translator apps for that right. I would definitely book her place for my next stay at Madrid! Thank you for the great hospitality Madam! très sympathique, accueillante Margarita es una excelente anfitriona, siempre atenta y dispuesta a ayudarte con lo que necesites... El piso es muy lindo y esta muy bien ubicado, casi no es necesario tomar el metro para conocer la ciudad...
Sin duda la recomendamos!!! Gracias Marga!!!Marga es una anfitriona excelente! Muy atenta y servicial. El cuarto es espacioso, limpio y muy comodoThe reservation was canceled 24 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.Margarita was very kind, got me from the station and showed me the map with interesting points. she was a very good host and very supporting, I will go there again,
Margarita was a great host! She kept in touch all throughout before I reached Madrid, and she came to pick me up at the Metro station (getting to her place is a little tricky..). She had great tips for me as a tourist, and offered breakfast. She's a very involved and interesting person to discuss with too!
On my last day, she accompanied me to the train station as well, insisting to carry my luggage! Very nice stay overall, I would definitely recommend her place!Margarita estuve muy encogedora y muy amable. Es tambien una excelente cocinera! Fue un placer quedarme en su piso. Ademas, la habitacion fue grande y limpia, y el piso es muy bien situado, muy tranquilo, muy cerca de la estacion de metro "Embajadores", y tambien muy cerca del centro de la ciudad, solamente a unos 20 minutos de la Plaza mayor a pie.I stayed with Marga for more than 2 weeks, she was very nice, welcoming, and caring, she used to make me breakfast and offer me afternoon tea or anything. the thing is she doesn't speak English, only Spanish, so communication was kind of difficult.
the room was clean, and the location is near to the centre, overall it is a good choice, but not for long periods, max 3 weeks.

Thank you MargaLa casa está muy bien situada, cerca de muchos lugares interesantes en Madrid. La habitación es sencilla y limpia. Margarita es muy agradable. Seguro que es un buen lugar para quedarse en Madrid!Maria was a warm and helpful host. She picked me up from the Oporto station to bring me back to her house. She answered every question I had and put in an effort to make me feel welcome. If I came back in the future id ask if i could stay with her.Margarita is a very nice host, she knows how to welcome. I stayed only one night but she made me feel like at home. The room is nice and clean. Marga ha sido una excelente anfitriona, es super recomendable su lugar. Primero, la habitacion es amplia, comoda, limpia y calefaccionada (viaje en diciembre). Tiene un escritorio en cada habitacion y el acceso a internet es muy bueno. La casa tambiem es grande, limpia, ordenada y muy confortable. En segundo lugar, Marga esta atenta a todos los detalles y es una gran compañia. El valor agregado de su hospitalidad es que nunca faltara una taza de te, cafe, sopa y una buena tortilla española. Ademas, conoce muy bien la ciudad y te puede indicar lugares muy interesantes y como maximizar tu tiempo y dinero. Tercero, la ubicacion es perfecta. Estas a 10 min caminando de Atocha, a 15 de Tirso de Molina y a 5 de la puerta de Toledo. Puedes recorrer todo el centro de la ciudad a pie.
Por todos estos motivos, es un lugar super recomendable para pasar una linda estadia en Madrid.Margarita and Maria are great hosts! It was pleasure to stay in their flat. Very helpful with showing neighborhood and Madrid attractions. Reasonable price for basic room. Worth recommendation. Thank you!!   Maria is a very nice host and even offered to pick me up from the train station. However, i feel like since she does not know any English, it will prove challenging for some non-spanish speaking guests to interact with her. I was only luck to have another guest there who could help me translate. Marga and her daughters were very friendly and helpful and offered me breakfast every morning. Apart from a little mold on 1 wall the room was very nice to stay in. The location was perfect for me. Close to the metro station and within walking distance of most of the things I needed to get to.El apartamento es sencillo pero muy limpio y confortable,  esta situado en un excelente y céntrico lugar, si te gusta caminar podrás llegar a la gran mayoría de los lugares de interés en el centro de la ciudad y si quieres aventurarte un tanto con el metro o el tren de cercanías, la estación central de Atocha, esta bastante cerca, lo que te da una excelente conectividad. Marga and Maria are nice host. Maria came to pick me up at the airport (which save me lots of headache with transportation at 5 in the morning ;-) The bedroom I stayed in (single bed) is basic but comfortable and clean as is the bathroom. 
It's located less than 5min walk to the metro Embajadores and you can walk to the historic centre in about 15min. It was a nice stay and if you're on a budget I recommend it :-)Marga is a very good host. She is very helpful and she creates a nice friendly atmosphere in the house. I felt like at home. She picked me up at the train station and showed me all the directions. The location of the house is very central near to all tourist attractions. The room is comfortable. The house is clean and tidy. Marga is very kind, it was nice she offered meal and coffee. Thanks a lot Marga! Margarita è super disponibile e gentilissima! Sempre pronta ad aiutare e di compagnia. 
La casa è situata a soli 5 minuti a piedi da Plaza Mayor e a 30 metri dalla fermata della metropolitana Embajadores e 10 minuti a piedi dalla stazione dei treni/bus Atocha.
La casa è pulita e confortevole, la cucina è a disposizione degli ospiti così pure la connessione wifi.
E' una sistemazione perfetta per soggiornare a Madrid.
Die Unterkunft ist wunderbar und so, wie ich es mir gewünscht hatte: ruhig und zentral gelegen.
Die Gastgeberin ist sehr sympathisch, hilfsbereit und unkompliziert.
Margarita sabe cual es su negocio y lo hace muy bien como anfitriona. Nos recibió en la estación de Atocha y fuimos caminando hasta su apartamento, que queda a unos 10 min. Las habitaciones limpias y cómodas por el precio que se cobra. Muy amable y gentil, nos ayudo demasiado ya que a mi amigo le robaron su billetera en el mercado de San Miguel y ella nos acompaño a la estación de policía para hacer el denuncio y llamar para cancelar las tarjetas de crédito. Así que sin pensarlo nos quedaríamos de nuevo donde Margarita!  Mil gracias! Margarita is an amazing woman and a superb host! She made sure I had everything I needed when I arrived and spent time telling me about things I should do during my visit. She was available throughout my stay to answer questions or just chat and even accompanied me to the train station at 6am to depart. All in all, Margarita is incredibly gracious and this very much felt like a homestay! Perfect for solo travelers!

Like everyone else mentioned, Margarita does not speak any English, but she made every effort to communicate through non-verbal means with her guests that did not speak Spanish.It was an individual room in a family house and Marga (the host) was extremely nice, helpful and kind.Very close to the Embajadores metro station.
I could only stay one night and I got to the house when it was already dark so don't really know how close to some attractions is but Marga showed them in the map and looked fairly close.Take into account that there are at least two other (non-individual) rooms for rent so chances are you won't be the only guest in the house during your stay.
I would recommend this accommodation since the host and the room were nice but as I said, I basically only slept there and left in the morning.Margarita is a warm, relaxed, and welcoming hostess.  She came to meet me at Atocha, walked me back to the apartment and at the end of my stay drove me to the airport bus stop  She could not have been more helpful, generous or considerate.  Her apartment is large and quiet as it faces an interior courtyard, not a busy street.  My room was basic but clean and comfortable, with a good bed, ample closet/shelf space, a desk, chair and WiFi .Margarita is helpful, informative and very willing to share her kitchen and her company with her guests.  The neighbourhood is residential, close to Embajadores metro station, with cafes, a supermarket and a fruit stand nearby and the major museums with easy walking distance.Experiencia positiva. Margarita es una anfitriona excelente,  la habitación estupenda, el baño también, limpio y acogedor. Seguro que repito.
Relación precio calidad, buena.Bella esperienza da rifare senza esitazione. Grazie di tutto Marga.Margarita me hizo sentir como en casa! Mi estadía en su hogar fue excelente, no podría pedir más, me recogió en la estación, me indicó que visitar, dónde comer, me proporcionó un mapa con indicaciones, nos cocinó una tortilla estupenda, hasta tuvimos tiempo para charla con café luego de la cena. Súper recomendable como anfitriona y por supuesto también su hogar muy cerca de todo.This a conveniently located BnB. You can walk to a lot of the attractions and it is right next to the metro/renfe. The room we stayed in was quiet and comfortable. And there are two bathrooms which is great because you never have to wait! Margarita was a gracious host, she took my mother to the market on Mother's Day and invited her to have Mother's Day lunch with her and her family! Thank you both for having us.I'm so happy I stayed at Margarita's place! She's one amazing and hospitable lady.  When I arrived to her place, she took the time to show me everything, had a map if the city waiting for me and had a thorough session about what to see, how to get there and many amazing tips that saved me a lot of money! Her place is immaculate and very nice and comfy in a very safe equally clean area.  Everything is close by including the city center which is a10 mins walk from her place and is where all the action is.  Margarita is one if the most accommodating, attentive and sweetest hosts I've met on Airbnb.  I loved it here so much I ended up staying a few more days, which she was kind enough to let me do.  She's also full of sweet gestures: offering coffee or her delicious soup or even to accompany you to the metro station.  All in all I had a great time, and I'll be sure to stay with her again whenever I'm back to Madrid! Thank you very much for everything! Muchas gracias! :)The room is confortable and airy, the apartments in general was always clean. Also Margarida is a gently and helpful host and the location is very close to the subway. I highly recommend her!Hola!

Esta fue mi primera experiencia con Airbnb; y la verdad fue fenomenal. Margaita es una persona encantadora y muy amable; incluso se ofreció a venir a recogerme a la estación y acompañarme al piso. El piso está en perfectas condiciones.

No tengo más palabras que decir: gracias Margarita por esos fantásticos días y hasta la siguiente vez.I had a very comfortable stay here.  Margarita was very nice and caring, she was like a mother to me. So I felt o was home away from home.

The location is very good. You can walk from the apartment to Plaza Mayor or to Plaza Espana. If you don't like to walk much it is very near the metro too.C'était ma première visite a Madrid, elle restera inoubliable. Marga est vraiment géniale. Elle a été ma petite maman durant mon séjour, inquiète de mon confort et du bon déroulement de mon séjour à Madrid. Elle a été très disponible, c'est une personne vraiment généreuse et qui aime sa ville et qui veut nous la faire découvrir. 
Elle nous a fait aussi son très bon gaspacho et partage sa recette de tortilla. Je garde un merveilleux souvenir de mon séjour chez Marga. Muchas Gracias. Love. V. Mi estancia en casa de Margarita me gustó mucho, el cuarto estaba limpio y ella es la mejor anfitriona del mundo!!! Me ayudó mucho y es muy maja!! Hasta la próxima vez en Madrid, Margarita!

I enjoyed staying at Margarita´s house, the room was clean and she is simply the world´s best host!!! She helped me a lot and she is very nice and friendly!!  See you next time in Madrid, Margarita!

Ich habe meinen Aufenthalt in Margaritas Wohnung sehr genossen. Das Zimmer war sauber und ich muss sagen: Margarita ist die beste Gastgeberin der Welt! Sie war so hilfsbereit und half mir bei der Organisation meines Wochenendes in Madrid, gab mir Tipps und Ratschläge. Sie ist wirklich eine sehr nette Frau.
Bis zum nächsten Mal in Madrid, Margarita!

Bianca 

  Margarita, the owner, is very friendly and hospitable.  The apartment is clean and well located (5 min from the metro).  Breakfast was also great.  I enjoyed my stay and recommend this apartment to others visiting Madrid.  Marga is really a nice host , who acts as your mother and take care of you!! The living place is spacious and comfortable. The price is very low.
I highly recommend it to everybody!!Margarita fut une hôte très accueillante.
L'appartement est très bien situé, propre, simple et calme.
Si vous aimez énormément parler, Margarita sera l'hôte idéale. Elle vous présentera bien sûr les lieux touristiques principaux.
Bonne continuation Margarita! She was so nice. she was kind and the the breakfast was so good. she made  orange juice,caffee and omette.  she didn't stop feed us. 
just one problem was language, but We used (Hidden by Airbnb) translation and boby lanuage. So it wasn't problem later, and probably it was fun to me.
plus, the room was coZy and great.Margarita was very accommodating and generous during my stay. She came to collect me at the station and was very helpful to give me tips on Madrid. The room and apartment was comfortable and clean, well situated within walking distance to the city centre and many attractions. 

The only downside was that there was no air (Website hidden by Airbnb) Madrid is very hot late at night, I found it hard to sleep! Otherwise, I had a wonderful stay, muchas gracias Margarita!Our stay in Madrid was perfect thanks to warming Marga's house. 
She cleans it every day and tries to make our stay as comfortable as possible. 
You have to walk 5-10 min to Reina Sofia Museum, Atocha train station and about 15min to Prado Museum. 
She offered toast and coffee for breakfast. Her hospitality made my stay perfect and I would like to visit Madrid again :) 
I had great stay. I can speak a little spanish and was able to communicate. The location is good for being in the city as it is very close to the atocha train station.
Margarita is a very kind and even more helpful host. She didn't hesitate to be there when help was needed and made me and my friend, who decided to join me on very short notice, feel very comfortable and welcomed. The place is nice and clean and also very close to the centre of Madrid. I can only recommend Marga as a host! :)Maria was a great host and very hospitable. She cooked breakfast and recommended places to visit in Madrid. The only complaint I had was that there was a last minute change in location and I actually stayed in a different spot than I originally booked. The room i stayd in at marias place was ok.for the few days i stayd and the price i payed for i got along with it.maria and her hoyfriend are realy nice persons and they will help you if hey can, you just got to ask em.i would recomand that place for a short stay and a low budget.Margarita et Maria ont étés très accueillante. Par manque de place, je n'ai pas été logé à l'endroit indiqué sur la carte, mais près de la station de métro Oporto. C'est un peu plus  éloigné du centre, mais ça demeure un bon emplacement. La chambre était spacieuse et les lieux très propre.  Très agréable séjour chez Marga, le quartier est central et bien desservi par le métro mais aussi non loin de la gare d'Attocha. Chambre très bien pour une personne seule, le tout très propre. Marga vous met à l'aise en tout point! Fue muy agradable conocer a Marga, ella es muy atenta, me senti muy comoda y segura al hospedarme en su casa, la bienvenida y trato que ella brinda te hace sentir como en tu casa. Gracias Marga por todas tus atenciones!! Disfrute mucho nuestras charlas y el tiempo de television. Fuiste muy amable en ir a encontrarme a la estacion de tren! La ubicacion es perfecta cerca de los sitios de interes y muy bien comunicada, a una cuadra de la parada de autobus, metro, y tren cercanias. Te mando un abrazo. Margarita is a great host. She is friendly and helpful and will show you around the city of you want, or let you be on your own if you would rather do that. She is understanding and relaxed, and very responsive.

Her home is a family home,  comfortable and social, walking distance to pretty much everything,  close to Atocha also.

I would highly recommend staying here!

Muchas gracias Margarita!Staying with Margarita was a very nice experience in madrid! Although i cannot speak Spanish i managed to communicate and enjoy her very gracious company.
They treated so (Website hidden by Airbnb) i decided to stay here longer.
The apartment is 2 stops from the city center..the room was clean.
Highly recommended if you're on a tight budget and want to experience the local side of madridMi estancia en casa de Marga fue genial. Desde el primer momento Marga estuvo muy atenta a mi llegada y a todo lo que necesité, y estuve realmente a gusto. Además el piso está muy cerca de Pirámides, que era lo que estaba buscando.Ik werd gebracht door een vriendin, het bleek dat wij in de verkeerde Calle waren. Na een telefoontje naar Margarita kwam het voorspelde uur oponthoud prima uit!! Moeilijk te vinden met de auto dus, zeker omdat je onbekend bent in Madrid en er allemaal éénrichtingsverkeer is daar in die buurt. Ik kreeg een plattegrond en een Metro overzicht van Madrid!!
Margarita was elke dag hartelijk en zorgzaam, de kamer/het huis is schoon en wordt dagelijks schoongemaakt. Beddegoed natuurlijk niet; handdoeken hoefde ik maar om te vragen.
Haar huis ligt vlakbij het metrostation en een buslijn en er zijn ook fietsen die je uit een rek kunt halen en huren - erg makkelijk!
In de buurt was een kleine supermarkt, verderop een grotere. De straten zijn zelfs 's avonds goed verlicht en dat geeft een veilig gevoel. Uiteraard zijn er ook bedelaars, zoals in heel Madrid, maar daar had ik eigenlijk geen last van.
Ik heb een goed tijd daar gehad en zou daar naar terug gaan 
( indien ik weer naar Madrid zou gaan).J'ai passé un séjour très agréable avec l'aide de Margarita et sa fille, ce sont des personnes très aimables et très disponibles. Elles m'ont beaucoup aidée dans mes démarches administratives. L'appartement est très bien situé, proche du centre et de la gare Atocha. Margarita vous met à l'aise très rapidement comme dans une famille.Beaucoup de souplesse de la part des hôtes dans l'utilisation de toutes les pièces de l'appartement, on y est comme chez soi.I enjoyed my stay here for 5 nights. Apartment is clean and hosts were very nice. A block away from the train station, but you can easily get to main sights in 20 minutes or so by foot. Overall, a great stay in Madrid! Great Location, friendly host.RecomendMargarita es una persona genial. Se preocupó en todo momento de que todo fuese perfecto, con una atención maravillosa y un trato exquisito. Me sentí fenomenal en su casa y la recomiendo.  Me ayudó a mirar pisos, me acompañó a buscarme y me ofreció un desayuno muy variado y delicioso.  Su casa es grande y la habitación muy cómoda.  Fue un placer compartir unos días con ella y con su hija Ana.El apartamento de Marga es muy bien ubicado, cerca de la estación Renfe Atocha, el parque del Retiro, y se puede accesar la mayoría del Madrid centro a pie que me encantaba! Mi habitación doble fue espacioso y muy cómodo. Marga y su familia son muy simpáticos. A veces, la casa fue un poco concurrido, pero creo que es normal para una casa familiar además con huéspedes. Finalmente, lo importante - la conexión wifi funcionaba muy bien! :) En total, vale el precio. 
--
Marga's apartment is very well situated, close to the Atocha Renfe station, El Retiro park, and you can access most of central Madrid on foot, which I loved! My double room was spacious and very comfortable. Marga and her family are very friendly. At times, the house was a little busy but I think that's normal for a family home hosting guests too. Finally, the important thing - the wifi connection was great! :)  Overall, worth the money.      Splendid experience I had in this room. The room is cozy, the host is kind. Really close to Atocha station, and approachable with a subway. The host was really nice. The trip to Madrid was fantastic, well supported by this room.I stayed at Margarita's house for two nights during my short visit to Madrid. My experience went on perfectly well, as the house is based in the center of the city, well positioned between a few metro stations and I could even easily walk to most parts of the central area. 

Margarita was a wonderful host, extremely helpful and friendly and made me feel at home! My room was great - perfectly clean with a cozy bed. I also had access to the living room, if I fancied relaxing in front of a TV, kitchen where I could prepare my own food at any time and two always spotlessly clean bathrooms. 

I would definitely recommend Margarita's home and I surely hope I get a chance to visit again!Espectacular Margarita. Ella es una perfecta anfitriona, te llena de informacion, responde todas tus preguntas, tiene mapas preparados para los turistas, y conoce muy bien las ubicaciones de las cosas dentro u fuera de la ciudad. Respecto al cuarto, todo muy limpio, amplio y confortable. Ha sido una grata experiencia, y si tuviera que volver a Madrid seguro volveria a su casa.Cuando llegué Margarita me esperaba, me ayudó a instalarme y me ofreció información sobre como moverme por la ciudad de Madrid de manera eficaz. La conexión de Wi Fi funcionó correctamente. Pude descansar para reponerme del largo viaje ya que el lugar es silencioso y acogedor. Me he sentido como en casa.  Margarita es muy amable. La casa es muy limpia y está bien ubicada.
El único problema fue que en verano con las altas temperaturas de Madrid sólo disponía de un ventilador para  compartirlo con los otros huéspedes. This was my first experience with airbnb and I’m glad I got to stay at Margarita’s house. I stayed for six weeks and I always felt welcome.
The flat is well located, near Atocha and Lavapies so walking to centre Madrid is very easy and close.
All the common places, (bathroom, kitchen and lounge) were always clean and organised. The room were I stayed was also clean and stayed clean for the time I was there. The bed was comfortable and with a desk for work if I needed. 
Margarita is always willing to help you with anything, she picked me up from Atocha station and she always has tips of how to get to places or where to buy stuff.
I will definitely recommend this place to future travellers!
Marga made me feel really welcome when I first arrived, showing me where things were in Madrid. Marga was really chatty and friendly, which helped me speak Spanish! The room was clean and she always offered to do washing for me, great for a temporary stay in Madrid. Muchas gracias Marga! Besos xAnnak ellenére, hogy nem beszél angolul (szerencsére akadt ott lakó  alkalmi tolmács), minden zökkenőmentesen zajlott. Rendkívül szívélyes, minden segítséget megkaptam (térkép, címek, tippek).Todo estuvo perfecto, Margarita y Maria son geniales. Siempre puedes tener una noche de charla con margarita y una taza de te caliente. Sin duda volvería a quedarme allí.It was the first time I was using airbnb and it turned to be a great experience. Marga is very serviceable and willing to help at any time. The room had a queen size bed, a reasonable wardrobe to comfortably fit clothes for 1 week, and a decent desk for a laptop. Also the rest of the flat is nice, with good wifi connection, and the house was always clean. Marga's place will be the first I check the next time I go to MadridMi estancia con Margarita y María ha sido muy agradable. Se preocupan mucho de que estés a gusto. La casa está limpia y cuidada. Y la zona donde se encuentra muy bien comunicada y con todas las tiendas y negocios a mano. Así que si buscas en Madrid, un alojamiento económico y de calidad  ¡este es tu sitio!Persona gentile e simpatica, camera accogliente, posizione perfetta... Da ritornarci.... Un ringraziamento a Marga...Es mi primera vez como huésped y fue excelente, Margarita es una excelente anfitriona me hizo sentir como en casa. Me ayudo con mi ropa y me recibió con un plato de sopa delicioso. La casa muy limpia y muy fácil de moverse en transporte público. 100% recomendada ! 11일동안 마드리드에 머물면서 숙소는 진짜 잘 정했구나하고 생각했습니다. 제가 물갈이를 좀 해서 아팠는데 신경 써주셔서 굉장히 감사했습니다. 웬만한 관광지는 다 걸어서 다닐 수 있어요. 제가 걷는거 좋아해서 지하철 거의 안 탄거 같은데, 웬만한 관광지 전부 다 멀어봤자 걸어서 30분이고 가까운 곳은 10분이면 가요.I felt like Marga was my second mother during my stay in Madrid. After having had my debit card get stuck in the airport atm, I was pretty stressed when I arrived at her apartment. She immediately invited me to tea and cookies and I chatted with her and her daughter. She made me feel so welcome that I immediately forgot about the debit card fiasco.  Aside from always being a great conversation companion (we spoke in Spanish), Marga was also toiling away always, whether cleaning, cooking, or buying groceries. I don't think you will be able to get this kind of quality of airbnb for the price anywhere else in Madrid. My room had a big, comfortable bed and a desk, and plenty of space for storage. Everything was really clean and the wifi worked really well. The apartment is located a 2 minute walk away from the metro stop Embajadores, which is only two stops away from Sol, the center of the city. I most definitely recommend to this airbnb to anyone looking to have a comfortable stay in Madrid on a low budget.NOT A GOOD EXPERIENCE...UNFORTUNATELY the room Margarita made me sleep in, was NOT the one shown on the pictures. The room where I slept in, was much smaller, and in front of the window was a wall, so that it was almost always DARK and no daylight could enter; it was next to the kitchen, you could smell every smell from the kitchen and hear all conversations. It had nothing to to with the description..

When asking about changing the end of my stay (Margarita told me it was more reasonable to go to the airport in the evening, because my flight was so early), she first told me it was not possible through Airbnb, which is not true, as I know from my experience as a host; and then lied to the Aribnb customer service about the day of my departure.

Furthermore, the host offered me prior to my arrival to pick me up from the airport for 25 Euros, which seemed very strange for me. In my point of view Airbnb is not supposed to be used for a private Taxi-company. 

Even though the flat is very central, I would not recommend anyone to go there. Putting wrong pictures on the announce is a very dishonest thing to do...

The price was much to high for this little cell with little light. I chose to pay more for having a nice room; for the place I ended up in,  even 10 Euro would have been too much...

Very deceiving.....Amazing hosts! The apartment is very well organized and clean! I loved my bedroom! The neighborhood is very nice, near the metro, Atocha train station and few minutes walk from city centre! I recommend this place for sure! Very nice experience!Marga es una anfitriona estupenda. Hace todo para que te sientas bien. Ofrece algo para beber o comer. Toma tiempo para charlar. Te lleva a lugares desconocidos.
La ubicación del piso es central entre el centro y la estación. Buses y metro están a algunos pasos si no te gusta andar. 
Muchas gracias Maria !
Marga made me feel very welcome and no request was too much for her. She is an easy going, hard working person who wants her guests to feel at home. The listing was accurate as described. I really liked being in a neighbourhood where every day madrileños live and work. Local shop keepers and residents were friendly and helpful, and very few tourists are evident. I liked being able to walk to the main 3 art museums in 20 minutes or take the metro anywhere only two short blocks away. Highly recommended.Estar en casa de Margarita es estar como en casa. 100% recomendable. Para desayunar le compró a Joan (el hijo de mi amiga) la leche que toma de costumbre y una noche le invitó a cenar. Le explicó como ir a los sitios (buses, metro, etc), muy cariñosa. Excelente!!!!Mi estadía en lo de Margarita fue excelente. Ella y Maria son muy buenas personas y me ayudaron en todo lo que necesité y verdaderamente me hicieron sentir en mi casa. La habitación es comoda y el piso es grande. Esta ubicado a 2 minutos de la estación de Metro pero puedes caminar tranquilamente a Plaza Mayor y de camino pasas por La Latina.
Si vas a Madrid, tienes que ir a lo de Margarita.Margarita é uma pessoal muito simpática, super prestativa, sempre de bom humor e disposta a ajudar. Super recomendo ! Gracias por todo Marga <3 Very nice apartments! Very clean, there was everything what I need. Location is very good, Maria and Margarita are very friendly!! Muy buena. Margarita y su hija son muy amables. Todo está limpio. Te dan recomendaciones para tu estadía. Margarita es muy atenta. El departamento esta muy bien ubicado. Desde el se puede acceder a pie a los lugares mas bellos e interesantes de la ciudad. La habitacion esta bien para una sola persona y tiene una linda ventana por donde se ve el interior del edificio. La atencion de Margarita se siente desde el primer momento. Desde la limpieza del lugar, cafes y consejos para aprovechar todo. Recomiendo!Pro- Great location. 
Con- no a/c They both made me very welcome. They were kind and full of advice plus gave me maps. The place is very central with Retiro park nearby and the Reina de Sofia art gallery very close too. An excellent place as a cheap pad to explore central Madrid.The flat is very well located: close to the center, the train station and all the important sights and museums. The room is reasonably clean as is the apartment itself. You can use the kitchen for your meals and in the morning Marga would make some coffee and leave it on the kitchen counter for anyone who might want a cup. There were four other people in the apartment during my stay, all of them students - keep in mind that it can feel a little crowded at times and you have to figure out the best time to use the amenities. Marga and Maria are friendly and helpful, it certainly helps if you speak Spanish. All in all, it's a perfect place for someone who is on a budget or/and doesn't plan on spending too much time at home. Alojarse con Marga es como sentirse un poco en casa, ella es una excepcional anfitriona.  Me quedé en su casa por dos semanas y me sentí muy a gusto, pude llegar fácil a cualquier punto de la ciudad porque queda a una cuadra de la estación de metro y pude regresar a cualquier hora porque está ubicada en un vecindario tranquilo. Recomiendo quedarse en su casa ya sea por estudios, vacaciones, turismo o cualquier otro propósito.Neighbourhood is extremely central - the place is near a metro line and so easy to get around. Super recomendable.I had a very pleasant stay with Margarita and Maria. I recommend it 100%.Excellent stay at Margarita's house. Margarita y sus hijas son muy amables y te hacen sentir como en casa. Llegue antes de la hora de check-in y Marga no tuvo problemas en dejarme pasar. Siempre me ofrecieron desayunar en la casa. También tienes la opción de hacer comida en la casa. El cuarto es apropiado para una persona, tiene un escritorio y una percha para colocar la ropa en ganchos.  El apartamento está muy cerca del metro de Embajadores. Y estás a 15 minutos de camino a pie hasta el Museo Reina Sofía y la estación de Atocha. 
Definitivamente recomendaría este lugar. Die Unterkunft liegt zentral , sehr nah an der Metro Embajadores, in Spaziernähe des südlichen Endes des sonntäglichen Rastro, in einem typisch spanischen Wohnblock und in solider Wohngegend.
Nichts Aufregendes, aber eben auch erholsam ruhig, wenn man nach einem langen Studientag oder aus dem Lärm der Stadt zurückkehrt.

Die Schlafzimmer liegen alle zum Innenhof, sind also auch sehr ruhig, bis auf das typisch nachbarschaftliche Unterhaltungsprogramm.

Bad, WC und Küche stehen zur Verfügung und werden mit allen Bewohnern geteilt, Rücksichtnahme ist notwendig, klappte aber wunderbar.

Marga, die Gastgeberin, ist eine sehr freundliche agile Person, die sich stetes nach dem Wohlergehen der Gäste erkundigt, sie spricht aber nur spanisch.

The place is really perfect in Madrid, in a wonderful neighborhood.

The kitchen is easy to use if you need to cook (we usually had our breakfast there). Many groceries or boulangeries around.

José Miguel has been very helpful to find good adresses and really appreciated to bring us some good tips (places really special and where only madrilène go).
We discovered the Real Madrid thanks to him.

I 100% recommande jose Miguel appartement to go and visit Madrid.
