comments:
Localización, recibimiento y servicio perfecto. Muy recomendable.Sin duda la principal virtud del alojamiento es la ubicación, excelente, amén de trato del anfitrión, siempre muy atento a cuantas necesidades pudiera solucionar.
El principal inconveniente, para viajeros como yo que al final de un día de turismo le place el descanso, es el ruido provocado por un establecimiento de hostelería ubicado justo debajo del alojamiento. Una pena.
En cuanto a las instalaciones, correctas, salvo el altillo en donde está la cama de matrimonio (que no tiene altura suficiente para permanecer erguido ...) y el único ropero, que no alcanza estandar de calidad mínima.Perfekte Lage: Eine Metrostation, Gran Vía, das kreative Viertel Malasaña und Puerta de Sol kann man in wenigen Minuten zu Fuß erreichen. Mario war sehr freundlich und hat dafür gesorgt, dass wir uns in der Wohnung wohlfühlen. Genug Platz für bis zu 6 Personen - für diesen Preis wirklich überragend :)

Totalmente recomendable!Una experiencia satisfactoria, el piso muy limpio y suficiente espacio para las 6 personas. Situado en una zona buenísima y con parkings alrededor económicos. El anfitrión muy amable y estuvo ahí para darnos indicaciones de lo que necesitáramos. Volveríamos a repetir . No probs at all and delightful little place well worth the Euros.Mario è stato molto gentile e disponibile e la casa è in una posizione comodissima per visitare la città.
el departamento esta muy bien ubicado, es algo chico para 6 personas, y no tiene aire acondicionado, muy necesario en verano
Fabulous location! It was downtown where you could go shopping, find plenty of places to eat or just simply explore. Thank you Mario for a great stay,

AngelaEverything was amazing! Thank you Mario!Mario was the perfect host, waiting up for us even though our flight was delayed and we didn’t arrive until 2am! He even left us a bottle of wine to enjoy J
The apartment itself is in the perfect location, on a pedestrian only street lined with restaurants, and literally 1 min from Callao station and the shops of Gran Via. It is also only a 5 min walk to Plaza de Sol and less than 10 minutes from Plaza Mayor.
The kitchen is well equipped and the bathroom is a good size. Everything was clean and well looked after.
The lack of air conditioning means that it can get quite hot and stuffy, but Mario has provided many fans and there is a balcony which can be opened to let in some air.
All in all, I would 100% recommend this apartment and will definitely stay here again.Iy was a gereat experience..Mario was very friendly, welcoming..

La ubicación es excelente! Tan solo cruzas la calle y tienes todo Madrid río con sus parques y entretenimientos, además de que está cerca del centro. Amalia es una persona atenta y me ha hecho sentir muy cómodo allí. Definitivamente recomiendo su habitación, su casa y su compañía. De hecho, ya he vuelto a reservar con ella para otra ocasión. Amalia y Fran son muy amables.El piso es genial,la localización es perfecta si quieres estar por el centro.Lo recomiendo al 100 %!The place was wonderful on a perfect locqtion in waking range of the centre, yet calm and quiet. The hosts were wonderful and we are sorry we didn't have more time to spend with them. L appartement est situé au bord d une promenade très agréable avec aire de jeux,on peut y pratiquer le vélo ou le footing!il est situé à 5mn à pied du métro, 30 mn à pied de la place Major et face au stade!
La salle de bain privative n est pas attenante à la chambre
On peut utiliser la cuisine et le séjour
Je n ai vu que le compagnon d Amalia,qui nous a accueillis! Malgré notre retard,il nous a donné quelques conseils pour se rendre en ville!
Todo perfecto. Amalia y Fran son muy simpáticos y nos ayudaron en todo. La casa es hermosa y luminosa, el dormitorio muy cómodo y con baño propio. La ubicación también es muy buena, frente al río  y bien comunicado con todo a pie y metro. Lo recomendamos!! Saludos y gracias por todo!Todo muy bien, muchas gracias !Amalia foi muito atenciosa conosco e nos deixou muito confortáveis em sua casa. O quarto é como anunciado, assim como o banheiro. Super amables y atentos!!! 100% recomendado!! Wonderful stay. Very friendly and accommodating. Amalia y Fran son lo maximo, muy amables, me ayudaron bastante, me hicieron sentir como si estuviera en mi propia casa.  Levantarme  todo los dias y ver el Calderon desde la habitacion no tiiene precio.  Fui a ver la final De la Copa del Rey y el estadio esta tan cerca que cuando llegue me quede impresionado...priceless!!! No se puede pedir mas, todo estuvo excelente y maravilloso.  Si tuviera que hacerlo todo otra vez no lo pensaria dos veces.  Amalia y Fran son excelentes personas...muchas gracias por su hospitalidad chicos! Fue un placer conocerlos y again, gracias por todo son lo maximo!!!Nous avons passé un agréable séjour, Amalia et son compagnon nous on conseillé sur la ville. L'emplacement de l'appartement est génial, proche d'un petit parc où l'on peut faire du sport, face au stade de l'atlético de Madrid. Enfin bref  nous avons passé une superbe semaine, dans un appartement très propre est très agréable. Merci encore ! Pauline et Chloé.Magnifico sejour en casa de Amalia. Muy atenta a nuestras necesidades y muy simpatica. La recomiendo!!!Amalia es muy amable, el lugar cómodo y es tal cual como está descrito. Todo estuvo según lo acordado y más (Fran, debido a su ubicación laboral en el día de nuestro arribo se ofreció a buscarnos en el aeropuerto, lo cual me parece es un gesto sumamente destacable). La habitación es más amplia de lo que parece en las fotos, desde un primer momento dispusimos del uso completo de la cocina que nos fue de utilidad. La ubicación, si bien no está en el centro fue muy cómoda y el barrio muy agradable, teniendo el parque del río Manzanares en frente. 100% recomendable!!!Acomodação bem aconchegante, transporte público bastante acessível, excelente hospitalidade dos anfitriões, que estavam sempre prontos para quaisquer duvidas que tivéssemos. Recomendadíssimo :)I spent almost three weeks with Amalia and Fran. They were helpful and nice, Amalia even came to help me carry my suitcase from the metro station when I arrived. The bed was very comfortable and the private bathroom was nice. The wifi was fast. I had a very peaceful time at their place.Un lugar muy bonito al lado del Parque Madrid Río. Está perfecto para descansar y también muy cerca del centro de la ciudad. Amalia y Fran son chicos muy amables y simpáticos. Disfruté mi tiempo aquí mucho. Puedo recomendar esta casa 100%.Súper estancia con Amalia y Fran :)Amalia and Fran are great hosts. They are easy going, genuine and kind. The location is not far from the city centre (it is walkable or you can reach it by metro), there is a fruit shop next door and a grocery store next door. The location is super if you enjoy running, walking and biking along the water. Anfitriones super amables, piso bien ubicado.
sin duda repetirá.Шикарное место расположения, хорошие удобства и приличная общая зона, живет одна хозяйка, никаких других жильцов. Мы опоздали, но нас дождались и все показали. La habitación está muy bien y el baño está un poco pequeño pero muy funcional con todo lo necesario. Se puede utilizar en cualquier momento los espacios públicos. Si vuelo a Madrid, seguro que voy buscar por su casa como la primera opción!Ubicación cerca al metro, un sector muy lindo, hay de todo y muy económico. El centro está a solo 20 min en metro. comments:
Ursula was a wonderful host. The room is spacious and the apartment has everything you need. The apartment is centrally located at the top of Gran VIa- great for exploring the city! 
We loved our stay- Thanks Ursula! Ursula y su familia son majisimos. Siempre está dispuesta a ayudarte y lo facilita todo. El piso está muy bien ubicado, al lado de Plaza España y Gran Vía. Esta todo muy limpio,  espacios bien aprovechados y decoración acogedora. La habitación es amplia,  idónea para dos. Si buscas un lugar céntrico y económico, limpio, para visitar la ciudad, es tu sitio. Gracias Ursula!I didnt have the chance to meet Ursula , but she kept in touch with me all the time , unfortunately i did have to change the dates of the arrival and she was booked , but she offered me another room in another place to stay and i agreed , after a few days she called me to  tell me i could arrived at the place i was booked before , and everything was great , great room , friendly environment  and all was nice , definitely i will stay again in here!

No tuve el placer de conocer a Ursula, pero ella estuvo al pendiento conmigo todo el tiempo en mi llegada , degraciadamente tuve que cambiar las fechas que habia  reservado  y ella estaba llena pero se ofrecio a darme un cuarto en otro lugar  y acepte , despues de unos dias me hablo para comunicarme que si queria pasarme a su departamento  y acepte y todo muy bien , el ambiente era muy bueno , perfecta ubicación en la gran via y la plaza españa , muy cerca de la  estacion de metro , sin duda volveria a llegar !Stay in Ursulas place was try spanish- wormth and relax . I even learn  som spanish words :). Location of appartment is great too - very central .  Ursula was a very welcoming host. The room was ideal for a quick trip to Madrid.Maravillosamente bien,voy a volverUna estada agradable, con gente muy simpática. El piso esta realmente céntrico pero nos faltó poder usar aagua caliebte (lavar platos y ducha), nos faltó calefacción en la habitación (pasamos mucho frío) y nos falto más espacio en el pis, pasillos muy estrechos, cocina con poco espacio para montar la mesa, etc.Mon séjour a été très bien !! J'ai adoré. La chambre est confortable et grande. L'appartement a beaucoup de charme et est très très bien situé. Merci :) Desde que entre al piso, Ursula y su familia me hicieron sentir como en mi casa. Son personas increíbles, siempre dispuestas a ayudarte y hacer de tu estadía una linda experiencia!! La habitación es muy cómoda y amplia. El piso tiene todo lo que necesitas ademas de que siempre estaba muy limpio. Porúltimo la ubicación es excelente, ideal para conocer Madrid!!! Lo recomiendo!!!Muy buena, Ursula es súper amable y atentaÚrsula es una persona muy atenta y agradable. El barrio está en una situación perfecta para poder hacer turismo por Madrid. Perfectamente comunicado en cuanto a transportes o también perfecto para las personas que quieran caminar y visitar cosas.My host Ursula made me feel very welcome. The bed was very comfortable, the key and entrance was very easy. She showed me around and showed me what I could use, how to work the shower, and I had a very comfortable stay. She made me feel like family, which was very supportive in a time when I am moving to a new country! I slept well, very peacefully, had WiFi, coffee in the morning, a hot shower when I wanted one, and space for my bags. Ursula helped me with my stay more than she needed to, she was great. She was an angel!Todo bien organizado sin problemas... Comunicación 100% con Ursula y familia... Bien situado el piso, habitación grande genial, sin ruidos y lo unico es un poco de frio en la habitación, pero con fácil solucion... Recomendable 100%Ursula est très accueillante et aux petits soins. Elle insiste pour qu'on se sente comme à la maison et s'arrange pour qu'on soit très vite à son aise. 

La situation est idéale, en plein centre. Tout est à distance de marche. On est à deux pas du Palais royal comme des petits quartiers sympas où chiner et boire un verre. Le métro permet un accès très facile à l'aéroport. 

La chambre et les commodités sont basics mais propres et très calmes. 

Si vous cherchez un endroit pratique et fonctionnel où dormir en plein centre, vous avez trouvé ici un bon rapport qualité prix.

Apartment was nice, with a good central location right near the Gran Via street. The beds were very comfortable, but the bedroom was quite cold at night (in February). Hot water in the shower did not last very long (less than 10 min), so my friend and I had to take quick showers for the two days (one night) we were there. We had some slight problems with the check in time, and had to carry our backpacks around the city with us all day after check-in was delayed, but the host was very welcoming and nice when we arrived.My friend and I only had about 24 hours in Madrid and Ursula's flat was perfect for our situation! Despite the language barrier, Ursula was very welcoming and understanding! The location is fabulous with tons of shops, restaurants, bars and sights within walking distance. I wish we could have stayed longer! :) Ursula es una chica encantadora,la habitación esta en un sitio céntrico de Madrid,muy bien comunicado con el metro,sin embargo no me esperaba llegar de noche cansados y tener que hacer nosotros la cama subidos a una escalera apoyada en una estructura inestable a dos metros del suelo,con una mano,ya que la otra tenía que sujestarse.Esperabamos poder dormir en una cama y no en una litera ya digo que inestable tan arriba,más de lo (Website hidden by Airbnb) reservar la foto me hizo pensar que la cama con colcha amarilla era donde dormiríamos pero ahí había  sólo dos colchones negros pequeños uno encima de otro.Existía la opción de tirar uno  en el suelo pero sinceramente no nos apetecía porque uno estaba encima de la estructura de cama y el otro fisicamente en el suelo.Hacía frío y había ruido de la calle por la carpintería tan vieja y por ser viernes noche imagino.Las toallas que nos ofrecieron estaban muy gastadas y eran de mano,imposible pensar en ducharse.Elegi esta opción porque por la fecha todo Madrid estaba sin plazas disponibles de hoteles o b&b y aunque barato me esperaba algo medianamente confortable y espacioso como parece en la foto.La foto de la web es profesional,poco que ver con la realidad.El contacto con Ursula antes y mientras fue excelente,pena que las instalaciones no cumplan.Lo sientoThis was a fantastic place to stay. Ursula was very welcoming and happy to have me stay with her. Location is ideal, right on the Plaza and a five minute walk from 2 metro stations. I would highly reccommend this airbnb!Great location! Ursula was super nice and warm! Great to be around when away from home. Ursula's place is at the heart of city and very convenient to get to the tourist attractions. Very close to metro and good cafes as well. There were few hiccups though- we booked the room shown in photo 4 weeks ago but just 5 days before we were supposed to arrive, she asked us if we can stay in windowless room as the other room was booked. The window less room was really tiny and was not comfortable. It sort of left sour taste. 
Also the building does not have lift and her apartment is on second floor, so if you have heavy luggage, you might wanna consider it.
the host is nice and the bed is good...but the room is a little bit cold...La descripción del lugar es correcta. El espacio es acogedor. Ursula es una excelente anfitriona, da consejos y sugerencias de que hacer, es empatica y muy respetuosa del espacio e intimidad. Me hizo sentir como en casa de alguien familiar. Esta en una excelente ubicación de fácil acceso y todo te queda caminando si te gusta caminar o en metro si no eres fan de caminar.

Anyhow,  the room is cozy spacious and lovely in a good location. I'd certainly recommend it.Ursula人很热情,虽然她不会说英语,但是依然很努力的和我们沟通,房间的位置在市中心｡交通方便｡谢谢Ursula!The location is very convenient!the room is little smaller than picture but it's still nice!The flat is clean and Ursula has two sweet kids!The water of shower is small and living with family you should be careful about your voice.But I don't mind.I have stayed there for 2 nights,one night is quiet but the other is noisy. Ursula is nice and friendly although she can't speak English and I can't speak Spanish either.All in all it is a nice flat.I will go back again if I travel alone!The location is very good. It is only few steps away from metro station and market. It is also near good tourist points. But the room is smaller than on the picture. The pressure of water in the shower is very low. There is no kitchen table in the flat. Ursula - the host is nice and helpful, although she can't speak English and I can't speak Spanish either. So we communicated through airbnb profile.We stayed in the apartment of Ursula for ten days. 
The apartment is located in a great area, very very close to Plaza de Espana, the metro, Sol square and city center. We could go anywhere, quickly and easily, on foot or by metro.
We got a private room, quite small, but enough for us. It is clean and breezy and the beds were comfortable.
The apartment is not large but very clean (Ursula really careful about it, and it's excellent)

Ursula is very, very nice and funny young woman. She does not know English, and we did not know Spanish, but nevertheless we managed to communicate and became good friends.
It was very important to her that we feel at home and so it was.

In conclusion, we had a wonderful vacation in Madrid, and many thanks to the experience of living with Ursula and her family.
Ursula was very receptive to our needs, and told us about the things to see and do in Madrid at the time of our stay. The room was in the city center of Madrid, and was very close to many of the city's main attractions. On était trois pour un petit séjour de 3 jours à Madrid qui s'est très bien passé. L'appartement de Ursula est très bien situé, à une minute du métro, pas très loin de Palais Royale. La chambre est un peu plus petite qu'elle ne paraît dans les photos mais elle en parfaite état et Ursula est une hôte très sympathique, accueillante et aidante malgré la barrière de la langue ! Location, Location, Location!! Across from Metro Station and Plaza Espana where most tour motor coaches meet. Very clean! We stayed at the smaller room with bunk beds. Ursula described everything with details before we finalized the reservation so there were no surprises.  I will definitely recommend Ursula's place to my friends and will definitely stay here again when we go back to Madrid.Das Zimmer befindet sich in unmittelbarer Nähe des Plaza de Espana. Vom Flughafen aus leicht durch die Metro zu erreichen. Es ist schön und liebevoll eingerichtet und wie auf dem Bild abgebildet. Die Küche und das Bad sind direkt vor der Tür. Die Küche ist etwas klein, aber gut ausgestattet. Ich habe sie nicht benutzt, sondern die Restaurants in der Nähe ausgetestet. Ursula spricht leider kein Englisch, trotzdem war die Kommunikation mittels (Hidden by Airbnb) und (Hidden by Airbnb) Translate gut möglich. Ich komme gerne wieder, auch wenn die Nachbarschaft nicht ruhig ist. Das sollte man bedenken, wenn man eine Wohnung in der Nähe der Gran Via nimmt, einer stark befahrenen Straße. Das Zimmer liegt glücklicherweise zur Seitenstraße hin. Allerdings sorgen die Bars und die feierwütigen Spanier dafür, dass es Nachts etwas lauter zugeht. Alles in allem ein gelungener Kurzurlaub. Danke Dir, Ursula.A estadia foi ótima, Ursula é muito atenciosa e tudo estava arrumado em ordem. Recomendo! Muy buena la ubicación del departamento, todo es caminable, pleno centro y metro al lados. Ursula muy buena disposición en guiarnos. Ursula felt much more like a friend than a host.  She was lovely and the perfect ambassador for Madrid.  She was enthusiastic about her city and had many great ideas for where to go and what to see.  Her darling kids were a pure delight - but we only saw them if we wanted to interact with them (in case you're not into kids).  The room was clean and spacious.  Staying with Ursula will definitely add value to your time in Madrid.Todo bien. Ursula fue muy dulce, su hija fue adorable. 

Excelente comunicaciónWe had a great stay with Ursula. The location is right in the city center with bars, restaurants, and theaters. Room was clean and quite. Happy to come back anytime...Ursula me ayudó desde el primer momento... y hace que te sientas en casa. El piso está super céntrico, al lado de plaza España, y a 10 minutos andando de las principales plazas y calles de Madrid.
Ya sabe que me reservo un fin de semana muy prontito en su casa otra vez...Ursula was the perfect host, she was sweet, kind and very patient with us :)good locationUrsula is a very friendly and helpful host. The room is in the best location of Madrid. We couldnt ask for a better location. Although Ursula speaks only spanish, we had no problem in communicating and coordinating with her. I would come back and stay at ursula's place again in the future when I come to Madrid. Ursula Is a very nice, helpful and comprehensive host. She helped me during my stay in Madrid ^^. The apartment was very clean, beautiful and very sell located, in the main center of the city. 
I really appreciated my stay in Madrid.
Muchas Gracias Ursula :*Básico y limpio. Céntrico al lado del metro plaza España.Ursula es muy atenta, estuvo pendiente en todo momento y me ofreció todas las facilidades. El dormitorio muy amplio y agradable. Ursula is very very passionate host ! she host me and my parents for 2nights in Madrid , we love her so much and her cutttttyyyy babe Eva !!! and everything is clean , clam and nice ! and next time if we go back to Madrid , we still want stay here !!!!!! kisssss and thank you every things ! Estuvimos unos días en casa de Úrsula y su familia y nos trataron como si fuera nuestra propia casa. Ella es encantadora y súper atenta y la habitación está genial. El piso es muy céntrico. Salimos encantados con la amabilidad de todos :)Ursula is very welcoming and helpful. She is darling. I felt like I was staying with family.

The room is small but cozy; it is very centralized for exploring Madrid. The metro is a 2 min walk from the flat. 

I would return again.

Hemos pasado un gran fin de semana en Madrid, y en gran parte ha sido gracias a Ursula por su simpatía y amabilidad con nosotros, el piso es un 10. Muy recomendable 房东一家都非常的好,小女儿特别可爱,虽然语言不通,但是借助谷歌翻译和胡乱比划还是可以交流的,哈哈｡重点是真的太方便了,基本上走路就可以到达大部分的景点,楼下的超市开到十二点,走两步就是地铁站,强烈推荐!The apartment is really convenient, it is located right next to Plaza de España, which is in Gran Vía (main street in Madrid). Ursula is an amazing host, during the time that I was at the apartment I was a bit sick and she just made me feel like home. Overall, it was a great experience, I highly recommend it. 

El apartamento es muy conveniente, está ubicado justo al lado de Plaza de España en la calle Gran Vía (calle importante de Madrid). Ursula es una excelente anfitriona, durante mi estadía estaba un poco enferma y ella me hizo sentir como en casa, siempre estuvo pendiente de mi. En general, fue una muy buena experiencia y lo recomiendo muchísimo. The apartment is in the hearth of gran Via so the position is great, a 1 minute walking distance from the metro station, a park and many local restaurants and pubs. However this comes with its negative side, the street is really noisy (specially on the pride weekend) and people shout outside the window until 5 am so make sure u bring ur own earplugs. The house is comfortable and nice but for a summer weather in Madrid is just too hot and it has no AC so be prepared for it. Ursula is really kind, she helped us and even offer us a bigger nicer room for our stay, great host!Staying at Ursula's made us feel right at home! She's sweet, friendly and super helpful. Don't be afraid to ask her for recommendations, she so knowledgeable about what Madrid has to offer. Her place is not only very clean and central, but it's located in Plaza de España across from the metro station. Her location makes it so simple and accessible for you to visit so many places such as: Plaza Mayor, Museo de Prado, Parque de Retiro, Puerta de Alcala, Corte Inglés, and Puerta del Sol. There's also many great flamenco shows in the area and one down the street that we enjoyed at Casa de Chinitas. We can't wait to return to Madrid and stay with Ursula! I had a wonderful stay with Ursula. She was a considerate host who checked in frequently, asked me if I needed any recommendations or directions, and was genuinely warm and fun. 

The room I stayed in was spacious and well-lit with a balcony window. Be aware that there's plenty of noise on the street at night. Ursula also cares about cleanliness/tidiness, so that's something to keep in mind. 

It's conveniently located in the center of the city, which gives you easy walking access to cultural landmarks such as (Royal Palace, Prado), shopping, delicious food (Mercado de San Miguel) and a range of neighborhood sites. The location is very convenient. Though might be slight loud in the weekend but that's how Madrid is. Just embrace it or better yet join the locals at the plaza! The room got light and true to description. Her husband has been helpful throughout. Decent experience overall.Todo fue sobre ruedas, el apartamento coincidia con la descripcion, muy bien situado en el centro de Madrid. Ursula muy comprensiva, amable y atenta a que estuviesemos bien.
Ursula siempre atenta a colaborar.  Un lugar como para el descanso. La ubicación es ideal para conocer los lugares centrales de Madrid Úrsula fue muy amable con nosotros desde el principio hasta el final de nuestra estancia, la cual fue corta pero hizo que nos sintiéramos como en casa. Nos contactamos diariamente y siempre nos recalcaba que estaba a nuestra disposición por cualquier duda y/o problema. Al irnos de Madrid en camino a otra ciudad, ella siempre mantuvo en contacto con nosotros ofreciéndose por si surgía algún obstáculo en el camino. El lugar limpio, cómodo y en pleno centro superó todas nuestras expectativas.
 ¡Totalmente recomendado!Ursula was a wonderful host! Very kind and caring, and she checked in regularly to see that I was enjoying myself and whether I needed anything. The location of the apartment is amazing; immediately near a metro stop and walkable to the center of the city. The room was clean and sufficient. Overall a very positive experience! Ursula is very kind. She is a warm host who welcomed my family and went out of her way to make us feel comfortable. The place was neat and clean and it was good staying there for two nights. Would recommend :)Thanks again. Also for availability on short notice and fast communication. We came back for one night. Very central place right in the heart of Madrid.Excelente ubicación!! Muy limpio! Ursula es muy amable Úrsula es una persona muy amable y atenta con quienes decidimos quedarnos en su cuarto.  Después de terminar la estancia ella siguió pendiente y en disposición de colaborar con lo que se necesitase... 
Lo único es que al quedar en una zona tan céntrica de Madrid, suele escucharse mucho ruido. 
Laget är perfekt. Det ligger precis brevid plaza Espana. Det är väldig central men det kan svårt att sova om man känslig för ljud för att det finns  folk och ljud under natten men det går att sova. 

Huset är väldigt ren och det är lätt att kommunicera med ägare. Det är en bed soffa där man sover men det går att sova. Jag skulle gärna rekommendera att boka den lägenhet. Allt har funkat väldigt bra.From seeing other peoples reviews, I trust that Ursula is a great host and under regular circumstances I could have given this experience a better review.  However, my case is a little as I never actually stayed at her home, but had a pretty stressful experience her.  I requested to book 3 nights with her last minute in which I was quoted about $300.  She then messaged me and told that she could only host me for 2 nights, and sent me a different agreement with a 2 night stay, however, the price was HIGHER for 2 nights than for 3 nights.  After I inquired about this, she proceeded to try to convince that it wasn't her charging me extra, but it was Air BnB charging me a surcharge on top of her regular nightly price. I was confused and stressed out since I was literally at the airport heading to Madrid and we still had not formally confirmed my stay with her.  She wasn't able to send me a request for 2 nights with the proper price before I got on my plane and I lost WiFi. When I got off the plane and found WiFi, I was ready to decline her offer of 2 nights since I was being overcharged, I was stunned to see she had confirmed and charged my card for the original agreement of 3 nights, the 3 nights which she said earlier she could not host. 

Overall, it was a super stressful experience.Ursula is very nice! It may be important to be able to speak a bit of Spanish, because she doesn't understand any English. The appartement is right next to the Plaza de Espana, which is amazing. And the room is perfect for one or two people to stay in. It's a bit cold in the house and unfortunately there were no heaters, so if you're staying during the winter make sure to bring slippers and sweaters for inside the room.Super central accommodation, close to Plaza de Espana.
Ursula is a good host, very kind, helpful and the communication with her are fast and friendly.

comments:
Estudio pequeño pero muy acogedor, es tal y como se ve en las fotos, muy céntrico a 10mins más o menos andando de Sol, La Latina, Plaza Mayor... 
Decir que es un cuarto sin ascensor pero perfecto para una pareja.
Además Ana es muy maja.
Estuvimos muy agusto.First, let me talk about Ana.  She's terrific!  While she was out of town when I arrived, she made certain someone was there to greet me and open the apartment.  And when when she returned, she immediately looked me to make sure I was comfortable and happy.  And when I decided to shorten my stay in Madrid, she readily agreed to revise the AirBnb contract so I could get a refund.  I also had two issues with the apartment, a problem with the fold-out couch, and a problem with street noise.  Ana took steps immediately to fix both.  She replaced the fold-out bed mechanism during my stay.  And she tells me she is replacing the window to the street with Climalit thermal double-paned glass to address street noise. 

Second, Ana's apartment:  Location, location, location!  If you are a tourist wanting to see key Madrid sites, or even a business traveler, I can't imagine finding a better-situated place in central Madrid.  A brief walk to the Atocha train station, a metro stop just around the corner, a very easy walk to Plaza Mayor, Sol, and all major museums.  And a density of bars and restaurants and small fruit markets and other shops like I've never seen, even after 18 months in France.  You won't do better.  

You need to realize the flat is very small, not untypical for a one-person studio in Europe, or even for a couple.  The main issue I encountered was street noise, which regularly carried into the early morning hours.  Another review commented on this, but said it was not an issue for him.  It did bother me, but Ana was very understanding.  She has informed me that she plans to install the above-mentioned insulated window to the street, which should readily solve the problem.  I had the same problem in my long-term apartment in France, and thermal windows fixed it easily.  

In short, once Ana has the new window installed, I think a single person or couple could not do better than her little studio for short to medium-term stays in Madrid.  Staying at Anna's appartment was great! The location is the best you can wish for - really is the very heart of Madrid. The appartment is small, but cosy and extremely handy - got everything you might require. Anna is a very hospitable and very responsive host. Unfortunately we did get a change to meet in person, but communicationg with her was nice and easy. It's recommended that you speak at least a tiny bit of spanish though =)
All in all, we had a very positive experience and will highly recommend Anna and her appartment to anybody travelling to Madrid.
Anna, muchas gracias por todo!
 Ana es muy simpática y agradable. Nos recibió con una sonrisa y nos explicó perfectamente todo lo necesario para pasar nuestra estancia en Madrid. Además, el estudio estaba muy limpio y ordenado. De hecho, al entrar huele a limpio. Nos dejó en la nevera y en la despensa zumo, leche y cosas para desayunar al día siguiente.  La zona es estupenda. Al lado hay muchas tiendas y hay un supermercado a unos 100 metros. Está al ladito de una parada de metro y muy céntrico. A dos paradas de Sol, hasta se puede ir caminando.  Además los horarios de llegada y de salida son flexibles. Para mí quizás lo peor sea escuchar el tráfico por las mañanas, pero supongo que eso pasa en la mayoría de pisos de Madrid. En resumen: recomiendo sin duda el estudio de Ana, ideal para pasar unos días en Madrid en pareja o solo. Ana's apartment was fantastic. Highly recommended! Thanks again for everything Ana!My boyfriend and I have recently come back from staying here and it was the perfect base to explore Madrid. Excellent location near to bars, restaurants and the main tourist sights and the apartment had all the things we needed for a comfortable stay - the fridge was even stocked with milk and juice when we arrived. I would definitely recommend Ana and her apartment to anyone coming to Madrid!! Great location - very central - we didn't use public transport the whole weekend, we walked everywhere. More tapas bars than you could possibly do in a weekend within 10/15 mins walk (and we tried!). The apartment is small, but perfect for what we needed - and the little balcony is a nice extra to have a pre-dinner drink by in the evening. There was also some coffee/milk/oil etc in the kitchen for us, perfect for making our own breakfasts. Previous reviews mentioned the noise - but the balcony door has clearly since been double-glazed so it's now super quiet. Would definitely recommend this apartment if you want a base from which to explore the central old town Madrid for a weekend. We didn't see Ana at the beginning, and it would have been nice to have more instructions on the keys and how to work things in the apartment. The keys we got didn't work very well, so we ended up using a spare set we found in the apartment. 

Also, when we arrived the washing machine and the dish rack were already full. There wasn't much toilet paper, but when I checked my message I saw Ana sent a message about some tp and milk the maid had left in a box in the hall. She was nice to message a lot and check in on how we were.

For being on a side street, it had an amazing  amount of traffic that often included honking, but the proximity to the sights and metro was great. We enjoyed going to a tapas bar right on the corner and a crepe restaurant nearby. 




Estudio completo con todo lo necesario para pasar unos estupendos días en Madrid.Perfecta ubicación, al lado del metro y a 8-10min de Atocha y a 5 min de la Puerta del Sol. Calle tranquila y se puede descansar perfectamente por la noche.Perfecto para una pareja. Ana comparte libros, guías de la ciudad y películas. Dispone de Mini-Cadena y DVD. Recomendable  100%.Gracias Ana por tu ayuda y tu amabilidad!  La ubicación de tu piso es perfecta para descubrir una ciudad maravillosa.  Tu piso contiene todo que necesitamos y lo hemos encantado. Muy recomendable!Ana's has a very nice flat to stay at. It was very clean, near the metro, and many places to see. I did have trouble with the keys the first night since Ana couldn't be home when I arrived. It would be have been great if Ana could have been there when I checked in that evening to help me with the door. But she checked up on me to make sure everything was okay. Also, since my flight to leave Madrid was in the evening she let me keep my luggage in the flat after check out so that I could go around Madrid without my luggage. I would recommend her place! The time spent in Madrid was great, and the apartment's central location made it very convenient to see and do a lot. We were disappointed in the cold shower and general lack of privacy of the bathroom, though the studio space is good for two people. We wished for a bit more responsiveness from the host concerning out early arrival and entry, as well as resolving the shower issue. The good:  Very well located clean apartment with Ana's agent (Paco) meeting us on time and making check in easy.
The not so good: The apartment is in an old building and 3 floors up with no elevator, which should be born in mind if you have luggage.  The old building also means low water pressure for shower and thin walls. The neighbours smoke, sing bad karaoke and watch TV until 3 am (repeated 4 nights).  Despite Paco promising to return with light bulb for bathroom, he did not return and host ignored our communications to follow this up, so used bathroom in dark for 4 days. Very good location, central.
The apartment is much smaller than one could imagine from the pictures. Very noisy neighborhood. Very small bathroom, not very appropriate for two people. Lack of privacy.
The host was very nice and helpful.
Ana was a great host! When my fiancee and I first got to Madrid, she gave us a map and gave us a bunch of suggestions on where to go, where to eat, etc. When she found out that we were going to Sevilla later on during our trip, she gave us suggestions too since she is originally from there.

The apartment is in a perfect location and is within walking distance to everything. The apartment is on the 3rd floor so the worst part was bringing our luggage upstairs, but it wasn't that bad. Ana was kind enough to help my fiancee out with her bags. The hot water goes away pretty quickly so make sure you don't take long showers.

The apartment is a nice studio with the essential amenities - perfect for a short stay in Madrid. We felt comfortable with our belongings being safe and we felt comfortable walking around the neighborhood at any time of day or night. I would recommend this apartment to anyone staying in Madrid!Muy recomendable el apartamento de Ana. Central, muy bien ubicado y equipado. Ana es muy buena anfitriona, muy atenta y amable. The apartment was in a great location- we walked everywhere. The apartment is quite small (especially the bathroom) but that didnt matter as it was very nice.
We never met Ana, and had to pick up the keys  in the pharmacy below. This was strange but actually very easy as we could pick the keys up anytime.
Very pleasant stay! We had a great time in Madrid and Ana's apartment was a big part of it. The appartment is perfectly located, in a very tipical neighborhood. From there everything is reachable by foot. If you want to use the underground, a station is just down the apartment. 

Ana made everything to make our arrival and departure easier.
The place was clear and very clean. Perfect for a couple.A pesar de que no pude conocer en persona a Ana, estuve en todo momento atenta. El apartamento es tal y como aparece en las fotos: limpio, acogedor y en una situación inmejorable. 
Totalmente recomendable para disfrutar unos días de la ciudad. El estudio es muy fiel a las fotografías.
Nosotros fuimos de viaje para correr la Media Maratón de Madrid y el apartamento se encuentra cerca de la zona de salida y además se puede ir a todo los sitios turísticos caminando.
El estudio se encuentra en la 3 planta, que cuesta un poco subir al principio, pero después te vas acostumbrando. Por la noche casi no se oía ruido del exterior, por lo que perfecto para dormir.
Ana es una gran anfitriona, que nos dio la posibilidad de salir más tarde para que nos diera tiempo de bañarnos después de la media maratón. Además está siempre atenta y en continuo contacto con los huéspedes.Ana was very friendly and has welcome us at our arrival (being flexible on checkin time for us which allowed us to drop our bags and enjoy the city straight away).
The flat is ideally located right in the heart of Madrid lively old neighbourhood and you can walk from there without using the tube which is fantastic.
There is a lot of traffic yet the double glazed windows are really working great reducing the outside noise level to a minimum.

On the less positive note: 
The flat is located in an old building with extremely thin walls which means you will hear conversations, singing and flushing/showers from the neighbours (sometime until very late in the night). 
The flat was clean when we arrived but unfortunately most of the dishes had been left dirty in the cupboard - probably from previous hosts...
Despite these small hiccups we really enjoyed our stay in the city!Ana a été une hôte très agréable. Même si elle n'était pas disponible pour nous remettre les clés à notre arrivée, elle a pris le temps de passer nous dire bonjour à l'appartement et de répondre à nos questions. C'est quelqu'un de très sympathique et elle était joignable pendant tout notre séjour. 

Pour ce qui est du studio, nous étions très contents de voir qu'il correspondait exactement au descriptif. Il était en parfait état, suffisamment equipé et très ensoleillé. En plus, il est très bien situé. A 7 min de marche, on peut trouver la plaza Mayor, la station Atocha (où on peut trouver des bus pour l'aeroport), etc. La station de métro Anton Martin est à 2 min de marche. 

Le seul bémol est que la rue est un peu bruyante par moment, à cause des klaxons des voitures. Cependant, dès qu'on ferme la vitre, le bruit devient moins intense. 

Pour conclure, je suis extrêmement satisfaite de mon séjour, de l'accueil d'Ana et de cette 1ère expérience sur airbnb. 

Je recommande fortement et je n'hésiterai pas à retenter l'expérience ! 

Malgré notre heure d'arrivée tardive, nous avons été accueillis très chaleureusement par Ana sur place. beaucoup de visite au alentour.

The apartment was cosy and right in the center of Madrid!

Nice!The apartment is in a great location, right in the heart of all the tourist attraction, less than a 5-minute walk and right around a corner of the metro (30sec walk).

I wont not recommend the apartment for older couples with knee concerns.

I would definitely stay there again. 
Ana's house is small but it has all you can need for a short stay in Madrid. Also the location is really good and close to everything within a walk. The room is exactly the same as seen in pictures. would I stay again? yes!Great location. Close to the metro and other sights in Madrid. The apartment was also clean and cozy.Ana’s place is in a great location in central Madrid. The place was fine for a short trip, but there were a few issues that made it less than ideal for us. First, the pros: the apartment is right by a metro station, and is walking distance to many popular spots in the city center. There is lots of natural light in the studio. Finally, there is a washing machine, which is nice in the middle of a long trip. Now the cons - none of these were big enough to be dealbreakers on their own, but they added up to make us wish we had spent more money to go somewhere a little nicer. The check in process was confusing. Ana sent us instructions for where to pick up the key, but when we arrived the shopkeeper told us that Ana hadn’t left the key that day. Thankfully we decided to just go to the apartment to check if anyone was there. One of Ana’s friends was there and let us in, but she seemed sort of surprised we were there and her instructions for check out didn’t match what Ana had told us, which made the whole thing seem a little questionable to us. We ended up confirming things with Ana later, but advance communication of the change in check in plans would have been nice. The apartment itself is definitely more worn and dingy than it looks in the photos. Some things need to be repaired, like the handle to the balcony door that has fallen off and the ventilation fan in the bathroom. Also, some things weren’t very clean - the sheets were stained and the mattress had hair of various kinds on it. In the bathroom the shower could have used a scrubbing and the only bar of hand soap was super tiny and dirty. Some other small things - the iron was too rusty to use and the towels were stained. Like I said, no single thing was a huge deal for a short stay, but next time I would pay more for a better place.Great place to stay, perfect location and very easy to communicate with Ana.Ana’s place was the PERFECT spot to explore Madrid. No noise from the street below 
The washer was a big plus
The studio was clean
Ana gave us some very good tips of  places to eat

Now the not so good:
*It's a lot smaller than the pictures present but that's really not a problem 

*Every time we tried to use the microwave it blew the breaker

*The bathroom is very, very small and the cleaning broom, mop, etc., were kept there

*Nowhere in the listing it states that it's on a 3rd floor (that would be 4th floor in the USA) with 67 steps to get to the studio. Had I known it was on the third floor I wouldn't have stayed there due to a bad knee. If you have a heavy suitcase it will be a struggle to get it up there.

*The listing showed that it provides breakfast, not so. There was a used container of milk in the fridge with ROTTEN milk. A half used juice container. An open box of cereal. Two open containers of jelly preserves.

I wish Ana the best. I hate to leave a review like this because Ana is very nice.Ana’s place is central, clean and very nice. There was everything to prepare a nice cup of tea, clean towels, wi-fi... we had a great stay and we enjoyed the opportunities to just come back home, drop some shopping and be able to directly go out in one of the nice coffee/ bar of the area.The appartment from Ana is located perfectly. You are directly in the city center. Ana is really friendly and helpful. She was there for the check in and she gave us some great reccomendations. The appartment is simple but clean. The bed and the shower aren‘t that big - so dont expect a Kingsize bed ;) We can recommend the Appartment from Ana and would book it again.Good location, Ana is very niceLa recepción de Ana fue muy atenta y agradable! Llegamos muy bien con las indicaciones q nos dio
 La ubicación es inmejorable ya q recorrimos todos los puntos principales caminando sin tomar ningún transporte! Es lo mejor del apartamanento!
Las fotos se ven mejores de lo que es realmente, se nota algunos detalles descuidados como la tostadora y amoblamientos en general! 
Es un sofá cama q resultó un tanto incómoda para mi estadia!Het appartement ligt op een fantastische locatie in Madrid, waardoor de meeste belangrijke bezienswaardigheden te voet te bereiken zijn. En verder is het metrostation om de hoek.

Het is handig als je je realiseert dat het appartement drie hoog ligt, maar het scheelt wel in het lawaai. De isolatie van de balkondeuren is prima, dus met deze deuren dicht is het ook midden in de stad stil.Elegí el apartamento de Ana por la ubicación y los ratings positivos pero el trato de Ana fue decepcionante.  Cuando llegué al apartamento las llaves no abrían, le escribí a Ana y no recibí respuesta hasta las 22.30 en la que me preguntaba por el chat de airbnb si habia logrado entrar. Tenía mi número de teléfono y no fue capaz de llamarme. Ella me había comentado que la cerradura no funcionaba bien y que necesitaba abrir la puerta desde dentro para salir por lo que pensé que se trataba de un problema de cerradura pero después de varios mensajes ella se dio cuenta de que me había enviado el número de piso incorrecto. Para entonces yo ya me había tenido que coger una noche en un hotel y le pedí que me hiciera el reembolso del alquiler del apartamento + limpieza, a lo que se negó. He reportado esto al centro de resoluciones para ver si me lo reembolsan.Overall our stay was OK. The location is definitely a 6/5 but we found the bed to be uncomfortable (pull out sofa sleeper) and the apartment lacked basic amenities we’ve received at other Airbnb’s (coffee / coffee maker, full dining set, etc). Our issues were minor though. After figuring out how to check into the apartment and getting the lay of the land, we made some of the minor disappointments work! It’s a good apartment, in a good location, for a couple of days. We booked for five days, which might have been a few more than the apartment could afford. Very clean and cozy.La ubicación es excelente. Varios lugares para comer cerca. 
Por otro lado, la cama es muy incómoda y pequeña, no considero que sea un departamento para 2 personas.Amazing location. Perfect apartment for a couple day visit! Was clean and accessible. The lock was a bit difficult for those not from Europe but easy to figure out with a couple try’s!Ubicacion excelente, limpieza inmejorable y Ana es una chica muy amable. Repetiremos!El apartamento cumple con creces lo prometido, excelente limpieza, ubicación y por sobre todas las cosas la anfitriona siempre dispuesta para atender inquietudes.El apartamento esta genial para pasar unos dias en Madrid, pleno centro donde puedes ir andando a cualquier sitio.
Recomendable 100%
Comunicación y atención de Ana un 10Ana's place was exactly what I expected. It was nice and neat and close to the centre city. She allowed us to enter at exactly 2pm. We only stayed for the day (12hr layover in Madrid) so we did not experience an overnight stay. But for the time we used it, it was perfect.Ana’s home is a great place to stay in Madrid! Conveniently located!You can walk anywhere in the city center from this location. The apartment is efficient - with a nice window view. The AC works well. Nice accommodations for a few days to experience Madrid.Ana’s place is within walking distance to everything, which was amazing! It is up 3 flights of stairs though, with no elevator, so keep that in mind if you have a lot of luggage!Excelente! Super recomendable!Anna's apartment is very central. Great place for a few nights stay in Madrid.Todo super bien! La ubicacion es excelente!Great Location, and the loft is really beautiful. Perfect place to stay in MadridOn a passé un très agréable séjour dans l'appartement d'Ana, celui-ci est très bien situé dans un quartier populaire, vivant et proche des principaux sites à visiter dans la capitale. Il est propre, bien équipé et fonctionnel, la clim est un vrai plus quand on voyage en août ! La communication avec Ana a était très facile, elle s est montrée réactive et disponible tout au long du séjour. Merci beaucoup Ana! au plaisir de se recroiser si nous revenons sur Madrid.Thanks for a lovely stay. A GREAT location and I definitely recommend to everybody!Muy bien ubicado, pequeño pero cómodo. Ana es una persona muy atenta.Location is excellent. Only 2 steps from the metro station.Ana’s place has much to offer for a stay in a Madrid! You can NOT beat the location - steps from the pharmacy and metro station and in the heart of a beautiful city close to major attractions and great eats!  There is also a very accessible kitchenette we utilized to cook meals at home! Although it does get very noisy on the street at night due to recycling (glasses breaking) and old beautiful doors that can be tricky to open. this should be mentioned -
the air condition is very noisy- the bed very uncomfortable and the bed linens should be changed- the bathroom is very small 
this apartment should be refreshedPerfect location for accessing central Madrid . Superb studio flat. Beware light sleepers - a fair amount of noise on the street below so not good if windows are open - there is air conditioning however so with windows closed and air con it is silentPerfect location for a quick stop in Madrid. Thanks again AnaBien ubicadoAna was very kind and her place was just what we needed for an overnight stay in Madrid.Ana's place is very well situated. The bathroom is tiny and the hot water will last you about 5 minutes if you're lucky.Ana's studio is very comfortable for a madrid stay. The appartment is in a great location, it was very clean and well equipped. It had a lovely warm and romantic vibe. The water heater is a bit small so the whot water runs out fast, but if the AC is on, it's OK :)

We plan to stay here again on our way out of Spain. Thank you Ana!!Ana fue muy amable y su apartamento es muy cómodo y está muy bien ubicado; tiene una estación de metro céntrica a 100m

comments:
Guillermo showed great hospitality. The house was super clean and he even had a welcome wine in the fridge as well as chocolate on the bed. He was there at an ugly early time to welcome me (I landed early Sunday morning) and he was available to help me with anything I needed. Our experience at Guillermo's apartment was awesome.
At our arrival, we found the place as clean as a new pin: just as you can see in the pictures. It's totally furnished and with all the basic and necessary equipment you will need during your stay. On top of that, the host had left us some brochures and maps of the city.

Guillermo was truly welcoming. Even if we arrived late the first day, he was very understanding and he helped us from the very beginning. He was kind and caring during our sojourn.

Besides, the location is fantastic: the apartment is in the heart of Chueca, at the very centre of Madrid. We were able to visit all the city highlights on foot. 

In a nutshell, don't you hesitate, and if you are planning to come to Madrid, I urge you to choose this marvelous apartment for your stay. At least, if I come back, I'm sure I will...!Fantastic place, in a great location -- plus, Guillermo was a fantastic host, and went wel above and beyond at making us feel at home and getting to know our way around Madrid.Guillermo's apartment was perfect! It is located in the heart of Madrid and was extremely comfortable. Guillermo was the perfect host - a bottle of wine to welcome us and contacted me the day following arrival to ensure we were settling in okay and didn't need any help. I would love to return and stay here again. What a fantastic trip! An amazing spacious modernly furnished apartment in a fantastic location.
The apartment was very clean, organized and prepared quite well. Everything was available. 

Guillermo was fantastic. Very friendly, very helpful and is very approachable. 
This place was one of my best stays abroad overall. I highly recommend this apartment if you are staying in Madrid.

The reservation was canceled 27 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.A nice and stylish place with good amenities provided. Very lively at night but quiet in the morning.I was looking for a centrally located, upscale place to stay for a week over the Christmas and new year period. I paid £840 (approx 944 euros) in total for seven nights.  Guillermo, the host, communicated swiftly and was totally fine about my late arrival time even meeting me near by. The living area is nicely furnished however there is no natural daylight in the living / dining / kitchen area or bathroom. Only the bedrooms have windows. This means the apartment stays dark even during the day and has a rather heavy feel.  I’m a non-smoker and always look for non-smoking apartments. The first thing I noticed was the overwhelming smell of stale cigarette smoke. It was so strong it permeated the entire apartment including the bedroom and bedding. It lasted the entire stay and each day I had to leave the bedroom terrace door open to try and air the place. I also bought a can of air freshener to try and get rid of it but nothing worked. All my clothes took on the smell and it was really unpleasant. The main bed was a cheap foam mattress that sagged in the middle. The duvet was quite thin for winter and its cover very old. There was only one small hand towel and one bath towel which I thought strange especially since the owner knew I would be there a week and the photo clearly shows several towels. I messaged him to ask where I could find more and he replied saying that each guest gets one large and one small towel regardless of how long they are staying. I have never experienced this in an Airbnb booking before so was somewhat taken aback and asked why? I was told it’s to prevent guests sneakily bringing other guests with them that he does not know about. I immediately felt quite insulted and angry by this as it does somewhat imply that the host is mistrusting of all his guests.  I tried to reason with the host on this issue and eventually he said he would bring more towels the next day. I was out when he came but upon returning I noticed he had removed the ones I was using and replaced with once again, one small towel and one large towel. He later told me in a message that if I wanted them to be replaced again to message him and he would do so. I was not about to start calling my host every time I wanted my towel changed so at this point I went to a department store and purchased towels for my stay which I left in the apt before leaving.  There are no channels to watch on the TV other than free Spanish shopping channels, as it’s not connected to any cable or satellite. Not of the standard expected.Guillermo was super helpful and easy to communicate with. He helped us with all our concerns!Generally was fine, but when I arrived at the apartment at the check-in time it wasn’t ready! 

So I had to wait for hours after check-in time for the host to clean the flat before I can get in! 

Also there was cockroaches in the apartment (I found some in bed and in shower!) 

And after this, and although I had already paid cleaning service, he asked me to pay even more (500€!) even though I stayed for 2 weeks with no cleaning service provided so the floor and sheets had stains ..etc 

But the apartment was nice, well located, a bit dark in the dinning room though.

Host is approachable and nice, but I think other people handles the apartment as I didn’t personally meet him.Guillermo’s has a wonderful apartment in a terrific location. The place is small and perfectly designed to maximize the space. 

The location is lively on weekends with a number of bars and cafes just outside the apartment. If you require total silence to sleep bring along some earplugs. But not to worry, this is a lovely flat in a big city so step out onto one of the two small balconies to soak in the experience.

This was the best place I stayed in during a week traveling in Spain.

Thanks, Guillermo!Great experience, very comfortable stay in a great apartment, & Guillermo was a kind & professional host. I would definitely recommend this flat for its location, which is ideal.A great host and great place to stay, we were provided with great amenities and were in a great location to visit all Madrid has to offer!compact apartment in the heart of Madrid, great vibe nearby although it can get a bit noisy on holidays!  Great stop for 2-3 people looking to soak in the cityI recommend this apartment. Everything is perfect.We had a very nice and comfortable staying in Guillermo’s apartment. It is beautiful and very central to the main activities of Madrid. We suggest this flatPiso muy cómodo y muy bien situado. 100 % recomendableIncredible space with a great host! Easy to communicate with and very accommodating to schedule changes regarding travel plans. Highly recommend!Excellent rien à dire

comments:
Inicialmente con Miguel Angel muy mal, me dijo que me haría una devolución del importe de la reserva del que luego se desdijo, gracias a Airbnb y Marianne que nos atendió de manera excelente el problema se solventó a mí favor de Un manera muy rápida y eficaz. Agradezco también la atención de Celis a la llegada del apartamento, fue un anfitrión espectacular muy atento y dispuesto haciéndonos sugerencias de donde cenar e indicaciones de la zona GRACIASHa sido una estancia buenaFoi uma surpresa maravilhosa a estadia nesse belo espaço. Havia delicadezas e uma decoração repleta de lembranças de viagens, temperos e mimos de boas vindas. Tudo estava limpo, bonito e impecável, com todas as comodidades próximas (mercado, ônibus, metrô, etc). O cuidado de montar um grupo de (Hidden by Airbnb) para nos receber (destaque  para a simpatia de Cristina e o cuidado de Cecil), foi um grande diferencial. Deixo meu muito obrigado a todos.Todo empezó bien, se preocuparon por nuestra llegada e hicieron lo posible para que pudiéramos entrar antes de lo previsto, fueron muy amables. Estábamos bastante satisfechos y contentos con el piso.

La cosa se torció cuando encontramos una cucaracha enorme en el baño. Se lo señalamos al propietario, que nos dijo que ya se ocuparía del problema cuando nos fuéramos. No propuso ayuda, solución, ni nada. Lo dejamos pasar, pero al día siguiente encontramos 3 cucarachas más en el piso, en las habitaciones y en el salón. Otra vez, no propuso solución, cuando claramente era insalubre quedarse en el piso. Un gesto económico se hubiera agradecido, por ejemplo. Además, su actitud fue muy agresiva a la hora de irnos, amenazó con hacer lo posible para que no pudiéramos alquilar más pisos, bajo el supuesto motivo de que gente en el piso había fumado (cuando está prohibido).
Una estancia muy decepcionante (y asquerosa si tomamos en cuenta que habían varias cucarachas en el piso) y un propietario falsamente amable que no nos propuso ayuda ni solución a los problemas que tuvimos. No volveremos a su piso.Accueil génial, petit guide à disposition et disponible pour toutes questionsExcelente departamento que está muy cerca del metro de Madrid.This is an ideal place to stay in Madrid , all amenities like supermarkets nearby.  plus if you have a car you can do on street parking.Solo tengo buenas palabras para el anfitrión del apartamento , se adaptaron a la hora de llegada en todo momento , ya que en un principio pensaba que iba a ser una y por circunstancias nos retrasamos , la casa esta muy bien , limpia y con la entrada de metro y supermercado cerca .Miguel Ángel te puede contestar cualquier duda enseguida . Volveremos al apartamento si tenemos posibilidad.Отдыхали в августе 2019. Изначально планировали втроём, но остановились впятером. Места всем хватило без проблем. Квартира очень уютная и чистая, есть все до мелочей. Хозяин всегда был на связи и было очень приятно с ним общаться. Метро, транспорт, магазины, банки- все в шаговой доступности. Отличная квартира и отличный хозяинI definitely recommend it, this is a place to be once you are in Madrid.  You totally feel at home and very professional team.The apartment is super cute has really nice touches and very clean...the location in not bad..the metro is literally up the block from where you can go ANYWHERE. 
The only struggle we had was with the baby’s stroller.. the listing didn’t clarify that this was a basement apartment to which the elevator didn’t go so it was hard going up and down the stairs with the luggage the first time...and the baby stroller everyday. Also the air conditioner is only in the living room not in the other two rooms. But the host was awesome when we communicated that it was hot they gave us 2 fans one for each room. Also the communication was awesome. They made a (Hidden by Airbnb) group which made communication so much easier and faster. I had an issue with the washer machine... I couldn’t turn it on...they literally video called me and were there till it worked. I would totally recommend this apartment and the host.Alojamiento situado en barrio tranquilo, no tuvimos problemas en aparcar el coche. Casa reformada, limpia y tranquila, con todo tipo de electrodomésticos modernos y bien equipada.One of the best experience , host are very responsive right from checking in to checking out , very clean place well keptBuen ambiente, fotos reales, cena de cortesía por las horas que llegamos, atención rápida y personalizada, me dejo salida tardía por el tema maletasGood location, nice place to stay... I definitely recommend it.Una estancia super buena! El piso esta fenomenal, prácticamente recién reformado y decorado.
La comunicación y la llegada, de diez, así como los detalles que tienen para los huéspedes a la llegada. 
La zona, muy cómoda. Cerca del centro pero en una zona tranquila y sin ruidos, que nos venía fenomenal estando con niños. Además cuenta con todos los servicios cerca (supermercado, farmacia...).
La única pega que tuvimos fue que pensábamos que la entrada era directa y nos encontramos con unas escaleras para acceder, que nosotros no sabíamos e ibamos con cochecito de bebé. Aun así esto no ha supuesto un inconveniente. De hecho, cuando volvamos a Madrid, si podemos, nos quedaremos aquí de nuevo.todo bien!Miguel Angel a été très disponible et à l'écoute de nos besoins. L'appartement est très commode et très bien équipé. Un bon séjour passé à Madrid.My family and I enjoyed our christmas stay a lot. Everything was ok, the place was super clean, the kitchen was good equipped. The flat is very near metro station, restaurants and shops. Communication with host was nice and without problems.

This is an automated posting.Estupendo apartamento, trato muy bueno y ubicación excelenteUbicación inmejorable. María es muy atenta y acogedora.ExcelenteLocalização  EXCELENTE!!! 
O AP fica praticamente dento da praça Mayor,  ao lado está o mercado São Miguel,  a 400m a praça do sol,  a 300m está o palacio real,  e a 10 min caminhando da Gran via.  Fizemos tudo a pé,  fora que estações de metrô é perto. O espaço pra duas pessoas,  é muito confortável,  cama boa,  tudo novo.  Tem supermercado muito próximo,  além de tudo que vc vai precisar,B farmácia,  restaurantes,  é tudo muito perto.  AP fica no 1° andar,  super seguro,  e com uma sacada pra avenida super movimentada de turistas,  porém dentro do apartamento vc tem uma acústica muito boa, que dá pra descansar tranquilamente. A Maria é super atenciosa, nos aguardou no check in,  deu várias dicas e respondeu super rápido as msg.  SUPER RECOMENDADO.Superb location, very kind host and a clean room. Perfect for two people. Je hebt een privé studio en de locatie is echt ongelofelijk. Zo centraal gelegen, bizar. Hierdoor kun je optimaal genieten van al het moois dat Madrid te bieden heeft (en dat is veel!)Buen alojamiento bien situado,lo recomiendo sin problema, la propriétaire es agradables, nos facilito la estadia ,adaptandose à nuestra horario de llegada.Muito bom, tudo nota (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza  voltaria.El estudio cumple con todas las expectativas: limpio, completo, con un colchón comodísimo, un montón de luz natural y en pleno centro de Madrid.

Wlan, TV, vorhanden, alles bestensExcelente lugar con todo lo necesario. Muy cómodo y una ubicación excepcional para disfrutar de Madrid.Perfekte Lage für einen Städtetrip im wunderschönen Madrid. Das Apartment ist schön eingerichtet und Gastgeberin Maria war sehr sympathisch und hilfsbereit.It is a very nice flat, very well located. Maria is very nice. I would go there again :)Gracias por todo María, espero volver prontoEl apartamento estaba perfecto, ubicación inmejorable y todo muy limpio y en buenas condiciones.Appartement très bien situé, d une propreté irréprochable.  Bien équipé.  est très gentille et réactiveTodo perfecto!
La ubicación es muy buena, maria esta totalmente disponible en cuanto necesitas algo y sobretodo la casa es muy acogedora! Bien decorado y con todo para disfrutar de algunos días!

Muchas gracias Maria!La localización genial. María contesta rápido. Apartamento limpio. Cama confortable. No entra demasiado ruido. Hay aparato de aire acondicionado y calefacción. Cómo pega destacar que el calentador no da agua caliente ni para dos duchas y que al ir a ducharme me lo encontré apagado y tuve que marcharme y ducharme Varias horas después cuando ya se calentó. Hubiera agradecido que estuviese listo cuando llegue.Would definitive book again. I loved the location. Maria is a super nice host and explained everything to us in detail. Thank you so much!Maria è stata gentilissima e disponibile ad ogni nostra richiesta. L'appartamento è piccolo ma ha tutto il necessario per un soggiorno di pochi giorni. La posizione è fantastica , direttamente su Calle Mayor, a pochissima distanza da tutte attrazioni di Madrid.
Super consigliato.Un apartamento fantástico para hospedarse en Madrid. María es muy hospitalaria. Y el apartamento es una opción ideal para disfrutar de todo lo que oferta Madrid.
Detalles del apartamento: 2º piso sin ascensor, vistas a la calle Mayor, justo en la esquina del mercado de San Miguel, supermercados cerca, parada de taxis cercana, aire acondicionado, y ruido e de una ciudad que nunca duerme (yo siempre viajo con tapones).Das charmante Appartement war sehr sauber und es bietet alles was man für einen Städtetrip benötigt. Die Geräte funktionieren einwandfrei. Es ist zentral und man kann die meisten Sehenswürdigkeiten zu Fuß erreichen.
Maria ist eine sehr freundliche, zuvorkommende und hilfsbereite Gastgeberin. Ich kann das Appartement und die Gastgeberin nur empfehlen!Un estudio ideal para pasar unos pocos días en la capital. Muy céntrico. Cómodo y limpio. 
Se agradece mucho el trato recibido por Maria.

amenities: {TV,Wifi,"Air conditioning",Kitchen,"Smoking allowed","Pets allowed",Elevator,Heating,"Family/kid friendly",Washer,Essentials,Hangers,Iron,"Hot water","Host greets you"}
comments:
AA pior experiência que tivemos no AIRBNB. 
Aos fatos:
A reserva foi feita para 4 pessoas. Só encontramos 2 toalhas de banho e 1 cobertor. Enviamos uma mensagem para empresa solicitando mais um cobertor e 2 toalhas e não nos responderam. 
Na cozinha o saca rolha estava quebrado e a cafeteria italiana suja sem condições de uso. Enviamos uma mensagem e mais uma vez não obtivemos resposta. 
O quarto possui uma cama de campanha com um colchão muito ruim. 
É uma empresa que possui vários apartamentos no prédio, impessoal, e não converge para o que procuramos no AIRBNB.

Emplacement vraiment parfait. Proche de tout (Transports, magasin, monuments). Appartement très conviviale et confortable. Malgré le bruit de la rue on s’y sent bien et on peut se reposer tranquillement
Les hôtes sont très réactifs au moindre message. Merci à elles pour la rapidité de leur réponse et leur flexibilité des horaires
Je conseil vivementPick this place if you can.Todo muy bien. Gracias!Perfecto para pasar unos dias en Madridla casa está en pleno centro, a un paso de la plaza mayor y de sol. la habitación que da a la calle (la otra es interior) y el comedor son algo ruidosas (tráfico). por lo demás la casa es perfecta.Très bon accueil, l'appartement est super bien situé, en plein cœur de Madrid. Je recommande vivement cet appartement!goodPiso acogedor cerca de Cava Baja.Great place in a absolutely perfect location close to the beating heart of Madrid. Isa responded within minutes when we needed her and they made sure that we had a perfect stay.The apartment is very comfortable and well appointed and just 5 minutes walk from Sol. It is clean and tidy and has everything you need for a short stay. We as a family of five had no problems with space and had a great trip. The contact with Amanda was very easy, quick and helpful.This home is located in an awesome spot of Madrid and is spacious!Espectacular ubicación. Muy limpio y todo tal cual lo publicado. Muy recomendableWe enjoyed staying in an apartment that is so well located. Close to Sol and Mayor squares, walking distance everywhere. Smiling and kind hosts who gave lots of recommendations and explanations. A neat, clean and well-designed apartment. Great fit for our family. Hosts GovernorMuy bien !This stylish place is located right in the heart of Madrid. Perfect place to do everything on foot. I highly recommend this place.Muy atentasVery nice flat! Great location, clean and comfortable !Casa muy acogedora muy bien ubicada y con todas las comodidades necesarias para pasar unos días en MadridThe apartment was pretty and clean. The location was amazing, we had a blast.Isa and Amanda were amazing! The lodging was great and the place is wonderful.

amenities: {TV,Wifi,"Air conditioning",Kitchen,Breakfast,Elevator,Heating,"Family/kid friendly",Washer,Dryer,"Smoke detector","Carbon monoxide detector","First aid kit","Fire extinguisher",Essentials,Shampoo,"24-hour check-in",Hangers,"Hair dryer",Iron,"Laptop friendly workspace","translation missing: en.hosting_amenity_50","Self check-in","Building staff"}
comments:
Staying at Fernando's apartment was an amazing experience. The apartment is elegant, well decorated, comfortable and full of light and good vibes. Also the neighbourhood is great for shopping (or at least window-shopping), Gucci and all the best brands are on the same street! It is a walk away from the city center and most important museums. A cozy luxurious space in the cities fanciest street! I really recommend this place to anyone, we had a blast! Experiencia muy agradable en un Entorno inmejorable! Barrio céntrico y piso muy cómodo! Repetiremos seguro!!Fernando was charming, punctual and very helpful. He gave us amazing recommendations on places to go (tortilla at Jurrucha was amazing). The flat was spotless, classy, comfortable and well supplied and the location was unbeatable with ALL the best stores literally downstairs.
Will definitely repeat!

---------- Forwarded message ----------
From: Fernando Delas 
Date: Tuesday, 25 October 2016
Subject: Airbnb
To: Nana Sarriera 


The Apartment is indeed impressive. Has a lot of sunlight, nice decor, modern kitchen and bathroom and its perfectly located near all the sights and things to see in Madrid. The restaurant offers around the area is also impressive and the area is extremely chic and fashionable, it is actually the street were all the fashion boutiques are...Dior, Chanel, are literally on the same building. I wish I could have stayed longer, the stay was excellent overall. 100% recommended.
The apartment is very central, trendy and modern inside, however, has a decor of a uniquely old Spanish building. It is extremely central and is a shopping haven. The departmental stores are close by, eating joints, and public transport is very closeby. It is a very posh locality and is very safe.

Fernando has been a perfect host, waiting for us and helping us even though we reached quite late at night. He was always there to help us on any query and help. 

I strongly recommend this place with a very hospitable host for all to stay. I would like to stay again, in case I get an opportunity to visit Madrid. 

The stay in the apartment made my stay in Madrid an extra fillip....thank you, Fernando!This appartment is very beautiful and stylish. The beds are very comfortable, just as the livingroom. The appartment is spacious and light and very clean. Also Nice and warm. 
Fernando was a great host. It was no problem to have a late check out. 
Thanks for having us! Nice spacy place.
A lot of noice especially during the night!This apartment is definitely beautiful with an unbeatable location. The location is upscale and much calmer than the busy street of gran via which was something i wanted. Fernando was very helpful and responsive if you had any questions and was willing to help, he gave us great recommendations for restaurants too! El departamento es muy bonito, muy bien situado y es una excelente opción para familias o grupos de amigos. Está bien equipado y fue excelente para lo que necesitábamos. Nos dio mucho gusto al entrar al apartamento, tan agradable como se ve en las fotos. Quedamos con ganas de regresar por una temporada más larga. puedes vivir aquí como local, inmediato al mejor comercio y a las vez muy tranquilo, desde aquí todo es caminable, el corte inglés y calle Serrano está a cien metros. Disfrutamos el ambiente los detalles que ofrece su arquitectura.Estuve alojada por viaje de trabajo durante dos semanas, las camas son muy cómodas, buena presión de agua, buena temperatura ambiente, de agradecer en estos días de frío intenso, un piso céntrico y agradable. 
Una buena experiencia, gracias Fernando!great space! Fernando is very helpful and the home is beautiful! Fantástico , limpísimo , precioso y muy bien ubicadoThis apartment is exactly as pictured and described. It's absolutely beautiful in its modern classic, cultural embrace.  Plus to have king sized beds offered in an European apartment is itself something very special!  

The flat is a yummy, delightful city residence.  Lots of great restaurants and eateries in very close proximity, the location is lovely for your city stay.  The neighborhood is trendy in the upmarket manner - surrounded by top designer shopping venues.  Very much a high end road yet casually fun as it should be!  This being said we didn't find it expensive to eat in the wonderful restaurants or buying for our daily needs.

 Fernando, the host was very easy to communicate with.  He answered numerous questions almost immediately (via email) which was perfect for us.  He was and is a very amicable, friendly, hospitable host!

I can easily say that we now consider this flat our Madrid city home!  A heartfelt thanks to Fernando.A very nice apartment in a great location. My wife enjoyed this oasis and would be willing to stay again. We were able to visit all of the sites and enjoyed the quiet that this apartment afforded in a quality building.Es garantía! Super bueniGreat central place, close to any kind of shopping and great restaurants! ExcelenteThe apartment is perfectly located. Check-in was smooth and flexible. Fernando was reachable and helpful.Perfecto como siempre.Una mala experiencia!!!  
Cuando llegamos al portal no había nadie esperandonos, habíamos quedado a las 4:30 y nos dijeron que hasta las 7 no podían venir, de todas formas tampoco vino nadie, luego quedamos a las 23:00 y no aparecieron. Estábamos en la calle con dos niños.
Fernando nos alojó en otro apartamento donde llegamos a la 1 Y MEDIA DE LA MADRUGADA, ¡¡¡un cuarto piso sin ascensor!!! y con un precio inferior, de momento no me ha contestado a mi requerimiento de si me devolverá la diferencia.
Cuando conseguimos entrar en el apartamento 24 HORAS DESPUÉS DE LA CITA, descubrimos que el apartamento no estaba muy limpio, había un labavo estropeado que no se podía utilizar, el otro con el grifo moviendose y la tapa del WC suelta, vamos un desastre. El horno de la cocina lleno de grasa daba asco.
Resumiendo, el apartamento es magnífico pero muy mal gestionado, no se corresponde el precio con el servicio para nada. Hay propietarios que creen que con un buen apartamento lo demás sobra y no hay que cuidar los detalles.
En fin una pena.Location, location, location.  This place is amazingly located in one of the best neighborhood of Madrid.  A bit basic in terms of furnitures but it will make your vacations great.  Fernando and his team assist us very well, with an immediate response time frame.Fernando is a kind thoughtful host. Easy communication. The apartment was huge and met our needs perfectly. The location was AMAZING. In the centre of a luxurious shopping district with all our favourite designers. Would recommendPerfecto como siempre!
