Repetiré seguro!!Lisbet é uma ótima anfitriã, ela e o marido nos receberam muito bem e nos deixaram muito a vontade na casa. O quarto fica bem localizado, foi fácil de chegar, apenas tivemos um pequeno contratempo na chegada porque estávamos sem telefone e não tínhamos o número do apartamento, mas eles estavam lá para nos receber e correu tudo bem. Há uma estação de trem próximo, mercados e restaurantes, é uma boa região. Na casa, o quarto é simples mas tivemos uma noite bem agradável, tinha tudo o que precisávamos. Gracias Lisbet!Super sweet coupleMuy simpática y alegre. Sincera, implicada. Estuve muy cómoda y me sentí segura. La recomiendo. Si subo a Madrid repito.Lisbet is a wonderful person and waa s very accommodating. The flat is located close to public transport and was very quite. The internet also worked perfectly and I was even able to connect by cable. Thank you Lisbet!Friendly couple and very accomodatingVery friendly and welcoming couple. Nice room close to the bus station. Can absolutely recommend it.Buena estancia, recomendadoEs un muy buen espacio, buenas camas y muy buena atención. Debido a que solo estuvimos 1 noche no tuvimos mucho tiempo de compartir con Lisbeth pero la comunicación fue fluida cuando la necesitamos.The place it’s near the metro, clean house and very comfortable beds and room, the place was very clean and commutation was very good, I recommend this place to anyone flying from Madrid or visiting Madrid. Thanks LisbetNice!Lovely welcoming couple.Very basic, “ no frills” amenities in a small apartment in close proximity with the host living areaUna maravillosa pareja, con una habita con sencilla, no obstante muy agradable.Habitación cerca de la Estación de Atocha. A una parada de Renfe cercanias.Very helpful hosts!The place is very suitable for travelers that plan to spend most of their days outdoors exploring the city and neighborhood. No elevator here so pack light! My friend and I were able to check in earlier than normal because of our early flight. We had basic amenities like using the kitchen, tea, towels, and iron. The bedding is basic, but we had no problems sleeping in them. You can feel the springs (in case you have a sensitive back). One thing I will note though is that the walls are paper thin so you will hear the neighboring apartments as well as the train and public transportation outside. If you're a light sleeper like me, bring some ear plugs or comfortable headphones. This is a must. 

I will also note that one of the hosts occasionally smokes in his office and if we leave our door open, the smell may seep through. My friend and I are very sensitive to smoke, but we did not feel bothered at all by it. They did a great job containing the smell by closing their doors and keeping windows open. In Spain, you will notice that almost everyone smokes and this is something you cannot always escape, even in the open air!

The hosts were very attentive, but also allowed us to have a lot of independence and privacy. The room is sectioned off away from their room, kitchen, and bathroom. It is only connected by their living room so you're never bothered. And even though they work, they respond to Airbnb messages very promptly. I loved that they gave us keys so that we can come and go as we pleased with no curfew. :)

It is a 15 minute bus ride into the Atocha station and from there you can travel to other sight seeing points. I didn't mind taking the bus everyday to explore and I felt very safe doing so in the area. If you are not up for exploring the city and want to stay in, maybe catch a bite in their neighborhood, I really recommend "Bar Los Canales." It is a 5 minute walk, affordable, and the staff is very helpful! We've been there 4 times while our stay there, so I would say that they're getting the hang of having foreigners visit. ;)

I would love to come again if the hosts continue to reopen their homes for us. It was very worth it to us.El lugar es tal cual se anuncia. Lisbet y Vincen son muy gentiles y predispuestos a ayudar y brindar información. El departamento está bien comunicado con buses a 2 cuadras y tren de cercanías a 4 cuadras. El barrio es sencillo y tranquilo. La habitación el baño muy limpios.Lisbet y su marido han sido una pareja formidable, muy humanos, amables y muy generosos, volvería otra vez a su casa.Excelente atención de LIsbet y su esposo... Me recibieron a una hora muy temprana del día y fueron muy amables conmigo. Si hogar está excelente para descansar después de un día de tourClose to the station and bus stops. The room is away from host’s, so you’ll have a private space. Apartment is next to the railway, so if you are sensitive to the noise, you may find it difficult to sleep. Overall, hosts are nice! Thank you!Cheap and great value for mediocre living conditions. Near the commuter train and kebabs.Lisbet y su esposo fueron muy amigables y respetuosos durante nuestra estadía en Madrid, nos explicaron varias cosas, estamos muy agradecidos.Recomiendo a Lisbet. Siempre está dispuesta a facilitar la estancia de las personas hospedadas.

comments:
This stay was ABSOLUTELY perfect!. 

The place itself was gorgeous, cozy, and with lots of natural light!. 

The location couldn't be better also, cause it's right in the middle of great restaurant action (lots of options) AND close to public transportation. 

Marie it's also a great host!

Highly recommended :)Great place! I really enjoyed my stay at Marie's apartment! 
Marie is an exceptional host. She not only provides great accommodation, but she also makes sure that you have all the information you need for your stay in Madrid. 
The place is centrally located. A few steps from the Chueca metro stop. The neighborhood is fantastic and very safe! Lots of good restaurants, bars and chic shops. And it's walking distance from most of the city's attractions.
The apartment is super cute, love how is decorated and how much light it gets during the day. It had all the ammenities I could possibly need and most importantly, it was impeccably clean. I would highly recommend this place!!!
Muchas gracias Marie! Volveremos!Este apartamento está en el mejor barrio de Madrid. No solo en el mejor barrio de Madrid sino que en la mejor zona del barrio. Las calles de alrededor son maravillosas. Hay tantos restaurantes y cafeterías maravillosas que tu único problema será elegir una entre tantas opciones. 

Por otro lado, aún y estar en un punto tan céntrico se puede dormir perfectamente y descansar. 

El piso está perfectamente equipado y decorado con un gusto exquisito... me podéis pasar por favor el teléfono de la decoradora? jajajaja maravilloso! 

Marie te cuida como si te conociera de toda la vida. Mil gracias por ser tan atenta! Espero volver muy pronto.We enjoyed our stay very much!! We have loved our host kindness and hospitality. And the house was wonderful too. Amazing experience!We had a wonderful time at Marie’s place. Beatriz was a great help, a kind person who gave us many informations about the neighborhood and city. The apartment was clean and very well equipped. It was cozy and with a great taste decorated. 
The only sad think is, that I could NOT give more than 5* to that apartment and host. 
I and my family highly recommend it to everyone who is visiting Madrid. 
Thank you very much Beatriz!!!Appartement très confortable et très bien équipé avec une excellente situation géographique, l'accueil de Béatriz a été extrêmement convivial et chaleureux.Fantastic apartment in the heart of vibrant Chueca.  Wonderful host.Inmejorable! El apartamento precioso, muy bien ubicado y la atención extraordinariaIt was a great location, and the place was perfect.  I really enjoyed staying at the place.Nunca soñé con encontrarme un departamento así!, Impecable todo,  la decoración es preciosa, super bien equipado, con todos los detalles que uno pueda soñar, super limpio, muy bien ubicado, tenia metro enfrente y podía ir caminando a todos lados, un lujo de departamento!!!, lo recomiendo 100 x 100!!!We had a most amazing stay! The apt is sunny, spacious and airy, and very tastefully decorated and furnished. A wonderful welcome snack was waiting for us and Beatriz was very friendly and more than helpful and hospitable, giving great and speedy advice and information! I and my father were happy to have the elevator, a large bathtub and to be in the central and trendy Chueca area. Definitely one of our favorite Air BnB’s so far!! Thanks so much Beatriz!!Le logement est conforme aux photos, très propre et nous y sommes reçus très gentiment avec une bouteille de vin et une planche de charcuterie et de fromage, bienvenus lors de notre arrivée très tardive. Il est important de noter que le canapé-lit situé dans la seconde chambre est d’un confort précaire et ne devrait pas être considéré comme un lit. Le quartier est très sympa et très vivant mais il a aussi ses inconvénients : la boîte de nuit en face de l’appartement avec ses clients assez éméchés au petit matin et le bac de récolte de verres juste au pied de l’appartement qui reçoit la visite des particuliers comme des restaurateurs à toute heure du jour et de la nuit ! Ne comptez donc pas trop vous reposer ici et n’oubliez surtout pas vos boules Quies.This apartment is SO MUCH more adorable and stylish than even the photos suggest. The large, open main room was such a lovely place to spend time, especially with the four large windows open, flooding the room with natural sunlight. The kitchen was well equipped and we loved having a large table (even just to fold clothes). The A/C in each room was such a pleasant touch to take the sting out of the warmer days. Having a washing machine/dryer on our trip was a godsend. When we arrived, Beatriz was waiting for us (even at 9pm on a Saturday night) and when we walked in, there was a thoughtful bottle of wine and a jamon and queso plate for us to snack on after our long trip. This apartment is a few doors away from the hustle-and-bustle Plaza de Chueca which made it so convenient to enjoy the local nightlife, great food, and access to the Metro. There are SO many markets within a block, making food shopping a pleasure. Don't miss the Mercado San Anton, and explore EVERY floor. Bring earplugs if you are a light sleeper... this location also means there are people enjoying themselves into the wee hours of the morning. It's not unlikely to hear the hollers and laughter of people even at 4am. But with earplugs, it was never an issue - and worth being in the heart of such a great neighborhood. We couldn't recommend this apartment MORE!!!This apt is really amazing.  Super big space in the living room and kitchen areas.  Everything was beautifully done for the guests.  Beatriz was super.  Quick to respond to our needs.  The neighborhood (Chueca) was very happening.    We usually do not mind loud noises in the streets., but the party people downstairs were a bit loud in the bedroom area.   Even with this minor issue we would stay again in this apt.  It was awesome and we would be coming again.

The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.Excelente trato! Limpieza, comunicación, comodidad... 100% recomendable.Es un estudio muy comodo para dos. Las fotos son tal cual el lugar. El metro que está a 5 minutos Es muy comodo moverse. Fueron muy amables en la recepción y durantela estadía. Mucha claridad con el funcionamiento del lugarLa habitación está muy completa, tiene hasta lavadora secadora y una nevera grande, ideal para pasar desde una noche romántica hasta un par de semanas por trabajo. Esta en un barrio bastante tradicional, todavia quedan negocios locales y restaurantes que te pueden sorprender.Ha sido un placer alojarnos en este estudio, está igual que en las fotos, es muy cómodo e ideal para pasar unos días. Mi única sugerencia sería agregar un horno eléctrico para poder ampliar las opciones a la hora de cocinar, ya que con la vitrocerámica se reducen mucho. Muchas gracias por todo Mille! Volveremos sin dudar!Todo ha estado genial!Great apartment with all necessary amenities. I would definitely stay here again.

In addition responsive time and sympathy of hosts is a plus.Un apartamento en excelentes condiciones y accesible, próximo a las estaciones de Estrecho y Alvarado. Muy recomendable.Exactamente como en las fotos, zona con un montón de tiendas y mercados, de hecho andando 10 minutos hay un carrefour market que abre 24h por lo que ayuda bastante si se te olvida comprar algo. Toda la comunicación fue excelente y rápida. 100% recomendado.Muy recomendableTrès bon accueil, propreté et appartement conformeThis apartment in Madrid is the most luxurious, spacious, and beautiful short term rental in Madrid for this price range. The hostess (mírela) takes immaculate care of the room, and is super friendly. I even had a situation where I locked myself out late at night, and the owner of the complex took my call and helped me get back in. Do not look further! I promise you, I’ve stayed in quite a few Airbnb’s, and this is the best one yet. Thanks for my stay!

The apartment was clean and tidy. Would definitely recommend to stay here.Отличный прием, девушка все обьяснила и рассказала куда сходить покушать, что посмотреть в Мадриде! Localização otimaExcelentes Anfitriones el espacio es tal cual lo refieren las fotografías súper recomendable, la ubicación para mi punto de vista no es la mejor pero el lugar muy confortable.Very comfortable room. A washing machine and a dryer is equipped. If you have long-term stay, you will need several sets of clothes with them. Very close to some metro stations. In addition, 20 minutes walk will take you to Estadio Santiago Bernabéu.Todo estaba muy limpio, las fotos hacen justícia a la realidad. La coordinación para entrar al piso fue muy fácil y rápido, así cómo la reserva del mismo. Queda un poco alejado del centro de Madrid pero està muy bien comunicado y en 15-20 minutos puedes estar en cualquier zona céntrica. En resumen muy buena opción para pasar un fin de semana.Quite clean and convenient, especially kitchen amenities. A bit noisy because the doors and walls are thin, so you can hear neighbors if they talk loudly or open doors. The bed is very low, so might not be comfortable for everyone. Location is approx 18 min walk to Nuevos Ministerios but quite far from the city center.Muy buen alojamiento y mejor atencion y muy cerca del metroMuy recomendable.Clean apartment, quiet street, good metro connection to the city centre,  about 15 minutes.A really nice little mini-apartment in the Bellas Vistas area of Madrid, and may be one of the best places I've stayed with ABB. The bed is comfortable, and there's a washing machine and full-size refrigerator available. The apartment also has a small cooktop, and a coffee pot and toaster, so preparation of small means is possible. The apartment is clean and stylish, and the bed is very comfortable. The view across to a neighbors rooftop garden is nice as well. The only small drawback is that it's a bit far from the middle of Madrid - there's a nearby Metro stop, but probably 20-25 minutes to most of Madrid's attractions in the city center. It's a short hop by taxi (about 15 minutes) to the city center or Chamartin Station, a bit further to Atocha Station. Some folks might find Bellas Vistas a bit rough, but I never perceived any danger, and the street the apartment is on is wonderfully quiet. I would definitely stay here again.Ningún problema durante la estancia. Todo estaba impecable y buena localización del apartamento. Repetiré sin duda en futuras ocasiones.Ottima location a due minuti dalla fermata metro, personale gentile e disponibile, torneró sicuramenteLogement conforme au descriptif et propreThe flat is great, very clean, with all the commodities you could need, well located, just a couple of minute walk to the metro which holds the metro line going straight to the city centre. The communication with hosts was quick and accurate, all questions were answered and the check in/check out process was nothing problematic. Recommended! :)Great place for visiting the university. a few mins from line 1 and 10 from line 6 which can give you access to the rest of the city. Quick responses and friendly check in. Unfortunately did not have the time to explore nearby restaurants and bars but it seemed that could find few options.

comments:
Die Unterkunft ist genau so, wie auf den Bildern ersichtlich (das ist erfahrungsgemäß ja leider nicht immer der Fall), die Lage ist super und der Kontakt war mehr als kundenfreundlich! Eine tolle Unterkunft zu einem tollen Preis!Lindo lugar, buen ubicado y tranquilo.Excelente apartamento. Espacioso, moderno y con todas las instalaciones. Estaba impecable. La ubicacion  se encuentra a unos 10 - 12 minutos de la estacion de metro manuel becerra.  Cuenta con ascensor y portero. Cuando me hospede no tenia Wifi del resto fue maravilloso. Gracias por la atencion y el servicio!Buen alojamiento, totalmente equipado, incluida cocina. Cama muy cómoda y baño impecable. Muy limpio. Único inconveniente fue que pese a que el check out es pronto y el check in tarde, el piso no estaba listo cuando llegamos, pero fue cuestión de minutos. Localización no muy céntrica, pero como se anuncia.Great place to stay - clean and quiet. Thanks Marta :)Nuestra estancia en el apartamento ha sido estupenda y trataremos de volver al mismo en futuras visitas a madridEl apartamento está bonito, tal y como aparece en las fotos. Boca de metro( Manuel Becerra) a 10 min a pie. Todo genial, la única pega es que tiene un termo de agua caliente de poca capacidad con lo cual la duchas acababan en agua fría.La verdad estuve muy cómoda pero lok me gustaría destacar esk toallas me sobraron y ese detalle me gusto, también disponía de todo lo necesario para la limpieza como detergente pastillas para lavavajillas .  Yo fui para hacerme una operación por lo cual apenas salí y me vino bien que estuviera todo mas o menos cerca la farmacia, un bar, supermercado hasta para hacerme las uñas. Si tuviera k ponerle alguna pega esa seria la limpiadora k la vi limpiar y paso la fregona ta rápido kni debajo de la mesa paso la fregona limpio to por encima tipo rápido. Bueno por lo demás la casa si vale su precio y mucho :)Mucho ojo con el perfil de una anfitriona que presume de ser abierta y accesible, pues en cuanto requieres de algún apoyo, ella no aparece, siempre se apoya en equipos de entrega de llaves y limpieza y no da la cara -por sus ocupaciones laborales que no le permiten atender este negocio- ni entrega ningún comprobante fiscal, pero si amenaza con cancelar reserva, ya pagada, si no se rellena formularios que jamás advierten de su existencia y otros establecimientos similares de Madrid no obligan a cumplimentar.Es un lugar bastante cómodo, limpio y equipado, ubicado en una buena locación y con una buena anfitriona.Es un apartamento muy funcional, situado en una zona tranquila y muy bien conectado.El apartamento está muy bien y es muy funcional, además está en una zona muy tranquila y muy buen conectado para ir al centro. Fue una buena elección.La estancia en el apartamento ha sido estupenda, la cama muy cómoda y el piso muy acogedor, sin duda volvería a alojarme allí.Overall very clean and quiet spot to stay. Carmen's space is about a 10 min walking distance to the metro stop, so it was convenient to getting around Madrid. Only complaint is that the hot water ran out very quickly while showering.el apartamento está en muy buenas condiciones. Merece la pena su reservaMe quede ahí para atender a un evento en la feria de Madrid por trabajo, hicimos media hora de metro para llegar, la zona es dinámica (panederias, tiendas bio, algunos restaurantes) y cerca del centro en metro también. Es recomendable el lugar.. El agua caliente se acaba muy pronto..Muy bien todo, tal y como dice el anuncio, repetiría.El apartamento está muy bien situado. Cuenta con una cocina estupenda.
Muy bien iluminado y cerca de la parada de metro.Muy bueno el apartamento limpio bien ubicado me gustoPiso impecable y muy moderno! Estuvimos encantados y la atención fue de 10. Volveremos sin dudarloL' appartamento e' davvero grazioso e spazioso. Letti comodissimi e bagno perfetto. La pulizia e' ineccepibile. L'host ci fatto trovare le chiavi in aeroporto e siamo potuti entrare in casa prima dell'orario di check in. Per il check out ci ha fornito indicazioni per un deposito bagagli. La zona dista pero' circa mezz'ora dal centro citta'.No me pareció correcto que no hubiera sabanas para el sofá cama y nos quisiera cobrar 20€, cuando sabía que iba con dos niños pequeñosEstuvimos muy a gusto en casa de Carmen.

comments: A very nice and clean space, situated in a very good area, close to the centre of MadridGreat location that made everywhere walkable. Super stylish space. Bed was extremely comfy!  I highly recommend this space.Adri es super buena, nos respondia en seguida, nos enviava recomendaciones y servicions que podiamos usar para no tener que cargar con nuestros equipajes, detalles que valoramos mucho. El apartamento tiene todo lo que necessitas  y es muy acojedor, para mi gusto le faltava un poco de iluminación natural. El barrio? Sin duda el mejor, buen ambiente y lleno de bares, muy alternativo y ubicación perfecta para estar a 15 minutos del centro y poder desconectar de toda la macificación. Hay supermercados muy cerca, bueno realmente casi todo lo más centrico y turistico esta a nada, teniamos tambien al lado el barrio de las letras y fue genial.No me el gusto el edificio y la ubicaciónThe location is perfect, within walking distance to Madrid's key sights with some lovely bars on its doorstep. The nespresso machine was a lovely touch and we were were able to get capsules at the massive 24 hour carrefour around the corner. The check in was dreamy and allowed us to arrive on our own schedule. The apartment is small with limited natural light however is a perfect base for exploring Madrid.

comments:
Nuria se portó genial. El piso estaba y está genial. Un trato muy amable y las condiciones geniales. Nos dejó toallas, secador, plancha, desayuno, agua, leche y un largo etc. Y la zona muy bien situada y barrio precioso. Recomendado al 100%Una atención muy buena por parte de Nuria, ella no pudo venir y dejo una persona al cargo para nuestro recibimiento. Nos dejaron leche y magdalenas para desayunar, todo un detalle, Además es un piso situado en un sitio centrico pero tranquilo. Una buena experiencia!El piso de Nuria es ideal. Pequeño, pero perfecto para una pareja. Todo estaba limpio y ordenado, e incluso nos dejó cositas para el desayuno. Fue muy comprensiva con los horarios de nuestros vuelos y aunque no pudo estar ella en persona, lo organizó muy bien para que fuéramos recibidos. La ubicación es genial, al lado de Atocha, que a nosotros nos fue muy bien porque teníamos un coche de alquiler allí. En general, todo excelente. Lo recomiendo 100%Nuria wasn't able to meet us but had someone else give us the keys and a quick tour of the flat. They also left us some tasty muffins and milk!
The flat itself was very very nice and spotlessly clean. The kitchen had everything we needed to cook meals. We really liked the location (7min walk to Atocha Renfe station, super close to the park, grocery stores within a 3min walk).
The listing says there is no internet, which is doubly true as there is no wifi in the flat and cell signal is pretty bad as well (it took literally minutes for pages to load) so we ended up doing most of our planning on the move (which may be a plus, depending on how you look at it).Nuestra experiencia con Nuria y su apartamento fue muy agradable. La ubicación es ideal por turistas quienes quieren acceso al tren y al metro para descubrir Madrid y otras ciudades cercanas. El apartamento es cómodo y contiene lo necesario (se debe notar que no hay wi-fi). Nuria ha estado muy responsiva y amable.Al apartamento casi no le falta nada. Tiene cocina, TV, microondas, lavadora, plancha... Tiene espacio suficiente para guardar las cosas y para estar cómodo. Está bien resguardado del calor. Lo único que le falta es Internet, pero en el anuncio está claramente indicado. La zona es bastante tranquila y está bien comunicada. El trato fue muy amable. Por lo general, es un apartamento cómodo y completo, totalmente recomendable.La estancia en el piso de Nuria ha sido genial. Estuvimos como en nuestra casa, tranquilos y con absolutamente de todo (cocina y baño completos, plancha, secador...hasta nos dejó el desayuno para todos los días)
Además, fue mi flexible con la hora de salida el Domingo.
Recomendada al 100%. GraciasApartamento completamente recomendable (es mucho mejor que en las fotografías). Además, Está muy limpio, bien situado y el trato magnífico. Por lo que, tengo claro que lo volvería a reservar si me surgiera nuevamente la necesidad.Con mi novia pasamos 3 noches en el apartamento de Nuria. La recepción fue muy buena. El apartamento cuenta con todo lo necesario para dos personas. La ubicación es excelente, nosotros nos trasladamos a pie, inclusive hay un supermercado a 2 cuadras. Si tuviéramos que volver a Madrid, volveríamos a alquilar éste apartamento.Nuria was a great host. The apartment was all that was described - clean and neat. The neighborhood was great - quiet but within walking distance to Retiro Park, the major museums, restaurants, a couple of good supermarkets and the Atocha train station. It was hot in July in Madrid but that is to be expected. Nuria was responsive to any questions or needs I had (she brought a fan when I asked about one and arranged for me to get in early when I showed up earlier than expected). Nuria’s place is perfect for the long weekend. It has good public transport connections due to the proximity to Atocha Station. Otherwise, the city centre is reachable by a 20-minute walk. The apartment was clean and tidy and the communication was easy.A nice and clean apartment, new furniture. A bit small, but cozy. notre séjour a été impeccable. l'appartement était très propre. très proche des métros ou bus et d'un supermarché. très calmeThe apartment is a perfect base for exploring Madrid and very well located. Also very quiet, as all windows give to to courtyard, not the road. And Nuria is an experienced, well-organized host.Nuria deberías plantearte cambiar la cama y el sofá, son muy incómodos. No hemos podido descansar.
Por lo demás correctoEstuve 3 días y todo fue muy bien, el piso es cómodo y tranquilo.apartamento muy acogedor y limpio, bien situado, lo unico que el metro que esta cerca estaba cerrado por obras. la chica que nos atendió muy amable.El apartamento es tal cual las fotos, es muy bonito y tiene todo lo que 2 personas necesitan para una linda y agradable estadía en Madrid. Cerca de Atocha y líneas de metro y tan solo 10 minutos del parque del retiro. La estancia fue mejor de lo que esperábamos. El apartamento es muy acogedor y muy buen situado. Si vuelvo a visitar Madrid, sin duda, contactaré con Nuria. Gracias.Piso pequeño al lado de atocha con buena limpiezaThe host canceled this reservation 10 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.The apartment is clan and accurate as at the photo. It is very convenient to connect everywhere. It is ordinary, but there are everything to have a rest after day in Madrid.
We have some troubles with arrival due to misunderstanding with Nuria. She has wait us one night before schedule, and decide that we go out one night before booking. It was unpleasant situation, but at the end everything was OK.
And the last — some problems with communications in English. I had a lot of airbnb travel, but it first time for me with total zero with person who met me.Magnífico apartamento . Es ideal para una estancia en Madrid. A 4 minutos andando de la estación de Atocha, por lo que las comunicaciones con cualquier punto de Madrid y de España son inmejorables. Alrededor bares, restaurantes y varios supermercados. 
El apartamento es perfecto para una o 2 personas, y esta equipado con todo lo necesario (sábanas, toallas menaje de cocina, plancha, secador, tv). 
Nuria es encantadora y se puso a mi disposición para todo lo que pudiera necesitar. 
Alojamiento totalmente recomendable. Hemos estado muy bien , el piso está bien situado y párking para poder dejar el coche cercano en Reina Cristina. Metro de Atocha  Y Renfe a dos minutos. Todo limpio , piso bien equipado. Lo único que hemos echado en falta ha sido un ventilador o aire acondicionado que hacía bastante calor, pero muy bien. Mauvaise isolation au bruitEl piso estaba como indicado en la zona que queríamos. Aunque fue una finde muy animada, Nuria tomó noticias de que tal iba las cosas. Le recomiendoClean place, quiet and close to museums and Madrid Central,Parl,el Retiro. Close to bus and subway.Piso pequeñito pero con todas las comodidades, céntrico y la anfitriona nos dio flexibilidad horaria. Estupenda experiencia.Nuria's place is in a perfect location near Atocha, Retiro, supermarkets and bus and bicycle stations. It had everything we needed. Unfortunately for us it was extremely hot in Madrid that week and had no air conditioning, but the fan provided was OK and we could walk to Retiro in the evenings with all the locals. We felt the apartment was very small for a weeks stay but it was sufficient.The cozy apartment was exactly as described and in a super location. The building is in a safe neighborhood an easy short walk from Atocha train and metro station. We walked everywhere from here, and only used the Renfe Cercanias to and from the airport. The apartment is 1 block from a corner store and 2 blocks from a good supermarket. All amenities we used in the apartment worked perfectly: wifi, washer, microwave and iron. Windows are to inner courtyards, so it was quiet. All was clean and orderly, and Nuria was very quick to communicate. Would definitely stay here again.Todo genial. Muy céntrico y coqueto.El piso, aunque está ubicado en una finca antigua que, quizás, necesitaría algún que otro arreglo estético, está perfectamente cuidado y limpio, y equipado con todo lo necesario para pasar unos días en Madrid.  

Aunque nosotros hicimos poco uso del transporte público (se puede llegar al centro caminando en una media hora), está bien comunicado tanto por metro y tren como autobuses (todo a menos de 10 minutos andando). 

A Nuria no la conocimos, pero la comunicación a través de mensajes fue fluida en todo momento y se preocupó por cómo habíamos encontrado todo (además, ¡tuvo el detalle de dejarnos el desayuno!). En cuanto a horarios de llegada y salida, fue muy flexible.

Como puntos negativos, quizás comentar que, al menos en las horas en las que nosotros hacíamos uso del piso, había poca luz natural. Otro detalle, que quizás a alguien le pueda preocupar, es que dentro del piso no había cobertura de telefóno móvil (el piso está equipado con wifi, eso sí).

En definitiva, para nuestros planes en Madrid, este piso cumplió perfectamente con nuestras expectativas.Buena ubicacion, gran anfitrionaLa comunicación con Nuria ha sido excelente y su flexibilidad con las horas de llegas y salida increible! Son detalles que se aprecian. La casa estaba limpia y con todo lo que se necesita. Como han comentado otros huéspedes es oscura; hay que encender las luces hasta a mediodia. Si la luminosidad del piso no es un detalle que importa, lo recomiendo.The host canceled this reservation 36 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

amenities: {TV,Wifi,Kitchen,Heating,Washer,"Smoke detector","Carbon monoxide detector","First aid kit","Fire extinguisher",Essentials,Shampoo,Hangers,"Hair dryer",Iron,"Laptop friendly workspace","Private entrance",Bathtub,"High chair","Babysitter recommendations","Pack ’n Play/travel crib","Body soap","Bath towel","Toilet paper","Bed linens","Extra pillows and blankets",Microwave,"Coffee maker",Refrigerator,Dishwasher,"Dishes and silverware","Cooking basics",Oven,Stove,"Patio or balcony","Long term stays allowed","Full kitchen","Bedroom comforts","Bathroom essentials"}
comments:
Apartamento ideal para familias, amplio y bien comunicado.Muy confortable y limpio.Piso muy amplio, con mucha luz, con todas las comodidades como en tu casa, con todo lo necesario. Baños cómodos.
Ubicación inmejorable.
Lo importante que es en Madrid, disponer de una plaza de garaje.The house is very nice, exactly as described. 
It is a very bright flat, with nicely chosen furniture and complements. 
It is spacious for 6 people and I recommend it. 
The flat was clean and Santiago kindly allowed for a flexible check-in and check-out. 
The flat is conveniently located, with easy access to the city center and public transport. 
Highly recommended.Appartement très bien décoré, agréable et bien pensé. Parfait pour un séjour à Madrid, avec en plus le parking a proximitéA beautiful apartment - immaculately clean, very spacious & stylishly furnished.
Santiago was a great host, replied promptly to any queries we had & provided great information on the local area. He supplied us with a taxi from the airport to the apartment & helped with our luggage up the 3 flights of stairs - excellent! 
When checking out Santiago allowed us to keep our bags in the apartment until early evening, this was a huge help as our return flight home was quite late.
Thanks so much Santiago, we had a great time!Appartement très agréable, bien décoré et équipé. Parking à 2 minutes. Hôte très réactif et sympathiquePiso estupendo y muy bonito que hace justicia a las fotos (no engaña). Buena ubicación y la comunicación con Santiago muy buena. Totalmente recomendable. Nosotros volveremos.Piso muy acogedor, bonito y tranquilo, sobre estar situado en una zona muy céntrica de Madrid.El piso es espectacular. Con todas las comodidades y reformada con mucho gusto. Muy cerca de atocha. Santiago fue muy amable en el trato. Recomendaría sin duda el alojamiento a otros viajeros. Un 10 sobre 10.Muy recomendable este piso. Perfectamente ubicado. No está en pleno centro, lo que garantiza tranquilidad, pero está a dos pasos de Atocha. El piso está equipado con  todo lo necesario y más. Es cómodo, tranquilo, agradable, todo nuevo.
Una apuesta segura. Y el anfitrión atento en todo momento.
Un plus a tener muy en cuenta es que tiene plaza de garaje.
Para repetirThis is a beautiful apartment with lots of family room sitting space (this was a little hard to find in other places) The rooms are very small so really would be better with one person in each. The master is beautifulA big and beautiful space that fit us family of 6 so comfortably. Yes, there are stairs but they are not steep! I recommend anyone staying in Madrid to choose this place.This apartment is fabulous! We were 6 friends celebrating several birthdays, so 6 single beds were perfect (4 can be turned into 2 doubles).  This stylish and well equipped living space worked really well for us, we could happily have stayed longer but real life pulled us back.  The location is unbeatable, so easy to walk up to Atocha and Plaza Major and with a supermarket, bakery and pharmacy just metres away.  The recommendation of Bodegas Rosell was also fantastic, thank you so much for your hospitality :)Santiago es muy atento. El apartamento muy chévere y bien ubicado.Santiago’s apartment is beautiful and in a great location. There are great restaurants and museums close by, it’s close to Retiro Park. He left us lots of info on the surrounding area, things to do and a bottle of wine, so nice! I wouldn’t hesitate to stay here, it’s beautiful and very comfortable, lots of room.L’appartamento corrisponde alle foto pubblicate,anzi è anche meglio ! Pulitissimo , molto curato nei dettagli, vicino alla metro e molto centrale come zona . Santiago è stato molto disponibile sia nel darci consigli che nel rispondere ad ogni richiesta. Super consigliato !Appartement conforme aux photos et à l’annonce. Très bien situé avec la place de parking près de l’appartement. Nous avons passé un trés bon séjour chez Santiago.Amazing place in a near perfect location for a short or longer stay in Madrid. The apartment is very beautiful with a lot of very nice details, we loved the decoration. Santiago is very forthcoming and the communication was always flawless! Would highly recommend this place!Great location. Fabulous apartment. Really helpful information given by Santiago. Would definitely stay there again.Very nice apartment with a practical location next to Atocha station, Reina Sofia museum and great bars and restaurants. 
It was spotless clean with a very nice decoration.
Santiago was also a great host.
Please be aware that the apartment does not have any air conditioning units which may be an issue in the hotter summer months in Madrid. It is also on a 3rd floor with no elevator unit.
Otherwise we had a great stay in Santiagos unit.Absolutely outstanding. Santiago and his apartment were exceptional. The apartment is beautiful and in the best location to explore Madrid. Santiago is an exceptional host and went over and beyond to make it a great trip. Thank you!The decor of this  spacious apartment was the big selling point for us.  It also was a perfect size and layout for our family of five because of the three bedrooms and three bathrooms.  Even without air conditioning, the ceiling fans kept us cool when it was over 100 degrees Fahrenheit outside. The host was easy to reach when we had questions and he left us a great book of information and recommendations that we used. Some guests may not want to carry luggage up three flights of stairs, however.  It wasn't a problem for us with teenagers.  Overall, we loved our stay in this apartment.  It also was clean and recently remodeled. 
The Jensen FamilySantiago is very helpful. It’s a great stay in Madrid. I came with my family with 2 kids and 4 adults. They all like this place and the parking is also very easy. Strongly recommend this place for family.Beautiful and spacious apartment, very  tastefully decorated and fully equipped. We spent three great days with my family and completely recommend this apartment. Santiago was a great and very responsive host who facilitated everything for us. Would come back for sure!great location ! near to  Atocha railway station, just  walk in 5 minuts,   close to  Par Retiro, Sofia art centre. stylish decoration, clean and big living room, I like  the albums of painting  about  Madrid, a  little balcony can see the street view, 6 beds can  hold many people , highly recommended !~ host  reply quicklyMuy cómodo el lugar y la atención de Santiago muy buena!Todo muy bien en el piso de Santiago, solo que quizá estuvimos en la época más calurosa de Madrid y en las noches hacía mucho calor. De ahí en más todo excelente. Muy bonito apartamento, nos hicieron sentir en casa de verdad.The landlord is very enthusiastic. The room is basically the same as the photo. It's comfortable to live in. I'm looking forward to staying next time.Superbly renovated, perfectly clean and very well situated place. Do try the local restaurants recommended by Santiago! He was incredibly helpful when our suitcase went missing at the airport.Good location and with packingIt was the best Airbnb I’ve stayed in Spain! It looks like home a it is exactly like the pictures show! Congratulations Santiago and thank you for the incredible stay!Great place! It’s beautifully decorated,
great location and it will totally make you feel at home. Santiago was always available!Santiago's flat warmly welcomed us to Madrid. It is in a convenient location near Atocha train station and an easy walk to the Reina Sofia, Prado, and Thyssen-Bornemisza museums. The apartment is well-appointed and tastefully decorated. The three bedrooms are not adjacent to each other which provides more privacy, and the master bedroom suite has its own sitting room and couch. Curtains in the master bedroom provide darkness but do not completely block the light. Having access to a washing machine and dishwasher in the unit was very convenient. The only negatives I can think to mention is that the apartment is on the 3rd floor an there is no elevator, and there is no A/C (there are ceiling fans though). Overall we definitely recommend the apartment, and we would be happy to stay here again.We had a wonderful time staying at Santiago’s place in Madrid.  It was a perfect landing space for us and it comfortably accommodated four adults. It was perfect for what we needed and centrally located to the beautiful gardens, museums and Barrios of Madrid.  We could easily walk everywhere we wanted to go!

Santiago was very responsive in his communication and provided helpful details and information about things to do, see and eat which were great for us!  He and Jimena were both very accommodating with our check-in and arrival.  Would highly recommend staying here!Very stylish and beautiful apartement! Santiago was so helpful and kind (early check-in  and late check-out was also possible) and the informations before the arrival were perfect! The flat is a very good starting-point to explore the beautiful city madrid :-)This home is better than home! The decor is top of the line. Location was perfect with the metro right at the corner. Santiago was very attentive and even worked with us on our check in time. We enjoyed every second in the place and can’t wait to visit again. Santiago even has a recommendation book ready for exploring Madrid. We had a great stay thank you!Every bit as stylish as it appears in the photos. Spacious flat with great original features and wonderful design. Well equipped and each bedroom had its own bathroom. A corner store right beneath the apartment. Very quiet - and brilliant for art lovers : only 5 minutes walk from the Reina Sofia gallery, the beginning of museum mile. Would stay again.100% recomendable. El piso es muy amplio con todos los detalles y  equipamientos que uno podría llegar a tener.
A pesar de quedar sobre una calle con mucho tráfico, no hay ruidos.
Muy bien ubicado para recorrer la Ciudad. Con varias opciones de  estaciones de metro y la del tren para hacer paseos por el día. 
Lo único a lo que hay que animarse es a subir el equipaje al 3 piso.지리적인 위치가 너무나 좋습니다. 프라도 미술관 레이나 소비아 미술관도 도보로 접근 가능합니다. 호스트도 무척 친절했어요. 항상 도와주려는 모습을보여 줬구요. 한가지 아쉬운 점은 엘리베이터가 없어 짐을 끌고 올라가야하는점..The apartment is just around the train station. There are subways and bus stops nearby. It is very convenient to walk to the Prado Art Museum and the Queen Sofia Art Center.  The apartment is also very clean and comfortable, well equipped and has a charming little balcony, this apartment is your perfect home in Madrid.The apartment is very beautiful and comfortable. It's situated very central in Madrid, with just a few minutes walking distance from Madrid's biggest art museums. Santiago, the host, was helpful and easy to get in touch with. He also organised our transport from and back to the airport. It all worked perfect! Thank you for a comfortable and stylish stay!It’s a beautiful apartment to stay, within close proximity to everything. Nicely done up and makes you feel like home. Locating the Parking area is a bit of an issue, with ppl not being able to communicate in English. 
Else everything is pretty nice.We never wanted to leave this beautiful apartment! Everything was absolutely perfect with so much thought and care put into making guests feel comfortable and at home. The kitchen is modern with all that you can need (dishwasher , clothes washer, microwave) and there are three very clean, modern bathrooms. This is a three story walk up (no elevator) although we were fine. Fresh linens and toiletries provided. Amazing location close to Reina Sofia museum and Retira Park. You walk into an oasis that is your home away from home. Santiago is an amazing host—We highly recommend.El piso es una maravilla, acogedor, limpio y con un diseño espectacular. El anfitrión superatento y nos facilitó todo para que estar lo mas comodos posible. Repetiremos sin duda.Beautiful, comfortable, well-equipped flat in a great location! I highly recommend staying here.Everything was great.  Santiago was very helpful with arranging rides to and from the airport.  Everything was clean and the apartment was well furnished.  He is was flexible with check in and checkout times which we appreciated.  Location is great.  Would definitely come again.The apartment is spacious and homely. Every ameniety you need is available. Very warm welcome. Excellent guide book in apartment. Communication before arrival was brilliant. I would highly reccomend this apartment. Very comfortable beds and chairs. Shower was excellent and whole accomadation was spotless.Santiago's place was excellent!

Great layout and amenities that worked perfectly for our group of six.

Great location near the train station, airport, a convenience store for quick groceries, the Prado Museum and many other points of interest.

Being on the third floor without a lift wasn't too bad to manage, just something to be aware of when booking.

We will definitely look up Santiago's place again in the future when we return to Madrid.

Thanks!This flat is a complete delight. It’s a beautiful, modern space with three (!) bathrooms and tons of communal space that we enjoyed every evening of our stay in Madrid. The location is perfect and entirely walkable. We’d definitely stay in Santiago’s flat again if we venture back.Me and my friends had great long weekend at Santiago's flat. The flat is beautifully decorated an spacious. Location is great for exploring the city and Santiago is an amazing host. I would be happy to stay here again.This is possibly one of the best Airbnb listings I have tried. 

It is close to everything. It is within walking distances to a number of good restaurants. 3~5 mins to metro stations. 

Santiago did a lot to make me comfortable. I had a super big van and he tried hard to make sure I can park near the place. The check process is very considerate.This is a lovely flat that is even better in person. The decor and tile floors are really well-done. There are three separate rooms and three bathrooms, which is really hard to find in Spain. There's a great set of sofas and a coffee table for chatting with friends and a large table for group dinners. It is a short walk from Atocha train station, which is nice for the airport bus or train connections. I would stay here again.Everything was great.The apartment was beautiful and comfortable. It was amazing to have 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. The location was perfect. Host was very accommodating with our early  arrival. Unfortunately, We were not told That there would be construction in the courtyard every day They never started before 9am which helped, but we were dealing with a 9 hour time change and trying to nap was impossible. We were reminded everyday thst the other neighbors were not on vacation and to be silent in the hall and after 10pm at night. (We were 6- sisters with our husbands and grown daughters. Not the parting crowd) We were not the ones who needed to be told to be quiet. There was an apartment below us thst opened all their courtyard windows and partied loudly and drunkenly till 5:30am. At 2:30am they were belting out  Feliz cumpleaños . Without the partying neighbors and construction noise it would have been an idea stay. The location is perfect and the apartment is lovely with a well equipped kitchen.Great place to stay, close to many important attraction, restaurant and important places with a feel of being local, we were a family of 5 and we all were very comfortable and pleased at the property. Definitively I will stay again on my next trip to Madrid.아토차역과 미술관, 지하철역이 모두 가까운 위치이며 조용한 주택가에 편의시설이 잘 갖추어져 있습니다.

Handy to the zoo and aquarium. A couple of minutes to the Metro (easy to use). Takes about 15 minutes to Centre with one change. Nice 2 bedroom place very suitable for 4 adults. Recently renovated with all we needed. Instant communication.
Thank youTodo muy bienApartamento recien reformado,  habitaciones amplias,  camas cómodas y a 2 min andando de parada se metro. Muy recomendable.Recomendable 100*El apartamento cuenta con todos los servicios necesarios, es muy bonito, cómodo y muy cerca a la estación del metro.  Súper recomendado.Limpio y muy bien comunicadoHemos tenido una estancia muy agradable. Es un piso bonito y cómodo. Lo recomiendo 100%.Es todo como se describeMuy bien comunicado, limpieza aceptable y acogida buena. Siendo un entresuelo no hemos sufrido ruidos callejeros, la zona es tranquila. Utensilios los justos. El baño bien, con ducha grande, buena potencia de agua y calentador bien.El apartamento está bien. Aunque es un bajo no tiene mucho ruido con las ventanas cerradas. Aparcar en la zona es viable. Perfecto para ir paseando al zoo. Metro en la puerta.Hemos tenido estancia agradable.
Piso bonito y cómodo.

Excelente servicio , María muy atenta y el piso en perfectas condiciones Buena estancia y atencion por maria muy buena para volver a repetirTodo perfecto. Muy chulo el piso. Limpieza, servicios correctos. Un lujo.Todo excelente, llegada, estancia y salidaApartamento de un dormitorio y un baño cerquita del centro comercial Plenilunio y del Aeropuerto. Bastante cómodo, cocina americana. Cama muy cómoda y servicio de conserjería, lo valoro positivamente porque transmite tranquilidad en la comunidad. Maria súper simpática y atenta.Un lugar limpio y acogedor. Lo recomiendo totalmente.María es muy atenta y hospitalaria. El apartamento está genial. Hemos estado muy cómodos y muy a gustoMuy limpio y acogedorTodo Genial! Apartamento muy acogedor y muy limpio, buena ubicación y muy amable Maria 
100% recomendable.A small, cozy apartment with a bedroom (double bed), and a living room (expandable sofa, comfortable for sleeping), suitable for a two/three people. The neighborhood and the community is really nice and feels very safe; a supermarket is right outside of the building, and there's a shopping mall a bit further away. About 20 minutes of walking brings you to the subway El Capricho subway station, from which you can arrive to the city center in about 30-40 minutes. The wall between the bedroom and the living room is very thin, so you can hear any noises from the other side pretty clearly. The apartment is well equipped, and was very pleasant to stay in!
The garage is very nice - it's spacious and very easy to park/navigate in, and it's connected to the building by elevator.Excelente servicio, muy bonito y acogedor el apartamento.Un piso muy bien cuidado y cómodo, muy buena comunicación con la anfitriona. Lo recomendamos sin duda.Muy lindo y todo ala mano recommendableLa anfitriona no respondió punctualmente. Tenía que anular mi reservación el mismo día que iba a llegar porque no pude entrar el apartamento.
