comments:
Dear Fernando,

It was really a dream for us to stay at the "White House". As first guests, we had high expectations which were all fulfilled in your extraordinary apartment. Your mother and brother welcomed us and gave us some really useful tips to discover both the local and the touristic sides of Madrid.
From iberico to calamares, from Guernica to Palacio Real, from the narrow streets of La Latina to gran Via, it all contributed to an unforgettable journey. 
Thanks for the warm welcome and if you have other places to stay, there is no doubt we will book you again!

Kind regards,
Thomas Soetens & Marie Van Brempt
Fernando was a great host, he answered my questions quickly. I turned up late to pick up the keys he was not annoyed in fact he welcomed me with a smile told me not to worry and helped me with my bags. I speak a little bit of Spanish so I tried my best to speak in Spanish and he could tell I was struggling so he spoke to me in English. He communicated everything really well. I also had not finished packing when they came to pick up the keys they didn’t hurry me they told me they would wait outside until I was done. 

Normally I am not such a bad guest!! But I just started a job in Madrid and was all over the place. If I could afford to rent this flat all year around I would, this has been newly renovated and as you can see from the pictures they made it really nice. The shower was really nice, the water pressure was really good and the water was really hot. The fridge is huge and he left some drinks and snacks for us for free. 
The area is great I walked to Plaza Mayor and to the Mercado from here easily. There are bars and restaurants on your doorstep and supermarkets and I felt very safe walking around in the night. 
I can´t say enough good things about this place and I would definitely recommend it. If any of my friends and family come to Madrid I will defiantly be booking it again!! I hope it stays white because I was the second person to use the place  so hopefully they manage to keep it looking as nice as it is. 
Thank you for welcoming us!! I hope I wasn’t too much of a pain  
The host canceled this reservation 17 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.It speaks volumes that the only negative thing I have to say about this flat is that I had to get a bit creative about where to hang my clothes to dry. Truly one of the best Airbnb places I've ever stayed in, everything super modern, clean, comfortable. Fernando & Javier were exceedingly gracious hosts, checking in to see how we were and forgiving us our trespass with a wine glass (thanks guys!). Overall, really great value for money, strongly recommended.
Tuvimos que esforzarnos para encontrar algo que criticar de esta casa y aun así, solo se nos ocurrió esto: que tienes que ponerte creativo cuando vas a guindar tu ropa a secar :) Realmente es una de las mejores experiencias que hemos tenido con Airbnb. La casa es super limpia, moderna y nuevecita. Fernando y Javier fueron super amables y fácil de contactar. Lo recomendamos 100%, no dudes en reservarla!Fernando was a very warm welcoming host. He responded to all our messages very quick and tried to help finding information for us during our stay. The property was as new and as beautiful as shown in the photos. You really get what you see here. We stayed there for 3 nights and we enjoyed it very much.
One thing to consider about is the location. The location of the property is very convenient. It is close to the MRT station, supermarket, restaurants and bars. And for the fact that it is near to the bars, if you love going out at night you will find this place very convenient for you. However, if you are a light sleeper, there may be some noise for you during the weekend. We were fine with it, though.
Thank you Fernando for making this trip a good one for us.Fernando is the perfect host, very friendly and helpful.
The appartment is well located, very clean and well equipped, I highly recommend this appartmentFantastic apartment in a great location. It is all newly decorated and spotlessly clean. Very central and minutes from Plaza Mayor, close to numerous restaurants,tapas bars,supermarkets and a great authentic mercado! Very spacious apartment with a lovely comfy bed and sofa bed. Fernando was very welcoming and left us some treats in the fridge!! The kitchen had all necessary cooking equipment and had all the necessary cleaning agents , towels and kitchen paper. He even had toothbrushes and toothpaste in the bathroom such a good idea!! Beautiful, new, very clean apartment in a quiet street but yet so close to everything. The location is just perfect. It's in the La Latina area (with plenty of great tapas bars and restaurants) and in only a few minutes you can walk to the Plaza Mayor, the Royal Palace and the Mercado de San Miguel. The metro station La Latina is less than 5 minutes from the apartment.
Fernando is the perfect host. We felt immediately at home and welcome in his apartment. There were plenty of little attentions that we really appreciated (chocolates on the towels, drinks in the fridge for the children, a welcome message in the kitchen…you can see he is a generous and kind person who likes to please his guests). The bath towels are huge and so soft. He answered all our mails immediately and was always available when we needed some help or advice. A great and perfect stay - we would definitely stay at Fernando's apartment  again if we'd come back to Madrid.O anfitreao foi muito simpático! O bairro é um bocado deslocado das minhas zonas favoritas de MadridFernando nous a très bien reçu dans son appartement. Il s'agit d'un logement totalement neuf dans une rue calme et isolée en plein coeur du quartier de La Latina (le quartier des bars à tapas). L'appartement est bien équipé et silencieux étant situé sur l'arrière de la rue. Nous avons passé un très agréable séjour.Apartamento TOPLo mejor: 
La flexibilidad: Fernando nos dejó entrar antes el primer día (cuando llegamos ya nos estaba esperando) y dejar las maletas hasta las 7 el último.
El piso: es nuevo, acogedor y tiene todo lo necesario y más, tanto en cocina como en baño y resto de la casa. La situación es inmejorable, la calefacción va de maravilla, y la ducha es una gozada (odio las duchas sin presión).
Puntos flojos: 
Ruidos: Estaban reformando el piso de arriba y las obras empezaban a las 8:30, pero supongo que no puedes pedirle al vecino que no haga obras... Tuvimos mala suerte y es algo temporal. Lástima que de viernes a domingo también se escuche la música de los bares... Es lo que tiene estar al lado de una de las zonas más animadas de Madrid :)
Piso: es bajo y no tiene mucha luz pero para pasar unos días de vacaciones no creo que sea ningún un problema.
Lo recomendaría!It haas been a real pleasure to stay in Fernando's flat. It is really in the very center of Madrid, 10 minutes walking from plaza Mayor and exactly in the middle of the pubs area, the best one of Madrid.
It was really very clean and full of all things you may need.
Just one single thing: two windows are very high and the other two faces on the inside part of the building, no nice view from them, but it's just a detail compensated by staying in the center of the city.
I suggest Fernando's flat to all couples willing to visit Madrid.Fernando is awesome. He communicated with us very promptly. He is very nice and approachable and his brother Javier is also very nice.Really clean transportation is also good.
Many good tapas bars around the main tourist attractions are also within walking closer.Fernando nous a très bien accueillis malgré un retard de 2 heures de notre vol. L'appartement était très propre et très bien équipé.

Il est localisé près du Métro La Latina et de rues pleines de restaurants et bars.  C'est animé dans la rue, mais les bruits ne parviennent pas à l'intérieur, puis qu'il est localisé en retrait.  Seul bémol, pas de fenêtres donnant sur l'extérieur, peu de lumière naturelle.

Nous avons été très satisfaits.Lovely, well-appointed and well positioned apartment. 5 mins from metro, 10 from Plaza Mayor. Fernando helpful and polite. Seconds from the action in La Latina.A Great jewel in the middle of town! 
Could not explain it any different, this apartment has a really good location, close to subways and all the sights you could want to see are mostly walking distance. Quiet neighborhood during the day and a lots of bars and restaurants nearby if you would want to enjoy some local food and socialize with some drinks!Fernando was an amazing host. My girlfriend and I stayed at the apartment for a week. We received a warm welcome from Fernando and his girlfriend as soon as we walked in. The apartment was flawless, everything was well thought out and we had everything we needed. We really enjoyed the small details throughout the apartment, which made the whole experience a lot more cosy and pleasant.

The apartment was whitin walking distance of the most beautiful locations, which gave us the opportunity to experience much more of Madrid than we could have hoped.

Should we ever find ourselves in Madrid again, we would certainly stay with Fernando.Das Apartment war perfekt, stylisch und modern, aber auch zweckmäßig eingerichtet, die 
Lage ist super, man erreicht fast alles Wichtige zu Fuss, quasi vor der Haustür gibt es zahlreiche Restaurants und Bars.
Ferando war sehr gastfreundlich, hat uns mit Kleinigkeiten verwöhnt.
Sehr zu empfehlen, lädt zum Wiederkommen ein!We stayed in the White House for 4 days. Fernando is very attentive and he did a great job in ensuring we felt welcome and at home the moment we arrived.
The apartment was really nice, cosy and clean and very conveniently located on a walking distance from the spectacular centre of Madrid, lots of restaurants, tapas bars and close to public transport!
Definitely a recommendation for any short stay to explore Madrid. Lovely apartment in city centre location, short walk from plaza major (about 3 minutes) and 2 mins walk from metro. Excellent facilities & wifi, clean, modern, secure and quiet. Lots of bars and restaurants in the area. Fernando met us as promised and welcomed us, he also checked in during our stay. Would highly recommend this apt. My boyfriend arrived at Fernando's air bnb apartment early in the morning and texted me right away to let me know how Fernando was extremely accommodating and even offered to help him find local groceries since he knew he was cooking dinner for me later. Upon my arrival, I noticed how beautiful and clean the apartment was. It also gave us the most amazing experience since we were literally a five minute walk from every touristy location and restaurant. I would definitely recommend staying at Fernando's white house when staying in Madrid. You won't regret it! Alojamiento 100% recomendable. Perfecta ubicación respecto al metro, bares y restaurantes. Todo está muy nuevo y cuidado. Fernando es un gran anfitrión, atento y responsable. Hemos pasado una estancia inmejorable en este apartamento!Fernando was very helpful and greeted us. He also sent us messages throughout our stay to ask if we need anything. The apartment was exactly as described. It's in a wonderful neighborhood if you are looking to explore some Madrid bars and restaurants. Fernando gave as a warm welcome provided us the things we needed to know. It was nice of him to provide us a weclome drink a  fresh strawberriesFernando was very welcoming despite a long delay on our arrival.  The apartment was just what we expected (simple and clean) and conveniently located right in the middle of La Latina - ideal for tapas, sangria, metro and the on/off bus.  We had a  great break. We had a great time in Madrid and having a home so central from all the shopping and great restaurants was a huge help. It was ready with everything we could possibly think of tea, coffee and even laundry detergent. thank you so much for being so hospitable and being so patient and waiting for us the first day! :) Fernando is a very decent host.
The apartment is situated perfectly in the centre of Madrid. All sights in walking distance.
The apartment is exactly as it is described. Most important the bed is very good and the apartment very clean. 
Fernando: thank you very much for the nice stay.The apartment is very nicely finished, modern, ultra-clean. Everything you need is in there.  There is not much natural light because the windows are few and tiny, all of them facing either into the interior yard of the building or even into the interior corridors of the building itself where the lift is.  For this reason it's unusually quiet for the location (the BEST part of Madrid), and cool.  However - because the main window to the bedroom is an interior one, it can be quite noisy if the restaurant downstairs is open - there is a constant sound of dishes being washed between 6PM and midnight.  This only bothered us on the first day when we arrived tired after a very early start, and heard this.  For the 3 remaining days we were not disturbed at all, despite the fact that outside in the street there was noisy, joyful chaos all around (mainly because we were out ourselves).  Fernando was very friendly, accommodating and attentive.  Easy and fun to deal with.  I would recommend this apartment for a short stay if you plan to be out in the evenings (and why wouldn't you do that if you're in this fabulous La Latina area of Madrid?  Fernando's apartment was in a great location-just south of Plaza Mayor in the La Latina neighborhood, a quick walk to 3 metro stations that took us anywhere we needed to go. It was very clean, and Fernando patiently waited for us after our flight was delayed, and communicated via email often. He also left us a list of restaurants and some snacks in the apartment. Tip: to maximize hot water usage for multiple guests, shower at separate times during the day. Had a great time. Great location, and Fernando was very understanding of my flight delay Le logement est conforme au descriptif ; il est grand, agréable, moderne, très bonne literie   et parfait pour un couple. Il est bien isolé de la chaleur ce qui est parfait pour l'été à Madrid; il est aussi très bien équipé ; l'emplacement est aussi bon pour visiter le centre de Madrid. Fernando nous a bien accueilli.  Seul petit point négatif : présence de 2 bars de nuit à l'entrée de l'immeuble  - on entend certains soirs de la musique à une heure avancée  même si c'est tout à fait  supportable. Je recommande ce logement   This was awesome experience...5 stars on every measure.We had an excellent stay at Fernandos! Great location and nicely appointed. Fernando is a wonderful host.Our stay at Fernando's apartment was excellent! Communication was great and check-in/check-out was simple. 

The apartment itself is exactly like the photos. The place was clean, organized and everything was in working order. The wifi was great, the washing machine worked well, and the bed was comfortable. The outside weather was hot during our stay, so having the ceiling fans was a great relief. 

I would definitely recommend staying at Fernando's apartment for anyone traveling to Madrid.

All in all, the place is as advertised and Fernando is a great host! Fernando wasn't able to greet us, but his uncle and father did and they were very kind and helpful. Fernando made sure to check in with us afterwards as well. Everyone was very kind and helpful. The place was very clean, pictures are real, and the location was great. Me and my wife really enjoyed our stay here and if we do return would definitely look to stay here again. Fernando was een geweldige gastheer. Hij heeft ons, ook tijdens ons verblijf, meerdere keren gecontacteerd om te vragen of alles OK was. Hij heeft ook moeite gedaan om voor ons een trip naar Toledo te boeken enz... 
Overigens is het appartement heel comfortabel, mooi ingericht en koel. Ze doen er alles aan of je een 'thuisgevoel' te geven.A very nice apartment in a brilliant area of the city. The pictures are as real as they can get, everything we needed was available. The fans create a fresh wind flow and the water pressure in the shower is excellent. Great bed, enough pillows and enough closet space to unpack the suitcases.
The apartment is a few hundred meters away from plaza major and walking distance to Sol and Gran Via. Never felt unsafe for a moment and there are loads of bars and restaurants in the streets around the apartment.
The host is very welcoming, having prepared some of the necessities before our arrival and he was easy to get in touch with. 

I would definitely go here again.We loved this apartment. It was well appointed, clean, all furniture in good condition. Wonderful ceiling fans to help keep rooms cool. Truly what you see in the photos is what the apartment looks like. Wonderful neighborhood with bars, restaurants, shops in walking distance. Fernando was a gracious host, any questions were immediately answered. I would highly recommend this apartment and would use again on a return trip to Madrid. Appartement refait, clair, propre et bien équipé. 
Idéalement situé pour le toutisme.
Pas de vue (fenêtres très hautes) mais ce n'est pas gênant.
Ce qui l'est davantage c'est le bruit nocturne ponctuel du voisinage et la lumière émanant de la cage d'escalier.
Je recommande néanmoins cet appartement. 
Fernando est accueillant, ponctuel et agréable. 
Nous avons apprécié les petites attentions : boissons fraiches, thé, café, chips....Fernando's appartement ligt midden in de uitgaanswijk La Latina. Veel terrassen, café's en restaurants; overal een gezellige atmosfeer. Het appartement is uiterst doelmatig ingericht en heel schoon. Het is prima ingericht en van alle gemakken voorzien. Het is gevestigd in een oud appartementenblok, maar is van binnen hypermodern. Goed bed, goede douche, goede keuken, Wifi en TV. Een droogrek voor handdoeken zou handig zijn.
Zoals blijkt uit het adres, is het een binnen-appartement en heeft dus geen ramen naar buiten (behalve twee ramen naar een binnenplaats). Dat heeft het voordeel dat je daardoor geen last hebt van geluiden van de straat.
Als uitvalsbasis voor een bezoek aan Madrid is het echt uitstekend.Location: excellent
Cleanliness: excellent
Bed:  excellent
Shower:  excellent
Kitchen:  excellent
Wifi: excellent
Host greeting: excellent
Host checkout: disappointing, arrangement was 12.  Phoned at 12.40 to enquire about the delay. Told that he would be there in 40 mins followed by call 5 mins later to be told to leave the key on table and close the door behind you.......not great. My wife and I stayed at Fernando's apartment for a long weekend and we really enjoyed our stay.

The apartment is great - modern, clean, more than enough space for 2 people and all the facilities you need.

The location is really good too - right in the heart of La Latina, with loads of bars and restaurants around and within walking distance of most of the city centre. The only negative is the bar below the apartment, which can be quite noisy.

Fernando was a great host. Communication was prompt and helpful, and he gave us some really good recommendations of places in the area.Fernando welcomed us past 1am due to our 3h flight delay. Despite the late hour, he was very nice and took the time to show us around the apartment.
The apartment is in a very good shape and comfortable, with plenty of amenities. There isn't a lot of natural light but all the rooms are well lit and we spent much of our time outside anyway. The location is great with plenty of bars and restaurants around the corner.Apartamento muy acogedor, tal y como se muestra en las fotografías.       
Ubicación ideal! 
Repetiríamos sin duda!

Gracias Fernando!Great host. Fernando responded fast to any questions we had. Our flight was delayed, Fernando was patient to wait for us. We stayed for two weeks and felt very comfortable just like home. Great experience. Thank you Fernando. Estuvimos tres dias en un apartamento super super encantador.
Puesto con mucho gusto,limpisimo,muy bien comunicado....en fin que cuando vuelva a Madrid no dudare en hospedarme alli. Os lo recomiendo a todosI cannot say enough wonderful things about Fernando and the wonderful apartment! The apartment is beautiful-- the photos are very accurate. The location is wonderful; the apartment is walking distance to shops, restaurants, bars, and other attractions. Fernando was a great host-- he was always quick to reply and answer any of my questions and he even called a taxi for me for my morning flight out of Madrid. I would absolutely stay here if I ever came back to Madrid.Fernando was very helpful, check in was a breeze, we checked in late at 10pm and Fernando waited and showed us around. Place was very upmarket just as shown in the pics. Location was good lots of bars and restaurants around and easy to get to alot of tourists sites on foot. Didn't think it was too noisy at all. We enjoyed our stay and would stay there again. 마드리드 시내 관광하기에 최적의 숙소 위치입니다. 왕궁 대성당 마요르 광장까지 도보 5분거리 이내에 있습니다.    깨끗하고 모던한 인테리어에 필요한 물품들을 모두 구비하고 있습니다. 다만 빛이 별로 들어오지 않지만 관광하는데 대부분의 시간을 보내는 여행자라면 별 문제되지 않을 것입니다.This apartment is in a great location in the neighbourhood "La Latina". It has tapas restaurants and bars on the same street and surrounding streets, and although these were quite quiet during the week, they were packed and pumping until late on the Saturday night. It is only a 5 minute walk from the main square and another 5 minutes or so to the "Sol" area. The apartment is spacious and has lovely warm heating. The bed was very comfortable and firm. There was some noise from other apartments one night, but other than that it was a very easy and enjoyable stay. Fernando welcomed us warmly, showed us around the apartment and also checked via text message that we were ok once during our stay which was kind. There was water, coca cola and some snacks left for us in the kitchen. It was unusual to have a lift in the building which makes things easier with suitcases, plus the apartment is only on the first floor which was also pleasing.One of the best apartments I stayed in.
Very clean, well equipped, close to Metro Station "La Latina" . 
Highly Recommended! I would stay in this apartment everytime I think about coming to Madrid. Fernando wartete geduldig auf uns ca. 1 Stunde vor dem Haustor, weil der Taxifahrer die Gasse nicht finden konnte. Dafür ein extra großes Danke an Fernando!
Fernando ist sehr freundlich und nahm sich Zeit uns sein Apartment vorzustellen. Dieses ist komplett neu und entsprechend hochwertig ausgestattet. Die Küche bietet alles was man benötigt, das Bett ist besonders hervorzuheben, da es groß und gut gefedert ist. Das Badezimmer verfügt über eine Monsundusche sowie eine Heizung, welche uns im Jänner gute Dienste erwies. In der gleichen Gasse befinden sich mehrere originelle Lokale sowie in unmittelbarer Nähe eine Markthalle sowie die Metro-Bahn Station "La Latina". In etwa 20min erreicht man die Kathedrale Nueva sowie den Palacio Real und befindet sich damit schon inmitten der Altstadt. Wir empfehlen dieses Apartment zu 100%.Fernando was a great host overall, the place was clean as a whistle, he even left some snacks for us upon arrival which was very kind. The apartment is very well located, especially if you're looking for nightlife and restaurants, you'll have all of those literally within steps of the front door. 
Overall very nice stay, I highly recommend the place!Fernando's place is the perfect spot if you want to really experience Madrid! 

It's centrally located to a lot of restaurants/ bars, coffee shops and shopping. We were able to get to all the "tourist" attractions within 30 minutes or less by foot. It was a great way to see the city.

The place itself is clean, well decorated and stocked. It definitely made you feel like you were "home" even though we were in a different country. I would highly recommend it and stay here again myself.

Thanks for having us, Fernando!

Fernando was an amazing host. He was super kind and generous with his time and offered to help in any way possible. The apartment was fantastic and the location was simply incredible! It'll be my number one pick when I head back to Madrid and I would absolutely recommend this place to my friends and family. Mejor zona no pudimos haber escogido, el apartamento es impecable y Fernando muy atento y receptivo. 
Totalmente recomendable!!! 
Equipado con todo, excelente wifi y cerca a todos los lugares turísticos. Mi esposo y yo disfrutamos 100% nuestra estadía en The White House of La Latina.Enjoyed my stay and Fernando was a great host!If you are looking right now for a place to stay in Madrid and experience its full culture, search no more, this is the place!!!

Clean, easy to find, perfect location connected to the La Latina Metro line which pretty much connects with all of the other lines, closely located to shops, markets and lots of bars!! A perfect stay for a couple or if you are on a business trip.

Fernando is an amazing host!! Greeted us, explained everything, and was one of the few hosts to actually check in (via message) to see how our stay is going!!

We had to urgently extend our stay for one more day, and Fernando was super flexible on that!!

Amazing stay in an amazing city!

Definitely coming back!

Thank you so much Fernando!!Fernando was the best host, we could not ask for better! From the moment we booked - he sent a very friendly message with clear instructions on when & how to get here. Apartment is in the most amazing location, so social and safe..we loved it. He really went above and beyond his duty to help us during our stay & I would highly recommend everyone to stay here - Love Madrid! See you next time Fernando! Great place in a great location. Easy to walk to many places. The metro is near and the neighborhood is great to explore. Deux pièces plein de charme même si pas beaucoup de lumière idéalement situé, à 5 mn à pieds de la plaza Mayor et à 100 m de la rue de Madrid où se situe tous les bars à tapasI would recommend this apartment to anyone visiting Madrid for a few days. I am so glad we stayed here during our vacation. The apartment is very central to many of Madrid's attractions. We were able to walk to most of the sites that we wanted to see. It also happens to be right in the heart of one of Madrid's most lively neighborhoods. We were easily able to find many bars and restaurants at all hours of the day that were not touristy at all. Absolutely a great place to stay!Great flat. Very clean and modern with high ceiling and a lot of equipement. The bar downstairs can be a bit noisy till one ish but that is actually early for Madrid and not a problem unless you plan on sleeping early. Check in was easy as Fernando was really nice and available.Locatie is super. echt op paar minuten van belangrijke plaatsen. Let op dat appartement geen daglicht heeft. Alle reviews kloppen, maar niemand vermeld duidelijk dat er geen buiten ramen zijn en dat de flat pal boven een bar gelegen is die behoorlijk veel overlast genereerd door het lawaai. Ik ben genoodzaakt geweest om oor doppen aan te schaffen.Fernando had been nothing short of hospitable - accommodating to our delayed check-in due to weather related flight delays.  Everything in the apartment was as described.  Safe and close to local attractions either via walking or metro.  Muy bueno apartamento para quedarse en la región central de Madrid. El apartamento está muy buen arreglado! Tiene todo lo que necesitas!Nice place. Plenty of room. Bathroom is a little tight. Overall clean and easy access to points of interest and restaurants. Very comfortable apartment. Plenty of space.  Very central with local bars and restaurants. Metro a 2 minute walk. Fernando responded very quickly to questions.  I would recommend this apartment Das Check-In hat super geklappt, Fernando musste lange auf uns warten weil das Gepäck nicht kam - das war aber überhaupt kein Problem für ihn. 
Das Apartment ist wie auf den Bildern beschrieben, sehr gemütlich, sauber und mit einem riesengroßen Kleiderschrank der auch Platz für die Koffer bietet. 
Bett und Sofa sind gemütlich, die Küche hat wirklich alles, was man braucht. 
Bezüglich der Fenster und dem Tageslicht: Es stimmt, es ist recht dunkel aber dafür hatten wir absolut erträgliche Temperaturen in der Wohnung - vor allem zum Schlafen- bei 40 Grad Außentemperatur. Also vollkommen OK für uns.
Im Haus ist immer was los, man hört Fernseher und so weiter der Nachbarn, darauf muss man sich einstellen. Aber einfach zwei Gläschen Sangria mehr und das ist kein Problem mehr ;-)
Wir hatten eine sehr schöne Zeit in Fernandos Apartment, vielen Dank dafür.Good location within the old Madrid center. 10 min walk to Plaza Mayor. Some nice bars in the street and around the corner. Tiny, clean, well equiped apartment. Unfortunately, no windows or view to the outside, just a small window to the back. Ceiling-mounted fans, no air-conditioning, which is a problem in the summer. Great place, centrally located near Calle Cava Baja with numerous tapas bars. Fernando is incredibly helpful and the place is thoughtfully equipped with everything you need for a great stay. Quiet at night whilst being in a bustling area, lovely comfortable bed and great shower! Highly recommended.El piso de Fernando está en porTraveling thru Europe by far antonio's place was the best of the best!
It was clean, close to restaurants and bars and cafes literally right outside of the front gate/door. It was very convenient to get to sightseeing attractions as well.
Antonio and his brother were very communicative and super helpful! 
Loved it!!! Thank you Antonio to open up your home for us!El departamento está perfectamente ubicado,  pasos de todo, en un barrio más que interesante. Además, es lindo, limpio y confortable. Volvería, sin duda. Lo recomiendo!Great location and great apartment. Very clean, nicely decorated and Fernando was a great host! I would come back and stay here again.Ryddig, rent og flott leilighetClean. Apartment is as pictured. Modern. Easy access. Close to great area full of tapas plus numerous attractions within walking distance and very close to metro. Highly recommend!Fernando was an amazing host. His home is lovely and he was very accommodating with all of our need and questions. Definitely would come again and recommend to all looking for a stay in Madrid. Fran who was a taxi driver recommended by Fernando was also very great.We loved the convenient location for everything we wanted to do! This place felt like home and was clean and spacious. So many good places to eat nearby as well. The bed was very comfortable and the apartment was quiet at night despite being in a busy area. The bathroom was small but had space to lay out toiletries, and the shower pressure was great. Fernando let us check in a bit early which was greatly appreciated after long flights, and was very communicative during our stay. Would stay again!!We loved Fernando's place. It was spacious, extremely well located, and accurately depicted in the pictures.  Fernando was a good host too. I would recommend.  

Note for those driving: Parking in the immediate area is expensive (25-30 euros a day for covered spot).Excelente lugar, la locación esta muy buena llegas caminando a casi cualquier lugar de interés de Madrid, muchos bares, restaurantes, mercados y plazas alrededor.Veramente un'ottima sistemazione. Spaziosa, centrale, confortevole. Fernando è un ottimo host, ospitale e sempre presente. Consiglio a chi vuole vivere Madrid di soggiornare qui.Great place, I would recommend it. Fernando is very responsive and punctual.Amazing apartmentLe logement de Fernando fut parfait pour notre séjour à deux : bel espace, bien décoré, propre, très bien équipé (!) et idéalement situé (quartier vivant avec de nombreuses activités, marchés, bars et resto --> un peu de bruit mais pas dérangeant). La communication avec Fernando était très facile et nous avons été très bien accueillis. Parfait, mieux qu'à l'hotel !Great area, lovely apartment!El apartamento está situado en La Latina, rodeado de zona de bares y cerca de los principales puntos de interés de Madrid, con fácil acceso a pie. De decoración moderna y confortable, el apartamento es idóneo para pasar unos días y disfrutar de la ciudad. Además Fernando ha sido muy atento en todo momento. ¡Totalmente recomendable!Great locationGreat place Fernando always responded right awayL'appartamento è carino e in posizione centrale, però è molto piccolo e buio. Prezzo decisamente eccessivo.Great location for being in and amongst great restaurants, bars and clubs.  Be aware that some days can be noisy because of location but we had a great time non the less.  Thanks Fernando.Good location, nice place and Fernando was very quick with his responses. Only downside was how noisy the place was.The apartment was nice and 
well located and Fernando was very kindWonderful flat and close to everything, especially the amazing Cava Baja. I'd stay here again in a heartbeat!If you want to stay right in the heart of the lively part of Madrid known as La Latina and want somewhere surprisingly quiet to stay then Fernando's apartment is a good choice. If you're after total quietness at night time then pick a different area as La Latina is not for you! However we slept well and really enjoyed having great bars and restaurants on our doorstep with the famous Tapas pilgrimage road just round the corner! Would definitely recommend for location and comfort.Very well located and clean airBnb, but take into account that it can be noisy, especially in the weekend. You can hear outside noise very well.This is a beautiful, modern and stylish apartment in La Latina, Fernando was a great host, helpful and accommodating. We would definitely consider staying at his apartment again (we visit Madrid a lot) The only slight issue we had was that the apartment is in a traditional Spanish apartment block built around a central stairwell, this meant it could be a little noisy when people come and go, this is not a specific fault with Fernando’s apartment just something to be aware of if you are considering renting this type of apartment. That said there was no noise from the street which has several bars close by. La Latina is a great place to stay when visiting Madrid, has a more local rather that tourist feel which we loveThe apartment is in a great location, we walked everywhere.  There are dozens of restaurants nearby, as well as a large market that sell fresh fruits and vegetables. The apartment is also stylish and well furnished.  The kitchen has been updated with new appliances , and the living room is very comfortable. Muy buena experiencia. Localizacion excelente. Fernando fue muy atento y rapido en contestar. Nos ayudo con la hora de llegada y se acomodo a nosotros. 100% recomendado!Fernando's apartment is in a GREAT location! Everything was clean and nice and we had everything we needed for our stay. Fernando was a wonderful host, even letting us come early to drop off our bags so we could go explore before our check in time. He checked with us a few times throughout the trip to make sure we had everything we needed. Overall, we recommend this apartment for the location, value, cleanliness, and the very helpful and communicative host. The apartment is on the interior of the building, so the windows do not open up to the street, but rather to a courtyard (in case it is hard to tell from the photos.) We spent a lot of time in the apartment because we were working part of the time, but I don't think this would be noticeable to anyone else spending most of the day out exploring :)I think there should be a penalty for late arrival of host.My friend waited for more than 60 minutes( 7 pm on satursday) for his late show up.  And I don’t think the host read the messages carefully,the communication is very ineffective.Since I repeated several times in my message the time of our arrival, while he
kept asking all the time and finally appeared at least one hour late as promised. The light of the apartment is so dark and have to turn up lights during daytime.Whats more,  there is no quilt (bedclothes)on bed (not sofa bed),only a piece of bedsheet instead,which made me get a bad cold unfortunately. If I have a chance to visit Madrid again,I will certainly pick up somewhere more comfortable to stay!Dear travelers,

Please don’t hesitate to book this apartment. Everything you want to see and do is within a short walking distance. Clubs, food, metro, and historic landmarks. The apartment is very clean and remodeled, in the district of La Latina. But most importantly, Fernando is a wonderful host. 

Hope you enjoy your stay in Madrid, sending love from San Francisco California,

MartinThere are so many great things about Fernando’s place.  It’s beautiful and stylishly decorated. It’s sparkling clean and feels brand new. The couch and bed are extremely comfortable. There is lots of room to hang out in, and lots of space for hanging and storing clothes.  The location is perfect-we walked everywhere. Although the bathroom is small, it’s so well planned that there is lots of room for toiletries. We had an excellent dinner one night at Esteban’s, a very friendly restaurant recommended by Fernando right around the corner. Thanks Fernando! Your place will be at the top of the list when we return to Madrid.Appartment is great in a very nice area with plenty of restaurants and walking streets around.Great apartment in a great location. Walking distance to multiple subway stations with access to multiple train lines. Walking distance to most sightseeing, restaurants, bars, etc. Clean and well appointed with wifi, a washing machine, dishwasher, oven, range, microwave, full size fridge, etc. for extended stays. One floor up but there is an elevator. Not a ton of natural light due to small windows, but you will likely not be spending much time in the flat anyway. As described, windows do open to an interior courtyard but then you lose privacy so this is not ideal. No air, but we did not need it. Also, when the windows are open and the fans are on, it cools the apartment nicely in the evenings. It is heated, but it was unseasonably warm when we were there and we did not need it at all, despite being the end of October. Nice rainfall shower and a place for toiletries, etc. for the ladies. Hair dryer is good, not like the typical hotel ones that are bad. Towels are nice and big and fluffy. Bed is firm, but we prefer it that way, better for your back. Lots of closet space and hangers. Worth the cost and would definitely not hesitate to stay here again or recommend to friends.From start to finish it was a pleasure to deal with Fernando. He was easy to contact, and punctual at check in. The apartment was spotless, with everything we needed for a great stay. The location is ideal, right in the centre of the La Latina district. Lots of nice bars and cafes nearby, and a short walk from the metro and bike rentals.Very professional and flexible. Overall a great stay!Not sure if this was a fluke  to happen at this apartment but on our first night we lost power and it wasn't fixed until 15 hours later. Our host was unresponsive for over 12 hours. We ended up calling airbnb who then called our host. We got the power back on, but it kept tripping anytime we tried to use any of the amenities, we could barely charge our phones without the power tripping. We had none of the kitchen appliances plugged in. We could not use any of the amenities. We would go to sleep only to wake to the power being out and the heat off.  It was freezing. This was not my idea of a vacation. Having to fix a problem every 5 minutes really took the fun out of being in Madrid. It was a constant issue. Overall it was a terrible experience.Great location, cool placeUbicación perfecta, para dos es inmejorable. Precio Justo. Bonito, colchón cómodo, baño justito pero suficiente, cocina importante salón comodisimo... limpio. 
Perfecto para conocer madridThe apartment is beautifully decorated and has all amenities you could ask for. Over the weekend it can get a little loud with the bars/ club next to it. Fernando immediately replied to any questions we had. The location is absolutely amazing. Thank you for everything!Fantastic host with excellent communication and was very obliging. The location is excellent with all amenities nearby. The apartment was spotlessly clean.Thank you're great host....keep it up brother Great location close to Cava Baja. Comfortable warm and fully equipped. Host communicates well in English. Check in conducted by lovely lady who only spoke Spanish but everything was straightforward and easy to find and operate.Great location in the La Latina area! Even though it's near a lot of restaurants, the apartment itself was quiet and spacious for our needs. The bathroom is a little small but the shower worked great and everything functioned well.Perfect place for a weekend getaway! Fernando was very quick to reply to all my messages and very helpful, even when we had to check in at night due to flight delays.

The place was very clean and had all the amnesties needed. The location is perfect as well - so close to a lot of wonderful restaurants. 

A light sleeper might find the place a bit noisy though...This is the perfect place to stay in Madrid. It is walking distance to most touristic areas and also has some amazing restaurants just minutes away.The White House is exactly as shown in the photographs and my husband and I spent a wonderful 2 weeks in this well-located apartment.

Fernando was very responsive in all aspects of our communication, from the initial enquiry to our arrival when he met us outside the apartment, before showing us around.

As well as being beautifully, comfortably and sensitively decorated, this apartment is in a brilliant location - walking distance from most attractions and only a 5-minute walk to the La Latina metro.

I would recommend this apartment to fellow travellers.ExtraordinarioWe did a 3-city tour and this was by far the best value BnB for our money.  The unit was like the pictures show. It was clean and the location was great. For 2 people, my husband & I, it worked great.  If you don't mind the couch, you could have put 3 people in there--but the bathroom is off the bedroom so you would loose privacy if you had more than 2 people.  

I picked this location specifically to be close to where our daughter lives (she was studying there for a semester which prompted our trip in the first place) but this central Madrid area also turned out to be in walking distance to many sight-seeing things we had on our list and we walked to many, many places from there which is a great way to get the personality and rhythm of the city.

The unit was clean and bright even though it doesn't have a lot of windows.  We suggested to the host that he add a shade or room darkening curtain over the one window that's facing the elevator out in the enclosed/interior court yard because the elevator lights shine through that window at night on an irregular basis as the lighted elevator goes up and down. That window is in direct line with the bed and there is no way to close the bedroom off from that light coming through.  Most nights it wasn't a problem but it was especially problematic for me the1st night--I'm guessing in part due to jet lag and my sleeping pattern being out of whack, but on one other night it kind of bugged me, too. (maybe there was more traffic on it that night? Anyway, the light pattern is unpredictable.) It would be an easy fix to add a window shade/curtain that could be rolled up during the day.  

The bed was comfy, kitchen and living areas are a nice size.  Mostly we ate out, but our daughter came over and cooked us breakfast one day and found everything she needed in the kitchen. We bought our own coffee since there was only tea available. Host provided paper towels, toilet paper, laundry soap (washer works good, no dryer so use the rack and ceiling fan to dry.) Shampoo/soaps were provided but we brought our own shampoo.  The bathroom is fully equipped but teeny tiny--including the shower. It's definitely only meant for person at a time, but is fine.  The rain shower is nice.  I have long hair and appreciated the full power blow dryer vs. those whimpy ones some places have and plenty of towels. The towel warmer was good for getting them dry between use.

Weather was warm most of the time (highs of 80's/low 90's) but it was not hot in the unit.  We used the ceiling fans and were quite comfortable. (there is no A/C) Overnight & mornings were cool so we opened the windows. 

Building entrance is secured at the street level and we felt very safe in the unit and the area all around it.  

Wifi worked fine. 

Great price. 

We'd  recommend this host/unit and would stay here again given the opportunity.todo fue perfecto hasta el último día. hubiera puesto cinco estrellas pero no. El check out era a las 12:00 y salimos 12:20 nos cobró 56 euros más por salir 20 minutos más tarde. La señora que llegó a limpiar llegó a las 12:10 le dijimos que pasara, sólo estábamos cerrando las maleta y no quiso pasar dijo que esperaba afuera. Le regalamos comida que habíamos dejado en el refrigerador. La señora que limpia le indicó a el dueño y el dueño enojado me hablo diciéndome que soy un irrespetuoso y que es una falta de respeto y que sin educacion. Que para empezar no tiene ningún derecho de hablarme así y en segunda entiendo los 10 minutos tarde pero no es para hacer  tanto drama y hablarme así. Todos los días que estuve ahí me hospedé yo y mi hermano pero el último día llegó un amigo que se quedó con nosotros porque salimos en la noche Y también nos quiso cobrar eso. Cuando en la página web dice que caben de una a cuatro personas. 
Lástima hubiera sido una excelente experiencia sino hubiera sido por ese último día.Alles wie beschrieben.Apartamento muy limpio,muy tranquilo ,muy cómodo y sobretodo la ubicación y el edificio inmejorableWe had a really great time at Fernando’s flat and would recommend to others!Great spot and very modern. Super quiet considering the location m. Best coffee in town right next door at Perro de PavlovFantastic location and good amenities. Would stay at Fernando’s place again!Great location and neighborhood atmosphereA very good location and a clean and comfortable appartment.Die Wohnung ist perfekt gelegen. Und sie ist sehr gut eingerichtet und sehr sauber. Für einen weiteren Aufenthalt in Madrid würden wir die Wohnung wieder nehmen. Besonders im Sommer, denn die Wohnung hat wenig Fenster.Great apartment in a quiet location but walkable to main attractions in the city. The place was perfectly clean and a very comfortable place to stay숙소 위치도 솔광장까지 도보 약 10~13분 거리여서 걸어다니기 편했고, 거실 및 화장실도 매우 깨끗했어요. 침대도 편했구요. 다만 전기가 간혹 끊기는 점은 조금 불편했습니다Very clean, nice and cosy apartment. Superb location; everything is in walking-distance. Metro is very close as well. Fernando is easy going and willing to help where he can. We had a lovely stay in his apartment!!A good place, a minus the sound and the facts that there is no balking or external windowFernando is fantastic and answered our questions within seconds. You in walking distance of so many Madrid attractions. It doesn’t get better than this. The home is clean and the washer provides a valuable resource on a long trip. Would stay again.Es un apartamento genial, con una ubicación inmejorable y un anfitrión muy agradable. Tuvimos algunos problemas con la electricidad y sólo podíamos encender un radiador de lis cuatro.

comments: Andrea es una excelente anfitriona, la habitación está impecable, la recomiendo ampliamente para estancias largas, la ubicación es buena sobretodo si vas a alguno de los hospitales universitarios de la zona, y la estación de metro (línea 9) está a pocos metros del alojamiento y te lleva al centro de Madrid en 20 minutos. Sin duda volvería a alojarme con ella.Andrea simplemente es alguien especial te trata como su familia siempre dispuesta a ayudar a enseñar a un buen consejo es excelente estar con ella

comments: Magnifique appartement super bien placé sur la place chueca, au coeur d'un quartier avec plein de bars, restos et boutiques. A 10mn de la pueta del sol également!

comments:
Genial. Manuel estuvo atento en todo momento por si necesitábamos algo. La habitación es mejor aún que las fotos, durante el día es muy luminosa y cómoda. La ubicación es también perfecta, muy bien comunicada con el metro y autobuses. En general, muy contento con la estancia, sin duda volvería a repetir.Уютная комната, удобная гостиная и кухня. Рядом с домом остановка автобуса, метро - 5 мин. пешком. Мануэль очень гостеприимный и отзывчивый хозяин. Комната очень понравилась, рекомендуем!Manuel 
Es un excelente anfitrión, nos sentimos como en casa. El trato fue excelente y la hospitalidad de Manuel fue increíble. El departamento es muy comodo, tenes todo lo que necesitas. Podes utilizar la nevera, la cocina. Estas a 100mts del metro y a 5 minutos de la estacion de autobus.  
Manuel est très gentil et beau, il nous aidait beaucoup. Si j'irais à Madrid prochaine fois, je voudrais encore louer cette chambre. Nous avons passé bon séjour. Merci beaucoup à Manuel!Manuel is a very warm and welcoming host. Good location next to transit, cafes, and great parks, also walkable to center if you're up for it. Room was great but the apartment is very small and shared with other airbnb room as well as host and his nice kids. La casa de Manuel es tal cual como indica el anuncio, nos quedamos 2 noches y hemos podido hacer todo lo q queríamos. Muy cerca de la estación del metro y con servicios cerca. Manuel es un buen anfitrión muy atento. Lugar ideal para quienes busquen contacto personal con gente local y ambiente de piso compartido. Manuel es un anfitrión fantástico, muy amable e implicado. We do have a couple of suggestions- the first would be locks on the bedroom doors as there is 3 rooms in the apartment rented to guests, and so at times we felt a little uneasy leaving our laptop and money in the room when we were out.

-	La propreté et le calme absolu bien qu’il se trouve dans un quartier animé et cela est dû à sa position architecturale dans le bâtiment dont il  fait partie ;

comments:
Overall, we had a great time in Christian's place. There were a few items we needed some help/clarification (e.g., hot water heater), but we were able to get that resolved fairly quickly and had hot water in the morning.

The location was great! Literally half a block from La Gran Via, over by Plaza Santo Domingo. Street had traffic/buses on it--but wasn't overly noisy. Were able to relax/sleep w/o major disturbance. Plenty of cool shops, restaurants, and bars in the neighborhood. Right on major bus/subway lines and shopping on La Gran Via.

Christian's property was by far our favorite AirBnb we've stayed in. Was a 3rd floor walk-up in a historic building. The unit was 3 large bedrooms, 2.5 baths. Full kitchen. Washer/dryer (cycles are a bit long, but not a big deal). 

Great upscale place. I took my parents and they loved it as well. Overall great experience. Would definitely stay here again!Nice place, location and everything else but if you have lots of luggage’s it will be a bit challenge as there is no elevatorLinda casa, cómoda y muy céntrica.
Te hace sentir como en casa sobre todo si vas con familia.This is a super stylish and huge apartment in a hopping central area of Madrid. The building is historic and beautiful, with many unique touches. The apartment itself was enormous, with many rooms and hallways- plenty of space for all of our guests! The decor was very trendy with a lot of unique artistic touches.
It was in a great and convenient location!This apartment is great. It is big and roomy. It’s is close to shopping and food locations. Plenty of public transportation available near apartment. The place is as pictured with large rooms and common spaces. it has all the facilities one can imagine and is very aesthetically done. The location was very convenient as well being so close to the metro. However the electrical connectivity was getting off frequently during evenings, upto 10 times in the 4 days we were there, even after following instructions. As adviced we switched the trip up whenever it happened and it was fine. 

Also due to the large size of the apartment, the WiFi is feeble in the living room area, but good speed on the 2 backside so it didnt bother us much. loved the big common space as we enjoyed it a lot . Would recommend the apartment if you are traveling as a big group.

Perfect for large groups, much larger than that photos make it seem. Beautiful furnishings that add a touch of luxury to your holiday.GoodReally awesome apartment,  exactly the same with the pictures , very clean and large bedrooms. comments:
Precioso piso ubicado en Chueca con unos magníficos anfitriones. Muy atentos al huésped e involucrados.  Localizado en zona céntrica y llena de ocio. Además un piso en espléndidas condiciones y y nuevas instalaciones. Muy recomendable.Anfitriones super atentos y trato muy especial, incluso nos dejaron detalles como cervezas en el frigo! Teniamos todo a nuestra mano para poder tener una estancia muy agradable.
El piso está genial y muy detallista. En una ubicación muy buena y céntrica.Mati has been always available and ready to pick up our problems as they were his ones. One of the best hosts I ever experienced.Great place to stay for the weekend. Perfect location and nice amenities. The only thing ceilings are quite low, and I wouldn't necessarily recommend this place for anyone over 6'3" or so.Among my best experiences in Madrid. Comfortable and beautifully lit studio - quiet, light and airy, with all necessary amenities, then more.
Mati was  pleasant, efficient and always eager to go the extra mile to improve my stay.The apartment is perfect for two people. Clean, tidy and located in a great location in the beautiful Chueca district. Mati and Ceci are adorable, precise and ready for any of your requests. I highly recommend staying in this beautiful attic (Website hidden by Airbnb) L'appartamento è perfetto per due persone. Pulito, ordinato e situato in una posizione ottima nel bellissimo quartiere delle Chueca. Mati e Ceci sono adorabili, precisi e pronti a qualsiasi tua richiesta. Consiglio vivamente di soggiornare in questo bello particolare attico.The stay was perfect and the host amazing.Mati and Ceci apartment is very cosy, clean and well furnished.
The position is excellent, near the metro stations of Banco de España and Chueca.
The quarter is full of restaurants, cafes, pubs, supermarkets and shops.
The only weak point is the height of the ceiling: it could create some problems with very tall people.
Recommended!Amazing apartment in the center of Madrid. You don’t need to use the bus/train/metro but just your legs because you have everything around you. Thank you Mati & Ceci for your warm welcome. Hope to see you soon again.Attenzione! 
Le foto che descrivono la casa non corrispondono alla realtà. Le travi in legno, che con furbizia si intravedono soltanto, nella realtà sono talmente basse che nell'80% della casa non si riesce a starci in piedi. 
Per entrare nel bagno bisogna chinarsi, per farsi la barba davanti lo specchio del bagno bisogna stare abbassati, per girare per casa bisogna stare molto attenti, per alzarsi dal letto bisogna pensarci bene e prenderci le misure... tutto solo per non rischiare di rompersi la testa sulle travi di casa.
Ad una media di più di 90 euro al giorno in due persone! 
Un'altra cosa vergognosa si scopre all'arrivo,  quando arrivati all'ultimo piano, bisogna salire altri gradini per arrivare finalmente al livello delle cantinole dell'edificio. 
Credi sia uno scherzo... invece purtroppo no.  
In mezzo alle basse porticine delle cantinole c'è la porta di questo  disdicevole posto. Praticamente una cantina/sottotetto, di cui dubito sia regolare per farci alloggiare gente, ristrutturata e fotografata con molta furbizia.
Avevamo prenotato con mia moglie per 11 giorni e siamo stati costretti a rimanere 3 giorni, il tempo utile per scappare da questo rifugio indicibile.  
Attenzione... hanno il coraggio di proporre la cantina anche per quattro persone!!! non c'e' nemmeno un armadiuccio... 
Attenzione.muy amable MATI ; todo muy puntual! inmejorable ubicaciónThis place is great! Awesome and thoughtful hosts who will test you with beer and local bread and jam. Great place, clean, stylish, awesomely located.Mati y Ceci fueron muy simpáticos, la casa cuenta con detalles de gran calidad y estaba muy limpia. Situada en pleno centro de chueca, pero no se oye ningun ruido.Excelente anfitrión, muy amable y atento, departamento super equipado, limpio y moderno. 100% recomendable para futuros viajantes!El departamento tiene una excelente ubicacion y es muy bonito! esta decorado con muy buen estilo y es muy nuevo. Mati y Ceci son muy amables, muy pendientes del huesped y siempre dispuestos a colaborar. Volveria a alojarme ahi sin dudarlo. Amazing communication, in the heart of Madrid, & asked if they needed to bring more items of such as towels, simple amenities, etc. great stay.Great location, modern and clean apartment. Very comfortable.I enjoyed my stay in this apartment immensely! Beautiful hosts, area, place - everything was great! I will definitely go back there whenever in Madrid!!! Highly recommended!!!Cool attic in the middle of everything. Mati was super responsive and very accommodating around arrival and departure. He even knew my connecting flight from London to Madrid was cancelled before I did. People taller than I might have problems with the beams, but I still loved the apartment, and the location can’t be beat.This place exemplifies the best of Airbnb - comfort and the feel of being home faraway - plus, staying in an aesthetically and architecturally unique space.  Additionally, the neighborhood was ideal - plenty to see, do and eat and all by walking. And hosts who care. Lovely!We booked Mati and Ceci’s place a day before arrival and they were in contact with us continuously to make sure they were available for when we arrived. The location is great as we took the express bus from the airport to Plaza de Cibeles and it was an easy walk to the their place. They greeted us when we arrived and showed us around the place and explained everything to us. The apartment is very clean and very modern - they renovated the place very well. The location is in walking distance to all the tourist attractions. Many shops and restaurants are in the area as well. We contacted Mati and Ceci for recommendation for dinner and their recommendations were right on. I would definitely recommend this place to any couples looking for a place to stay in Madrid.Mati was such a great host, we had a fantastic stay in this apartment. 

Mati was really flexible and communication was always instant. The location is very good, walking distance from everything.

The apartment was super clean and really cozy.

Definitely a place you should check out if you re here for a short stay.Mati fue super amable con nosotros desde el momento de la reserva hasta la despedida! Excelente ático tal cual se describe, impecable limpieza. Muy recomendable para visitar el centro de MadridGreat designed apartment in a very nice neighborhood!Todo ha sido perfecto, tal y como se describe en el anuncio. Respuesta muy rápida y muy atentosIncredible apartment, right in the middle of Madrid! A must that I'm already looking forward to visit again...Stylish loft apartment in a brilliant location.  Immaculate and very well appointed. Mati the host was excellent- very helpful. Está a pasos de muy buenos restaurantes y zona de compras. 
El departamento muy buen puesto, limpio y con todo lo necesario. Como nada es perfecto y como es un ático en algunos sitios hay que cuidarse para no golpearse. 
Gracias chicos si volvemos por Madrid nos comunicamos.The space was unlike any other Airbnb I have stayed in. The design was very modern and stylish. Best part about this space was it's location, it was near all the major museums, stores, and subways. Would recommend!Muy recomendableThis place was great for what we needed.  They had laundry in the building. And Matt and Ceci waited for us in the place even though our flight was delayed by 2 hours.  There was some confusion with a new automated system they are trying to use. But they were very accommodating. The place is very centrally located and a great place if you are sleeping and heading out. It’s a beautiful use of space and well designed. However the ceilings are much lower than expected and you can only stand fully upright in about 20 percent or less of the house.  If you are tall I would avoid this place.  We both wacked our heads on the ceiling a few times.Great place. Great hosts. Great location. Would stay again even in Madrid.Mati & Cesi’s apartment is beautifully decorated, spotlessly clean, and has everything that you could possibly need.

I know Madrid well, and for this reason chose the most central neighbourhood that I could. The hosts did everything that they possibly could to accommodate my needs and make me comfortable, and I would not hesitate to stay here again next time I’m in Madrid. I just hope that the apartment is available!thanks for everything. REally good hostsDie Unterkunft war wirklich sehr sauber und liegt sehr zentral (wenige Gehminuten zur Gran Via). Our hosts were great at communicating with us and making it a pleasant experience. The flat has everything you need and it’s very modern with stylish touches.  I highly recommend!Muy bien situado. Un poco incómodo para personas altas por los techos.The hosts are very helpful, location is great, the design/decoration of the place is nice/modern and clean-  however the space is not very practical for a long stay or if you are over 1.80m/5'11 - as the ceiling is quite low and there is only very narrow part of the house where you can actually walk uprightGreat place to stay in Madrid - clean and sophisticated.Very cosy apartment situated in a nice neighborhood.  Bars, nice restaurants at only a few minutes walking distance. Very close to the  city center with all it's touristic attractions.Extremely clean. Wonderful location.
Highly recommend.Interesting space and great neighborhood. I spent a week there on a work trip to Madrid and easily walked everywhere. Mati quickly fixed a few very minor issues. The rough-hewn beams are very cool to look at, a bit hard on the head if you forget about them. Next time I'll bring my bike helmet!Alojamiento increíble, buena atención y muy amables...
Recomendable al 100%!I support all the good things that have been said by the other guests. Everything was perfect and I had a great week at this amazing place. The flat has an excellent location, right in the center of Chueca. Once inside the flat, it was completely quiet.  It was a nice chill oasis after a long day of enjoying Madrid.Great location !This is a great place to stay while in Madrid, stylish apartment, so easy to get about and lots of places to eat and drink.A pleasant and comfortable place, excellent locationGreat location. Secure place.Mati and Ceci’s place is quite unique and very stylish.  They are first class hosts and were very helpful.  The apartment is conveniently located for everything you would like to see or do in the city.  The only slight criticism would be that although the floor space is adequate, head height is restricted in parts of each room.A very beutiful and nice place!!Excelente ubicación y bien equipado. Apropiado para jóvenes aventurerosAll I can say is very clean, very centrally located in a great area.  Very prompt and helpful hosts. Thoroughly enjoyed my stay here and would definitely stay again and recommend  it. If you are a very tall person I’d say it maybe be difficult for you however the description does mention that specifically. 
Definitely a great experience all round.Really enjoyed my stay here!  Similar to everyone else’s feedback: great location, very unique/cool space, excellent communication and an enjoyable stay!The apartment is super located, super clean and modern ;) I would recommend it to everyone !! Mati &Ceci are very welcoming and super nice !!
Loved to stay there and I’ll do it again ;))great location and value, 100% recommendWe enjoyed our stay here. The location is amazing! And it’s so easy to get here from the airport.Muy buena situacion y limpieza impecableIf it’s available, book it!  It was a great space in a great location. The space is best for those under 6’, which is noted in the listing. Other than that, it’s such a fantastic retreat from the bustling city!This appartment is located in the middle of the Chueca district surrounded by great restaurants d bars. The place is really stylish and we totally loved it. If you’re very tall, however, it’s possible that this place is not for you :-)El apartamento esta en una Zona perfecta!! Es un ático entonces tiene el techo caído .. pero te acostumbras  .. el apartamento en si es perfecto :)Great apartment in a great location.  The space is certainly unique, so be prepared as headroom is a bit tight in some places.  Very clean, and really good communication with the hosts.The place is in a fantastic location.  You can't ask for a better place to stay. We traveled easily from the airport to the flat.  You are in close proximity to the metro and buses, but honestly, it's so close to everything we barely used transportation.  We walked everywhere.  The place comes complete with an elevator, air-conditioning, dishwasher, and wash machine (it's not often you get ALL of those in one place!).  It's very close to several markets (aka grocery stores) but also lots of restaurants and shops.  The only drawback is the low ceilings.  I'm 5'6" and my husband is 6' and we did bang our heads several times on the ceiling beams.  Just something to take into consideration if you are tall or have difficulty bending down.The place is just as advertised and described by others: spotlessly clean, new & modern, fabulous location, nice architectural lighting.

comments: Ich war beim Yoga Workshop direkt in der Nähe und das war perfekt. Nuria hat vor meiner Ankunft noch  mich informiert dass jetzt kalt geworden ist , dass ich warme Sachen brauche. comments:
Una hogar muy acogedor, con preciosas vistas. Y una licalizacion muy buena. Tuvimos la gran suerte de ser los primeros clientes y eso es todo un orgullo. Juan Carlos nos explico todo muy bien y es Una casa acogedora, limpia, amplia, céntrica y con unas vistas increíbles de Madrid.  En los alrededores hay dos aparcamientos públicos por lo que te puedes olvidar del coche y además la parada de metro está a 5 minutos de la casa. Juan Carlos estuvo disponible y atento en todo momento, fue un gran ANFITRIÓN. Recomendamos la casa a cualquiera que quiera pasar unos días en la capital, tanto con amigos como con familia. No podemos decir nada negativo porque no lo hubo. Our stay in Juan Carlos' flat has been great. This flat is completely prepared to have a nice stay in the center of Madrid. Location is so good, lots of close restaurants, underground stops and good nearby neighbourdhoods such us "Chueca" or "Malasaña".
The flat was so clean and tidy, it's so cossy and quiet! We could sleep properly as the beds are so comfortable. The sight from main's room is amazing, you can see the skyline.
Juan Carlos was so nice and easygoing from the beginning, and he really took care of us to have a good experience there. Perfect host!
I seriously recommend this flat, i would come back again.

/////////////////////////////
 La estancia en el piso de Juan Carlos ha sido perfecta. El piso tiene todo lo que necesitas para tener una estancia inmejorable. A destacar la limpieza y lo ordenado que estaba. Está cerca de todo lo que necesitas, metro, restaurantes, barrios importantes...
Las vistas desde la habitación principal son muy buenas.
Juan Carlos fue muy atento desde el principio y fue muy fácil la comunicación. Sepre estaba disponible para cualquier duda.
Lo recomiendo!!!!! Volvería otra vez.Apartamento acogedor y muy bien situado!! 
Todo muy bien organizado por Juan Carlos!!
Gracias!
Todo correcto, tal y como indica la descripción del piso, mejorable la hora de entrada a la  casa, por lo demás , nada que decir. Muy buena comunicación y trato

comments:
Très bel appartement tout à fait conforme aux photos. Il est très bien équipé (machine à laver, sèche cheveux, four, micro-onde, linge propre,...) L'emplacement est idéal - rue calme - et se situe à 7 min à pied de la plaza de mayor et à 2 min de l'arrêt de métro "Tierso de Molino". Le seul bémol c'est l'isolation, le soir on entend absolument tous les bruits de l'extérieur. Muy bien situada en el barrio de las letras. El equipamiento muy completo. El precio inmejorable.We spent two nights in this apartment and we had a great time. Everything works well, it is clean and there is everything you need for your stay. 
We really recommend this place. Next time we are going to Madrid we will check availability for this place. Great location and easy check-in and checkout. As a whole superb and excellent apartment, truly at a heart of Madrid. Value for money.All in all, the location was amazing and check in and out was easy.

-AC was amazing
-balcony was nice
-washer was great!
-nice decorations
-two sinks was great!
-great communication 

Cons:
-very noisy over the weekend; we could hear everything outsideSix Rooms's place was very clean and high quality! Apartment is spacious, bed confy. Shower could use a bit of cleaning and repair but otherwise good.

Muy céntrico y bien comunicado.Ubicación inmejorablemuy buena y exelente la ubicación recomendadaGreat location, modern and clean but bit noisy.Piso con muy buenas condiciones a 100 metros del metro Tirso de Molina.

Uno de los sofás cama no es muy cómodo, sin embargo, la cama y el sofá cama están muy bien.

Utensilios muy buenos y buenas instalaciones.Very good, clean and comfortable!Great place to stay. Very centrally located with many places to eat and shops, theatre, clubs,, metro near by. Loved all the amenities and the easy check-in and check-out.  Beautiful decor. Open kitchen with all kitchen utensils. Large TV. Plenty of storage. Sexy bedroom decor with red lamps. A bit noisy at night since it's in the center of the city but I use ear plugs to sleep.Everything was a great, it was in center, we dont use metro
everything was clean... super cool,i recommend
The most important chek in and out its so easyVery friendly and the location was perfect, access to everything and o was able to leave my suitcase and come back for it. Kept contact until I arrived to the apartment. Also very clean and everything that’s needed was provided. Would definitely choose them again if I were to stay in Madrid in the futureGreat location and awesome place!the hospitality here is unparalleled. awsome location too. inthe heart of Madrid by Plaza del Sol. great host who wants to make you comfo4atablr and welcomedSúper accueil et magnifique appartement. Merci pour toutLa experiencia ha sido genial.
Perfecto para comidas / cenas de empresa ya que Justo al final de la calle encontrareis Medias Puri, una discoteca muy conocida de Madrid donde podréis acabar la noche.

Respecto a la amabilidad de nuestro anfitrión un 10. Una lástima que nos comentara que hoy era su último día!
Porque estoy seguro de que habrá atendido así de bien a cientos de huéspedes. Sin duda tardaréis en encontrar a alguien mejor!!

Limpieza Genial. Ubicación perfecta
Comodidad aceptable para un apartamento de este estilo.

Por lo que, podría decir que un 9,2 
La única pega que le vi, es que las fotos no están actualizadas.Creo que la habitación es muy bien y cómoda.Excelente ubicación,  muy bien equipado, harta luz natural y excelente ventilación. Exactamente igual a lo que se ve en la fotografía.  Excelente atención y disposición del personal en oficina. Nos vamos felices.
Muchas gracias !!This was a really nice place, the location was amazing.Apartamento muy chulo en el centro de Madrid. Muy bien comunicadoExcelente ubicación y atención rápida y precisa.excelente ubicacionExcelente departamento, la ubicación es inmejorable! Nosotros estuvimos el año pasado y volveríamos encantados.You can’t pick a better location than this. Apartment looks a bit nicer in the photos than it does in real life, but that probably wouldn’t deter me from staying there again. Would be tough to fit 5 people there. Weird smell in the hallway (not in the actual room). The shower didn’t drain very well. All in all, great location, great value. I’d stay againExcelente ubicacion y muy buena atencion del equipo de Six Rooms. Muy recomendable para familias.Muy bueno ,contento en todos los aspectos.un 10Muy bien ubicado, comodo y amplio para pasar unos lindos dias en MadridGreat place. La persona que nos recibió fue sumamente amable y atenta a escuchar nuestras sugerencias o comentarios.

comments:
The apartment is nice and comfortable and very close to the important musea. It was a shame that the swimming pool was closed.¡He tenido una estancia estupenda! La casa está justo enfrente del museo del Prado y al lado de todos los sitios que a uno le interesan cuando va a Madrid a hacer turismo. La casa súper agradable y todo muy nuevo. Mucha luz y comodidad. Y para rematar: el poder darte un baño en la piscina al volver de recorrer la ciudad. ¡Repetiré!Ximena is an amazing host, very helpful, very welcoming and great communication at all times.

Loved our stay, the apartment was big enough for 2 people, had the necessities in the apartment for a comfortable stay. Restaurants, transport and nightlife/bars close by and the apartment itself was peaceful.

Enjoyed our stay. Thank you.Appartement correspondant à la description. Idéalement situé. Confortable. Hôte toujours dispo pour les échanges. Je recommande. Easy communication and check-in. The apartment and the rooftop pool are amazing to spend relaxing days in Madrid. The location is great, in the center of Madrid, opposite the Museo del Prado and near some very nice restaurants.Everything was really great! Thanks to Ximena and her colleagues. They were very helpful and accommodating. Muy céntrico y cómodo. Piso tal cual las fotos. Muy bonito y cuidado. Una pena que haya tanto ruido fuera y que no se pueda aprovechar mucho la terraza pero a cambio tienes acceso a una piscina que en los días calurosos viene genial con unas bonitas vistas de la ciudad! 
Lo único que diría que es un poco incómodo es tener que recoger las llaves en otra dirección (hay posibilidad de recogerlo en el mismo piso si pagas un extra!)

This is a fantastically located apartment that is perfect for 2 people or a solo traveller like me. The neighbourhood is full of great bars, restaurants, tapas places and there's always something going on. Despite that the apartment isn't noisy and being quite high up means good views both from the apartment (where you can see across to the Prado & the leafy street from the balcony) with the Botanical gardens and Retiro park also just over the road. A short walk to museums, markets shops etc. Perfect location! The place itself has everything you need and is really well designed. Light, airy, comfortable and felt like home really quickly. It feels like a holiday apartment rather than a home but done to a high spec & welcoming. I would definitely stay here again.The unit is every bit as it looks in the pics, and is very comfortable for two people.  It was well fitted out with mostly new stuff.  The location can't be beaten - 10 minutes walk from the train station and 10 - 15 from the centre of the city.  It's easy walking distance from 3 great Museums [Thyssen, Reina Sophia and of course the Prado].  It's so convenient for the Prado that we got our tickets stamped and came home for lunch before starting again in the afternoon.  We had a problem with the wifi and it was fixed very quickly, which we appreciated.  Recommended, especially if you want to see the galleries.EverythingBright, open and well appointed.  With easy access to public transportation,  it is easy to get around.  Take advantage of the nicely equipped kitchen.  If you use “Yelp”,  you may quickly find bakeries, grocery stores and wine shop that are close by.100% recommend you stay here! Modern, stylish, and clean apartment close to everything. Plenty of restaurants/bars and close to attractions. Ximena always responded quickly, and check-in and check-out were very easy. We had a great and comfortable stay!great location, walking distance to many attractions, markets and restaurantsTodo perfecto salvo problemas con el aguan caliente, tardaba en exceso en calentar y aunque lo ponía en la descripción, 20€ por un retraso de una hora es excesivo.
RecomendableGreat location and place, would come back again.Unbeaten locationOverall a great experience in Madrid! Apartment was a perfect location within walking distance of everywhere we wanted to visit.  The apartment was as expected and looked the same as the images we saw when we booked which was great.  The communal areas weren't as nice as we had hoped and are in need of renovation (obviously this has nothing to do with our host!).  Not exactly a great view of the Prado museum as from the balcony you can mainly see the street and lots of trees.  Would recommend for a reasonably priced apartment in a great location :)Great location, clean, comfortable bed and good facilities.  Ximena was very responsive, and allowed me a late check-out to fit with my flight without any fuss.Ximena's place is exactly like shown in pictures. A modern, stylish studio right in front of El Prado museum (but note the museum is not really visible due to the tall trees in between). Location is great, at a residential area at walking distance from the city centre.

Unfortunately, Ximena tried to charge an extra check-in fee, and I had to resort to Airbnb support team to sort the situation.
