comments:
I was visiting Madrid to attend a 3-day event. During my whole stay I felt like home. Nicole and Alex gave me a very warm welcome, and they’re very kind and thoughtful people. They also gave me some tips for public transport connections.
The place is super cosy and very clean too, I honestly can’t find any possible remarks or suggestions for improvement.
Location-wise, neighbourhood has everything you need, pharmacy, supermarket, park, and public transport. If coming with your car, finding a spot to park for free is easy.
They have two great pets, a dog and a cat, they’re super fun and playful.Nicole received my reservation just 2 days ago. But, she was so quick response, very helpful for transportation, where to visit and willing to spend time for a nice conversation with me. (I went to the place where she recommended to see the Madrid cityscape from a rooftop which was superb!!!) The room I stayed was very clean and cozy that I can take a good rest when I was sick upon my arrival. For travellers who want to visit city centre frequently, I suggest to buy ‘tourists ticket’ in order to cover the Renfe cost without limitation as Nicole’s flat is just next to Renfe station. Recommended to traveler who love away from busy area. Thank you your hospitality ;)Genial la estancia con NicolePerfect! Great hospitality from our super host Nicole, strategic location (really near to Renfe's station, 10 minutes from the (Website hidden by Airbnb) excellent solution to visit and enjoy Madrid in a warm, welcoming atmosphere.Pasamos dos noches en la casa de Nicole, la casa es muy cómoda y limpia y muy cerca de la estación RENFE. El sofá cama es muy cómoda.
No se escucha ruidos de afuera pero si se escucha los vecinos y la puerta de la entrada del edificio por la noche.Fue un recibimiento muy bueno y el hogar era muy bonito,Alex nos ayudo en todo,siempre estaba en contacto con nosotros a pesar de que trabaja mucho,nunca nos falto atencion. Los animales domesticos muy amorosos y sentimos tan comodo como en nuestra propia casa !

comments:
Ana´s appartment is very well placed if your travelling to Madrid by train (very close to Atocha station) or even by car. The appartment is perfect for a family witth 2 children. You can easily walk to the main attractions or use public bus or underground stations nearby. Ana is very helpful and the whole procedure was easy with her.Increible! Totalmente recomendable, Ana es una finisima persona, nos recibio, respondio a todas nuestras preguntas y estuvo al tanto de nosotros, es una persona muy amable y facil de tratar.

El departamento esta excelentemente ubicado, el retiro a una cuadra y un supermercado a 50 metros, el bus y el metro tambien cerca. Limpio y comodo. No queja alguna.

Si quieres pasarla bien y comodo en Madrid esta es la mejor opcion. 

Incredible! 100% recommendable, Ana is the finest person ever, she welcomed us at the appartmen, she answer all our questions and she was on contact wiht us while our stay on Madrid, she is a easygoing and very nice person.

The appartment is very well located, El retiro one block away, a supermarket 50 meters, bus and subway near by.

Clean and cozy. No complains at all

If you want to have a good time in Madrid this is the option!Very nice apartment in quiet residential neighborhood very close to the museums, El Retiro, and El Centro.  Hostess very accommodating.  We were a party of four and the apartment was very comfortable.Primero quiero saludar y dar las gracias a Ana por su hospitalidad e inmejorable trato. Un lugar perfecto para una estancia corta o larga en Madrid. Tiene todas las comodidades que te puedas imaginar(aire acondicionado,internet, pequeña biblioteca...) Tanto para familias como para grupo de amigos. Economico, agradable, bien situado, tranquilo, edificio con porteria,un mercadona enfrente, una casera majisima... Una pasada, con diferenia el mejor sitio en el que he estado por internet.Definitivamente volvería a este departamento. Estuvimos entre el 10 y el 21 de julio de (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) El departamento está pegado al Parque del Retiro, en un lugar hermoso de Madrid, muy pero muy cerca de Atocha que es la estación de trenes central de España. El lugar tiene una cocina bastante completa, un living super amplio, una hermosa biblioteca (yo aproveché para leer “La Metamorfosis”), dos habitaciones, un baño muy cómodo. Ana es un amor de persona, conocedora de su ciudad y dispuesta a compartir sus conocimientos. Cuando llegamos fuimos recibidos por Ana con gaseosa, jugo de naranja y leche en la heladera. Pasan cerca dos líneas de metro y varias de buses. El departamento es tal cual se ve en las fotografías, es un décimo piso para nada ruidoso. Reitero, si volviera a Madrid, volvería a este lugar.
Beware of English part: was translated with (Hidden by Airbnb) translator.
Definitely return to this apartment. Were between 10 and 21 July (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) The department is attached to the Retiro Park in Madrid a beautiful place, very, very close to Atocha train station is the center of Spain. The place has a fairly complete kitchen, a living super wide, a beautiful library (I took the opportunity to read "The Metamorphosis"), two bedrooms, bathroom very comfortable. Ana is a love of people, aware of their city and willing to share their knowledge. When we arrived we were greeted by Ana with soda, orange juice and milk in the fridge. They spend about two subway lines and several bus. The department is as it looks in the pictures, is the tenth floor at all noisy. I reiterate, if Madrid were to return to this place.
Great location, right to the Retiro park, which is a real  wonder.  It is some 15 minutes walking and you are  at Prado, and in the city center. Very close is a good supermarket, so to say, all that is necessary is just all around.Ana is more than a wonderful personality. Very helpful, nice and very kindly treating. The flat is perfect, there were 3 of us, and had great comfort, nice bedrooms, very luminous flat, everything was just perfect about the flat, and Ana. I would recommend it to everyone for sure. And if I am once back to Madrid, will 100 % choose Ana's flat again. I was in a rush to find an apartment for weekend. I was saved by Ana's reply. Just right in time. Her flat in just in center of Madrid. You can just walk to Retiro, Puerta del Sol any others. Enough for 5 people and located next to a supermarket. Thank you Ana. El apartamento estaba impecable. Está en buena zona y es limpio, acogedor y de fácil acceso a tranporte público.

Ana, ¡muchas gracias por tu amabilidad y disposición!



La estancia estuvo genial. Llegamos pasadas las 11 de la noche y Ana nos esperó sin problemas. Cuando llegamos, Ana, con una atención muy amable, nos dio algunos consejos para movernos y unos planos de la ciudad y el metro. Viajamos mis suegros, mi mujer, mi hijo (de 2 años) y yo. Era víspera de festivo y Ana, sin pedírselo, nos había preparado cosas para nuestro desayuno del día siguiente.
El piso está muy bien, y que esté al lado del Retiro es un lujo que nos permitió empezar los días respirando aire fresco y disfrutando de su encanto.
Gracias AnaThe house is very confortable, and the location is also good, just walking distance to Prado museum, and 4 stations to SOL Square by metro. Ana is a perfect host. The house was very clean she also bought cruassants and fruit juice for our first brekfast.Our little family  (my husband and I , and our 2 year old daughter) had a great stay at Ana's place. The location is perfect, right next to Retiro Parc and walking distance from the big museums. The apartment is good, although the kitchen is quite small if you like to cook your own meals. The internet was slow e.g. for (Hidden by Airbnb) phone calls. But overall we loved our stay in Ana's place, have good memories of our week in Madrid, and would recommend this appartment to others! Thanks Ana!We had a wonderful stay in this apartment. It's in a fairly quiet neighborhood with a supermarket, a produce market, and restaurants, plus it's very close to Retiro Park. Ana was quite helpful. There was a general strike the day we left and she gave my girlfriend and I a ride to the airport! The apartment is really nice. Good location and perfect service! I would like to recomend this apartment for all people how wants to visit Madrid. Ana is really nice and polite persone.We had a wonderful time at Ana's place. She is very kind and helpful, a true host. The location was absolutely perfect, right next to Retiro (Madrid's flagship, breathtaking park). We walked through the park every day going to and from the city (a 25-30 min walk to Plaza Mayor, Sol), quite enjoyable way to start and finish the day. If you enjoy running, the park is excellent for a morning jog.
The apartment is big enough for a family of 5, we had a 2 month old baby and we had no issues at all -thanks to elevators. There are tons of books (in spanish), so my family enjoyed unwinding while reading each day.   We would definitely come back to Ana's place. MI estancia en casa de Ana fue muy placentera ya que esta en una muy buena ubicación tanto para hacer turismo como para trabajo, cuneta con 2 estaciones de metro que esta a menos de 8 minutos y una supermercado bien surtido y con precios adecuados a menos de 2 min, en cuanto a la casa mi estancia fue durante el invierno y la verdad estaba muy a gusto con la calefacción, cuenta con todo lo necesario tanto  para estancias corta o larga como fue mi caso, en cuanto a la hospitalidad de Ana y su atención es excelente siempre atenta a ayudarte en cualquier momento. Gracias Ana The apartment in general is nice.  The location is very good being so close to El Retiro Park, supermarket, and public transport.  It is warm in winter, and it has pretty much all one needs.  It is on a tenth floor with good views of the Moratalaz neighborhood from the bedrooms.  Ana is a warm and approachable person.   When we entered the wi-fi did not work well and Ana promptly contracted more.

The negatives are 1) that the noise from neighbors woke us up at seven ish everyday.  2) The doorman or "portero" is extremely rude.  He was quite rude and unhelpful from the beginning.  He lives with his family above the apartment so, one day when I inquired about all the noise so early in the morning, they became extremely defensive, yelling and blaming other neighbors.  He even yelled out that I was bothering him.   An unbelievable and quite uncomfortable situation.



We enjoyed the location and apartment quietness very much. The place is very close to Park Retiro which is great to walk after a long flight, especially if you have small kids who need to move.

There are many books in the apartment which show Ana's interests in art and literature. The kitchen is well equipped. Beds are comfortable. The internet connection worked great. 

Most importantly Ana was very helpful. And we appreciate the stay in Madrid she provided very much. The flamenco, bullfighting, Prado museum, tour of Royal palace, walk to all major squares and monuments of Madrid, trip to Toledo - were all possible in four nights because of Ana's apartment location.  Ana a été très aimable et nous a fourni des informations précieuses pour nous orienter rapidement dans Madrid. L'appartement était propre et fonctionnel.Great place right near the park. It's an easy walk through the beautiful park right into the center of the city. Ana was a great host. She waited outside the building until I arrived and was available for any questions. Merci à Ana. Nous sommes restés cinq jours à Madrid dans cet appartement et ça a été un très agréable séjour en famille. L'appartement lumineux et très confortable. Idéalement situé puisque juste à côté du parc de Retiro, un endroit très agréable et excellant pour se promener avec enfants.
Thanks to Ana, a very kind host. The flat is cozy and comfortable as well. The location is excellent near the Retiro park. We have really enjoyed our stay in Madrid! 
Appartement bien aménagé, dont les pièces sont bien réparties, confortable, bien chauffé en hiver. Atmosphère très agréable. 10 e étage. Lumineux. A 3 minutes à pieds du parc du Retiro. A 10 mn du métro. A 2 minutes aussi un supermarché.Nos gustó mucho nuestra experiencia en el apartamento de Ana. Ella muy amable nos entrego todo muy ordenado y limpio. Buena ubicación y el portero muy amable y servicial.
Ana is really nice. House was real clean. Everything was good. We really enjoyed our stay at Ana's place and would definitely recommend it.  The wifi was challenging but Ana did come and fix it.   She is a very pleasant person and the apartment is an excellent location to explore old town.   We started our days with a great walk through the park and fifteen minutes later we were in Old Madrid.    Thanks Ana.Un apartamento muy comodo, tranquilo, con vistas y bien ventilado, a los que no nos gusta el olor a tabaco! Muy bien situado, muy recomendable y Ana de gran ayuda.We had a very nice stay at Ana's apartment. Were in town for the half marathon and the location could not have been better. Good size place for four people. Grocery store nearby was also a plus. Check in and check out could not have been easier or smoother. Apartment has everything you would need with a nice little kitchen. I would recommend this apartment and host to anyone. Thanks Ana! We had a really good time in Ana's apartment, its a perfect place to be with children. The rooms and amenities are very well suited, the location is ideal (Retiro, public transport, excellent supermarket really 2 mins). Ana's is very friendly and helpful, so if you look for a good place to be felt welcome, I can absolutely recommend itTodo correcto. El piso es tal y como se ve en las fotos, está en la zona que dice estar y tiene todas las características que dice tener. Ana como anfitriona más que correcta, siempre dispuesta a ofrecernos facilidades para mejorar nuestra estancia pese a q no necesitamos mucho de ella ni la requerimos mucho siempre estuvo en contacto. Quedamos encantados tanto con el piso que correspondió a nuestras expectativas como con el anfitrión.Très bel appartement dans un quartier commerçant, proche de 3 stations de métro à 7 minutes à pieds. Tout près du Retiro, qu'il suffit de traverser pour arriver au coeur de Madrid. Supermarché en bas de l'immeuble. Ana est une hôte sympathique, chaleureuse et disponible.Nous recommandons cette location.Zona tranquila bien comunicada y al lado del retiro. Ideal para medias o largas estancias. Piso acogedor y muy limpio. Cocina perfectamente equipada y camas muy comfortables. Our hostess was very gracious and stopped by to meet us and explain everything about the neighborhood.   The apt was very nice, comfortable and homey.  It is located in a quiet safe neighborhood.  We totally enjoyed our stay!Muy buena experiencia con el apartamento escogido. Acceso fácil por bus, por metro o caminar a través del parque del Retiro una delicia. Supermercado al frente, zona de parqueo público, para caminar a distancias adecuadas hacia Atocha, museo del Prado, museo reina Sofía. El sitio confortable, ambiente cálido, una biblioteca para quedarse leyendo,cocina equipada, lavadora, camas confortables, buena agua. En un piso 10, servicio internet por wi-fi  un poco lento pero adecuado. el anfitrión accesible, disponible, ayudó con las inquietudes. Lo volvería a tomar en un próximo viaje a Madrid.Spacious clean nice bAth. Walk to retiro park in two minutes.  The metro stations are a bit further and downhill. Wifi could not handle skyoe or graphics.  Quiet. Lots of taxis. High up in building but 2 elevators.Ana was really helpful and explained lots of stuff to us. She also had a lot of info in the apartment that we made use of. Ana met us at the door and there were no problems at all.

The apartment is very very close to the beautiful La Retiro Park which for me (a keen runner) was perfect. A two minute walk and I was in the park. The circuit is 5km but you can stretch that out by using the inside paths. Very beautiful.

We found the area quite quiet and it's around 2 km from downtown Madrid where all the nightlife / restaurants and bars are. That wasn't a problem for us.

Accommodation was clean and tidy but could use a facelift. Perfectly functional though.We enjoyed Ana's apartment a lot. It centrally located and close to everything.  In the apartment there are everything one would need for a good rest.Ana's place is very nice. The flat is very well-furnished. Good location. I highly recommend.Todo muy bien. El apartamento es tal cual lo describe Ana, y ella nos atendió estupendamente.Ana welcomed us warmly in the flat and helped with all essential information about neighborhood, property and places of interest in Madrid.

The flat itself is very cosy, clean and comfortable with nice tiny kitchen equiped with microwave and regular ovens.

The flat located next to Retiro park and it takes around 15-20 minutes of walk through the park to Prado museumAna fue muy amable. Nos estaba esperando en el piso y nos enseñó todo: habitaciones, lavabo, etc... Nos dejó un par de llaves y nos dejó libertad los casi 3 días que estuvimos.

El piso está en buenas condiciones y es muy agradable y en buena zona. Está a 10 minutos andando del metro y al lado del retiro.The apartment is bathed in light and fulfilled my needs perfectly.  It is located a five-minute walk away from the SE corner of Retiro Park through which one can have a pleasant 20-30 minute stroll to all of Madrid's main museums and entertainment areas.  The apartment is very quiet and thus allows for one to be able to both sleep and get work done.  Ana is very welcoming and showed me the apartment features and the location of the  nearest necessitites of life, e.g. Metro stations and grocery.  It is a very good apartment for people who want a bit of respite from the hectic bustle of Madrid life.Ana was a great host! The apartment is really nice and well located. 100% recomendedAna was a very great host. The apartment was clean and in a great location right next to El Retiro park. Perfect place for a weekend in Madrid. Was very satisfied with my stay!Muy amable Ana en todo momento. Nos esperó a nuestra llegada y se ofreció para cualquier cosa que necesitáramos. El departamento es muy cómodo, luminoso y silencioso. Excelente ubicación. Gracias Ana por todo!Pasamos un fin de semana muy tranquilos disfrutando de la cercanía del piso al parque del Retiro y al centro de Madrid.
El piso tal y como se ha descrito en la página, todo muy limpio, silencioso y muy luminoso, ideal para 4 personas.
Aunque no conocimos a Ana personalmente, ella se interesó en todo momento para que no nos faltara de nada y estuviéramos cómodos.
Para repetir.
RobertoLa casa estaba limpia y luminosa ,tal vez hacia un poco de calor .Hacía calor en Madrid en esos días y las casa está en el último piso . Los dormitorios  bien (eché de menos una luz para la lectura en una de los dos dormitorios). El cuarto de baño espacioso y con  abundante  agua caliente.   La ubicación no podría ser mejor .  La cercanía de El Retiro es impagable así como los dos supermercados  y la estación de metro . Tranquila y sin ruidos .Ana es muy  amable y servicial ; cuando surgió un pequeño contratiempo con  el wifi lo solucionó  sin demora . Recomendaría la casa sin reparos. Es perfecta para estancias cortas en Madrid. 
Para los que vienen con niños, el bloque  cuenta con un amplio y resguardado jardín interior  que los niños pueden usar por las tardes. Es un buen desahogo. Todo perfecto en casa de Ana, la ubicación excelente y ella fue muy amable en darme recomendaciones y custodiar mi maleta mientras daba una vuelta hasta que sea la hora del checkin. Mi única observación es la conexión a internet... poco ancho de banda si es que uno quiere hacer llamadas o revisar mapas online. Fuera de eso el departamento de Ana es recomendable totalmente. Would come back for sure!Buena experiencia y trato. El piso es lo ideal si necesitas estancia unos días en el centro de Madrid. El hecho de que tenga aire acondicionado en el salón y en las habitaciones nos ha dado la vida... Sin ellos habría sido insoportable aguantar el calor.We stayed at Ana's house for 3 months and loved it.  It is very centric, in a safe, quiet neighborhood and has 2 supermarkets, a fresh produce store and 2 pharmacies within a 2 block radius.  The best supermarket is actually only half a block, so shopping for food is painless.
It is 1 block away from a plaza that has a BUNCH of bus stops which is really handy and you can get anywhere easily starting there.  There are also 2 metro stations in opposing directions, about 7 mins away.  It is relatively close to the main train station (Atocha) which makes traveling easy too.

The house itself is cozy and comfortable.  It has air conditioning in every room, although we only used it during the hottest days, as the nights were quite cool with the windows open.  At first glance the kitchen seems tiny, but it is really very functional.   We cooked all our meals and managed very well.  She has a well equipped kitchen despite its size.  The kitchen includes the washing machine.   The clothes line for drying is out the bedroom windows.  Madrid is so dry, the clothes dry SUPER quickly.  

Ana was really helpful during our stay.  She brought us plenty of fresh sheets and towels when we got there.  She came over and helped sort out a loose connection with the tv antenna, and got the dvd player running.   She was also available by telephone or (Hidden by Airbnb) to answer any questions.   

If you have small children be aware:  the windows slide open very wide, very easily.  We took window stops to limit how much the window could slide open.  I highly recommend bringing your own (non permanent) childproofing.  We also took cabinet locks to keep the kid from opening the doors  to the cupboard under the sink which are full of cleaning supplies.

If you have kids, there are several small neighborhood parks very nearby.  There is also a carousel one block down!  But the best part is that you are right across the street from a gigantic LOVELY park called El Retiro, complete with duck ponds, rose garden and museums.  Retiro also has several children's play areas within the park.

This is an automated posting.저는 Charo의 집에서 열흘 동안 행복한 시간을 보냈어요. 어디든 걸어서 갈 수 있는 곳에 위치한 Charo의 집은, 마드리드를 즐기기에 훌륭한 장소예요. 그리고, 나의 집처럼 혹은 친구의 집처럼, 따뜻하고 편안하고 익숙한 공간이예요. 플러스, Charo는 친절하고  능숙한 호스트 입니다. 저는 그녀와 그녀의 친구에게 많은 도움을 받았어요.Excelente ubicaciónPosto centralissimo, sicuro e ben fornito. Tutti i comfort per una famiglia e bimba al seguito.Emplacement idéal et conforme au descriptif. Le canapé lit doit plutôt être réservé à des enfants que des adultes car il n'est pas du tout confortable. Sinon tout est très bien, très bon rapport qualité-prix.Ótima localização, fizemos quase tudo à pé. Charo foi muito atenciosa e permitiu que fizéssemos o check in mais cedo. O apartamento é bom, embora precise renovar algumas coisas.Charo’s place is just perfect if you are visiting the city for a couple of days. Even though you are in the noisy and vibrant heart of the city, the apartment is very quiet and you get a very good night sleep. You hardly ever need to take the subway, because every important city objective is at a walking distance. Totally recommend it, thank you for excellent communication as well!Hospitality: Charo is a wonderful host! Very polite and friendly! She made our arrival very easy, we couldn't provide a specific time of arrival as we both were flying from different places but we kept communicating on that day and she waited for us until we arrived from the airport which  we were very grateful for as we've heard stories of people having to wait for ages until their host arrives with the keys. On arrival she took time to explain everything about the property and made herself available for any queries we may have. We had to contact her about a ceiling light which had gone and she immediately offered to replace it. She also gave us lots of great tips on trips to do and places to visit. 

Communications: Perfect! From the moment we enquired about the booking right until after we had gone. I had to contact Charo a couple of weeks after we left as we realised we had left something in the apartment and she kindly got hold of her cleaner to find out if she had found it which luckily she had!

Location: Simply the best location to stay in Madrid, right in the middle of old town Madrid a few minutes walk from the Palacio Real, Opera and Sol metro, San Miguel Market and lots of lovely shops too we even walked to Prado Museum and El Retiro Park.

Facilities: The apartment is lovely but basic but that's what we were expecting. Everything was very adequate and super clean. There's air con in the bedroom which made a difference and there's also a big fan in the livingroom. The shower was powerful. Only thing I would improve is some of the kitchen utensils which need updating as well as some of the linen.

We would totally stay here again and recommend it 100%! Thank you Charo!Recibimiento y alojamiento sin objeción, todo cercano y a mano,ánimo que no lo vais a lamentar seguroExpectativas cubiertas, información  y comunicación fluidaRapport qualité/prix perfecto. El apartamento esta muy centrico, muy bien situado

Todo genial.First many thanks to Nina and her partner, they are so helpful and friendly. Everything was nice and clean all the time. Strongly recommended to anybody going to Madrid because the flat is very close to the airport, town centre, shops, restaurants and just 2 minutes walk from the metro station. Simply beautiful place and lovely hosts.I arrived on a Friday during some of the hottest weeks in Europe, expecting to find a quaint little apartment that was “cozy” as it is listed in the name. If you don’t mind going up 5 flights of stairs (no elevator!) and going up and down about 6 steep pathways to find the place, then go for it. 

I had to leave this Airbnb for two big reasons: one, there is no air conditioning in the apartment at all. What is provided is a small table top fan that turns on and off every half hour or so. “Un ventilador” (oscillating fan) is not the same as having  “Aire acondicionado” (AC). I was not able to cool down, despite closing the blinds and other measures; it was impossible to feel comfortable. Another thing: The space between the bed and the wall is maybe 5 inches, so you have to either sit on the bed or crouch over the bed to get to the other side of the room. 

Two, the bathroom is tiny and the shower flooded the first use.

Nina was not at the apartment when I arrived, but a family member came an hour after the check in time to show me around. I found this irresponsible to have someone else do this, especially since the woman didn’t know what the host did and/or provided.Great little room for two travelers! Not far from airport and MadCool festival.Nina et Zurab sont des personnes très sympathiques et disponibles.
Ils ont été de bons conseils et nous ont bien dépannés pour l'impression du billet d'avion et la réservation du taxi.
Le logement se situe dans un quartier calme à deux pas du métro.

5 of us (2 couples, 1 single) stayed for one night on a long layover out of Ibiza. Great size apartment for 5, but probably no more. Perfect location for limited time in the city. Perfect communication from the host and quiet, peaceful ambiance despite the central location. One thing to note, on check in, you'll be charged 10 euros for every hour past 7pm you check in. I think it's listed somewhere in listing, so my fault for missing it, but I thought that was a little extreme. Overall would stay again :)  Excelente ubicación y el piso muy limpio y cómodo. Very good location and nice apartment. However the host interrupted my stay a few times. Patricia was excellent! She came on time and was easy to contact at all times. She thoroughly explained everything around the apartment from the use of the appliances to the rules of the building. What we appreciated the most was how the agent supplied us with valuable information about Donostia/San Sebastian, which helped us enjoy the trip more. We especially liked their tips on driving outside of the city. Patricia also suggested some of her favourite restaurants that were delicious. It might be a good idea to have a fan in each of the rooms as it got a bit warm during the evenings. Other than that, we will certainly recommend this apartment. Rien à redire si ce n’est la taille du salon qui semble plus grand sur les photos 
Je recommande!Siamo stati a Madrid 4 giorni, la posizione della casa è perfetta. In pieno centro fra puerta del sol e plaza mayor.
La casa è come descritta, sconsiglio vivamente di selezionare il materasso ad aria aggiuntivo (come ahimè abbiamo fatto noi), non c'è assolutamente spazio a sufficienza.
Divano letto un po' piccolo.
Per passare qualche giorno a Madrid in 5/6 persone è l'ideale.La localización es ideal pero el piso deja un poco que desear. Las losas de la cocina estaban rotas y del resto de la vivienda huecas. La mesa del salón estaba rota y las pareces con falta de una mano de pintura. El wifi tampoco funcionaba muy bien. Eso sí, las camas, baños y cocina estaban limpios. La entrada podrían arreglarla un poco también. Con el dinero que cobras les de de sobra para comprar una mesa decente en ikea al menos. Se nota que va a través de agencia.El piso es una chulada! Muy limpio, ubicación excelente좋은 위치에 있는 깨끗한 숙소라 좋았습니다.The pictures of the apartment are not fitting the exact situation. I personally had higher expectations. The apartment is older now and has many small disappointing details. First, the rooms are in real smaller than on the pictures. Second, everything on the pictures is bright and shiny, however, the apartment is in the inner house, so there is no light, the windows look directly on the wall. The single room doesn't have a window and the bed is short for an adult (170 cm). The double room with the bathroom is also very dark, there is a small window near the ceiling, which also looks inside the narrow space between houses. Third, the apartment is not fresh anymore: the table is much scratched, the tiles on the floor move and some are broken, a lot of sockets do not work, there were no carpets in the living room and kitchen, the common bathroom door can't be locked, the clothes holder (we assumed it was it, but maybe we were wrong) are very strange and fall out, if you put something on them, the flowers are artificial and dusty etc. Fourth, pay attention that there is a fee for the late check-in. Our flight was late, and we arrived at 23h and paid 40 EUR more. I understand the reason (the apartment is most probably owned by the company and you need to pay after-work fee), but we were very upset the whole flight, as in other apartments you won't need to worry about that. BUT: The location is very good! And at the end, you have two bathrooms and three rooms to fit 7 people (we were 5 and it was fine). The place was also clean and the double beds were comfortable.Great place in a GREAT location! I would definitely stay there again!!Nos gusto todo. ExcepcionalApartamento muy céntrico. Todo bien, la finca es antigua (como es normal en la zona) pero el piso está totalmente reformado. Muy recomendableTrès bien ! Consigliatissimo.perfectGreat location and nice spaceBella location, molto centrale e comoda per girare a piedi il cuore di Madrid.
Check-in puntuale e molto rapido!Good base for exploring MadridGreat location, itemized additional charges.El espacio totalmente recomendable10Apartamento correcto en situación inmejorableEmplacement idéal appartement très bien Lo mejor la ubicación. Piso antiguo. Muy descontentos con el servicio de check in i check out, se retraso más de media hora i ni aviso para poder recojer maletas i ni se disculpó.Muy recomendableThis was a great location and the location is what warranted the 5 stars. The accomodations need to be updated and the apartment itself is only  3 and 1/2 stars. The  apartment is so centrally located. Just around the corner from Plaza Mayor and a couple of blocks straight down from Puerto de Sol.  From this apartment we were able to walk just about everywhere we went while in Madrid. Because of it's proximity, we even stopped in during the day for a bathroom break or more water without really going out of our way. The only time we used Metro was to go the Atocha train station and the Prado but even those are walkable, about 25 minutes away. I would stay here again for the location. 
The unit itself needs some updates (it was clean and that was not an issue!). The airconditioning is located in the main room only. We were there in summer and because there was only one unit, either the main room and front bedroom would be too cold or the master bedroom in the back would be too warm. We couldn't get a comfortable temperature in both areas. A lot of the floor tiles are either cracked or loose. This made it noisy/creaky while walking through the apartment. The showers all have hand held nozzles. The problem is the nozzle holder in the  middle bathroom was broken and hung down loose. This meant getting sprayed in the face while soaping up with two hands. The nozzle holder in the master bedroom didn't securely hold the nozzle. Whenever you turned the water off, if you forgot to hold the nozzle it would fall and hit your head.  Because the shower was very small, you sometimes bumped the water off accidentally which meant the nozzle would fall. Despite these issues, the location is fantastic and that alone makes this apartment worthwhile. We would return for the location alone. We had a great time during our stay in Madrid.Buena ubicación. Súper recomendable. Las llaves se recogen en otro lugar no muy lejos del apartamento a no ser que pagues un plus cosa que podrían incluirlo en el servicio y precio.Alles perfekt und sehr sauber! Sehr gut gelegen.Very good location! We had everything we neededGreat location. Perfect for a family vacation.Great location, Clean, loved the 3 bedrooms and 2 baths.  Fans in bedrooms would help,Apartamento correcto, buena localización.Emplacement idéal. Propre et calme.Excelente localização, boas comodidades. Raro espaço com dois banheiros.La casa é localizzata molto bene, super centrale e abbastanza tranquilla ma é abbastanza vecchia e molto buia, la piccola stanza, veramente piccola, non ha finestre del tutto. Le foto sono più belle della realtà. E' gestita da un agenzia tra l'Inghilterra e Madrid. Tra l'altro se non vuoi pagare un supplemento di 10€ devi andare prendere le chiavi nel loro ufficio.This home is in a great location. pretty central to most things you will want to see in Madrid. There is plenty of room for everyone and the place is clean and well kept.
Definitely recommend this place.ubicación muy buena!The location was great but the flat we was much smaller than we expected. Our group of 6 felt almost claustrophobic. We were not told that somebody smoked in the flat, the host tried to use excessive deodorant to fight smoke and it smelled awful. The entrance door was hidden at the back of jewelry store, the floor was dirty, two electric sockets were not working or broken. Nobody wanted to show us the apartment unless we pay extra: we chose to register in the office, but it was 5 min away and hard to find (no sign)..La casa vale soprattutto per la posizione, davvero centralissima: ad 1 minuto da Plaza Mayor e Puerta del Sol, in una strada animata piena di negozi, ristoranti, pasticcerie (Mallorquina e cioccolateria St. Gines a due passi, Museo del Jamon a 50 metri), il Palazzo Reale a 10 minuti a piedi e il Prado a 15. Adattissima per vedere tutto il centro a piedi, riuscendo anche a tornare a casa per una sosta, quindi comodissima. L'appartamento affaccia su cortile interno perciò è silenzioso, gli unici rumori possono essere le voci dei vicini. La camera più interna con bagno annesso manca un poco di areazione perché ha solo un piccolo finestrino, ma nel nostro soggiorno - a metà di un ottobre purtroppo piovoso - non abbiamo sofferto caldo. La vera pecca dell'appartamento è l'eccessiva essenzialità dell'arredo, poco curato (forse perché di una agenzia) con molti elementi di scomodità: il pavimento scricchiola ed ha parecchie mattonelle rotte, l'unico tavolo è piuttosto rovinato, c'è un solo armadio in tutta la casa con 1 gruccia ( ora sono 3 perché due le abbiamo lasciate noi!) e non ci sono piani di appoggio per lasciare le valigie aperte. Nei bagni mancano - specie in quello grande- ganci per gli asciugamani e piani per poggiare gli oggetti; in cucina non c'è uno strofinaccio per asciugare piatti e mani, né tovaglia o tovagliette, neanche di carta, né abbiamo trovato p.es. sale o olio già disponibili. In sintesi, parecchie cose scomode ma niente di insuperabile, alla fine la nostra famiglia di 4 persone adulte si è trovata bene per le cinque giornate trascorse a Madrid... È da considerare però che prendere questa casa non significa potersi rilassare in un ambiente raffinato ma accontentarsi dell'essenziale in cambio della posizione.  Madrid vale la pena, buon viaggio!Piso ideal para estar en el centro de Madrid y poder disfrutar de la ciudadBien placé et chauffé mais c'est tout. Apparemment de marchand de sommeil, refait à la va vite, et pas agréable. Attention à ne pas arriver après 19h sinon c'est 10€ / heure de retard. Bref autant aller à l'hôtel, au moins on peut y laisser les bagages la journéeAppartement très bien situé en plein centre de Madrid, et pourtant très calme. Bonne literie et appartement très propre, excellente communication avec l'agence en amont. Seul bémol, pour une prise de clef en agence, cette dernière est un peu délicate à trouver car il n'y a pas de nom sur les sonnettes.Buenos anfitriones. Todo genial. Lo único el wifi no funcionaba bien.Great location. Small space but not a problem for us. Communication was not the best.Inmejorable ubicación en Madrid. Muy cómodo. Estuve con mi familia (mi esposa y 3 hijos adolescentes) y nos acomodamos muy bien. Una parte del mobiliario podría renovarse.Apartamento com EXCELENTE localização, 2 banheiros, ótimo sistema de calefação.
Localizado entre Plaza Mayor, mercado San Miguel e Plaza del Sol. MUITO perto de tudo.Lo mejor la ubicación sin desmerecer el resto. Como detalles negativos, una de las habitaciones no tiene ninguna ventilación, pero al dar al salón y al tener está una puerta, con cerrar el salón que da perfecto. Nosotros nos quedamos tres parejas y lo hicimos así. El suelo cruje bastante en alguna zona por lo que si caminas de noche puedes despertar a algún compañero. Son pequeños detalles que no bajan la nota del alojamiento cómodo, limpio y sobre todo bien ubicado.Lugar perfecto, tiene una ubicación inmejorable.Lajas homes is a great host. The communication was great and the house was perfectDen bedst tænkelige service og gæstfrihed. Alle varmeste anbefalinger herfraVery good location, and availability. Very clean, good quality for the beds.
Could be a bit more nice inside, very simple furniture, noisy floor, noisy boiler for the showers.
Thanks a lot !El apartamento se encuentra ubicado en un lugar inmejorable a unos cuantos pasos del centro de Madrid.
El sitio es tranquilo, limpio y agradable. Las respuestas del anfitrión fueron amables y oportunas. 
El piso del apartamento traquea y suena un poco al caminar, pero nada que impida pasar una estancia buena y agradable.
Sin duda alguna recomiendo el apartamento a cualquier visitante.El apartamento está muy bonito, con una ubicación inmejorable. Los anfitriones muy amables, volvería a quedarme en este mismo lugar.La ubicación es perfecta, todo queda cerca
El apartamento muy amplio y limpio, perfecto para familias grandesEs muy real, tal y como me lo esperaba, ubicación genial, cerca a todo, lo recominedo 100%Hola buenas tardes, fuimos a pasar el fin de  semana del 26 de abril de 2019 un grupo de 7 mujeres, cuando nos encontramos con la anfitrión nos comento que nos teníamos que ir el domingo a las 11 y no se podían dejar las maletas allí, nos dijo que nos iba a facilitar un correo para poder dejar las maletas y resulta que no nos contesto al correo, tambíen la comentamos que en los armarios solo había una percha para 7 personas ella nos dijo que nos iba a mandar una persona y al final todas sus promesas no fueron cumplidas.Me encanto! La casa está en una localización inmejorable, es grande y agradezco infinita mente que nos dejaran quedarnos asta que saliera nuestro avión! Muchísimas gracias! Respondieron a todas mis preguntas súper rápido, sin duda volvería a quedarme aquí y totalmente recomendado

Love the place! The house is huge and in amazing location =)Todo bien. 
Ubicación muy buena, la comunicación y la facilidad del checking y checkout tambien perfecto. No pasamos mucho tiempo en el apartamento por lo que tampoco usamos la cocina. Por poner un pero, el agua caliente no se controlaba del todo bien, pero nada importante.Buena experiencia calidad precio. Buena ubicaciónThe host canceled this reservation 14 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.Convenient location, close to many shops! It was easy to check in with the instructions given but the house was smaller than we expected (we had 7 people so it was a bit of a squeeze). All in all, we had a lovely time in Madrid!Great location, they were flexible on our check in and check out. The place is very clean. The only think they should improve is the AC situation; they have a small unit in the leaving room and the rooms are far away from it. Therefore, it was difficult to get cold air to the rooms. Everything else was great.Han sido muy atentos y amables en cuanto a la comunicación, y el alojamiento estaba muy limpio, además de muy bien ubicado.Muy buena estancia. Recomendada 100%.Piso con una ubicación excelente ya que se encuentra en pleno centro. Para 5 personas está muy bien pero para 7 no porque el sofá cama no es nada cómodo.el departamento cumple, ubicación inmejorableLocalização espetacular! Apartamento confortável. Muito bom. comments:
Increíble departamento, muy espacioso, limpio y perfectamente ubicado. Fuimos recibidos muy calidamente y nos brindaron muchísima información acerca de Madrid. Se los recomiendo si quieren disfrutar Madrid y estar verdaderamente cómodos.El departamento cubre las necesidades básicas de cualquier huésped, es pequeño, cálido y muy acogedor. Se encuentra en una ubicación privilegiada. La anfitriona está atenta a cualquier consulta y responde en forma casi inmediata. 
Un lugar ciento por ciento recomendable!Piso estupendo, muy acogedor y cómodo, excelente ubicación en Malasaña, muy cerca de zona de restaurantes, tiendas, teatro y metro, preferiblemente para ir sin coche. Un saludo a Leticia, la anfitriona con quien la comunicación fue muy atenta y cercana. Lo recomiendo, para pasar una estancia muy agradable en Madrid, seguro repetiremos!Muy bien.Leticia est une hôte très accueillante et très serviable. L'appartement est agréable, bien équipé et bien situé.Appartement idéalement placé, très propre, bien équipé et calme. Commerces et métro à proximité.
Parfait pour 2 personnes.Es un apartment céntrico y muy equipado. Y la anfitriona es muy atenta y que me dió los consejos turísticos muy útiles.El apartamento es tal cual se muestra en La fotos, me ha encantado.
Se sitúa entre la parada de metro de San Bernardo y Noviciado lo que hace que cualquier desplazamiento sea rápido y cercano. Tienes dos supermercados a menos de 30m, lo que es bastante cómodo.
El apartamento es moderno y está totalmente renovado, tiene todo cuanto vas a necesitar, además de dejarte productos de primera necesidad para cocinar, como aceite, sal, café...
La verdad que al estar en pleno centro puedes ir caminando a cualquier zona, y El Barrio de  Malasaña es de lo mejor para disfrutar de Madrid.Leticia is very friendly and very accommodating.  Even when we had traveling issues and came in way later than check in, she was very understanding.   Especially allowing myself and my pregnant fiancé check in late.  
The apartment is a little dark as it is located in a corridor with very limited light, but not uncommon to most apartments in this area.  The area is a hipster area with bars, cafes and restaurants.  Very well situated as we were able to walk everywhere within 15-20 minutes from where the tourist sites are which was ideal and cost effective.  The apartment has everything you need along with a great host!Simplesmente maravilhoso! Localização super central, no bairro Malasaña, ao lado da estação San Bernardo e a 15min de caminhada até a Gran Vía, Plaza de España, Teleférico... O estilo do apê é uma lindeza só! Com móveis feitos pela proprietária Charo numa delicadeza incrível.  Ela e a Leticia são duas fofas que estão sempre dispostas a ajudar com o que quer que você precise. Aliás, duvido você precisar de algo pq o apê tem TUDO! Fiquei 2 meses lá e tinha: máquina de lavar roupa, varal pra estender, prancha e ferro pra passar, detergente, amaciante, água sanitaria, vassoura e esfregão... Fazer faxina ali foi uma delicinha de fácil! Mas só fiz faxina porque fiquei dois meses, porque te juro: recebi o apê numa limpeza impecável! Tudo brilhando e cheirando a novinho! Foi uma experiência incrível e recomendo a qualquer pessoa que queira disfrutar de uma estadia agradável no centro de Madri! Foram dois meses sozinha, mas recebi pessoas lá: o sofá-cama é muito confortável também! Tranquilo pra ficar de 1 final de semana a 6 meses... e de 1 pessoa até 4, numa boa!It is a great little place located in the center of Madrid. Parking is difficult but a parking garage is available not too far at a reasonable price within walking distance. Located near to the Metro and very near to great restaurants and bars and a great supermarket 2 minutes away. The host is great and extremely helpful. Todo perfecto. Repetiré seguro. Calidad precio increíble.Muy buen piso y ubicación. Es un espacio pequeño, pero se ha reformado muy bien, por lo que tienes todo lo necesario. Charo y Leticia son muy amables y responden rápidamente los mensajes.Great location, easy to check in and find, nice apartment. Would stay againAccueil extraordinaire. Appartement conforme à la description, hyper bien placé. Nous recommandons vivement. Gros plus pour les fumeurs, possibilité juste dans la cour extérieure devant la porte de l'appartement.  Un alojamiento con una excelente ubicación nos encanto el lugarMuy buena ubicación y tiene todos los servicios necesarios, Charo es muy amable y te da indicaciones de todo, todo estuvo perfecto y muy bien !Really enjoyed the apartment. My boyfriend and I stayed for 3 nights and felt very comfortable. The space is small but very well designed, so it is functional and nice. The location is perfect, close to Malasana and the nice coffee shops. The walls are slightly thin so you can hear the neighbors, but I am a light sleeper and wasn't bothered. Definitely recommend!EL DEPARTAMENTO ES (Website hidden by Airbnb) UBICACION INCREIBLE.Muy buena la estancia en el apartamento. La atención de Leticia muy buena.Todo muy bien 100% recomendada!Todo perfecto. Estancia muy limpia y confortable. Repetiremos!Good location, 10 minutes walk to Gran Via, 20 minutes to Royal palace. Nice neighborhood, couple of supermarkets 200 meters around. We were provided with the whole necessary information about center of the city. Thanks for hospitality!Had a great stay! The apartment was clean and had a nice layout and decor. It is located in a fun neighborhood with great restaurants and shopping in walking distance. It is close to several Metro stops, but we were able to walk most places that we wanted to go. Leticia was so helpful with our check-in and gave us lots of suggestions that made our trip great!Fantastic location and lovely cosy flatO apartamento é charmoso e aconchegante; idêntico às fotos. Bem equipado, tudo em perfeito funcionamento. Limpíssimo.

Espaço compacto, todavia funcional. Acomoda bem duas pessoas.

Localização excelente, a 10 minutos de descida a pé para Gran Via. Diversas linhas de metrô próximas, bem como bares, restaurantes e minimercados.  

Boa relação custo-benefício.

Letícia, pessoa responsável pelo check in,  foi muito gentil no check in. Explicou-nos as regras da casa e deu boas dicas para conhecermos Madrid.

Ótima estadia. Sentimo-nos em casa.Super sauber und zentral gelegenes Appartement für Madrid. Für einen Städtetrip sehr zu empfehlen.Estancia muy satisfactoria en el alojamiento, tiene una ubicación excelente se puede llegar a los puntos de interés caminando y hay metro cercano , el súper a pasos donde pudimos comprar comidas y el apartamento está súper bien la cocina bien equipada todo nos gusto volveríamos a hospedarnos aquí nuestra próxima vez en Madrid.Very good locationVery convenient place,close to the airport(20 min) and underground.The house is quiet and clean and equipped with basic facilities.Local muito limpo e localização ótima. Só o tamanho do apartamento que na foto parecia maior. Para 2 pessoas ficou muito apertado. Mas foi tudo ótimo!Excelente localização em Madri. Além da facilidade com metrô pode se ir a pé a muitos pontos turísticos. Anfitriã muito solicita e as instalações muito boa. Preço justo.Eu me senti muito confortável durante as duas semanas em que ocupei esse apartamento, que é bonito e funcional como aparece nas fotos. A qualidade do colchão, do chuveiro e do sinal wi-fi me surpreenderam. Fui recebido de maneira muito gentil pela Leticia, que explicou todos os detalhes do apartamento e destacou no mapa as principais regiões da cidade e suas principais atrações, o que me deu muitas ideias de locais para visitar. Leticia também esclareceu rapidamente às minhas dúvidas durante a estadia. A localização é excelente, a menos de 5 minutos da estação San Bernardo, com uma ampla oferta de mercados e restaurantes na região. Mesmo estando a poucos passos do metrô, fui a muitos pontos interessantes da cidade a pé: Gran Vía e Mercado de San Ildefonso estão a pouco mais de 10 minutos de caminhada, enquanto para chegar à Plaza Mayor ou à Puerta del Sol caminhava apenas 20 minutos. Retornando à Madrid, com certeza gostaria de voltar a me hospedar neste local.Perfect location, and a brilliant base to explore Madrid. Very comfortable space, lovely bathroom (great shower), superb bed and plenty of storage space. Kitchen perfect for making simple dishes and lovely homely touches. Would highly recommend and would definitely returnTal y como aparece en las fotos, un apartamento con mucho encanto, estuvimos muy a gusto, y está todo cerca de cualquier lugar de interés, si volvemos a Madrid, me volvería alojar en el mismo sitio. Leticia ns explicó todo lo q podías ver, nos explicó todo, un encanto, gracias por todoA great stay. Nice area. Highly recommendedAppartement propre, bien équipé et situé proche d'une station  de métro. Des magasins d'alimentation à proximité. Et surtout Leticia très disponible pour notre confort.Easy find. Easy check in. Great location. Lovely and clean. Comfy bed. Great shower. No complaints!The apartment is in a great location with everything needed being in a walking distance. There are also metro stations close by.

The apartment was fully equipped and sparkling clean. Couldn't have asked for more. 

The hostess also showed us on a map some key things about the city which if you're visiting Madrid for the first time are very helpful and much appreciated.Apartamento bien ubicado, muy cómodo para dos personas. Tal vez cuatro personas estén muy estrechos y no sea óptimo. La limpieza es irreprochable. 
La comunicación fue fluida y nuestra anfitriona fue muy amable compartiendo lugares de interés en la ciudad. Regresaremos con agrado.

¡Recomendado!Excelente ubicación! el departamento es muy funcional y moderno en su interior con todo lo necesario para una muy buena estancia.El departamento tiene muy buena ubicacion, es tranquilo y estaba muy limpio. En lo personal lo unico negativo es que la calefaccion es por aire acondicionado.

comments:
Quick review:
- Super stylish/modern touches
- Great location
- Get acquainted with Minty Host..they are who help with opening up place
- Air conditioner, although new state-of-the art wireless (Website hidden by Airbnb) the renter you have no control of the system
- Internet connecting took a bit of work as password was not the one on the router..had to do some leg work to get it goingFantastic place! Close to the city center and all the tourist attractions. No more than a 20 min walk, or €4-€5 ride (do not use Uber. We had 2 rides cancelled when they couldn’t find the address. But the Taxi drivers were always spot on. Use the Free Now app for taxis). 
The unit is very nice, brand new, clean, comfortable, and accurate to all the pictures. 
Our hosts were very attentive and kept checking in to ensure everything was OK. 
All in all, we highly recommend!Espectacular el departamento! divina la decoración y amoblamientos, limpio impecable Jamila y Paul, unos anfitriones increíbles, volveré junto con mi familia!Lovely clean, comfortable and modern apartment in a great location. Everything you need for an enjoyable stay in Madrid. Good communication and very easy check in/out. Wouldnt hesitate to recommend or would definitely stay again.SuperApartamento moderno acogedor y muy limpio sin duda un superhost !Lovely space, amazing hospitality. Would recommend to anyone!Ubicación perfecta la parada del metro(Puerta de Toledo)  esta a 6 minutos andando, la limpieza es muy buena y el servicio y atención exquisita. Agradecer a Mariana la disponibilidad para resolver cualquier tipo de duda desde temas que incumben al alojamiento a diversas sugerencias de que visitar durante el hospedaje en la ciudad.Muy bien ubicado, limpio y lindo. Lo único malo son las escaleras qué hay que bajar para llegar al sótano.

comments:
Eduardo was a super nice host. He went the extra mile to make sure I knew how to get to his place, had coffee/tea/everything I needed.

Besides that he is an extremely intelligent man: learning about physics and CERN was a true joy.

I wish you the best, Eduardo, and look forward to meeting you again.Eduardo fue un anfitrión muy atento. Tiene mucho conocimiento de la ciudad y está dispuesto a sentarse contigo a explicarte dónde ir, por dónde conocer y darte buenos consejos.

El cuarto era tal y como fue descrito. Todo muy limpio y ordenado.Eduardo es un anfitrión súper atento, y majísimo. Me dejó 3 tipos de mapas diferentes para que pudiera ubicarme en la zona, explicaciones detalladas de todas las dudas que tenía, y además, la habitación y departamento estaban impecables y más luminosos de los que esperaba.
¡Muy recomendado!
Un saludo y gracias por todo.Eduardo fue muy amable durante mi estancia, me dio todo lo que necesitaba y me permitió una salida tardía adaptada a mi horario. Muy buen anfitrión.

El edificio está bien situado, muy cerca del Paseo de la Castellana y la habitación es tal y como se muestra en la foto. Eduardo made me very welcome and helped to explain all I needed to know. He further explained any questions I might have regarding how to get to certain places and that parts of metro were closed at present. 
We had some lovely talks too, which were both interesting and informative.
I would definitely recommend Eduardo as a good place to stay, and I would definitely stay again.
Best
AndrewMi estancia con Eduardo fue muy satisfactoria. La habitación es tal y cómo aparece descrita en el anuncio y estaba perfecta a mi llegada. La zona en la que está situada es muy buena. Eduardo es muy amable y me ayudó con todo lo que necesité. Pude usar todas las comodidades cómo si estuviese en mi propia casa. Incluso tuvimos un par de conversaciones interesantes acerca de temas de interés común.. En mi opinión una muy buena opción para alojarse en Madrid.. repetiría sin duda! Eduardo was very welcoming and conversational. He gave me some tips on how to get to places. House was clean and as described. Thanks.Muy buen anfitrion. Cerca del centro. Un placer Eduardo!Great stay! Eduardo has a good sense of hospitality. I recommend you.Me hizo sentir como en casa. Disponibilidad total. Muy limpio y accesible al sitio donde debia ir.Muy buena casa! En un piso increíble! Recomendable200%La estadía en el apartamento de Eduardo ha sido excelente, muy cómoda y confortable. La ubicación del apartamento es muy buena ya que es muy accesible a dos estaciones del Metro, Eduardo ha sido un excelente guía para poder transportarme y no perderme.Ya se que tengo suerte con la gente pero con Edu es otro nivel.
Totalmente recomendado.Great stay thank you! Highly recommend!Thank you very much, Eduardo. It's a wonderful room with wonderful host. I love there. And i promise i will come back. Because i want to watch the football match again. And it's the best room. I will choose again, if there is place when travelling.
The house is near the stadium. If you want to watch Real Madrid, you just walk there in 10 minutes. And be careful! After the match, there are a lot of fans to get metro. If you live this room, it's convenient. Just walk! And the room is clean. All house is clean. If you want to cook, there are everything. 
Eduardo is very kind and friendly. He will introduce the road, the shop, and other information that you need. He is willing to prepare everything for you. If he have already planed something, he is also willing to change it. But i don't want to bring him a lot of troubles. So i refused, but he brought me a lot of warmth and touched. I sure that if you meet problems, he is willing to help you. 

Bardzo polecam. To jest wspaniały dom. Gospodarz jest sympatyczny i otwarty. 

强推这个地方,对球迷来说简直太棒了,离伯纳乌球场仅需10分钟的走路距离｡平时,街道很安静,这个地区算是人流量较少,因此你可以享受到高质量的睡眠｡房东很热情,愿意为你改变自己的计划,我一开始去,会为我介绍车站,景点,超市等,桌上还有地图,都很方便｡如果你锁门,房东也会尊重你的隐私｡这次我安排错误,少订了一天,临时又早走了一天,房东很好人的帮我更改了,并没有收我房费｡我是在他那和他沟通才想起来的,所以特别不好意思,还是他提醒了我｡我漏了护照,登不了机,想多住一晚,他也愿意结束旅程来给我开门｡我不想太麻烦人家,就订了其他房子,让他好好享受旅程｡但是西班牙人真的好好好人,好多人都帮助了我们,我真的真的很感动｡
下一次去看皇马比赛,我绝对还会选这里,超级棒,对一个球迷而言,最合适的地方｡Great host! Great location! Great value! 
I would stay there again if\when I would return to Madrid.

Recommended!  Eduardo´s place is nice and is located in an interesting neighborhood close to many shops, restaurants, and Santiago Bernabeau Stadium. It has 2 metro lines that the guest can take to go everywhere very easily. The room is nice and bright. As it is shown in the picture, the room is quite small but comfortable; it is a good option if you are going to spend few days in Madrid. No living space is available so pretty much the room is the place where the guest will stay most of the time. Kitchen and bathroom are share with other guests. During my stay I met other nice guests that I shared the appartment with so the whole stay was very pleasant. Thanks Eduardo!!!.Eduardo is a top bloke. He helped me with my stay. I would highly recommend. Clean and eduardo us very hospitable.The location is nice and easily accessible to the centre, the flat is clean and well equipped. Eduardo was a great host, he was very welcoming :) it was a pleasure to stay thereL'appartement d'Eduardo est à environ 10 minutes à pied de 4 arrêts de métro, sur les lignes 8 et 1. A côté du stade Santiago Barnabeu, idéal pour les fans de foot.
Les indications d'Eduardo et son accueil sont au top, il explique tout ce qu'il faut savoir sur le quartier (en espagnol, anglais ou français) et fournit des plans. 
Si toutes les chambres sont louées et qu'Eduardo est présents il y a 4 personnes dans l'appartement, pour ma part j'ai a peine croisé mes colocataires et j'ai pu disposer de la salle de bain et de la cuisine (deus pièces très agréables) sans gêne.
Gros point positif: l'appartement est nickel, vraiment rien à dire sur la propreté et pourtant je suis du genre exigeante.
Ma chambre était petite mais bien meublée (bureau, rangements, assez bonne literie) et équipée (clim et ventilateur). 
Ah! Eduardo si tu lis, une petite lampe de chevet dans la chambre et ça serait parfait.
Voilà, bon séjour à Madrid!
Julie.Todo muy bien con Eduardo, y la habitacion muy correctaEs un buen cuarto agradable y cómodo. Cerca del estadio Santiago Bernabéu, restaurantes y bares. Eduardo es un buen anfitrión estuvo atento durante mi estadía y me explico bien las amenidades de los espacios compartidos. Buen ambiente y silencioso durante la noche. Lo recomiendo.Eduardo is a friendly guy, he was able to help me with everything I had asked him. The neighborhood of Castillejos is great both for living there or just for staying few nights in Madrid. The room and flat are quite small, but everything you need is there.산티아고 베르나베우, 쿠스코 두개의 역에서 가까운게 제일 좋았습니다. 숙소 상태도 너무 깨끗하고 샤워 시설도 훌륭했습니다. 관공서 근처라서 조용하고 안전하기에 여러 사람들에게 추천하고 싶습니다. 호스트 에두아르도씨 역시 너무 친절하셨습니다.숙소도 엄청 깨끗하고 여러명이서 같이 집을 쓰는데 공동 공간이 아주 넓습니다. 방마다 자물쇠도 있어서 안전하고 신기하게도 지내는동안 다른 투숙객들과 한번도 마주치지 않았네요. 위치도 되게 안전한 곳에 있고 근처에 24시간 까르푸도 있습니다. 교통도 편리하고 호스트분이 되게 친절하세요. 거의 30분동안 근처 대중교통 이용방법이랑 마드리드 여행시 참고할점 설명해주셨는데 되게 도움됐네요. 진짜 돈을 더 줘도 아깝지 않을 정도로 좋은 집이었습니다.Eduardo ha sido un gran anfitrión, muy atento y preocupado por hacer agradable la estancia a sus huéspedes. Además, tiene temas de conversación muy interesante. En definitiva, gran experiencia y muy recomendable reservar habitación en casa de Eduardo.Really nice place...very clean and friendly! I would recommend him for sureEduardo was great from start to finish and helped answer all questions I had. Even took one to print maps for me. Would recommend staying with Eduardo to anyone looking for time away in Madrid. Many bars and restaurants nearby, and less than a 10 minute walk from the Santiago Bernabeu. Perfect.It was great at his accommodation. The place is located well for public transport and Eduardo gives you hints for life in Madrid. Also he knows much about many things like yhe history of Madrid for some places and it was fun listening to him. He provides a great stay!Es un dueño muy responsable y amable , vivir en la casa me da el sentido de vivir en mi casaLa casa de Eduardo es ideal para estancias en Madrid, el departamento es muy lindo, limpio, organizado, tranquilo y la atención de Eduardo la mejor desde el momento mismo de llegada, recibí mucha ayuda de su parte para moverme en madrid, consejos de lugares a visitar, transporte, y cosas interesantes acerca de Madrid. La ubicación es en un barrio muy céntrico, cerca de estaciones de metro, supermercados y restaurantes, en fin mi estadía fue excelente!!!Eduardo was very kind and flexible with check in and check out, as I needed to check out later. The region is awesome, next to Bernabeu, more than one market, restaurants, stores, lots of metro and bus stations. There's some main streets near the apartment also, Calle bravo Murillo, Calle orense, that have everything you need. Although the room is not sooo big, I stayed 2 weeks without any problem, the wardrobe helps managing the space. The fact that there's only one bathroom was not a problem also. Everything was very clean always. Heating works good. Kitchen well equipped. Very good experience! I will come back when I need it.La habitación es muy cómoda. El recibimiento por parte de Eduardo inmejorable.
Cuenta con todos los servicios, las áreas comunes siempre se encuentran limpias y ordenadas.
Las demás personas del piso son muy amables.De los mejores Airbnb que he usado, inmejorableUna habitación muy práctica y con todos lo necesario. Muy bien comunicada con el transporte público y cercana a supermercados y restaurantes. Muy recomendable.Excelente ubicación,  piso muy limpio. Eduardo siempre atento ante cualquier eventualidad. Had a great experience and can recommend 100%.

Es como me senti en este Airbnb, 10/10. Cabe destacar que es la mejor ubicacion de todo Madrid, el barrio de Bilbao  es el mejor si vas de turista  o breve estancia a Madrid. 

Ojo!!!  La hospitalidad del hotel para con mi bebe fue la mejor, me ofrecieron una cuna, toalla/sabanas/utensilio de baño exclusicos para mi bebe.

Sin duda lo volveria a elegir.Hotel One Shot es sin duda un excelente sitio para descansar. La cama es muy cómoda y la habitación está impecable. La zona es muy buena ya que tienes una estación del metro al salir y otra más cruzando la calle.

comments:
Bonito y agradable apartamento en el centro de Madrid. Muy tranquilo y bien situado. La parada de metro muy cerca y hay muchas tiendas cerca. El dueño muy amable. Totalmente recomendable.Good shower and quality mattress. Very clean. Very central. Highly recommended if you spend a few days in Madrid. Pasamos una buena estanciaMy friend and I spent 2 nights in this cozy apartment and we just loved it. It is not big but very comfortable for 2 people. There is everything you may need during your stay in Madrid. The location is great: 2 steps from commercial streets with shops and restaurants and in about 2 minutes from Gran Via. 
The mattress is VERY comfortable :)
Lorenzo is great host! Very friendly and helpful. I highly recommend that apartment if you want to spend some days in Madrid!
Muy acogedor el apartamento y súper bien situado, Lorenzo muy atento. Lo recomiendo completamente, todo estaba limpio y muy bien cuidado.El piso està en un sitio perfecto para visitar madris, cerca de dos paradas de metro, con muchos restaurantes y bares de copas (Lorenzo nos dió unas excelentes recomendaciones)... El ambiente madrileño que buscabamos.
Lorenzo un  buen anfitrión, que nos facilitó mucho la estancia.
Volveremos.El apartamento está situado en una zona estupenda, cerca de los lugares más turísticos y de las zona de bares y con una parada de metro muy cerca. Es estupendo para una pareja y muy limpio. Nos ha encantado, repetiremos.The apartment is lovely, Lorenzo is super nice, and the neighborhood is fantastic. Stay here!Apartamento superguai, centrico, tranquilo..........y muy limpio! Lorenzo was an absolute delight from the moment we met him. Extremely helpful with tips on where to go in Madrid. The apartment is as cute as it looks in the pictures and the location is just perfect. All the touristy places are at a walking distance and the neighbourhood is amazing with quaint tapas bars and cafes all around. When visiting Madrid, look no further than this apartment.Verry nice apartment in the city center of madrid. We never had to use the public transport because it's all in walking distance. The apartment is clean, confortable and in a verry good part of the city - a lot of bars, restaurants, shops,... just around the corner. We would recommend it at all. Lorenzo was very friendly and always available to answer questions or to give informations. We had a verry good time here :) Lorenzo's apartment is very cosy and convenient. It takes two stops to Sol which is the center of Madrid. Lorenzo is very helpful. I love his place and will recommend it to anyone who plans to Madrid. We had a nice stay at Lorenzo's apartment.Buena localización, al lado de la calle Fuencarral. Bonito y cómodo. Muy recomendable para parejas. El apartamento tiene una situación muy buena. Todo estaba tal y como se ve en las fotos, y a nuestro gusto, todo muy bien y muy limpio. Lorenzo se portó muy bien con nosotros, estando atento en todo momento a lo que pudiéramos necesitar.
Completamente recomendable.Loved our stay in Lorenzo's apartment! He was a great host, with good communication in the lead-up to our trip and very friendly and helpful when we met him.  The apartment was clean and tidy with all you might need - and in a fantastic, buzzy part of town.  All in all a really good experience for our first visit to Madrid. Todo OK. 
El departamento es precioso, me encantó la decoración, está muy limpio y perfectamente ubicado, en un barrio amigable y céntrico, a un paso de todos los puntos de interés.This place is great! The apartment is smart, clean, and has everything you need. It's in a great part of town: there are bars and restaurants all around and you can walk to all the major sights in Madrid. Lorenzo was really polite, hospitable, and recommended some excellent restaurants. I'd stay again.
SeanWe loved Lorenzo's apartment in Chueca! Great location and lovely loft apartment. It was very clean and had everything we needed for a 5 night stay. Lorenzo made getting the keys very easy & was very helpful and accommodating. Madrid is an intense place, and we felt perfectly at ease in this apartment and location. 

Location - walking distance to city center and Sol. We hardly took the Metro during our visit around Madrid. Chueca station is a few blocks away.

Sleep - Pillows weren't great, but the bed was perfectly comfortable.

Tip - there is a charming French bakery very close to this apartment called Mamá Framboise. Highly recommended for delicious pastries! (Website hidden by Airbnb) 

We'd definitely stay here again and will recommend it to anyone visiting Madrid!Lorenzo was an incredible host- he accommodated our early arrival, oriented us to the apartment and the neighborhood, and even helped us out when we left a belonging upon checking out. Chueca is a wonderful, bustling neighborhood with far more offer than we could experience during our brief stay. The cozy apartment with a lofted bed was clean, quiet, and had everything we needed. Appartments was great, small but very nice. Lorenzo is a good man and reacted with understanding with time issues. If I will be at Madrid again it will be Lorenzos appartments.For 2 people....this place was perfect! No issues and great location. We walked everywhere. Clean and comfortable. This is a great little apartment in the center of all the action in Chueca. Lots of bars and restaurants close by and it's possible to walk to a lot of the major attractions if you don't want to use the subway. The kitchen is good to do some very basic cooking and there is a nice grocery a few blocks away. The apartment is small, but if you pack light like we did you should be fine. Lorenzo is also a great host and took time to give advice on Madrid and the neighborhood. I would stay here again.El depto es tal cual lo ves en las fotos! Muy bonito!!! A parte Lorenzo es muy buen anfitrión!!!
Mejor dicho es un lugar súper recomendado!!! Buen lugar! Buen anfitrión!! Todo muy bueno! It was a great experience. Lorenzo was very kind and helpful. The apt is beautiful and centrally located. It has AC which is rare in Madrid and key during the summer days.Très bon séjour ! Appartement très propre, calme et très bien place. On peut visiter madrid sans jamais prendre le métro. Plein de restaurants dans le quartier ! 
Je conseille fortement cet appartement.The place was perfect! Very clean, someone was there to greet us uopen arrival and very accomedating. Loved the location as well. Able to walk everywhere. The place is very nice and comfortable, is has a very good location, we were there for 2 nights but we really enjoyed our stay, Lorenzo's place has everything needed to have a nice rest after a day out in Madrid, we did not met Lorenzo, but the girl who was wating for us was very nice.

My wife loved the place and the pictoric neighborhood of Chueca!!

We definitely recommed Lorenzo's place to have a nice visit in Madrid.El apartamento es pequeño, pero tiene todo lo necesario. El aire acondicionado realmente se agradece en verano. La ubicación es inmejorable.Beautiful apartment, perfect for a weekend getaway. Location couldn't be better. Thanks Lorenzo was great from the beginning, the communication was great and Lorenzo was very helpful!
I 
On arrival Lorenzo met us in the flat, and was very kind seeing as we got lost when looking for the car park and kept him waiting (sorry Lorenzo!)

The flat was beautiful and had everything we needed for our two day stay!
It is so close to the centre and right next to a very busy shopping street which I loved!!

One full day is not enough time to see Madrid properly so it gives us a perfect excuse to come back and stay again!!

Thanks again

Katie and Morgan La recepción fue correcta, el barrio de Chueca nos encanta. El apartamento está muy bien situado. Muy céntrico . Lo que no nos gustó es que la cama estaba en un altillo. Bien para jóvenes no para nosotros. Muy limpió todo muy correcto.Lorenzo was very welcoming and gave us great advice on where to eat and drink within walking distance of his apartment.  He made us feel at home immediately and the apartment is in a fantastic location in Madrid.  It's very easy to walk all over the southern half of the city, and easy to find off the metro. Lorenzo's apartment was great for our short stay in Madrid.  The place was clean and had sufficient space for 2 people.  Chueca is a lively neighborhood at night, but the apartment is on a quiet side street and we did not hear any noise at night.  Location was very convenient to all of the Madrid sights and city center.  The lofted bed may not be great for older people, but we had no issues getting in or out.  Lorenzo was an excellent host with communication throughout and was there to greet us and show how everything worked in the apartment.Lorenzo was a lovely host, and the apartment was everything we wanted! Perfect location, yet very quiet. Easy walking access to everywhere in Madrid, and right in the heart of Chueca and Malasana. It's very cute, and though small, has all you'd need. The stairs to the loft area are necessarily a little steep due to space restrictions, but this shouldn't put you off unless you have genuine mobility issues. We're very happy to stay here again, and recommend it to our friends too.Nice flat! Decoration is very good and warm.  Me and my wife were very sutisfied. %100 recomendet for young people and couples. 
Lorenzo was very kind .

Ismet - IstanbulLorenzo's place is so beautiful, clean, and cozy. Love the neighborhood - within walking distance from Plaza Mayor etc and all the most on trend shopping you could ask for. Appartamento piccolino ma carinissimo e pulitissimo in una posizione molto agevole... A due passi dalla metro....  Molto soddisfatto.grazie Lorenzo :)J'ai séjourné dans cet appartement durant quinze jours. Après une première impression positive, j'ai été déçu.

Le lit, en mezzanine, est comfortable, des draps et serviettes en quantité suffisante sont mis à la disposition des locataires.

Points négatifs : Le canapé, que l'on voit sur les photos, est si usé qu'il est quasiment impossible de rester assis dessus tellement il est inconfortable : il n'est donc pas possible de regarder la télévision posée en face, ou alors il faut s'assoir sur le sol, on y est mieux que sur le canapé.
L'appartement n'est absolument pas calme. L'immeuble, ancien, est très sonore ; même si le voisins sont calmes, on entend absolument tous les bruits intérieurs.
L'appartement donne sur une petite rue à sens unique, près d'un feu ; on entend donc les moteurs de voiture, de motos, le soir des gens qui parlent très fort ou qui crient dans la rue. On entend également dans la journée les bruits provenant de la rue voisine, très passante.

Experience was averagely good with some PRO and CONS:
COMMUNICATION:
Communication and welcoming were fast and great from Lorenzo and his colleague Maria Helena.
LOCATION:
Location is superb, close to Tribunal metro, in a very nice area and you can easily walk everywhere to discover the beauty of Madrid.
Around the flat you also have everything you might need in Madrid: from restaurants, bars, shops, supermarkets etc.
FLAT:
The flat is simple, nice and potentially very cosy.
It's located in a vibrant neighborhood but the street is quiet so you don't have noise!
Nice point!

The cons point was that we unfortunately had a bad experience on the cleaning side: the flat was a bit too much dusty for us, and towels and bed sheets were old and not properly cleaned.
I guess that was just a bad luck for us and we are sure that Lorenzo will take care about this aspect in the future!

comments:
Una estancia muy agradable en Madrid. El apartamento es un poco pequeña para 5 personas, pero suficiente si estáis allí sólo para dormir! Roman es un propietario muy atento, que nos dejó sorpresas en los armarios de la cocina. 10 minutos en metro del centro de la ciudad, recomendaría este apartamento a todos los jóvenes que quieran ir de fiesta en Madrid.Bueno y barato, al bonito le faltan algunos detalles. En general muy bien situado (2 min del metro) con desayuno incluido. Aunque esta muy cerca del centro (20 min). El wifi no estaba instalado cuando llegamos pero Roman se preocupó de dejarnos un móvil para que no gastáramos los datos. En resumen las fotos no engañan. Una zona inmejorable con vistas preciosas y muy tranquilo. En relación calidad precio Román ha sido un anfitrión perfecto. Ha estado antes, durante y después pendiente de nuestra comodidad y procurando que nuestra estancia fuese perfecta... y lo ha sido!!! Nos dejó desayuno en el armario y bastante variado por cierto. La casa muy bien situada, un barrio muy tranquilo pero bastante cerca del centro andando. Está claro que cuando volvamos repetiremos! 
Tuvimos una EXCELENTE estancia en casa de Roman! Es una persona atenta y pendiente de hacer que nos sintiéramos como en nuestra casa. 
El piso estaba muy limpio y a solo 2 minutos del metro. 
Dejarnos un cajón lleno de comida  fue todo un detalle por su parte! Por supuesto volveremos si vamos a Madrid!

Recomendable 100%
Gracias RomanBuen anfitrion, buen piso, y con desayuno gratis, buena localizacion, en general todo perfecto, Roman siempre ha estado atento a todo y a explicarnos todo sobre Madrid, repetiria sin ninguna duda.Desde el momento de la reserva Roman estuvo muy pendiente de nuestra llegada, explicando y enviándonos indicaciones de como llegar, siempre de un manera muy clara! El piso es tal cual uno lo ve en las fotos! La ubicación es inmejorable, es muy fácil de acceder al centro de la ciudad caminando en pocos minutos. Roman es una persona muy amable y atenta! Hemos quedado encantados de haber podido hospedarnos en su casa! Definitivamente recomendamos en un 100% hospedarse en su piso! Muchas gracias por todo! :)Lo mejor de la casa su situación. Céntrico y cerca de la parada de metro.
Limpieza: lo primero que hicimos fue limpiar el único mueble que tiene la casa para poder dejar cosas y, lo  más grave de todo, limpiar el cuarto de baño para poder usarlo. La única limpieza que tenía la casa era una barrida del suelo muy superficial. Lamentable!!!
Espacio: que en un piso puedas meter camas para 8 no significa que sea apropiado. Con lo pequeño que es con más de cuatro no te puedes ni revolver ni tienes sitio para dejar las cosas, sin espacio para poner la "mesa" que te ofrece en teoría para por lo menos el desayuno que se ofrece, nosotros 6 sólo hemos ido a dormir.
Román, el propietario, es muy amable y atento pero hay mucho que mejorar para ofrecer un servicio digno.It is great apartment for staying with friends and with perfect location - very easy to find from the airport. At the apartment you can find everything you need, has heaters, very warm! 

Roman, works very professional. He was so much thoughtful, we were very much impressed with his attitude to customer! Next time if i come to Madrid I definitely will stay his place!
