Roman desde el primer momento que entramos en contacto estuvo muy pendiente de que nos encontráramos a gusto en su casa y ofreciéndonos toda la disponibilidad que estaba en sus manos tanto para entrada y salida, además de estar siempre atento con nosotros, experiencia Repetible!!! Un anfitrión 10. 
Román es un excelente anfitrión, nos esperó con chocolates, nos regaló vino, y fue muy amable. Nos orientó en lo que precisamos. Todo estaba impecable, tal cual la publicación. Pasamos muy bien, dormimos muy cómodo. Todo excelente. Volveremos en unas semanas. Nos vemos pronto Román! Muchas gracias por tu hospitalidad!!!!Fomos muito bem recebidos. O local e´ bem posicionado.El apartamento es pequeño pero confortable, la atención de Roman muy buena y la pasamos muy bien.El alojamiento esta bien situado, no muy lejos del centro y con una estación de metro muy cerca.  En cuanto a lo demás la evaluación es mas bien negativa, es un piso muy pequeño e incluso para 4 personas llega a ser agobiante. Las habitaciones son bastante "espartanas"ya que el unico mueble es la cama (echamos de menos algun armario para dejar la ropa) y tienen unas ventanas( ?) muy pequeñas que apenas dejan pasar el aire aunque si dejan pasar la luz porque no tienen cortinas ni persianas. La cocina y el baño tambien son pequeños pero tienen lo necesario.
Es caro para lo que ofrece.
Roman's appartment is small but functional. I could fit my family (4) and have my own bed. Very handy location closed to the metro and also easy to reach major sightseeings such as the royal palace and opera. Roman himself is one of the greatest host I had met in 2 years with airbnb. He surprised us with a shelf full of stuff for breakfast and one bottle of cava. On top of that he was really helpful by giving tons of tips and provide us his own service to bring us back to the airport. I fully recommend to stay at his place.Apartamento con muy buena calidad/precio, ideal para pasar una o dos noches en Madrid y sobre todo para gente que quiere hacer turismo por la ciudad por dos razones: 1- Por su cercania al centro ya que puedes empezar por la almudena hasta sol andando sin necesidad de coger transporte publico y 2- por la posibilidad de aparcar en la zona de manera libre sin pagar zona verde o azul. Roman ha estado pendiente todo el tiempo de nuestras necesidades y ha explicado perfectamente el itinerario y la forma de llegar al apartamento. Muy contentos con el apartamento!Great area, right next to Metro and other great transport links. 
Roman was fantastic, could not have been more helpful. 
Will stay again when I return to Madrid. Roman was generally, a great host! Communication was never a problem with him - before, during, and after the trip. He gave easy instructions and suggestions on how to go to his flat; tips on where to dine and what to see; and he would always check on how his guests are. 

The place was just as how it was described in the listing. It was just right for us. We were a group of six friends and even though the space was small, it worked! There were a lot of goodies for breakfast and for a quick bite, plus a bottle of Cava! The only thing that we had to adjust to was the broiler (water heater) that can only accommodate a couple of people in the shower in a specified time. Roman was very prompt in responding to our concern then and was imwithin the doorstep even if it was 11pm. 

Highly recommended! Coqueto apartamento en una ubicación estratégica, a un paso de la Casa de Campo y de la renovada zona de Madrid Río, a un paseo a zonas tan céntricas como la Plaza Mayor y con autobuses en la puerta que te dejan en 5 minutos en pleno centro, además de metro. Es un apartamento donde encuentras todo lo que necesitas para preparar algo en la cocina, descansar un rato viendo la tele o navegando por Internet con su buena conexión wifi. Por la noche, se duerme muy bien sin ruidos, es muy tranquilo. 
Lo recomiendo por su óptima relación calidad/precio, además Román deja en la cocina un buen surtido de productos para desayunar o para tomarte un té o un café en cualquier momento, y es un anfitrión muy atento a todo lo que necesites.The flat was as we expected, very clean and well located. We really enjoyed it and the price is very cheap! Moreover Roman has been a perfect host to us, giving us a map with all the locations to visit, and offering us a bottle of Cava and many things for breakfast. I certainly recommend this place, and will definitly rent this place next time I'm going to Madrid!Roman fue una gran elección en Madrid! Gran host! El apartamento es perfecto para visitar la ciudad y tiene todo lo necesario. Queda muy cerca de la estación del metro y eso hace muy fácil moverse en Madrid. Además, el desayuno fue un plus. Ahorramos dinero gracias a que Román dejo la alacena y nevera llenas. También nos dejó una botella de cava que mis padres disfrutaron mucho! Sin duda si alguna vez vuelvo a Madrid me quedaré acá! La descripción del anuncio era correcta, nos ofreció un buen desayuno y fue flexible con los horarios. Camas muy cómodas. Excelente ubicación.Román es un excelente anfitrión. Fuimos dos veces a su apartamento. La segunda vez que fuimos, por confusión nuestra llegamos en una hora incorrecta y Román se preocupó por resolver la situación y logramos obtener la llave al llegar. 
Es muy cuidadoso y atento con los huéspedes, se preocupa mucho por que los huéspedes estén bien y tengan lo que necesitan. Lo recomiendo totalmente!!!Román fue muy amable en todo momento, desde el principio estuvo disponible modificando su horario para poder dejarnos las llaves y estando atento a cualquier cosa que pudiéramos necesitar. About the place:

The place was very clean with fresh towels. It could do with a hand/face towel. Although in a great location, the apartment feels much smaller than pictured. The walls are thin and the air-con is in the hallway so you have to have the room (sliding) doors open which pretty much removes any kind of privacy.

The bathroom (with bifolding doors) is next to the kitchen so I don't recommend cooking and using the bathroom for no. 2 at the same time...
If you have the the air-con and want to turn the stove on it will blow the main fuse. You can reset it very easily but it will happen every time. 

The rooms are really small but "cozy", one has no storage space so you have to put your stuff on the floor or in the hallway.

I would recommend this place for people who are friends and don't mind hearing people from the next room.Román solo se puede contactar por (Hidden by Airbnb) o por el chat de Airbnb, y aveces se demora en responder.Roman was really great and responded quickly. Sol estuvo disponible en todo momento para las dudas o necesidades que nos surgían, y nos dió recomendaciones geniales para hacer en Madrid. The apartment is nice and cozy, the location is perfect and Sol was a great host.It's a good (basic) apartment for a couple but I don't recommend it for a couple with a baby. I went there with mine 11 months old son and yes, there was a (very old and dusty) baby bed and a bath but I couldn't fit my pram through the entrance (of the building) door, which meant I had to pack it up, while carrying my baby and my stuff. Plus even if there was a lift, it was very small AND there were quite a few steps both before and after the lift. 
The microwave wasn't working (turning but not heating) and I could see that most stuff were done cheaply (screw coming loose everywhere, hook hanging from the bathroom door which meant we couldn't close the door unless we removed the hook, etc. It was great to have air-conditioning though as we were there during the heat wave (40° and more). So a pretty average place overall...Apartment was as described, very clean and close to the centre. Communication was also great. I recommend!It was great!! We met Isa, Sol’s friend. comments:
I highly recommend Maribel's apartment. This is a wonderful find in Madrid and ticks all the boxes for great experience, great location, great host! 

Location-wise, it scores top as it is about 10 mins (or less) walkable distance from Atocha station, yet sheltered in a green residential compound. There are security guards so it all feels safe. From here, you are also within walkable distance to many other places such as the Reina Sofia (just 10 min), the Prado, and a boulevard-full of other museums, the Botanic Gardens and El Retiro.  Maribel also took me on a walking tour of the neighboring districts, again walkable distance - Chueco, Letras, etc. We had a lovely couple of hours strolling and discovering Madrid by night. 

The apartment is impeccable neat and clean. It has lovely scents, and a bonus is the wonderful terrace where when there is sun, you can relax over a drink. The apartment is on the top floor so you get privacy outdoors on the terrace. The internet works well here so those on work trips can rest assured.

Maribel is such a great host, we ended up spending much time together discovering Madrid and the arts here, an experience with this local host has greatly increased my appreciation of Madrid. Definitely will stay here again!



I visited my son and used his AirBnB account while visiting Madrid and staying with Maribel.  It was wonderful! 

First, Maribel has a big heart.  Maribel always wanted to know that I was comfortable.  Whether cooking me breakfast or taking me to see the sights around town, Maribel went out of her way to ensure that my visit was the best possible.

Maribel is fluent in English after having lived in London.  I learned a lot about the Spanish way of life through her eyes.

Maribel keeps her apartment spotless.  The apartment is small but uses space efficiently. Maribel lights candles and burns incense on occasion adding to the charm of her nicely decorated place.  The apartment has a large patio with ample room to sit out and read. The bedroom has a twin bed and a desk.  There is one shared bathroom.  The building complex is safe and gated.  There are paddleboard courts and a swimming pool, which is open in the summer months.

The apartment is centrallly located in Madrid and in easy walking distance to many museums, attractions, neighborhoods, eateries, and to the bus and railway systems.

I highly recommend staying with Maribel.Maribel is nice and helpful host, she treat me very well, and provide many info to me. The room is clean, and make me feel like home. Also If you want to stay near atocha station, i think this is the best choice for you, you can walk to everywhere, even at night time, this is safe, and you dun have to worry about that. This was the first time i had used Airbnb. I stayed with Maribel for 2 nights in May. It was a wonderful experience , she was so friendly and very helpful. Everything as described, great location close to Atocha station . A 2 bedroomed apartment in a block , with 24 hour security on the door and pool and padel in the courtyard.  Lovely feel to the apartment with a nice terrace to relax on. I would definitely stay with Maribel again when in Madrid and would highly recommend her. Maribel was a fabulous host! She was very generous, kind, and overall just such a sweet woman. The apartment was extremely clean and the bedroom opens up to a beautiful terrace that feels like a quiet retreat--while being centrally located in Madrid and walking distance to all of my destinations. She provided food, drinks, advice, and her company. I Highly recommend staying with her! Staying at Maribel's was an excellent choice. The apartment is beautifully decorated and super clean, in fact, the cleanest I have ever seen.  There is a great terrace, pool and gardens in the complex. The apartment location is close to the main attractions and the Renfe Station.  Maribel is a very generous woman and a great conversationalist. I recommend this  place highly. Thank you Maribel for your hospitality!!! Maribel is one of the best host I met in Airbnb. She is very kind and friendly. We have great talk and share a lot.

Maribel prepare a detail arrival instruction that I can reach her house easily. And She know much about Madrid, where to visit, shop and transport. I really love to stay there.Maribel is one of the best hosts I have had doing Airbnb. She made me feel so welcome from the moment I arrived. The apartment as a large terrace that is quite and gets the midday sun and is an extension to the bed room. There's a pool in the complex which is really clean and refreshing. Her apartment is 10 mins walk from the central station so close to the centre of Madrid. A female travelling alone the area felt very safe. I when I travel to Madrid again I will definitely looking to stay with Maribel again! Thank you for such a great weekend. One of the best Airbnbs I have ever visited. It was a wonderful experience staying with Maribel. Even though it was pretty late when I reached, she took the time to explain and show around the home, gave me a map and literally drew a route map for me. The suggestions were very useful - I could do all the non touristy stuff. She even told me which roads to take so I could experience the culture Madrid has. Her suggestions were far better than (Hidden by Airbnb) trips.

AnnabelleMaribel has a very nice place near the Atocha station which is one of the major train and bus depots in Madrid. Her complex has a wonderful park in the middle of the buildings which includes a swimming pool which was really nice with the heat wave that hit us while I was there to cool down at the end of a hard day of touring. It also has a tennis court and fantastic and well kept garden and grounds. Maribel's flat is super clean and well maintained and met all my needs and more due to the terrace she has out back which was nice to relax and have a drink when the sun went down. Maribel is extremely knowledgeable about her city, Madrid and really went out of her way to help me plan my touring routes and provided exceptional inside tips about terrace viewing locations around the city that I otherwise would not have known about. The real highlight for me was her recommendation to see the performance of Sara Baras at the Teatro Nuevo Apolo. The interpretational Flamenco was tremendous and I will never forget it. Thank you Maribel for recommending it and taking care of me while

Maribel is a very active host and is a great person to stay with if it is your first time in Madrid. She is clearly very passionate about the city and is eager to offer advice of what to see, how to get to places, etc. I already knew the city very well, but still enjoyed chatting with her over a few meals. Staying at her place was much like staying at a true bed and breakfast since she bought an assortment of breakfast foods for me to help myself to in the morning. She was also kind enough to offer me some homemade paella one night for dinner. If you are more of a relaxed traveler and like to spread out or limit your daily site seeing, her place is also a great option since there is an awesome balcony area and a shared pool for reading/tanning/relaxing. Over all, I'd definitely recommend. Great guide to the city! I had a great stay, thank you so much Maria!Maria's place is beautiful, tranquil and immaculate and you could now ask for a better host.  She is friendly and genuine and she takes care of every detail from the practical through to those little touches that really add to the experience. This is better than a hotel in my opinion, the same exceptional quality but with the addition that you feel you have your own oasis in the city especially made for you. Don't hesitate to book! Thank you again Maribel for all the care you took, it was a memorable trip.Maribel's house is immaculately clean, organized, and well-kept. If you stay here, make sure you are tidy and respect the space!

I really appreciated that Maribel went to the trouble of buying breakfast items for me and gave me some options to choose from. (A nice way to start each day.) She also gave me great recommendations for sightseeing in Madrid. I was very glad to have her map with me or I would have missed out on some incredible side streets and vistas.

Finally, Maribel is extremely outgoing and talkative, and I enjoyed learning about her life and picking up some new Spanish words along the way.

¡Gracias Maribel!Fantastic stay.  And the terrace, my goodness, the terrace.  Excellent location (10-15 min walk to The Prado), safe to walk around at night, wifi is great, the bed is comfortable, and the hostess knows Madrid like the back of her hand.  And my goodness, did I mention the terrace .... lovely place.This is a true perl. Such an amazing hospitality, perfect location, cosy apartment/room and above all the cleanest place I've ever stayed in. Absolutely recommended.西班牙的最后一站马德里有幸住进了Maria的房子｡Maria是一个非常耐心､细心､友善的房东,从入住前到入住指导以及退房都给予了详细的指引｡入住当天她还非常热情的给了我一张旅行地图,跟我讲了半小时马德里应该怎么玩､如何坐地铁､如何找好吃的､购物场所｡还贴别贴心的给了我当地交通卡,服务特别周到!Maria的家干净整洁､美丽有品位､交通便利､安静没噪音,离24小时穿梭机场巴士走路十几分钟､离地铁站步行8分钟内可达,十分便利｡很可惜我在马德里的时间短暂,还没有时间一一玩遍所有房东介绍的景点,下一次再来深度游时,还会选择这里｡性价比超级高的房子(房价还包含免费早餐哟)､服务特别贴心的美丽房东,让旅行中的你有家的温暖｡Maribel , tiene un departamento muy lindo y muy cuidado , lo que realmente es muy apreciado cuando decides estar un en lugar compartido . Todo está impecable y es muy luminoso., muy bien ubicado y tal cual cómo se muestra en las fotos . Maribel es una persona muy linda y especial , muy comunicativa y preocupada por tener todo perfecto . Muchas gracias Maribel !Maria’s place is a gem. About a 10 min walk from Atocha station and 7 min from the yellow line. Convenient for those taking the AVE train for day trips. She orients you with a map on your first day, with tips on what to see. She is a lovely host who cares about your well being. It was lovely to chat with her at the end of the day. Thanks Maria for your hospitality!O espaço da Maria Isabel é muito bonito, bem decorado, extremamente limpo. Ela é uma excelente anfitriã, que gosta de conversar e mostrar os pontos a se visitar na cidade. Foi bastante atenciosa e sempre deixou pão, manteiga, água e iogurte disponível para café da manhã. Gostei bastante da estadia, o único ponto negativo foi o sinal de Wi-Fi, que não era muito bom no quarto.Estancia muy agradable, Maribel es muy detallista y te hace sentir como en casaThis place is pretty cute! It’s right next to the train station, but the closest main attraction is about a 20min walk away. It is well decorated and very clean! 

Maribel was an okay host: she was helpful in guiding me around Madrid by giving me a detailed map and metro card. She even provided some breakfast food, but made me feel bad when I didn’t eat it. If you’re wanting more of a private stay, this is not the place. The host constantly held me back to talk when I made it clear I was going to bed or going out. She tried to get way too personal with me, which is not the roll of an Airbnb host. The worst part was she made very inappropriate comments about my ethnicity. I felt uncomfortable in this Airbnb and would not recommend if you want to have a relaxing stay in Madrid.El apartamento de Maribel está impecablemente limpio y con muy buena ubicación. Maribel ofrece hospitalidad y consejos sobre rutas y sitios turísticamente interesantes en Madrid. ¡Muy recomendable si viajas solo!I had a wonderful time staying at Maria's home in Madrid. The location is close to a lot of metro stations and walking distance from the centre. Maria will give you tons of local tips along with a week explained map with routes. If you are fond of walking, then she will give you much more valuable tips. Home is neat and very well done. Stylish and thoughtful touches. Thanks again.Muy buena ubicación (zona residencial, pero cerca de varios lugares de interés), el lugar IMPECABLE de limpio y Maribel una maravillosa host, te ayuda con tips de la ciudad, te presta una tarjeta de transporte e incluye un desayuno continental. Sin duda recomiendo este lugar!Clean place in a great location close to the Prado museumSuperb host, Superb location and great serviceMaria is really adorable. She has made me feel at home and really cared about me. She helped me with booking a taxi, giving me tips, landing me her travel card I could recharge for a few days. The flat is exceptionally clean, and well located for those who need to stay near the main station. The neighbourhood is nice and I found it safe. A big thanks again to Maria!

The apartment is amazing! Very modern, stylish and sparklingly clean. 3 min walk from the metro station and 15 min by metro away from Sol. Before our arrival Isrrael sent us messages about the weather and transpiration tips from the airport. Big thanks to Isrrael and definitely would recommend this flat to anyone who’s traveling to Madrid.Best AirBnB experience so far! The whole apartment was great, clean, tidy, spacious room with a private bathroom ... like a 5 star hotel! :) I definitely recommend. Isrrael was a great host, kind and professional. He even wait for us until 2AM, because our flight was delayed 2,5 hours. Thank you for your hospitality, we will definitely come back! Best regards from Serbia!Isrrael  ha sido un perfecto anfitrión , sus respuestas han sido rápidas y sus informaciones muy útiles. El apartamento está situado en un barrio muy tranquilo y muy bien comunicado, rodeado de todo tipo de tiendas y supermercados. Muy cómodo y muy bien decorad QQIssreal is a great host ! He responded quickly when I was trying to find my way to the appartment, welcomed me really nicely and gave me tips about where  to eat. His place is very clean, with brand new furnitures and the flat has everything you need.Es muy acogedor.Isrrael est un très bon hote, tout était parfait. L'accueil et les aménagements de la chambre étaient très bien. Il y a également un bon emplacement.El alojamiento de Isrrael está muy bien ubicado, cerca de estaciones de metro, supermercados, restaurantes. Muy céntrico y a la vez en una zona muy tranquila. El apartamento es muy acogedor e Isrrael una persona muy  amable. Sus respuestas son siempre rápidas y de gran ayuda. Por todo esto , esta es la segunda vez que me alojo en su casa.Increíble ubicación, a dos cuadras del metro y te puedes mover por todo Madrid e Israel una persona súper linda y amable, sin duda lo recomiendo muchísimo, gracias Israel por toda la hospitalidad y atenciones,.

La habitación y departamento súper, un estilo increíble, todo excelente!!

Me volvería hospedar ahí sin duda !!!Nice, clean place that's close to the subway. Would stay here again!Isrrael is very friendly and attentive host - customer focused.
I arrived for some seminars in the morning and Isrrael was very helpful and very flexible with check in and check out . 
Great place! 
Location: walking distance to the city centre and easy access to metro and buses. Shopping next door. 
State: Clean and quiet place. Modern, beautiful design.
You will have your own room with separate bathroom (Italian shower). Everything is spacious. New quality furniture, comfortable bed (ca. 140cm). Netflix TV, WiFi with good speed. 
General: I stayed 10 days st Isrrael's place. In the middle Isrrael friendly suggested to change my blankets . 
By my departure (in the evening) Isrrael allowed me to leave my luggage and even helped me to order a taxi. Even more he helped me to bring my luggage to the taxi .
I definitely would recommend Isrrael as a host and his place for discovery of Madrid.


IApartamento con estilo, bien ubicado y muy limpio. Excelente fin de semanaIsrrael was so nice and the apartment was lovely! Everything was perfect!Isrrael ha sido un maravilloso anfitrión, buena comunicación en todo momento con él, tanto para el check-in como otros detalles relativos al alojamiento y es muy amable y simpático.
Respecto a la habitación, no puedo decir más que es uno de los mejores sitios donde me he alojado, muy tranquila y sin ruido y con todo tipo de comodidades. Mi puntuación de 10, repetiría otra vez sin duda.Mi piace molto questo appartamento, la camera bellissima e  pulita molto con un bagno privato. La posizione della casa molto tranquilla,  vicino il metro e l’autobus, il padrone molto simpatico. La prossima volta che verrò a Madrid, lo prenoterò di nuovo.  Le camere sono tutte bianche, che è il mio stile preferito.
L’acqua della doccia molto caldo, ci sono shampoo e gel doccia, anche asciugacapelli. Tutto perfetto ! ! ! !Muy buen lugar para alojarse

Highly recommend Very well located, clean and modernDepartamento amplio, limpio, bien equipado y cómodo ideal para familia de 4 personas. Realmente superó nuestras expectativas. Clean, modern, and located in a very popular part of town.  Very quiet building. This is a really nice apartment in an absolutely fabulous location, within walking distance of sites, restaurants, museums and the train station, as well as Metro stops. 100% recomendable Sergio's apartment has it all: location, family size, amenities and great taste.
I highly recommend it for any traveler that wants to explore Madrid.
Amazing value for the money!No duden ni un segundo en rentar este piso.

Impecable, moderno, buenos aires acondicionados (tanto en las 2 habitaciones como en la Sala-Comedor). Amplia cocina, con todo lo necesario, incluyendo lavadora, heladera grande,  equipos nuevos. Cuarto de baño impecable, moderno. Distribución súper funcional. Excelente cobertura wi-fi. Camas súper cómodas, sábanas y toallas limpias y suaves. Excelente iluminación.

Pero lo mejor, sin duda, la ubicación, walking distance de absolutamente todo y en el centro de la ciudad, y el anfitrión, Sergio, pendiente del más mínimo detalle para que la pases excelente.

He rentado por AB&b en Toronto y Chicago y confieso que tenía un poco de temor en Madrid, pues viví ahí del 93 al 96 y los pisos no eran muy modernos ni funcionales en esa época.

Sin embargo, este piso superó todas nuestras expectativas. Volvería a quedarme en él con los ojos cerrados.Great place and valueWe stayed, a family of 2 +3 children, for 5 days in August.  The apartment is wonderful !  Not big but well designed, maintained, clean, comfortable  and mostly -  located in the middle of all the most fun atractions in Madrid.  
Sergio was very helpful and attentive long before we arrived (Incl. helping us checking in earlier than planed).  There are great places to eat & drink and just under the apartment and at the near plaza.  
 We'll be happy to return to this lovely apartment with or without the children :-)I live in Manhattan and I am a discerning traveler. This apartment was absolutely stunning. It is newly renovated, nicely furnished and central to anything you'd want in Madrid. I traveled with my 67 year old Mother as well, and everything about the apt made it easy for her to get around.

You won't find a better value for the quality of the apt and location. Highly recommended!The apartment is centrally located close to a variety of restaurants and bars and within walking distance of the main sites and museums. The apartment itself was modern spacious, had air con and very clean and we were met on time. Would certainly recommend!Sergio's apartment is in a fantastic location. Great restaurants, tapas bars,
markets, jazz clubs - are nearby. The apartment is very quiet, comfortable, clean and elegant. The  large walk-in shower is a plus as are the dishwasher and the washing machine. We look forward to staying here again!
MaryEl apartamento es excepcional. Ubicación perfecta y excelente comunicación!!! 
Lá passamos muy lindo y vamos volver seguro!!! Muchas gracias.We had a great stay at Sergio's apartment. It is exactly as advertised - modern, spacious and in a fantastic location. Very central and close to restaurants, pubs, sights, etc. lovely apartment. Sergio is always available if you have any needs. We enjoyed ourselves here and recommend it highly!!Excellent location, high quality furniture, clean and professional. You can tell they do this for a living because it is run professionallySergio est un hôte dont on peut que rêver. L'appartement - un des meilleurs dans lequel nous avons pu séjourner lors de nos divers voyages. Super central, parfait pour découvrir cette magnifique ville de Madrid. Seul bémol: légèrement bruyant dans l'une des chambres à coucher, qui donne sur la place, le week end si vous avez l'habitude de dormir la fenêtre ouverte ( une fois celle ci fermée on dort comme sur un nuage) mais c'est un prix qu'on serait prêt à repayer pour bénéficier d'un tel accueil, d'une telle position, et d'une telle qualité d'appartement. Impeccable, nous espérons y retourner bientôt. Merci!This place is great! Perfect location, clean, nice view of a placa. Sergio was quick to communicate. La ubicación es inmejorable y se puede llegar a todos los sitios turísticos de Madrid caminando. Sin dudas es una excelente opción para una estancia en la bella Madrid.L'appartement est parfaitement situé pour profiter des différents quartiers et attraits de Madrid à pied. Nous y avons passé un agréable séjour.
Nous n'avons pas rencontré Sergio et n'avons pu le joindre personnellement car le numéro de téléphone qu'il nous a communiqué n'était pas le sien mais plutôt celui d'une agence de location (c'est ce qu'il nous a semblé). Donc, pas d'arrangement possible pour laisser les bagages jusqu'à l'heure de notre vol, le dernier jour.La ubicación es inmejorable para aquellos que buscan un ambiente de fiesta y buenos restaurantes. El apartamento es ideal para familias o grupos de amigos que quieren alojarse en una zona céntrica de Madrid.

La distribución de las habitaciones, la tranquilidad del edificio, la proximidad a Sol, Plaza de España, zona de restaurantes... lo hacen una buena elección para pasar unos días en Madrid.
Sergio's apartment is modern, fresh, sparklingly clean and in a fantastic location. Communication was always prompt and finding the apartment/checking in was very easy.We really liked our stay at Sergio's place. The apartment is very well designed and furnished. The location in the heart of Madrid made our stay an amazing experience. Sergio's flat is absolutely wonderful, light, warm and clean, and right in the heart of Madrid. It is very well set up for families or for a couple, and has excellent modern furniture, a great shower, and an elevator! The location could not be better, in calle Huertas, close to the Prado, the Puerta del Sol, and so many bars and restaurants, as well as having supermarkets nearby. Sergio was a great host and communication and assistance with any requirements was very fast. I would thoroughly recommend Sergio's place.La ubicación es excelente, el barrio muy hermoso con acceso a todos los lugares de interes.
Cercano al apartamento hay supermercados, restaurantes y lo que precises.
La persona que nos recibió no nos ha dado mucha explicación del funcionamiento de la casa.
Tuvimos inconvenientes con algunos faltantes de cosas para cocinar, trapos de cocina, etc que debimos comprar nosotros porque aunque avisamos la situación no se han contactado  para solucionarlo.
El agua para bañarnos, éramos 4 personas,y no tardábamos más de 5/10 min en cada ducha, no alcanzaba, debíamos esperar unos minutos para que se cargue de nuevo.
El apartamento no tiene calefacción, solo aire frío /calor y tarda bastante en época de invierno en calentar.
Por el resto la estadía ha sido muy buena, el apartamento es tal cual se muestra en las fotos y la coordinación de la llegada ha sido perfecta.
Solo recomiendo estar atentos a esos detalles.
La vista desde el apartamento es preciosa!Brilliant location, a 5 minute walk from Plaza Pueta del Sol and 10 mins from Plaza Mayor. Felt very safe in this neighbourhood. The apartment was clean and comfortable, good electronic shutters to block out light at night. Was fairly noisy all night but to be expected in a city setting. Small supermarket nearby, bike rental 2 minutes away and plenty of bars/cafes and restaurants. Overall a great stay.Logement impeccable, trés bien situé , proche toutes commodités (shop, restaurants , metro, visite) je recommande cette appart' pour un voyage paisible à madrid en famille ou entre amis !! Excellente semaine pour nous.Sergio à été au petits soins pour nous !El apartamento de Sergio es precioso, muy bien decorado y con todas las comodidades para pasar unos días como en su propia casa, la ubicación es inmejorable estando a pasos de puerta del sol y en una zona muy animada llena de restaurantes y bares. Hubo muy buena comunicación con Sergio y sin duda lo recomiendo porque lo tiene todo. Saludos y hasta pronto!!Allez-y les yeux fermés ! 
Sergio est un hôte en or, superbe appartement, proche de tout bref TOUT PARFAIT ! Nous avons passé, avec nos 4 enfants une excellente semaine. Je recommande +++This place was beautiful and very central. Check in was on time and the person that walked us in was very kind.  The apartment was spacious. Towels were available, beds were comfortable, wifi was good and the kids had TV to be entertained. A bit of crowd noice on Saturday night by the master-bedroom but not enough to be a concern for us. The rest of the nights were quiet. Restaurants all over the place in walking distance. Transportation available right around the corner. Our only issue was the dust when we came in, I think there might have been a gap between guests and therefor the dust film.  Overall what a great location and beautiful apartment, would recommend.Central location. Very clean space. Would definitely recommend.Great apartment in great location with great host!Perfect sized apartment for our trip. Well decorated and immaculately clean.

Quick walk to the centre of lovely Madrid and around the corner from a metro stop if you want to go any further.Location is one of the great features of this apartment, everything accessible within a short walk.  Tons of restaurant close by.  Sergio was of great help to us when we had to change our arrival time due to a change of flights to Madrid. Sergio was very quick to answer all our questions and help us whenever possible.We liked the location and appartment.Great location!Our family had a heat stay in Sergio’s apartment. The location is very central to everything! The apartment was clean. Esta inmaculado y los muebles han estado elegidos con mucho gusto. Fue une experience muy agradable ! 
ENGLISH: For those of you that want to be in the heart of Madrid, enjoy the lively center and its restaurants/bars while enjoying an immaculate and really agreeable flat, I recommend Sergio's one. It was a really great experience for me and my family.

FRENCH: Si vous souhaitez pouvoir vivre au coeur de Madrid, profiter de ce que toute la vie animée du barrio de Las Lettras peut vous offrir, l'appartement de Sergio est pour vous. C'est un appartement très propre, conforme aux photos et qui est meublé avec goût !The apartment was very clean and nicely furnished. The beds were comfortable. It’s in a clean and easy to use building. It’s located in a very happening area. Lots of night life, plazas full of cafes, shopping, etc.  

You can easily walk to the major sights: the big three art museums, Gran Via,, Plaza Mayor, Royal Palace, etc etc.

Sergio agreed to meet us for entry an hour before regular checkin to drop off our bags, which was very helpful. Unfortunately the apartment had not been stocked with some basic supplies which Sergio said were usually there. He made efforts to provide them promptly but our sightseeing schedule made it hard to coordinate. It will probably be fine in future. But do note that there are very few staples for the kitchen; only salt and sugar when we were there.Great stay at a modern, stylish apartment in Madrid. Brilliant location and Sergio was very helpful.
ThanksExcelente departamento , ubicacion inmejorable, todo bueno !!Fantastic location, great apartment and views onto Plaza del Angel.I highly recommend staying at Sergio's place. The location is 20/10.  The street is very quiet and lined with trees and everything you need in one street. Just around the corner would be 2 amazing plazas: Sta Ana and Portal Angel where there are many restaurants and cafes. Very near would be Sol, Plaza Mayor, and 2 metros. The room and apartment itself is very modern, chic and functional. From the usb sockets, to the electric shutters.. little things like these help! Finally, Sergio was very responsive and understanding. I was not able to meet him but he was amazing as a host.In general - a modern, well equipped  appartment in a convenient location.
Should pay more attention to cleaning of capets and the functionallity of bathroom sink (drainage) and air contitioners - dusty filters.The place is spick and span , location is very central , very comfortable

Indudablemente recomendable ;)Excellent location and family friendly.   Better than expectationCentrally located, walkable to most of the must-see in Madrid. I absolutely recommend this apartment to everyone visiting Madrid. Great value for money! Thank you Sergio!I highley recomend

Todo muy bien con el apartamento de Sergio, muy bien ubicado y como en las fotos, muy agradable nuestra estancia, todo lo necesario. RecomendadoEl departamento es tal como aparece en las fotos, la ubicacion es buenisima se llega pie a todos lados y la puerta del sol esta muy cerquita. A pesar de estar en un barrio bullicioso las ventanas sellan todo el ruido. Hermoso, volveria sin dudarlo.Wonderful location This lovely apartment is in a wonderful location, overlooking a garden shop and Plaza del Angel, and steps away from Plaza de Santa Ana. It is within walking distance of The Prado, the Royal Palace, Puerto del Sol and the Atocha train station. The apartment was very clean and well equipped. The apartment is also very well equipped with a confortable living room, a well equipped kitchen, a good size bathroom and a bedroom with a conformable bed. El lugar es tal cual se presenta en las fotografías, pero ya en vivo tiene mucho estilo y de la atención de José Antonio está atento a las cosas que le preguntas, responde rápido y es muy atento, un espacio totalmente recomendable. // A totally cosy space, with a lot of style and where you can feel as comfortable as at home; the location is unbeatable,just a few steps from the Gran Vía, the Plaza del Sol, shopping centers, restaurants, bars, theaters, metro stations, among others. The place is as it is presented in the pictures, and José Antonio is really attentive to the things you ask, fast answer and is very attentive, totally recommended.The apartment is a great spot very well located in Madrid! Its spacious, clean and Antonio definitely a Superhost!Fantástico apartamento muy céntrico. José Antonio ha sido muy rápido y muy atento a la hora de comunicarse por si teniamos alguna duda. Repetiria sin dudarlo :)Très bel apartment  idéalement situé pour visiter Madrid.
Nous n'avons pas croisé José Antonio mais il a très bien organisé notre arrivée et était très disponible par message.
Je recommande cet apartmentEine wunderschöne Wohnung! Mit viel Liebe zum Detail eingerichtet und an einer tollen Lage. José Antonio hat uns herzlich empfangen und war immer sofort zur Stelle, wenn wir Fragen hatten. Vielen Dank!! <3

comments:
Nice, clean, and vibrant apt with great amenities (4 bathrooms, new washer/dryer). Gran Via is a bustling, popular area with a lot going on nearby. 

Maroco was a great host and very helpful with recommendations, directions, etc. He responded very quickly to my messages and is a super nice guy! Would definitely recommend. We really enjoyed the flat!! The location is perfect to enjoy the city, with your own space to return to afterwards. And the view from the balconies is stunning. Maroco is the perfect host. Volveremos pronto!!This place looks exactly the way it does in the pictures. Maroco is a great host and has a great place. The place is so clean and has plenty of bathrooms that you are not intruding on anyone at anytime. The cleaning lady came everyday I was there and she is super helpful as well. Maroco was on vacation while I was staying there but he always responded to my text and checked up on me to make sure everything was ok. If you plan on staying in Madrid, this is the place to be. It is centrally located, has wonderful AC( a must if you come in the summer!), reliable WiFi, a large elevator and very spacious kitchen. It is so comfortable that I found myself having trouble to get out and enjoy the city! :)Muy buena ubicación! la experiencia impresionante! y Maroco estuvo siempre a nuestra disposición ayudándonos y ofreciéndonos buena información para movernos y saber que ver. Muchas Gracias por todo! 100x100 recomendado! Saludos!!!Great place. Great host. Great location. I just have positive things to say about Maroco.This is a fantastic place to stay with a very central location and plenty of character in a lovely old building. Maroco and Flavia were excellent hosts, couldn't ask for more, thank you guys. 
The property is calm , cool, clean and really well equipped for a short or long stay. 4 nights was not enough. 

2 very happy holiday makers. La ubicación de la habitación es perfecta! Esta en pleno corazón de Madrid y accesible a los medios de transporte, es muy limpia y tiene un pequeño balcón muy lindo.
Maroco es muy buen anfitrión, nos apoyó en todo lo necesario en nuestra primera visita a esta ciudad ....  100% recomendadoMaroco es muy amable nos dirigió para llegar a su piso y estuvo pendiente de nuestra llegada, el piso estuvo muy limpio, y esta súper bien ubicado definitivamente les recomiendo a este anfitrión 房间明亮舒适,房东热情,并且很注意隐私,平时很少见到｡地段很好,靠近市中心非常方便,值得推荐｡Excelente lugar, bien ubicado cerca del metro y del centro de Madrid. Hasta para ir al aeropuerto desde ahí es muy simple tomando 1 solo camión a 600 metros. 
La habitación muy limpia y cómoda. Nice place! I love this house!

Al llegar el anfitrión no se encontraba allí, nos abrió la puerta de la vivienda el portero del edificio. Nos llevó a la habitación y al ir a cerrar la puerta nos dimos cuenta de que la cerradura estaba rota. Contactamos con el anfitrión y nos dijo que tardaría más de una hora en llegar, que dejáramos las cosas y que nos fuéramos, ya que nunca pasaba nada. Al parecer un grupo anterior había roto la cerradura y no habían solucionado nada. Le dijimos que queríamos salir ya que habíamos llegado a las 20h, y que queríamos aprovechar el poco tiempo que teníamos. No nos da solucion otra vez más, solo que perdamos mínimo una hora esperándole, que dejemos las cosas en su estudio cuando llegasen. No queremos dejar las cosas en la habitación abierta ni en su estudio porque tenemos documentación y cosas de valor. Le pedimos que nos cambie de habitación y dice que es imposible porque todas están reservadas, y que si queremos lo que podemos hacer es irnos de su casa(todo esto ya de malas formas). A esto le siguen (Hidden by Airbnb) s de aún peores formas. Literalmente nos deja en la calle, más una lucha continua para q nos reenbolsara el dinero de la reserva. Él no asume el cargo de Airbnb.
Una experiencia para olvidar.Maroco's place is perfect for your stay in Madrid. It's right on Gran Via, a top shopping street in Madrid with lots of restaurants close by. The apartment is large with 7 bedrooms, shared bathrooms and common areas but very clean. Loved that there was a washer & dryer available for laundry. There's A/C throughout the apartment and the wifi works well. If we could've we would have stayed longer. Great option for exploring Madrid. We had an amazing stay thanks to Maroco. The apartment is very central, clean and comfortable. I would surely recommend this place to everybody who wants to have a great time im Madrid.
Thanks Maroco !A great place to stay for friends and groups! We only had one bad thing at the end when someone tried to pickpocket us right outside the apartment but we had a wonderful stay.es un apartamento espacioso, con áreas comunes impecables y muchos baños con agua caliente (5 si mal no estoy) en otra época es evidente que debió pertenecer a la aristocracia madrileña. MUY COMODO Y BIEN EQUIPADO.  MARAVILLOSA UBICACIÓN!! CERCA A TODO. las habitaciones si no tienen televisión, pero quien va a ver tv? se va es a concierto Madrid. muy próximo al metro de la gran vía y el Callao. fácil acceso. gracias maroco por tu acogida.  إقامة جد رائعة في مكان أروع.. قريبة جدا من جميع المجالات التجارية (شارع Gran Via) ماروكو لطيف جدا.. أوصيكم بها جدا.Tout s est très bien passé avec et chez Maroco. Séjour très court mais très apprécié.Lo mejor la localización. Marco ha contestado todas nuestras dudas super rápido. Limpio y cómodo. Sin duda repetiría :)best location in townVery good locationSéjourner chez Maroco c’est être au bon endroit au bon moment: hôtes sympathiques, qui sont toujours prêts à faciliter votre passage; bon emplacement de l’appartement, séjour (Website hidden by Airbnb) recommande fortement!주방에 커피와 핫초코 등 다양한 마실거리들이 있어서 아침에 간단하게 식사를 하고 티타임을 가질 수 있어서 너무 좋았습니다. 또한 체크인 도와주시는 아주머니께서 영어가 잘 안되시지만 이쁜 웃음으로 최대한 노력하시면서 친절하게 알려주셔서 너무 감사했습니다 :)
마지막으로 공용 욕실과 공용 화장실인데 되게 많이 있어서 골라쓰는 재미(?)가 쏠쏠했습니다. 강추합니다 ㅎㅎMuy recomendable, tiene una ubicación buena, limpieza impecable, buena calefacción, las camas son cómodas... Los baños también! que decir, ha sido un placer!El alojamiento está super bien muy acogedor y Maroco muy amable 
La experiencia de mi hija y mia, excelente.  Está en pleno centro de Madrid cerca de todo , la ubicación es excelente.  Colchón y almohada muy cómodosLa atención es amable, el lugar estaba ordenado y limpio, la habitación estaba súper bien. Hay otras habitaciones y por ello tenía temor de que al ser baño compartido tuviera problemas con ello, por tener que esperar y eso, pero en realidad me sorprendió porque habían varios y todos estaban limpios y con lo necesario.Todo genial, la verdad la felicidad a la hora de la llegada y la salida, la cantidad de elementos a disposición de todos los inquilinos, la ubicación, los balcones... todo muy bien. Recomendado hospedarse aquíSegunda vez y no será la última, genial todo, calidad precio-imbatibleVery clean and nice location! Bedroom was private and shared spaces were clean. Perfect for what we needed!If I have to go to Madrid again, I will go to Maroco's place, sure!Great location. Beautifully clean, friendly and perfect facilities for traveling. It made being in Madrid easy and you can really feel part of the buzz of the city thanks for a great stayExcelente servicio, mucho mejor de lo que esperaba. ¡La localización increíble y cómodo!Inmejorable localización, buena limpieza pero sin sábanas...Great accommodation in a great locality!Strongly recommended!Son muy atentos y amables. En todo momento hemos tenido su ayuda y su atención. 
Volveremos eso es seguro.Gracias por todo, me encanto el detalle del café, la ubicación es realmente fantástica, los baños sin problemas y todo muy limpio.
Sin duda regreso. Recomendable

No es en realidad el concepto Airbnb (familiar) pero es muy agradableMuy buen lugar, la habitación es súper amplia, muy limpio todo, los baños son impecables, me encantó la cocina está súper bien dotada con todo lo que uno requiere para estar cómo en casa. 

La ubicación es perfecta, Maroco estuvo súper pendiente. Me recibió Julio de la portería, demasiado amable siempre atento a lo que necesitará.Un espacio habitacional increíble, en un lugar de Madrid increíbleDifficult to get a hold of someone. Parking is outrageously expensive.Jesteśmy bardzo zadowoleni z pobytu u Maroco. Wszystko było zgodne z ofertą. Na pochwałę zasługuje bardzo dobra komunikacja z gospodarzem, prowadzona za pośrednictwem komunikatora na Airbnb. Wszystkie nasze ustalenia zostały w pełni zrealizowane. W naszym pokoju i całym mieszkaniu było czysto i miło. Kuchnia była bardzo dobrze wyposażona.
Musicie liczyć się z tym, że w pokoju nie ma klimatyzacji, a spanie przy otwartym oknie jest trudne z powodu dużego hałasu dochodzącego z Gran Via.Super bueno recomiendo este sitio

amenities: {TV,Internet,Wifi,"Air conditioning",Kitchen,"Paid parking off premises","Buzzer/wireless intercom",Heating,"Family/kid friendly",Washer,Essentials,Shampoo,"24-hour check-in",Hangers,"Hair dryer",Iron,"Laptop friendly workspace","Self check-in",Keypad,"Hot water","Bed linens","Extra pillows and blankets","Pocket wifi",Microwave,"Coffee maker",Refrigerator,Dishwasher,"Dishes and silverware","Cooking basics",Oven,Stove,"Long term stays allowed","Paid parking on premises"}
comments:
El apartamento es mejor de como se muestra en las fotografías. La localización muy céntrica, en una zona muy agradable para salir a tomar algo, ya que está llena de terracitas. Nos recibió Sira, muy agradable. El único inconveniente es que no tiene ascensor y si vas con bebe como nosotros es algo incómodo. Para una escapada en pareja perfecto!the apartment was in a very nice area centrally located. We stayed in Fifi's flat for five nights. The communication was fast and clear, even though due to no fault of the host, there was some confusion around the booking. 

We were allowed flexible check in and check out and Fifi's friend, Sira, waited for us even though our flight was delayed. She picked us up from the metro station, which was really kind of her. Sira also came to take over the flat when we checked out and was available to answer our queries during our stay. She was both friendly and informative. 

The flat itself was new, clean, stylish and of high standard (the shower is great!), and the best thing about it was its location (you can really walk everywhere and the surrounding area is lovely). 

There are however couple of things that could definitely be improved. Firstly, there is no internet (and yes you can get free wifi outside, 100m away, in the square, but it is a nuisance and we ended up just using internet on our phones and paying roaming charges, which after 5 days turned kind of expensive). 

Secondly, the kitchen lacks a lot of the things you would expect in a home such as coffee and tea making facilities (there is a coffee machine in the pictures that is clearly no longer there), knives (the only ones in the flat are butter knives), chopping board, wine opener, tea towels, pots and pans (there is only one huge pot), there is also nothing there in terms of salt, pepper, oil, tea, coffee, sugar, etc., (so the usual things you would expect to see in an air bnb flat). 
One good thing about staying in an air bnb flat is that you can 'live like a local', so buy groceries locally and cook yourself a meal, or just have a nice cup of coffee at 'home', which in this flat was impossible. 

Then, there is attention to detail, so things that don't cost much but make life easier, such as hand soap in the bathroom, hair dryer, extra blanket, information about the neighbourhood (none of which were in the flat).

Finally, the flat is kind of dark, there is not much natural light, so you end up having the lights on in the middle of the day. It did not bother us, but if it is the Spanish sunlight you are craving, then maybe this flat is not for you.

So in summary, even though the space is very stylish and new, the overall experience could definitely be made better by making it more like a home and less like an empty hotel room. And yes, wifi really is kind of a standard these days, so that should also be addressed.Una atención excelente.
El ático es muy acogedor y dotado de todo lo necesario para hacerte sentir cómodo.
La dueña estuvo siempre disponible para facilitarnos todo lo que necesitamos y resolver cualquier duda.
Fue un detalle el poder convenir sin problema la hora de llegada y de salida.
Recomendable 100%. Repetiré sin dudaUnkomplizierter und schneller e-mail oder sms Kontakt; nette Mitarbeiterin oder Freundin die sich zum ein- und auschecken nach meinen Zeiten richten konnte, mir gute Tipps gab zum Stadtviertel La Latina; auch noch Kneipen, Plätze und den Weg zur U-Bahn zeigte; das Apartment ist gepflegt, sauber, stylish, hat Charakter und ist mit allem ausgestattet was man für ein paar Wochen braucht und liegt natürlich äußerst günstig. Hatte eine gute Zeit dort. Anunciaba el apartamento con aire acondicionado y era un simple ventilador. Es un ático por lo que hacía un calor insoportable de modo que tuvimos que abandonar el apartamento una noche antes de lo previsto y buscar otro alojamiento sobre la marcha. A pesar de todos los inconvenientes que nos causo y de haber anunciado algo que no era real, sólo nos devolvió la parte proporcional del dinero. Me siento engañada, no lo recomiendo para nada.Thank you for the positive airbnb experience. This apartment is in the heart of Madrid. We did a short day break on leaving Spain and the apartment is well suited for a couple and it can also fit a small family. All the facilities are as described. It's a short walk to anywhere in the historic centre from the doorstep. The host was also communicative and the entry and late arrival was really assisted.We have been 4 friends during 3 days in the super-well-located and nice-designed Dina's apartment : all was perfect (NB: dividers inside the flat are thin and translucent, but it was ok for us).

Dina were really helpful and kind with us during check-in and check-out.Dina's place was just what we need for our stay in Madrid. The location is excellent. 

It's clear that it's an apartment only for vacation rental, but it has everything we needed and was in mint condition. 

It was easy with key handover and communicating with DisaGreat location, Great and Well organised flat managed by a precise and accurate person. Highly recommmendedExcellent, clean and stylish apartment in a very central location. I could not recommend this apartment any higher. Dina was also an excellent host providing instructions to the apartment and a very informative itinerary. Thanks Dina. Un ático precioso. Tiene de todo. La reserva y la estancia fueron perfectas. Creo que es ideal para parejas. Está en un barrio muy bonito de Madrid. Dina es una anfitriona atenta y amable.The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.Muy buena comunicación con Dina y David. El apartamento es limpio e igual a las fotos mostradas. La ubicación en La Latina es inmejorable.Fantastic location close to the metro. Great restaurants and coffee shops nearby. Apartment was very clean and had all the amenities we needed. I stayed at Dina's apartment with my boyfriend for a whole week. I received the key from her friendly neighbor and that was totally fine. The apartment is very cozy, small, but perfect for a couple! The barrio is very beautiful and you can easily walk to Plaza Mayor and Sol. I didn't meet Dina in person and we didn't really need any help, but she seemed very friendly. I would definitely recommend Dina's atico!Verhuurder reageerde direct op mails. De routebeschrijving was duidelijk. verhuurder had geregeld dat we opgevangen werden bij aankomst. Verhuurder heeft een map aangelegd met gebruiksaanwijzingen van alle apparatuur die in het appartement aanwezig is. Er is ook wifi.
De buurt is leuk: in het hartje van Madrid, vlak achter de Calle Mayor en de mercado Michel. Huis is wel wat gehorig: zowel buren zijn goed hoorbaar als het verkeer en het uitgaansleven. 
Het appartement is niet groot, maar voorzien van alles wat je nodig hebt: keukentje, bank, tafel met stoelen en een goed bed, goed sanitair. De ruimte is cosy (zolderkamer), wel wat donker. Er is wel voldoende kunstlicht aangebracht. De 'balcony' waarover gesproken wordt in de advertentie, biedt geen 'buiten': het is niet meer dan een raam.
Keuken is goed in te koken, ijskast ruim en een afwasmachine aanwezig! 

Alojamiento estupendo para pasar unos días en Madrid. Pequeñito pero totalmente equipado!Un piccolo, moderno e accogliente monolocale in pieno centro della città. La proprietaria è molto gentile e lo consiglio a tutti coloro che vogliono godersi questa magnifica città. Thank you Dina! We loved staying at Dina's place. It is in a great, central location. It is within walking distance of every popular site and it is surrounded by lots of great restaurants. Dina's place is very cute and chic. It was the perfect size for us as a couple.The host canceled this reservation 23 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.Very close to La Latina area which is awesome. Dina was not in town but neighbour Javi helped with excellent tips for restaurants and place to go. Wifi is fast. Bring your own dryer.The apartment is very close to the cathedral and to the royal palace. 500m from Plaza Mayor.
We really enjoyed staying there. It is very cosy, and comfortable for 2 person, but I would not suggest to book for 4 person (maybe with 2 children it is OK). It could be small.
The apartment is nice decorated as you can see on the pictures. It is quiet, we have not heard much noise from the street.
Un emplacement idéal au coeur de la ville. Un adorable petit logement dans un immeuble plein de charme.Dina's apartment was a great place to stay in Madrid! 20 minute walk to the Prado museum, a couple minutes from the palace, and tons of cafes in the square just up the hill. Would definitely stay again. El apartamento de Dina está muy bien ubicado, cerca de la latina y sol. Tiene todo lo que aparece en las fotos, solo la división entre el baño y el dormitorio es un poco limitada (puerta deslizante). Sin embargo, para una persona es más que suficiente. Ella estuvo siempre atenta para ayudarme con la logística de entrada y salida.WOW.  This place is roomy, beautiful, clean, and so comfortable.  It's the type of place you'll want to stay in every time you're in Madrid!  
The location is perfect - a super short walk into the city centre, Plaza Mayor, Clle Cava Baja area for tapas, El Rastro market, San Fernando Market, Palacio Real, etc. etc.  
The area is nice and quiet, but also feels really safe.  
Dina is extremely helpful and quick to respond, and was so helpful to make sure I had a great stay (despite the major flight delays I had!).   

Thank you so much - my Madrid experience would not have been the same without you and your place!The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.Super experiencia en Madrid!
El ático es muy lindo, la ubicación inmejorable y la comunicación con Dina fue muy eficiente.
Recomendado!!Una estancia perfecta. Todo tal y como se describía, y Dina super simpática y atenta.Dina was a very good host and the communication before and during the stay has been very good. The apartment is in a very good location, close to many great restaurants.
The standard of the apartment was a bit lower then expected. Especially the toilet, we were expecting a more private location in the apartment and with a better door which could be closed properly.
Overall we have enjoyed our stay and recommend Dina as a host.My mom and her friend stayed there. All good except for bed which they said was not great and the toilet which is approximately 20cms from their head on the bed so not the nicest thing to have in a home.Precioso piso, excepcionalmente bien localizado y un trato excelente por parte de Dina. 100% recomendable.muy cerca de todo, la casa está en perfecto estado y Dina ha sido super!Fantastic experience. Nice, clean apartment on a quiet side street. Very close to many attractions, restaurants and the metro. Dina was very helpful with local recommendations as well. I would gladly stay here again.L’appartamento è piccolo ma carino, non è adatto a bambini e a chi non è molto in confidenza con l’altra persona. La posizione è buona. Unica nota negativa l’acqua calda, il boiler non funziona sempre.Dina flat is nice and perfectly located in the center of the city. Dina is very helpful and friendly. Very recomended to visit and enjoy Madrid center.This is a great space!  Dina's open-plan attic is in a fantastic location in La Latina, in a quiet street.  We had 2 beds set up for the two of us, which was great and there's enough room for a couple of people to stay very comfortably.  Entry and exit where really easy and we had everything we needed!  Thanks Dina!We spent 4 perfect days and nights at Dina's apartment in La Latina. Great location and nice vibe in the house. We felt super comfortable !! Also communication with Dina was very easy and quick! Thank you!!Un sitio estupendo, recomendable. El único punto a mejorar es la falta de privacidad entre baño y dormitorio. Es una pequeña puerta corredera de plástico, a través de la cual se oye todo.
Por lo demás...Fantástico!

amenities: {TV,Wifi,"Air conditioning",Kitchen,Heating,Essentials,Hangers,"Hair dryer",Iron}
comments:
Todo genial! Los dos muy atentos con todo..ademas hubo retraso en nuestro viaje ,nos esperaron y fueron muy amables!
100% recomendableEl piso es igualito que en las fotos. Muy limpio. Nos recibió Cata a nuestra llegada. Muy agradable y servicial con nosotras. Piso 10 con todo tipo d detalle. Volveremos sin duda. Gracias por todo.Rubén es un anfitrión muy atento y dedicado, en todo momento hubo una gran comunicación para la hora de llegada y para cualquier cuestión que pudiese surgir. 

El piso es una pasada, totalmente reformado y con una gran elegancia con lo que te hace estar súper cómodo en el lugar.

Al principio la ubicación puede resultar de poca confianza pero realmente es todo lo contrario. Es un barrio humilde de gente mayor y gente trabajadora con mucha educación. Realmente esto nos ha sorprendido mucho ha sido una experiencia muy agradable poder charlar con gente de la calle que no conoces. En los locales de alrededor te tratan genial. 

En la zona hay bazares chinos en los que poder hacer compras rápidas y varios bares y cafeterías para poder almorzar chocolate con porras etc... 

Sin duda una pasada de lugar, seguro que repetimos.Rubén es un excelente anfitrión.., amable y servicial.

amenities: {TV,Wifi,"Air conditioning",Kitchen,Heating,"Family/kid friendly",Washer,Essentials,Shampoo,Hangers,"Hair dryer",Iron,"Hot water",Refrigerator,"Dishes and silverware","Long term stays allowed","Host greets you","Paid parking on premises"}
comments:
El apartamento está muy bien para dos personas que sean pareja, todo muy nuevo. De hecho, lo hemos estrenado. La ubicación inmejorable para conocer Madrid.I would definitely recommend Shay’s place if you want a clean and central (within walking distance) location to all the major attractions yet on a quiet street.Great place to stayWe were really well received by the responsible of the place (Christian), who was also available at any time in case of doubt. At the end of our stay, he was also so kind as to let us leave our luggage in the flat after 12:00. Very kind as not all hosts are that flexible! The apartment is in a good location as it is in the city center, close to Plaza de España. The apartment is modern and has been recently refurbished. Very nice, as in the pictures! It is great for two people, maybe a bit small for 3 or 4, but still ok. The weakness stays in the lack of light, as it is situated on the ground floor and is fully interior. Furthermore, the smelling of the building (and therefore the flat) is quite unpleasant. This is nobody's fault though but is a bit of a pity. Great value for money.  This is a great place to stay. The appartment is very nice looking, easy to reach and priced good. It's a great location to start from; almost everything we wanted to do was on walking distance. For the activitys farther away, the subway is very close.
The host is hard to reach by phone, but responds fast if you use the airbnb app. There were a few small problems with our stay, but the host was fast and correct about solving these. 
Was a really great experience! 
 The house is located in a really comfortable area of Madrid And very central.. the host was nice and helpfull

The apartment was really nice. A great location in a nice neighbourhood and walking distance to the city centre. apartamento limpio y con mucho gusto.
repetiremis en proximas ocasionesA really lovely apartment in a great area. 6 of us stayed for a night and we found the apartment had everything we needed, was clean, well decorated and had enough space for us all.

It’s near enough to the centre to walk and find lots to do but far enough to avoid the noise at night. Dani met us on arrival and was really helpful and friendly, he even helped us with our bags for the next day which was much appreciated! He also gave us some tips on where to eat etc locally.

If you’re planning a stay with a few friends it’s perfect!Es un piso bonito y céntrico pero le faltan detalles por mejorar: es un piso bastante caluroso, le vendría bien instalar aire acondicionado. The door of toilet even can’t lock. In addition, the host requested to visit the apartment for twice during our stay.Dani's apartment is in a perfect location and is an impeccably clean and stylish. Absolutely loved it ! Would come here again .This the perfect location to visit madrid, the flat is fantastic including  all the amenities you need for a perfect stay, walking to distance to Plaza Espana and the subwayThe apartment was super clean, super stylish, super new and extremely comfortable. Dani was a great host, he came out and met us when we arrived because he knew we’d have trouble navigating the Madrid traffic. He bought us breakfast for the four days we were staying there. Even though we said we didn’t need a microwave, he insisted on bringing it in case we needed them. He also had great tips for the local areas and responds within minutes no matter what question or concerns I had. Dani was a great guy and a pleasure to be around overall. 

As for the apartment itself, honestly we have nothing to complain about, it was clean and stylish. And that’s not even the best part, the location is what makes it awesome. Most places are within walking distance. We rented a car cuz we were in Barcelona prior to Madrid. But we didn’t use our car at all while we were in Madrid.

Highly recommended!因為這間浴室臨時出狀況,所以我們臨時被更改到另一個公寓住所,地點很方便,房子也很乾淨,唯獨每天半夜樓下都非常的吵,導致無法好好睡覺,很可惜,但這與房東無關,他是個非常好的人Dani is thoughtful and the house is perfecr.房东很好!房子位置也非常好,出行方便｡Great location, newly renovated space and very responsive hosts.

The only downside is that the bathrooms are extremely small and highly inconvenient!La estancia en el piso de Dani y Andrea no ha podido ser mejor. Tanto la propia vivienda, recién reformada, súper bonita y muy práctica, como su ubicación. Está en pleno centro pero sin ningún ruido. No cabe duda de que volveremos!!!Прекрасный дом в самом центре Мадрида! Идеальное размещение)Fin de semana con amigos visitando Madrid. Apartamento espacioso y muy bien decorado. El detalle del aparcamiento, un lujo tratándose de Madrid. El anfitrión, Dani, siempre muy atento y disponible. Recomendable.Lovely host and conveniently located.Great location, lovely apartment. We only spent one night but would have like to spend more time here. Andrea was very patient and friendly, had good communication with hosts through AirBnb. Though it has lift access, the lift stops between floors, so not wheelchair accessible.Excelente. Buena ubicación, el apartamento es exactamente como sale en las fotos! Muy recomendado!Salimos encantados del apartamento, para repetir sin duda!Andrea & Dani’s place was great. Comfortable sleeping arrangements, multiple bathrooms and very stylish and charming apartment. They gave amazing suggestions for local restaurants and activities. The apartment was very spacious and clean! Location was also great with all the “spots” within walking distance.

Only issue was WiFi was not working and there are different Airbnb regulations that make the check in process a little more thorough than what we were used to. 

Regardless of any issues above, we would definitely be back. Highly recommend!Hi everyone! I enjoyed my staying here:) The flat is located in a lively neighborhood, very quiet at night and walking distance to the very center of Madrid. The flat is renovated with style and spotless. Have a great time!Apartamento muy bien amueblado, confortable y veraz respecto a las fotografias.
Muy bien ubicado para ver la zona centro de MadridEl apartamento está muy bien, bonita decoración, cómodo... aunque el baño es un poco agobiante. La comunicación con Dani fue buena.El departamento esta impecable. En excelentes condiciones y el beneficio del parking es muy conveniente. Esta muy cerca del centro de la ciudad y de noche no se escucha el ruido urbano, por lo que es muy cómodo para el dacansoThe place is great and everything was fine till we had to check out, the host didn’t show up and he was supposed to refund the parking (48€ for 2 days), it has been 5 days and still nothing and no answers from him since we left...The stay was amazing and a wonderful experience.El apartamento de Andrea & Dani tiene una locación maravillosa, y está muy bien equipado para pasar unos días muy cómodos y con acceso a una zona estupenda de la ciudad. Tiendas, supermercados y cafes accesibles. La comunicación fue muy dinámica y no hubo ningún inconveniente a la hora de hacer la reserva o localizar el lugar. Recomendado¡Todo Perfecto!! El apartamento muy espacioso y todo muy limpio. 
La comunicación con Dani muy rápida y son muy amables.
La ubicación genial. Para repetir.Tal cual indica el anuncio, 5 personas se alojan estupendamentegood

comments: Kevin was a really thoughtful and friendly host. His apartment is really modern, clean and has an amazing view over Madrid! He gave great advice for our adventures, thank you Kevin!Beautiful, well designed apartment two steps from the Pacífico Metro station. The place offers both discretion (separate bedroom and bathroom) as well as community (very friendly, social and helpful host) - whatever the guest desires.The whole flat is bright and modern. We especially enjoyed the rooftop terrace. The room is very well furnished and has a beautiful enclosed bathroom. Everything was clean and in best shape. Kevin was also a great host. We had everything we needed. The location is also good. Very close to the subway station. We would definitely stay at Kevin’s Airbnb again!

comments:
Todo perfecto.ubicación, piso y sobre todo el anfitrión.100% recomendable.gracias Jesús por todo.El anfitrión nos trató en todo momento con mucha delicadeza y atención, siempre dispuesto a ayudar en lo que nos hizo falta. La descripción del piso era totalmente fiel a lo que nos encontramos cuando llegamos al piso. Muy acogedor, limpio y agradable. Zona muy céntrica, con una supermercado a 30 segundos del piso, con muchos bares y restaurantes al lado y a pocos minutos de las zonas con más ambiente de la ciudad, un lujo!El sector era muy agradable y seguro. El supermercado estaba muy cerca y habia un ambiente muy agradable para disfrutar. El apartamento fue muy comodo. El wifi no funciono correctamente durante nuestra estadia. Jesus fue atento y nos ayudo con indicaciones sobre la ciudad y las cosas por hacer. Jesus es un excelente anfitrion y rapidamente nos hizo sentir en casa. Fue rapido para contestar a nuestras preguntas y siempre estuve al pendiente que nada faltara. El apartamento esta en magnifica localidad. Hay mucha vida y todos los servicios a unos cuantos pasos. Todo bien ordenado y con los muebles necesarios para estar confortable. El precio es un poco alto comparado con otros apartamentos igualmente equipados y semejante (o mejor) localidad. Si Jesus le baja un poco al precio, este apartamento es ideal para pasar una buena estancia en Madrid. The host canceled this reservation 17 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.Jesús es una persona correcta y disponible. Algunas cosas deberían ser mejores en la casa, pero en general la estancia fue agradable.Appartement idéalement placé dans Madrid, conforme à l'attendu.
Dommage qu'il manque les éléments de première nécessité. Et attention, le bruit n'est pas du tout toléré dans l'appartement.

comments:
La estancia en la casa de Gonzalo ha sido inmejorable para nosotros. Aparte de la ubicación que a nivel personal nos venía perfecta, la comunicación con él ha sido genial en todo momento y ha estado pendiente de nosotros a lo largo de la estancia para que no nos faltase nada. Las vistas de la habitación y el salón son muy bonitas, entra mucha luz por el día y de noche ver la iluminación de esta parte de Madrid ha hecho que durmiésemos en varias ocasiones con las persianas subidas. La limpieza era impoluta y no faltaba de nada tanto en la cocina como en el baño. Recomendable sobre todo si se viaja en coche, aunque también hay buen servicio de autobuses. Pasan bastantes taxis por la zona así como uber. Nosotros, lo recomendamos. Gracias por la atención Gonzalo :)GONZALO muy buen anfitrión y el piso totalmente recomendableHi very goodMuy buen trato con los huéspedes, la casa estaba impecable,muy buena disponibilidad a la hora de contactar con el anfitrión,preocupación en todo momento por nuestro bienestar. Un 10 a nuestra estancia allí.Mi amigos y yo (3) hemos estado en el apartamento de Gonzalo 11 días durante nuestras vacaciones. El apartamento es una verdadera perla. La cocina está equipada y al igual que el salón, son lo suficientemente grandes para estar muy cómodos. Las habitaciones son una maravilla. El apartamento cuenta con una sala de baño dentro de la habitación de matrimonio y otra en el pasillo, lo que nos vino bastante de bien. Las vistas son una maravilla y El Barrio es muy tranquilo y muy bien comunicado con el Cercanías, los autobuses y el metro a 2km. Gonzalo ha sido un buen anfitrión que se preocupaba por cualquier cosa. Le agradecemos la estancia y seguro que volveremos a su apartamento. ¡Muchas gracias!Excellent location and awesome host.
Thank you Gonzalo!Gonzalo fue un anfitrión excepcional. Recomendable 100%Huis is echt heel schoon alleen de tweepersoons bed vond ik aan de kleine kant mooie locatie mooie aansluiting oo het openbaar vervoer.El piso de Gonzalo está genial, todo nuevo, limpio y en perfectas condiciones. Hemos dormido muy bien y nos hemos sentido como en casa. Sin duda, repetiremos cuando volvamos a Madrid

comments: Lara’s place is wonderful. It looks exactly like the photos. 5 minute walk to the closest metro station and about 20 minutes to the city centre. It was very clean and a great place to base myself in madrid. I would definitely stay here again!We where 6 night in Lara's apartment and this was the best airbnb apartment that I experienced! It's location is just 5 min walking from the metro station, across the building there is a big supermarket, the house is fully equipped with a big tv, cofee machine, dish washer, laundry machine, microwave and oven. The leaving room is very comfortable with a big dining table, bathroom is well designed and better than any hotel, bedroom is big and comfortable. And I cannot forget the outstanding design of the apartment by Lara that was very nice and gave us good tips and was available where ever we needed to ask a question.  Aa I told to Lara, this apartment and hospitality made our trip in madrid!The appartment is nice and clean. The communication and welcome were very good. I would definitely recommend this apartment.El piso de Lara es tal y como se muestra en las fotos, cumple con todos los servicios y es muy confortable. Hemos estado encantados!!! Muy bien ubicado en zona céntrica, tienes varios supermercados y bares alrededor. Cuando teníamos alguna duda sobre algo nos comunicábamos con Lara y rápidamente nos ayudaba. Es el mejor en el que hemos estado y nos fuimos hasta con pena de el.
