Me encantó el piso de Jorge, estuve muy comoda, es tan y como se ve en las fotografías, sin duda volveréUn appartement idéalement situé, proche de stations de métro et de l'axe principal de Madrid. De plus l'appartement est décoré avec beaucoup de gout. (à savoir qu'il se situe au 4ème étage sans ascenseur !!!) Le gros point négatif fut lors de notre arrivée, nous avons attendu 1 heure pour qu'une personne de l'équipe My Mad Madrid arrive faire le check-in... Puis à l'arrivée, le ménage n'avait pas été fait lors de la sortie des précédents voyageurs... 
Malgré une arrivée très décevante, l'équipe MMM est restée disponible et soucieuse quant à notre séjour. Je recommande ce bien !Ubicación magnífica! Inmejorable!!! Muy cómodo, cada habitación con su armario, perchas de sobra, cajones limpios... las camas bastante cómodas (si te gustan los colchones firmes), y ningún ruido de la calle.
La ducha es un poco pequeña e incómoda, no creo que alguien grande quepa.
La única pega es que es un cuarto piso sin ascensor pero la escalera es tan bonita que se te olvida.
Volveremos sin duda.Definitely recommend this place! Amazing location, and clean apartment. 10/10El piso es tal y como se ve en las fotos. Esta genial y tiene una ubicación increible para hacer turismo. Totalmente recomendable, el unico inconveniente las escaleras pero merece mucho la pena alojarte en el piso.Piso sencillo pero muy bueno. Una vez que salvas el 4° sin ascensor tiene todo lo necesario para una buena estancia. Pequeño salón-cocina con lo imprescindible, dos habitaciones cómodas, con unas camas muy buenas, y un baño funcional. Limpieza correcta. En general lo que se ve en las fotos, veraz. La comunicación perfecta y al instante, y la situación perfecta para el «ocio madrileño de moda». Muy recomendableEl apartamento es exactamente igual que en las fotos. Pequeño pero no incómodo; limpio, cálido, práctico y céntrico. Para nosotras resultó perfecto. Totalmente recomendable. No dudaríamos en repetir.Nice on a very good location, everything went really smoothly!It is in the center of Madrid. I didn’t know the area but it was an amazing choice, close to Gran Via and metro, also Royal Palace. I will definitely stay again if I go to Madrid again! Communication with the owner is really easy and they know English well. 1 min walking distance to supermarkets and metros. Perfect placeEl piso esta en un barrio muy animado y a unos minutos a pie del centro y de todos los monumentos y plazas famosas de Madrid.
En el piso había todo lo que necesitabamos.
Aunque no lo necesitamos , nuestro anfitrión estaba muy disponible y nos respondía rápidamente.
No hay ascensor y es en el 4 piso pero necesitábamos hacer un poco de deporte con todo lo que habíamos comido.
Muchas gracias por todo.
¡Hasta pronto!Buena localización y el piso està muy bien cuidado.Lo mejor: la situación es muy muy buena. Si se puede criticar algo: es un 4 piso sin ascensor que es bastante frecuente en edificios antiguos del centro de Madrid; cuando llegamos nos recibió una señorita que nos enseñó lo que necesitábamos saber del piso..tenía todo lo que anunciaban salvo el papel higiénico...(que si llegas apurado como fue el (Website hidden by Airbnb) un pequeño problema) y la última cosa es que la ducha es taaaaan pequeña que si mides >1.90 o pesas >85 kg es difícil entrar....
Pero vamos,que calidad-precio está bien! Podría volverMuy recomendable. Volveríamos a repetir.Fantastic location and great cozy place with all the amenities you need for a few nights in Madrid. The small touches (like the coffee machine) were quite useful and the ease of communication was very helpful in planning our stay. Recommended if you want a place nearby Gran Via and all the shops and restaurants nearby within walking distance ;-).Todo perfecto!. Limpieza, trato, no faltaba ningún detalle y ubicación inmejorable!Tutto perfetto appartamento silenzioso e centrale fantasticothe receptionist demand 25euro for check after 21pm which is not the 15euro as discussedEin tolles Apartment, ideal für 2 Paare. Gemütliche Betten, ein gemütlicher Wohnbereich, praktisch ausgestatteter Küche. Es war sehr sauber. Check-in und Kommunikation mit der Gastgeberin verliefen wunderbar.

Die Lage ist kaum zu übertreffen: Mitten im Ausgehviertel, aber trotzdem ruhig. Unzählige Restaurants und Bars in der Nähe. Das Zentrum und die beliebten Sehenswürdigkeiten sind fußläufig erreichbar. 

Ich würde unbedingt noch ein mal buchen :-)Very enjoyable stay thank you, great location!!!This is a great 2 bed  appartment for exploring Madrid. Clean and easy to get to and location culdn't be better. It is on the 4th floor so be prepared for the climb up as no lift but good for fitness. Would return.

Thanks

AnthonyThe location of the apartment is perfect. I stayed with a friend and my friend and I walked everywhere except when it rained too much and then we caught the metro.
It’s very straightforward to get from airport to apartment via metro with two line changes and a short walk.
Although the apartment is quite small, it is very well equipped - especially the kitchen.
Very comfortable beds and pillows, and it’s very quiet too.

Things to be aware of:
1. Up four flights of steps - good to walk off all that tapas!
2. The hosts (name I still doubt know even though I asked several times) is quick to answer questions via Airbnb app but when I checked in the person didn’t speak English so it was hard to ask questions.
3. The space in the bathroom is very squeezie. If you are a larger person you may have trouble  getting into he shower or on the toilet.

This apartment really is in a top location. It’s very clean and quiet and sunny too. I loved it!Recomendado 100%Excelente!!Apartment was as shown in the picture, clean and well equipped. The location was very central and close to many good restaurants and bars. The shower is tiny though, so big guys might wanna reconsider!Appartamento silenzioso e pulito, ottima ubicazione a 5 min dalla metro Callao. Arredamento moderno. 4' piano senza ascensore, ma ne vale la pena!Ótimo local e bem limpo.
Tudo funcionando e novo.O box é muito pequeno mas o chuveiro é ótimo.Foram muito atenciosos e responderam rapidamente a nossas dúvidas.
Fomos surpreendidas pela escadaria não tem elevador e 97 degraus com mala subir e descer achamos complicado.
O resto tudo ótimo.GrataZeer goed mooi gelegen appt. in rustige straat. Overal restaurants en winkeltjes. Metro vrij dichtbij 3 min. lopen. Services van Airbnb agent goed (spreekt geen Engels). Maar het is rustig en prettig. Appartement op 4e verdieping zonder lift. Goed en schoon appt. Maar de lift is in aanleg!일단 위치가 진짜 좋았어요!
번화가에서 살짝 골목쪽에 있어서 너무 정신없고 시끄럽지도 않고 적당히 여유있고 활기있는 동네였어요! 그란비아거리, 솔광장, 마요르 광장, 마드리드 궁전 등 웬만한데는 다 걸어서 다닐 수 있었구요.
여기 안지냈으면 몰랐을 동네 로컬 카페, 레스토랑들도 너무 좋았어요.
집도 깨끗하고 키친에도 요리해먹을 수 있게 완벽하게 세팅 되어있구요.
단지 여기가 4층, 한국으로 치면 5층인데 저희 갔을때는 리프트가 공사중이라 무거운 캐리어 들고 올라가야 했다는거 빼면..ㅋ 관절 안좋으시면 일단 리프트 공사 끝났는지 확인하고 가세요ㅎㅎㅎ
그리구 여기는 드라이기가 없어요.  참고하세용Realmente increíble el departamento. Estaba súper limpio el departamento y muy bien ubicado, walking distance de todos los atractivos principales de Madrid. Lo único que mejoraría de la estancia es el acceso al departamento. Se supone que es en un 4to piso pero realmente se suben 5 pisos en escalera. Para buena noticia, creemos que están haciendo un ascensor, si es así volveríamos SI O SI a alojarnos ahí.El apartamento está céntrico y muy bien
Recomiendo el apartamento. La ubicación es genial, el piso estaba limpio y el trato de cara al cliente muy bueno.

El piso es igual que las fotos, volvería sin duda a alquilar el apartamento.Great value for the location. It's near two metro stops and in a great area for nightlife. However, this does seem to be a small company running a business, and it is not your traditional Airbnb where you'll meet the owner and be super well received upon arriving. I.e. it's more of a hotel than an Airbnb - if that makes sense. We were greeted by someone who clearly did not want to be there. For some reason there were five keys for two doors, which caused some issues.This place was absolutely amazing! It is a renovated 2 bedroom apartment and was absolutely beautiful. One thing about it is that it is on the 4th floor but they are installing a lift so carrying heavy bags up won't be a struggle for much longer.

The host was also very communicative and would respond to any questions we had within minutes. I really appreciated that as we had a part of our trip unplanned and the host helped us fill that time with some local suggestions. 

All in all I would 100% stay here again. I would want to live in this apartment. It was also close to 3 different metro stops so if you don't want to walk to your destination, there are so many route available. 

Thanks Again!La ubicación es inmejorable. El apartamento es fiel a las imágenes. Las camas son cómodas y hay espacio suficiente para cuatro personas. La ducha es muy pequeñita y no permite mucha movilidad.The service and answer were amazingly fast and efficient. Almost immediate answers. Stairs are a bit of a struggle after a long day and shower is really tight but the rest was perfect. Nice, comfy with all the due ammenities. I recommend this flat and the customer service behind. Had a great stay and the location is perfect and very centrale. Enjoy your stay in Madrid. Departamento pequeño pero funcional, si eres un poco grande no te lo recomiendo porque la regadera está diminuta. Ubicación muy buena para caminar por la ciudad y muy limpio.
Cuando esté listo el elevador será genial, tuvimos que cargar nuestras maletas 4 pisos.A really nice little apartment in a very cool suburb. There are plenty of things to do right at your doorstep. The building the apartment is located in, is very quiet and peaceful. 
We really enjoyed our stay there.Recomendable! Limpio y agradable, la verdad que en general ha estado muy bien y ha sido tal y como esperaba. Un detallazo que nos dejaran dos copias de las llaves.localización inmejorable y el piso es tal cual en las fotosNo hay asensor...para subir las.maletas es difiicil.The location of this apartment was perfect. Two blocks from Gran Via shopping neighborhood. The pictures and description are accurate. It was also a quiet apartment as it is not facing the street. 

Checking in is not ideal as they have someone bring the keys to you and you need to provide an exact arrival time. If you are caught in traffic or your flight is delayed then you will probably need to reschedule a checking time. Also, there is many flights of stairs if you have big luggage it is difficult to carry up and back down.

The host messaged us the next day to provide recommendations and also to make sure the apartment was good.

Overall, I would recommend if you want a safe neighborhood and quiet place to sleep.Piso limpio y comodo! La ubicación es perfecta.Apartment is on 4th floor and no elavator.

also room is small also height of selling is also less.El apartamento tiene excelente ubicación y cuenta con dos habitaciones, pero solo una de ellas tiene aire acondicionado, lo que podría ser un problema en el verano. 
Actualmente, no funciona el ascensor y son cerca de 100 peldaños para llegar al cuarto piso, lo que lo hace no recomendable para personas mayores o con limitaciones físicas.
El baño es el punto más complicado: es muyyyyyyy pequeño, ducharse es una tarea complicada, principalmente se uno tiene más de 1:80m o sobrepeso.
Recomiendo para los que los peldaños y el baño pequeño no sean un problema.Pas d'ascenseur avec un appartement au 4ème étage !
Manque cruel d'insolation sonore dans l'appartement (on entends les discussions des voisins).
Appartement bien placé dans madrid mais plutôt décevant en terme de qualitéHope the elevator could be repairedThe lift is small and awkward to get out of but everything else was great.  It will be a perfect spot when the lift to the fourth floor is in action - not long now.El piso es exactamente como se indica. Hay un poco de todo lo necesario para pasar unos días. Todo genialGreat area to stay in and the apartment was great.Ubicación insuperable. Apartamento bonito y cómodo.A lovely apartment in a great location. The shower is very small but apart from that there is enough storage and space.great value for money, location spot on, very cleanHermoso departamento muy buen ubicado y limpio. Muy Recomendable.Muy buena ubicación, apartamento correctoVery nice apartment. Centrally located and very good value for its priceEverything was good apart from the check in process. Stood on the street for 20 minutes before being let in by the cleaner who was just arriving to clean the place (at 7pm). Had to leave our bags and leave the apartment to be cleaned. Not ideal after coming in from a flight. However we were told it was due to a problem with the previous guest checking out late, but at least let me know. Todo nos quedaba cerca caminando, 
A mi familia y a mi nos gustó mucho, si volviéramos a ir a Madrid, elegiríamos el mismo apartamento.This place was just as presented. Finding it was easy. Just be very precise with arrival time and keep them updated. The location is outside all the chaos. So the night is peaceful. You are blocks away from local bars and coffee shops. Everything is pretty walking distance. The building also has an elevator installed so no worries about too much luggage.Un experiencia increíble en este apartamento. Estaba todo impecable, nos sentimos como en casa. Es un piso moderno, muy bonito y súper cómodo. Recibimos un trato insuperable por parte de todo el equipo, repetiremos sin duda!great location for exploring Madrid.For all intents and purposes, this place is as described in profile.  It's far from the set up of a fancy hotel and much better than most hostels.  The apartment was clean.  Very clean.  The layout left much to be desired but no one goes to Madrid to hangout at the place they are staying so it gets the job done as far as a place to sleep.  My biggest issue was the bathroom.  It is tiny. I strongly feel that normal sized people can not comfortably fit in the shower or on toilet.  The bathroom is clearly the original design of when the building was constructed, and if you've ever traveled to Europe you know that most buildings are old and their bathrooms are not designed roomy like many modern American restrooms, of where I live.  I traveled with my parents and they chose not to venture in the shower by the second day because it was dangerous for them.  Using the bathroom was something I also did not generally look forward to. The shower is enclosed by 2 sliding doors with a tight opening of about 2 feet, and is on a bit of a platform, and opens up right near the toilet, with little room to position yourself when getting out or in.  A bad slip off that high shower and our vacation would be over.  I am both slim and flexible and I had trouble using it, doing very best not to touch walls, door, or not fall.  There are no shelves in the shower so trying to lean or bend over to pick up soap/shampoo was VERY difficult.  Everything else in the apartment was as described in photos and description.  
The host was kind enough to accomodate an early check in.  The check in was easy after a call was made.  A worker from the hostel across the street was nice enough to call the host using the landline which got the greeter to open door for us, as she passed us up when she first arrived.  (This same worker, who has nothing to do with this Airbnb was also kind enough to arrange for a taxi cab pick up when we left.)
It was easy to communicate with the host over Airbnb and they were very responsive. 
The location was convenient with a short walk to the main street Calle Gran Via.  Also right by the stop for the hop on/hop off bus tour, which was super convenient.
I went during a holiday week so The price was high.  Much higher than I wanted especially for an Airbnb, and the whole bathroom issue, but decided to move forward with it because it was too late to look for a hotel. 
Beds are memory foam and comfortable.  Pillows are good.  
Living room couch fabric has seen better days.El departamento es muy lindo, tal cual se ve en las fotos. Las camas son super cómodas, el baño está muy bien y hay de todo para cocinar (aunque horno solo microondas) . La ubicación es perfecta, se puede ir andando a todos lados. Hay muchos cafés, bares y restaurantes en la zona. Me volvería a hospedar aquí sin dudarlo. La atención fue muy buena todo el tiempo, comunicación fluida. Super recomendable.  Lo único malo es dejar MadridGreat location, not the best communication with the host.Lovely apartment in Madrid in a great location. Within walking distance of everywhere we wanted to see!Good location, quiet street in an interesting area. The person letting us in (the cleaner) was over 1h20m late, and I had to hassle the management company during this time for updates. There’s no where to sit outside and with poor communication we had to sit in the street the whole time. This put a dampener on our trip. The apartment was v v basic. As noted by another guest the shower is awkward and you have to be careful getting in and out. Wouldn’t stay again.Thanks for hosting during our trip to Madrid! I will be completely honest, the location of this apartment was amazing, very close to Gran Via, Plaza del Callao, Plaza del Sol and so so many shopping and eating options, it will be hard to find something similar in that area within that price range BUT (there’s always a BUT) the place was disgusting, so so so dirty, from the dusty dishes to the extremely dirty floors, to the walls and even the linen. I would recommend Mad Madrid to deep clean the apartment before a guest arrives! Communication with the host was not good, our phones were not working because we are from the States and we didn’t have WiFi so when we got to the building we didn’t know what floor to go or which door to knock, it was very confusing because there is a hostal on the second floor. We were very lucky that a couple on the first floor shared their WiFi with me so that I could message the host! It took them about 10 minutes to answer but to us it felt like a day since we had been taking planes for over 20 hours. I would recommend Mad Madrid to tell people in advance the exact location of the apartment in the building (4th floor, to the left when you exit the elevator), the gate code at the entrance of the building and even the WiFi name and password so that people can connect from outside of the apartment and communicate with the host. We had a problem with the water heater on day 2, and sent him/her (we don’t even know the gender of this person since they sent a friend to give us the apartment keys) a message and it took him/her about 10 hours to respond, that day we could not have a hot shower in the morning. BTW the shower is very tiny, I would say that a person that weights +230 pounds will not fit in the shower so please keep this in mind, we were all average sized people and had no problem but I can see some people I know not being able to take a shower there. Overall I will give them 3 stars and will let go of a secret this location holds... THE ROOFTOP!!! They don’t mention it in the apartment description but please go up there if you stay at this location, it’s amazing view of Madrid will take your breath away!Let me start with the positive part. The apartment is in a very beautiful old building with old stairs but recently provided with an elevator. The location is superb in a nice neighborhood (Malasaña) close to restaurants and cozy bars. The apartment is nice but I wouldn't want to stay there with 4 adults unless you only use it to sleep. The sound isolation is very very poor. When I arrived the neighbors had a party and played music with a very low bass which made the wineglasses in my apartment shift from the shelf and fall on the floor. When I contacted the organization who let this apartment to me they told me that I should have booked a hotel instead of an AirBnB. People are allowed to make noise till 10 PM they said. But this was not noise, this was literally if you were in front of a stage. When I swept the floor to get rid of all the broken glass pieces I noticed the floor was not clean as well. I made pictures of all. Furthermore you can literally hear what the neighbors say also when they are finished in bed. As written in earlier reviews the shower is tiny. It takes some practice to enter and exit it for a normal size human being and there is more water coming out of the shower hose then the shower itself.Host established by themselves the check in time, then also the host was late. There are 2 reasonable size bedrooms and a smallish bathroom.  The living/kitchen area is also quite small but manageable.  My friend and I were only staying for the one night so did not need anything bigger. It is clean and tastefully decorated and has all the things you need should you be having a short stay in this wonderfull area.  It is close to a lot of local bars and cafes and would provide the prefect base for exploring all the eclectic experiences Malasana provides. As the apartment is relatively small I would perhaps recommend for a couple or perhaps 2 friends but no more as you may find youself on top of each other. The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.Great apartment, the best host! Sonia's place is located roughly 3 mins from Plaza del Sol, next to a cool Irish Pub, supermarket, pizza shop, bars, restaurants, cafes, discos (it has great insulation and soundproofing as well)...you won't need to take public transportation at all, everything is at walking distance and it's an enjoyable walk as well :-) We were welcome by Michelle's warm smile and he was available everytime I needed to ask something (it didn't happen much since like I said, it's a great location). Overall, I would highly recommend this place, our room was tidy and gracefully decorated, the whole place is lovely, and there's a good music system in the living room for those who like chilling while listening to some tunes there. I was hoping that our experience would be a more personal experience with a young couple in Madrid. However, that was not the case. The apartment is run more like a hostel with multiple rooms being rented out. Many people (at least 6) had to share one full bathroom, so there was often a wait in the morning. Luckily there was a lock on the bedroom door so we felt safer with people constantly coming and going. With that being said, Miguel was very friendly and nice when greeting us very late at night when we arrived, and the apartment was clean and centrally-located. Viaje con mi pareja a un cuarto privado y desde el principio Abi se manejo con amabilidad, nos ayudó a llegar (de todas formas es muy fácil dado a la excelente ubicación), nos facilitó las llaves por mas que el no se encontrara en el departamento, no nos invadió en ningún momento y nos sentimos como en nuestra casa, respondió todas nuestras dudas muy rápido. 

En cuanto a la habitación, es muy espaciosa, nos brindo toallas y sabanas, no se escucha el ruido de la calle, el baño limpio (si hay algo que criticar igual es que un baño estaba fuera de servicio, por lo tanto había solo uno para las 3 habitaciones alojadas), te permite usar heladera y horno. 

En conclusión es altamente recomendable y a muy buen precio.

Inma ha sido una anfitriona muy buena. Se le ve muy buena chica, muy simpática y servicial. Me ha dado buenos consejos sobre Madrid y como moverme.  
La casa está en una buena zona de Madrid, muy bien comunicada con transporte  publicó. Ha sido fácil encontrarla.
La habitación estaba muy limpia, igual que en la Foto, con mucha luz en la mañana al abrir la pesiana. La cama es pequeña, perfecto para una persona. Con sabana y toallas limpias. Las zonas comunes, también en muy buen estado. He podido hacerme café en la mañana y ducharme sin problemas.
La casa tiene internet. Me he sentido como en casa. Ha sido una perfecta anfitriona! La estancia ha sido mucho mejor de lo que jamás hubiera pensado! La vivienda es acogedora y cómoda. La situación del piso está al lado de la parada de metro De Diego de León, y todo tipo de tiendas y restaurantes.

I highly recommend her apartment, thanks for a great stay!Recomendado 100%Inma es la MEJOR anfitriona: atenta, educada, cercana, simpática y con total accesibilidad en cada momento. Gracias por compartir el exquisito desayuno el sábado y por toda la ayuda que me brindaste en el más mínimo detalle. No puedo pensar en otro sitio para el siguiente viaje a Madrid.Inma es el modelo de anfitrión de Airbnb que todas queremos conocer: atenta, amable, puntual, simpática, cercana. Tiene la respuesta para todo y lo que necesites de su casa, lo comparte sin dudar. El piso es precioso  y muy cálido. La cama de la habitación muy cómoda y tendrás el espacio suficiente para organizar tus pertenencias perfectamente. El baño está siempre impecable, la ducha con excelente presión y toallas limpias y grandes. La vista desde los balcones a la calle madrileña llena de vida es preciosa. El ruido exterior se vuelve imperceptible a partir del segundo día, pero si eres sensible al sonido recomiendo uso de tapones para dormir -yo disfruté ese ruido tan característico de una gran ciudad. La cocina está perfectamente equipada y lista para uso. 

Por último y como huésped, debo decir que este es el espacio ideal para personas que disfrutamos del orden y la limpieza, así como del respeto en los horarios y en los espacios comunes, porque para mí es un requisito fundamental para sentirme como en casa. 

Gracias de nuevo, Inma. Espero volver a Madrid en el corto plazo y no puedo pensar en hospedarme en otro sitio que no sea tu casa.La estancia en casa de Inmaculada fue muy buena. Esta muy buen ubicado y muy limpio.Inmaculada es una muy buena anfitriona. Totalmente recomendable!Muy amable y hospitalaria. The host is super sweet and chatty, and helpful with tips and tricks of enjoying the city.  However, she is out a lot, so if you're not into that, she's definitely out of your hair. The place is super close to so many restaurants and bars, and even though its not right by the city center, its very close to the metro/subway line, so any destination is easy to get to because of that.fue una excelente anfitriona! recomendablr para una persona y mas si vas en plan de turismo!Alojamiento exquisito. Inma and her friend were wonderful hosts, they gave me so many tips for exploring Madrid and getting around. I would highly recommend a stay here!This is a great apartment in a wonderful neighborhood. It's super close to the metro and good restaurants. Inmaculada is very nice and helpful. comments:
Overall: It was an unforgettable experience. We did not feel like being in an Airbnb at all. It felt like visiting a friend that we dearly missed. We cannot recommend more, especially if you are a person of art and culture.
Location: the apartment locates in a vibrant Madridian neighbourhood in the heart of Madrid where you don’t easily find tourists. It is extremely convenient from the airport, a 30-40 minute 5 Euro bus journey takes you directly to central station Atocha (kindly informed by Ben). And 10 minutes walk to Ben’s home. A good supermarket Carrefour with orange juice machine is within 3 minute walk if you walk as slow as me. And many small groceries, bars, deli and a market just within 1 minute walk. Reina Sofia is about 7 minutes walk and there are some cool streets around. 
The room: gigantic room, very long that has a small balcony that gives good air and natural light. A big comfortable bed and interesting collections.
The apartment: From practicality perspective, the apartment is fully equipped. It is more of a charismatic museum than an apartment. We felt like that we were in wonderland since when you look up, down or anywhere, there would be something fun, interesting, and you wonder what is the story behind it. It is filled with artsy items that trigger your curiosity and it is perfect as a whole.
The cat: We think Mr S is a Zen cat, who is so mild tempered, peaceful and silent. We actually tried to play with him every day but only on the 5th day he appeared to be slightly playful. 
Ben: An utterly charismatic, creative, cultural and cool person who is also very generous. He generously showed us his 3D photography which we believe soon we’ll have to pay to attend his exhibition. As a host, he is very helpful and responsive. 
The food: the apartment is surrounded by authentic restaurants, delis, and bars where local people enjoy good food under sunshine.
The only regret is that we did not have enough time to explore more in Ben’s home and we did not want to disturb him too much. Otherwise we’d hand out with him every day. 

It would be wise to stay at Ben’s before he becomes famous, soon. :)Es un hermoso departamento, con una ubicación excelente y Ben es un anfitrión muy atento y dispuesto a resolver y ayudarte en la visita a Madrid.Ben est un hôte discret mais capable de nous aider quand il le faut...Nous avons eu des conversations passionnantes avec lui..
Il est rès ouvert et sympathique.My friend Alex and I stayed with Ben for 3 nights towards the end of our trip to Portugal/Spain.  From the moment we stepped into the apartment, Ben made us feel welcome and comfortable, offering to make us coffee/tea/toast while we got settled in.  While chatting over breakfast, we learned that he is a photographer by trade, and he offered to take us on an impromptu photography tour of his neighborhood.  We stopped at a number of delicious tapas restaurants/bars, saw some of his favorite sights, and attended a really cool record store festival that we would never have known about otherwise.  The next day, he provided some suggestions of places to go and things to see, but let us explore the city on our own.  On our final day, I got very sick with flu-like symptoms, and Ben went above and beyond to make me feel most comfortable- making me tea and setting me up with Netflix on the couch.  All in all, Ben was a fantastic Air BnB host, and Alex and I both agree that we left Madrid with a new friend.  We can't wait to come back to visit again soon, and I highly suggest booking your next stay with Ben as well!Ben is a great host and an awesome person! He made us feel at home and was very nice! We met his family (cat and son) and they were very welcoming! The room is nice, there is  room for storing clothes and very important: a ceiling fan!
Also the bathroom, that doesn’t show in the pictures, is clean and comfortable!
Highly recommend!
Thank you Ben!!!A great host and a fantastic location really made my stay in Madrid thoroughly enjoyable!!Sin duda Mejor experiencia en Madrid no pude tener con Ben, inmejorable hospitalidad, No me gustaban Los Gatos y acabé extrañando a Sony. Regresaría con Ben sin duda alguna. El metro y las calles principales del centro lo haces caminando sin problemas. Lo recomiendo ampliamenteУ нас не было ощущения, что мы прилетели по Airbnb, было такое ощущение что мы приехали к другу и это самое важное. Ben сделал все, что бы мы чувствовали себя комфортно, как дома. Мы очень благодарны ему за все. Ben сделал наше прибытие в Мадриде незабываемым и превосходным. Показал нам уголки Мадрида, которые без него мы бы даже не увидели. Большое спасибо, Ben!Très bon accueil, très bon emplacement.
A conseiller vivement.We had a great stay at Ben's place. It's very central to the city and a beautiful little apartment with everything you need. Ben was amazing with the communication even though he was on the other side of the globe! Thanks so much!It was such a pleasure staying with Ben, we quickly made friends, he was very warm and accommodating, it was like having a brother looking out for you! The extra special touch was that he made breakfast and served us coffee daily, an amazing amenity! Also, the apartment is perfectly located in the center. We highly recommend this option for anyone on a budget looking to stay central.Ben and his cat, Sony, are wonderful hosts. The artist pad is interesting and super comfortable. Highly recommend!Ben’s breezy, Bowie-inflected apartment in Lavapies is full of charm and a great value. His quick responses, genuine hospitality, and very friendly cat Sony made the stay extra pleasant and smooth. Highly recommended for a laid-back stay in a vibrant neighborhood close to everything you need/want to do in Madrid.Location was perfect! It was truly in the middle of everything. It was easy to find. The place was a lot nicer than the pics therefore was pleasantly surprised. He’s an artist so the place has a different but cool vibe. It has a nice little balcony and the size of the room is pretty large. His cat Sonny was the sweetest. Check-in was easy and he’s very flexible. He even made me some coffee upon arrival. The only con would be the wifi not working most of the time we were there but for us it wasn’t that big of a deal.The description of his place was good. We were on the go so we only slept there. He had us join him on a street art talk he was giving which was fun. Great location. Nice family.Ben es un gran anfitrión, presto a atender todas las consultas y siempre atento a que no te falte nada. Lo mejor es que es flexible en términos de la llegada y salida en su alojamiento, siempre dispuesto a ayudarte si así lo requires. El espacio es tal y como aparece en las fotos. Lo recomiendo!Ben's flat is in a great area with a number of small bars and friendly cafés within walking distance. It is close enough to the sights without being in the middle of touristville. The flat has lots of quirky well thought out elements and the room is large and comfortable with good natural light. Ben is most welcoming and his cat super sociable. It was lovely to share a creative person's home rather than a dull pseudo hotel room.Amazing flat and Ben was super flexible! The cat is just adorable :)The room is very comfortable and you get everything you need. We stayed for a week and really felt like at home. The area is really convinient, you can walk 10-15 min to the main attractions in Madrid. We had a big suitcase and it was not a problem at all to walk to the train central station Atocha. We highly recommend to visit the market around the corner "Mercado Anton Martin", it offers a lot of lunch possibilities.

Unfortunately for us, Ben was in a job related trip, which means that we had the flat for us and his cat (Sony). However, we had contact with Ben all the time, he was very interested that we felt happy at his place. At the end of our visit we got to meet Ben personally, it was a nice experience, because his energy and warm welcoming attitude made us felt as if we have been friends for years. We can only say that Ben is an amazing host.Nice appartement, very well located! Ben is a very flexible and welcoming host :)Great area (Reina Sofia, Prado, Atocha main station in 10-15 min walking distance, bars, restaurants and bakerys litterally around the corner). Very nice host, that loves to help and give advice for Madrid. Friendly decorated room, big enough for two. Super: very calm area for a good night´s sleep (at least in December, can´t say anything about the summer time). But, careful -  be sure to be a true cat lover who doesn´t care about a cat sitting on kitchen table, cutting boards and kitchen towels, going in and out the bathroom. 100% cleanliness should be a minor. Also, the room is not lockable.

comments:
Maroco has been a really good host, as well as his girlfriend Flavia. We were a big group of 15 men on a bachelor party, the appartment was big enough for all of us, with even most of us having a double bed for single use. Appartment is around 300 m2, with 7 bedrooms, so it is easy to find your peace even with 15 people sharing the appartment. Location is ideal, only 10 min walk to strict city center. Maroco has also been on his disposition, helping in anything we needed. All together, very nice flat, very nice host.Mis amigos y yo fuimos a parar a casa de Maroco tras haber sido estafados con otra casa en Madrid.
La diferencia fue abismal.
Una casa enorme, limpia, con muchísima luz y muchísimas camas. Más de las que necesitábamos.
El trato de él y su novia fue excelente.
Los 12 que dormimos ahí recomendamos totalmente esta casa y a sus anfitriones.
Muchas gracias por aparecer!
My group had a great experience! The flat was in a great location and was well maintained. The hosts were super nice and were readily available for any questions we had. I would definetly stay here again when in Madrid.Mario and his girlfriend Flavia were very friendly people. The were 5 star hosts and the apartment was absolutely beautiful. It was even better than I imagined. Every room was big and spacious, the beds were extremely comfy. It is the perfect accommodation for any group with 14 to 20 people. The location couldn't have been more perfect. It was a 2 minute walk to Gran Via. 

I would definitely recommend this apartment to anyone going to Madrid.  All-round 5 star experience. The host canceled this reservation 25 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.Nous avons été reçu chez Maroco et Flavia comme des rois, on ne pouvait pas rêver mieux en terme d'accueil. 
L'appartement est super bien placé, en plein centre de Madrid. 
Les chambre sont spacieuses et agréables avec des balcons, il y a 4 salles de bain avec WC et en plus de ça il y a la climatisation ! 
Très disponibles et super récatifs, Maroco et Flavia ont été de super guides en nous recommandant des lieux où sortir et manger. 
Notre séjour à Madrid chez Maroco et Flavia a été de loin notre meilleure expérience Airbnb.Excellent Service, always going the extra mile for our best comfort.

Place is extremely well positioned  cleaned and well maintained.

Hosts were always available for any question and gave great recommendations if you want to dine and wine, or have a night out in town.

The experience was better than expected, for big groups would definitely recommend A++Our stay at Marocos apartment was fantastic. I have nothing but good things to say. Communication both before and during our stay was fast, clear and easy. The arrival process was straightforward. Maroco and Flavia was there to welcome us and they are a wonderful and welcoming. The apartment itself is lovely. It is spacious, beautifully decorated with attention to detail and it had everything we could possibly need and more. The best equipped and stocked AirBnB I have ever stayed in. Any implement we could have wished for. There was enough bathrooms and they were very clean. The location is excellent. Gran Via is a lovely area at walking distance of the city center . There are  many lovely restaurants and pubs in the neighborhood,. Thank you Maroco and Flavia, for a fantastic stay. Très bon accueil des propriétaires.
Logement très bien situé.
Equipement un peu juste, une cafetière italienne pour deux personnes seulement, lorsque vous êtes 16 personnes c'est un peu compliqué. Grill-pain en panne.
La rue est très bruyante toute la nuit.
Certaines lampes dans les chambres n'étaient pas branchées faute de prise ou de rallonge. 
Hola a todos las personas que estén mirando este alojamiento. Hace unas horas acabamos de salir de este maravilloso piso, y no tengo mejor palabras, para describirlo cómo la de excelente . No dudéis en alojarse aqui, que desde luego estaréis como en vuestras casa y cerca de todo.
Los anfitriones son gente maravillosa y muy amables.posizione strategica-  buona pulizia di tutti i locali-Marcos e la sua ragazza simpaticissimi e super disponibili-scegliere questo alloggio è stata una scelta vincente e strategicaFuimos de viaje de estudios 2 profesores con 12 chicxs de 13 y 14 años.
La ubicación es excelente, en pleno centro de Madrid.
El alojamiento fue perfecto, muchas habitaciones y camas, cocina amplia para los desayunos y las cenas.
Limpio y con 4 baños!!! Imprescindible para tanta gente.
Y los anfitriones muy amables y atentos. Ademas fueron muy flexibles en el check in y check out, lo que agradecimos mucho.
Inmejorable para un grupo numeroso que quiera pasar unos días por Madrid.Piso amplio y agradable para viajes en grupo situado en una zona céntrica con acceso a transporte público muy cerca. Limpio, bastante tranquilo para la zona donde está situado y en buen estado, muy recomendable para familias numerosas. El anfitrión ha estado pendiente en todo momento y nos ha tratado de forma excelente. Hemos pasado unos días geniales!!Apparment was really great and in the middle of Madrid city centre. Everything is in walking distance. We where there with a group of 14 people and there was enough space in the appartment. Nice big bedrooms and bathrooms. Apparment was really clean. Owners was really nice and made us feel welcome. If there are any questions regarding your stay in Madrid he can help you out. If we return to Madrid we will make sure to stay in this apparment again.Beautiful spacious and great location 
I booked this apartment for my 15 guests ,apartment is beautiful ,very much centrally located ,close to restaurants and tourist attractions ..
We all really had a great time staying at Maroco's place and he's a great host ,very helpful ...
Hope to again see ya soon Great host, great apartment and great location. Loved every minute! Thanks MarocoIt was an incredible place with good AC that kept up with the July heat. There were 20 of us and it was very centric. Incredible hosts. 

Only bad thing which hosts don't have control of is there is a lot of noise with the surrounding buildings with people being up at all hours of the night. 

Again, simply incredible and spacious place. We enjoyed every moment. 

Thank you Maroco!! 9 of us stayed at the apartment for a company away weekend and it was perfect. The apartment is right in the heart of the city and within walking distance of anywhere you'd want to go. The place was clean, comfortable and huge. Maroco made the entire process very easy and was even kind enough to check in with us half way through our trip to see if everything was ok! El apartamento está muy bien ubicado y está bonito.
Tuvimos inconvenientes con el portero del edificio, que fue muy grosero. Desafortunadamente el anfitrión no pudo recibirnos y envió a una chica que no se dio el tiempo se explicarnos los detalles del apartamento, por ejemplo no supimos que tenía aire acondicionado y pasamos varios días de calor y no tuvimos explicación de lo detalles de los servicios. Es muy ruidoso y entra mucha luz (algunas habitaciones tienen persianas y otras sólo cortinas) lo cual hace difícil descansar.Stayed here with some work colleagues because we all wanted our own rooms. Great central location in madrid on the Main Street. Spacious simple bedrooms. Multiple beds in each room. Beautiful old building with a lift. 
Take eyeshades if you struggle to sleep with daylight. 
It was unlucky for us but there were roadworks outside during our stay but clearly this won't last for long. Ther is some road noise as normal. 
The owner was fabulous with contact and check in arrangements. Would recommend for groups needing space, no fuss and central location.Grande appartamento nel centro di Madrid perfetto per gruppi numerosi.Very good hostLeiligheten hadde en fantastisk beliggenhet.

Ellers godt fornøyd med leiligheten.Хорошая квартира для больших компаний.Si buscas un sitio grande y en el mismo centro de Madrid, este es tu sitio. Es un tanto ruidoso pero es lo que tiene estar en la Gran Via.The apartment is centrally located and very convenient to get around the city. Maroco was an attentive and responsive host. He is jovial and understanding. We had no issues with his hospitality and would surely recommend this apartment.
Enjoy Madrid!!Piso perfecto para grupos y celebraciones ! Se comparte la entrada asi que se pierde un poco de privacidad. 
La luz y el ruido molesta bastante para dormir o descansar pero por el ruido es por el hecho de ser tan centrico tambien. 
El dueno fue siempre muy atento y disponible para preguntas y dudas !Very GoodL'appartamento di Maroco è perfettamente posizionato al centro della città. 
L'host è stato gentile, disponibile, ci è venuto incontro per ogni nostra esigenza permettendoci anche di rimanere oltre l'orario normale di check-out. 
Ha risposto alle nostre richieste in qualsiasi momento della giornata.
L'appartamento è molto spazioso e pulito rispecchia quello che si vede dalle foto. Grazie alla sua posizione tutto è raggiungibile a piedi, vicinissimo alla fermata della metro.  
Consiglio vivamente questo alloggio per scoprire MadridCentral location with lots of beds. Perfect for large groups.Great apartment in a great location
Very spacious for 17 of us
Maroco is very welcoming and informative

Madrid is awesome and this is a flat built for large groups who want to be together and have space at the same time.Maroco est un super hôte, communication facile, très réactif et toujours disposé à donner des conseils pour visiter la ville et sortir.

He is so personal and so nice , he makes us feel like home!
We were a group of 13 people and all the rooms were great , clean, and spacious.
I lost 2 plugs and Maroco and his fiancé Flavia came at 1 am in the morning to bring us chargers   !! They saved  us ! Great host and I hope to see you soon in NYC!
Gracias por todo! Que amabilidad la de Maroco y su prometida Flavia . Los dos fueron muy amables, no encontré mis cargadores y el vino a la una de la mañana a traerme unos nuevos . Muchas gracias por hacernos sentir como en nuestra propia casa! Excelente ubicación y el edificio súper lindo ! El mejor Host que he tenido en todo mi viaje por Europa ! Espero verlos pronto en NY ! Besos  your New York friends !Apartamento muy grande y espacioso,   la ubicación es excelente sobre ka Gran vía. Sin duda regresaría!!!Maroco's place was AWESOME!  We had 16 people in our party and there was plenty of room for everyone.  The place was central to everything in Madrid.  Right on Gran Via, everything you need is within walking distance - shops, food, groceries, coffee, famous sites, etc.  If ever I am back in Madrid, I will be looking at renting one of Maroco's place again!This is an amazing space!  Great balcony to cool off on.  Hardwood floors need to be replaced but other than that very comfortable apartment.  Ikea stuff throughout but that's fine.. Great space for 14 people ages 2-80 to be comfortable.  Some bedrooms were en suite with baths attached which was great for families.  We were pleasantly surprised.  ACs in all rooms and they worked.  The higher location limited the street noise though you still hear it.  Elevators worked and the location can't be beat.  Right on gran Via on the metro line. Maroco was a great host. This Airbnb was perfect for our trip to Spain. Located in Chueca; we had plenty of options for sightseeing and nightlife. Most prominent landmarks are within walking distance. I would definitely stay here again. We had a wonderful long weekend here - it was really well designed and furnished. We knew it was a basement so we didn’t expect any natural light and for a short stay this is not a problem, I would expect it to be more challenging for a long stay. Kitchen is really well equipped and had everything to cook a good meal. Living room had huge smart TV with Netflix and YouTube. Host was very responsive and had very helpful guidebook. Wifi was fast but occasionally unreliable and air seemed a little damp. Location was fantastic, you really cannot beat it - everything is seconds away but without any noise.

There’s so much to do and see within walking distance of the flat, I wish I’d had more time to explore! One thing I’d recommend to change is the doors - the green front door is very tricky to open, and the door to the unit requires the key to lock it from the inside which is a fire hazard. Other than that, the perfect spot to stay in Madrid!Great place! Location is perfect. Decor is beautiful. Would definitely stay againVery charming place in a great location. Key pick up and drop off was easy, and EuroAntillas was very flexible with check in time as long as there wasn't anybody staying the previous night. It seems to be located in a mini gay district, which was perfect for my partner and I. For the combination of size, comfort, and location, I doubt you will find a better place in Madrid!Great communication, recommendations, and location. Overall great experience.La cueva en medio de Chueca es una experiencia diferente para visitar Madrid. Apartamento decorado con estilo y las luces hacen que no tengas la sensación de estar bajo tierra. El wifi funcionaba bien y es importante porque al ser una cueva no llega la señal ;)Gorgeous apartment! Clearly in a basement but you wouldn't be able to tell because of the well-placed lighting. Also in a great location within walking distance of several restaurants, shops and bars like the Mercado San Anton. Definitely recommend staying here!This place is in a great location. walking distance from almost anything and the Metro (Chueca station) is a 2 min walk. It was my wife, two kids (5 and 1 y/o), and me and we felt safe walking around. Overall a great stay.Amazing location. Nice temperatured basementReally interesting space in a perfect location. Definitely make sure you’re ok with this being a basement space before booking as there are some unique things to come to terms with (no windows, air quality, egress). But it was a unique experience that we both enjoyed, and the space is stunning - exactly as pictured.The flat is beautiful (and nice and cool!), location is great. However,  our stay was blighted by being informed the boiler was broken and there was no hot water. Cold showers for the entirety of our stay wasn't ideal. The boiler was fixed on our last night, but still didn't work properly. Overall - the flat is great, we were just unlucky with the boiler situation.The flat is very good located and quite big. However, it’s very humid and not comfortable because everything is wet (clothes etc)Interesante, bien comunicado. Muy complicado para conseguir y devolver la llave.eine coole Keller Wohnung sehr zentral gelegen. Nicht geeignet für mehr als 3 Personen und für solche, die nicht auf nächtliche Straßen-Parties stehen. Zweites Bett ist eine Klapp-Couch mit ca 140 cm Breite im WohnzimmerThis was a nice place and a perfect location.  We were really happy with everything. The only thing to note is that it doesn’t get any sunlight as it is a basement but we would happily stay there again.Overall, a great place to stay in an amazing location. It is spacious and you do forget that you're underground. It is humid/damp down there (they supply multiple de-humidifiers) and there is no a/c (but it doesn't get too hot and they provide a fan), but it was fine for our 2 night stay.Pros - 
Location - right where we wanted to be on Chueca, really good location for the gay district, really close to the metro. 
Clean - apartment was pretty clean although a bit of black mould starting to grow in the shower 
Equipped - apartment has everything you need, iron, hairdryer, all the kitchen bits. 

Cons 
Noise - Every time someone came in or out or up the stairs in the main entrance it was really loud. There was workman in two days of our stay that had us up really early with the noise. 
Humid - because the apartment is in the basement it gets really humid and can smell a bit stuffy. The dehumidifier and fan seem to drop the temperature and the humidity quite quickly, but you need to remember to empty it. 
Keys - the lock on the main door is really old and involved some kind of magic trick to open it, we had to sit outside and wait for the host to contact us to revel the secret.

There isn’t a lot of fresh air or natural light but we expected this as it’s a basement apartment, this isn’t for everyone. The apartment was good, but I probably wouldn’t stay here again.The space was exactly as described and very easy to find. I truly enjoyed the fact that it was in the heart of the city and walking distance to everything. The place was super quiet because it’s underground and when you come up your in the middle of vibrant, busy Madrid! I would highly recommend staying here to visitors and will definitely come back!Amazing location very close to metroThe location is great, in the heart of Chueca. However, I am not a fan of the rest: dead cockroaches in the apt, very humid, not enough Oxygen in the apt - i had to leave the door open to get some air, restauration in the building - intensive paint smell, and the worst: the front door is super hard to open (i was almost freaking out, the first time it took me 10minutes). Futhermore the dehumidifying machine collapsed and lost litres and litres of water in the living room. Half of the living room was flooded. Asked for a partly refund, but didn't get an answer on that. And i am also not a fan of picking up/leaving the keys at a different place than the airbnb itself. don't have time for this kind of things.Increible la decoración y la ubicación. Precioso. No es el típico sitio al que vas a alojarte para salir del paso. En sí es una experiencia el estar allí. Precioso. Para repetir sin duda. Inmejorable.Place is nice and totally worth its price just keep in mind its a little hard at first to get into the building because of the weird main door lock and plus its an apartment in the basement not specified in the airbnb listing.Everything about this place is spot on! Location location location! The hosts are amazing and provided an excellent channel of communication up to and throughout my stay. (Which really helps when you miss your original flight and don’t arrive until well after midnight!)Great location (very close to Gran Vía and Sol), and the property was clean and spacious. Would highly recommend!Lovely apartment, great location and host!!Such a great place to stay while visiting Madrid! There’s no natural light but it’s a spacious apartment in a great neighborhood for a great price - can’t beat it!Very stylish apartment in a great location. I highly recommend!Great location in the heart of Madrid’s nightlife. Stylish cave.Appartement conforme aux photos, il est très joli, bien situé et bien agencé. Attention cependant : il  n'y a pas de réseau mobile à l'intérieur, l'appartement étant au sol. Appartement humide également et sans fenêtre. 
Porte vitrée pour les toilettes, ouverte en haut et en face de la douche. Il faut bien choisir avec qui on part ! 
Sinon, il est vraiment parfait pour y passer quelques jours ! Les proprios sont très réactifs et très sympathiques .Le service pour récupérer les clés ne marchait pas, nous avons dû appeler l’hôte qui a mit 1h30 a arrivé. 
L’appartement est bien situé ce qui est très pratique. Il est également spacieux.The flat is an incredibly stylish basement perfect for a couple. You can escape the heat of the day in here or go out where there is lots of things to see and do nearby. 

We had a fantastic stay here and would definitely stay here again.Posizione ottima e perfetta la cooperazione con l'host, presente in ogni fase.. Il portoncino d'ingresso necessita di alcuni accorgimenti ma i consigli dell'host ne hanno reso facilissimo l'utilizzo. Ottima esperienza in bella struttura. Sconsigliato a persone con difficoltà motorie per la presenza di scale ripide all'ingresso. ConsigliatoBien ubicado, cómodo y buena relación calidad/precio.This place is perfect for a long weekend. Everything in the center is within walking distance & you are approx. 5 mins from a metro if you need to venture that bit further out. The apartment itself is quite stylish & had all the mod cons you could think of. Any questions that we had in general we just texted our host & we had a response within a matter of minutes. Highly recommend.first I must say this apartment is beautiful. Very nicely designed and very well thought out.  

We went into our rental with our eyes open. We understood this was a basement apartment. With no windows. We were also told that the heat issue had been resolved -it hadn't. The humidity issue had been resolved -it hadn't. The check-in process was terrible.

I do want to thank the management company for allowing us to leave the keys in the apartment rather than travel backward to the key locker before we left town.

I believe it's these kind of experiences when Airbnb participants are renting from management companies who really are not involved in the process rather than individuals is what's going to kill Airbnb.Well located and clean, but in the basement (dark and wet), and noisyDecoración fantástica, aunque resulta un poco claustrofóbicoGreat stay at the apartment, it's very stylish, comfortable and quiet and a good locationGreat location and amazing apartment.  Very unique, spacious, well maintained and with good amenities.   Highly recommend.The pictures do illustrate how the apartment looks. Bed was comfortable, and couch was actually quite comfy as well. Shower has signs of mold, careful if you have allergies. The check-in process was confusing and frustrating. The keys to get into the building as well as the unit were very sensitive. It was hard to open both. The unit was very humid but they do provide humidifiers. Overall it was good.Convenient location, comfortable condo, quiet and dark for sleeping!  This unit is very cleverly designed with lighting solutions to make it feel cozy even though it is in the basement.  We did sleep very well here, with the dark and quiet at night.  The kitchen is well-equipped with the basics, and communication with the host was prompt and clear.Really lovely and stylish basement apartment in the heart of a busy and vibrant area. So close to the center we walked everywhere and didn't need to rely on public transport or taxis (other than to and from the airport). Because the apartment is downstairs it felt peaceful when wanting to retreat from the bustle of the area, but then easy enough to head out with many good bars and restaurants very close by.Bien! Excelente ubicaciónEspaço gostoso, porém não aconselhável para quem tem claustrofobia, pq fica no porão.
Apartamento bem montado com tudo o que se necessita.Great place, great host!todo impecable y todos los servicios, acogedor y diferente, muy cercano al centro, no hay mucha red móvil pero tiene wifi.This place is in a perfect central area in Madrid! It was a fantastic value in a great neighborhood, close to Chueca metro and Mercado San Anton.The location was great right in Chueca, and the value was amazing for such a nice place. Has everything you need for a short or extended stay! The only issues we had was that the key didn't work into the building and we had to try 40+ times to get it to work, but as long as this or the door is fixed I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.Mi experiencia fue muy mala. Al alquilarlo recibimos un mail donde nos daban las indicaciones para el ingreso al departamento. El cual no sabiamos que era un sotano sin luz natural hasta ya haber reservado ,ya que en la descripcion no aparece que lo es. En ese mail figuraba un codigo y la direccion de un bar en donde debiamos retirar la llave de una taquilla . Tambien nos daba un horario para poder retirarla el cual no teniamos problema porque retirariamos la llave al horario del check in 15 pm. Al llegar a las 15 pm a la direccion no existia ese pub , lo cual tuvimos que ir preguntando en los restaurantes de esa cuadra  y nos informaron  que ese pub no existia. Buscamos el tel de euroantillas y nos atendio un seńor diciendo que habian cambiado el lugar de entrega de las llaves lo cual no sabiamos porque no nos lo habian informado. Nos dirigimos a la nueva direccion que era una lavanderia que tenia horarios para su ingreso. Pero como ya habiamos estado una hora buscando ,pasadas las 16 hs pudimos retirar la llave. Nos dirigimos al departamento y la llave no abria la puerta de entrada al edificio. Despues de muchos intentos sin lograrlo volvimos a llamar y el seńor nos dijo que la llave tenia un “truquillo” para abrir la puerta. Palabras textuales del seńor. Despues de mas intentos pudimos entrar de suerte. Al rato mandaron a una persona de euroantillas la cual me pregunto si me habian mandado el video de como abrir la puerta a lo cual le respondi que ni siquiera me habian mandado la direccion correcta. Me la mandaron recien cuando llamanos la primera vez porque no existia el bar. Luego nos encontramos con la sorpresa que era un sotano sin luz natural y extremadamente ruidoso ya que se encuentra abajo de la escalera del edificio que es de madera. Entonces la gente subia y bajaba y a la noche el ruido era insoportable. El departamento es tal cual las fotos que se muestran. Otro problema era internet andaba muy mal y no llegaba al cuarto. Solo en el living funcionaba. El agua caliente fue otro problema , no nos alcanzaba para bańarnos dos personas seguidas. Realmente una decepcion el lugar.Great location and very clean. I really recommend it.Prachtige plek om een aantal dagen te verblijven. Merkt totaal niet dat je in een kelder en dus onder de grond verblijft vanwege de details die aan de ruimte zijn toegevoegd. Wij gaan de ruimte zeker aanraden bij vrienden en familie. Handig om te weten: de deur van het pand gaat wat moeilijk open. De eerste keer hebben de buren ons geholpen, maar misschien handig om hier een briefje of message over te sturen voor de volgende bezoekers. Verder echt een geweldige locatie!!Great location, huge space,  very clean and comfortable, and great communication as well- will stay here if I return to Madrid!Amazing stay!!Great location

comments:
Un lugar acogedor, recomendableDhalya was an excellent host. She welcomed us super friendly, always responded to all our questions immediately and gave us many recommendations what to do in Madrid. 
The room was small, but clean. It has no air conditioning, but a van.
A metro station is right around the corner and it takes about 15 minutes to go to the city center.
We really felt welcomed in Dhalyas appartment.Excelentes host, son lo mejor de lo mejor, fue una estancia muy agradable y no tengo ningún comentario negativo de toda la experiencia de hospedarme con ellos.Nuestra estancia fue corta pero agradable y cómoda, Alexandra nos ofreció de todo y se preocupó bastante.La propreté laisse à désirer 
Le lit est pour 1 personne et non pour 2 
Pas de chauffage dans la chambre et elle est humide
Pas d’isolation sonore donc pas mal de bruit
Nous avons passé une nuit horribleEl alojamiento tiene una buena ubicación.
Está muy cerca de una estación de metro y se siente un zona segura incluso tarde en la noche.

comments:
The accommodation was perfect!So close to the metro station,5 mins from the city centre,near many bars,restaurants and clubs!The location was simply the best!Moreover the flat was very new,clean and big enough for 4 people!Begoña is a great person.We will definitely come back and we will recommend it to everyone :-)El piso es muy bonito y luminoso, tal y como se muestra en las fotos. La ubicación es excelente también. Begoña estuvo pendiente de todo y la comunicación antes y durante nuestra visita fue inmediata y de mucha ayuda.La casa es preciosa muy bien ciudada y ella un encantoMis padres se lo pasaron de maravilla. El piso esta muy bien ubicado y es exactamente como se muestra en las fotos. La comunicación con Begoña fue muy ágil y nos ayudo mucho. Great experience from Begoña! The apartment was beautiful and in a very centrally located part of Madrid; only a few steps away from the metro. Will stay here again when I'm in Madrid. El piso es INCREIBLE! Pese a qu es muy chiquitin esta decorado con muchisimo gusto, al ser 4 cuando nos alojamos yo dormi en el sofa cama y descanse sin problema toda la noche, el entorno es espectacular, coincidimos con las fiestas del barrio y lucia precioso, todo el edificio esta rehabilitado. La ducha y la presión de agua Una pasada!!!! Imposible no volver!The flat is really nice and the location is great.
Begonia was also very nice.

CheersMuy agradable departamento, nuevo, limpio, luminoso, con decoración muy cuidada. Inmejorable ubicación en un barrio de las letras lleno de vida y muy cerca de un magnífico mercado de Antón Martín.Excelente. Acogedor Apto. Limpio y con una ubicación privilegiadaHi, we had a wonderful weekend in Madrid. The apartment was/ is very nice and really near to the centre. 
We had a fantastic stay at Begona's place. It was very comfortable and everything worked well. It is in a good location, only 100m or so from the metro station and has heaps of small grocery shops and restaurants around. 
Communication was easy and Begona was very organised. 
Recommend this place for sure!
Thanks again :)Excelente. Begoña muy atenta flexible y de gran ayuda. Mejor anfitrión es imposible.Very nice apartment and location ! The host is quickly responsive to our enquiries!  This is a lovely apartment in a fantastic location, and Begoña was a wonderful host! Our train arrived in Madrid much earlier than check in time, and she was very accommodating! Definitely recommend.La verdad es que el piso es exactamente lo que parece en el anuncio pero mas mono. Es un piso pequeño pero puesto con muchísimo gusto y comodisimo. Begoña encantadora. Muy recomendableThe house was clean. The zone itself wasn't that great but it was near to puerta del sol and the zone of the museum (prado and rejina sofia).This was our second stay at Begona's place and just lile the first time Begona did a very good job in making it a perfect day for us. Although small the apartment has everything you need if you want to stay in center of Madrid. It is very clean and good equipped. Begona is very flexible and nice to communicate with. Easy going and we certainly come back when we arein Madrid.Begoña es encantadora y estuvo muy pendiente para que estuviésemos cómodos y no nos faltase de nada. El piso es precioso y está muy bien situado, como hacía mucho calor el aire acondicionado vino genial. Begona nos ha recibido en su piso y explicado muy bien como funcionaba todo. El piso era como prometido en el red y en un barrio tranquilo y centrico.
La communicacion fue perfecto y el extra servicio de poder dejar nuestra malletas  en el piso nos ha gustado mucho.
We were very welcome in the nice apartment that was exactly as described on the webside. We really loved her help and hints on how to come to the apartment. Begona is ver flexible and we liked the service she offered to leave our suitcases in the apartment until we had to go. The apartment is in the center of Madrid on walking distance of all the mayor points of interest.It is a nice place, the place is clean. However, the nearest metro station will be closed for construction until november, we need to walk from another station which is required 15-20mins.El apartamento es muy limpio, moderno y centrico. Si regreso a Madrid lo rentaría de nuevo. Begoña fue muy amable con nosotras y se acomodo a nuestros horarios. De todos los Airbnbs que he rentado, este fue es el mejor. The place was fantastic, perfectly located, very comfortable. Only here for 1 night, but if we were back in Madrid again we would definitely try to stay here for longer. A well designed little apartment, with an excellent location.El piso está muy bien, no le falta detalle. La ubicación perfecta, céntrica y situada en el centro. La anfitriona muy atenta y facilitadora. Todo perfecto.Très bel appartement, propre et très bien situé (quartier sympa, rue calme).
Bien équipé. 
Begona was a great host. She accommodated our late arrival and provided extra bedding. The apartment was very comfortable for two people  and in a great location! I would definitely stay here again. El apartamento está genial. Muy céntrico y cómodo.Begoña me atendió muy bien, mostró gran disponibilidad para ayudarnos con todo lo que pudiéramos necesitar.We absolutely loved our stay in Madrid. Begona's place was perfect. It is the perfect size in a nice neighbourhood. Well kept, comfortable and feels very homey. There is a lift, which was really great. The water gets nice and hot. The space gets beautiful light during the day. The place had everything we needed. The bed was perfectly comfortable. We would absolutely stay here again! Begona was very easy to contact and an excellent host.We enjoyed our stay in Begoña's place a lot. It is a lovely decorated, sun-lit and cosy flat in which we felt at home straight away. Everything we needed was there: well equipped kitchen and bathroom, comfortable bed, elevator and enough space for 2. 
The area is great - very close to the Atocha train station, Metro and all the sights of Madrid.
We only stayed 1 night, but would definitely consider booking the flat again the next time we are coming to Madrid.The apartment was small and cozy and had everything you need for a short stay.  It was nicely decorated and bright, had a small balcony. 
The only thing that could have been better was wifi connection - it was not very strong. Begona's friend welcomed us and explained everything. 
The apartment is well located, close to the city center. We were 4 people and it was comfortable to sleep on the couch. 
It was easy to reach Begona, she was very responsive. We didn't know the exact arrival hour since we were traveling by car, but for her it was not a problem.
Reccommend.It was one of the best apartments that we had seen by far on our trip. Really cozy, modern and perfect, felt like home...I fell in love. The location was perfect to get around and go site seeing. I wish we had spent more time in Madrid to enjoy the place. Our host was so nice and understanding, we had an early morning flight and requested to leave our luggage there before the check in time and she was totally cool with that. She even gave us a map of the city to find our are way around and back home which came in handy and we used it the whole time. I would definitely pick this host and place again when i re-visit Madrid and stay longer next time to enjoy. Begona's place was very central, between Plaza Mayor and Retiro Park, so close to the tourist attractions. It was a very cute, well decorated apartment. The place was very clean and it had all the basic needs, clean towels, very nice shampoo etc. Although the bed is a little bit small it was very comfortable. Begona's mother welcomed us to the apartment, she was very cute and we had a little bit of trouble finding the wifi code, but Begona was prompt to communicate with us. The only problem was that the noises (mainly people talking very loud) did not stop until 4 am making it a little bit hard to sleep. Other than this, the place is highly recommended!Nuestra experiencia en el apartamento de Begoña ha sido muy biena y positiva. El apartamento es pequeño, para dos personas máximo, pero está muy bien situado y tiene todo lo necesaria para una buena estancia. Perhaps the cleanest Airbnb I've ever stayed in. Beautiful accommodations and great location!Lovely Begona!
Helpful and kind host.
The place located perfectly! 
And the most convenient apartment we visited!
Every detail was thought about! And very esthetic taste. 
(Weekend night s are loud)
Dont miss it!Begona's apartment was really lovely it was compact and modern. It had everything we needed for a comfortable stay. The location was good it was in an area with lots of restaurants cafes and bars and there were 2 small grocery stores close by. We were able to walk to many places but the bus service seemed quite good although we did not use it as we walked everywhere except for the hop on hop off bus which is worth doing.
We were only there for 2 nights, I would recommend the apartment. It was in a nice area.  The only negative was it was a bit noisy although my friend did not notice it as much she was in the bedroom with the door closed and I was on the fold out couch, it was not as bad the second night. Although I would not let this put me off staying here and would come back if I ever returned to Madrid.
Begona was not able to meet us herself but had arranged for a friend to meet us and show us where everything was, she also had Begona on the phone to speak to us as her friend did not speak English that well, she said to contact her if we had any concerns, which I did and she replied very promptly. We were not flying out till night time on the day of check out and other people were coming in that day but Begona arranged for our bags to be held for the day and for someone to meet and give them to us at 6pm. 
Overall it was a great place to stay and I would recommend it. CarmelMy family said they had a really comfortable stay here and that the location was perfect. Walking distance to almost everywhereHost was helpful and great with communication, and the apartment was also great, very clean, nicely decorated, and as described.Very nice and clean apartment and amazing location. However we have some problems with internet and Begonã didn´t responde to our messages and phone calls. She told us that we could leave the bags in the apartment on our last day but just when we arrived she said  that we couldn´t. Apart from that the aprtment is very cool!!La casa sigue perfecta. Todo bien. Gracias. Everything was great. I love this little appartment :) Plenty of space for 2 people and a great are with lots of Restaurants, typical Tappas Bars, Sights.... Thank you very much for a preasurable stay. Everything was great. A cute, small but perfectly designed appartment in a nice area. Almost a pity I was only staying for one night. I was awaited patiently although my plane was late and I had some issues with my luggage. Would definitely come back...enjoying it longer. Only suggestion: Bring ear plugs! As some other renters have stated before: the garbage cans are getting emptied at night (during my stay at 1am and 3am, astonishingly), which is quite noisy in this small street! Apart from this it's supersilent...Begoña was great since I first contacted her. It was and excellent touch that we were allowed to enter a little before the checkin time which allowed us to drop our luggage before start walking in the neighborhood.

Apartment was really cozy, clean, comfortable and in accordance with pictures and my expectations. Its 15min walking distance from Atocha train station and Puerta del Sol. It has a subway station 1 block away however closed for renovation until the end of current year, no surprise because I was informed about it in advance. 

Only not so positive aspect was the noise of the upstairs neighbors and building service stairs. Soundproof of windows and doors could be better.

Would definitely recommend or stay here again if coming back.El apartamento estaba decorado como tu propia casa. Muy acogedor. We only had the place for 1 night and were getting in early from a night train so it made a huge difference to be able to drop our bags off earlier than the check in time. Thank you SO much for being so flexible with us.Our stay at Begoña's place was great. It's a nice appartment and Las Letras is a nice neighbourhood with a lot of restaurants. And you can walk easily to the city centre or otherwise go with public transport. 
The only negative thing was that it is very noisy at night, the noise came from the street. So bring earplugs. Well situated. I strongly recommend. Apartment is clean and as described. The host is helpful and reactive. 5 stars.El departamento está lindisimo súper ubicado. 
Sin duda me volvería a hospedar aquí. 
Estuvimos muy cómodas, tiene todo lo necesario. 
Fueron muy atentos y muy fácil el acceso y check out Acogedor y moderno a la vez, con muchos detalles. Centrico, cercano a muchos sitios emblemáticos de Madrid como El Prado o la Plaza Mayor y bien conectado con metro. Lástima haber estado solo una noche...An amazing apartment right in the centre of Madrid, close to everything - I bought a subway pass but it was so easy walking everywhere from the apartment I barely needed to use it. Really enjoyed staying here, has everything you need and beautifully furnished. Highly recommend.   The apartment was really nice and clean. We enjoyed the stay a lot. High flexibility of the check in and check out time and good location. Helpful and friendly host. Will definitely recommend it to others.Estuvimos alojados 4 personas a finales de Diciembre, y la verdad es que terminamos encantados. Un piso muy acogedor, nos sentimos como en casa desde el primer momento. La zona era estupenda porque hay una boca de metro al final de la calle, además de que está muy céntrico por lo que también puedes acceder a todo andando. El vecindario no era para nada ruidoso, y dormimos muy bien tanto en la cama como en el sofá-cama. Begoña se mostró siempre accesible y respondió todas nuestras dudas. Sin duda, al siguiente viaje repetiremos. Begonia responded quickly when we needed help after my wife fell and injured her ankle at the Prado and took a taxi to the hospital for Xrays, taking the apartment keys with her, and my granddaughter and I were locked out.  She brought us another set of keys and helped me unlock the door, and was always cheerful and friendly and helpful.   The apartment itself was spacious and comfortable, and the kitchen especially was large and well supplied with all the utensils anyone could need -  we fixed most of our own meals, which was great because we wanted to eat at the times we are accustomed to.  El piso dispone de todo lo que se indica en el anuncio e incluso más. Nos lo encontramos muy limpio y ordenado. Cocina con todos los utensilios necesarios para cocinar y comer allí si lo deseas. Todo muy nuevo y en buen estado. Muy buena ubicación en zona bastante tranquila y cerca de la estación de tren y del centro. Begoña buena anfitriona y atenta. Lo recomendamos al 100 %Sitio muito acolhedor e centralEl piso acogedor, moderno y en una zona muy agradable para poder visitar la ciudad y hacer la estancia en Madrid amena. It is almost directly in the center of all the major monuments, bars and restaurants. on average, I was walking about 10 km a day around the city, but there are many bikes available from posts around the city If you do not want to walk. If you are driving here, be aware that a lot of cities in Spain have traffic issues, so there are cameras that capture your license plate on the way into streets within the center, this studio being one of them. Be aware of the signs that tell you this because I’m sure there’s a hefty fine if you are not an authorized vehicle. I’m sure if you are on official business and can show an alibi (such as a dated receipt or invoice), you should be fine. Parking in most garages cost about 36€ per day but if you talk to a parking staff receptionist, it should lower significantly (average 20€ per day for longer term parking).

Great location from metro, the Prado, and lots of little shops and restaurants. The flat is very close to the Prado Museum (buy tickets in advance!) , and one stop from Sol station which is very central.
