amenities: {TV,Wifi,Kitchen,Elevator,Heating,Washer,Essentials,"Hair dryer",Iron}
comments:
Overall, very happy with my stay. Very clean and modern, in a renovated building. Just as described.

Only slight downsides were that sound travels very far when speaking in hallways, and communication wasn't very quick (sometims took 2 days for an answer prior to the trip), though questions were answered. the apartment is in the centre of Madrid! It is convenient and quiet! We are a group of 6 people and the place is such a good place to stay in! The host is such a nice person and help us a lot! As it is near the centre of Madrid, therefore we can find many different restaurants and bars beside! Overall the place is really good and a nice place to stay in for holiday! Thank you so much for giving us such a nice holidayAppartement très agréable, spacieux, moderne, très bien équipé et idéalement situé. Accès sécurisé. 
Le seul petit reproche que je ferai est que nous pensions en réservant l'appartement que la terrasse était privative et en fait non, elle est commune à tous les appartements de l'immeuble. Les deux lits simples d'une des trois chambres s'était finalement transformé en 1 lit double. The good first -- the apartment itself is quite lovely.  There's two well-sized rooms each with two twin beds (that can be pushed together to form a larger bed if you're traveling as a couple) and a third smaller bedroom with a single twin bed.  The living spaces are also nice.  The real selling point is the absolutely lovely rooftop with some great views (particularly around sunset).

The apartment would frankly be perfect if it weren't for the management company.  If they can be a pain, they will be.   Our troubles began when I accidentally booked our arrival one day too early.  Admittedly my fault but normally Airbnb hosts are relatively forgiving of such oversights if you notify them promptly (I did within a day).  Not here.  The management company insisted that change was subject to their cancellation policy and so I'd have to fork over 50% of the cost for that night -- more than $150.  And they stuck to that position even though the policies on their own website expressly distinguish between a modification (change dates) and cancellation (nix the entire stay).  Only after a great many emails, did they finally see the light and give me an "exception" to their unwritten (and unagreed to) modification fee.

The next hurdle was check-in.  On this front the AirBnB posting couldn't have been clearer -- it said "checkin is done at the apartment."  Yet the management company insisted that we'd have to trek to their office to check-in, which is a 20 minute metro ride away.  Again we exchanged numerous emails before they agreed to honor their listing and meet us at the apartment.

This was still a lovely place to stay in Madrid but it wasn't worth the headache.  Had I known how difficult the management company would be, I would have chosen to stay elsewhere.  So be forewarned.  

One final note -- this is the first time I've given anything other than a 100% positive review on AirBnB and I take no joy in doing it.  I love staying in AirBnBs and it's always been a good experience.  This one would be too if only the management company could manage to be reasonable.Todo muy bien!!Estupendo apartamento al lado del mercado de la cebada, ideal para ir en pareja o con unos amigos!Muy aseado, limpio y cómodo. Accesible por transporte público y a pocos minutos de ubicaciones destacadas de la ciudad.
Recomendable.Muy buena ubicación, diseño, limpieza y comodidad con el añadido de la terraza-azotea como zona común con el resto de viviendas, aunque al ser invierno no coincidimos con nadie. El pero fue tener que recoger la llave en una ubicación distinta a la de la vivienda, con el añadido de la dificultad para el aparcamiento en ambas zonas. Friendly Rentals usa la plataforma Airbnb para alquilar sus viviendas, por lo que no alquilas la casa a un particular, sino a una especie de inmobiliaria. 
A pesar de todo esto, repetiríamos.Apartamento muito bom e em boa localidade.casa centrale rispondente alle fotoLamentablemente no está pensado para alojar 7 personas como se describe, el sofá cama del living es muy incómodo para que duerman 2, solo hay 5 sillas en la mesa, una de ellas estaba rota. No había cosas básicas como sal, azúcar,  jabón para lavar los platos, servilletas de cocina o al menos un trapo / repasador. Si bien te ofrecen dejar el equipaje en sus oficinas, tener que ir levantar las llaves a 2 km del apartamento no es cómodo. Por otro lado, la calefacción funciona muy bien para las noches de invierno. Los 3 dormitorios y 2 baños son cómodos, hay ascensor en el edificio. La ubicación es muy buena, a 8 minutos caminando de Plaza Mayor y 15 de Puerta del Sol. La Latina es un barrio muy pintoresco, lleno de restaurantes y bares. En cada esquina de la calle del apartamento hay un supermercado.Thank you for everything! We really appreciated the amenities (the pots, the towels etc), the great service and the brilliant location of the Airbnb!
However, there were general issues. The main attraction for booking the apartment was because of the two bathrooms...However, the master bedroom en suite door would not shut and we are family of young teens who understandably did not feel comfortable using a bathroom that didn't even shut. This completely wasted this bathroom, and 7 people had to share one which proved difficult.
Additionally, there was general dust and in the pictures, there are over 6 chairs but in real life, there were only 3 which proved difficult for our large family. Also, the sofa bed was very dirty, it made it hard to enjoy it.

Other than that, everything else was amazing.O ar condicionado não funciona. No verão é um problema grave, em Madrid.
No mais, o apartamento tem 3 habitações, mas apenas 3 cadeiras na sala, de apoio à mesa de jantar! 
Em uma das casas de banho a porta está tão empenada que vão fecha. 
A localização é honesta e o apartamento estava limpo.La Latina es a perfect place, it is really central and you may explore the hole area walking! On Sunday you have the famous Rastro right in front of your door! The whole house as well as the apartment is totally clean and in a really good status, the rooftop is amazing!Toller Blick von der Dachterasse! Metrostation nicht weit entfernt und sehr zentral.El apartamento nos resultó muy cómodo, todo estaba muy limpio y además la decoración y los espacios muy bonitos y (Website hidden by Airbnb) terraza chulisimo y la ubicación para nosotras perfecta. En plena Latina que es un barrio que nos encanta, pudimos hacer todo andando porque está súper bien situado.

comments:
La habitación tal y como se describe y aparece en las fotos. Muy limpia, tranquila y bien comunicada. Muy recomendable!!Es amplio y moderno.
Queda en un lugar nuy turistico. Facil acceso a gran via y otras estaciones de metro.
Para contactar al host, la forma mas rapida es enviando un correo electronico ( no me gusto) .
Tu mismo haces el check in ( no hay quien te explique como funciona el aire acondicionado) 
Tuve un inconveniente con el bano, me solucionaron una parte rapido pero seguia oliendo terrible.Buen sitio en el centro de MadridPerfecto lugar. Limpio, práctico, completo, zona céntrica animada, buena relación calidad-precio.Great location and good price-value. Quick responses. I would go back!Muchas gracias ! Era una estancia maravillosa en Madrid, volveremos seguramente. La localizacion es perfecta, muy central pero el ruido de la calle no se oye en las habitaciones. 
Todo es muy comodo, la cama doble es muy grande, los armarios tambien, y hay una pequeña neverra. Todo esta muy limpio, las zonas comunes tambien.
La cocina enorme es el lugar donde se puede encontrar gente de todo el mundo asi que es muy convivial !Alojamiento increíble en inmejorable situación, habitaciónes de diseño totalmente equipadas, sin duda repetiria siempre. Los anfitriones super atentos enseguida responden a todas las dudas. Un 10 Excelente ubicación y habitación con estilo! Recomendado!Pablo's place is perfect for people who want to be in the center of the action in Madrid. The building is located a few steps from a Metro and is a mixed-use development with shops on the ground floor (Guess Jeans is the landmark), businesses on some levels, and housing on others. It is placed at the start of a major pedestrian corridor that leads right into a busy street of stores, restaurants and vibrant street life.

The room itself is one of several units that are linked together much like a college dorm, but with private bathrooms in each room (no shared showers here!). The kitchen, dining area and living room are all shared with a host of people who are staying for a few days or few months, making the experience of this room quite different from other AirBnBs that I've encountered.

Although Pablo and I communicated via AirBnB several times, we never met, I never saw him or anyone else associated with his rental. Check-in was a code to a locked box for room keys-- that's it. It was simple,  it was straightforward, and it was people-free.

Side note for vegans: My husband and I found several great vegan restaurants within walking distance of Pablo's place, which we greatly appreciated. In general, we found Madrid to be the most vegan friendly place we've visited in Europe. So, if you're looking for a place with vegan options nearby, this is it!Muy buena comunicación con el anfitrión. La ubicación es inmejorable en pleno corazón de la ciudad. La habitación es bonita y limpia. Top Kommunikation mit den Gastgebern. Das Zimmer ist sauber & zweckmäßig mit Klimaanlage und Kühlschrank eingerichtet, es gibt einen Aufenthaltsraum und eine große Küche zur gemeinschaftlichen Nutzung.
Auf jeden Fall für einen Kurztrip weiter zu empfehlen!You pay for what you get. Excellent location but overall we wouldn’t recommend this place. The room feels really cold and the vibe itself is cold too.  There’s a weird sewer-like smell from the bathroom. We did contact the host and he offered to send us the maintenance but after checking the reviews we realized that it was not worth it because it was constant problem throughout all the airbnb reservations and we were not staying long enough to deal with all of this. Furthermore this host/company notes that basic toiletry services are offered but we had a problem. Indeed, we did not have enough toilet paper....something that should always be included if basic toiletries are included. So we decided to contact the host and his response was “ this is not a hotel ”, to which we laughed at because when you’re traveling you shouldn’t be worried about basic toiletry services especially when it is included. It costs 2€ to buy toilet paper and it’s really annoying to make us buy a pack of 6 rolling papers when housekeeping has plenty available right on the spot in the kitchen storage. On the other hand, there’s a no noise policy from 10pm-8am, but there’s no one there during evening/ and nights which makes the space a free for all environment. Overall, if you’re on a lowbuget as we are, go ahead! However, don’t expect much from this place expect for the fact that it’s well located.Habitación espaciosa y muy limpia, excelente ubicación.

Un alojamiento magnifico, nos encantaría repetir. Una ubicación estupenda, a buen precio. El alojamiento muy limpio y ordenado. Wifi con buena conexion. Nos informaron de que no podíamos utilizar la cocina y no comprendíamos por qué y, una vez alli, entendimos que era porque estaban terminando de montarla. Esto no supuso un problema durante nuestra estancia.
Dos días antes de nuestra llegada, tuvieron problemas con el agua caliente de los baños privados, pero nos ofrecieron una disminución del precio o la cancelación de la habitación. Nos informaron de que podíamos usar el baño publico.
Las chicas se mostraron muy amables y, aparentemente, siempre dispuestas a ayudar, aunque la comunicación con ellas resultó difícil. Solían tardar en responder y en ocasiones no hubo ni respuesta. Igualmente, nos debían proporcionar gel y champu y no lo tuvimos, a pesar de avisarlo, aunque imaginamos que fue un despiste.Un buen alojamiento, lo mejor es sin duda la zona. Si no tienes teléfono inteligente con internet propio, NUNCA PODRAS ACCEDER. Tienes que acceder al link para abrir la puerta cada vez, olvidate si te quedas sin batería. 
Esto no es airbnb y me parece irrespetuoso que se venda acá. Son habitaciones y bodegas de acceso independiente sin ayuda de nada. I would say this place is best for a group who has travelled to Madrid before and the location is very good ( 2 mins to calle Alcala) and 24 min ride to the airport with uber or the airport bus which stops 4 min walk from the airbnb! The only thing that was a real issue was the heat.

It was not enough for the room, much less for the whole apartment.
The third room has no window, no AC of any kind. It was REALLY HOT.

Obs: Baño con mal olor y debería haber 2 váteres, la luz se va en toda la casa con frecuencia, los aires acondicionados no enfrían y la luz de la cocina es muy débil.

%100 recomendable el alojamientoI hate to write bad reviews but this was a horrible horrible stay. The location is prime- it’s right off Gran Via.  However, that’s the only positive about this Airbnb. The host is too busy to respond- every question I asked received the same copy and paste response. He kept telling us it would cost 3 euros per bag if we wanted to leave them at his office before checkin (even though it was only 1 hour before). The place is more like a hostel. The bathrooms were grimey (there is only 1 toilet, the other one only had a shower and sink), the place smelled, sheets were stained. I would still have been ok with it except there was no crib after I confirmed with the host that it would be set up before arrival. When I called him (at 730pm), he told me it was too late because there was no one else but him at the office. He very rudely told us to come to his office to pick it up from him because apparently it was our fault that we didn’t notice his error before his staff left for the day. When i told him we needed a crib and that’s the main reason why we chose his Airbnb over other locations, he again told us to go pick it up from him. In the rain. WITH. OUR. BABY. If that’s not bad enough he hung up on us, then brought the pack and play and a disgusting stained mattress to us after we called Airbnb to complain. Both were wet from the rain. Dropped it and left with zero apology. 
Some of the sheets were stained, making us wonder about cleanliness of everything from the sheets to the towels. 
If you are looking for a place to crash near Gran Via and don’t care about cleanliness or customer service, this is your place. Otherwise, especially if you’re staying with a baby beware and look elsewhere!!Excelente ubicación y muy cómodoPosizione perfetta. Pas assez de serviettes de bain drap taché , et gros manque de vaisselles dans la cuisine ( merci aux voisins ) . Gros problème d'électricité , avec disjoncteur qui sautait régulièrement . Donc un chauffage pour 5 pièces  en novembre ... Le top !! Bref pour finir réclamation de 15 € pour soit disant une serviette et un tapis de sol tachés ... alors que nous ne sommes pas du tout d'accord !!!! Tout est bien rodé , une vraie petite entreprise . Désolée c est trop facile mais pour nous du AirBnB de cette façon... A EVITER!!!!We had a really nice time in Madrid and the appartement was well furnished, very clean and adapted to our needs. The only little problem was the heating, the windows were not completely isolated and the power went out everytime we turned on the electric heaters.De verdad muy complacido con tu apartamento , muy cómodo y realmente es tal cual como se ve en la foto , excelente ubicación , muy céntrico a todo , tiene supermercados cercas y también parking el cual fue de gran utilidad , ya que trabajo con turistas de discotecas el cual son muy exigentes , pero realmente son muy amables y respetuosos de igual forma que atentos a la hora de cualquier duda que tuviese . Muy agradecido , los utensilios de cocina muy útiles y a su vez la limpieza estaba un 10 de 10 , la verdad excelenteReporte calidad precio bien, el piso tiene problemas de voltaje eléctrico, se va la electricidad al usar varias equipos eléctricos,  agua caliente se agota, estas dos cosas en invierno pueden resultar incomodas, en cocina no hay muchos utensilios, poca luz, del otro lado excelente ubicación y camas cómodas, espacioso, el ruido de la calle puede perturbar un poco el sueño en 2 habitaciones principales al estar en un 1er nivelUbicación excelente, el anfitrión muy amable y rápida respuesta.Very niceExcelente departamentoEl apartamento está muy bien ubicado, céntrico, limpio y con todos los detalles, altamente recomendable. Estamos seguros que la próxima vez contactaremos con ustedes. Gracias por todo.Muy buena ubicación y personal de contacto muy atentoAppartement situé parfaitement pour visiter la ville à pied. 
L'appartement était un peu petit pour 8, et manquait un petit peu de propreté mais la localisation vaut vraiment le coupEs un lindo departamento para estar de paso por Madrid, algunos días. La ubicación de día es increíble, pero de noche no es de los mejores barrios para estar con niños pequeños ya que hay muchos bares en las cercanías, aunque el sonido apenas llega al departamento.Apartamento con una ubicación inmejorable!

comments:
Andrés es muy amable, la habitación es cómoda y acogedoraAndrés is really attentive and kind guy. Really appreciated the hospitality and attention he gave me. He answers quickly and is always attentive.Unterkunft war in Ordnung. Andres war nett und hat alles gut erklärt. Allerdings hätte es sauberer sein können (z.B. Hundehaare an der Bettwäsche). Außerdem habe ich mich in der Gegend nicht 100% sicher gefühlt.A gusto y como en casa.Andrés super majo y atento , su perrita cuca super cariñosa y adorable , he estado muy agusto .Disappointing.  Not as nice as the photos.Muy limpia, no hay mucho espacio pero no hay ruido y me ofreció ventiladores. Sin problemas Friendly guy. Great locationColchón incómodo, se clavan los muelles.
Estancia sucia.
Muy buen anfitrión y muy buena comunicación.Andres es un chico muy-muy amable e inteligente. Me encontró con gran nivel de hospitalidad y bienvenida. Con gran cariño Andres siempre me ayudó en mis necesidades. Su casa está muy auténtica con atmósfera de tranquilidad. Habitación pequeña pero contiene todo que te necesario para descansar bien y cómodo.Muy buen lugar para estar un tiempo.Muy buena hospitalidadAndres place was really nice. He was a great host and very welcoming. No problems and a great nights sleep!Andrés había preparado la habitación y estaba todo muy limpio. Es muy simpático y te explica todo lo que debes saber sobre el piso y los alrededores. Tiene un perrito muy bueno y cariñoso. La relación calidad-precio es óptima. Repetiría sin dudasLa habitación parece más nueva de lo que es, el colchón incómodo y en la ventana no hay persiana, la puerta de fuera hace ruido y se oye porque la habitación está al lado y la puerta de la habitación no se puede cerrar con pestillo desde dentro. Anfitrion correcto y perrita inquieta pero no pesada.Andres é muito atencioso mas sua casa deixa a desejar, precisa de uma reforma desde a entrada do prédio até o banheiro que só tem uma luz fraca dentro e não tem como trancar a porta do banheiro (o que não é nada agradável). Já no quarto a cama é muito barulhenta , achei que ia cair dela durante a noite por conta do barulho que fazia. Todo amabilidad y hospitalidad. Lo recomiendoThe room is exactly as advertised, Andres is very helpful and friendly and was very welcoming and accommodating despite the language barrier.Estancia muy agradable y 100% recomendable. Gute Lage und Metro Anbindung.Good place for 1 or 2 nights in Madrid

comments:
La descripcion del anuncio era correcta. Daniel nos espero al llegar y fue muy amable explicandonos todo lo relativo al departamenteo, ademas de datos sobre la zona y una gentileza respecto de un retaurant cercano.
La zona es muy buena y accesible y el edificio muy tranquilo.La estancia en Madrid ha sido estupenda. Gran parte gracias al apartamento de Daniel. 
Este viaje ha sido planeado como un regalo de cumpleaños a mi pareja por lo que todo era importante. El piso está súper bien situado, a dos pasos de Malasaña y Chueca. El piso súper bien decorado, limpísimo, con una cocina increíble. Aunque es pequeño, gracias a cómo está inteligentemente dividido, tienes todo el tiempo sensación de amplitud. Cuanto a Daniel, simplemente encantador. Ha estado esperándonos a la hora programada y nos ha explicado todo súper bien. Además se ha mostrado disponible para ayudarnos en todo. 
Lo recomiendo 100%Todo perfecto, espero volver pronto y muy a menudo. Lo recomiendo I have one regret about my experience at Daniel's apartment -- that I didn't book it earlier!!! Daniel is an amazing host. I only had two nights left in Spain so I requested a stay at his apartment the night before I needed to check in. His response accepting my request was immediate. The apartment was clean, modern, nicely furnished and located inside of a beautiful old building. Daniel was patient and very kind. He was always available for questions, directions, and recommendations. I highly suggest taking his restaurant recommendations -- you will not be disappointed. He also was willing to help retrieve and ship to me a personal item left in the scooter we rented while in Madrid. Daniel went completely out of his way for us, going well beyond the services of a host to help me get this item back after I left the country. I am so grateful that I had a chance to meet Daniel. More than a great host, he's a great human being. Salud, Daniel!Daniel ha estado atento en todo momento a cuando llegábamos y ha respondido siempre rápido a nuestras preguntas y dudas. La casa estaba nueva, cuidada y preparada para nosotros. Nos ha encantado. Appartement super clean, quartier très chic et calme. 
Daniel et son assistante sont sympathiques et à l’écoute.
Je vous recommande vivement cet appartement.
Really great flat, perfectly located and very well-presented. Everything was well thought-out - an excellent experience!Daniel was easy to contact and communicate with throughout the booking which made it so easy to ask questions and get information about the listing and area. 
The apartment building is exactly as shown in the picture, it's located on a quiet street near to metro lines and lots of amenities. Inside the apartment is small but beautifully finished, as shown in the photos. It has everything you would need for a stay and is still very new, clean and modern. 
I would definitely recommend this apartment to a couple or single traveller visiting Madrid for a few days. Daniel is a great host and very efficient in his communication, reducing any worries we had and offering advice around the local area. Great apartment and great host. 
Thank you! Daniel was super friendly. The apartment was perfect. Good location!La comunicación con Daniel fue perfecta. Mi vuelo llegó tarde por la noche, pero sin embargo, cuando llegué al edificio, me estaban esperando para darme las llaves y mostrarme el departamento. El lugar es exactamente como en las fotos y está bien ubicado. Recomendado sin dudas! :)Well Daniel was waiting for us in the street and welcomed us with a nice smile.
Then showed us the flat, explained everything about it, some tips about the city, providing us some maps. To say that Daniel's welcoming was very nicely appreciated!

The district is nice, quite street, metro lines are very close and anyway many interesting sights of the city are accessible by foot.

The flat doesn't maybe reflects any kind of Spanish atmosphere due to a previous standardised renovation, but anyway it's clean, functional and comfortable. 
Daniel es un anfitrion estupendo, nos recibió en el apartamento, nos enseñó dónde estaba todo y puso a nuestra disposición info de la ciudad súper útil.
El apartamento es tal cual lo véis en las fotos, decoración minimal, súper funcional y muy bien ubicado.
Repetiré sin duda cuando vuelva a Madrid!Daniel's house was perfect. 
Modern, beautiful  and confortable apartment, you get everything you need at its kitchen.
It is my first time using an apartment instead of an hotel and it was a Success.
My next time in Madrid??.....Daniel's apartment AGAIN!!!
Thank you !!!!!
Enrique VillasanaTodo tal cual la descripción, la zona excelente con todo cerca. El apartamento muy completo y limpio. El anfitrión excelente persona. Todo muy recomendable. El piso es perfecto.  Exactamente como se ve en las fotos e impoluto. Muy bien situado, a un par de manzanas de el metro en una zona preciosa de Madrid.
Daniel es un encanto y muy amable, facilitándonos toda la información necesaria. Fue muy atento y flexible a la hora de adaptarse a nuestro horario de llegada/salida.

No dudaría en recomendar este piso así como de repetir la próxima vez que pase por la ciudad.
Daniel was a great host - met us promptly upon arrival and had a myriad of suggestions for thing to do and places to eat in the neighborhood. 

The flat is perfectly located near Chamberi, Malasana, and a 20 to 25 minute walk from all the major attractions (return, prado, the royal palace).  THE flat is well appointed, well designed, and perfect for a stay in Madrid.  Also, the apartment has A/C, which is great in the summer; and the building has a lift, which is great to get yuur luggage up.Again Daniel do it.
He was able to receive us too late at night.
And its apartment pefect like our last visit.
As I told before Daniel offers a very modern and confortable apartment with an excellent location.
Thanks (Website hidden by Airbnb) sure on my next trip to Madrid I will contact you again
EnriqueLocalización excelente. El edificio es muy tranquilo y está dotado de todo lo necesario para pasar unos días estupendos. El detalle del agua fría en el frigorífico es de agradecer así como la disponibilidad del anfitrión en la entrega de las llaves. Lo único inesperado es que no sabíamos que el apartamento era interior. ¡Volveremos a repetir!Great communication up front, check-in coordination with ease. We were staying with four people at Daniel's place and it was a great starting point for our adventures in Madrid. Daniel gave us some splendid advice regarding Saturday evening activities, as there was a music festival nearby. Definitely recommended!Daniel's apartment was very comfortable and well designed.
Nothing was missing.
Daniel was very helpful, spoke good English.
The apartment is in a perfect location near Metro and a very nice lovely area.
We were family with 2 children and we recommend staying there.
Daniel cuida al máximo los detalles de su apartamento. La casa está llena de pequeños detalles que hacen la estancia inmejorable. Su flexibilidad y disponibilidad han hecho el viaje maravilloso! Sin duda recomiendo este alojamiento a cualquier persona que desee visitar la capital. La ubicación es perfecta y la limpieza muy cuidada. Gracias Daniel! Muy biena experiencia con Daniel, el apartamento cumplia de sobra lo esperado, espero poder volver prontoLimpio, bonito y perfecta ubicación. The apartment is in a prime location and within walking distance (15-20 mins) to almost all of Madrid's landmarks. It's within two blocks from many restaurant and shopping options yet it is in a calm and quiet street. The apartment is very modern, clean and spacious. Would definitely stay here again in my next trips. I come to Madrid often, and Daniel's place is exactly what I need when I visit.  The place is in a great location, about a block from the San Bernardo station in the Chamberi neighborhood just north of Chueca.  The apartment is quiet, clean, the internet works great in the living room (although the bedroom reception is a bit spotty).  The bed is queen-sized and very comfortable.  And Daniel was an excellent host, helpful with information, friendly, responsive, and even walked me to a place so I could have breakfast.  The air-conditioner works very well, although the control strangely froze a few times during my stay.  Neither of us could figure it out.  Finally, although the balcony faces an inside-courtyard (not the street), there is plenty of natural light coming 
in.
I have never stayed in an AirBnB rental in Madrid more than once, but I plan to book this apartment as often as I can when I go to Madrid.
Thumbs up!Great appartment, great location! Thanks Daniel and Marcos! And sorry about the key Perfecta mi estancia,  y la atención de Daniel, como siempre más que atenta. Volveré pronto.El apartamento además de estar muy bien ubicado, está muy nuevo y cuidado, con todo lo necesario para poder estar a gusto en Madrid. 
Daniel fue muy amable y atendió a todas nuestras peticiones, como la de entrar después de las 11 de la noche. También nos permitió salir más tarde de la hora de salida. 
My friends and I had a great stay at Daniels apartment. The apartment is lovely, modern and clean! It's within a great area and I would stay here again! - one of my favourite Airbnb apartments. 
Thanks for hosting us! Excellent stay. Frankly the best part was Daniel. He was professional, courteous, thoughtful at every point of contact. He gave wonderful restaurant and siteseeing Recommendations & even provided a map. The apartment was perfect. Spacious shower and space. Met all of our needs. Would definitely stay here again. Daniel's apartament is very beautiful and clean, it looks exactly like in the pictures. Daniel is very friendly and gives helpful tips, I highly reccomend!This is a great apartment. Centrally located, quiet and functional. The space is not too big, but very well designed and perfect for 2 people. The bed is very comfortable and there is plenty of closet space. Public transportation is fantastic, several metro stations and buses near by that bring you to the touristic area in just 10-15 minutes. Great neighborhood and good restaurants. Daniel was extremely courteous, flexible and easy to communicate with. Stay in  Daniel's place. You will not regret it. I will definitely stay there the next time I go to Madrid., David was great. He welcomed us in his amazing appartment and described us the things to do in the city.

Just trust him and you won't be disappointed :)Excelente Depto, muy recomendable! Daniel muy atento, nos estaba esperando cuando llegamos. Buena ubicación, muy bien equipado , todo nuevo, se nota que se preocupan por los huespedes.Como siempre, la estancia ha sido estupenda al igual que la atención de Daniel.Perfecto. Muebles casi nuevos, limpieza total, tranquilo pero central. Daniel è un host molto corretto e disponibile, gentilissimo e a completa disposizione...molto puntuale e alla mano! L'appartamento è situato in una zona molto carina e autentica di Madrid a soli 10 min a piedi dalle attrazioni turistiche più conosciute... arredato con gusto è un vero gioiellino completo di tutto ciò che può servire per un paio di giorni! Torneremo presto a Madrid e abbiamo già prenotato nuovamente questo appartamento che è una vera chicca!!!Thanks for Daniel's kindness and consideration. We arrived there earlier than we expected. The neighborhood is very fun with many restaurants and bars, but it is also very relaxed and there isn't any noise to worry about! The apartment is clean, elegant, and spacious! I would absolutely stay here again, and recommend this home to anyone looking for a quiet place near in the heart of Madrid!

Yo vivo en Madrid y alquilé este piso para estar en un barrio cerca del centro de Madrid porque tuve un visitante. Lo recomiendo!!Great location for visiting a friend. Easy check in. Close to airport, shops and restaurants. Great modern hub. El barrio esta muy bien y el alojamiento también.Todo perfecto, limpísimo y muy bien situado. Daniel un perfecto anfitrión, si volvemos por aquí intentaré alojarme con el de nuevo.We had a nice stay at Daniel's place. Muchas gracias Daniel!Daniel place has got all you need for a stay in Madrid center. Daniel è stato gentilissimo ad aspettarci prima del tempo stabilito dalle regole e come sempre accogliente e disponibile!! È stato come tornare a casa!Buena estadia ! Gracias Perfecta ubicación y un pido precioso, con todas las comodidades y muy muy ordenado y limpio! Daniel es un anfitrión genial, volveremos!Apartamento perfecto por situación. Recientemente reformado. Muy limpio. Anfitrión excelenteDaniel was a great host! The space is luxurious and the location is wonderful... just a few blocks from my favorite eateries and coffee shops. A perfect stay! Como siempre, Daniel ofrece una estancia de la máxima calidad en todos los sentidos Hôte agréable et professionnel. Appartement impeccable aussi bien que sur les photos voire mieux. Very pleasant hoste and the appartment is very clean and looks exactly like the photos. The flat is located near very cool bar and restaurant.  we love the apartment of Daniel! Everytime we come back is like home!!! Thank you very much!!!Had a lovely stay! Nicely decorated and comfortableFantástico apartamento, limpo e muito cuidado. Accueil très sympathique de Daniel . De nuevo Daniel cumple todas las expectativas de sobra. Una estancia muy agradable como siempreLa estancia ha sido estupenda. Un apartamento ideal para parejas en una ubicación perfecta. Recomendable 100%El apartamento estaba perfecto. Cama buena, buena ubicación, buen anfitrión. Muy recomendable.Es un apartamento limpísimo,con todo lo necesario de menaje ,bien comunicado (hay de todo en barrio) ,fácil aparcamiento. 

Sin duda repetiremos .Great host, easy communication and check in. Amazing location with lots of advice and very friendly!Die Wohnung ist sehr sauber, modern und hell. Daniel war sehr kommunikativ und hilfsbereit. Die Lage ist sehr zentral aber trotzdem ruhig. Leider hat man keine Aussicht aus der Wohnung und es ist sehr hellhörig. The apartment is very clean, modern and has everything you need. Daniel was an amazing host. He was so helpful and welcoming, insisting this was our home for the week. We had a lovely time. Alojamiento en un estado genial, muy bien equipado. Todo fueron facilidades desde el inicio. Muy recomendable.Gran estancia como siempre en los apartamentos de DanielFenomenal como siempre !!Clean and comfortable flat, perfect location. Daniel is very friendly host. I definitely recommend this accommodation to everyone.Spotlessly clean, excellently located, well equipped place. Great value in Madrid. We were very well looked after.¡Piso impecable! Desconozco cuándo se hizo la reforma pero está totalmente nuevo. La zona es tranquila, muy cerca del metro pero dando un paseo se puede ir a todos sitios. Apartment is clean and exactly like displayed photo.   We stayed 4 nights this time and will be happy to stay here again next time when we come to Madrid.Great flat, modern, comfortable and practical, v good location, v close to metro though we walked most of the time really enjoyed our stay great host pleasure to deal with Thanks!Muy funcional, limpio y cómodo.  Ubicado en una calle tranquila y cercano a comercios y restaurantes. Su decoración moderna y el contraste de lo típico de su fachada exterior hicieron  nuestra estancia muy cómoda. Daniel excelente anfitrión. Lo recomiendo.Lovely apartment in the perfect location. Perfect for a weekend getaway !! Recommend very highly and Daniel is the perfect host.Daniel es un excelente anfitrión. Todo muy limpio y cuidado, la ubicación excelente. Súper recomendable!Daniel's place was super well located near fun neighborhoods and close to metro too. Daniel nos dio la bienvenida explicándonos todos aquellos planes que nos podrían interesar. It is in a great location, close to three metro stations, shops and restaurants. The apartment is very quiet and clean. It has everything you might need. You will not regret staying here. Daniel is the perfect host. I have nothing negative to say. I just love it!El piso está genial. Todo reformado y buenas calidades. Muy comodo y Daniel encantador. Repetiré!Experiencia increíble, el piso era muy acogedor y disponía de todo lo que podíamos necesitar.Todo genial! Tanto la llegada, como el piso! Muy recomendableIt was my second time with my family at Daniel house. Everything was PERFECT & AMAZING!!Great location. Great space. The host is kind and friendly.Daniel è stato molto gentile, ci ha dato consigli su dove mangiare a malasaña e consigli sul giro turistico. Appartamento moderno, pulito e ristrutturato. Unico consiglio, se si lasciano le capsule del caffè lo zucchero sarebbe graditoEstuvimos ya en varias ocasiones en este apartamento porque es muy cómodo y la localización es muy buena.Excellent location near cafes and bars. Metro just around the corner and only 10/15mins walk from the heart of the city. Apartment was clean and spacious. The host was very accommodating, allowing us to check in early. Reasonably priced. Would definitely stay here again.Excelente apartamento, muy bien ubicado.Daniel’s apartment is on a quiet, residential street, but one street away there are loads of shops, cafes and restaurants. If you want to see daily life in Madrid rather than tourism, this is a great place to do it. That said, if you want to do tourism, there are various metro stops within a short walk. All in all it’s a great location.

The apartment was spotlessly clean, all very modern and apparently recently redone. We had no trouble checking in at the apartment with José (Daniel’s friend) even though our train got us in late. José took time to show us the place and answer any of our questions. He was also readily available to chat over the internet. In general both Daniel and José struck us as very professional about their work on Airbnb.

All the appliances worked well, and it was good to have a microwave for reheating food. 

Only drawbacks to be aware of are first that there is no view to speak of out the windows: they look on a nondescript airshaft, although they do let in light. Second the walls are paper thin, so when the neighbor talks on his phone late at night or early in the morning you hear every word.

Thanks so much to Daniel and José for a great apartment in Madrid!Siamo stati più volte nell’appartamento di Daniel e sono sicuro che la prossima volta che andrò a Madrid la prima cosa che farò e prenotate di nuovo questo appartamento ... pulito, carino, centrale ... è difficile trovare qualcosa del genere a Madrid!Amazing stay at this perfect location in Madrid!A pesar de q es pequeño nos ha resultado cómodo para los 4 (2 adultos y 2 niños). Esta muy bien situado. Y lo mejor, muy limpioInstalación moderna, cómoda, fácil acceso a transporte y atracciones del centro de la ciudadThe appartement is really well located and really cozy ! It is in a great location -- close to a lot of fun neighborhoods -- making it easy to get around either on foot or via the metro.  I loved my stay here and would definitely stay again.Bonito apartamento al lado de la calle Fuencarral, muy buena ubicación, parking de pago al lado. El piso, la ubicación, muyy bien!Great place 
Would book it again

The host was great
And gave us few tips 
You can’t beat the location EXCELENTE apartamento ,atención, ubicación!!!The house is as it appears in the photos, clean, tidy and in a very convenient position to reach the city center on foot or by subway. Daniel is a very kind and caring host. Highly recommended!Excelente Apartamento muy comodo y bien ubicado. Lo recomiendo 100%. Daniel es muy buen anfitrion.Daniel is a great host. Daniel nos recomendó sitios por la zona! El piso muy limpio y confortable!En un lateral de la calle Fuencarral muy centrico y acogedor. Very clean, well designed and perfectly equipped. We explored Madrid mainly by foot, which is very easy because this place is smack in the center. Also, you have 2-3 lines of subway very close. 
Conclusion : highly recommended.The apartment is very quiet, well equipped and very clean.
It is in a trendy area and full of e very kind of shop. It’s close to metro stations, Bilbao e Fuencarral.

Completely new appartment with excellent ameneties and quality! Daniel, the host, is very welcoming and helpful. Daniel was super friendly when he checked us in and also gave us some tips for our stay. Very beautiful apartment in the good house.

Perfect for any weekend in Madrid. All goods and attractions are close to home.

We would like to return to this apartment again, definitely.

Super limpio. Buena location. Volvería sin lugar a dudas.This is a fantastic apartment for a large group of friends wanting to explore Madrid. We were a group of eight and apartment provided ample space.

The apartment is in a fantastic location right in the centre of the city.  It has clearly been recently renovated and has been finished to a high specification. The apartment was beautifully clean on our arrival and communication with Jose was excellent.Very nice apartment in perfect location.Buena ubicación, apartamento bonito y amplio.Très bel appartement dans un bel immeuble art-deco. Très bien situé au pied de la Gran via et à 250m du métro. Communication rapide avec le propriétaire. Rien à dire. Fidèle aux photosPerfect.. everything..En cuanto al apartamento perfecto tanto en calidad como en ubicación y respecto al anfitrión, muy correcto, amable y servicial.很好的位置Great location and spacious apartmentTrès bel appartement ! Situé idéalement pour visiter Madrid à pied.
Très agréable à vivre.
Seul bémol : les chambres situées côté rue sont un peu bruyantes ( 4 couchages concernés sur 12) et deux salles de douches avec WC dedans. 
6ème étage avec terrasse avec vue sur les toits juste superbe !
Bistro pour petit déj situé au rez de chaussée.
Je recommande vivement, vous ne serez pas déçus !Casa accogliente e ideale per famiglie o compagnie posizione meravigliosa pulizia ineccepibile 
Direi che non ci si può aspettare di meglioTrès bel appartement. Super localisation. Génial pour séjour en famille.Great place great locationBeautiful apartment in the centre of Madrid. Walking distance to everything, very stylish place!My family and I (8 adults and 2 toddlers) spent 12 nights in this gorgeous apartment! It’s on the 6th floor with two elevators. It’s stylishly decorated, spacious, sparkling clean, the beds are really comfortable AND the most important... unlimited hot water (not always the case in an Airbnb)!!! We were even provided with a portable crib for the toddlers which was a lovely touch! We found it very kid friendly with lots of space, no sharp objects or breakables at their level. There are also a bunch of city parks nearby!! There is a massive balcony off one of the bedrooms which is perfect for enjoying coffee and taking photos. 
It’s perfectly situated off Gran Via so you have several neighborhoods/sights easily accessible by foot! There is a small Carrefour supermarket nearby and a larger one at Corte Ingles about 7 minutes away by foot. A few things to note - as we were there for almost 2 weeks we cooked a lot. The hosts leaves an array of juices and muffins for you however you will need to purchase oil, vinegar and spices as they are not provided. Also, two of the bedrooms face the busy street and can be quite noisy at night. Luckily that didn’t bother us as we are used to city noise but we recommend bringing earplugs if you are a light sleeper. All in all this apartment is absolutely perfect for large groups traveling together!! Highly recommend!!! We will be back!Inmejorable locación por ubicación para hacer turismo, seguridad, aseo impecable; facil, rapida y cordial comunicación con el anfitrión. Facil checkin y checkout. Gracias por su hospitalidad, volveríamos sin duda.Excelente ubicación!! La terraza lo mejor <3 La llegada inmejorable y la ubicación es súper cómoda para estar muchas personas.Buena estanciaLogement conforme aux photos, emplacement idéal, vue sur les toits de Madrid. Appartement très grands avec deux salles de bain. Parfait pour des groupes d’amis ou famille.
Disponibilité de l’hôte parfaite.Pedro fue muy agradable. Además el apartamento estaba genial, localización inmejorable y el apartamento es según se ve en las fotos. Todo perfecto.Beautiful clean flat in a very central location! We loved our stay in Jose's Air BnB.  
Spacious rooms with plenty of amenities. We would love to come back!Amazing apartment, wonderful balcony, big dining table, super comfortable beds, modern furnishing, light-filled rooms, perfect location.

Jose was a great host. Although we booked this Apartment for a group of 12 people, he provided an extra bed for a friend, who decided to join us 2 weeks before our stay. Thanks for that! Easy check-in and check-out and very good communication.Apartamento muy grande, bien equipado, construcción muy antigua, pero decorado con gusto y agradable. Ubicación perfecta. Comunicación perfecta.This apartment is breathtaking. 
Beautifully decorated, lots of space.
It has 3 rooms with double beds and 2 more rooms with smaller beds.
Best of all, the apartment is in the middle of the City.
The host writes back very quickly and is very helpful.
Thank you I would book again immediatelymadrid & jose turned out to be excellentGreat location, stylish apartment & prompt communicationGreat location, easy to find underground parking, 31euro/ day.Apartment is huge we fit 10 girls perfectly and the mirrors on the doors made getting ready stress free! Great location just off one of the big shopping streets. Would highly recommend and can't wait to come back and stayWonderful apartment in a fantastic location. The apartment was beautiful. It is refurbished in an older building with high ceilings and beautiful crown moldings. The furnishings are modern and comfortable. The apartment was clean and had most everything. We were a group of 5 adults and 4 children and felt like there was plenty of space. The location is great. It is walkable to many attractions, close to the metro, and has many shops and restaurants nearby. Jose and Pedro were wonderful hosts.The apartment is very spacious so it suits bigger groups very well. The apartment is also very nicely decorated and it was super clean when we arrived. The location is really good right next to Gran Via and close to the Malasana area. You can walk any where at the city center area if you like. We didn't need to use public transportation once. We only took a taxi when we came and left to the airport. The apartment has a really nice balcony with a great view. This was one of our favorite things about the apartment. Since the apartment is next to Gran Via it's not a quiet location but suits you if you like to stay at the city center. But it's not right next to any big tourist attractions either so it's very convenient spot to stay at the city center area. The apartment is very well equipped with a dishwasher, washing  machine, coffee maker, hair dryer etc. There were a lot of extra towels, pillows, blankets etc. The beds were really comfortable and all the bedrooms had good curtains to block the light. Jose Luis is was a great host, he was always answering really quickly to all of our questions and checking in to the apartment was made super easy for us. I would recommend this apartment to any one who is staying in Madrid and would definitely stay here again if I ever go back to Madrid.Jose and Pedro were great hosts, communication was fantastic and the apartment was spacious, clean and perfectly located. I would highly recommend!El apartamento tiene una ubicación perfecta, justo al lado de la gran vía. Es tal cual se ve en las fotos, muy limpio, bien decorado y súper amplio. 12 personas se pueden alojar perfectamente sin estar agobiadas. La comunicación con el anfitrión ha sido muy fluida y nos han facilitado tanto la entrada como la salida, adaptándose a nuestros horarios en la medida de lo posible. 100% recomendable.Great apartment. Will definitely stay again!!  Great hosts.Super appartement !
Localisation parfait et communication avec l'hôte facileLocation and apartment were amazing! We stayed as a family but would be ideal for a group of friends also. We booked on arrival in Madrid so literally a few hours before check in and the hosts were great organised cleaning last minute (as people had checked out that morning) and allowed us to leave luggage whilst cleaning was going on. Would recommend bookingAmazing apartment was perfect for a party of 12 girls, location is fantastic and would highly recommendRecomendamos este apartamento por ter uma privilegiada localização, pelo cumprimento do contrato e ótimas instalações internas .Beautiful, light and airy apartment in a great central location. Close to many of the main touristy attractions and also easy to get to some of the more local parts of Madrid too. Stylishly decorated and very clean. 

The terrace/ balcony off the main bedroom is perfect for sunny breakfasts with outstanding views over Madrid. I will miss my morning coffees there in the sunshine! 

Jose Luis was an excellent communicator and always replied quickly before and during our stay. The shower broke shortly after we arrived and he sent someone very quickly to fix it. 

Note the some of the furniture is IKEA and so quite flimsy / not in the best shape when we arrived, albeit probably more practical for an apartment that is often rented. 

Overall, a wonderful and fun stay and the apartment was perfect for a girlie weekend. Would definitely return! 

Gracias Jose!Bel appartement situé au plein cœur de des magasinsMe and my family (10ppl) spent couple nights in this place. It was fabulous. The apartment is very clean and beautiful and located in very great location, surrounded by shops and beautiful architectures. Lots of public transportation. We will booked here again for the next trip for sure!This apartment is absolutely beautiful. It is spacious and all the pictures are totally accurate, in fact they do not do the place justice- it is even better in real life. There is a great social space, with plenty of chairs and the bedrooms are unreal. The hallway, ceilings, doors are all amazing (plenty of mirrors too!) honestly it is one of the nicest places I’ve ever stayed. Would definitely recommend to large groups/ families and if ever in Madrid again with a big group (maybe a hen do reunion!? ;)!!) I would stay here again <3 it was close to shops, restaurants, roof top pools and bars... FANTASTIC ACCOMMODATION!This is a beautiful apartment and deserves its top rating
Wonderful in every respectSpacious apartment perfect for our family trip. Jose was super efficient with comms and very helpful. Thank you!!Buena estanciaGreat location.  Clean, spacious and beautiful apartment.The place was big and clean, everything you need for a big group was readily available, and the location is great, close to everything, the only reason I’m not giving it a five is because there is only AC in the living room and one bedroom, as we were there during a heat wave, it was hard to sleep without AC, in my opinion, in order to consider it a luxury apartment, it would have to have AC for the summer months.The location was excellent. We were able to do and see all Madrid from this spot. We were met upon our arrival and were provided with recommendations and links to activities and services that met our needs.The location for the place is very perfect for the people looking for shopping and fun time.Very nice apartment. Big, clean and in a great location with many restaurants and grocery stores nearby! We were able to walk to many attractions and also used the subway, just about a block away. And the host was very nice, greeted us when we arrived and sent us some tips about the city and transportation. The only reason for not giving 5 stars is that they have AC only in the living room and one of the bedrooms. There are ceiling fans in the other rooms. They helped but it was still hard to sleep, specially in the room with two bunk beds. We would stay there again but not during summer.Great apartment.  In a fantastic location. We really enjoyed our stay here. The apartment is decorated  lovely and the balcony is wonderful. You will enjoy your stay.My stay at Jose Luis’s place was amazing. With fit a group of 10 there and it was beautiful and accommodating for all. We were referred to Javier to handle our check in and he was so helpful with everything. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone looking to stay a few nights in Madrid.Very nice condo, with great location close to everything. José and Javier are amazing hosts and very helpful.Súper recomendadaStylish large apartment with large living room & dining room area, super central and great for large groups.Our family of five stayed in Jose Luis's place and enjoyed every moment. The place is stylish and has all the amenities one would need (do need to bring shampoo, soap, etc.). The best feature is the location. The metro was located across the street, and everything we would need was in walking distance. The large family room was perfect for those who wanted to come back to the apartment to relax. We did notice that one of the showers was not draining and sent a message to Jose Luis, who sent someone over to fix it the next day. Very transparent, quick communication. We  definitely recommend the place to others.Jose Luis' place is a big and beautiful apartment that's great for groups. We spent two weeks at the apartment and it served as the perfect home base for exploring Madrid. The apartment is just a few blocks from a number of different metro stations, making it an easy place to use as a home base to explore the city.Excelente apartamento, bien ubicado y muy espacioso. Todo está como en las fotografías y el host super atento a todo. Me volvería a quedar ahí cuantas veces se requiera.The best choice you can take!!Excelente apartamento, muy buena ubicación en el centro de Madrid.
Jose Luis fue un excelente anfitrión.Excellent location. We enjoyed our stay at Jose Luis’s place. The apartment is spacious and comfortable to fit 10 people.  
The communication with Jose Luis was smooth and easy.  We highly recommend it!

comments:
La habitacion tiene una excelente ubicacion. Muy cerca de los museos y parques, hasta la estacion de tren. En mi corta estancia en Madrid, Miguel fue siempre muy atento. Lo recomiendo si deseas tener la posibilidad de caminar a los principales puntos de interes.Excelente ubicación y trato de Miguel ! TopMiguel es una persona encantadora, muy amable y hospitalario. Repetiría sin duda. 100% recomendable. ¡Muchísimas gracias!Miguel is a great and attentive host, very quick to respond and communicate! The room was everything I needed and perfectly clean and tidy, and flat is quiet and well located close to the main train station and two metro stops, plus only a short 15-20 min walk into the center of town, El Prado and the Retiro Park. Unfortunately we had some trouble with the WiFi when I first arrived and I needed to do some work, but Miguel spent a great deal of time helping and trying to sort it out - he called an engineer who came over and we eventually got it solved and working. Wasn't a major issue and certainly don't think it is a regular problem with the internet. Miguel is also a great artist so make sure you check out some of his paintings!I contacted Miguel last minute (literally) to avoid a long trip to the suburbs to my original accomodation. Miguel answered promptly, and his room was ready for me to stay in it. The apartment's location is perfect for people arriving to or leaving from Atocha. Best bang for the buck in Madrid.Miguel es muy hospitalario y la localización excelente. 100% recomendable!Excelente anfitrión: amable, comunicativo, cálido. El espacio es excelente y la ubicacion es muy buena por estar cerca de la estación d Atocha. Super recomendableMiguel es un anfitrión detallista, la ubicación ideal, al lado de la estación.
Buena calefacción, buen barrio y casa tranquila. Puedes mantener una conversación interesante y sustancial, además de conocedor de Madrid y sus rincones de obligada visita.Mi experiencia fue excelente, la casa tiene muy buena ubicación, cerquita de Atocha, la habitación es muy cómoda y Miguel es muy amable. Volvería sin dudar.Miguel is a wonderful host. Clean apartment and easy communication. The apartment is ideally located very closed to the Atocha train station. I recommend.Great place to stay with a wonderfully friendly and helpful host. Close to the Atocha stations (I came in on the bus), and stayed for a comfortable night before my plane ride home the next day. Close to metro stations and grocery stores as well. Would stay again!Miguel is very kind. Easy walk to all the important sights of Madrid.

Super appart très bien situé avec très bon acceuil (petites attentions comme coca, eau et vin à l'arrivée). L'espace est très bien aménagé!Léger détail : ne pas se doucher tous à la suite car eau chaude un peu capricieuse!
Encore Merci à RenanHemos estado alli unos días y la verdad bien,  un poco pequeño para los 4 que eramos pero limpio,  centrico y cómodo, renan super atento repetiriaUn agréable appartement! bien placé et très propre !  je suis très satisfaite, merci encore une fois I would like to thank Renan, he was great host 
And the apartment was great in term of location and price 
I really recommend this flat  Very nice place, spacious, great location, Renan was very helpfulDe este apartamento hay que destacar la estupenda ubicación cerca de todo , nosotros estuvimos muy cómodos dos adultos y dos niñas , el apartamento limpio y el anfitrión nos dejo entras antes de la hora y pudimos dejar las maletas también destacar el detalle de que nos dejaran refrescos y agua en la nevera . El agua caliente para cuatro justito y para el coche los parking carísimos hay dos cerca pero 32 e la noche , así que el coche a la calle y zona azul gracias que el fin de semana no se paga  Foi uma boa experiência em Madri. Eu e minha esposa ficamos cinco dias e fomos recebido de forma muito profissional. Apartamento muito limpo com toda estrutura para uma estadia confortável. O único problema que tivemos foi  com relação a limitação da água quente, somente nos permitindo banhos muito rápidos. O apartamento esta muito bem localizado a poucos metros de inúmeros pontos de interesse. Our stay at Renan's apartment was very comfortable. The apartment was clean, and in a really great location. There was a bottle of wine waiting for us when we arrived. We loved our time in Madrid, and can't wait to get back!La estadía en el departamento de Renan fue muy buena, fue muy amable cuando nos entregó las llaves y nos explicó como funcionaba todo. Es un departamento súper espacioso y muy lindo (igual a las fotos publicadas). Les recomiendo 100% que se queden en este departamento.Renan's apartment is fantastic - it's modern, very comfortable, well-equipped and in an excellent location. There were three of us and we had plenty of space with the double bedroom and bunk beds in the living room. Renan and his team were really accommodating, flexible with check-in and check-out times, very quick to respond when we arrived and even let us store our luggage in another nearby apartment after we checked out. If you come to Madrid, this is an amazing place to stay - I doubt you'd get anything anywhere near as good for the same price. Highly recommended.Great location and a nice apartment. Everything is comfortable and the quality of furniture was higher than most apartments in this price range. I'd rate it an excellent value. Very clean! Also, Renan was very helpful and found a place to store our luggage between checkout and our train leaving Madrid.The apt was as expected -- clean and comfortable.  Location was good for exploring east to historic sights or west to rio madrid and lago pool.  Fine value for what we spent.  Nice apartment, everything is just like we saw on photos. Great location, in the city center.  
This was the first time that we rent apartment by Airbnb, and we were very satisfied. 
With Renan it was very easy to communicate even we didn’t meet. 
Awesome stay! Thank you Renan and Carolina for taking us in at the last minute. The apartment was great in a convenient location. Other helpful features were ac ( Madrid is very hot in the summer) and the washing machine. The decoration is modern and the apartment very clean. Overall I would recommend.great. The location is really good and it is very clean!!! I would like to recommend it.L'accueil était très bien, très sympathique et arrangeant pour stocker les valises pour le départ. L'appartement était très propre et confortable. Il est également bien situé par rapport aux transports mais tout de même au calme.Apartments location is superb, quiet street, carrefour express is nearby (50m) and it is very convenient. Apartment itself is smaller than on photos. You can easily tell that it is allowed to smoke here. We have not seen Renan in person but all support was provided. Special thanks for the baby crib.My experience here was great. The apartment is located in a great location. a couple blocks around the corner from the main shopping strip. Upon arrival, we were given a low down on the apartment, some beverages were left for us as well. We felt safe to walk around the neighborhood at night, and was very convinent with a market right on the corner. We had a great experience in Madrid. logement  agréable, trés bien situé et conforme aux prestations proposées. La secrétaire ,Carolina, est une personne accueillante et chaleureuse. Appartement idéal pour visiter Madrid à pied. El apartamento está muy bien ubicado y equipado. Renan es un excelente anfitrión, totalmente recomendable.Very well located apartment, you can walk to the main attractions, small supermarket nearby and thousands of good restaurants in a walking distance. Good apartment for a short stay.My friend and I had a great stay at gran via apartment!! Check in went smoothly and given a great introduction to the apartment. the apartment itself was perfect. big bedroom with a comfortable bed and a great bathroom. there is also a bunk bed in the living room of there are more guests. nice compact kitchen. it really had everything we needed! For 2 nights of our trip we did not have hot water, and when we contacted the host about the issue it was ignored. Air con does not exist although advertised in the description. Upon several offerings from Melvin to leave our bags in the office, we arrived and were again made to wait for 15 minutes before anyone would be able to see to us. A positive of this apartment is that it is in a good location, however I would not recommend and would not stay there again. Excelente ubicación, limpieza y hospitalidad.Todo fue excelente hasta el día de la salida. Nosotros habíamos consultado con el anfitrión a que hora teníamos que abandonar la estancia y él nos confirmo a las 11:00. Nosotros ya teníamos nuestro equipaje preparado a la hora indicada para dejar el apartamento pero una de las chicas necesitaba el aseo y nos demoramos algo más en el apartamento  (teniendo todo listo para dejarlo sobre la marcha, concretamente 20 min más tarde). A las 11:20 con todo recogido, maletas preparados simplemente esperando por una de las chicas que estaba usando el baño, la persona encargada, entendemos  coordinador de la limpieza y las llegadas (era la primera vez que la veíamos ya que el check in lo hicimos con otro chico muy encantador, Melvin) entró de manera abrupta a la casa gritando y diciendo "de aquí se tienen que ir ya, tengo otros huéspedes esperando, ustedes se van ya" y con unas formas bastantes groseras creando una situación  bastante violenta tanto para mi como para mis propios amigos. Tardamos menos de medio minuto en lo que ella entró en abandonar la vivienda pero igualmente ella continuó con sus gritos, llamando a alguien por teléfono (creemos que relacionado con el alojamiento quejándose de que estábamos allí cuando ella llegó a la estancia), encima los nuevos huéspedes también estaban allí con ella con caras de estupefacción similares a las nuestras. Entendemos nuestra parte de culpa por haber permanecido 20 min más en el apartamento de la hora indicada por el  anfitrión pero creemos que nuestro retraso no es justificación para las faltas de respetos, los malos modos y el trato grosero que recibimos por parte de esta persona miembro del staff y sobre todo, que nos parece una pena que después de estar pasando unos días muy agradables entre amigos, donde el alojamiento estaba cubriendo altamente nuestras expectativas, se haya visto empañado finalmente de forma negativa por la actitud grosera y mal educada de una persona que es carente de unas nociones mínimas de servicio al público y habilidades comunicativas.Muy bienMuy buen sitio... todo impecable y con tres aires acondicionados!!! Apartamento en buena localidad, muy callado y seguro, cerca de la Gran Vía y todos los monumentos y entretenimiento, un poco incómodo para 5 personas; es I estudio con 1 sola habitación. Pero pudimos acomodarnos.

amenities: {TV,Wifi,"Air conditioning",Kitchen,Elevator,Heating,Washer,Dryer,Essentials,Shampoo,Hangers,"Hair dryer",Iron,"Laptop friendly workspace"}
comments:
Emilio’s place is newly refurbished and is absolutely beautiful and stylish. We loved it! In fact, the six us (the two of us, our two sons, and their wives) didn’t want to leave to go to the north coast, but we have reservations there. The three separate bedrooms and bathrooms were very private and gave each couple nice personal space. Towels and sheets were very clean. The location was fantastic - quiet, convenient and close parking, and very near great restaurants, bakeries, and coffee shops. Emilio made special efforts to communicate with us and even to allow us to check out later. Five stars all the way around! We would definitely stay here again!Wow, wow, wow!  This place exceeded our expectations and then some.  I cannot recommend it highly enough.  The location, the stylish, newly-refurbished apartment, being spotlessly clean, the attentiveness of our hosts and the little special touches from the hosts that made us feel special and super-welcome to Madrid...including a surprise welcome gift that just blew us away (read below).  I had my original Airbnb that I had booked many months before cancel due to electrical problems the afternoon before a short 5 day stay in Madrid.  It sent me into chaos, but fortunately this apartment had just come onto the airbnb market.  It was like a blessing in disguise as it ended up being a much better choice.  LOCATION - first of all the location is in a relatively quiet street, but what is in the super-chic Malasaña neighbourhood.  This is one of the best locations to be in surrounded by super-cool restaurants and bars and adjacent to Chueca, with easy walking access to all the major sites around the central area of Madrid, including Gran Via, Puerta del Sol etc. THE APARTMENT - is located on the 4th floor of an apartment building that does require some steps from the elevator.  The apartment seemed to have been recently renovated and was absolutely spotlessly clean.  The photos just do not do it justice, but I really like the modern eclectic design of the place, with a motorbike as a feature and these wooden hand chairs that have to be seen to be believed.  You could see that whoever decorated it showed a lot of attention to detail with nice little touches in the bedrooms.  And importantly for visiting Madrid in the Summer there are air-conditioners in each of the the 3 bedrooms and the main room and they work very well. WiFI also worked well.  Soap and towels were well supplied for each of the rooms.  Although, we did not do much cooking (just eggs for breakfast) there were cooking and dining utensils provided.  THE HOSTS - for our stay were Aram and Emelio.  Communication with them via the app was easy and very prompt.  They kept in touch with us before and after our flight to make sure that they could meet us when we arrived at the apartment. Aram met us at the apartment and showed us around.  The check-in process was very easy.  For our stay they also sent us a list of local restaurants and places of interest that they recommended, which was helpful when deciding where to go to eat out.  Aram made it clear that they would always be on call for whatever we needed while we were there, which was reassuring.  I would have to say that the thing that was completely unexpected which kinda "blew us away" and really made it clear that we had very special hosts was the welcome gift that they had prepared for us.  To welcome us to the apartment they had prepared a large fruit platter, a large platter of ham and cheeses, as well as complimentary bottle of wine, bottles of water, savoury snacks and muesli bars.  This was completely unexpected and really set the tone for the attentiveness of our hosts in making sure that we had a good time there.  We were sending photos of this to our friends back in London, and they could not believe what they saw.  I want to thank Aram and Emelio for being really fantastic and attentive hosts.  I would have no hesitation in staying in this place or any other place they would host in Madrid.  And I really look forward to visiting again.Everything was 5 star from location to apartment to management. We loved everything and will 100% be back!!Beautiful and comfortable house in an excellent location! Emilio was extremely kind and replied immediately to all our questions or requests. We strongly recommend to stay at his place and enjoy all the beautiful spots in Madrid that you can reach nearby!Nice and clean apartment that is within walking distances (10-20 minutes). What was expected was received and this is greatly appreciated. Emilio is a great host and provided us places to go, see and do with local tips about the city. Highly recommend this stay.非常棒的屋子,我们是晚上到达的,房东很晚来帮我入住,并向我们介绍了整套公寓｡公寓位置非常好,设施也非常新Truly excellentEmilio has a great place in Madrid. Close walking distance to the center and to the metro. Place is clean and beautiful. Would def stay again.Excelente ubicación, nuevo limpio, con muy buen diseño, práctico con todo lo que necesitas para estar en madrid , excelente y Emilio muy buen anfitrión.The Apartment is everything you see and more - 5 stars!
Everything is new, shiny and clean. 
All bedrooms are big. 
The Bedroom next to the entrance has its own HUGE bathroom and shower. it is VERY quiet (which is great). and has a skylight which is fun.
The second bedroom doesn't have its own bathroom but has a bathroom right next to it which is also big and pampering. 
The third bedroom is very big, has a small cool hallway leading to it and its own bathroom. this bathroom is smaller than the other 2 but the room itself is a bit bigger.
we were 3 people and it really didn't matter which room anyone took since they are all great, no noise, big and comfy. 
The kitchen was great, all appliances, cool table and chairs. big fridge. just everything. only good things to say here.
the living room is big, nice couch, smart TV, AC.
all rooms have AC which is more than strong enough and very quiet. 
Location: Great location, literally 5 min away from grand via. quiet street. 
go up 1 floor for the elevator that only goes up to 3rd level. we were at 4th. but a very minor problem. 
I would book this apartment again in a heartbeat.Espaço maravilhoso, confortável, aconchegante e muito silencioso.

Tudo pensando nos mínimos detalhes além da decoração lindíssima. Localização excelente.We really liked the apartment and it’s location, it is even more lovely than on the photos.
It is a short walk from the main roads and easy to find. There are shops and restaurants all around. The place is central, but very quiet inside the apartment and has everything we needed.
Very nice style and plenty of space in each room. The communication is quick as well!公寓非常棒,位置也不错,周边有超市､餐厅也很方便｡公寓装饰很有设计感,很喜欢,值得推荐!Wonderful place. Our best air bnb experience to date. Beautiful apartment, with outstanding decoration, great amnesties, and responsive hosts that are happy to share great local tips and answer questions.Definitely stay here! Centrally locates and absolutely beautiful. The elevator is a huge plus and the bedrooms and bathrooms are spacious and spotless. They let us check in early and stay late and we’re gracious hosts.  Five star for sure!If you are planning a trip to Madrid look no further and book this place! Aside from the place it’s self being gorgeous, it’s location is also very central to everything. There are coffee shops, bars, and restaurants walking distance.  You are a short metro ride to may of Madrid’s most popular places. Such as Puerta Del Sol, Gran Via, Plaza mayor and others. Host was very responsive, hospitable,  and added very nice touches. Highly recommend!!Emilio’s apartment is not only stylish, it’s very comfortable and ideally situated in a trendy yet quiet street. We were very pleased with the comfort of the bed, and Emilio’s responsiveness to our requests. The building and the street are quiet, one can sleep very well there.:) We highly recommend!Wow! Great apartment in the best location of madrid! We loved it!Todo okPerfect !The apartment is very well located and very nice for 6 people. The 3 rooms with 3 bathrooms are very comfortable and quiet. The beds are a little hard but nothing that will keep you from sleeping. We asked for early check-in and as the apartment was not used the night before and they gave it to us. I would definitely recommend this place !!Amazing space! We arrived after a few hours of traveling by train and we were greeted with wine and appetizers! Truly a class act. I would definetly come back. The apartment was in a great location. We had a wonderful experience.A great place to stay in Madrid´s Centro. Impecably clean and with lots of stilish touches. Air Conditioning or Heating in all bedrooms and a heater in all bathrooms. Good amenities. Definitively a great value for money. Our familiy loved it.Excellent location for all of the sights and activities - we walked to everything we wanted to see and do in Madrid!  Very stylish, clean and very quiet.  Perfect for a group of six to enjoy relaxing before and after sight-seeing.  Hosts are welcoming and attentive!!
