Très bel appartementEl apartamento es perfecto y tal y como se ve en las fotos. Está muy bien situado y la tención fue inmejorable.
Sin duda lo recomiendo.Piso muy bien equipado, limpio y localización inmejorable. Tambien nos algunos detalles de bienvenida. RecomendableThe apartment is located between Sol and Malasaña so it's not directly in the hustle and bustle of both areas. There's a small bar on the ground floor but that's no problem because the living room is facing the streets while the bedroom is facing the inner courtyard. Wifi is good. It's a spacious place with its own room for washer dryer. It's stylish and comfortable. Right beside it is a grocery. Everything you need is just walking distance. No swarms of tourists here. 

This property is managed by property managers. The light bulbs in the main bedroom (ceiling) were both out since my second day. I told them about it but they didn't do anything. So for the rest of my stay, I have been surviving with night lamps which is hard since the bedroom is in the interior. Also, I couldn't understand the dryer (I'm not even sure it's a dryer) and again, they did not get back to me on how to make it function as it was not drying the clothes even after 4 cycles. Usually, that's not a problem is there's a drying rack or something but there weren't any. I hope the property management company would step up their game.The apartment looks exactly like the pictures. The location is excellent near everything you want to see in Madrid. The metro station is just a few steps away and there is a small grocery store also a few steps away. Overall we enjoyed our stay in this apartment. I would come back.Just great! Good location, confortable and safe. I highly recomend.A great apartment! Very good locationthis flat is simply perfect to stay in  Madrid . Close to center, very proactive managers, clear, full of any little detail. Spettacolare Totalmente recomendable, hemos estado mi marido, mis  dos niñas y yo. Totalmente céntrico buena accesibilidad, masima limpieza, muy recomendable, seguro q volveremos.Ubicación perfecta y Apart en perfecto estadoGreat apartment. Excellent location. Very clean, safe and has all you need to stay for some days. Many amenities around, including a Carrefour express next door.  We really enjoyed staying over there! Good location and clean and nice place! Metro and carrefour express is right next so very convenient!! Recommend!Ubicación perfecta, acceso al metro al lado, apartamento bien equipado y acogedor, buena atención y sin duda repetiría.Een appartement op een handige plek. Ideaal met warm weer: airco! 
Communicatie via WA was prima This was a wonderful, large apartment with great lighting and big rooms, including a laundry room with both a washer and a dryer. The bathroom was the largest of any apartment I had previously rented. The location was great and within steps of the Plaza de España and the Gran Vía. There is a grocery store next store that has everyone one might need. Everything is within walking distance but just in case, there is also a metro stop right outside the front door. It was perfect.Un apartamento precioso en pleno centro de Madrid. Limpio y coqueto. Nos ha encantado y volveremos pronto!!!Todo perfecto, la ubicación inmejorable, a un paso de supermercados, bares y la Gran vía.
Carlos, el chico que nos recibió, super atento y servicial en todo momento. No ha faltado un detalle.ottima posizione e nell'appartamento.Recomendadisimo. Bien comunicado, decorado con mucho estilo, camas comodisimas. La comunicación con el anfitrión inmejorable. Bien comunicado. Repetiremos si volvemos a Madrid sin lugar a dudas.Decir que el apartamento está en muy buena situación, muy limpio y acogedor. En el caso de ir a Madrid de nuevo, no dudaría en volver a contactar para hospedarme en el mismo apartamento.El departamento esta impecable, decorado con muy buen gusto, muy comodo; y se encuentra ubicado en un barrio con historia, tranquilo y a la vez muy entretenido.
Fue una Gran Estadia!!  :  )
Sin duda ...Volveremos!!Maria Jesus and her apartment managers were very good at contacting us and meeting us at the property to show us around. The apartment itself is in a great area, a few minutes walk from lots of bars and restaurants in a really cool area. Really comfy bed and stylish apartment too!Well equiped appartment in a perfect location in Madrid downtwon to explore the city! The organisation was professional and the appartment very cosy and clean!Muy bien!Awesome. Chic apartment, with plenty of natural light in the living room and bedroom, packed with amenities including a clothes dryer and a Nespresso machine. The air conditioning & WiFi are great. It's largish by city centre standards, great for 2 and adequate for 4 people. With an elevator and tight security. There's a Carrefour next door as well.
But the most amazing thing is its location. Literally a 4-5 minute walk to Gran Via with all it's shopping, and Plaza Espana, within 10 minutes to The Palacio Real, the Opera House, & The Museum of Modern Art. Even Retiro Park and the Prado & Reina Museums are  a pleasant 25 minutes away, on foot.
Hundreds of great restaurants & bars, from budget to luxury, including some serving outstanding Chinese cuisine, to choose from. 
There's an elevator to the Plaza Espana Metro station 25 metres from the apartment and 2 other Metro stops (Noviciado and San Bernardo) within a 5 minute walk which makes getting anywhere, including the airport, a breeze.
And finally a shout out to Eduardo and Ricardo for handling check-in, check-out and other requests beautifully.Hemos estado genial. Muy buena comunicación, buena unicación y lugar tranquiloBell appartamento letti confortevoli, ottimi arredi ed attrezzature, zona molto centrale ottimo in tutto.The apartment is located beautifully. There are many cafes and restaurants in the area. the apartment was very clean. everything is good except sleep in the living room. very noisy, especially on weekends and at night when garbage is being taken away. The apartment is ideal for a couple and sleeping in the bedroom.The apartment was great. Location is perfect, the apartment is super clean with all needed amenities, and extra pillows, blankets and towels. The host and management company helped us with a special request we had before arrival.
I will mention that the hot water current in the shower was very very weak, making it a bit unpleasant to shower. I informed the contact person about this but unfortunately he didn’t do anything with that. All in all - a very good and pleasant stay.El apartamento tiene muy buena ubicación. Es muy acogedor, con muchos detalles. Nos recibieron a la hora acordada y Carlos fue muy amable atendiendo todas nuestras preguntas. Sin duda volveremos si tenemos ocasión.muy recomendableEmplacement parfait appartement propre et très agréable . A compact apartment with nothing missing. Luxurious shower with hot water all the time.Appartement parfait pour 3 personnes pour visiter Madrid. Son emplacement permet de visiter les lieux les plus connus en se déplaçant à pied mais pour les personnes souhaitant des déplacements plus rapides, le métro est juste au pied de l’immeuble. Malgré la proximité de la Gran via, l’appartement est très calme et sécurisé.Muy recomendable, fantástica ubicación y el piso espectacular.Ótimo apartamento , bem localizado e limpo. It's handy for restaurants and there is a Carrefour supermarket just next door. It's right beside the Metro so easy to get around Madrid. The bed is comfy. It was a nice place to stay.Maria’s flat is in a great location and the communication with the agency that run it was amazing. There was a person waiting for us to check in and anything we needed was dealt with immediately. 

This flat is perfect for two people and I would recommend it with no doubt. However if you are three like we were, its not very suitable. The sofa bed is too uncomfortable and the light pours in as the blind did not work and the curtains were too thin. As a pair, the bright light in the living room is a great plus, but not so much for the person sleeping there.

Overall our stay there was great and we walked everywhere we wanted to go. For a central location, the flat was also very quiet.  

With a better sofa bed, this place would be amazing for more than two people.Woundeful time , excellent location,Highly recommendedThis apartment was great! Perfect for a couple but not for more people. It has a supermarket right next door. Place is very clean and quite. In a great trendy district with good bars and restaurants but quiet in the flat.Piso muy bueno con una ubicación perfecta (2 minutos de Gran Via).
Muy buena experiencia!Todo estaba como se describe y como aparece en ls fotos. Buena estancia. Muy recomendableThe apartment is perfectly located next to the stop Plaza España, great for reaching by foot really nice streets in Malasaña and Chueca. Gran Via is just a minute away. The location wasn't as loud as expected, although the ones sleeping in the living room could hear the trash-trucks who were collecting in the middle of the night. The sofa-bed was very small and we had for two people just one single bed sheet, but we gave it to the children, who slept behind, in the quiet bedroom. The door and window to the "balcony" (?), where the washing machine and the dryer are standing, were broken and couldn't close, it was therefor cold in the kitchen and the doorway. The lamp in the living room wasn't working... so overall the location was perfect, but a few things not. Nevertheless we had a great time and the host was very friendly.Volvería! Just overall great experience.A very central place. Right next to a metro station and a supermarket.
A clean, comfortable and very safe apartment.
There is an elevator to the apartment. Easy communication with the home care company. We will be happy to stay againEl piso esta muy bien: impecable, comodo y práctico. Le faltaban algunas cosas de vajilla.
La ubicación muy buena, cerca de la gran vía y de lugares que hay q conocer. 
El unico problema es q el edificio es muy ruidoso (los vecinos) y teniamos una obra en la calle de la entrada con lo que las maquinas trabajaban desde muy temprano.
Lo recomiendo igualmenteThe apartment was clean and conveniently located, within walking distance to the city center. I’d highly recommend this place!El apartamento es muy cómodo, limpio y está perfectamente ubicado. Perfecto para familias! Esperamos regresar pronto!El apartamento está muy bien ubicado, es iluminado y tiene todo lo necesario para una excelente estadía en Madrid.Comfortable, spacious apartment in a nice location. Easy check in and easy communication.El apto es excelente. Apropiado para ir con familia. La ubicación muy buena pues tiene a una cuadra la Gran vía, una estación del metro a unos metros y un supermercado donde consigues todo lo que necesitas para tu estancia. Recomendable 100%Muy buen servicio y la casa es muy bonita y en el centro!!Miy recendable,buenos  servicios y excelente ubicación!!!!Appartement agréable et très bien situé.Great location, superb flat with great amenities. The Plaza España metro station is within the same block, a supermarket just  20 Ft from the entrance; can’t be any better, super value...
Highly recommended..Great apartment for 2 people to stay in. Washer and dryer in apartment was great. Location was good right by a metro station but also walking distance to major attractions.  Comfy bed. And good communication with/from apartment handlerThe apartment is very clean with full amenities. The check in and check out process is really easy. Great value for money!It is in a very good location for exploring  Madrid.  The subway is right outside the door and grocery store a few doors down if you would like to cook at home.  The place is cozy, neat, and clean.  The host was accommodating at our arrival and had a professional courtesy.Marìa is absolutely a superhost. The service was excellent, the location great and the extra recommendations we received were absolutely wonderful! We enjoyed our short stay and will be back for more of Madrid! 
Thank you!Un  excelente  departamento, muy  comodo ,   con todo lo  ofrecido y en una  muy buena ubicacion .
A pocos  metros  de  la  GranVia y  a  pasos del Metro.-Precioso apartamento súper céntrico.Très bien placé dans Madrid et très bel appartement.Perfect location just steps from metro station and few minutes aways from Gran Vía. Very easy to check-in and they allowed me to drop my luggage off early while they cleaned the apartment. The only negative is the noise from neighbors, being in the middle of the busy city I expected outside noise, but the walls are very thin and I could hear the neighbors talk and move around and was woken up several times throughout the night. So if you are a light sleeper this might not be the right place. But other than that, the apartment was great!Apartamento céntrico y buena comunicación con la empresa que gestiona el alquiler. El apartamento no estaba en un estado óptimo ya que tenía bastantes humedades y las paredes estaban muy sucias. Otro detalle a tener en cuenta es la presión con la que esperan (literalmente en la puerta de entrada) a la hora de check out.Nous avons eu un super séjour dans ce logement. Très bien situé et très propre. Attention à l'adresse c'est 1, 2ieme étage et non 12.Centrally located. A little noisy if you're not used to the city. Perfect  for exploring.This apartment is very centrally located and we could walk everywhere we wanted.Great apartment! 
The location is good, and the team handling the apartment is very responsive on all your needs.
Recommended!muy bien todoIt's in a prime spot & fairly simple to get around once you get the hang of where you are. There's a transit station right outside, BUT just double check where you are going & if you can use that one, other then that theres another one a few blocks away. You can hear noise for sure, not super load, but if your sensitive to it, this might not be the place for you. Theres a supermarket yards away which made it easy for us.Emplacement idéal pour découvrir le quartier... et la ville. Appartement pratique et propre.Excelente lugar para hospedarseThis was an absolute amazing space! The location is perfect for getting around the city or just staying in and relaxing. 

The apartment has all the amenities that you need for your stay. The apartment is bigger in person too.

Maria left helpful local tips and the building is very safe and secure I would love to return to Madrid.

Communication was fast and easy. 

I absolutely recommend this apartment!This is a beautiful apartment. There is a metro entrance outside the gate, very convenient. Maria help us ordered a car take us from airport to apartment. We had a wonderful trip in Madrid.El departamento de Marìa Jesús es muy cómodo y se encuentra totalmente equipado para una estadía larga. La ubicación es muy buena ya que está cerca de la Gran  via y Plaza España. A tres cuadras del Metro para conocer todo Madrid. En la misma cuadra hay un supermercado Carrefour muy completo. 
Cuando llegamos nos esperaban en el departamento lo cual es muy importante luego de un largo viaje. 
Nos comunicamos con Carlos con facilidad y rapidez. 
Lo recomiendo especialmente. Sin duda volvería.

comments:
I had a wonderful stay at Gyorgy's penthouse. The place is close to everything, yet quiet and peaceful. The terrace is absolutely beautiful. Gyorgy and his girlfriend were supe nice and accommodating (asked for super early check-in). Thanks for everything!The best host ever. A gentle and polite person who delivered accurately what his add in Airbnb says. The house is cozy, clean, bright and comfortable. Highly recommended.This is one of the best Airbnb flats I have stayed at in Madrid. Gyorgy was great to work with, and check in and out was smooth. The flat is spacious and super clean. & having a terrace is the perfect way to spend your evening. The location is on a quiet street next to one of the cooler neighborhoods, Malasana. If you like going to the city center, that’s a quick walk as well. Again, can’t say enough good things!Gyorgys place was perfect close to every amenity ,tube etc and super proximous to all the nice bars and restaurants in Malasana/Chueca areaGyorgy’s place could not be in a better location. He was always very regardful and made us feel comfortable since the beginning. The place looks exactly as shown in the pictures and the atmosphere inside the apartment is very pleasant. Highly recommended!Mi estancia en casa de Gyorgy ha sido perfecta. La casa y la terraza son preciosas. El trato y la ubicación inmejorables.It was a great stay at Gyorgys flat. Check In was very easy and location was top. The great roof terrace is very cool and you can enjoy the sun. The flat is very central about 150m to the metro. The contact was very nice and we got some good hints for the stay. Absolutely  recommendend for a Madrid city trip.Biggest shopping street (gran via), pubs, metro station and tourist bus stop are only 150 meters away. Very cosy, clean and calm apartement for 2 people.Super terrasse dans un environnement très calme et sans vis-à-vis ! Quartier animéGreat location and the terrace is amazing!Great location, next to Gran Via. and very friendly atmosphere in all surroundings. La localización es una dd las mejores de Madrid. A 20m de Gran Vía pero en una calle muy tranquila. Ideal para no perder tiempo en desplazamientos.Fantastic location, perfect flat for a weekend break. Very central and walking distance to everything you need to see. Friendly host very helpful with check in.Nice place very clean !
The location is just perfect for discover this beautiful city !
We could come back easily !Hi! We liked staying at Georgy&Andrea's place! The location is amazing and the apartment is very cosy. Only thing missing is a kettle for making a tea/coffee. But that's an easy fix, I guess. Cheers and thank you for hosting! LukasUn superbe appartement très bien équipé et au cœur de Madrid. Excellent séjour.Gyorgy’s spot is amazing. Highly recommended for your next trip to Madrid. Located in a great neighborhood but very quiet and secluded. Hard to leave the rooftop patio!Lovely apartment right in the centre of Madrid. Loads of bars and restaurants close by. Gyorgy checked us in personally. He and Andrea were super nice and helpful with perfect English and great recommendations. Highly recommended.Amazing hosts, Andrea and Gyorgy made it so easy to coordinate check-in and any other needs we had, as well as with tips on what to do around the area. Very clean, modern place in a very nice building. The downstairs has a kitchen and dining table with a small bathroom and upstairs has the bedroom, master bathroom and lovely terrace to lounge on. 
Location is amazing, very central with everything you need within a 5-minute walk from the apartment. 
Thank you guys, hopefully, I can stay at your place again in the future!Amazing place in the heart of Madrid with wonderful hosts! Enjoy the beautiful terrace and never have to get in a car. You will be able to walk everywhere. I highly recommend staying here.We had a great time in Madrid. Gyorgy and Andrea’s apartment is in a great location and they also gave us some great tips for local restaurants and cafes. I’d highly recommend a stay here.Great location, great place, great host.. everything is perfect.appartement design très central et calmeHad a wonderful stay. Lovely place, the terrace is great and communication was very smooth. Would definitely recommend it !Un hogar con personalidad, acogedor y con una ubicación perfecta. Trato amable y flexible. Recomendable 100%.Definitivamente nuestro alojamiento preferido en Madrid.

No conocimos a Gyorgy pero nos recibió Andrea, que nos esperó en casa hasta que llegamos para darnos las llaves y explicarnos las reglas de la casa, darnos algunos consejos e informarnos de todo lo que necesitamos saber sobre el alojamiento. El apartamento es muy bonito y cómodo y tiene todo lo que se necesita. Es ideal para una o dos personas. La cama es muy cómoda y la terraza bastante grande. Las plantas que tienen en casa hacen del apartamente un lugar muy acogedor (por favor, cuídalas si te alojas en su apartamento). La ubicación es perfecta, entre Malasaña, Chueca y Gran Vía, y el apartamento es muy tranquilo, a pesar de estar muy cerca de bares y algún club.

Nosotros, si es posible, repetiremos.

Very nice apartment, the metro is just few meters away, the host is very kind and friendly.
Thanks Eduardo & Raul for the amazing experience.Alojamiento con todos los servicios y comodidades, el cual, la hospitalidad fue de lo mejor. Buena ubicacion. Comunicación con Eduardo y Raúl excelente. Sin ningún comentario negativo.Es un departamento muy agradable y acogedor, situado cerca de lugares muy turísticos. El check in y check out son super faciles, el departamento brilla por todos lados, una limpieza excelente,  volveria a repetir!We really like the Goya area where this apartment is located, so we enjoyed our stay. The apartment has an internal arrangement on the ground floor with no outlook. But the large bed is very comfortable and we had peaceful sleeps while we were there.The house is brand new and clean. Eduardo y Raul have been extremely gentle. The house is in the centre of city close to most of the attractions of the city.Eduardo&Rauls place is great. I stayed for. About  a week and the apartment was super clean they had coffee if you needed it. The check in process was seamless. When I had questions they responded very quickly. The area is quite and the metro is just a few blocks away.We had a lovely stay in Eduardo and Raul’s apartment. Great location with some fantastic bars and restaurants very near by. The apartment is clean, cool and has everything you need.El alojamiento de Eduardo es tal y cuál lo muestran las fotos y Yo diría que aún mejor, súper confortable con todo lo necesario, el barrio es muy lindo y está lleno de lugares para hacer las compras diarias, tomar un café o cenar.
Con respecto a el transporte el Metro está  a unas pocas cuadras y es perfecto para ir de un lugara otro sin problemas y conocer Madrid.El departamento es realmente muy acogedor y con buen estilo, tiene todas las comodidades y serví disponibles para pasar unos días increíbles en Madrid. Eduardo y Raúl siempre atentos y muy rápido ante cualquier duda o consulta. Lo recomiendo al 100% si vas a Madrid para hospedarte.Cozy, well furnished apartment in Goya. Great value for your money.Todo perfecto! Volveremos!!! Muchas gracias!El apartamento es tal cual se aprecia en las fotos mas algunos detalles que yo me encontré no correctos los dejo aqui explicados. Limpieza con zonas no hechas encimera de la cocina llena de salpicaduras de aceite del antiguo inquilino que debió cocinar alli me lo dejaron .... idem en el baño y en la habitación me encontré pelusas de polvo, con que hacen una limpieza superficial. Lo peor el tema cobertura el apartamento es un bajo y se encuentra al final d un largo pasillo y cero cobertura imposible atender al telf ni llamar ni recibir llamadas un drama vamos !!Good value for money. Great location and host.
On a less positive note there’s no phone coverage inside the house (but there’s wifi). Also there’s not much daylight.El apartamento es ideal para dos personas, muy bien equipado y decorado con detalle. La cama es muy cómoda y el baño es amplio. El apartamento es un bajo interior, muy tranquilo para descansar. El barrio tiene unos comercios de calidad y está bien comunicado.Se trata de un apartamento céntrico y muy acogedor.  Estaba decorado con mucho gusto y toda la familia estuvimos nos encontramos muy cómodos.  La cama del dormitorio es super grande y pudimos dormir un matrimonio y un niño sin problemas.La casa de Raul está genial, muy bien ubicada y con espacio, perfecta para una pareja. Tenía todo lo necesario, incluso básicos de cocina que nos vinieron muy bien dado que tuvimos que cenar en casa en alguna ocasión.The apartment is very well located: 4 metro stations are easily reachable by foot. Commenting on some previous guests’ remarks: WiFi is indeed super strong, but the phone connection could be patchy from time to time. After all, this is a zero floor. The apartment is also very warm, not a small feat when it is rather cold outside: Madrid winter is quite chilly from time to time. One thing to mention though: the sink in bathroom is a bit smallish. Apart of that, you have all you could need, including olive oil, salt, sugar (not always you have those in the apartments!). We spent a wonderful week in Raul’s place and will seek his place again when visiting Madrid next time.

comments:
Ha sido una estancia genial.
El piso muy limpio y muy bien ubicado. Los dueños muy amables y accesibles ante cualquier duda. Sin duda volveriamos a repetir!Great apartment, perfect location and excellent host. What else do you need? Highly recommended! L'appartement est très bien situé (à cinq minutes du Palais Royal et en plein cœur d'un Madrid vivant) . Il est très calme et confortable. Nous étions une famille de 4 et chacun a pu trouver son espace. Il est très propre. 
David est un hôte attentionné et réactif. The apartment was great. Perfect to walk around the historic center in Madrid. David was a great host and made sure we were comfortable during our stay. Urige Wohnung, schön verwinkelt. Die Lage war unschlagbar. Die Einrichtung ist ebenfalls gut. Fön, Handtücher, Waschmittel, Küchenkrams etc. alles da.

Also alles superMy friends and I arrived on Friday and stayed until Monday. The apartment was fantastic! Great central location and had everything we need. David was very accommodating and we really enjoyed staying here.Excelente vivienda, con todo tipo de detalles para hacer de ella un lugar altamente confortable. Excelente ubicación, y atención personalizada. Muy recomendable.Great flat. Great area. Great stay. The stay at the apartment was wonderful, very well prepared and cleaned, central location and big enough for 6 to stay! This flat is  very centrally placed in a relatively quiet, residential street. The royal palace, Mercado San Miguel and Plaza Major were all within 10 minutes walk away, and the famous tapas street Calle Cava Baja was practially next door. The flat has all amenities and suited us down to the ground, but it may not be for all as two of the bedrooms are on mezzanines accessed by ladders, which can be a challenge if you have overdone the Cava or are prone to dizzy spells. Perfect if you are travelling with children, as ours loved it. The host and his representative were both very nice and helpful, and we had a great stay.Amazing stay! The apartment is centrally located. Beautiful decor, comfortable beds, very fresh and chic. Communication was an ease. We would recommend this apartment to anyone visiting Madrid. We loved the apartment so much that we wouldn't hesitate to stay here again! This was the perfect place for our stay in Madrid. It is at max ten minutes walking distance from all major sights with an abundance of tapas places all around. The beds were all very comfy and the apartment was clean and just as photographed. We would definitely stay here again! A beautiful, spacious flat in a lovely area. We were very impressed with the facilities, the cleanliness and the decor.  Four of us stayed for three nights on a very hot weekend. The flat is very cool due to the thick walls and shaded location - there's no air con but there are fans. We were pleased with this choice of apartment and would be happy to stay here again. There are some quirky elements to the flat e.g. two beds are accessible via ladders, but it's really well designed and fitted. Highly recommended. It is a lovely place and  walkable to all the most interesting points in  Madrid . Plenty of bars and restaurant in the vicinity, but luckily not noisy. 
Not suitable for people with height issues, as 2 of the bedrooms are up ladders and you cannot stand up straight. 
El piso es estupendo  tal como se muestra en las fotos. Super equipado Con todo lo q se necesita p estrar comodos .Esta en una preciosa calle de La Latina , y desde alli se lllega caminando a  la distintos lugares del centro.  Esta el mercado de la Cebada y muchos bares donde comer rico. El barrio tiene mucho para disfrutar. Lo recomiebfo para familia  parejas o amigod
; 
Muy bienThe best place to stay in Madrid!Piso ubicado en zona privilegiada, con todo el barrio a mano y tranquilo para dormir. Los anfitriones mantuvieron constante contacto con nosotros para asegurar una estancia de calidad. Todo fue como la seda, sin duda repetible 100%.El piso muy recomendable para pasar muy buen tiempo en Madrid. Casi en el corazón de Madrid, la localidad ideal. Entre 5 y 10 minutos caminando del Palacio Real o de la Plaza Mayor. Todo limpio y listo para alojarse. La comunicación genial con mucho cariño. Da gusto tratar con anfitrión así.Hernan place is really nice, well organized and in the best part of the center. I really recommend this appartement for a stay in family!We loved our stay in Hernan’s place! What made him a wonderful host was the he was easy to contact and when we had questions he replied quickly!

The apartment is just as pictured and in close vicinity to restaurants and shops. It’s walking distances to some big landmarks and a lot of shopping areas!

It got a little stuffy at night, but this was a quick fix by opening the windows in the house and using the fans that Hernan has placed in the house! 

Overall, a fabulous place to stay on your trip to Madrid!Excelente airbnb, el barrio es excelente, tengo entendido que es uno de los mejores de Madrid, cerca de todo, se puede ir a muchas partes caminando, realmente hermoso. Hizo demasiado calor pero alcanzó con los ventiladores. Y algo importante fue que las habitaciones que están en la parte superior resultan un tanto más incómodas de lo que imaginaba ya que está descripto en la información de la publicación pero lo fue. De todos modos hermoso hospedaje, muy recomendableLes hôtes ont été très disponibles pour répondre à nos difficultés. Le quartier est très agréable mais il est très difficile de se garer, car le stationnement est payant et limité  à 2h. Nous recommandons ce logement pour un très court séjour sur Madrid.This apartment is in the best location and exactly everything you need for a great city break. Cafes, restaurants and bars were literally right at our doorstep, and when we were going slightly further afield the metro was really close and easy to use. 

In addition to the cafes and restaurants, a supermarket less than 100m away. 

The apartment suited our five people perfectly and the host was extremely helpful and responsive to any queries we had during our stay.房子和照片上看起来的一样,地理位置很好,距离地铁站很近,边上有一个小教堂,毗邻一个小广场,吃喝都很方便｡距离市政广场和皇宫走路只有不到8分钟的路程｡室内装修很地中海风格,非常干净,床很舒服｡我们这次没有做饭,但是所有的炉子都是好用的,餐具也很齐全｡是3-4个人非常好的选择!David人也很nice,很热情!总之,是非常美好舒适的住宿体验｡唯一不足的地方就是地上有一块地板翘了起来,很容易绊倒,其他的地方没有问题了!

The apartment is totally the same as it shows in the photo, very good location, near to the metro station, there is a little church beside and a small square with a lot of restaurants. It is very near to the Plaza Mayor and Royal Palace, only takes less than 8 mins to get there. The decoration is full of mediterranean style, very tidy and clean, and those beds are very cosy. We didn't cook during our staying but all the cookers are complete. It's a good choice for 3-4 persons. David is very nice, hospitable and helpful!Any way, it was a very beautiful experience! The only tiny problem is a piece of floor tiped up, and easy to be stumbled. Beside this all is perfect!

El apartamento es totalmente igual como lo que muestra en las fotos. Está de buena locación, muy cerca de metro. Hay una pequeña iglesia y una chiquita plaza cerca, muchos restaurantes alrededor hacen todo muy fácil. Está muy cerca de la Plaza Mayor y el Palacio Real con un camino menos de 8 minutos a pie. La decoración es muy mediterránea, todo muy limpio, las camas son cómodas. Nosotros no cocinamos durante la estancia pero todos los hornos funcionan bien y los servicios de la mesa son completos. Es una buena opción para 3 o 4 personas. David es muy bueno, hospitalario y ayudado. En fin, es una buena experiencia estar allí. La única cosa que hay que poner es una parte de establado está arqueada, y f᠋ácil de tropear. Además de eso, nada pero perfecto.Hrenan is a great host, and the house was clean, spacious and had real atmosphere. And just 7 minutes walking from PLaza Mayor. So really center center. Be prepare to crawl for the second floow, because ceiling is low. We had a great time.A realy beautiful appartment in the heart of la latina.Ótimo lugar! Próximo de tudo. Localização e recepção excelentes. Apartamento limpo e cumpre o que promete. Apenas dois detalhes para consertar: as portas dos banheiros não fecham: a da suíte fica sempre aberta e a porta do outro apenas encosta. No piso de madeira tem dois morrinhos artilheiros para acertar o tampão do dedão!A lovely apartment right in the heart of Madrid. We were able to walk everywhere during our stay whether it was seeing the sites of the gorgeous city during the day or going out for food and drink in the evening. This place is great for everyone, families with young children and groups of friends looking to enjoy the city. As long as you do not have back issues or mobility issues this place will be very accommodating, otherwise the ladders to the beds may be a challenge however the owners a very forth coming with information and do everything they can to help.Le logement est super bien placé à quelques minutes à pied de la place Mayor dans une  rue calme.El Departamento está. Muy bien ubicado , él área social es cómoda pero las 2 habitaciones son muy bajas de poca alturaL’appartement est très très bien situé. Nous étions 6, 4 adultes et 2 enfants. Nous avons pu visiter tout à pied. Nous n’avons pas passé beaucoup de temps à l’appartement (juste pour dormir et prendre les petits déjeuners). L’appartement était parfait pour nous. Il est conforme à la description. 
Il y a eu un problème de fuite d’eau et David a été très réactif.Piso en pleno Barrio de La Latina. Aún así no es ruidoso. A 2 minutos del metro La Latina. Muchas tascas y bares alrededor.El piso muy bonito y limpio,igual que en Las fotos.Como indican,dos de las habitaciones son en buhardilla así que no puedes estar de pie en (Website hidden by Airbnb) nos importó ya que solo dormimos allí y las camas eran muy cómodas. Le preguntamos al anfitrión por sitios a los que ir por la noche y para brunch y nos asesoró muy bien.Repetiríamos en el piso!Todo muy bienEveryone was very helpful - we did have an issue with the floor while we were there but David was extremely accommodating and provided us with a refund for the inconvenience without us asking.  The space was cute, the location was central to some good bars and cafes - most of which are not open Monday through Wednesday just as a note if you are looking for night life you'll have to walk a bit but it will also be quiet when you get home!  The rooms were exactly as pictured and we were able to drop our luggage off before our check in time which was great! Marta gave us some great shopping tips on some local shops and there is a great jewelry store not too far away.Fantastic location, especially if planning on staying in Madrid.  David was a responsive host. His assistant Lola brought us a toaster and answered our questions about heating the place. Overall, it was a good experience.El depto muy lindo. La ubicación perfecta. Lo único es que se escuchan los ruidos de los otros deptos.Very nice Apartment with very good  and efficient room layout!
flexible Check in and Check out time :-)
good and enough kitchen equipment.
nice soft beds.This flat is very well located (very close to touristic places, to la plaza mayor, etc.) and everything can be done on foot. The flat is clean and very well renovated. Beds are very confortable. The bedroom closed to the street is a little bit noisy but the two other bedrooms are quiet. everything was ok in the flat except the DVD player that didn't work.We loved staying in David's apartment. There were four of us and plenty of room. It is was also nice and warm in winter with central heating.  We were surprised to find we hardly needed to use the metro as most places, including the old town and square, were very close and accessible on foot.The apartment in the heart of La Latina is beautifully decorated and centrally located within walking distance from all the main sights in Madrid. We had an amazing stay here and were touched by the kindness and hospitality of the hosts who went above and beyond. Thanks for a great stay!Erg fijn ruim appartement op een unieke plek. Rustig maar zodra je de deur uitgaat midden in de gezellige wijk La Latina maar ook in het centrum met mooie winkels en dicht bij de musea etc. Erg goede en persoonlijke begeleiding van David en zijn vrienden.This place was lovely. It was a stylish apartment with a lot of space. There are two bathrooms, which was helpful for a group of 6 girls. It's also in a great location. We were able to walk everywhere to see and do everything we wanted to see and do. David and his colleague were very fast with communication. When we couldn't figure out the hot water, his colleague came right over to help. He also organized for a taxi to take us to and from the airport for 30 euros each way. There are 2 lofts that we had to bend over in while we were up there. It was very fine and not bothersome for a weekend but if staying for longer than a few days, I might not want to be in the loft the whole time. Overall, we loved this place and had a very pleasant stay.David was a very diligent host! Great LocationBuena comunicación y respuestas rápidas por parte de David. El apartamento muy céntrico, ideal para un fin de semana en la ciudad.I stayed at the apartment for 4 nights with friends. It was very spacious and clean. 
The location of the place is good, it you like to walk you can get everywhere by foot and if not there is a metro close by! Would definitely recommend the place.En jättemysig lägenhet med gott om plats även för ett större sällskap. Den har ett perfekt läge i gamla stan och närhet till Metro. Amazing hosts were quick to respond any doubts and schedule check in and check out. Thank you for making my stay in Madrid amazing!This flat is very well located and everything can be done on foot. Flat interior is well organized, well decorated, clean, with a big comfortable living room (compared the the price), and beds are very comfortable.
2 of the 3 bedrooms are in lofts with very low ceiling after climbing a ladder, a bit bothersome but it is the way to have a not too expensive place with a big living room, just be aware that it is a potential issue for some people.
The host was quick to respond.Really good location!! We were able to walk everywhere except to the bernabéu which was still easy to get to on the metro. Lovely area of Madrid with plenty of lovely restaurants near by. 
Hosts replied quickly to any questions and were very helpful. 
My parents struggled with the ladders and low ceilings where the beds are but was fine for younger guests. 

Overall great stay!Hermoso el departamento. La atencion fue genial y la ubicacion optima, cerca de todo!Bien placé, conforme à la description. Accueil sympa et réactifOttima posizione dell'appartamento, molto centrale, in sei giorni di permanenza abbiamo usato la metropolitana solo due volte.
Un po' bassi i soppalchi con i letti matrimoniali
Cucina ben attrezzata.
Ottima disponibilità e facile comunicazione.Asunto on hyvällä sijainnilla, kävelyetäisyyden päässä ydin keskustasta. Sopii hyvin 6-7 hengen porukalle. Asunnon yhteyshenkilö oli aina nopeasti tavoitettavissa ja asunto oli siistissä kunnossa. Suosittelen lämpimästi!Lovely Apartment ! Patricia was so nice ! 
Great Location !Piso centrico. Confortable. Muy buena recepción . El único comentario es que en los  espacios para dormir de los entrepisos los techos son  bajos .Muy buena zona y muy buena atenciónThe location is absolutely amazing, you find yourself in the very centre of Madrid, close to subway, local market and tons of places to eat and go to.
Apartment itself is rather small, with all available square meters used as efficiently as possible; but it still gets you a good sleep.
The hosts were amazing and provided all the support we asked for. Definitely recommended!Good location and great apartment!The apartment had a beautiful location, very near everything. Even attractions like the Santiago Bernabeu stadium are 10-15 minutes away by metro. Also, the large walls of the place ensure that the apartment is not getting incredibly warm during the summer. 

We were with five adults, which seems to be the right amount except if you have children. 

Also, our hosts were very good. They responded very quickly and were very warm. When we had a send a small request in the evening, they responded immediately and acted on it the next morning.

Avec un soleil de plomb la petite climatisation fut la bienvenue, mais la douche aux carreaux manquants avec la bac repeint pour cacher les anciens dégâts montre sans ambiguïté l’esprit qui résume l’entretient We had a great time in Madrid and in the apartment. The communication with David was always smooth and he responded always very quick. It's a nice and clean apartment. 
Thx for the stay!La zona es muy centrica, los anfitriones fueron muy atentos y estuvieron al tanto de todo. La casa cuenta con sabanas toallas las camas muy comodas, y todos los utensilios necesarios. Recomendado!This is a fantastic apartment for a group of friends or a family, there is ample space and two bathrooms! it's in a great location next to local amenities and easy to walk to main attractions. The place was very clean and tidy, with a small kitchen with everything you need. the main bedrooms are on a mezzanine, with a low ceiling but we found this quite charming. David and Patricia were very helpful and responded quickly to our messages. All in all a great place to stay!Really nice apartment in a awsome location. If visiting Madrid this will serve you very well.Very good location to explore Madrid. Enjoyed it!l'appartement est très bien situé et spacieux. Les deux lits doubles sont en mezzanine accessible par des sortes d'échelles, il ne faut donc pas avoir de difficultés de déplacement. La literie est impeccable.Appartamento davvero in ottima posizione, a pochi minuti di distanza da tutte le attrazioni di Madrid. Non abbiamo mai preso la metro. Appartamento molto confortevole e pulito con tutto l’occorrente che ci si può aspettare. 
Lo consiglio vivamente.The location is great near food, shopping, cafe. Loved going to San Miguel Market! Everything was walking distance, Plaza Mayor too. The place was what we expected,  clean and spacious. Lola was very nice and met us at arrival. I would stay here again.L'appartamento è in una posizione ottimale, in pieno centro in uno dei quartieri più tipici di Madrid. La casa è spaziosa, pulita e ben areata! Consiglio a tutti un soggiorno in questo appartamento.The house is very well located and you can go almost anywhere in the center by walking. The house itself is nice, and cozy. Only thing is that there are stairs inside the house and they are not the most secure to go up and down. The rest was great. Thanks for everything!Buena atencionWe had a wonderful stay at Hernan's apartment. Great location, super stylish apartment, loved the tiled bathrooms. Pero he de ser honesto y he encontrado alguna deficiencia en la casa por falta de mantenimiento
Humedad en habitación y aseos.
Plato de ducha en mal estado.
Campana en la cocina no funcionaba.
Bidet suelto y salía todo el agua.
Maderas en una parte del comedor levantadas.
Paredes manchadas .
Puerta de entrada no cierra con llave.
Mi opinión que por el precio q se paga en limpieza desde mi punto de vista es mejorable.
Sugerencia de poder hacer autorización para poder aparcar en la calle ,porq sólo está permitido en parking público y te dejas un dinero.
Las camas son bastante cómodas.

La casa es muy bonita pero siempre y cuando se miren estos detalles.Very nice place, enjoyed our stay with 5 friends for 4 nights!excelente lugar   y hospitalidad para una estadia fantasticamolt ben situat i un bon apartamentsuch an amazing place. location was perfect.  they hosts were so kind and nice. Very nice place with a lot of beds and a kitchen. The bathrooms were very outdated and DIRTY. The host was able to fix some issues in one bathroom but the other one we didn’t even touch except to use the toilet... other than that everything else was accurate and clean!The apartment was wonderful. Very clean and in a great location close to all the exciting places in Madrid. The hosts provided us with a great list of recommendations for places we should go and explore, they were very responsive. They also helped arrange for us a van to bring us to the airport. Wonderful place!Great location, close to everything, very nice neighborhood full of life. The apartment felt very peaceful and secure.The location of the apartment is really good, many sightseeings are very near, metro station is also quite nearby. Nightlife is very near, from the same side the biggest noise is a couple of buildings away. Note the stairs to the upper bedrooms, check your possibilities and abilities in advance - all is described by owner and was good for us thus. The owner organised two-way transfer (from the airport and to the airport), it was nice, in time and fast. Check-in and check-out were well organised.Stylish place, great location. Loft bedrooms only entered via step ladders, not standing room in either. Doable, but unique.Es un alojamiento muy bien ubicado, caminando puedes llegar a todos los lugares de interés de la ciudad. Muy limpio y adecuado para familias. Muy recomendadoLocation is great! The flat is situated in the heart of Madrid, perfect to stroll around as well as to enjoy nightlife in La Latina! Market 5 minutes to walk. We had problems with the dishwasher as the machine was leaking...Fantastic location, really hard to beat!El apartamento es amplio y está muy bien ubicado. Aunque las habitaciones están en alto y sus techos son muy bajos es perfectamente habitable.Great location!Ubicación inmejorable!!La estadía en madrid estuvo muy bien. El departamento está en un lugar perfecto para moverse caminando a los lugares más visitados. Muy linda zona, la recomiendo. El departamento es tal cual está publicado. Casa elegante , spaziosa e comoda. Puntualità è comunicazione perfetti . Super consigliato per un soggiorno a MadridCharming appartement in an ideal location. We were for 4 days in Madrid with our 3 teenagers. Hosts organised our transfer from the airport and checkin went smoothly.
Despite the heat during the period of our stay, the appartement stayed cool and the hosts provided airco and vents. 
Thanks!Location is perfect, only issue i had was the bathroom near back of apartment was problematic when showering. The water took a while to drain and therefore flooded the bathroom and the room next to it. Host was great to us, but that was the only issue.Appartement très très bien situé au centre de Madrid, parfait pour visiter la ville. Possibilité de presque tout faire à pieds, bars, restaurants et commerces tout proches. Très bonne réactivité de notre hôte David qui nous a réservé un taxi à l’arrivée pour venir de l’aéroport, c’était parfait, nous étions attendus comme prévu. Encore merci à David pour cela. L’appartement est très bien mis à part une des deux Douches qui est assez abîmée et qu’il faudrait recarreler. Nous avons pu passer un très bon séjour de 4 jours en famille à Madrid dans ce logement. A conseiller car le prix est intéressant et il est idéalement situé.Great host, central location, fast response and cozy placeExcellent location. You can walk everywhere. The appartment is great but the bathrooms could do with doing up and some painting.  Excellent appartment for great location. Two of bedrooms are up some stairs with low ceilings but this is indicated on information .Hi Leute, die Instandhaltung und die Sauberkeit könnten verbessert werden; was aber hervorhebenswert ist, war die Hilfsbereitschaft und die Erreichbarkeit.el apartamento increíble, super bien ubicado. Cual quier duda que teníamos la respondieron muy rápido. Lo único malo que tendría para decir es que se escucha mucha bulla de otros apartamentos, los tacones al caminar, cuando entran y lllegan hablando o riéndose. Aún así volvería a quedarme allí, vale la pena.Nice apartement, 
perfect location you can walk everywhere from the apartement,
Very hospitably公寓离老城区很近,离地铁站不远,但是床品太差了,整体环境很糟糕｡阁楼上的床……真的不忍直视｡还是推荐住丽池公园那边的住宿｡La limpieza está realmente mala, las paredes se encuentran todas muy sucias y la cosa es que los colchones donde duermes están pegados a las paredes lo cual no es agradable porque si está sucio, en algunas paredes había hasta mocos embarrados. El baño de la habitación principal la regadera muy deteriorada y sucia. El piso del pasillo está en reparación y para tapar pusieron una alfombra asquerosamente sucia , el colchón de la recámara accesoria está en muy mal estado de un lado está hundido y se duerme muy mal, de no ser porque hacen el cobro con antelación y no hay reembolso me hubiera ido de verdad. La sala muy sucia los sillones son “blancos” pero están muy sucios. La ubicación es maravillosa. Gracias.Appartement très bien situéWe would highly recommend this apartment! 6 of us stayed here for a long weekend and the apartment was really lovely and well laid out. The location was perfect with tons of nice restaurants, cafes, and bars all within five minutes walk and well connected by the metro. I would not hesitate to book this again next time I'm in Madrid :) They always responded very quickly and were ready to provide us with anything we needed.Está situado muy bien. A 5 minutos de la plaza mayor. El alojamiento es funcional. El salón coqueto. Los dormitorios tienen el techo bajo y no son cómodos. Buen sitio para una escapada a Madrid.Awesome space.Apartment is in a great location, very clean with everything you need and the host was great  and very helpful but 2 of the bedrooms are loft rooms which you have to crawl to get into and the street outside was noisylas áreas comunes del deparramento y la ubicación es fabulosa. lloyds anfitriones responden muy rápido. las camas son incómodas y la altura de las habitaciones es agotadora luego de dos días!

amenities: {TV,Wifi,"Air conditioning",Kitchen,Breakfast,Heating,"Family/kid friendly",Washer,Essentials,Shampoo,Hangers,"Hair dryer",Iron,"Laptop friendly workspace","Private entrance","Host greets you"}
comments:
Cristina's apartment was a perfect weekend bolthole for exploring Madrid. Clean and bright with a little balcony looking out onto the buzzy square (great for people watching!). The area is lively with plenty of bars retaurants, cafes and little suntrapped squares around. We walked everywhere as it is in a really accessible part of town without being in the thick of it. Cristina was very accommodating for our late arrival in Madrid. She left biscuits, wine, milk and coffee for us as well as shower gel and shampoo. (Top tip: the empanada place across the square is great for late night snacking!) Definitely recommended. Thanks Cristina!Very nice and clean apartment! Location is very central. Nice cafes, restaurants and supermarket directly across the street. The next subway station is about 5 minutes away.This is a very nice comfortable apartment in a great district. It is very easy to get to the Metro and lots of good restaurants. The district can be noisy at night. So we put the light sleeper in the very quiet back bedroom and the sleeper who wasn't bothered by noise in the front bedroom. A white noise app drowned out all the noise for me.Lovely place in a great neighborhood in Madrid. Would recommend to anyone!Our stay at Moises & Cristina’s place exceeded my expectations in every way.  Communication was excellent,  pre-arrival details were timely and clear,  and they were gracious and accommodating when our arrival time was delayed.  Their home is in pristine condition,  sparkling clean and the place feels new due to recent full remodeling.  The home is not used other than for guests, so it does not have the feeling of staying around other people’s stuff.  Having two bedrooms provides options for privacy and there is  less noise from plaza below in back bedroom.  Our stay included 3 weekend nights (Fri-Sun) and though the open pedestrian plaza below apartment was busy with lots of people, it was tolerable noise of voices and conversations, without typical big city noise of loud music or traffic.  We did not find the plaza noise too disturbing, it felt like part of the experience to see how the locals enjoy spending time together outdoors on warm summer evenings.  Light sleepers would do fine in back bedroom.  The apartment has dual air conditioners, one in front living area and one in back bedroom.  The apartment is actually more spacious that the Airbnb photos show!  The apartment is on second floor, with two sets of beautiful wooden stairs to climb.  Moises helped me carry my suitcase up,  there is no elevator but not a problem for us.  I highly recommend this place, it is in a central location, lots of food options within steps of apartment, easy walk to metro or central areas & Gran Vía.  A true jewel of a place!Very nice apartment. Good central location and there is lot of good resteraunts and bars near. Appartement agréable pour 3 personnes maximum. Nous avons récupéré les clefs plus d'une heure après le RDV, par une tierce personne autre que le propriétaire. Le logement est situé au pied d'une place déjà bien bruyante  en hiver et surtout la nuit. Nous regrettons que le ménage n'ait pas été réalisé correctement (Drap chambre parentale non changé, cheveux et poils.) et ménage non fait dans la chambre, frigo sale, poubelle pleine, dans la douche cheveux et poils. Le propriétaire nous a envoyé  le lendemain une personne pour faire le ménage.
En outre, le propriétaire s'était engagé par écrit (SMS), à nous rembourser la première nuit au titre de dédommagement lors de sa venue au logement, mais il n'a pas honoré sa parole.Muy bien ubicado y buena comunicación con los hosts, recomendado!todo perfectoEl departamento mucho mejor de lo que esperaba, ya atención de Cristina y Moisés excelente, siempre dispuestos a auxiliarme, increíble ubicación, sin mencionar el estilo y comodidad del lugar.I had a wonderful wonderful stay at Moises & Cristina's! The apt is super close to just about everything ... good food, shops, historical landmarks etc. The living room has beautiful tall windows that open up to an exciting square with restaurants &  bars. The window's do a pretty amazing job of blocking any noise from the street. The AC works very quickly, which was nice after walking around in the heat all day. Highly recommend this place :)My stay at this place was great. The place is clean and well maintained . Cristina did the check in and she was very kind and helpfull. Quickly responded to me when needed. The place make you feel at home is fully furnished and even with some extras !. Highly Recomended !!!foi óptimo!!! localização perfeita e apartamento 5 estrela obrigado Cristina
