comments:
Staying at Den & Vik's place was a 5-star experience.  Their place is stylish and very clean, with kitchen amenities.  The apartment overlooks a beautiful square, and so you get a sense of spaciousness while in very middle of Madrid.  The flat is also beautifully located, and I was able to get everywhere by foot or by a quick subway ride.  Den & Vik are also wonderful hosts.  They were gracious, responsive, and very kind.  Thanks for a great stay!Es probablemente de las mejores ubicaciones en corazón de MadridEl apartamento de Den y Vik es cómodo, luminoso, céntrico, a pocos pasos de la boca de metro de Tribunal. Cuando llegué, habían dejado un frutero lleno, agua embotellada, aceite y cosas para cocinar, toallas perfectamente colocadas como si de un hotel coqueto se tratase. Contestan a los mensajes en seguida ante cualquier duda o problema. El edificio tiene un portero 24h. Estaba todo muy limpio. Por la noche, con la ventana cerrada (y sin necesidad de bajar la persiana) no es ruidoso y se puede descansar bien. La cama es comodísima. Recomendable 100%!Un apartamiento muy bien situado, limpio, y agradable;  los anfitriones disponibles en todo momento, recomendable.Nice apartment right in front of Tribunal train station at the center of hip Malasaña, close to bars and restaurants, walkable distance from the center. The place is very clean and communication with Den & Vik worked perfectly. Mind the door, though, it can be a little tricky.El apartamento esta muy bien situado para visitar la ciudad. Todo se hace andando.
Gacias a Den & Vik para esta estancia.Nice place to stay.Den & Viks place was perfectly located - we walked everywhere to all the main attractions in less than 20 minutes. The apartment itself is lovely, has everything you need, super comfy bed, great shower and the terrace makes for a great breakfast venue!! The neighbourhood Malasaña was our favourite part of the trip - no need to venture further for great food and bars. Thanks Ven & Dik - we can't wait to come back! We loved staying at this place: great location to explore the city by foot, nice area for local bars and restaurants. Communication with Den&Vik was really easy.This is a wonderful apartment if you want to have a really nice stay in Madrid for a few or several days. The location is very central and the neighbourhood is alive and vivid. "Your backyard" will be filled with nice places, when you choose this apartment. Because the neighbourhood is so energetic,  there was street noise in the evening and nights (gay pride). Nevertheless we will still choose this place, when we come back to Madrid!Great place with a beautiful view!!! A beautiful apartment, communicative hosts and great location :)This place is as great as it looks in the photos. It's in a nice building with a doorman that feels really safe, in a cool neighborhood that's close to everything. The balcony is a real plus. The decor is eclectic and a bit surprising but overall very chic. The AC and the desk are great, too. I would definitely recommend this place! Todo muy bien, súper recomendable! El apartamento es tal como se describe: precioso y luminoso, en un sexto piso con una pequeña pero coqueta terracita con vistas a una plaza. Genial para una pareja. 
Muy bien comunicado por transporte público, en una zona muy céntrica y con todos los servicios en los alrededores.
Cien por cien recomendable.Clean, small, but convenient and very well situated. Kitchen had coffee/tea and breakfast cereal. Thank you for a lovely stay!Great location in the heart of Malasaña. We found other areas of Madrid reachable in walking distance too (although you could easily take public transport). Lovely clean apartment- the balcony and the AC were especially appreciated. We really enjoyed our time in Madrid. The location couldn’t be better! Nearly every attraction is in walking distance. If you wanna visit the stadium or other things, the subway station is in front of the building. Besides, there are a lot of hip Bars, vintage stores and tapas Bars 2-3 Minutes from the apartment. 
The apartment itself is very clean and has everything you need. The highlight is the balcony!Piccolo appartamento molto bello e ben locato. Ho trovato tutto ciò di cui avevo bisogno! La casa è profumatissima e il terrazzino è molto romantico. 
Consiglio vivamente!!This was a great Airbnb close to a lot of bars and restaurants. It’s also a short Uber ride to main attractions. The place had a lot of amenities and a great view of being on the 6th floor.What a lovely time! Really conveniently located, and super clean. The bedding was crisp and seemed pretty new (I’m really picky about bedding and can’t tell you how much this meant to me!)

Loved that they had a bowl of fruit, and I ate all of the apples and was so grateful for the readily available snack when I needed one. 

Best of all, they were SUPER responsive, and very warm. 

I think that they mentioned in their listing, but it can be pretty loud at night. Particularly between 2 and 5. If you’re a light sleeper, your stay will definitely be improved by a pair of earplugs.We have a great time staying at Den & Vik's apartment. The location couldn't have been more ideal as  it's so close to the metro and had many local amenities around. We loved the fact that it was more where locals stay and play and not near the main tourist attractions or large hotels. Saturday night, Madrid stays out 'til the crack of dawn which may have noise issues for some, but it was not for us.

The apartment was just what we needed for travelling. A place to stay with the necessities but still has something fun about (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication was terrific during every step from booking, pre-check in, stay, and check out.Den and Vik’s place was very comfortable. It had lovely amenities - an ironing board and a washer. It was very self contained. The proximity to everything was great. Easy access to taxis, metro and walking around safely. 
Den was very quick to respond when we arrived and allowed us to drop off our luggage early. 
There is a party atmosphere in the square so the noise was a bit intrusive all night. 
The decor was pleasant and the bed was comfortable.En el top 3 de los mejores Airbnb en los que haya estado sin duda.Great place! Had an amazing stay! Very close to lots of restaurants and attraction, and even if not close for what you're looking, the metro station is right outside the building.Great location on the metro line, only 36 min from the airport and 15 min from the train station.  The building is dated but the space is nicely decorated. The walls are a bit thin but thankfully the building seemed quiet and it wasn't an issue as we were out all day exploring.L'appartement est très bien situé et bien isolé malgré la rue très animée le soir et la nuit ! Propreté impeccable de l'appartement très bien équipé et joliment décoré. Les indications étaient parfaites pour l'entrée des lieux rapide.
Merci à Den &Vick pour cet excellent séjour !Location of this property is fantastic. We like to walk and we were able to walk easily to all of or destinations. 
It’s was a nice and clean apartment with plenty space to put your clothes etc. 
I would highly recommend staying here if you are visiting Madrid!Den & Vik's apartment was amazing. Perfect localization and very good and clean apartmentgreat Airbnb, highly recommendWe loved staying in Den & Vik’s place.  It is very central to everything.  Supermarket, bars and restaurants all in easy reach.  We spent six nights here and enjoyed walking through the suburbs of central Madrid.  The only drawback is the Nightclub next door.  On Friday and Saturday nights the partying can go on into the early hours of the morning.   Nothing that a pair earplugs can’t fix.
We would have no hesitation in staying here again.This AirBnB was in an amazing location of Madrid - very young, hip and bustling. We sat on the terrace almost everyday. Very clean, and Den was quick to respond to any questions we had. It did look smaller than in photos, but it was the perfect size for 2 guests. Very clean, comfortable and close to the metro - which made getting around Madrid seamless.Great place and great location, exactly what it said it would be. Easy to find, perfect balcony for a coffee and watching the square. Den and Vik very helpful. 
Will be returning.Den & Vik nos recibieron con unos detalles muy calidos para hacer nuestra estadia agradable. Entrega de llaves y comunicacion perfecta, todo funciona en el depto y descansamos muy bien. Falta una limpieza mas profunda pero estoy segura que se ocuparan de ello enseguida... El baño super pequeño (la ducha) pero para estadias cortas lo toleras ok. Toallas y sabanas nuevas, impecables. Yo cambiaria las almohadas right away ;). Excelente ubicacion, cerca de todo y muy luminoso.Ubicación excelente, limpio y nada ruidoso. Justo lo que buscábamos, si volvemos a Madrid, sin duda repetiremos.Located in the heart of Malasaña neighborhood, Den & Vik’s place was cozy, clean, and stocked full of amenities we took advantage of on our visit to Madrid. The patio is the apartment’s best feature and from the balcony, you can take in a gorgeous view of the city and it overlooks Jardines del Arquitecto Rivera (lovely park.) Tribunal Metro station is across the street and all major destinations (i.e. Palace, Retiro Park, Mercado de San Miguel, etc) are a quick subway ride away, or 10-20 mins walkable! Thanks Den & Vik for your amazing hospitality, we’ll be back.Den and Vik's apartment is perfectly located, within really easy walking distance of everything with plenty of great bars and restaurants nearby. The flat was clean and well kitted out with everything we needed. The balcony in particular is lovely and even though it was fairly cold when we were there, we still managed to have a drink and breakfasts out on the balcony. As other reviewers have said, it can get quite noisy at night (particularly at the weekend) because of the location in such a lively area. This wasn't a problem for us at all but some others might want to bear it in mind - it might not be ideal for light sleepers!Beautiful view is only one of the many great features of this place! Located less than five minutes from a metro stop and close to many shops, restaurants and bars, this studio made a great home base for my visit to Madrid.Very nice appartement, the location is located centrally. Nice view from the terrace.We enjoyed our stay at Den & Vik's apartment in Madrid and would highly recommend it to others. The place was clean, well equipped with essentials and comfortably warm, in spite of the lower temperatures outside. The wifi worked flawlessly. The nearest metro station is just 5 mins walk away. Finally, the self check-in/check-out system deserves a special mention as it worked like a charm!nice small , confortable apartment, very central. small balcony that catches morning sun. absolutely recommended.Nice apartment in good location for getting around the city. We enjoyed the terrace in the mornings with the view of the square across the street, however, it can be a bit noisy at night as people tend to drink in the park right below the apartment - it was loud until 5am when we were there.  We used the white noise phone app to drown it out. Overall our stay was very comfortable.Absolutely amazing. Right next to Tribunal metro station, nice balcony, comfortable bed, beautiful room. Just be aware that the apartment is right next to a dog park but it's not a big issue.The location is perfect yet not noisy. Very easy to get around in downtown madrid. The room is stylish and cozy, and the full kitchen is so helpful. We really enjoyed our stay there.I want to preface with the fact that we likely (hopefully) had an exceptional situation that made our experience particularly miserable but that is not applicable to the vast majority of guests here. The apartment appeared to be a dream: stunningly decorated, cream-of-the-crop location, spacious.. one of the best deals we had ever encountered! Den and Vik were also superb communicators who clearly care a great deal about providing an excellent experience for their guests. That being said, I can’t in good faith give my experience anything more than a 3 star rating. We had our visit here absolutely sabotaged by construction in the immediately neighboring apartment. From (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) there was a constant barrage of nails being smashed into the walls and wood saws running full blaze that essentially devastated our visit. We were unable to enjoy the great nightlife offered in Madrid because a couple hours after going to sleep, we were jolted awake by their all-consuming presence. Zombie-ing around the city in a miserably tired state without even the ability to take a nap due to ongoing construction greatly diminished the quality of our visit to Madrid. I understand that certain events are out of a hosts control and this may very well have been one of them. I do believe that a host who has performed diligent research on providing the best experience should have uncovered other horror stories from clients who have had their visits sabotaged by construction and placed appropriate control measures in place such as demanding they be notified of the construction ahead of time / negotiating construction hours to avoid work during quiet periods / doing anything possible to insure their customers are completely informed that this construction will be taking place ahead of time. I did reach out to the host and let them know of our struggle after the first night and to their credit they seemed determined to fix the issue. We held out for two nights here in hopes that the second night would be better than the first and were obviously very disappointed to realize this wasn’t the case.  I sincerely hope the host did the right thing and fully informed the guests staying directly after me about the situation. They appear to be of sound moral character so I have no reason to doubt that they would hide this issue under the rug at the expense of their incredibly strong reputation.Great experience. Plenty of nearby restaurants and shops. Enjoyed it very muchDen’s place is good. Nice location and Kiosk nearby, get almost everything you need. they answer mail quite fast and in good manner, which we appreciated very much. One star off because of noise, we guess there was construction going on next door, which was crazy in morning. Plus the smell of smoking outside the door through the ling hall. In addition,  as an Airbnb room for guest, you did not expect a lot host’s personal items in washroom. Hope they improve those in future.FENOMENALExcelente lugar con muy buena ubicacion, el departamento esta muy bien decorado y es acogedorLo que más nos gustó fue lo acogedor del apartamento, poder tener terraza y la facilidad para acceder aunque hubiéramos llegado tarde, la situación es buenísima puesto que está al lado de la boca del metro y cerca de Gran Via caminando, supermercados donde comprar, sitios donde comer buenos, bonitos y baratos y para salir de fiesta.Apartamento muy acogedor. Localización perfecta.Great location, clean, good communication. We would highly recommend this apartment for a stay in MadridGreat communication with the host, very accessible, unbeatable location and very cleanvery good accomodation. thank you for everythingApartamento perfecto, muy bien ubicado y con todos los servicios. La zona puede ser algo ruidosa.Den’s apartment was perfect for our stay in Madrid. It’s in Malasaña which is the “hipster” neighborhood and my favorite neighborhood. It has coffee shops, restaurants & bars every 2 steps. It’s the perfect central location but still not super touristy. Den’s place was easy to find and really easy to check into. Thanks Den!Estancia muy agradableThis apartment was absolutely lovely and very close to a really cool area in Madrid. The sweet little balcony is a wonderful bonus and there is a fresh food market right over the road. The hosts were absolutely fabulous with great communication. It’s noisy for light sleepers so earplugs are needed. Thank you for a lovely stay!Awesome little spot in the heart of Madrid. Den is very responsive and helpful and the space is one of the better ones I’ve seen in Madrid.El apartamento de Den es tal y como veis en las fotos. La ubicación es muy céntrica así que fue perfecto para moverse por el centro de la ciudad sin necesidad de coger el metro.
Tiene mucha luz y es muy acogedor, perfecto para una o dos personas. 
La comunicación fue perfecta y rápida.Apartamento muy bien ubicado, con una boca de metro a escasos segundos y al lado del centro. Además, muy cómoda la estancia y el apartamento es muy bonito.Pasamos un find e semana en el apartamento y todo fue fabuloso. Limpio y céntrico, en pleno fuencarral.Den’s place was great! Only thing I’d note is a lot of light and sound leaks through the window, so be careful if you’re a light sleeper.Den was a very kind, fast answering and always available host. We received all information we needed very quickly, the check-in and all necessary information have been very detailed and clear. We received very good additional tips for our stay in Madrid. And even because of an water issue in the whole apartment building Den was very helpful and took care of the issue and she was very fair! Overall a great place to be for a sightseeing trip in Madrid!Espléndido apartamento, en el centro de Madrid, cerca de todo para caminar y a menos de cuadra de la estación del metro. El apartamento es ideal, equipado con todo para hacer una fabulosa visita. Lo recomiendo 100%Den's place is great - a perfect location for exploring cool areas of Madrid. She made communication and check-in very easy. Thank you!Departamento muy bien ubicado, en una zona segura de Madrid, cerca del Metro y transporte publico, restaurantes, supermercado y lugares de interesExtremely central location in Madrid! Walking distance to all the local bars/ cafes/restaurants etc and a very helpful host :), place was clean and as described.  highly recommend!Very cozy and well located apartment in the heart of Madrid. Den was an excellent host and very responsive.Lovely little apartment close to the tube and very central location you can also walk to the centre and enjoy all Madrid has to offer.

We particularly enjoyed the terrace overlooking the plaza :)

Can get a bit noisy at night during the weekends but nothing a pair of earplugs can’t solve!El piso tiene el tamaño perfecto, es súper silencioso para lo bien ubicado que está, y la cocina está súper bien equipada. Den estuvo ubicable todo el tiempo y el proceso de llegada y partida fue inmejorable. Volvería a quedarme ahí sin dudarlo.This apartment was just as described. It is stylish, conveniently located, and perfect for a couple. We enjoyed our stay there and it was easy to get around by walking or with the metro stop nearby. 
Communication with Den was prompt and helpful. The apartment was bright and very clean.
On only one night was there loud street noise. Keeping the doors to the balcony closed and use of earplugs were helpful, so it was not a problem. Might have also brought eyeshades for early morning sunlight. There were thoughtful items some of which we did not discover until prior to leaving. We did not cook, but generally the apartment was well-equipped. We would hope to stay here again if we return Madrid. Would recommend to others.Do yourself a favor and stay at this place..... it’s just amazing!!!!Thank you for your warmden Den, which gave us a very wonderful holiday. It takes 2 minutes to get to the subway, with convenient transportation and a supermarket downstairs. The house is very clean and the view of the balcony is great.The apt was greatly situated, everything was in a manageable distance. We had a car but didn’t have to use it. Den and I exchanged many messages, I received answers back promptly. In overall, would recommend this apt since it’s a cozy place to stay.Petit appartement calme et très bien situé. Petites adresses et magasins à une centaine de mètres et à 50m du métro. Propre et sanitaires bien équipés. C’est adapté à un groupe de 2 personne souhaitant passer la majeur parti de leur temps dehors, le balcon permet de rester dehors le soir ou pour un petit déjeuner. Très bon rapport qualité/prix. Cette adresse a rendu le séjour (3 jours) simple.A great apartment in an ideal location - in walking distance of the centre and Retiro, and right next to Tribunal metro. Check-in was super easy and Den was really helpful. The apartment had everything we needed for a great stay in Madrid.Great place to stay, very clean and with great access to Madrid. Plenty of shops and restaurants nearby. Highly recommended for anyone staying in Madrid!Departamento cómodo, limpio y con buena ubicación.Excelente lugar, bien ubicado, diez en limpieza, muy bien decorado, recomendable para dos personas, yo volveríaTrès belle endroit très bien située 
A porter de tout 
Je le recommande à tout le mondeMy partner and I spent two nights here at the start of our trip to Spain. It was perfect. The location is amazing - truly can’t be beat. The place was clean, very dark with the blinds down, quiet (which was crazy considering the location) and all communications were easy and straight forward. Den was also very kind to send a list of luggage storage  locations ahead of time, which was helpful when we arrived long before check in. A great place for a couple or two friends. Highly recommend!El apartamento de Den es realmente como se muestra,  incluso mejor. Muy cómodo, práctico, bonito y situación perfecta. ¡Volveré!Great place in the best location of Madrid. And I'm a local.This is a comfortable & clean apartment in a pretty area of Madrid. Good air con, nice balcony, super easy check-in, and friendly host Den’s place is a light and minimalistic studio apartment located in the middle of the city, in one of the most vibrant and charming areas. It has all you need to feel at home. Our communication went good and it was the easiest checkin procedure I have ever tried. The air condition is a live safer in the summer season :)Pasé muy cómoda en mi estadía en el apartamento de Den! La ubicación es excelente,  cerca a la estación del metro y con fácil acceso caminando a muchísimos recursos, incluido supermercado! 
El acceso fue muy fácil , cuenta con portería permanente. Y el apartamento es claro, ventilado y tiene vista sobre un parque! Muy recomendado! No tiene tv! Esto podría ser importante para algunosMy boyfriend and I loved the place! The terrace was great, the room was quite spacious, and the air conditioning was a life saver!Very nice apartment, in an amazing neighbourhood . 100% recommended!Stayed here for a second time, fantastic location and really nice apartment! Highly recommended.I was excited to stay in what looked like a cozy studio but when I arrived it was extremely dirty. Whoever they hire to upkeep the place between guests did a horrible job. But from the jump, it’s clear this apartment is not really taken care of beyond a housekeeper coming through once in awhile. Amenities were missing and the shower head spewed water all over the floor. And like previous BnB guests mentioned, the noise is a lot. Not like in a comforting way, but just weird. As a solo traveler it didn’t feel quite right so I left early and found another BnB. The one benefit of the experience was that communication with Den was amazing up until I checked in. They were thorough about the check-in process and that was very helpful.Den's place was really great! The balcony was really nice, and we didn't encounter any issues with noise/light (especially when the shade was drawn).Great host! Thanks a lotDen's place was everything we were looking for in Madrid. Comfortable home, with amenities like air conditioning and a washing machine. Less than a minute's walk from the Metro and a mere fifteen minutes walk from Puerta del Sol, Plaza Mayor and numerous shops and restaurants. Apartment was clean upon arrival. Building felt safe and in a lively neighborhood. Host was communicative and prompt. No complaints.Amazing place and location!Fantastic studio apartment in the heart of Madrid.The location is great, the apartament is nice but it s a bit noisy outside in the morning and the sound isolation is pretty bad.Such a great place for a great price. You are so close to everything. We wouldn’t know what or where to eat but that’s no problem in Madrid cause you walk a block and have five options. There’s a night clubs right across the street which for young people is awesome... maybe not so much for older. I felt really safe here (was just me and my friend and we’re both 25 yr old women) went to three cities in Spain and Madrid was my absolute favorite. Like i said this location was amazing! Didn’t matter which way you walked you were bound to walk somewhere amazing. Will def be staying here again!!Den’s apartment is in a great location that is easily walkable to Madrid’s attractions, as well as great shopping and dining. I travelled with another young woman and we felt safe and comfortable walking home late at night. It was easy to check in and the apartment was clean and comfortable. I would recommend this apartment to anyone visiting Madrid.The total experience was great. Clean, great location, all we needed for a very good experience in amazing Madrid.
The only thing is that during weekends it's quite noisy, so can't sleep with open window.Den’s place was perfectly located, 10-15 minute walk from Gran Via and all the shops and sights.

The place itself is a small studio but was perfect for two people for a three day trip. We did not need much more.

We would come back and recommend this place.Ok location, very noisy, the apt was neat functionality was good.This place was clean and in a great neighborhood for restaurants, walking to Grand Via or Sol areas, and a convenient metro around the corner. The patio was very nice for morning coffee and afternoon wine. Den left nice touches to make the stay easy. Check in and out was also easy and communication was fast. The apartment is perfect for 1 or 2 persons. Light sleepers will find  the Street noise loud. I needed earplugs but my daughter who had been living in Madrid slept well! Just the sound of the city and expected in such a convenient location. The kitchen was well stocked to make simple meals. I would stay there again if I am lucky enough for a return visit!Lovely balcony with views to a square, and just a few steps away from trendy Malasaña-
Den was flexible with my check-out and that was highly appreciated, thank you!Lovely place, super location, truly a very good Airbnb! Easy to access!!and yes a little bit noisy, but in Madrid, if you want to be well located,  it will be anyway :) thanks again Den!Simple and well-located. Enjoyed my time there.Den's place was in a perfect location, just a few steps from the Tribunal metro station it makes it easy to explore the rest of Madrid. Malasaña neighborhood was awesome - lots of places to eat and drink. The apartment has all the essentials and my favorite was the balcony area overlooking a small park/plaza area. Really enjoyed a morning coffee or evening tea sitting there and relaxing! I also forgot my precious water bottle in the apartment and she graciously agreed to mail it to me. Highly recommend!Appartement très agréable ,bien équipé avec goût,dans un quartier central ,proche de commerces et du métro , idéal!! !Juste  un petit bémol quant à l'animation nocturne de la rue qui risque de perturber vos nuits ...Great place with great hosts! Very easy communication, beautiful place with all amenities. The location is a little bit noisy on the weekends (music and people on the streets until very late), but it's the price to stay in one of the coolest neighbors in Madrid. Totally recommended!

comments:
We were the first guests hosted by Petra and Victor - While booking a new BnB with no reviews to fall back on is always tough nevertheless we took the leap of faith. And we were so happy with our decision. Petra and Victor are an affable and a lovely couple having a beautiful house. They gave  perfect instructions from the airport to their house. They both came to receive us at the metro and helped us with our luggage. Their house is hardly a 5 minutes walk from the metro. They are conveniently located on Line 1 (of metro) taking precisely 15 mins to Centre, plaza and Atocha etc. We had a lovely room enclosed with the bathroom to ourselves. The bathroom was extremely clean and well stocked up with all the toliteries, one can think of. We were handed separate pair of keys with no restrictions on coming or going. Victor speaks only Spanish but Petra's English was quite decent. They gave us excellent instructions  for places to see and eat. Petra is an excellent cook, she even treated us to her freshly baked cakes and custard. If we wanted our privacy they didn't bother but were happy to chat whenever we had some queries. We had a lovely and very warm stay and would be happy to return anytime and recommend these hosts.The location of the B&B is great, which is only 10minutes walk from metro station, that makes travel around the city easy.

As for the bedroom, it is same as the photos shown in aibnb, clean and comfortable, and with many decorations like painting. We rested well during our stay. 

Besides, the house owners are very nice who received us from the metro station, so we wouldn't have get lost to the B&B. They even shared their homemade cake with us. Don't worry about the communication, Petra speaks good English and very willing to help.Muchas gracias a Susana y Víctor por su hospitalidad. Nos han hecho sentir como en casa. Un gran alojamiento con una ubicación y comunicaciones inmejorables. Totalmente recomendable. Volveremos!!!no duden en elegir este espacio. Su ubicación es inmejorable a 10 min del centro en metro.  La habitación es muy confortable, con calidez de hogar increíble. Los anfitriones te hacen sentir como en casa.The AirBnB was super easy to get to with the instructions Victor gave us ahead of our travel. We were received quite well and warm by the hosts and during our stay say sometimes offered us some snack (like cake) from their kitchen.Estadia muito agradável, o Sr. Victor e a Dona Suzana fizeram nos sentir em casa!Excelentes personas, nos sentimos muy a gusto y es muy cerca a una estación del metro donde te puedes mover a toda la ciudad, lo recomiendo !Super agradables, cercanos a la vez que discretos, la habitación un primor y no le faltaba un detalle, sin duda volveré a repetir cuando vuelva a MadridVictor fue al metro a recogernos a las 22:30. El y Susana su esposa, son muy atentos y agradables. Ropa de cama y toallas muy limpios.Nuestra estancia en el piso de Víctor fue muy agradable, la habitación muy limpia y con todo lo necesario para disfrutar de un fin de semana de descanso en Madrid. Los propietarios muy simpáticos y pendientes de nuestra comodidad. Ubicación buena también, a 20 mins del Centro en metro.Recomendable por el  buen trato, servicio y amabilidad de sus propietarios.Victor e la moglie gentili e dispinibili per qualsiasi informazione,camera con bagno privato pulita,vicino alla metro e centro citta,per vivere la vera Madrid posto consigliatoNot a good place for long stay!!
1. The WIFI signal is very slow. Sometimes it cannot be connected even.
2. You cannot use the washing machine when you need it. The host only allow you to do the laundry once a week, but it is not stated in the website about this.
3. The host smokes, so the clothes you washed will have the smell of smoke And once I found some cigarette ash on the floor after they have cleaned the room. 
4. The place to hang the clothes is very small. If you have a lot of clothes, you will be very inconvenient.
5. It is not allowed to use the kitchen, so if you want to stay for a long time, please consider it carefully.Pasamos algunos días estupendos en Madrid. La habitación es muy limpia y cómoda, Susana y Victor son muy simpáticos y hacen todo para que sus huespedes se sientan bien en su piso.  :)Totalmente recomendados, son muy amables y calurosos. La casa en general, es muy bonita y la habitación impecable, bonita y muy bien climatizada. Si vuelvo a Madrid, será nuestro lugar de alojamiento.Als alles erstes Super Nette und Hilfsbereiten Eigentümer. 
Super Ausstattung mit sehr angenehme Bett und Klima.
Das Bad 5 Sterne.
Ganze Wohnung super sauber.
Ich möchte mich an Susana endschuldigen, dass sie uns um 2:00 Uhr in der Nacht ins unserer Zimmer gebracht hat!
Ich kann nur sagen TOP SERVICE !
Einfach zu empfehlen !Sparkling clean. Good location (an easy access to the centre of the city) via metro. Friendly and helpful host.A suite de victor e susana e maravilhosa!  Extremante limpa, com muitos detalhes desde bombons, loucas e comidas para o cafe alem de um frigobar. O custo beneficio e otimo e os anfitrioes fazem vc se sentir em casa! Susana nos levou mousse e bolo 2 dias. Muito amorosos! 
Espero ve los novamente!La stanza nell'appartamento di Victor e Susane e' molto gradevole: riservata e con un buon isolamento. Arredata con gusto e corredata dai proprietari di tutto il necessario. Il comodo e accessoriato bagno in camera, completa la privacy e il confort e un frigo in camera permette un'autonomia anche per soggiorni lunghi. La pulizia e' impeccabile e l'accoglienza straordinaria e fuori dal comune; ci siamo sentiti accolti e coccolati! Host eccellentiThe location is good, only 5 mins to metro station and a 15 mins metro ride to the center. The house is in a secure building, the room has full privacy with an en suite bathroom and a separate key. Victor and his wife were very friendly. They provided everything from breakfast stuff to toiletries. 

The room has a fridge, tv and a comfortable bed. Highly recommended.la habitación es tal cual el anuncio. los propietarios han sido muy amables y nuestra estancia en Madrid fue muy cómoda.Cumple con lo que promete. Un alojamiento perfecto para pasar unos días en Madrid.It’s the perfect place to stay! The location and the room are perfect, everything is very clean, the bathroom is fully equipped with anything you need, and it’s great that you also have a fridge in the room, and the landlords are lovely, super nice. I strongly recommend!Próximo do metro, boas acessibilidades e bons anfitriõesEs mucho mejor de lo que se muestra en el anuncio, Susana y Víctor son muy amables y todo el alojamiento es muy limpio y cómodo. Cuando vuelva a Madrid sin pensarlo volvería a hospedarme. Me hicieron sentir como en casa.Victor y Susana encantadores! La habitación genial y totalmente equipada. Muy buena experiencia y súper recomendable.They were so thoughtful and helpful! The amenities provided were plentiful and we were really grateful for them.Amabilidad, atención,cordialidad  y buenos momentos.Los caseros son muy amables. La habitación es muy limpia y luminosa. Preparan muchas cosas para nosotras. Muy buena experiencia de Madrid!

comments:
Zona céntrica , todo limpio y ambiente agradableTres bien situé en plein centre ville, sur la plaza de la puerta del sol.
Metro devant la porte
Commerce et site touristiques à proximité 
Le seul hic, des douches communes sans portes, juste un rideau et des toilettes qui ne ferment pas à clef..
Rapport qualité prix intéressant tout de même....Correct :)The location was perfect & right in the center! It's just opposite of the metro station & few minutes walk to the plaza mayor. Marli was really kind & let us check in late in the night. Our room didn't have air-conditioning as per booking. It was quite hot during our visit. Our room was just by the dinning room & close to the shared bathroom& kitchen which had lots of noise throughout our stay & affected our sleeps. The one shared bathroom (without lock) has 3 showers(2 has plastic shower curtains on & one with door without lock), 2 sinks & 3 toilets is for all the guests at the apartment. There were 8 rooms in the apartment. While we were having showers, the other male guests also use the bathroom which we weren't aware of the bathroom situation and would prefer more privacy. The towels weren't in our room. But Marco showed us where they keep them after we asked on our last night stay when we saw Marco. Also the wifi was given to us didn't work & we found out from the lovely cleaning lady it should be lower case not as the one shown in the dining room board. The lovely cleaning lady was so nice & helpful. Even we have language barrier but she went beyond & above to show us where could we find supermarkets and the way to plaza mayor.Marli es súper linda, te recomienda cosas según tus gustos y cosas nuevas! Puedes preguntarle cualquier cosa!! La ubicación no podría estar mejor, tienes la entrada del metro en 3 min y la gran vía a 10 min caminando.

comments:
La habitación es amplia y cómoda, la ubicación inmejorable, cerca de todo y muy bien comunicada.Muy recomendable, Ariel estaba de viaje pero me atendió su amigo Carlos muy buena onda, el lugar súper cálido y tranquilo.Un trato perfecto! Estuve encanta ... volveré ! XxPiso muy tranquilo, ubicado en una zona muy central, cerca de todo. Ariel y Carlos geniales, siempre disponiblesBuena habitación, nada especial pero cómoda para pasar algunos días en la ciudad sin pagar muchoThe host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.Todo bienHe estado súper a gusto en esta casa. La ubicación es perfecta (para mí es la mejor zona de Madrid), el piso es sencillo, pero limpio y acogedor. Los anfitriones muy amables. Gracias!!Relación calidad precio inmejorable! Ubicación muy muy cómoda. Simpáticos y todo en orden siempre. Todo guay.El apartamento es en un buen barillo cerca de numerosos comercios, la habitacion responde a las expectivas y corresponde a las fotos, y los compañeros de piso son muy amables y disponibles para ayudar si tienes preguntas o dudas :)Ariel no estaba pero me recibió su amigo Carlos y muy bien todo, calidad-precio bastante bien y ubicacion perfecta
permite el uso de cocina y toalla y sabanas incluidas perfecto para pasar unos dias alliEl piso está en una buena ubicación.

La habitación era sencilla y el baño un poco pequeño.Muy buena localización. Habitación grande y limpia. Lo recomiendo =)Ariel was not there but Carlos welcomed me! Nice guy! The room was ok. There were also towels. The style of the home is a little old but it is well located near the underground and quite near to the center.Recomendado 100%La ubicación excelente porque se encuentra a una o dos cuadras del metro.Recomendaría este lugar, debido a que cuenta con una ubicación inmejorable en MadridEstuve 5 días hospedada en el alojamiento de Ariel, conseguí la tranquilidad e independencia que buscaba. Todo perfecto, 100% recomendableGreat localisation and place , comfy bed! Would recommand it!Ariel was not there, but his friend Carlos welcomed me and was very kind! He let me use his hairdryer until I bought my own. The only downsides is the oven does not work and the shower head was broken, other than that it was a very comfortable stay! Keep in mind that most places in madrid do not have central heat, so if you are staying during the colder months, it will be a little more chilly!Carlos, un ami d'Ariel, ma gentillement accueilli. L'emplacement est idéal pour découvrir Madrid  soit à métro (à 3min à pied), ou en pouvant se rendre en ville à pied facilement. Il n'y a pas de chauffage central mais un radiateur électrique à disposition.  J'ai été ravie de mon séjour, qui était ma première expérience airbnb.It's a really nice place in a very lively zone of Madrid, the host is really friendly and doesn't create any kind of disconfort.Me encantó estar ahí, el metro súper cerca y el bus se puede tomar en la puerta del edificio. Muy bien ubicado, todo quedaba a 15 min; flexible con la llegada. Me volvería a quedar ahí.Nice place in a very well connected area, really near Arguelles metro station and shops all around. A friend Carlos was there for the majority of my stay and he was a very nice guy who kept the house clean and tidy.Piso Muy bien ubicado y muy tranquiloArieal was a friendly host and assisted when I needed required.En general muy bien, de acuerdo a los estándares de un piso en Madrid. Muy buena ubicación, a menos de cinco minutos de la parada de metro. Las sábanas y la habitación impecables. Llegada sin ningún problema. Único aspecto a mejorar: la ducha, ya que hay que sostener el tubo con la mano, pero con una pequeña inversión se soluciona muy rápido ;-) Muchas gracias por la acogidaConsidering the low price everything was alright. The interior of the room was quite functional, but the bed very comfortable. The only bad thing was, that you were not able to lock your door, which was a bit unfortunate, since other people stayed in other rooms.Un chico muy hospitalario, comprensible y educado. Recomendable!!Great value! Some aspects minimal (broken shower head) but very clean, safe, and good location for the price. Would stay again and would recommend.Great place for budget travelers in a great location

comments:
La ubicación del apartamento es perfecta , en una calle super tranquila, al lado del metro y muy muy cerca de todo , hemos ido andando a todos sitios. Apartamento con muchisimos detalles y todo muy nuevo, sin problemas para la recogida y entrega de llaves!, así da gusto!La decoración del piso esta muy bonita, todo nuevo y adecuado. La ubicación es perfecta, el único detalle es que siendo un piso exterior, el ruido de la calle en noches de fin de semana puede ser considerable. La atención y amabilidad de Sara, excelente en todo sentido! Si se pudiera cambiar el grifo de la ducha, mucho mejor, pues no es el más funcional.Sara estuvo muy puntual y atenta en nuestro recibimiento. Además nos dejó un detallido de bienvenida.
El apartamento está muy céntrico y se puede ir por toda la zona centro de madrid a pié desde él. Además también está bien situado para salir de copas, comer y, de la estación de metro (2 minutos).
Era nuestra primera visita a madrid, pero no la última y, si podemos volveremos a casa de Sara.
Saludos.Nous avons passé un très agréable séjour dans cet appartement l'espace d'un weekend. 
Ce lieu allie calme, proximité de l'hypercentre, confort. Le métro est à quelques pas.
L'appartement est très agréable, très propre et neuf.
Je recommande vivement cet endroit!!!!!!
Merci encore. The apartment is well-equipped, as cosy as the photos suggest and supremely centrally located in quiet side street. Handling of check-in and out was very accommodating. Thumbs up!Veru nice apartment! It's so clean and excellent locate.The flat is modern, design, in a quite calm street but in an old residence. It is near every spots, museum  and shops . The subway is 1min walk from the apartment. We were welcomed by Sara: really expeditious. There were no toilet paper in the flat. We asked her to bring some, but she asked us to buy. She said she will reimburse us but at the leaving day, she never mentioned it or say sorry for the forgetting. Furthermore, as our flight was late in the evening, we asked her to keep our luggages in her agency. The first day, she agreed but the day before we leave she said that was impossible due to public holiday. We had to change our plans and pay for baggage lockers. La estancia ha sido muy agradable. Piso reformado, confortable, ideal para ir 2 o 4 personas. Bien situado a pocos metros de una estación de Metro y wifi potente. El baño también muy bien, con toallas para todos.
Tanto la cama como el sofá, muy confortables para dormir.
Además, la anfitriona fue flexible para la recogida y entrega de llaves, adaptándose a nuestro horario. Muy buena. El apartamento es cómodo. Se agradecen los libros!Ha sido una experiencia muy agradable. La zona es ideal, cerca del Metro y los museos más importantes. El apartamento se ciñe perfectamente a lo descrito y mostrado en las fotos y el trato con Sara perfecto y hubo disposición por su parte para adaptarse a los horarios de nuestro viaje. El único inconveniente fue el grifo del agua fría de la ducha, ya que no siempre funcionó bien. Tardamos un poco en conseguir contactar con Sara ya que estaba de baja pero otras personas se pusieron en contacto con nosotros y la atención y el piso fueron impecables. Sin duda repetiría. Sara's apartment is very comfortable and very nicely appointed. It is located in great area perfect to walk around, explore and enjoy all the great restaurants and stores that Madrid's traditional downtown has to offer.  Everything in the apartment works great and it is just like in the pictures. Great place to stay. Excellent apartment in the perfect neighborhood. Everything you could want is within walking distance. The apartment is modern and bright with a nice balcony. One of the best apartment you can get in Madrid. In the center of the center, the area around full with bars and restaurants.
The communication is perfect.
The place is FULLY equipmented, even tooth brushs:-)
Very very very recommended.Au moment de récupérer les clés, le propriétaire nous a informé d'un problème de fuite dans le logement et nous a orienté vers un autre appartement en face du métro Sol.

Appartement très propre, très fonctionnel, très bien situé.
Très bon séjour en plein centre touristique !Yes!! Good location n host!! Thanks for everythingNous avons passé un superbe séjour dans l'appartement de Leticia. Les photos sont tout à fait conformes à la réalité. Son emplacement est excellent car il est proche des musées et de la Plaza Mayor. Le quartier est assez calme la nuit, même si des bars et restaurants ne sont pas loin. Le seul bémol par rapport à cet appartement est la récupération des clefs qui a été un peu laborieuse. 
En résumé, je recommande chaudement cet appartement !
Excelente ubicación. Las fotos describen muy bien el departamento y esta bien equipado: vajilla, heladera, freezer, aire acondicionado. La cama del dormitorio muy bien. La cama del living es un sillon que se hace cama, para niños esta Ok, si fueran personas mayores no es muy recomendable. Las llaves se deben buscar en otra dirección que no es la del departamento (Esto es un detalle menor pero que cuando vienes viajando durante muchas horas desde lejos, es una pequeña incomodidad porque implica mas tiempo y mas taxi). An overall great experience!  Following a quick pick-up of our keys at a leasing office, we were able to get to the appt easily.  The location is ideal for a stay in central Madrid.  It is just steps from a Metro station and you can easily walk everywhere.  The flat is well equipped and the dual A/C works great!  I would definitely stay here again.We stayed for 3 days and loved the location. It is on a quiet street close to Paseo del Prado, which provided lovely walks to and from our travels and the neighborhood plazas, which were were lively and safe. We ate a great meal at Lomucca. The beds were so comfortable, even my 6'5" husband loved it. We had all the conveniences we needed in the flat and found it easy to come and go. The area has easy hills and the flat is on the 4th floor with several doors to go through and a lift. It is like the pictures. Picking up the key is time consuming. Evin konumu çok iyi, ulaşımı çok kolaydı. Evin içi tanıtımda yazıldığı gibiydi.
Ancak, bina çok pis ve bakımsızdı Asansör kartonla kaplı ve sürekli kötü kokuyordu.
Ayrıca tanıtımda yazıldığı gibi bizi ev sahibi karşılamadığı gibi, çıkışta da kimse (Website hidden by Airbnb) evin anahtarını bildirdiği adresteki ofisten aldık. Tanıtımda iki anahtar yazıyordu, ancak bir anahtar verildi.
Evden ayrılırken kimse gelmedi sadece çıkarken anahtarı bırakıp kapıyı çekmemiz söylendi. Ancak daha sonra telefonla hiçbir değeri olmayan çatal, bıçak vb. eksikliklerin olduğu söylendi. İtirazımız üzerine bir süre sonrada sorun olmadığı söylendi. Bu da bizim İspanya gezimizin en kötü anısı oldu.Great location for visiting the major museums of Madrid.

Apartment was fine once inside, but apartment building felt sketchy (light burned out in hallway, elevator sometimes not working). LOTS of construction happening in apartment underneath -- loud plaster removal for hours at at time, although presumably host cannot control this.

Leticia works for a real estate agency and does not have a personal attachment to this apartment that we could see. Communication was difficult and challenging in terms of timely responses and understanding. Information is missing from the listing about needing to provide passport and fees. This host would do well to put ALL information in the listing to avoid these miscommunication problems in the future.

Also note you will need to pick up keys to apartment 1.7 km walking distance away, at the office. Not the best setup. Meeting at the apartment would have been much more convenient and nice.Really good location, close to museums and fantastic area to walk, dine, tapa, drink and shop. Apartment was really clean, good size bed too. Only downside was having to go to an office not near the apartment to collect keys, sign a contract and a copy of my passport then taxi back to the apartment which was only possible as the taxi driver spoke English, but it cost us €20 to do this.  Also renovation works in the apartment below began before 9 and finished after 7pm. But I would stay in this area and apartment again for a short stay.The photos of the flat are all accurate. It easily accommodated the two of us. I found the location to be very convenient in a quiet street. It is within walking distance of Plaza de Sol and Parque de El Retiro. The nearest Metro station is very close to the flat. The flat is also close to the Atocha train station which has a direct train to the airport (T4). T4 has a free shuttle service to the other terminal. This can work out to be a cheaper and faster alternative to the Metro.

Leticia was always quite quick to reply to questions. We took advantage of the later key pick up time and everything went smoothly.

Thank you for letting us stay. We'll be staying again soon.This was the second time I had stayed in the apartment so obviously, I would recommend it. There are lots of places to eat close by and a convenience store just a couple of doors down.

I should say, on both occasions, I did not pick up the keys. My girlfriend arranged to collect the keys at a restaurant close to the office due to it being closed after 9pm. If you wish to collect the keys in this way, you'll need to bank transfer the money directly to them before you arrive. The apartment was exactly as pictured, it was in a great area around many bars and restaurants. It was kind of a hassle to pick up the keys at the office but the apartment was close enough to walk to. The garbages weren't taken out of the apartment upon arrival and I wasn't able to turn on the cold water in the shower so the water was extremely hot. Unfortunately the flat was lately available and we had to wait for the keys. Appart from that, the flat was great and well located in the city center. I would recommend this place for a stay in Madrid.We had great time in Madrid. The location is good, very close to the heart of the city. I'm satisfied of the service provided and is absolutely  recommendable.The apartment was exactly as advertised, they were very kind and easy to work with. Thanks Leticia.El piso y la localización están muy bien. Calidad / precio es buena y fueron flexibles para la hora de entrada. Aparte de esto, todo perfecto.Before we arrived in Madrid we had contact with Fer about our arrival time, keys, etc. via Phone and text. The apartment was very clean and light and contains everything you need during your stay. The neighbourhood is beautiful. In my opinion one of Madrids best. We walked for 3 days. No need to take the metro or taxi. Everything seems very closeby.

We had a great time in Madrid! Definitely a good place to stay.

Piso muy bien comunicado, a menos de 1 minuto de la estación de metro y cerca igualmente de los principales museos si se opta por ir caminando. Barrio agradable con bonitas calles y tranquilo por la noche.
El piso es tal cual las fotos, cocina bien equipada, salón amplio con balcón, habitación con una cama cómoda y un baño completo y limpio. We would definitely recommend this flat.  The photos show it accurately, and the location was great--not in the middle of a major tourist area, but everything was within a walkable distance.  There wifi is really good, but there is no washing machine, and the kitchen is well kitted out but could benefit from basics like salt/pepper/vinegar/oil.  There was a bit of a challenge with getting the keys but from reading other reviews we knew to have the lady show us how to work the front door/gate.

There is almost no traffic noise from the street, but the traditional style of the buildings does mean that you may get a late night concert from merry party-goers walking home, but the neighbourhood makes up for that with silence in the mornings.  We found a couple of really good restaurants in the area from TripAdvisor, and there a couple of supermarkets (the larger one is on the other side of Calle Atocha).  When we return to Madrid we would look to stay here again.The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.It was a really good stay. Great location that allowed us to walk to most of the major tourist attractions in Madrid. It is also not far from atocha station for those who are arriving by train. Nosotros llegamos el 31 de diciembre y tuvimos un problema con la calefacción de la habitación. El 1 de enero no nos atendió y apareció el 2 de enero pero no pudo solucionar nada. Al final fueron los propietarios del piso, que fueron encantadores y no la gestora que lleva el piso, los que nos solucionaron el problema después de pasar 2 noches sin calefacción proporcionándonos unas estufas eléctricas. Buen lugar para hospedarse, cómodo y bien ubicado. Ha sido un infierno los 5 días, el piso y la ubicación: bien. Pero no me parece nada honesto alquilar el piso mientras que el vecino está de obra. Mi marido es músico, trabajaba de noche, fue un verdadero infierno por el ruido de la obra. Si pensáis alquilar el piso, no olvidéis comprobar si la obra del vecino está terminada. I am staying here again next week so would highly recommend the apartment.The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. Non una bustina di tè né altro per la colazione e nemmeno la carta igienica (c'era un rotolo praticamente finito quando siamo arrivati e ce la siamo dovuta comprare perché non ce n'era altra in casa). Il prezzo comunque buono per la qualità dell'alloggio e la posizione.Nous avons passé un excellent séjour chez Leticia et Fer ! L’appartement est moderne, il y a tout ce dont on a besoin et il est surtout très très bien placé !! A 5 min à pied de tout (y compris la Puerta del Sol) et 1 min du métro ..
Je recommande !Otimo apartamento em zona central.Conveniently located to many different restaurants and shops. The place was as advertised. Really clean and the check in process was very easy.L'appartement est très agréable pour y vivre. Cependant les murs ne sont pas en très bon état et certains équipements ne fonctionnent pas (lumière salle de bain). Par ailleurs, à mon arrivée la poubelle des toilettes n'était pas vidée.
Malgré cela, l'appartement est tres bien situé et dans un environnement calme.Alojamiento muy bien situado. Buena acogida y muy bonito y comodoMuy bien ubicado, limpio y tal como se ve en las fotOs. Para repetir sin duda.Muy bueno todo¡Me gustó mucho la experiencia! La ubicación del apartamento era excelente!Buena ubicación, espaciosa y bastante cómodoGreat location! Walkable to all of the museums and fashion of Madrid! Great restaurant, La Sanabresa two steps from door. Host is excellent!Lugar super  bien localizado cerca de todo a de más tiene buenos lugares para comer bien al rededor , está perfecto el alojamiento para una familia, hemos estado muy a gusto como en casa.lo recomiendo mucho.
es limpio y con muy buena ubicacionI arranged for a dear, elderly friend to stay at Leticia&Fer's place in Barrio de Las Letras, Madrid.  The apartment was exactly as pictured and described.  Bright, airy, nicely furnished, quiet, and very nicely located.  We got off to a bad start in that their agent was not there to meet us at the time agreed upon, and when we finally did get into the apartment 2 hours later, there was no toilet paper.  (At that point, we had little confidence in their agent, so we went out and bought some for our friend.). Happily, the charms of the apartment more than compensated for our problems checking her in.  Our friend had a recent hip replacement and the building and apartment were easy for her to navigate given the spacious elevator and corridors.El apartamento está bien ubicado, muy cerca de la zona de museos, en el Barrio de las letras, hay bares cerca pero la calle es tranquila. 

Respecto a las comodidades bien, cama cómoda, corto en lo referente a equipamiento del baño, no había toalla de manos ni alfombra de ducha, solo un par de tarritos de gel minúsculo, sin jabón de manos y solo medio rollo de papel higiénico.

La atención normal, lo lleva una agencia. Llevo bastantes años reservando apartamentos y uno de los puntos a favor era que los anfitriones solían ser muy hospitalarios, ahora con las agencias la atención se vuelve menos personalizada, casi como de hotel o peor. En ningún momento nos ofrecieron darnos información del restaurantes y zonas de interés cercanas.Atención: tengan mucho cuidado con este anuncio! El departamento, de hecho, por lo general, es como en las fotos. Lo que pasa es que las dueñas son muy,  pero muuy irresponsables y groseras.  Quedaron con nosotras el check in a las 4 p.m., todo registrado en mensajes.  Llegamos de un viaje internacional agotador, exactamente a las 4 p.m. No estaban en el departamento como habían prometido.  Enviamos mensaje por wpp y nos dijeron que llegarían en 20 minutos.  Mientras tanto, estábamos en el frío de la calle,  con 4 valijas,  después de un viaje desde Sudamérica. Entonces,  empieza lo peor: las dueñas no llegaron para el check in y nos dijeron que deberíamos hablar con una chica desconocida. Enviamos mensaje a esta persona y nos dijo que no era ella la responsable, así que nos dió un tercer número,  de una chica llamada Carolina.  Fue cuando empezó el verdadero horror. Le enviamos mensaje y decía no nos conocer y preguntaba cómo conseguimos su número.  Lo más raro es que, a la vez,  se portaba como si fuera responsable y decía que nos llevaría las llaves dentro de una hora. Después nos llamó por wpp a los gritos y fue muy muy espeluznante. Decía que iría más tarde y que no deberíamos molestarla antes. Tardó más de 1 hora. Cuando llegó, accedió al  edificio portándose rara y peligrosa (tuvimos miedo), gritando en inglés "I'm here". Tiró las llaves del departamento en la mesa y fue muy muy sin educación.  Luego de irse, intentamos cerrar la puerta y nos dimos cuenta de que estaba rota y que no se la podía cerrar desde adentro, lo que nos dejaba en condiciones de absoluta inseguridad,  especialmente teniendose en cuenta el nivel de estas personas. Envíamos un mensaje a las dueñas que dijeron que enviarian a alguien. No lo hicieron y además nos bloquearon en wpp. Decidimos que ya era demasiado y nos fuimos a un hotel. Cuando pedimos a airbnb la devolución del pago, osaron decir que no entendían el reclamo,  que estábamos bien en el departamento y que éramos deshonestas. La mentira de ellas sólo se aclaró cuando enviamos las comprobaciones de check in y de pago del hotel que reservamos sin ninguna antelación y planeamiento y nos costó más de €600 por pocos días.  Sobre el check in tarde,  osaron decir que nos darían 1 hora extra en el check out, como si lo quisiéramos.  Queríamos apenas llegar del viaje y adentrar a un sitio seguro todo como quedado. Airbnb actuó bien y hizo la devolución total del dinero reconociendo el fraude, pero aun así no recomendamos este departamento a nadie. La peor experiencia de nuestras vidas. Cuidado! Este departamento es una estafa, un peligro, un problema!Lo mejor del apartamento es la ubicación, está a 10 cuadras promedio de cualquier sitio de interés, nosotros compramos una tarjeta de 10 pases de metro y no pudimos usarlos todos en 3 días pues todo queda tan cerca que es mejor caminar. El apartamento es cómodo y Leticia&Fer como sus dependientes, son sumamente amables e intentan colaborar con cualquier inconveniente que pueda suscitarse. Sumamente recomendable.sin duda la ubicación del apartamento es fantástica The flat given to us is not the same as the one they showed in the pictures. Even the location is different! The lady who checked us in was explaining that there were system issues thats why a different flat was given to us. However if they had issues internally they should have notified us and not just booked us in a different apartment! For future bookers please make sure that the apartment they will give you is the same as the one they are advertising as we honestly feel we were cheated but not able to do anything as it was too much hassle to argue and book a different apartment that time. I am not even sure the money we paid is of the same value of the apartment we originally booked since the one they gave us looked a bit old while the one they are advertising is new.Terrific space! Central location.Great location for this apartment in Madrid! It’s on a relatively quiet street in a really nice neighborhood. We walked everywhere and felt completely safe. It’s close to main tourist attractions as well! lovely spacious apartment in a great spot close to bars, restaurants and shops. the apartment has everything you need, with 2 air conditioning fans so great to stay cool in tge summer months. i would recommend the apartment and will likely be back!I recommand it without any hesitation! Good price, good location, good communication. Clean.Appartement spacieux et très bien placé pour visiter Madrid ou se déplacer en dehorsMuy correcto para un fin de semana. 
Muy bien situado y fácil comunicaciónAlojamiento bien situado, cómodo y luminoso en calle tranquila del centro, un sitio agradable.Luminoso, céntrico y bien comunicado.Muy recomendable por servicio, trato personal, zona y calidad del alojamiento.Place is like shown in the pictures, very neat and hip.
Such a great location! close walks to all tourist spots.Lindo apartamento, cómodo y muy bien ubicado.El apartamento es cómodo y muy bien localizado, alrededor la zona es muy bonita, con muchos lugares buenos para comer y cenar.The location of this place and its size are the good thing about it. Otherwise, there was no toilet paper, the coffee machine is old and rusty and doesn't work properly. The towels did not smell clean. The mattresses are old and uncomfortable. Not impressed.Great location,  very clean but sofa bed is not good to sleep on.  There is a bar close by that is noisy till 4 or 5 in morning so if you are a light sleeper , might not be ideal. Air condition worked great.Piso cómodo, luminoso y muy buen situado. Muy recomendableNoisy place at night on the weekend. Overall we enjoyed staying there as located in nice area, close to museums and Parc.Todo okGood location and well-equipment.high recommendation.Super ubicación y cómodo apartamentoEl apartamento muy bien y la decoración muy original.El piso no tenia nada en la nevera, nada en la cocina, penso que la filosofia del Airbnb es diferente de la que piensan. Importante recibir bien las personas. Cuando llegamos, estaban muy preocupados en rellenar el formulario de buenas vindas.사진이랑 비슷한데 다알라욤. 모양은 저건데 가까이서보면 찌져져이꺼낭 지지하고 냉장고 완젼 지지 지지. 청쇼하시는뷴이 꾸석꾸석 제애대로 안하나봄. 식기두 지지. 그냥 다 좀 지지. 밤 11시랑 새벽에 쓰렉이화물챠가 쓰렉이통 들꾸 흔둘흔둘 하규 다녀성 넘흐 싞끄려워염 잠다깸. 그리구 가쟝 즁요한건 첵크인하려 오는 여쟈뷴 완져어언 부울친졀해요. 본인이 40뷴 느져노쿠선 나한테 따지규 회샤에 내야댄다규 설뮨지 쟉성 해댤라규 해놓쿠 체쿠인에 별3개 쥬니깐 왜 3개냐규 모라햐규. 그래서 무시라 무시라 무셔워성 이로케 젹어놔염.The apartmentwas clean and very well located - we could walk to everything and only for the transfer to the airport we used the metro. For a few days stay it was perfekt. We had everything we need and the communication was perfect. We had a great time, thank you. This is located in a vibrant area of downtown Madrid. There is a lift and it is accessible. We were glad for the air conditioning. It is easy to walk or ride public transport from this location. It is close to the plazas and many opportunities for eating. Next door is a wonderful Peruvian restaurant. It is in the old city and the streets are narrow, do not plan to have a car unless you make plans. I did see people in the building who had cars, but they may have been permanent residents. It is actually a quiet street during the day, but at night after midnight the trash collection and street cleaners make lots of noise for a while.Un appartement très bien situé pour visiter Madrid à pieds ou en métro. L'appartement était très propre et calme ( bien qu'il soit situé à proximité de restaurants, bars...)
C'était la pemière fois que nous réservions sur AirBNB. Nous retenterons l'expérience sans hésiter. Leticia et fer. ont répondu rapidement à nos mails.La relacion calidad-precio es una de las mejores en Madrid, teniendo en cuenta que la ubicacion del piso es perfecta !The description says that this place has AC and Heat, but while they have three radiators, not a single one worked!!  On my first day, the host finally sent a repair person in the late evening after telling me it would be early morning.  The repair man came and could not repair the two main units, which he told me.  He was only able to get the one in the bathroom working properly.  I was definitely put off by the whole situation for quite a few reasons, but the worst part was that the host/owner knew the repair person could not fix the units, but they told Airbnb and myself that the repair man fixed them!  Then they lied to Airbnb about the condition of the unit and swore that the repair man came immediately in the morning.  The repair man told me that none of this was true and he could do nothing without the proper parts to fix them.  Further, the host/owner refused to promptly find me another place (they own many apartments) or refund my money, so I had to  escalate the matter to Airbnb.  I travel constantly and always use Airbnb, but this was my worst experience to date!  With that said, I am so thankful to Airbnb for stepping in and rectifying the situation and not letting me be cold and stranded.  

I will make note of this owner’s properties to be sure I never use them again.  To have an owner do this to a customer; especially, to a foreign traveler that is already stressed out and handicapped, was just rude, disgusting, unprofessional, and totally unbecoming of an Airbnb host/owner.

comments:
El piso está muy bien ubicado y a pesar de ser pequeño es muy cómodoOttimo alloggio. Ma i letti che si vedono in foto sono sul soppalco che è alto solamente 50/60 cm. Per dormire e ottimo!Javier ha sido un anfitrión comprometido y atento a nuestras necesidades. El departamento es tal cual se publica en el sitio. Tiene una ubicación excelente, cercano a restaurantes, supermercados, negocios varios , tren y metro. Los servicios necesarios para una estancia confortable.  Altamente recomendable!! Sin duda volvería a elegirlo!!El apartamento está ubicado en una zona extraordinaria ya que desde él se puede ir a los principales sitios turísticos de Madrid a pie, sin embargo, también está muy bien conectado con la red de transportes públicos de Madrid (Metro, buses, etc.).

Por otra parte, Javier fue muy agradable con nosotros en todo momento, estuvo atento a nuestros mensajes y fue flexible en algunos temas como la hora de llegada. A su vez, nos explicó el funcionamiento de todo de una manera clara y precisa.

¡Totalmente recomendable! Very nice flat in amazing location , host is great and very responsive , i highly recommend Javier' s flat in MadridThis is not a 2 bedroom apartment. This is a bedroom with a loft (seperated entrance) which opens into the main bedroom and seperated only by a curtain. This listing *might* be good for a couple only or with small kids but certainly not for adults looking for a small bit of privacy. 

The Host is super nice and communicative and gives great help about getting to the apartments and making sure you know how to use everything. So that's 10 stars if I could give it... but the apartment is sadly not accurately depicted.El lugar es encantador y súper bien ubicado , nos encantóApartamento pequeño, pero muy acogedor. Completamente equipado.  Ubicación inmejorable. Totalmente fiable con la descripción.El Lugar es central, Javier muy atento y te ayuda con todo. Recomendado !!!Una persona muy atentaExcelente ubicación, todo está cerca del apartamento, lo recomiendo apliamenteJavier encantador y su apartamento en un sitio inmejorable de Madrid.Excelente ubicación, muy cerca de la plaza España y muy amables y cordialesNous avons passé un sejour agreable chez javier.. l appartement propre et tres bien situé au centre de madrid proche du station de metro .. a 5 min a pied du fameux gran via.. petit mais equipé de tout .. merci javier pour ta gentillesse..Muy serio y recomendableótimo apto. Muito bem localizado. Voltaremos mais vezes.L’appartement est très bien placé, à deux pas du métro.
Il est très calme et situé entre le 1er et le 2ème étage, un petit ascenseur est disponible.
Bien sûr il est tout petit et convient surtout quand on y vient juste pour dormir et prendre le petit déjeuner.
Les deux lits situés sur la mezzanine sont larges, on peut juste s’assoir en baissant un peu la tête.
Les deux chambres sont en fait dans le même volume et séparées par un rideau. Une est en bas, l’autre est en haut.
C’est très propre. 
L’espace pour le WC est est un peu étroit mais pour quelques jours on s’en accommode.
Un petit supermarché est à 50 m.
C’est un très bon rapport qualité/prix. 
A recommanderL'appartement de Javier est très bien placé au centre de Madrid propre et fonctionnel! Javier a été très réactif et attentif à nos demandes. Seuls bémols le manque d ouverture sur l extérieur et l'étroitesse de la mezzanine.Super bienEl apartamento tiene una excelente ubicación. Javier es muy atento informando de cada detalle. Wifi anduvo bien. El techo de una de las habitaciones es bajo, no se puede estar parado tal como se muestra en las fotos.Todo bien, estupendo, es pequeño pero es lo que esperábamos.
Localización genial, no está en pleno centro pero a 5 minutos lo tienes todo.
Buena zona.Excelente ubicación, perfecto para estadías cortasMuy buena ubicación y seguroExcelente anfitrión recomendable para nuestra comunidadTodo perfecto! Tal cual las fotos y Javier muy amable.L'appartamento non è grandissimo, ma è perfetto per un soggiorno di qualche giorno sia in famiglia che con gli amici. È dotato di tutti gli accessori di cui si possa aver bisogno (come ferro da stiro e phon) ed è situato proprio nel centro della città. Molto vicino si hanno anche la fermata della metro, una fermata del bus, e un supermercato. Io e i miei amici ci siamo trovati veramente bene. A questo aggiungo che Javier è davvero gentile e disponibile.Very nice appartment, not very big but very well located! Javier is very nice and reactive host, thank you!La ubicación inmejorable a 10 minutos andando del Sol, Javier muy atento tuvimos un problema con la caldera y en seguida mandó a alguien para arreglarlo, todo genial, sin duda Repetiríamos.Cumplió exactamente con nuestras expectativas 
Excelente ubicaciónSehr gute zentrale Lage, Metro Verbindung excelente, Sehenswürdigkeiten zu Fuß zu erreichen, viele Restaurants.Embora seja pequeno, foi adequado para 4 hóspedes. Porém é mais confortável para até 2 pessoas. A localização é muito boa, muito próximo à gran via. Fizemos tudo a pé ou de metrô. Javier nos recebeu muito bem, foi muito simpático e gentil.O apartamento está muito bem localizado, próximo de tudo no centro. A casa bem equipada e limpa e tem um supermercado aberto até tarde mesmo ao lado. O Javier é muito amável e muito reativo. Recomendo este apartamento sem hesitar! Obrigado mais uma vez Javer!   ;-)Javier es una persona muy amable y dispuesta a ayudar en todo lo que le hemos solicitado.

Piso muy bien situado, en pleno centro de la ciudad, muy acogedor, bien decorado y con todo lo necesario para una estancia perfecta.Lovely apartment in a great location!
Close to Metro but most places are walkable.We stayed there over one month.  The apartment  was so great.  Location- can not better than there.  Spacious- much wider than photos.  Inside was bright and clean.  Kitchen was also clean and almost ready to use.  I highly recommended there.  The Apartment is perfecto y locales, in one of The best areas of Madrid. It is in a quiet street walking distance from the city center. It is well located because it is in a quiet area not far from city center. It makes you avoid the crowds. The flat is clean and the beds are comfortable. The host are responsive and any issue they are here to fix it. There is a lobby downstairs where you can see them if any issues. Overall = great !Muy buen departamento, amplio y bien iluminado, está en la mejor zona de madrid, lo recomiendo bastanteExcelente ubicación y apartamento amplio

comments: El lugar está en una ubicación genial. La comunicación con Mike fue fácil y nos ayudó con una llegada temprana a dejar las maletas. Muy amable y el apartamento como en las fotos. Limpio, cómodo. Todo muy bien.

amenities: {TV,Wifi,"Air conditioning",Kitchen,"Smoking allowed","Pets allowed",Elevator,Heating,"Family/kid friendly",Washer,Essentials,"Hair dryer",Iron,"Bed linens","Extra pillows and blankets"}
comments:
Very nice and good host, lovely apartment and great location A great comfortable place to stay in Madrid. Had everything we needed including easy parking in the street behind for our car and supermarkets very close by. Great shower and bed, plus a wonderful terrace. And it's under a 15 minute metro ride into the city centre. El departamento es lindísimo, nuevo, limpio, cómodo.
Los anfitriones muy atentos y seguro voy a regresar .This apartment is perfect. Great location, great facilities (A/C, TV, wifi), bright and very clean, lovely terrace. Fernando and Natalia are perfect hosts. I stayed with my girlfriend at this nice a tidy appartment for a couple of days during our stay in Madrid. I highly recommend to anyone looking for a starting point for old town visits, museums, etc. Metro and bus stops are just around the corner. The little restaurant is just below on the basement, where you can enjoy spanish breakfast and beer with chips at the evening. The appartment was perfect, and so was our stay. We are sad to be gone!Lovely apartment, very easy to get around Madrid with the metro on your doorstep, the tapas bar beneath is good for a beer and snack, would love to stay here again!O espaço é realmente excelente. Luminoso, arejado, muito limpo e equipado. 
A cozinha é totalmente equipada com utensílios domésticos, o quarto é confortável, a varanda é ampla e agradável com uma bela vista. O banheiro é amplo e ensolarado.
Tudo muito novo e modernizado.
O Fernando foi um ótimo anfitrião e estava esperando no dia do check in para apresentar o apartamento e foi muito solícito em ajudar na chegada.
Recomendo fortemente esse apartamento!The apartment is exactly like appear in the pictures. Very clean and fully equipped, I really mean it. Great communication with Fernando! Highly recommended!

comments:
Perfect location. Walking distance to all main attractions in Madrid.
Very clean. Very welcoming and helpful hosts. I would recommend  it to anyone coming to Madrid.It's a nice place. The wifi was in operation. When we needed something, the host would try his best to accommodate us. It was easy to get around the city from the apt. There's a very sweet lady working at the apt - she was very helpful. The kitchen was nice too. I would use the place again. El lugar esta muy bien ubicado. Limpieza excente. Las habitaciones tienen una sola cama de plaza y media. Excellent location; great, friendly people to greet you, and good communication with Pablo before the arrival. This place is clean and surprisingly spacious for central Madrid. Bring earplugs, as sometimes the noise levels can wake you up at night or in the morning if you want to sleep in... Highly recommended.  O espaço é bem localizado próximo a Metro, lojas, restaurantes, mercados e centros de diversão, limpo, bem aparelhado e o atendimento de Jorge é excelente. Eu recomendo I wouldn't bother staying here.
We booked a room with a double bed but only got a single bed. Check in was a joke, the aircon doesn't work at night so sleeping is difficult and when I mentioned all of this to the manager and his colleague all they said was 'it's not my problem' and 'there's nothing I can do'Muy buenoExcelente ubicación, limpieza excelente, El trato de primera, me encantó quedarme con ustedes, aunque no tuve oportunidad de tratarlos, la comunicacion siempre fué excelente, Victoria una gran persona, siempre dispuesta a ayudarnos en cualquier cosa. 100% recomendable.Muy buena experienciaMuy buena localización.
Habitación luminosa y moderna.Recommends this place 100%. Location is wonderful. The apartments are neat and clean. I can not say no bad words. The only small minus is that there is a small problem with telephone communication. All the rest without any complaints. I will definitely come to this place again.Posto centralissimo, e organizzato tutto alla perfezione.It is really a nice apartment. The Building is located on a shopping street which leads to Gran Via (the busiest street in Madrid). Most of the sights are within a  radius of 2km. So most of the sightseeing can be done by foot, but there are although two metrostations close by. 
Communication with the hosts was easy and they always replied quickly.¡Estupenda ubicación e instalaciones!Brilliant En-suite room at a lovely price. Absolutely city centre. Would definitely recommend this place.En general todo muy bien. Todo muy facil para coger llaves y encontrar el sitio. Ubicacion ideal, todo muy limpio y espacioso. Alguna cosa a mejorar pero solo algun pequeño detalle. Muy recomendable.Muy céntrico, tuvimos algunos problemas pero lo solucionaron y fueron muy amables.Sitio genial!! Repetiré!!!Céntrico, limpio y funcional. Muy buena relación calidad-precioUn sitio encantador, moderno, limpio y tranquiloLa ubicación es lo mejor ya que estás en pleno centro. Todo ha sido bueno, la habitación, el sistema de entrada y salida, la cama.... La única pega es que en la habitación 21 se oía mucho el ruido molesto de el sistema de aire, acondicionado.
