Negatives überwiegt aber leider deutlich: Angefangen vom unpersönlichen und komplizierten Check-in hin zur kühlen und ungemütlichen Einrichtung. Kein TV im Zimmer, keine Bilder an der Wand, null Persönlichkeit, keine Stilelemente die es wohnlicher machen. Es steht nur ein Tisch, ein Bett und eine Schrankwand im Zimmer. Es sieht so aus, als wäre jemand frisch eingezogen und noch nicht fertig geworden mit dem auspacken. Ausblick in eine Art Innenhof, sehr düster und kahl. Wir kamen uns so eingesperrt und eingeengt vor, obwohl das Zimmer recht groß war. Das Bad wiederum ist aber leider sehr klein. Hinzu kamen Dauergeräusche, die wir leider nicht näher definieren konnten, woher sie kamen. 24 Stunden am Tag eine Art Geräusch, die man sonst im Flugzeug kennt (Turbinengeräusche). Wenn man lärmempfindlich ist, ist an Schlaf nicht zu denken. Wir waren zum Glück nur eine Nacht da, alles andere hätte uns zu einem frühzeitigen Check-out bewogen.

Nel complesso molto buono.Excellent location, a spacious room with really good bed and shower. Big kitchen at your use. So much space and may I mention again the location! I can totally recommend to everyone. Just bring ear plugs if you are a very light sleeper, because there might be occasional sounds from neighbours, but nothing much.Excelente ubicación en pleno centro de Madrid. Habitación cómoda, amplia, con varios enchufes, con doble iluminación a ambos lados de la cama para facilitar la lectura. Muy acogedor! Espacios comunes muy amplios y cómodos. Todo funciona perfectamente! Ideal para sentirse como en casa!Piso lindo, cómodo, muy bien ubicado.L’alloggio era centrale, discreto nella pulizia, ma privo di una coperta/ piumone sul letto, c’era solo un plaid singolo che non copriva nemmeno i piedi (mese di dicembre), scoperto alle 10 di sera al nostro arrivo, abbiamo dovuto aspettare la mattina dormendo con maglioni e pantaloni. Al risveglio abbiamo segnalato il problema alla signora delle pulizie ( nel residence non c’e’ nessuno a fare ne’ accoglienza ne’ assistenza, e’ tutto fai da te, con armadi vuoti),  che ci ha detto che avrebbe provveduto. Rientrati alle 18,00 non c’era nessun piumone, abbiamo scritto a Daniel, ci ha risposto che ogni stanza aveva un piumone, ma non c’era, gli abbiamo inviato anche la foto della mini coperta, a quel punto e’ scomparso, non ha mai piu’ risposto nulla di nulla, eclissato. Avrebbe avuto tutto il tempo, tre giorni, per portare o farci portare la coperta, invece non si e’ piu’ fatto vivo. Abbiamo acquistato una coperta e uno zaino per portarla a casa, pagando anche il bagaglio supplementare per il trasporto in aereo. Abbiamo scritto chiedendo almeno un rimborso, dato il costo non preventivato, oltre al tempo e al disagio causatoci (viaggio che era un regalo di compleanno importante), non abbiamo ancora oggi ricevuto nessuna risposta, solo un mi spiace tardivo e inutile. 
Per 100 euro a notte, direi molto grave, le coperte le hanno anche i senzatetto, e’ la base di una camera in inverno. 
Quanto al comportamento, non ci sono parole. 
Direi molto sconsigliato, se volete il minimo dei servizi. 
La camera non viene mai rifatta, il problema e’ che in bagno c’erano due minuscoli tubetti di shampoo e di sapone, 2 soli e piccoli rotoli di carta igienica, il tutto per due persone per tre notti e tre giorni. Il phon non funzionava. L’host vi scrive ma non si occupa di voi, se ne frega, pertanto il rischio e’ molto alto.

Monica e LuigiGood placeVery good locationSitio muy bien situado.5/5Buen lugar acorde al precioI like it very much, I still choose here next time I go to Madrid

amenities: {TV,Wifi,"Air conditioning",Kitchen,Heating,Washer,Essentials,"Hair dryer",Iron}
comments:
Cuando llegas al apartamento te sientes frustrado pues es un piso alto y no hay ascensor, pero afortunadamente las escaleras son comodas y el apartamento esta nuevo, muy comodo, limpio y con todas las comodidades necesarias para pasar unos estupendos dias de vacaciones... Altamente recomendado< Muchas Gracias!Just book it. Great location and soothing interior vibeThis apartment in in a great location...walking distance to almost everything.  It was beautifully decorated and spotless.  On a Sunday morning you walk out right into the weekly market.  There are many bars and cafes on the corner.  The only negative was dragging luggage up the 3 story walk up. We would stay here again.Appartement au top! N hésitez pas!!This place is beautiful!!! We had a great time. Very spacious rooms, very comfortable, and stylish decorated with simple great taste. I really recommend. It added to our trip to be able to come back home after walking all day to such a lovely place. Super clean too. The neighborhood has lots of bars and is very lively. Thank you for having us!!!We were staying 2 nights at the place. There was no hot water and the responsable was finding any excuse to kill time and never resolved the problem. They were also lying to me saying that someone was there resolving the problem but we were there and there was no one!! 
When I called them they seemed like I annoying themUn apartamento muy moderno, para estrenar todo. Fue perfecto para nuestro grupo familiar de 8 adultos y 1 joven. Muy comodo, amplio, limpio y cerca a todo lo que se quisiera conocer de una ciudad magnífica, como Madrid.Fantastic location, great place to stay.The flat is very well located, 10-15 minutes by foot to Puerta del Sol (main place), there were everything we need, the flat was very clean and well furnished. Claudia is a very good host, she answers very quick and the check-in and -out are pretty easy to do. I would so recommend this flat to everyone who goes in Madrid and I will return there if I come back one day ! Thank you very much !Excelente apartamentoAppartement très spacieux et confortable (literie au top). Excellent emplacement. Il peut faire très chaud dans les 2 chambres sans fenêtre. On a eu un souci d'eau à notre arrivée, pas d'eau chaude le premier jour. Le problème a été réglé dans la journée et nous avons négocié en échange de faire un late check-out le dernier jouer à 18h. Donc pas de souci, on reviendra sans problème.This apartment is perfectly situated within a 10 minute walking distance from Plaza Mayor and only 15 minutes to the Palace and has many restaurants and bars nearby. The apartment inside was amazing and pictures don't do it justice. We enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay here again. Yes there is no lift/elevator but this apartment is in a historic building so its definitely worth staying in it. There is no dryer inside apartment however there is a public laundromat around the corner and for 3.50€ was worth drying cloths there. Book this place! Its gorgeous, spacious, and very clean!El departamento estaba impecable.  Tanto el edificio como el departamento fueron renovados. Hay una habitación en suite y las otras cuatro habitaciones comparten dos baños.Great apartment for our large group. Central to everything and bright and spacious. We would definitely stay there again!Overall a nice enough apartment, but cleanliness wasn’t great. Refusing to meet us at the actual apartment was always going to lose points with us too.Great place in a cool and lively areaThe apartment is perfect and convenient for live, we love it.  If check in office could be more near the apartment, it would be better for us.The apartment is beautiful and just as advertised. Great for large groups! Great urban location! Close to train station and a great location to get around. Be mindful there is no elevator in the building and you will have to carry your bags up and down. We had someone older that had trouble walking up and down. Other than that, amazing place and would definitely recommend it!Demoró la atención en las oficinas. El departamento estaba excelente, muy cómodo (aparte de los 3 largos pisos por escalera)It is a beautiful place ,very clean and location is great.Please be aware that you have a 30 minute walk (with your group of up to 9 and their luggage) after picking up the keys from the “host’s” office. When you arrive at the flat, it is three floors up without a lift. Remember to bring your own soap and shampoo. Don’t expect a “welcome pack of drinks, food and snacks”, there will be none. That being said, the location of the flat is quite good, it is large enough for a party of 9 and The Central air conditioning is a great benefit in the hot Madrid summer,Amazing home with more then enough room for my group of 9.. had plenty of space and restrooms for everyone to be comfortable. Location is very convenient to all the touristy places within a 10 min walk.C’est un bel appartement, fidèle aux photos, très bien situer pour rayonner à pied dans le centre de Madrid et sortir le soir !
Le personnel de l’agence est agréable et réactif.
Une adresse que l’on recommande !.

comments:
Mi experiencia en el alojamiento de Willie ha sido estupenda. Willie es una persona muy atenta, la habitación estuvo perfecta junto a la limpieza. Recomendado 100%, muchas gracias Willie.El apartamento es nuevo y está muy bien equipado; se ajusta a todas las necesidades del usuario. Los dueños son encantadores, atentos y dispuestos a ayudar en lo que puedan. La localización está muy bien,  a unos 7 minutos a  pie de Gran Vía.
Excelente anfitrión, lo recomiendo 100%. Ubicación fenomenal, la habitación es muy amplia, luminosa y cómoda. El baño estaba muy limpio y organizado, Willie es muy amable y atento. Recomendable a toda la comunidad de AirBnBExcelente Host, y localizacion, comodo y limpio el espacio  ...  
Gracias !!Ottima ubicazione, bagno privato,  proprietari gentili e disponibili.Willie was very accommodating and super friendly. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would recommend if you are looking for a central, affordable stay in Madrid. 

The only issue was waiting for an hour or so for Willie to check us in, but he was very apologetic and kind when he arrived. Che hanno i gatti in casa Todo perfecto!!! Willie y su esposa nos recibieron muy bien, son encantadores. El lugar super bien ubicado, nos ayudaron en todas y cada una de las inquietudes que tuvimos ( como llegar, donde comer...). El piso impecable. Lo pasamos de lujo!!!! Gracias!!!!Host disponibilissimi, stanza stupenda. Ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo e posizione centrale a tutto. Willie and his wife was so nice and helpful. We had a wonderful stay here. The apartment was great and very clean and has very cute European balconies. We had our own bathroom which was nice. The location is awesome and the cafe next door is great. Plus, their cats are so cute! :) an awesome experience overall!!! Great place to stay! Close to many attractions and the metro.The host canceled this reservation 18 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.It is in a great location. Alojamiento muy bien situado, al lado de Ópera.
Muy limpio, reformado y genial para una estancia de varios días.
Fueron muy amables conmigo y mis amigos.Ha sido un fin de semana fantástico. Hemos estado cuatro chicas en la habitación y sin problema. Es grande, luminosa y en cuanto a los espacios compartidos también genial. El trato maravilloso, no estaba el propietario pero nos recibió Verónica y de verdad que estamos contentísimas. Como para repetir ❤.Willie's home in Madrid was a wonderful place to live in and was exactly as mentioned on the website. The house is located within the centre and is walking distance from all points of interest in Madrid andre local restaurants and nightlife.
The house is clean and the people extremely hospitable. I would recommend this home to anyone who wishes to visit and stay in MadridTodo genial, cerca de muchos lugares turísticos, ideal para salir de noche por la cercanía de bares y restaurantes. Willie es súper amable. Volvería al mismo lugar.Willie è una persona fantastica, gentile e disponibile per aiuti negli spostamenti e molto flessibile come check in e check out.
Camera perfetta, letti grandi e comodi, molto pulito!Perfect place !!great location !! Metro was close by and the neighbourhood was brilliant !! Everything is pretty much walkable from the house !! And willie was very helpful and a great host !! The only issue were the presence of 3 cats.. if you are cat lovers then I think there will nothing to complain about !!Impeccabili, stanza sempre bellissima e pulita.Genial muy bien situado, limpio, todo perfectoThank you for hospitality, we had a great time in Madrid. The accommodation is clean and very central. Recommendable.The room is spacious for four people to live in. It's very close to most of the places. Wille is very kind and helpful. One of the cats likes to get inside the room. If you are a cat lover it won't be a problem at all =^.^=We loved staying in Willie's apartment! Willie was always kind and extremely helpful. The location is primo and the room is bigger than it looks in the photos. 100% would recommend!Lo mejor ha sido la ubicación, está muy céntrico y caminando puedes ver todo el centro de Madrid. La habitación es muy espaciosa y todo está muy limpio.
Los anfitriones son muy amables.Muy buena situación. Hemos descansado muy bien y nos hemos sentido realmente  cómodos en el alojamiento. 100% recomendable. RepetiremosEstá en una zona central pero sin mucho jaleo, se puede llegar a todo perfectamente andando y hay un par de paradas de metro muy cerca. El anfitrión es un encanto (y su gato también). La habitación es bastante grande y las camas muy cómodas y espaciosas. Teníamos un baño para nosotras solas y estaba impecable, sin duda repetiríamos.Muy céntrico, limpio, agradable. Estuvimos cuatro amigas alojadas dos días y fue un finde perfecto. Willie muy agradable y muy buena comunicación.Appartement très bien localisé.

Les hôtes sont vraiment gentils et le fait qu'ils aient des chats donne encore plus un côté chaleureux au logement. Nous avons bien aimé notre séjour. 

Par contre juste pendant la soirée et la nuit il faisait un peu froid dans la chambre, mais un bon training et c'est bon.Està habitacion esta muy centrica pero en una zona tranquila.  Muy recomendable para visitar el Madrid historico y monumental.  Nosotros fuimos con nuestras dos hijas y estuvimos comodos y sin interferencias del resto de habitantes del apartamento. Muy recomendable.  Los anfitriones muy accesibles y muy clarosWillie’s home was a great place to stay. It is a nice size room as well as very clean. We had a bathroom to ourselves and shared the rest of comon spaces with the hosts who were wonderful, friendly and helpful. The location is excelent.My friends and I had a wonderful stay with Willie. He was welcoming to us into his home and there was plenty of freedom to come and go as we pleased as we explored Madrid. The place was extremely clean and the cats were quite friendly and playful. You certainly get what is described and won’t leave disappointed. 5 stars!Willie is a really nice host. As we arrived he explained us everything which we really appreciated. Check-out was really good and he let us leave the luggage a bit longer which was nice.Willie fue un anfitrión genial, pasamos unos dias genial en su casa. Todo esta limpio y la ubicacion perfecta. 100% recomendable!La camera era molto pulita e in ordine. Willie e la moglie sono stati molto gentili e disponibili. Se non amate i gatti non è il posto per (Website hidden by Airbnb) noi li adoriamo e la loro compagnia è stata piacevole. L'appartamento è situato vicinissimo a Plaza Mayor quindi comodissimo per girare a piedi Madrid. La fermata della metro è molto vicina ma non vi consiglio di fare l'abbonamento perchè si raggiungono a piedi moltissimi punti di interesse. Lo consiglio vivamente.Willie's Apartment es perfecto para su estancia en el Royal Capitol de España. Ubicación perfecta: Metro Opera 2 bloques; Plaza Mayor a 3 cuadras. Una pequeña tienda de comestibles a la vuelta de la esquina, camino a la Plaza Mayor llamada Alimentacion Frutoa Secos. Habitación más grande que la imagen. Cuarto de baño espacioso con bañera y bidé. Cocina disponible con refrigerador y congelador conveniente. Como se mencionó, tienen tres gatos. Si te gustan los gatos, te encantarán estos, especialmente el llamado Nano. Finalmente, lo mejor de la estadía son sus anfitriones que son genuinamente cálidos y atentos. Lo recomendaría a todos

Willie's Apartment is perfect for your stay in Spain's Royal Capitol.Location perfect: Metro Opera 2 blocks;Plaza Mayor 3 blocks.Great little grocery just around corner, on the way to Plaza Mayor named  Alimentacion Frutoa Secos.Room larger than pictured.Bathroom spacious with bathtub and bide.Available kitchen with refrigerator and freezer (Website hidden by Airbnb) mentioned, they have three cats.If you like cats, you will love these, especially the one named Nano.Finally,  the best thing about the stay are your hosts who are genuinely warm and caring.  Would recommend to all.La ubicación es ideal ya que puedes ir andando y conocer los lugares emblemáticos del centro de Madrid sin tener que coger transporte, tiene  el metro Opera a 100 metros y en la esquina un super. Limpieza perfecta y los anfitriones muy majos al igual que los 3 gatitos que no molestan para nada. RecomendadisimoLa localización es inmejorable y la habitación es incluso mejor de lo que se ve en las fotos. Yuliana muy simpática y atenta. Cuando vuelva a Madrid sin duda volvería a reservar con ella.Relação preço qualidade, boa localização.Ubicación inmejorable, todo limpísimo y la atención muy muy buena. Zona muy tranquila pero en pleno centro. A destacar la amabilidad de las anfitrionas, la comodidad de las camas y la limpieza. ¡Hemos estado como en casa, y sin duda es muy recomendable! Gracias Totales!Gostei muito do quarto e da casa da Yuliana! Perfeito para quem quer estar perto do centro e andar a pé! Quarto muito confortável e limpo.Totalmente recomendado.
Nos recibió Ángela , nos explicó todo y fue muy amable, al igual que Yuliana , respuestas muy rápidas en todo momento y siempre al pendiente de nuestra estadía. 
La habitación , así como el baño y los
Lugares compartidos estuvieron muy limpios y ordenados. 
Tiene 3 gatos, son muy tranquilos y amigables.  
Ubicación muy céntrica, fácil de movilizarse a cualquier lugar (estaciones, metro, principales atracciones, restaurantes ,etc)Muy bien ubicado! Yiuliana súper amable! En la esquina hay un mercado Día que tiene de todo. Está cerca de todas las plazas principales, metro, bus turístico, restaurantes y bares. Estaba todo limpio impecable! Gracias por todo!Central location, almost walkable to everywhere. The room is big and clean, we are 3 and have big suitcases still very enough. The cats are very adorable and one of them tries to get in our room every moment, so if you don't like cats you need to take into consideration. Everything is fine but we're so bad luck that the heater for hot water was broken the time we were there.Very nice and cozy place. Cats are s (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) cute.Yuliana is a really great host. she was waiting for us later than expected because our flight was delayed. she's replying very quickly and she was very kind with us. regarding the location, it is perfect for visiting Madrid! everything is close from this place !Estamos encantados con la hospitalidad, con la habitacion, el servicio. El piso se encuentra en un sitio inmejorable que está cerca de todo a pie y en caso de ir más lejos a 100 metros hay una parada de metro. Si vuelvo repitoAccogliente e ben posizionata.La ubicación de la casa es buena y la habitacion y el baño limpios. Sin embargo,  aunque se advierte en el anuncio de la presencia  de gatos, no se dice que éstos tienen ocupado un territorio casi en exclusiva entre la habitación y el baño, de forma que convives con ellos sí  o sí .En general todo muy bien, pieza amplia, colchones cómodos, baño a disposición nuestro bien. Apt muy bien ubicado.
Los gatos que tiene son tiernos, y a ratos se mostraban muy inquietos, molestando mínimamente. Este aspecto hacía que hubiese olores particulares; el último día uno de ellos vomitó en zonas comunes.The place is exactly as described and the room is much bigger than what it seems through the photos.
However it’s a place for max 3 humans (adult or child irrespective - Personal opinion).
There were 3 cats in the apartment; 2 of them are extremely peaceful, so peaceful that one would not know they are there while 1 is very playful and would keep following you.
Did not get to interact much with the host on this trip but she is super responsive to messages.
The location is just too good and all previous reviews before mine have done enough justice with expressing satisfaction for the same.Very good.This was the perfect place to stay in Madrid for my friends and I traveling through Spain. There are many sites within walking distance from the apartment. It was very clean, comfortable and had the essential necessities. Yuliana was also very friendly and accommodating. I would definitely recommend her place to stay!Súper buena ubicación, muy cerca del metro, restaurantes, a unos pasos de Puerta del Sol, el lugar muy tranquilo y todo súper limpio y muy agradable estancia.Nos encantó la compañía de los gatos.Es lindo y un limpio departamento, se comparte la habitación y tienen 3 pequeños gatitos..

amenities: {TV,Internet,Wifi,Kitchen,"Paid parking off premises","Pets allowed","Buzzer/wireless intercom",Heating,"Family/kid friendly",Washer,Dryer,Essentials,Shampoo,Hangers,"Hair dryer",Iron,"Laptop friendly workspace","Hot water","Coffee maker","Cooking basics","Long term stays allowed","Host greets you"}
comments:
Tutto ok, soprattutto la cordialissima e meravigliosa padrona di casa. Alix è stata disponibilissima e gentilissima durante tutto il nostro soggiorno presso la sua abitazione! Grazie di tutto!

Todo bien, sobre todo la muy amable y maravillosa casera. Alix ha sido muy disponible y muy, muy amable durante toda nuestra instancia en su casa. Muchas gracias por todo!Realmente, esperábamos mas del piso, ya que no encontramos ni horno, ni microondas. Hay una serie de características escritas, como televisión y secadora que no se encontraban en el piso.

Por lo demás nos encontramos muy a gusto, el piso estaba cargado de energía positiva, todo se encontraba en optimas condiciones y el ambiente del barrio era genial. 

Aunque no vimos personalmente a la anfitriona, su representante, Farica, fue muy considerada con nosotros. La calificación sobre mi estadía en casa de Alix es, simplemente, EXCELENTE !
Aunque no vi a Alix, porque estaba de viaje, me atendió una persona de su confianza muy amable y ambas, sobre todo Alix, estuvieron siempre a disposición para cualquier asunto que hiciera falta. Incluso Alix se comuncicaba sólo para comprobar si todo marchaba bien en la casa. 
Con respecto a ésta, es exactamente igual a como la muestra la foto. Todo nuevo, super luminosa, muy bien equipada: ropa de cama, toallas, utensillos de cocina y de limpieza, vitrocerámica, un enorme refrigerador, estupenda lavadora, todo nuevo. 
El baño es más amplo de lo que parece en la foto; tiene unos enormes armarios con cajoneras. La habitación también muy buenas cajoneras.
Los vecinos fueron muy amables, había suma tranquilidad de noche, tanto por lo vecinos en sí, como en la calle (no hay bares que puedan molestar). Y el barrio es fantástico y so gustan los lugares típicos y con historia como es Lavapiés-Tirso de Molina que además van teniendo su bohemia. Muy cerca de los lugares histórico (Lavapíes, Rastro, Palza Mayor, Palacio Real ) dónde se puede ir caminando en 5 minutos. Para viajar en transporte público, está muy bien comunicado, ya sea por autobuses o por el metro.
Mi estadía fue un mes y diez días, por eso tuve el tiempo suficiente como para comprobar todo lo que cuento en esta evaluación. 
No lo dudéis, tanto por la casa como por su anfitriona. Repetiría sin dudarlo ! 
Best experience close to Puerta del Sol.The reservation was canceled 39 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.We stayed at Alix's place for one month and fell in love with Madrid. The location was amazing...we were walking distance to Lavapies, La Latina and Centro. The apartment had everything we needed and Alix was more than helpful. Highly recommend this place!La Casa è luminosa, molto curata e a 10 min a piedi dal centro. Alix è splendida, calorosa e molto disponibile. Ci siamo trovati benissimo e di sicuro ci torneremo.Casa luminosa e centrale.. Ideale anche per soggiorni lunghi. Alix cordiale e disponibilissima.El departamento es muy bonito y funcional, justo como en las fotos, pero su mayor atractivo defintivamente es el barrio de Lavapiés: ahí conviven vecinos inmigrantes de todas las regiones del mundo - América Latina, África, Asia cercana y lejana, jóvenes europeos - y la vida en las calles es impresionante. No hay lugar como este, es toda una aventura. Recomiendo este sitio no para relajarse, sino para hacer un viaje profundo, no típicamente turístico. Alix siempre muy atenta. Inolvidable experiencia!Nuestra estancia fue estupenda. La casa es pequeña pero suficiente para unos días y está bien cuidada. El barrio es un poco ruidoso pero muy bien situado. Tuvimos un problema con el aire acondicionado y Alix lo solucionó lo antes posible. Muy recomendable.Hablé con Alix dos veces, a ella no la vi sino a Fátima, una señora que vive cerca y se ocupa del estudio. Fátima fue amable y me enseñó el Carrefour donde comprar. El estudio es pequeño pero acogedor, luminoso y moderno. Los elementos de cocina no muy buenos pero me las arreglé. La lavadora muy buena. La calle es la más ruidosa y sucia en que jamás me ha tocado estar, los sábados noche difícil de creer. Alguna vez un operativo policial. También es una calle con vida de barrio y familiar. Las obras de la corrala molestaban poco y los encargados del trabajo eran personas tranquilas y amables. El container a la puerta generaba unos rincones donde se estacionaban a menudo grupos ruidosos, y la gente lanzaba dentro todo tipo de restos y desperdicios. Efectivamente, es un barrio popular, multiétnico, con servicios de limpieza muy insuficientes. Me acostumbré, aunque tuve a veces una sensación de inseguridad. El barrio está bien conectado y es muy interesante. Me sabe mal decirlo pero no volvería a estar allí.Super Lage, schöne helle Wohnung, genau wie in der Beschreibung. Auch die Ausstattung (Küche etc.) ist super. Wir haben über einen Monat in der WOhnung verbracht und kommen gerne wieder!Nos quedamos en el apartamento de Alix por un mes y medio y fue simplemente perfecto. El tamaño ideal para dos personas y muy bien decorado, súper ubicacion, cerca de todo. Volvería sin pensarlo. Aunque no llegue a conocer a Alix hablábamos por (Hidden by Airbnb) cada tanto para comprobar que todo iba bien. Súper atenta y con muy buena onda. Lo recomiendo muchoL'appartement est idéalement situé, nous avons pu faire beaucoup de visites à pieds. Il était propre et idéal pour 2 personnes, un couple ou, comme nous , 2 amis (canapé-lit + chambre). Nuestra estancia en el piso de Alix ha sido maravillosa. El piso es muy acogedor, Alix atenta en todo momento y Fatima, la chica que se ocupa del piso, encantadora. El único defecto a reseñar es la obra en la fachada del edificio que le quita al piso algo de luz. Por lo demás no dudaría en repetir y recomendarlo a todos.Nous revenons ravis de notre séjour à Madrid, qui est une ville très riche (quartiers, architecture, ambiance, musées, parcs.....). Nous avons trouvé une très bon accueil partout, même sans parler la langue... Alix a répondu à toutes nos questions rapidement (et en français).
Après nos visites de la ville, (tout à pieds depuis l'appartement), nous étions heureux de rentrer à la fraicheur de ce petit immeuble traditionnel et calme avec cour intérieure ombragée.
L’appartement est très bien situé, à 5 min du métro Tirso de Molina, à 10 min a pieds de la Plaza Mayor et de la Puerta del Sol. Le soir, le contraste était saisissant entre l'animation du centre ville et la quiétude de notre rue. 
L’appartement lui-même est tout rénové, clair, meublé simplement. Cuisine et salle de douche fonctionnelles. Lit large et très confortable. L'amie d'Alix qui nous a accueillis est efficace et nous a renseignés sur les magasins d’alimentation des alentours (mais nous avons toujours diné en ville). Petit déjeuner dans une "pastelleria" de quartier, un peu plus haut dans la rue (Las poemas de Tirso).
Pour résumer, très satisfait de tout ! (Nous sommes un couple de 57/60 ans)Wir verbrachten eine Woche für eine Städtereise in Alix' Wohnung und haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Die Wohnung liegt sehr Zentral, zu Fuß ist die Innenstadt sehr bequem zu erreichen. Einkaufsmöglichkeiten, Cafe's, Restaurants sind nur wenige Gehminuten entfernt. Die Wohnung ist mit allem ausgestattet was man braucht und genau wie in der Anzeige beschrieben. Alix ist eine mehr als hilfsbereite Gastgeberin, sie war stets bereit Fragen zu beantworten, und sehr gut zu erreichen. Schlüsselübergabe etc. hat problemlos und prima funktioniert. Wir haben uns in ihrer Wohnung sehr gut aufgehoben gefühlt und kommen sehr gerne wieder.The neighbourhood was very close to all the main areas of Madrid (only a 20 min walk to Serrano). The apartment is just like in the pictures and is a 5 min walk away from 4 Metro Stations. Would definitely consider staying again.Estuve una semana alojada en el piso de Alix. Lo recomiendo 100%, estuve muy a gusto. El piso tiene de todo y rapidamente te sientes en casa. Ademas esta ubicado cerca de 3 metros i muchos supermercados. Aunque no tuve el placer de conocer a Alix en persona, estuvimos todo el rato en contacto por whatzap. Gracias por todo Alix :-)Appartement fidèle aux photos; propre et fonctionnel; l'appartement est très proche de Sol (environ 10-15 minutes à pieds; et à tout juste 5 minutes du métro (Lavapiés ou Tirso de Molina)); Alix est réactive en cas de question/problème. La zone entre la station Lavapiés et la rue de l'appartement n'est pas des mieux fréquentées pendant la nuit (il y a des groupes de dealers ici et là, toujours aux même endroits) - mais la zone entre la station Tirso de Molina et l'appartement n'a pas ce problème là.Céntrico. Muy limpio. Bastante completo en cuanto a útiles de cocina,. Wc completo. Carrefour 24 hs a tiro de piedraHermoso departamento! Muy buen gusto, Alix muy atenta y cordial. Gracias por ayudarnos a pasar unos días perfectos en Madrid ! ❤La casa de Alix es muy acogedora y luminosa. Esta es la segunda vez que alquilo su piso y las dos veces han sido por un mes. Alix ha estado al pendiente de mis sugerencias y las ha implementado rápidamente el trato con ella es directo y agradable. El barrio es vivo, multi-etnico con mucha actividad comercial; restaurantes y tiendas principalmente. Es un barrio antiguo y de mucha tradición. El departamento es igual a lo que se ve en las fotos. Esta muy bien ubicado y cerca (5 mn) a pié de varias estaciones de metro. La ubicación fue ideal para mi. Para los que les guste caminar pueden conocer bastante de madrid a pié sin subirse al metro. A great apartment! We didn't meet Alix, but she kept us informed, checked everything was ok, and we were welcomed by the housekeeper. Nous avons bien aimé notre semaine à Madrid. Appartement très bien situé, propre, très éclairé et conforme à la description. Alex est un hô te accueillant et attentionné.He estado 10 días en casa de Alix y la experiencia ha sido maravillosa. Me he sentido como en mi propia casa. El piso es perfecto para cualquier tipo de estancia. Esta situado en una zona llena de vida  pleno centro de Madrid y puedes ir caminando a muchas de las principales atracciones turísticas. El piso tiene todo lo que necesitas para vivir.  Cuando llegué estaba super limpio y además es muy luminoso, algo que a mi me encanta. También he de decir que la cama es super cómoda, un detalle que normalmente se cuida poco y es muy importante. Además lo más importante, Alix es completamente encantadora. En todo momento estuvo atenta de mi para que estuviera a gusto y no me faltara de nada. Volvería sin duda a reservar en su casita y con ella. Muchas gracias Alix:) Great location in Madrid, with all of the best places to visit within walking distance. Lively neighbourhood close to La Latina where we found a lot of amazing places to eat! Perfect for a couple. 

Alix was fast to respond to communication. The cleaner who let us in was very nice and friendly. 

A good place to stay in Madrid!  We had a very friendly and we'll organised welcome. Alix was very helpful and quick to reply when we messaged. The apartment was clean and perfectly prepared. We found it a little odd that none of the rooms had doors (including the bathroom). The location was very good for the metro and being in the heart of la latina was a great experience.  The only downside was that the night times were very noisy.
We had a lovely time and would recommend Alix and her apartment. Thank youAlix is a very friendly and helpful host - takes a really good care for her guests. The apartament looks as in the pictures and is ideal to spend a week or more in Madrid and feel like a local. Located in center - you may reach Prado, Grand Via or Palacio Real in 15-20 min walk. In neighborhood you’ll find many shops, bars and restaurants. Highly recommended!Alix’s apartment was everything that was advertised.  The flat is located in the Lavapies area, a wonderful multi cultural area, with lovely cafes, bars and restaurants to hang out in.  Upon arrival we saw people painting murals and there are people sitting on benches playing music and enjoying life.  The apartment is in a quiet street.  It is close to small mini markets and walking distance to a supermarket that is open 24 hours.  This is very convenient, and makes it easy to buy food after spending the whole day in the museums.  The Reina Sofia museum is walking distance and I recommend walking through the neighbourhood to the Prado Museum that is a bit further. 
I can write a love sonnet to the bed in the apartment.  There were more than enough pillows and the bed is huge, making it a sleep heaven to fall into after a long day in Madrid.  The kitchen is fully equipped and lovely to use.  
I would definitely stay here again when I visit Madrid in the future. Super séjour l'appartement est top et Alix très sympathique.
A bientôt
Charleyne et karenEl cuarto era tal y como esperábamos. Limpio, amplio y con los esenciales para dos personas. La casa contaba con todas las amenidades que se mencionaba. En cuanto a ubicación, era muy bueno pues estaba muy cerca de varias estaciones de metro y hasta caminando de muchos lugares. Cerca de Lavapies, La Latina, Embajadores y no era problema caminar a Sol o Gran Vía desde la casa. Los únicos inconvenientes fueron que hacía mucho calor y solo había un pequeño ventilador y dejar las ventanas abiertas para que entrara el aire, lo cual a veces por la noche era incomodo pues era un vecindario un poco ruidoso. Sin embargo, si cerrabas la ventana todo el ruido dejaba de entrar, lo que ayudaba a dormir perfectamente. En general, un muy buen apartamento con excelente ubicación para conocer Madrid. Nos hubiera gustado haber conocido a Alix. Alix was tremendously helpful with everything leading up to booking and kept in communication the whole time. She had a house keeper meet us on the day of our arrival who walked me through all aspects of the apartment. It was clean, cosy and homely. A great stay for the week. We walked everywhere! It is very accessible to all the sights of Madrid and close to great restaurants and bars. The kitchen is well equipped too, so you could easily make a meal at home without hassle also. My only criticism would be that is was a bit warm at times. There was a fan available but it was not 100% effective. We ended up sleeping separately on couch and in bed because it was too hot. The balcony added some additional air flow in the nighttime, however the nose from the street below was quite disturbing to sleep in the wee hours of the morning. But even with the criticism I would definitely stay again!   Alix ist sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Wir haben uns sofort zurecht gefunden und unsere Fragen wurden alle beantwortet. Die Wohnung ist gut gelegen, man konnte alles gut zu Fuss erreichen. Metro station war in der Nähe. EN GENERAL NOS SENTIMOS MUY BIEN, LA DESCRIPCION DEL ANUNCIO ES LA CORRECTA, EL BARRIO ES UNA BARRIO ANTIGUO Y ESTA MUY CERCA DE CENTRO PARA IR CAMINANDO AL IGUAL QUE EL METRO. The apartment in itself was exactly as described: very bright, with functioning kitchen and internet connection. Even though I never got to see Alix, the communication was flawless. Overall, this apartment is good enough. It has great location (3 metro stations around,10-15 minutes of walking to El Retiro, Teatro Real, Sol square, Atocha railway station). There are many small shops in neighborhood. And 2 Lidl supermarkets are near too, I would recommend to shop there. BTW, if you are going to cook, please be aware, that you will find many plates, pans, but there was no oil, sugar, spice. We found only salt.
Alix was really helpful and always answered our questions fast, also she kept in touch with us during our staying in Madrid.
In general, we spent great time in Madrid and want to say thanks to Alix for her apartment and help with our journey!
We had a really great time in Madrid and enjoyed our stay at this apartment. It has a great location, close to bars, supermarket and has perfect connection to Metro lines. The apartment was clean and bright, just as you can see on the pictures. What I liked the most, is the bed: it was super comfortable.
Alix is so friendly and helpful - communication was perfect before traveling and also during our stay. We had some complications with the arrival because of the flight, but Alix was very flexible.
I would absolutely recommend it. :)Très bien situé pour visiter la ville à pieds et tout près de 2 stations de métro ( Lavapiès ou La Latina) . Accès pratique de l'aéroport.
Le logement est clair et très propre situé dans un immeuble très calme.
Nous y avons beaucoup apprécié notre séjour.

C'etait parfait ! A renouveler. Fabrice.This apartment was perfect for our 8-night stay in Madrid. It was clean, functional, and conveniently located. Only a 10 minute taxi ride from Atocha station. The best part was the location. We were able to walk to the Prado, Royal Palace, Plaza Mayor, Puerta del Sol, Thyssen, and Reina Sofía. I also loved the neighborhood, Lavapies, which is multicultural, gritty, and non-commercialized. It's like staying in the Mission District vs. Union Square in San Francisco (where we're from). 

The apartment itself is very comfortable, and the bed is cozy and relaxing. 

We only had one small problem opening the door our first time. The lock on the apartment has 4 bolts, turn the key 4 times and each bolt will lock or unlock. When unlocking, when you get to the fourth bolt, pull the door  in toward you, then unlock. It's a little tricky and we thought we were locked out! 

Alix was very responsive and checked in periodically to make sure we had everything we needed. We would definitely stay here again!A nice, bright apartment in a wonderful neighborhood.Ci siamo trovati benissimo.  Accueil efficace et souple, à recommander.Appartement très bien situé dans quartier populaire et dynamique. I definitely would book this place again!!El apartamento tiene una ubicación perfecta, muy cerca del centro turístico y de compras de la ciudad y muy cerca de varias estaciones del metro, todo a pocos minutos caminando.

Great place. Walking distance to everything This little apartment was just the right fit for my teenage daughter and I for a two week stay in Madrid. She raved about the comfort of the bed (and my futon wasn't bad either!). The location is phenomenal -- within walking distance to everything in the city -- over the two weeks we were there we walked over 70 miles and saw everything!

The value was exceptional and we found everything we needed in the apartment. Alix even went out of her way to stock the apartment with an umbrella when we asked about one. The little balcony was perfect for listening to the city or as a perch to watch the world go by down below.

Both Alix and Farica (the housekeeper extraordinaire) were very friendly and helpful. Farica doesn't speak English but we made do. Alix was easy to communicate with by phone or text and checked in mid-stay to make sure all was well. We never met Alix but saw Farica a couple of times.

We enjoyed the colorful neighborhood and found lots of great food options close by...as well as little groceries, bakeries, pharmacies, and such. The apartment was as described and shown in the picture. When I got home to the states I found out they were bed bug bites. It also made sense since I killed one of the bugs by the bed I just hadn’t realize it was a bed bug. I would have let Alix know immediately but I didn’t know they were bed bug bites until I got home (first time in my life getting them). Lo malo: la cuadra en la que está el departamento es sumamente ruidosa de noche. De hecho, las 3 noches que estuvimos en el departamento tuvimos inconvenientes con un grupo de gente en la calle (frente a nuestro balcón casi siempre), que se drogaba y hacía todo tipo de ruidos. Nos resultó imposible  dormir mientras estaban. Esto tampoco ayudó a sentirnos  del todo seguros para salir de noche. La tercer noche hubo incluso un operativo policial por esta gente. La ubicación es muy buena ya que están cerca tres paradas de metro de líneas diferentes con lo cual se piede acceder al transporte sin problema. The apartment is very central, allowing us to walk to Plaza Mayor, Gran Vía, Puerta del Sol, and numerous other places within 15 minutes. Alberto provided an air mattress for my party but in all honesty the sofa was extremely large and comfortable so it was not necessary. Alberto quickly responded to all my messages and calls. Alberto was very helpful in us getting into the apartment (unlocks remotely) and, when we had trouble with the keys, he was very responsive in helping us. The location is perfect- very walkable to bars and restaurants. We weren't there long enough to enjoy the museums and day-life of the city, but they seemed very close from our drive in. The apartment was clean, stylish, and comfortably slept all 5 of us. There was a roll-away bed (and an air mattress, which we didn't use) for the 5th person and she was very comfortable. Edu est disponible pour répondre à nos questions et flexible au niveau des horaires. 
A recommander.This was an amazing place to stay. The flat was stylish and bigger than expected! Great facilities and in such a good location. NIce and quiet but close enough to get to wherever you want to go. Would 100% recommend and would definitely come back again!edu’s apartment provides all you need for a stay in Madrid. It is very well located only 20 minutes walk from plaza mayor. Quiet area although busy on Sunday for el Rastro. Beds were comfortable and air con worked well. Really good shower. Edu’s communication excellent throughout. 
Would highly recommend this flat for a short stay in MadridСветлая и очень уютная квартира. Есть лифт, хозяин очень приветливый и помог с трансфером. В апартаментах не было чайника, не было шампуня и геля, как было указано на сайте. в целом, остались довольны.The place is great! Very clean, bed is super comfortable and there is a lot of space in the apartment. It is walking distance from everything  but also a bit tucked away so it was not loud. Would recommend!!Perfect place to stay with 3 persons for a weekend in Madrid. Great location, really clean and cosy. Milagros and Edu are both really friendly. We had a late flight and it was no problem to have a late check out without extra costs.Apartamento muito limpo e bem localizado. Recomendo!A lovely apartment. Good location, especially for the Sunday morning market. Easy communication. I enjoyed my stay and would come back again.lovely apartment and perfect lavapies location! would love to stay again in the future. many thanks Edu & Milagros!We had a great stay at the apartment. Very close to many restaurants and about a 15 minute walk to Plaza Major. The host Edu, was very accommodating, friendly and quick to respond to messages. We highly rate this apartment and would definitely stay here again.Piso muy agradable, muy bien situado, práctico y acogedor. Lo recomiendo!הדירה נראת בדיוק כמו בתמונות,
במיקום מצויין.
הצאק אין היה מהיר וקל.
ממליץ בחום.Knap appartement gelegen in de straatjes van Madrid elke week markt. Alles is gemakkelijk te voet bereikbaar. Zeer vlotte en vriendelijke verhuurder reageert bijzonder snel op je bericht.Lovely place, great location, wonderful cityNice a new apartment in la Latina area about 7 min walk to metro station. Clean and cozy with small terrace. 
Friendly with quick respond host. Thanks for hosting us:)We had a great stay at Edu’s apartment. It’s clean, comfortable, modern and tastefully decorated. The location is fine, especially for antique shopping and the enormous El Rastro Sunday flea market. 

Although we never met Edu our host, he was really helpful in arranging a pre booked taxi to the airport for an early flight. 

Check-in was a little awkward as the person who met us only spoke Spanish, this made some of the basic exchange of information difficult.

Eventually discovered the washing machine and iron located three floors down in the building basement. 

Also there is no kettle. 

We really enjoyed our stay at Edu’s and will stay again, and recommend to others.Spacious apartment, quiet area and walking distance from major sites.
Everything needed exists in the apartment.Edu’s place looks exactly the same as the pictures. It is very nicely decorated, very clean and in a super location. We found very good restaurants walking distance and the 
Metro that allowed us to move around the city very fast. We would love to stay at Edu’s again next time we visit Madrid :)The location is close enough to everything where you can comfortably walk w/o being bombarded with too much noise at night in such a lively city. El Rastro is also right outside the front door on Sundays!Die Lage ist sehr gut, nahe an der Metrostation La Latina und es hat mehrer Supermärkte. Die Wohnung ist genau wie auf den Bildern und es ist sehr sauber.Great apartment.  Very clean, and well-equipped.  Lovely part of town that had local bars/shops/restaurants and easy walk into the main tourist areas.  Would highly recommend, and would certainly stay again when returning to Madrid.L'appartement est très bien situé, en plein cœur du marché aux puces d'El Rastro et à quelques minutes à pied du centre historique. Spacieux, lumineux et calme, il est très agréable à vivre. Deux petits bémols, toutefois : les odeurs d'égouts dans la salle de bain et l'utilisation du chauffage un peu compliquée. Autrement, la mise en relation avec un chauffeur de taxi très sympa est fort appréciable, pour faire le trajet de l'aéroport à l'appartement.Great location and great apartment for a little getaway to Madrid! Would stay again. Thanks edu :)Nice and quiet location (except the amazing sunday market), close to the metro and city centre, clean, stylish and comfortable appartment + Edu is a nice guy. We'll be back!

comments:
Un apartamento con su encanto,muy acogedor,muy bien situado,practicamente en el (Website hidden by Airbnb) verdad que no puedo ponerle pegas al piso.Los dueños muy atentos en todos los (Website hidden by Airbnb) tuviera que volver a madrid repetiria el mismo apartamento!Gracias por todo!El piso es una joya, la ubicacion es ideal, muy centrica y perfecto tanto para viajes de ocio como para viajes de negocio.  El piso esta muy bien cuidado, luminoso, grande, limpio y es casi nuevo! 
Pero lo que hay que destacar es la atencion de Jose Vicente y de su mujer! Super amables!
Lo recomiendo y sin duda repitire!The apartment is superb, with a very beautiful view! José is very welcoming and gave us nice advice a out the city!!The apartment is very clean and cosy, well equipped. Everything is almost new - it is a real pleasure to stay in the apartment. Location is perfect - 5 min walking distance to Plaza Mayor. There is a supermarket nearby. Jose is very hostile, there were no problems during check in/out process. Highly recommended!El departamento de José Vicente es un muy buen sitio para estar en Madrid para una pareja. A unos minutos del metro, se puede visitar a pie casi todos los sitios turísticos. La zona esta llena de varios lugares para comer o tomar unas copas, aunque el alojamiento mismo está en un lugar tranquilo salvo niños jugando o jóvenes conversando, que se atenúan con el anochecer o con la ventana anti ruidos. La oportunidad de respuesta, el estar siempre atento, ha sido un plus muy valorado. Ciertamente retornaría.This guys wehere amazing! We gotta on the way in..and Jose waited for us to get there.. not knowing we got lost and waited for us till we got there..after se met ant showed us in..had a surprise welcome with a bottle of wine for our anniversary.
The place is super clean and very well located, we walked everywhere and even had a flea market downstairs. Over all it was amazingPerfect location! Close to the metro, close to restaurants! Great little apartment with everything you need and more! Perfect place to stay if you’re visiting Madrid!We spent a very good weekend in Madrid! Jose Vicente and Isabel ´s apartment is very nice and very well located! Jose Vicente is very friendly! I recommend!un lugar perfecto para descubrir la ciudad !Great apartment which is located very well to get to all the sightseeing by foot. Checkin/out was very convenient and communication was also good. Thanks again!Fabulous location! Wander the streets of La Latina's tapas bars, then return to relax and enjoy the view! If this Airbnb is available... Book it!All easy, amazing view, perfect location. José and Isa were very forthcoming. 100% Recommended.Our second stay in the heart of this wonderful neighborhood. Beautiful people! Lovely place!Beautiful place 5 minutes or so from the metro station. Also it’s 20 minutes to walk to Puerta del Sol. The place was very clean, and the view from the Airbnb was amazing! Jose was very quick to respond and easy to work with. The place is small, but perfect for one or two people. Definitely recommend!Super close to everything! The train station is literally around the block and walking distance to Puerta De Sol, Plaza Mayor, Palacio RealA great space convenient to many places in MadridWe fell in love with the city of Madrid. This flat, in the heart of La Latina, is perfectly situated to take advantage of the local life and rich culture, as well as the must see museums. José Vicente is the best host ever! Attentive to our every need.  Book it!The View from Josés Appartment is tip top and therefor worth to stay home for breakfast or drink a nice vine from the vinothek right arround the corner at your home and enjoy the great view. You can watch Madrid by dawn and how it changes when it turns night. Great! The appartment has everything as described and even a little more. everything is just arround the corner- tapas, wine, food, madreñillos. All important sights are max 15 min walk away. You fall into a tapas bar when you step 1 minute out of the door and if you dont like it, go to the next right next door. Of course, beeing in the middle of madrid means also that its not too quite during night  (but not so loud that you cant sleep). The 4 balcony doors seal the appartment good from noises.
José was out host and we met him personally. He even took the time before we arrived to look for some special events in madrid during our stay. 
Our stay in Madrid was a great experience, thanks José!Apartment had a perfect location in Madrid. Authentic neighbourhood, great transport links, all bars and cafes super close. The only thing I'd maybe improve is the size of the bed - it's a double, but just! :-) I'd recommend this host to all travellers.There is no question that Jose deserves the Superhost badge as the flat has everything and more that a nice hotel room has in it. Having some breakfast foods and drinks made my stay so much easier as I could leave the flat ready to go for a full day of sightseeing or whatever. The plaza down below can get pretty rowdy up until late like 1am, even on weeknights, but it wasn't too bad as the windows were quite good. Also, the view out of those windows was amazing! Thanks for a great stay, Jose!Thank you Jose for an excellent stay in Madrid. My partner and I greatly appreciated how prompt you were in your communication with us. Your apartment was an excellent stop in Madrid for a couple, with gorgeous view from the windows and excellent access to the Metro and walking distance from all major destinations in Madrid. Would recommend!Excelente alojamiento, totalmente recomendable en cuanto a ubicacion, limpieza y servicios.Very pleasant flat in the heart of la Latina! We had a very nice stay !Awesome apartment within walking distance to most of the main sites in Madrid, location is also close to "La latina" metro station in case you want to venture out. Jose and Isabel go above and beyond to make sure you have a pleasant stay. I will highly recommend this place for your next visit to Madrid.Jose was a great host- even though our flight and trains were delayed, we were able to meet him at his work to get the keys. The apartment is located in a quiet area that is within walking distance to great bars/restaurants and attractions (Plaza Mayor, Royal Palace, etc). The view is incredible, and the price point was perfect!Todo como se indica en la publicación, barrio lleno de vida y lugares para comer. Céntrico y lleno de tiendecillas curiosas. Seguro repetiría!Wonderful describes the apartment and the hosts. The apartment is in the La Latina district which is vibrant, has lots of restaurants and bars and is walking distance to the main attractions. The apartment is well appointed and has everything you need. Our hosts Jose and Isabel were easy to communicate with and very accommodating. We would highly recommend staying here.Los anfitriones son muy amables y serviciales, el apartamento está limpio, bellamente amueblado y tiene una gran vista. Todo salió muy bien.Beautiful luminous with a nice view apartment in the great location. José Vicente and Isabel are very friendly! Highly recommended!What an incredible flat. The views are amazing. Jose was very kind and helpful. Check in was very easy. Location can’t be beat.This apartment is in a GREAT location. Very close to the metro and within walking distance to many great tapas bars. The lock to the apartment door was a little tricky but we were able to get in after a few tries. Great amenities, very clean/nicely decorated, and a nice view as well. A little bit noisy but nothing out of the ordinary. Would highly recommend to anyone wanting to stay in Madrid!Très bel appartement très bien situé. Avec tout ce qu’il faut pour un excellent séjour. Vue superbe.  Conforme à ce qui est décrit par José. Merci à toi.The apartment is really bright, with a breathtaking view and an ideal location. We recommend it for a few days in Madrid, you will not be disappointed. 
Contact with José was quick and easy, nothing caused us a problem :-)Great location, awesome apartment with a magnificent view! 100% recommended. Hopefully we can come back soon. :)The place was perfect and the view was amazing! It was very clean and had everything we needed. There was even a market that set up in the courtyard right outside on Sunday while we were visiting.We stay at José apt for two days and it was amazing. The apt was on the 5th floor and it had a view.  Everything was walking distances 10-20min away. A lot of Resturant in the areaGreat location- you are super close to Plaza Mayor and a Metro station. Can’t beat it! Tons of places to eat around there, a bustling market in Sunday morning. Great neighborhood!

It’s noisy at night. This was not a big deal to me at all, the location, views and neighborhood more than made up for it. But if you are a light sleeper, take note. People go out and stay out late, and you are right above areas where people hang out.‍♀️

Jose was very hospitable- left  muffins, coffee. Let me check in early, gave me suggestions on where to go and even walked me in the direction of plaza mayor so I could get my bearings. Very gracious!José Vicente’s apartment is perfect for a stay in Madrid. It’s in a convenient location, not too touristy and with a lot of nice tapas spots in the neighborhood. The apartment has amazing views of the city and is very bright and sunny. Very clean and safe area, we didn’t find it to be too noisy either despite being in lively La Latina quarter. It’s as good as it looks in the pictures and then even better. José Vicente met us to give run through of apartment and provided great recommendations for sights & eating in Madrid. We couldn’t recommend this place enough and it really helped make our stay in Madrid one of a kind. Thanks so much!Excellent place, excellent location!  Would definitely stay at this beautiful place whenever in Madrid!  Perfect!Die Wohnung ist genauso schön wie auf den Fotos gezeigt. Sie ist aufgrund von Lage und Ausstattung perfekt für 1-2 Personen, um die Stadt zu erkunden. Man ist wirklich mitten drin. Wenn sonntags Rastro ist, ist es allerdings recht trubelig, da er u.a. direkt vor der Haustür stattfindet. 
Die Aussicht ist wirklich der Knaller. 
Vicente und Isabel hatten Saft, Kaffee, Milch, Butter und Marmelade bereit gestellt, sodass man den Tag gemütlich zuhause angehen konnte. 
Absolut empfehlenswert!.Great place to stay in Madrid. Very nice apartrment with a terrific view in a vivid and friendly neighborhood. José is a very friendly host, easy communication, easy check-in. Perfect in every way!José Vincente’s place was perfect for our two nights in Madrid. The location was perfect to explore the popular sites in Madrid, like the Plaza Mayor and the Royal Palace. We preferred to walk but for those who don’t there is a metro station very close by. The apartment itself was beautiful and modern and the view was even more breathtaking in person than in the pictures. It is located right by a plaza with many different restaurant and bar choices, a lively place with outdoor seating. José was quick to get back to my questions before our arrival and helped give us detailed metro instructions from the airport. José had stocked some muffins, cereals, juice, milk, and more which is a nice touch after traveling. He also provided some tips on places to explore in Madrid. If you’re a fan of tacos or Mexican food in general, we highly recommend taking a 10 minute walk to Cutzamala Mexican Restaurant inside Mercado Anton Martin for the best pork carnitas tacos I’ve had to date!The apartment is incredible and the view through the floor to ceiling windows was absolutely spectacular. The location was great too - it was easy to get to all of the major landmarks by foot.

Would love to stay at this apartment in the future for our next trip to Madrid!Todo impecable, excelente ubicacion muy cerca de la estacion del centro. 
Vicente e Isabel son excelentes anfitriones, nos dieron recomendaciones y tips que nos fueron muy utiles en nuestra estadia.Very nice apartment, very nice host <3L’appartement est conforme à la description.
Idéalement situé , très propre, lumineux .
La résidence est calme , le quartier proche de toutes commodités.
Je recommande vivement et en toute confiance .Great location and clean space with a helpful guide to find the best local places!The studio apartment is well renovated, stylish and modern , very clean with a wall of floor to ceiling sliding doors which let in plenty of natural light. It is a good size for a couple. The location is central and walking distance from many attractions, restaurants and market. On Sunday morning the roads in the area are closed to traffic to allow for a flea market. 
This is one of the better Airbnb’s I have stayed at. The description is accurate and the host goes above and beyond to make your stay comfortable. Small things such as the host stocking the fridge with some milk for tea and the kitchen olive oil for salads/cooking was greatly appreciated. 
The apartment has a wonderful view and gets the morning sun. There Is a clothes washing machine and a clothes line for drying.José's hospitality, friendlinesss and accurate information to his beautiful apartment is excellent. The view 
from the balcony is spectacular. Very close to subways and once you get the hang of the subways it is pretty easy. He even left breakfast items, which is an added bonus. Very close to the scenic Plaza Mayor and some major attractions. We loved Madrid and his apartment made our stay even better. If its available, book it!We would definitely recommend this accommodation! It‘s perfect for a short city trip!A beautiful apartment in a excellent location. The host was so helpful, and it was great to have some food and breakfast basics in the apartment. It was very comfortable and we had a wonderful stay there.Jose is a perfect host, fast in reply, very flexible with checking in and out (if possible).La ubicación GENIAL!!!
Es uno de esos lugares en los que te encuentras a gusto desde que entras, es muy acogedor y José Vicente una persona encantadora. No dudaremos en volver.It's a nice, very clean and cosy apartment with cool design, big windows and a great view from the 5th floor. Jose is such a caring, attentive and friendly host, he was always happy to help. The apartment was equipped with everything we needed and Jose even provided us with breakfast for a few days. The bed is very comfy, wifi signal is fast. 2 metro stations and a lot of shops, restaurants and a big Mercado are in the area. We just walked to the Prado Museum and to the main streets. We enjoyed our stay in Madrid. Thank you Jose!Die Unterkunft ist perfekt gelegen so dass wir nahezu alles zu Fuß gemacht haben und gleichzeitig in einer ruhigen Lage schlafen konnten. Der Blick der Wohnung ist atemberaubend und man findet in der Wohnung alles was man braucht um etwas zu kochen :) 
Ich habe bereits Freunden die Wohnung weiterempfohlen!

amenities: {TV,"Cable TV",Wifi,"Air conditioning",Kitchen,"Smoking allowed",Heating,Washer,Dryer,"Smoke detector","Carbon monoxide detector","First aid kit","Fire extinguisher",Essentials,Shampoo,"Lock on bedroom door",Hangers,"Hair dryer",Iron,"Private living room",Crib,"Hot water","Bed linens","Extra pillows and blankets","Ethernet connection"}
comments:
Una ubicación maravillosa, céntrica. El departamento grande, limpio, cómodo; los servicios estupendosAn incredibly well-located apartment where the nightlife happens and is a lovely walk away from Sol, Plaza Mayor, Ayuntamiento. Clean apartment, comfortable and plenty of space for everyone. Can be noisy in the front 2 rooms but not insurmountable. Great comms from the host, thanks Jorge!Estupenda ubicación, limpieza y comodidad. Camas y almohadas perfectas. Buenísimo en general.Amazing prime location to get a real feel for Madrid, close to numerous attractions, restaurants and shops. Spacious, brand new and sparkling clean. We had a great time !Very nice and large apartment, perfect as a base for a trip to MadridSuper emplacement et super appartement avec salle de bains pour chaque chambre. A recommander !Located at Calle de Fuencerral near the cross-street of Calle Gran Via, the location is spot-on for close walks & reasonable pedestrian travel to the many sites of interest such as Puerta del Sol, Plaza Mayor, Palacio Real, and of central Madrid. 

The flat & its rooms are very clean, modernly updated, with great amenities, and a comfortable cozy feel unto it. 

Unlike other flats I have been to previously, the bathrooms here are spacious, with ample maneuver room, and fully functional. This was a positive standout... compared to other flats our group has experienced where the bathrooms are over-glorified closets with drain-flooding potential issue. None of that here. This flat’s bathrooms surely pass good for American standards we are used to. 5-stars to that! 

There is no elevator in this building. But it was not a dealbreaker at all, as the staircase was wide and had landing areas to split the climbing effort to ease. 

Security features are well thought off. The superhost Jorge had us covered with each room having a keycard, along with a master keycard for the head of the group (me). In addition, smaller wallet keycards were provided for the main door entrance of the building. This added convenience to the group, and afforded the group flexibility in different entry times to the flat. No fumbling with different set of keys, as the keycards & lock sets are electronic. Smart, modern and safe. Imagine at night when one has to fumble through keys  & lock, as opposed to this more quick, safe & reliable. 

Each room had a TV, well functioning aircon, a bathroom, nice closets with drawers, couch, and small refrigerator. The beds are of good quality. The feel was equivalent to a Serta we have in the states. 

A common kitchen is well situated at the end of the flat, with good ergonomics, and complete in basics. Ref-freezer unit tucked well as a cabinet. A small-sized washer-dryer unit is nicely tucked in there too. 

A living room with a nice medium sized dining table is a nice touch. Also with a large TV and main WiFi. Couch & lounge chair too. Smart furniture leaves a cozy, comfort feel & look. 

The superhost Jorge is very congenial, approachable, and cool guy. Our group likes him very well. We appreciate Jorge! Un piso espectacular, en una ubicación inmejorable. 
La verdad que el piso lo tiene todo, todo muy limpio, , las habitaciones muy amplias,  los baños geniales para 12 personas que eramos,  todo muy bien la verdad, ninguna queja .. y además muy fácil comunicar con el propietario.   Si podemos repetiremosParfait à tout point de vue, la formule nous a vraiment plu. Situation parfaite et prestation irréprochable. On recommande !.L’appartement est extrêmement bien placé et très pratique pour visiter Madrid. Les chambres sont grandes, agréables, propres. Quelques points négatifs à souligner cependant : cela n’est pas très clair dans la description mais deux des chambres ont des salles de bains très éloignées et elles donnent sur la rue qui est très bruyante. Très difficile de dormir sans boules quiès. La cuisine se situe à l’autre bout de l’appartement par rapport au salon et celui-ci est très petit par rapport aux autres pièces et sans aucune lumière naturelle ce qui n’en fait pas un lieu convivial du tout. L’appartement ne convient pas pour passer du temps tous ensemble. On peut ainsi dormir à 10 mais s’asseoir autour de la table à seulement 6. Par ailleurs aucune adresses locales et pas de guide de fonctionnement de la maison. Enfin quand nous sommes arrivés la cafetière ne fonctionnait pas. Nous attendons toujours d’en avoir une en remplacement.Alojamiento extraordinario. Muy buena ubicación y servicios.The location is great, the rooms are neat, comfortable and clean. 
BUT. 
If you are a single party don't go there or be prepared for some very close and awkward encounters. If you rent a just a single or a couple of rooms, make sure they are not No 1 or 2, (which are the nice ones in the pictures) unless you're prepared to cross the living room, a 15 meter corridor (with all the  rest of the room's  entrances)  and the kitchen in your towel to get on your bathroom. And pray that you've got everything and you didn't  run out of toilet paper.This place was simply amazing. Very clean and comfortable. Enough space for our 7-person group. The location was close to shops, bars, restaurants and public transportation.Appartamento molto bello. Posizione eccellente, nel cuore dello shopping e a pochi passi da Puerta del Sol. Camere ampie, pulite e arredamento moderno e curato. Difficilissimo trovare un appartamento con trovare 5 camere matrimoniali super funzionali ognuna con bagno (dentro o fuori, ma privato), tutte con TV Led. Ogni camera dotata di chiave elettronica. Spazi comuni un pò ristretti. Il costo un pò alto è però da rapportare alla posizione e all'ottima qualità della casa.  E' un terzo piano a piedi. Può essere un limite per qualcuno. Per persone giovani o allenate non è un problema. Il wifi funziona mediamente bene, meglio negli spazi comuni.The flat is centrally located to everything!  The rooms with their own bathrooms came in handy with a large group.  The only downside is the three story walk up with luggages. Jorge is very responsive. Very modern and chic.Excelente Ubicación, muy espacioso, recomendado para familias grandes, 
Jorge muy amable y dispuesto a apoyarte en todo, muy limpio, moderno y lo mejor tv en cada cuarto. Sin duda volveremos de nuevo.Un appartement très bien placé. Cinq chambres et 5 salles de bain: c'est très agréable  même si les 2 chambres qui donnent sur la rue Fuencarral sont bruyantes et leurs salle de bain éloignée. La pièce à vivre est assez petite et sans lumière naturelle, et la cuisine est à l'autre bout du grand couloir qui traverse l'appartement. Les chambres sont grandes, lit-double et canapé, les salles de bains sont très bien. L'appartement a été refait récemment, il est très propre. L'emplacement est idéal : nous avons passé un excellent séjour en famille.

comments:
We spent a marvelous week-end at Arrate's place. She was very welcoming and we really feel like we were at home. The apartment is just like the pictures and is in central Madrid. I would definitely reccomend  Arrate's flat for a journey in Madrid!!
Hope to come back soon 
MaximeWe stayed 5 nights and it was an absolute pleasure. Arrate is a very kind host, the flat was clean and tidy with everything we needed. The location is quite good and the street is relatively quiet and private.

Nuestra estancia estaba estupendo! Os recomendáis sin duda este piso y su anfitrióna. Hemos pasado muy bien y Arrate es muy maja! Lo que es necessario esta aqui. Fue un placer quedar!Arrate is the best host. I had a wonderful 3 week stay in her apartment. It is in an ideal location right between La Latina and Lavapíes, two of the best neighborhoods in Madrid. All of the city center and sites are within walking distance. But above all, the place is great because of Arrate. She is a kind, welcoming host and an awesome person. Can't recommend this place enough.

comments:
Todo según lo acordado, la habitación es grande y la casa en general está muy limpia.Byron was very sweet and welcoming. The apartment was immaculate and he made us feel right at home. Great communication; would recommend!Todo fue genial desde el principio, ya que fueron flexibles con nuestra hora de llegada, salió a nuestro encuentro, y la habitación estaba en perfectas condiciones. Todo muy ordenado y limpio, e incluso teniamos toallas limpias. Tuvimos total libertad de movimiento y horario.  Ah, y muy amable. Byron and his family were great hosts and provided a comfortable place to base myself for the duration of my stay, which was primarily for work. Very nice and specialUn hôte très agréable,  tres serviable et très sympathique ,  emplacement pas tres loin du centre ville , je recommande vivement.The flat was extremely nice, clean and quiet. Byron was very friendly and helpful. Overall was a nice experience :)Una estancia placentera en todos los sentidos y repetiría sin duda porque ha sido muy acogedora y siempre muy atentos con los huéspedes. Ojala todos los anfitriones fueran asi. Good location close by the tube and buses. The owner was nice and helpfull. Good place to stay for a weekin madridAbsolutely wonderful hospitality. 10/10 would recommend. Neighbourhood slightly quiet, but 3min walk from metro. We had a great stay, Byron was a great host! Great place and super close to the metro. Recommended! This location is a little off the path but it's super close to the metro. The host was very nice. Ha sido muy agradable con nosotros!! volveremos sin duda :)Todo bienClean place just a 30 min bus to plaza mayor. Jesus und Sonia betreiben das Ganze sehr professionell und waren immer gut erreichbar. Obwohl mein Zug eine halbe Stunde Verspätung hatte, gab ich Jesus Bescheid und das Mädchen für die Schlüsselübergabe hat auf mich gewartet und sie war super nett.

Das Apartment ist zwar im 4. Stock ohne Lift, aber das war kein Problem für mich. Es ist so hell und freundlich wie auf den Bildern. Die Lage ist perfekt, ca.  5-10 Gehminuten von Plaza del Sol und mit einem kleinen Carrefour Express um´s Eck. Die Matratzen auf den 2 zusammengeschobenen Betten verrutschen leider leicht, für ein Pärchen eventuell nicht optimal, aber da ich alleine war, hat mich das nicht so gestört.
Ich würde das Apartment auf jeden Fall weiter empfehlen und werde gerne wiederkommen. The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.Genial! Es un cuarto sin ascensor pero compensa con la luminosidad del inmueble! Súper limpio, nuevo , ❤En resumen ubicación genial y calidad precio estupenda, tiene todas las comodidades y lo recomendaría 100% si no tienes problemas en subir a un 4to piso sin ascensor. La estancia ha estado genial y como esperaba. El apartamento está muy bien ubicado y en él no te falta nada, es totalmente como aparece en las imágenes. En general he quedado muy satisfecha y volvería a repetir.Appartement extrêmement bien situé , a 5 min à pied du métro , tous commerce à proximité , rue très calme , tout était à disposition . L'appartement est très bien isolé ce qui permet à la fraîcheur d'être tenue grave à la climatisation.

Petit bémol , manque de volet sur l'une des fenêtres de la chambre , pour ceux qui aime dormir dans le noir c'est un peu gênant surtout en été quand le soleil ce lève à 5h.Jesus and Sonia's property was the perfect accommodation for our stay in Madrid. It is spacious enough for 4 people, and beautifully furnished. It has AC, which is nice after a long day in the heat. The property is conveniently located in a central area - with many restaurants and tapa bars right outside of the place. Also, the bus and metro stops are within a 5 minute walk. There isn't an elevator in the building and the apartment is on the 4th floor, so if you are not able to lift your luggage up a flight of stairs this may not be the place for you. It also gets quite loud at night, but it did not bother us. Overall, my sister and I had a wonderful time at the property and would recommend staying there for your time in Madrid.Très bel appartement, parfaitement situé et bien spacieux. Jesus est très gentil et accueillant.very good placeWe had a great stay at Jesus & Sonia's place. The location is perfect for exploring the city in a few days. The apartment was very clean and had everything you needed to feel at home. The only thing we found slightly difficult at the end of a long day were the four flights of stairs, so if you're elderly or have a pram etc it might be a challenge. Nonetheless, we highly recommend this apartment. Thank you Jesus and Sonia for a lovely stay!L'appartamento è esattamente come appare nelle foto, piccolo ma ben fornito, perfetto per una coppia. L'abbiamo trovato pulitissimo, con arredi nuovi, confortevole e accogliente. Al nostro arrivo l'accoglienza di Jesùs è stata ottima, ci ha mostrato la casa e spiegato tutto in maniera molto chiara (non tutti sono così attenti nella presentazione di un appartamento). Non abbiamo avuto particolari necessità, ma quando ci siamo messi in contatto con lui abbiamo subito ricevuto risposta. Ubicazione perfetta sia per turisti, in quanto si trova a due passi dalle principali piazze della città, che per lavoratori, perchè vicino alla stazione di Sol dalla quale è possibile raggiungere diversi punti della città. Il quartiere in cui si trova è pieno di vita, ristoranti, bar, negozi, ma il rumore proveniente dalla strada praticamente non si sente in casa. Giudizio positivo, se dovessimo avere bisogno, non esiteremo a ripetere l'esperienza!Apartamento fantástico en el centro de Madrid.
