Angel gracias por tu hospitalidad.Angel was a good host with a great place at a good location. 5 minutes walk to the nearest train station, bus stop, restaurant and supermarket. He will bring you/ show you the location of all this place so that you won’t get lost.We enjoyed our stay at Angel's place.  Angel met us on the street and directed me to the secure underground parking lot.  He had a metro map for us and brochures for things to do in Madrid.  We found his place to be clean and comfortable.Angel’s place is simply amazing. Very big and spacious, high ceilings, large rooms, 2 bedrooms with very comfortable beds. The place looks brand new and sparkling clean. The bathroom is very, very nice! Kitchen is all modern appliances and has everything you could ever need. Angel is a great host, he was very helpful when meeting us for the check-in. He helped us park our rental car in the underground parking lot (parking space included), he explained all there is to see and do around the area and how to get in and out of the historical center of Madrid. The apartment is close to the center actually, it is only a 10 minute metro ride to Sol station, which is exact center of Madrid. Can’t say enough nice things about Angel and his place, very highly recommended! Would certainly stay here again.Lovely apartment in a perfect location. Could not have wished for anything better! Angel is a great host as well! I highly recommend this apartment to other travelers!Angels place is nice and clean and on the Metro only 10 mins from the centre of Madrid. It is a great place to stay with a family- there is a small playground across the road and within walking distance the Mataderos. A new complex in Madrid with walking paths, modern art exhibitions for free, kids playgrounds and a great fountain style water park! The Rio 2 nearby offers rooftop views of Madrid whilst eating. We loved Madrid- fabulous food and art exhibitions and a very efficient Metro. Retiro is also great! Everything was fine without any problem. I recommend.Todo perfecto.Recomiendo llegar en Ave ya que la estación está muy cerca. Trato impecable. Recomendable . A pocas paradas del centro en metro. A great little place in Madrid.Excelente estancia en el apartamento de Angel, tiene las comodidades de una casa y todo el equipamiento. It was very clean, safe and comfortable for four people.
It’s a great option in Madrid.

We would stay again!El apartamento es tal cual aparece en las fotos, eramos 4 adultos y 4 niñas y es perfecto, la ubicación magnífica.Nos quedamos un fin de semana en Madrid y la casa estaba muy bien ubicada y todo muy limpio. Volveremos!Alojamiento muy bien ubicado y prácticamente nuevo.Excelente ubicación y trato inmejorable con el anfitrión非常完美的公寓,就在阿拖查火车站边上,交通以及到达各个景点都很方便｡房间温馨舒适｡最让人感动的是房东,我们当地时间清早的航班到达马德里,和房东商量如果方便的话是否可以提早入住,我们愿意额外付费,房东二话没说就让他漂亮的侄女一清早在公寓迎接我们办理入住,并且没有加收费用,他的热情让我们以美好的心情开启了这次西班牙之行,非常感谢!We had a good time staying at this apartment. It's spacious, well-stocked and clean. It's walking distance from El Retiro Park and the train station. 
Wished there was better parking.Great location, very nice and effective communication!Apartamento perfecto en una ubicación inmejorable para pasar unos días en Madrid. Repetiríamos sin duda!The apartment was in a really handy spot for the Atoche train station and in a nice peaceful area of Madrid. There was plenty of room for the 7 of us staying there and it had all the things we needed.  The host who met us was very helpful and arrived on time etc and really helped us out later when one of us left our passports back in the apartment.Great locationCarlos  is a very decent host and always in a "service mode" which is very nice. But the quality in the apartment does not "match" the pictures in regards to the real offer. Beds are not confortable (they only have 2 decent full bed) the rest of the accommodations, where not good quality.  We could feel the bedsprings and if your are staying more that one night you are not able to rest with dignity. Bathrooms accessories were found broken. And it is obviously a very "modest" apartment. The quality "issue" deteriorates the location factor which is incredibly convenient in conjunction with host attention.Lo esperado, muy bien.Very clean apartment. Small clean once we entered. We were met by Carlos and he gave us a thorough tour of the apartment. At the end he gave recommendations on where to eat and where to go. 

The apartment is walking distance to the train station. Shopping, eateries, and tourist hot spots are all walkable distances. 

I would definitely stay here again and highly recommend this place to others. 

Great host and beautiful apartmentGreat central location to all attractions
Very clean
Responsive host
Safe neighborhood with some character
Street and paid parkingFoi ótimo nossa estadia em Madrid, otimo apartamento, excelente localização. 
Limpeza impecável.很干净舒服,地铁站旁边房间逗不错,就是觉得厅小了一点,位置很好,出行很方便｡Muy buen alojamiento, muy limpio y muy bien ubicado si la intención es ir bastantes personas y poder moverse por el centro, ya que el aparcamiento resultó moderadamente simple y el metro está muy cercaEl alojamiento ha superado nuestras expectativasMuy buen alojamiento, ubicación y comunicación perfecta; además el apartamento contaba con aspectos básicos de higiene y alimentación (agua, cápsulas de café) . Anfitrión inmejorable, nos permitió entrar antes de la hora predeterminada sin ningún problema, y salir más tarde de la hora acordada pagando un suplemento.Amazing place, very convenient !!El apartamento es muy bonito, esta muy bien ubicado. Es limpio, con mucha iluminación y tiene todo lo que uno necesita para quedarse ahi. Carlos, el anfritrion, es muy querido y contesta rápido, lo ayuda a uno con lo que uno necesitaBuen piso en una ubicación excelenteThis place met the needs of our family holiday. Watch out for the small uncomfortable beds. Great Wi-Fi and Amazon Fire Stick with apps.If this apartment is available...book it!

The apartment was sparkling clean. We could not fault the facilities, cleanliness or location. The listing and photos were very accurate. 

We stayed with 10 people - 7 adults and 3 kids. Everyone enjoyed themselves very much. Plenty of space, air conditioning and utensils for cooking / eating. 

The rooms are very well presented, the bathrooms have everything that you need. Washing machine and dishwasher were a huge bonus! 

Carlos is an amazing host. He is very friendly, responsive and flexible. He was waiting for us on his arrival (even though we were slightly delayed).

The location is the best in Madrid - you have a 1 minute walk to Atocha Train Station and very close to Parque Retiro (which is amazing!). There are plenty of restaurants nearby and 2 supermarkets within less than a 5 minute walk.非常好｡房东亲自接待~但是唯一不足就是卫生间没有垃圾桶,垃圾袋没有多备用几个Very nice, spacious and clean. Four rooms, two bathrooms and full kitchen. First floor with lift. Perfect location before or after travelling intercity by train (one minute walk to the Puerta de Atocha station) and not too far from the city centre by taxi. Location is quiet, except for the garbage trucks that stop outside in the middle of the night and can wake you up if you’re a light sleeper. Would recommend for a large family looking for a comfortable stay at a reasonable price.Location is very close to a lot of cool local spots as well as close to more ‘touristy’ spots (museums, park, Crystal Palace, etc).Buena ubicación, flexibilidad horaria de entrada/salida, había un somier roto pero en principio iban a repararlo para siguientes estancias, baños y cocina modernosApartamento muy bueno , tiene todo lo necesario para pasar unos días , sin lugar a dudas lo mejor la ubicación ,  a 50 mts de la estación de Atocha  a 25 minutos dando un paseo de Sol y a 10 minutos del Retiro , zona preciosa para conocer el museo del Prado y el Reina Sofía ... realmente muy aconsejable ( un solo pero , alguna de las camas necesita un recambio ..:) , la atención por parte de Carlos en este caso fue magnífica , nos dejo llegar un poco antes y salir un poco después sin pega ninguna y es de agradecer .....Wonderful place to stay in the middle of everything. This is great home, if you are coming with a group of ppl.Piso muy céntrico y cerca a todo!
Fuimos un grupo de 8 y estuvimos muy cómodos en el piso. Si volvemos en grupo, no dudaría en repetir! Gracias por todo!Nuestra estancia ha sido muy agradable. A 2 minutos andando de Atocha, por lo que está muy bien comunicado. Muy limpio y acogedor.great위치좋고 친절해요!

comments:
Well where to start….. the whole experience from the first email with Marcela to the last walk through the door was an absolute pleasure and experience! I can say that hands down this was the best apartment and host I have encountered over 10 or so stays in AirBNB apartments throughout Europe. 

The spacious apartment is beautifully decorated and furnished with stunning art, knick knacks and all the equipment and items you would need for your stay in Madrid - you will not be lacking in anything. The roof terrace is large, and beautifully furnished with blooming plants, recliners, a table with 4seats and a lovely view over the surrounding areas. The house is also wonderfully quite and with plenty of light and windows for air during the hot humid weather that Madrid can offer. 

Marcela is a warm, inviting and knowledgable host who makes sure you have all the info and help you so desire. 

The location is brilliant - easy walk to all of the main sites, Plaza Major, Sol, Prado Museums - a supermarket 2mins away so everything is at your finger tips.

Overall this place is more like a boutique hotel than a place to crash for the night, and it's a steal compared to a similar hotel experience - I would recommend it to anyone, and I hope that everyone who stays looks after the beautiful apartment as well as Marcela leaves it ready for your arrival. 
Nice host, helpful and quick to reply when needed. House is much bigger than what you think when you see the pictures. It has lots of character and is a true gem to have so much space right in the center of the city. It might be a bit uncomfortable if you are there in the summer, as no A/C is available, but if you are looking for real space, this is your place.The apartament is perfect! Great location- walking distance to all important things in Madrid! Apartemnent is beautiful and very comfortable. Marcela is super friendly and helpful. I will defenietly recomend this place. We had a wonderful Time in Marcela' flat. It Is spacious, clean, very shinny and very well situated !
The terrace Is beautifull too! 
Marcela Is always available and very kind. 
You can rent this place without hesitation !I was in Madrid with my son for the weekend, the highlight of which was seeing Real Madrid play Atletico Madrid.

Marcela contributed to a fantastic weekend.  The apartment is actually better than advertised.  Charming, spacious, light and perfectly located in downtown Madrid.

Marcela’s communication was exemplary and everything possible was done to make our stay memorable.  

I would definitely recommend her apartment and thank her for contributing to a great stay in sunny MadridThere are too many wonderful things to say about Marcela and her apartment it's difficult to know where to begin. Firstly as Marcela was away when we arrived she organised a friend to come with the keys and let us in, and it was organised perfectly. She also left us plenty of information and tips about the place which were very useful.
The apartment was even better than the pictures, very spacious, and the terrace truly stunning. We had everything we needed and more including lovely sets of toiletries left on our bed and two sun loungers which were well used.
The location is fabulous!!!! We barely used the metro as all the main, and more interesting attractions/areas were a stone's throw away. There were plenty of supermarkets, bars and lovely squares only meters from the apartment. Also for fitness freaks there is a superb gym at the end of the street which costs only 8 euros a day (great for Madrid) and the staff are very friendly.
We highly recommend this apartment, thank you so much Marcela :)Marcela's place was absolutely incredible. Located in the heart of Madrid, her flat was stunning; a very stylish, modern design with a fantastic balcony for lounging in the sun and tons and tons of space! Marcela was a lovely host, showing us around on arrival, leaving us fruit and some other supplies and recommending a tapas bar for us to visit on our first night. I would happily return to Marcela's apartment when I am next in Madrid and dream of one day owning an apartment like Marcela's!Amazing house and location!! Marcela was an amazing host and her communication was the best I have had on Airbnb. The location is in the heart of the city easily accessed by the station. The space is huge and the deck is beautiful. It also has a elevator which makes carting bags up and down the best! Don't look any where else this is the best spot! Marcela vous accueille très bien. Une bouteille de vin nous attendait. Son appartement est vraiment agréable et bien placé.
Encore merci Marcela.We had a wonderful stay in Marcela's apartment, which is nicely decorated and feels like a real home away from home and not like one of those anonimous rental spaces you usually find in big cities. The apartment was extremely central, even though set in a very quiet side street. Everything was at walking distance and we really enjoed this wonderful city. The apartment's terrace was great: sunny and warm even in January. Marcela and Goyo gave us a very warm welcome and good tips for good tapas bars and restaurants. We had a very good stay in Madrid and thank Marcela for letting us stay at her place.I've stayed at 20+ vacation rentals over the past few years, and I've been satisfied with 95+% of my stays, so I think my review of this apartment is accurate.  Overall, we were disappointed with our stay at this apartment, especially for the price.   Marcela, the host, communicated very well throughout the process.  Although she did ask if we could show some people around while we were staying there, which seemed a bit odd.

Cons
-In general, the apartment is cluttered and somewhat dirty.  We noticed dust throughout the apartment.  The sheets on one of the beds was stained somewhat yellow in spots.  Also, one of the cowhide chairs pictured has a large rip in the entire seat.  
-The walls are heavily marked with black scuffs and dents.  They need to be painted.  
-The floors creak quite a bit and are a safety hazard.  There are three sections in the apartment with small changes in height that we tripped over multiple times.  It was so bad we put luggage at each spot as a reminder not to trip.
-The kitchen smelled of gas.
-The main entrance gate to the apartment was difficult to use.  On one occasion we were unable to get the door open for five minutes.  Luckily, a visitor to another apartment was buzzed in by a resident so were able to enter.  
-No functional living room furniture.  Both couches have very low backs.
-The door to the toilet in the main bathroom doesn't close

Pros
-Excellent location (less than 20 minute walk to most major sites)
-Very large and spacious, especially for European standards
-Nice outdoor patio that would be perfect for the summer time.  This was the perfect place for our vacation.  Marcela's place is spacious, homey, very clean and in a perfect location for exploring the city.  She was great at communication prior to the trip and during.  Thank you Marcela for the excellent restaurant suggestions, as they were far from being touristy and every meal was absolutely delicious.  We would absolutely stay here again.Das Appartment ist fantastisch mitten im Zentrum von Madrid gelegen und mit der Terrasse wirklich schön, um Abends noch die Sonne zu geniessen. Doppelbetten sind eher Queen-Size aber sehr bequem. Das Appartment ist einfach interessant mit vielen besonderen Details eingerichtet. Marcela ist eine sehr aufmerksame Gastgeberin, die uns die Wohnung sehr sauber und sogar mit einer Weinflasche als Willkommensgeschenk vorbereitet hatte. Obwohl Sie während unseres Aufenthaltes nicht in der Stadt war, hat Sie organisatorische Fragen sehr schnell und freundlich beantwortet. Das Appartment für sich und Marcela als Gastgeberin kann ich uneingeschränkt empfehlen, um einen tollen Aufenthalt in Madrid zu geniessen.This is a wonderful apartment in the heart of Old Madrid in a beautiful old building and has a huge amount of character - not to mention a fantastic balcony / terrace that the photos don't do justice to. The location is perfect for exploring the main tourist sights of Madrid, with the Prado, Reina Sofia, Plaza Mayor, Thyssen, Gran Via, Palacio Real and Puerto del Sol all within 10 minutes or so walk. Marcela was a very attentive and accomodating host and made sure our visit went smoothly, from lots of communication before our visit and arranging our arrival to letting us leave luggage on our departure. A lot of useful information about where to eat was provided too. The apartment was clean and well stocked with plenty of room. All in all, a perfect location to explore Madrid! We would definitely stay again.The reservation was canceled 15 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.The reservation was canceled 24 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.We were four girls who stayed in Marcela's beautiful apartment which we absolutely loved! The apartment is situated in the heart of Madrid and we just had to walk a few minutes to reach areas with lots of restaurants and cosy bars. The best was the huge terrace and a quiet but central location.

Marcela was a very good host who replied all my e-mails very quickly and gave us lots of tips about where to go in Madrid.

We can highly recommend this apartment and Marcela as a host!Marcela unfortunately couldnt meet us in the apartment due to a family emergency, However we were given Pablo's number and he was there in plenty of time to let us into apartment and show us around. 
The apartment was fantastic and the terrace alone was well worth the money. Where the apartment was situated was perfect, it was pretty central to all the areas in City Centre you would want to visit.  The apartment was in the next road to what is deemed the best Flamenco show in the City. Casa Patas. We had an amazing night there and only took 5 minutes to get home from. Would fully recommend you book early to get a seat near the stage. 

Marcela had left us a welcoming bottle of wine and biscuits to enjoy and also left details of nearby Supermarkets (the next block) and also recommended some restaurants to to go.

Even the extra 3rd bed which was a "put me up" was nice and comfortable. 

Nous nous félicitons d'avoir choisi l'appartement de Marcela. Il est fonctionnel, facile à vivre, accueillant, parfait pour 4 personnes avec ses deux SDB. 
Nous avons largement profité de la grande terrasse toute fleurie et de l'ascenseur, bien utile pour atteindre le 4ème étage.
Le quartier est vivant, central : nous avons tout fait å pied.
Marcela avait gentiment préparé notre arrivée : multiples messages, envoi de bonnes adresses, petits cadeaux  de bienvenue.
Notre séjour de 4 jours â été tres réussi et je ne peux que recommander cette bonne adresse.
Merci Marcela !We had the most magical and wonderful stay at Marcela's apartment. The location could not be better! You are within 10/15 minutes walk of all the main sights across the city. Madrid is an amazing city and Marcela recommended some superb places to go.
The apartment is beautifully decorated and HUGE! The terrace was sunny all day and pure bliss. The pictures do not do the apartment justice. Marcela was great to communicate with before, during and after the trip.
We will definitely be staying again next time we are in Madrid.
Thanks!First of all, the location is superb; easy walking distance to all the 'must-do' locations. The apartment is spacious and clean with a lovely ambience. We loved our time in Madrid. Marchelanin dairesi šehrin merkezinde, görülmesi gereken yerlere 5-10 dakika  yürüme mesafesinde
Daire çok rahat, ferah ve çok kullanišli.
Marchela'yi görmemiš olsaniz bile size uzaktan yardimci olmaya çališir ve sorun var ise çözüyor
Bu daireyi herkeze tavsiye ederim
DenizThis apartment, location and hosts were simply awesome in every way.  We felt like we were at home and part of the community.  The bedrooms and bathrooms were very comfortable and kitchen was well equipped.  Perfect in every way.The apartment was Nice and located perfect in the city area.We had a wonderful stay at Marcela's apartment. It's very stylish, clean and very centrally located. Best Airbnb stay!Très bel appartement, spacieux, décoré avec beaucoup de goût et de style et parfaitement situé. La terrasse est magnifique!
En plus, Marcela est une personne adorable!!! Toujours disponible pour répondre à mes questions. Ses petites attentions en arrivant nous ont beaucoup touchés. Elle nous a recommandé (et réservé) un tablao flamenco et nous avons passé une excellente soirée.

A refaire sans modération!
J'ai hâte d'y retourner.
Merci Marcela pour tout. Merci d'avoir fait de notre voyage un souvenir inoubliable.  Siamo arrivate sul tardi la sera e, come da accordi presicon Marcela, siamo state accolte da un suo amico che ci ha dato le chiavi. L'appartamento e' stato al di sopra delle nostre aspettative, grande, accogliente, arredato con molto gusto. La posizione e' la pou' comoda e centrale che si possa sperare. Marcela e' stata semplicemente perfetta. Peima del nostro arrivo ci ha spiegato tutto per bene dandoci delle dritte. Al nostro arrivo, cone benvenuto,  ci ha fatto trovare una bottiglia di buon vino rosso e degli snacks, che ci hanno risolto il problema della cena. Mi e' spiaciuto non incontrarla per ringraziarla di persona, ma era Pasqua e lei era in vacanza. Raccomando la sua casa e la sua ospitalita'. Spero di tornarvi io stessa. MUCHAS GRATIAS cara Marcela :-)We loved Marcela's apartment. As it is her home it gives you a real sense of life in Madrid. It's in a characterful old building and is spacious and light and filled with an eclectic collection of paintings, Fabulous location. Thanks Marcela for our stay.Great place, warm welcome and excellent suggestions from Marcela.
I do recommend this place, the terrace is fantastic! Marcela was very attentive, and her place was fabulous! I would stay there again.Marcela took great care of us - everything from checkin to checkout and even left some treats for us:)

Super recommended!Marcela's apartment is surely a nice place to stay for those who prefer homelike atmosphere to freshly made repair and featureless design. You really feel the character of the place and the terrace adds additional charm to it. We really enjoyed spending our time there relaxing in the sun after a long walking touristic day)
Marcela is a very friendly, quick to respond and ready to help host. We appreciated an easy going check-in and check-out without unnecessary formalities. She was also easily reachable on mobile in case of any questions and we received her responses promptly from the moment we got in touch during reservation process till our last day of stay.
The apartment is very light and sunny, with all necessary equipment and stuff in the kitchen and with well working Wifi (the only thing which we mentioned about to Marcela is that it would be even better if it could reach bedrooms but the apartment is large and the signal went out after the dining room; of course, we managed with it and this is a minor detail which could make our perfect stay even better).
The location is very convenient, in a walking distance to 2 metro stations and other necessities (several supermarkets, cafes, bakeries, etc). Touristic locations are also easily reachable from the apartment, we usually love walking around in our trips so we did it in Madrid and took metro only to really far away places.
We would surely recomend the apartment as a pleasant place to stay in Madrid and Marcela as a very nice personality and host.
Thank you Marcela again for making our stay so positive)Un immense merci à Marcella pour son accueil chaleureux et ses précieux conseils! La terrasse est le point fort de cet appartement très bien situé. Nous reviendrons avec plaisir!We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and were greatly impressed by the quaint old world charm. Its an experience for us . Especially the lift!! Definately a recommendation for others. Mercela was patient and nice enough to accomodate our requests and we appreciate that. Marcela is a wonderful and very helpful host.  Her apartment is clean, spacious and quiet and has the most fantastic terrace which is a huge bonus in hot weather.  It is also perfectly located for any places you might want to visit as well as being in a charming neighbourhood with easy access to supermarkets, bakeries, coffee shops,  restaurants and the Metro which are all just a short walk away.Exceptional location with a wonderful rooftop terrace attached to a spacious apartment.  Fells like home away from home.坐落在马德里老城区的市中心 最有名的景点基本都是步行可达 楼下就有迪亚天天超市 自己做早饭也很方便
房东特地送了红酒 印象最深的要数电梯 很复古很有历史感 好像电影里面的场景一样Tres bien placé entre Vieux Madrid et quartier Bourbon. Appartement très calme avec beaucoup de charme. Super terrasse pleine de plantes ensoleillée l'après-midi. Hotesse aux petits soins.La verdad que ha sido una experiencia inmejorable. Llegué y Marcela me recibió con una botella de vino y unas recomendaciones sobre la zona. Un recibimiento excepcional!
Después me enseñó la vivienda y la maravillosa terraza.
Es una pena no haber podido disfrutar de más días, pero el trabajo no me lo ha permitido.
Sin duda recomendable por la vivienda amplia y con una terraza de lujo y por la localización que aun estando en el centro de la ciudad no se oyen ruidos y se puede dormir tranquilamente.
Para repetir!!Very nice Apartment,  Marcela is a great and caring host, ; satisfied with everything,!Tasteful and artistic apartment.  Bigger than it looks in photos.  Easy walk to markets, restaurants, the palace and the gardens.This place was great! The unit is big, and the terrace is incredible with an amazing view. You won’t be disappointed. Highly recommended.The place is great! Feels like a guest of an old friend of yours, while he/she is out for vacation. That great spirit of Airbnb .Marcelas Wohnung können wir nur empfehlen. Sie liegt zentral - viele Sehenswürdigkeiten und vor allem auch die grossen Museen sind gut zu Fuss erreichbar. Trotzdem ist die Wohnung ruhig und sehr angenehm. Die Dachterrasse ist sehr schön. Und die Wohnung ist ideal für zwei (auch wenn problemlos vier Platz finden - zwei Schlafzimmer, zwei Badezimmer). Marcela hat immer sehr prompt reagiert und war stets erreichbar. Check-in war problemlos. Wir würden jederzeit wieder diese Wohnung mieten.Lovely apartment in nice location.Thanks a lot for hosting us. Great flat with a wonderful and huge balkony in a central location. I can totally recommend!Absolutely gorgeous penthouse apartment with fantastic balcony and in a great location. Perfect for 4 people. Marcela was very kind and accommodating. Best place I have stayed in Madrid by far. Thanks MarcelaThis is a really wonderful apartment in a great lively part of Madrid. 
The hosts are thoughtful an very helpful. 
Everything you need is there from the well equipped kitchen to the terrace and even heat and air conditioning. All in a beautifully stylish, authentic and large space. 

I give it the highest recommendation.A great place in a central location to Madrid. I had a great stay the place is very spacious and has an outdoor area to enjoy the sun.Beautiful penthouse with amazing terrace!!! Sol, Plaza Mayor and the Prado all in walking distance.  Marcela’s    wonderful accommodation  is so private even though you are I the middle of Madrid.  Lovely host that provided many thoughtful touches.  My family was so impressed!  We’d love to stay there again!Want the experience of Madrid at its best , most charming and most sophisticated ? This is the place to go . We loved it . Nick and JackA casa é uma delícia, e uma habitação de quem vive no lugar, e não só aluga, muito perto de tudo, excelente localização, o terraço é um lugar delicioso de ficar e com tudo muito perto .
É possível fazer os museus e os centro a pé muito rapidamente.
Marcela está disponível sempre e na hora que precisar, voltaria com muito gosto, Madri estava especialmente quente durante nossa estadia, mas às noites com janelas abertas foram agradáveisA lovely big apartment with a beautiful terrace and stylishly and eclectically furnished, with some interesting art. It is wonderfully located in the centre of the city in a well looked after building.  Despite its centrality it is a quiet, yet vibrant cul de sac, if that makes sense.
Marcela and her husband are gracious, thoughtful and attentive hosts. 
I thoroughly recommend both the apartment and the host.Great location great flat with lovely stylish flat. We enjoyed it very much. 
Also I should add that Marcela is great host and looked after us very well.El departamento está en un lugar muy céntrico de la ciudad puedes encontrar lugares cerca donde comer o comprar despensa, del departamento nos encantó y Marcela y Goyo son unos grandes anfitriones que te hacen sentir en casa, siempre estuvieron al pendiente de nosotros.

comments:
Excelente,  muy recomendado trato respetuoso y muy tranquila la estancia
Volvería los recomiendoBuenos anfitriones, habitacion comoda, se esta genial. La pareja genial, para repetir.Recomendado si no es un problema estar un poco alejado del centro de MadridUn lugar muy agradable y acogedor para cualquiera que llegue, además del ambiente amigable y familiar que se crea en el lugar.La habitacion es tal cual se ve en el anuncio. Esta como a 10 min de la estacion de metro. Si vas a ir al aeropuerto en el metro pues tardas como 50 min aproximadamente. Yo lo cogi solo por una noche y la verdad que no hubo nada de ruido y tiene un ventilador en el cuarto para el calor. Seguro que si lo necesito repito.goodJuliana y su familia son amables , hospitalarios y respetuosos.Fueron muy flexibles en nuestra llegada y salida. Desde el primer mensaje, Juliana respondió muy rápido resolviendo nuestras dudas. La habitación es como la de imagen, y la casa está muy limpia. Cerca hay super, transporte de autobús y metro. Es una zona tranquila cerca del aeropuerto, pero se llega rápido al centro de Madrid. Sin duda repetiremos, ¡es una excelente anfitriona!Juliana es muy amable y la zona ideal para ir a IFEMA o aeropuerto o el estadio Wanda.Juliana et son mari sont très accueillants! L’appartement est bien situé, près de l’aéroport, idéal pour une escale rapide à Madrid ! Habitación recomendable. Volvería 100% . Lo único q en la habitación hacía muchísimo calor aun así con el aire ...Muy limpio. Llegada flexibleJuliana es muy simpática y hospitalaria, su casa es comoda, la habitación es genial pero la zona un poco mala. comments:
Visito Madrid muy a menudo. Conozco bien la cuidad. 
Tuve el placer de inagurar este sitio tan especial. Un apartamento muy acogedor y espacioso. Con una terraza en el techo muy bonita. 
Con una ubicación excelente. Por el Teatro Calderón. Cerca de Plaza Mayor, Mercado de San Miguel, Puerto del Sol, Opera, Palacio Real. Muy céntrico. 
Cipri fue un gran anfitrión. Sumamente educado, agradable, cooperativo, caballero. Tuvimos  la oportunidad, el día que me iba,  de tomarnos un café y platicar un rato. 
Fue flexible con la hora de entrada y salida, previa conversación, lo cual fue maravilloso. 
Me recomendo sitios para ver flamenco, cenar y lugares de moda (nuevos) en Madrid. 
Estuvo pendiente que me estancia fuera la mejor. 
El Apartamento muy limpio. La cama muy cómoda. Una sala para ver televisión muy rica. Incluso me dejaron galletas, jugo, leche en caso de que necesitase algo de momento. 
Recomiendo el lugar al 200%. Y definitivamente buscaré hospedarme aquí en otras visitas. The flat of Cipri is perfect. Spacious, calm, clean, in the very center of madrid. (2min by foot puerta del Sol and plaza Mayor)

Cipri is between a perfect host and your very best friend. He does not let you down once he passes the keys, he never fails to solve any of your problems....

Among all the things he did for us, he arranged a parking lot for our car, filled the fridge with essentials, brought us to a mini tour of the city, gave us all the good addresses, send us text message everyday to see if we needed everything....Cet appartement est un petit bijou situé en centre ville. A moins de 5 minutes de la Puerta del Sol et de la Plaza Mayor, on y apprécie la terrasse sur les toits!!! Cipri est un hôte excellent qui n'hésite pas à communiquer les bonnes adresses pour vivre Madrid autrement que via les guides touristiques!!!

Cipri and his place are amazing! Place is very central but safe for walking at any times..
Cipri went out of his way to make our stay pleasant and comfortable. Apartment was very clean and guiet, kitchen was equipped with all that you need if you want to use it.. Cipri even provided milk, fruits and cookies.. Apartment is on the 5th floor with beautiful terrace. There is an elevator in the building- so no problem bringing luggage upstairs..
Cipri is a professional guitar player.. He recommended Flamenco to visit ( even with a small discount) and we liked it..
We highly recommend Cipri's place. It would be comfortable for 2-4 persons
Cipri, 
Thank you so much for sharing the apartment with us
thanks a lot ! we had a wondeful time in madrid. The appartement is really well located, and the rooftop really pleasant!This apartment is a very nice place to stay in Madrid. It is centrally located and very close to most of the landmarks and museums!
I would highly recommend staying here!La situation de l'appartement est vraiment idéale pour visiter se promener ou aller diner au gré  de nos envies. Nous regrettons de ne pas avoir assez profité  de la terrasse car nous avions trop de choses à  faire. Les conseils et la disponibilité  de Cipri nous ont beaucoup  servi. Nous comptons y retourner en automne.Este ático está céntrico y genial. Más que recomendable. Great location. Nice views. Helpful host. And during our visitation, Real celebrated the 33th La Liga cup :) We had a wonderful time staying in Cipri's place. Everything from check-in to check-out went smoothly, and communicating with Cipri was a breeze. I had to change my check in time last minute and he was totally understanding. 

The apartment is centrally located around plaza mayor and plaza Santa Ana. I would recommend Cipri's place 10/10 times. Cipris place is exactly as seen in the pictures. Amazing value for money. great sun balcony in the center of the center of madrid. Cipri is a great host, he was attentive to all our needs plus he was super friendly. Highly recommend for a group of friends or family traveling to madrid.We had a fantastic holiday in Madrid staying at Cipri's apartment. The location was excellent and the flat is beautiful. Cipri is a great host and the apartment is perfect: well located with lots of room and right in the center of the city. There was a problem with the AC that took a little more time to fix than expected but all went finally fine. Nice place,with great help from Cipri and good info. 

Privat rooftop was nice. The pool was ok,but some time closedThe flat has a brilliant location in the centre of Madrid.  Most of the top attractions are within walking distance.  We were in Madrid when the temperature was above 30 degrees and the air-conditioning worked flawlessly.  A real bonus is the pool.

The flat is immaculate and clean.  Cipri is a terrific host that is happy to help with lots of things.

I will definitely see if we can use this flat again when we come to Madrid.

Cipri a su être disponible et très acceuillant. L'appartement était tous simplement parfait avec une terrasse splendide. Voyage au top !Cipri's place was great (clean, central, sweet pool) and he was a fantastic host who made the check-in super easy and offered recommendations of what to do and where to eat. Would definitely stay again when I'm in Madrid. Vi havde nogen fantastiske dage i Madrid. Legligheden var perfekt. Super beliggenhed , tæt på det hele. Dejlig tagterrasse . Cipri var sød og hjælpsom. Gav mange tips til hvad vi skulle se og gode restauranter.This place exceeded our expectations. It is really central and both the bedroom and the sofa bed are very comfortable.  There are separate air conditioner for the bedroom and living area which make it easy in the Madrid heat.

Also the pool is a huge plus and the terrace you see in the pictures is actually a private terrace and not shared.

Capri himself could not have been more welcoming and helpful.  His responses were within minutes and he had terrific tips for us first time visitors.

Highly recommended Super good! Excellent location with only a 2 minute walk to anything you need. Balcony area is also great with a lovely view. 7 out of 7 would visit again!Los sugerentes tejados de Madrid, los atardeceres que no se acaban nunca, las campanas cercanas de la iglesia de la Santa Cruz, la piscina en la planta baja del edificio, la ducha permanente en la terraza, la casa bastante amplia y, sobre todo, las primeras horas de las mañanas de domingo. ¿Que hace calor en Madrid? ¿Quién lo dice? Disfruten unos días veraniegos en esta sorprendente casa desde la que, en las noches más claras, es posible ver hasta la Estrella Polar. 
Gracias Cipri, Cristina y Kiko.Cipri was a great host and we got à nice contact with him... the flat was great for a 4 persons family, with climatisation and ideally situated in the history center of madrid (playa major at less than 5 mns). The + for us: the nice small swimmingpool in the residence with life guard. Sure that when we will come back to Madrid, we will try to reserve again by Cipri !!!Cipri's place is perfectly situated in the city for every activity! Cipri is a kind, gracious and wonderful host. Thanks Cipri!!Apartamento estupendísimo en pleno centro de Madrid. Amplio salón, terraza espectacular desde donde ver el atardecer o tomar algo en las calurosas noches madrileñas y una piscina más que útil para refrescarte en los días de verabo. Lo tiene todo (y si algo falta, Cipri, muy atento, te lo intenta proporcionar)I stayed eleven nights at Cipri's flat with my daughter and it was overall a really good stay. The host was really friendly and warm, and made sure that we were well looked after. He was able to check us in even if we arrived really late at night.  The flat was really nice, with lift, pool and AC and it was located in the center near to all the main attractions of the city! A perfect location to enjoy all Madrid has to offer. Great location 2 minutes walk to Puerto del sol and Plaza mayor, the center of Madrid. There is big minimarket near - lidl and small minimarket downstairs. The terrace is great and big. Gracias por todo CipriFirst the apartment: a very nice apartment which has everything you need and is very clean. A nice rooftop were you can relax and watch over a part of Madrid.
The apartment is in the middle of Madrid, with very much sightnings on walking distance (Retiro Park, Plaza Mayor, Del Prado Museum, Royal palace of Madrid, Cathedral of Madrid and many more). Also very convenient: a supermarket (Lidl) is right around the corner (2 minute walk). Plenty of taxi's nearby and also located near a metro station.

Secondly, the host: Cipri. Cipri is a great host. Was right on time when we arrived at the apartment and responds within a couple of minutes on messages. Cipri was a great host and very flexible with our check in and check out times. Cipri was great. He was prompt and turned up on the agreed time for check-in. Very friendly and welcoming and he gave us some good recommendations. Appartement très bien situé’ tout peut  se faire à pied, la terrasse est très agréable avec vue, attention escalier difficile pour y accéder. Piscine sympa après une journée de visite. Appartement très propre, très calme. C’est professionnel, rien à redire si ce n’est un manque de chaleur dans la décoration.
A recommander.What a wonderful and memorable experience had in Madrid…and a huge part is due to Cipri’s apartment.  The building is in a fantastic location!  We walked everywhere and key areas, like Plaza Mayor and Puerta Del Sol, were only minutes away.  Not to mention that there were some of the best tapas bars and restaurants at our fingertips.  Also, if you need the Metro for anything, you have access to 2 stations and 3 different lines.  Despite being close to all the action, it was always quiet and easy to sleep at night.  The amenities were great, including comfortable beds, a clean bathroom (with a great shower), and a spacious living space.  One of my favorite parts was the private rooftop terrace, which we used to relax, enjoy the view, and sip wine…like true Spaniards!  The building has a pool which comes in handy during the very hot summer months.  Cipri is a Superhost for a reason!  He was in contact with us during our entire stay, making reservations at restaurants and shows, and just offering suggestions to make our experience more authentic.  The apartment and experience went above my expectations!  Thank you again, Cipri!We loved the rooftop terrace! It is really spacious and a wonderful place for having breakfast or relaxing in the evening with a nice view. The terrace is private, nobody else can access it.
The apartment was like expected with one bedroom, living room, bathroom and kitchen. The living room is very spacious. If you are 3 people and/0r don't sleep together in the double bed you can use the sofa bed and a temporary bed in the living room. The kitchen has all the things you need like a dishwasher and a moka pot.
The location is great, situated in a small and quiet street.  Still you are right in the center of Madrid with all the main attractions in walking distance. Metro and a 24h supermarket are just 5 minutes away.
And last but not least Cipri was a great host. Always friendly and with a fast response time before and during our stay. He made our stay comfortable at any time and had a lot of recommendations.We stayed 4 days at Cipris apartment. It is perfectly located in the heart of Madrid. In my opinion, it's hard to find a better area. Even though it's very lively outside, the apartment in the fifth floor is completely quiet. It's 5 minutes walk to the subway station Sol. But on foot, you can reach almost all attractions in the center of Madrid. The roof top terrace gives you a great view. The apartment is very spacious and the kitchen is well equipped. The bed has a very comfortable mattress, which is a rarity in many apartments. So, whenever I would come back to Madrid, the apartment is my first choice.Wonderfull place wonderfull person
Right in the center

The apartment had everything I needed and I loved the skylights which made the place bright and cheery but the best was the private rooftop terrace!  What an amazing place to have in the morning or in the evening to watch the sunset.  My only regret was I did not have more time to spend at your place in Madrid.

I would recommend highly this place to stay and look forward to returning to Madrid and staying with Cipri again.  I loved the location it was perfect - close walking to many sites and I felt very safe in the neighbourhood. Cipri made my first visit to Madrid a wonderful experience.Great attic just 5 mins walk from Puerta del Sol, very spacious, fully furnished with all standard amenities, and a great rooftop terrace with fantastic views of Madrid. The place could not be more centrally located, yet its quiet and homely, and is a perfect base to explore Madrid. Cipri was a great host, very attentive. Recommended!This apartment is situated in an excellent location with only a 5 minute walk to Plaza Mayor and a 6 minute stroll to Puerta del Sol. It had a supermarket around the corner which can be very useful and Triso de Molina metro station.
It was very clean and we requested the sofa bed to be ready upon arrival which it was. The linen was clean as was the whole apartment. The coffee provided for the plunger was great and all kitchen utensils etc were clean. The host provided ample toilet paper, soaps and washing detergents for our stay.
It was very cold in Madrid and the central heating was ideal in keeping the place warm. 
It has stairs ( can be a little steep) to the outside rooftop terrace which was furnished and provided a great view. The apartment was on the 5th floor and it has an elevator. The whole building and foyer was very clean and mopped frequently by the caretaker. 
Within walking distance to Cava Baja 
which is great for authentic food and we even walked to the Royal Palace. The host was very responsive and not only greeted us promptly upon arrival but also kept in contact with us, made recommendations in regards to restaurants, shows and things to do and even offered to book these for us. Cipri answered all our questions and was helpful throughout our stay and is an excellent Superhost. Again it was a great location and we would highly recommend it.Cipri is a fabulous host!  His recommendations for places to eat (even making a restaurant reservation for our special occasion), places to visit, booking some 'tickets' on our behalf, booking our early morning taxi (which was waiting 5 minutes before the due time which was brilliant). The apartment was extremely clean and well equipped.  There were 3 of us staying in the apartment and we had plenty of room.  The terrace was the icing on the cake, wonderful to sit in the sun after a day of sightseeing. The location of the apartment was perfect! Central to all of the sights and the metro but also on a quiet street. We walked miles and came back in the evening to our comfortable apartment. Thank you Cipri!El departamento está muy bien ubicado a metros de Puerta del Sol. Muy limpio y luminoso. Ideal para 2 o 3 personas. La única crítica que podría hacerle es que la cocina podría estar más equipada. Cipri fue siempre muy gentil y nos proporcionó información acerca de la ciudad. Recomendable.Perfekt service och perfekt läge. Gångavstånd till många sevärdheter och bra restauranger.Tout est parfait.
Cipri est un hôte hors pair de par son accueil, son écoute, sa disponibilité et son efficacité. 
Il m’a été d’une grande aide et de bon conseil en réponse à toutes mes demandes.
Quant à l’appartement, il est très bien aménagé et présente toutes les commodités nécessaires pour se sentir chez soi. La terrasse est un plus, pour prendre des bains de soleil et avoir une vue imprenable sur Madrid.
Le logement est très calme, au dernier étage, sans vis à vis, et surtout idéalement situé tout près du centre historique, très pratique car on peut tout faire à pied pour aller à l’essentiel des visites.
Bref un séjour à renouveler sans modération pour découvrir de beaux sites dont Madrid a le secret.
Un 5 étoiles pour notre ami Cipri , je vous le recommande les yeux fermés.Great stay for business at Cipri’s apartment, fast communication, and all expectations were met. I would recommend this place to anyone!Je garde un super souvenir de mon voyage à Madrid notamment grâce à Cipri qui nous a mis dans de merveilleuses dispositions pour profiter un maximum de nos vacances.Great location close to Sol and Cipri is a good host.Cipri's apartment is a great place to stay in Madrid. Centrally located, very close to the metro stations of Sol and Tirso de Molina, you can go out and visit Madrid by walking. It is also very quite. The apartament is equipped with everything you need to stay and it has a terrace with a wonderful view on Madrid center. A pool is also available in the ground floor. Cipri is a perfect host, he is always available to give you tips and suggestions and flexible in check in check out time, really appreciated. 
Next time in Madrid will be there again with no doubts!
Thank you Cipri!This apartment is super comfortable and clean. The host was very kind every time and answer you quickly!
Definitely would come back here!:) Thank you!Super coole Wohnung in perfekter Lage. Capri ist super nett und war jederzeit für Tipps und Fragen zu erreichen. Die Dachterasse ist unschlagbar und der perfekte Ruhepool mitten im Zentrum. Wir würden auf jeden Fall wiederkommen!My second time at Cipri’s place, and again a very comfortable experience: spacious, comfy bed, great location minutes away from Puerta de Sol, and a great private terrace with fantastic views over Madrid (plus a nice communal swimming pool in the ground floor). A great base to explore madrid for a single traveller or coupleExcellent location for Madrid, also great roof space if you want a couple of hours break from touring Madrid.Wonderful host and lovely apartment! Highly recommended!Appartement hyper bien situé dans le centre historique de Madrid. On peut tout faire à pieds. Magnifique terrasse sur les toits. Piscine très agréable après une journée de visite. Merci à Cipri pour son hospitalité!Cipri is a fantastic host. Very responsive and eager to give attraction recommendations. The apartment is a few minute walk away from plaza mayor, sol and excellent restaurants. I highly recommend.Me and my wife booked for 5 days the flat was amazing the fact that it had a roof terrace and a pool made the flat for us  the location was spot on as well . Cipri has been amazing from when we booked all the way up till when we left I would highly recommend any one to bookCipri's apartment was perfect for our family of 3 (dad and two middle school daughters). The kitchen had all we needed to prepare breakfasts and snacks. The location was absolutely central to everything in the city, but still quiet because facing a courtyard. The private rooftop terrace was a great spot to catch the sunset. We were able to cool off in the refreshing pool on the ground floor of the courtyard. Cipri himself was friendly and helpful, giving us several tips for exploring the city. I would stay again any time.Parfait , idéalement situé 
Réserver sans hésiterEl alojamiento de Cipri es estupendo,  amplio y con terraza,  a pesar de no poder disfrutar mucho de ella por el mal tiempo. La ubicación perfecta, y el trato de Cipri de lo mejor. Sin duda repetiremos.Great location and beautiful space. The roof is great to hang out on at sunset, or midday. The apartment is very quiet, the bedroom is dark at night and the mattress is comfortable. There’s a washing machine and the bathroom has a bidet- nice perks! Great stay and Cipri is very nice!This was our first stay in an Airbnb and it was fantastic! Cipri is a wonderful host and the apartment is in a great location! The whole trip was amazing!We had an amazing time at Cipri’s place. The apartment is lovely and the location is great! Cipri was very helpful and give us great tips regarding places to eat in the area. Cipri is a super host!The location is perfect, it is walking distance to Plaza Mayor and Plaza del Sol. It is a mile away from the main train station, as we arrived from Sevilla. There is a grocery store down the street, and plenty of restaurants, bars, and shopping. San Marcos Market and San Gines Chocolatier were less than a 10 minute walk. Cipri offers shampoo, conditioner, dish soap, towels, iron, ironing board, and many great amenities.Klasse Wohnung und super Lage. Cipri war jederzeit ansprechbar und gab uns direkt selbst Tipps für unseren Aufenthalt. Highlight ist die Dachterrasse, um zwischendurch auszuruhen oder den Sonnenuntergang zu genießen. Check-in und Check-out waren super einfach. Wir würden gerne wiederkommen.We really appreciated our time in Madrid and at Cipri's place. He offered punctual check-in, kind orientation to the space and the area, great suggestions for restaurants and activities, as well as nice touches such as food staples, kitchen/laundry detergent, hairdryer/shampoo/conditioner/soap, and umbrella. It was a great location to explore Madrid. Very spacious and clean! Good WiFi connection. And the terrace is lovely!Cipri his apartment is reall (Website hidden by Airbnb) G. The location is the best you can get in madrid. The apartment has a fantastic and huge rooftop terrace and there is a lot of natural light inside. 
When you go to Madrid, I recommend you to choose for thi (Website hidden by Airbnb) apartment.Nos encantó alojarnos en el apartamento! Luminoso, limpio y con excelente ubicación! Cipriano estuvo en todo momento conectado con nosotros y nos dió algunas recomendaciones para comer por la zona! Recomiendo 100% quedarse acá!This flat is in a great location. Only three stops on the metro from the train station and then walking distance to Plaza del Sol, Plaza Mayor, Mercado de San Miguel and the Royal Palace. There are lots of restaurants in the area and Cipri also had several places that he personally recommended.
The flat was nice. The private rooftop patio was a nice place to get outdoors without leaving the flat. The stairs to the roof are a bit steep, so watch the kids. The kitchen had nearly everything you could want. And the washer is an added benefit if you need to do laundry.
I would stay here again if I get back to Madrid.Sin duda Cipri fue un host excelente!
Excelente atención y el lugar esta ubicado muy bien!Cipri es un excelente anfitrión. Muy cordial y super atento.The location of this apartment is better than perfect. At walking distance everything, due to it's central location. The roof terrace is very nice. The apartment itself is decorated pretty sober but well equipped. The only downside are the neighbours.  The walls seem to be pretty thin and in the weekend they where quite noisy. Cipri is a very friendly and attentive host. Overall had a great stay and recommend this apartment.

comments:
Great experience, everything was excellent. Lindo piso, la zona inmejorable y el piso es espacioso, cómodo y seguro.
Es un lugar para repetir sin dudarlo.Absolutely amazing place to stay in the heart of all the action. Not too mention the place is well organized, clean and spacious. Eloisa was a gracious host, who was not only very communicative, but also had all the amenities we needed. I can't recommend her, and her apartment enough, 5 stars!!!A mí cuando vuelva a Madrid me gustaría volverme a alojarme aquí.Muy buena ubicación, el piso muy cómodo y con todos los servicios. Sin duda repetiríaVery nice neighborhood, good restaurants at just 200 metres walking distance. Nice appartment, clean with all required luxury. Good beds, except for foldable bed in the livingroom, mattress too thin, however not very uncomfortable. We experienced two nights with quite a lot of noise from “drunken” passers-by. If you keep the window closed of your bedroom, it won’t disturb you so much, but if you like to sleep with window open ( fresh air), it will wake you during the night. Final conclusion: good value for money ! I recommend itWe had a wonderful stay in Madrid. Eloisa's apartment is well located, very clean and spacious.Great experience, follow her advice for food.Very goodThis cozy place is in a great location near to metro stations making it easy to move around the city.Apparemment bien situé et proche du métro lavapies ou du centre ville à pieds, parking très pratique en face. L'appartement est bien agencé même si quelques améliorations sont encore à apporter mais Eloisa doit le rénover petit à petit car certains éléments sont plus design et neufs. Posto bello e tranquillo... comodissimo, grazie alla fermata degli autobus e della metro.Estuvimos muy bien en casa de Meichan, te da todo tipo de facilidades para estar comodos y la casa se ajusta a las imagenes publicadasPasamos sólo una noche en Madrid pero nos sentimos muy cómodas. El piso se encuentra cerca de la estación de Metro y muchas estaciones de buses. Aunque no es el centro se nos hizo muy fácil llegar y volver de noche.Very flexible host :) . Everything was ok. Departamento limpio, junto al metro. Comodo y con equipado con lo necesario.El piso está muy bien si es sólo para dormir y pasar unas pocas noches, la ubicación excelente, aunque el barrio parece un poco peligroso de noche (parece, no si lo es), tiene un super 24 horas muy cerca, lo cual le da unos puntos positivos. En cuanto a la comodidad de la cama y la habitación en general, es aceptable, pero es económico y tiene una relación calidad-precio buena. Es importante saber que en el piso viven otras personas (aunque nunca las vi) y quizás se debería mejorar la limpieza del baño y la cocina. En cuanto a la atención del Sr. Meichan, fue buena y muy pendiente de nuestra llegada, en general la estancia fue buena.Nice stay, accurate description. Meichan has a great place for travelers just passing through or staying for a while. It's an easy walk to the train, and an easy train ride to anywhere in the city. The bed was comfy, and we slept great. El lugar es lo que muestra la foto : simple, justo lo necesario para pasar un tiempo corto. El lugar es muy limpio, silencioso, tranquilo. Cerca esta el meyro q comunica con todo y a tres estaciones de Atocha, lugar importante. Hay comercios para realizar compras o comer afuera. Recomendable !!!The room, like the whole house is clean, the bed comfortable and is located in a nice area. The apartment is close to the metro station and about 20-25 minutes walk from the Atocha Station. I can totally recommend this place to all travelers :)Thanks. All was great. Good location, nice room and wonderful host.Es una casa comoda, simple, cumple con todo lo necesario. Se puede cocinar sin problemas! Y eso ahorra mucho . muy limpia y con luz. Cerca del metro , de avenudas con lugares para comprar. Muy recomendableMuy buen lugar para pasar unos días en Madrid, Meichan fué un buen anfitrión y nos entregó todo lo necesario para una buena estadía, muy recomendado!!Todo muy bien. Sitio muy tranquilo. Era lo que buscaba. Económico y cómodo. Para repetir.A decent place with a super market near by. Todo bien, ninguna queja. Meichan muy amable, y el piso ubicado cerca de una boca de metro.El piso   está muy bien  de precio y sobre todo bien localizado y de fácil acceso mediante metro. El anfitrión es muy amable y atento. Muy recomendable para gente joven que quiera visitar Madrid con un presupuesto limitado .Meichan fue muy amable, a pesar de que fue una reserva a última hora no hubo prácticamente ningún problema para quedarme, y Meichan se encargó de asegurarse de que todo estuviera a mi gusto.
El lugar se encuentra a 3-4 calles de la estación de metro por lo cual queda muy bien ubicado en cuanto a transporte.Meichan is a very helpful, kind and warm person! He let us bring things early as we stayed for 3 months to help with the moving process. He is very clean, comes everyday to wash and mop. The location is very convenient close to metro line 1, one block away, which can bring you almost anywhere to the city. We were very pleased with our stay and enjoyed Meichan's hospitality! Mucho gracias Meichan =)Perfect for travelers in a budget. I recommend. Agradable trato, buena combinacion房东是中国人哦,交流起来超级方便,挺舒服｡Buen ambiente, todo muy limpio.Todo fue muy grato. Meichan es muy atento y está dispuesto a ayudar en lo que sea necesario. Tres Bien situé. .métro accès direct pour le centre .. proche des stations bus eurolineMeichan est très gentil et son logement est propre et bien placéHigiene del lugar, privacidad, tranquilidad, un lugar muy confortable, Muy buena comunicación con otras lugares, etc.Die Wohnung ist wie beschrieben. Das beste war nur die Lage: Vallecas ist nicht so weit weg von Atocha Renfe (Hauptbahnhof) (3 Metro-Haltestellen) und vom Puerta del Sol (7 Haltestellen). Es war relativ Sauber, aber die Sauberkeit der Küche hat vieles zu wünschen übrig gelassen: es war Fett überall, vor allem an Schranktüren und Schubladen, und die arme Ausstattung hat das Kochen ein bisschen unangenehm und schwierig gemacht. Ich würde diese Wohnung nur für einen kurzen Aufenthalt empfehlen (1 bis 2 Nächte), sogar gibt es in Madrid bessere Hostels für weniger Preis. Die Möbel waren Spermüllmäßig: der "couch" war sehr weich und unbequem und das Bett war nicht das Beste, außerdem gab es immer wieder Lärm auf der Straße und die Türen der Zimmer hatten keinen Schlüssel. Alles in allem war der Gastgeber freundlich aber ich würde die Wohnung leider nicht empfehlen (es ärgert mich immer wieder, dass viele Leute bwz. Besitzer wollen nur profitieren aber sie kümmer sich überhaupt nicht um Qualität und um ein besseres und angemesseneres Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis. Schade...El alojamiento es aseado y cómodo para dormir , las gradas y la bulla de la calle molestaron un poco.Insgesamt eine günstige Unterkunft d gut angebundene Alternative, um Madrid zu entdecken.
Meichan ist sehr freundlich und stets hilfsbereit. Der zunächst kritische Sauberkeitszustand wurde auf Anfrage hin schnell von ihm verbessert.
Meichan reinigt regelmäßig die Böden, Bad und Küche und nach Auszug auch die Zimmer. Das Viertel wird sicherlich etwas kritischer gesehen, da die Wohnung aber direkt am Rand und nah an einer U-Bahn Station liegt gibt es da keine Probleme. Ein Mercadona und ein Markt für Lebensmittel und alle sonstigen, typischen spanischen Geschäfte in der Nähe machen die Verpflegung sehr einfach.Muy buena comunicación con transporte público. Anfitrión muy amable y deja usar todos los espacios del piso.Meichan was great at communicating with me. The neighborhood looked nice, residential/commercial mix.  However, we did not stay at her place because we were unable to find parking anywhere. The roads are very narrow, totally crowded and parking was just not to be found. We tried for 90 minutes without luck. Her place was probably amazing, but ... No place for the rental car.Meichan was extremely welcoming, gave us a metro map and pointed us toward areas of interest. He was in the apartment frequently cleaning, sweeping, mopping, and making sure we had fresh sheets when needed and extra towels. The kitchen was well-equipped and he cleared out room in the refrigerator for us. Also, plenty of cabinet space for our food. At times, there were 2 guests to 4 rooms (meaning 8 people sharing one bathroom/toilet/shower, which was a bit difficult). The apartment was very clean and comfortable. It was a short walk to the metro station, which made for easy access to the Centro and anywhere else we needed to go. For the price of the stay, we would definitely return!Meichan ist ein sehr freundlicher und hilfsbereiter Gastgeber, der Check-In und der Aufenthalt waren sehr angenehm. Die Unterkunft war dem Preis angemessen, lediglich die Küche war dreckig und das Bad war nicht komplett sauber. Zudem waren wir mit 3 anderen Gästen zusammen in der Wohnung, was etwas unerwartet war, aber an sich kein Problem darstellte. Unser Zimmer war sauber und ordentlich, die Bettwäsche und Handtücher sauber und frisch gewaschen. THE BIGGEST PROBLEM WAS THAT WE WE NOT THE ONLY GUESTS!!
1. IT WAS COLD, THE BLANKET THAT MEICHAN SHOWN US WAS DIRTY AND NOT WASHED

3. IT WAS HARD TO CLOSE THE WINDOW

6. VERY BAD CONTACT WITH THE HOST1. 추움. 여름 이외 날씨에 여행하시는 분은 방한 대비(핫팩, 전기장판, 따듯한 옷 등)를 하시고 오셔야 되요! 집에 다른 난방 기구나 그런 것들이 없고 외풍이 있습니다.

3. 도심과의 거리는 지하철과 20분 정도이고 지하철역과 거리가 멀지 않아서 위치는 좋았습니다.

4. 방은 2인이서 쓰기 적당하고 주방이나 화장실 시설도 괜찮았습니다. 

5. 호스트 분과 말이 통하진 않았지만 체크인부터 세세히 신경 써 주셨어요! 친절하셨습니다.Meichan's place is exactly as advertised. AdoreiMeichan es muy amable, su casa está cerca del metro y es recomendable很好的房东,超级热心｡

Comfortable and private.

Un poco fría la habitación, nomás. El resto todo bien!gracias!Very nice Ya lo evalué al huesped.Meichan's place is perfect for anyone looking for a central and affordable place to stay at in Madrid.  It is less than two blocks away from the metro station and just stops away from most touristic areas.  It is a bit far from the airport and may need to switch metro lines about 3 times if you decide to do it all by metro but you can also use the Renfe (railway) which is a bit easier in my opinion is you're carrying a lot of luggage as we were.  Meichan doesn't live in the same place but comes in everyday to make sure the place is clean and to help people check in.  He tries to help with any questions you may have and keeps helpful maps on the house.  The place is just as described and loved the ability to do laundry and use the kitchen as needed which is well equipped.  Just one thing to keep in mind, the apartment is on the 3rd/4th floor and there's no elevator and there are 3 other guest rooms a well, all sharing the same (Website hidden by Airbnb) you may have to wait for your turn to shower in the morning, but the place was cleaned by Meichan everyday and we didn't really have any issues. We would definitely stay here if we come back to Madrid.Meichan es un excelente anfitrión   amable   atento  el apartamento es central y con todos los serviciosLa puerta de la habitación no tenía ni llave ni medida de seguridad alguna. Tuvimos que comprar un candado y colocarlo. El anfitrión no reside en el lugar y casi no habla español. Buena la ubicación, a cuatro cuadras del metro.Meichan es muy educado y agradable, pero infelizmente nuestra estancia en el piso fue terrible, se encuentra muy lejos del centro de Madrid, el piso tenía un olor muy fuerte poco agradable y el segundo día no tuvimos agua caliente a pesar de que el anuncio dice que hay agua caliente 24 horas, además el baño estaba lleno de pelos y el sifón de la ducha tapada por esta razón. No hay calefacción que caliente (la que hay en la habitación es pequeñísima y no calienta nada) por lo que pasamos la noche muy mal. A pesar de que el dueño es muy amable, no recomendaría ir a este lugar. Tuvimos que buscar un hostel porque no aguantamos estar en esas condiciones para nuestro segundo día en Madrid.Meichan was a great host. He welcomed us and gave us some tips on the local area. The location is good, right near the metro and lots of restaurants. We would stay here again!Good room in a good place for a small price.Meichan fue un gran anfitrión, aunque no habla muy bien español se esfuerza al máximo para hacerse entender. La casa está muy cerca de la estación de Metro Puente de Vallecas y en 15 minutos puedes llegar hasta el centro de la cuidad. La casa estaba limpia y agradable. Sin dudar volvería a quedarme alli. Muchas gracias Meichan.很不错的温州大叔,很热情｡房间性价比高Gracias Meichan! Muy atento!Just for teenagers not for families or adults.La habitación es buena, y la ubicación, aunque alejada, está cerca de la línea de metro (que funciona muy bien). La cocina está un poco sucia pero zafa.Meichan's place is pretty basic, but it's in a great location, easily accessible by the subway. Just a block away from a subway stop. Even though I don't speak spanish, Meichan took GREAT effort in making sure I understood where to go to catch my plane the next morning. He was very thorough, wrote me directions, and made extra extra sure I knew when I needed to leave and where to go to make it to my plane in time. He was very sweet. The apartment has 3 other private rooms and only one bathroom, so it can be a little hectic in that regard, but I just made sure to shower the night before so I didn't have to fight for the bathroom in the morning! It was the perfect pit stop!It is a place really close to the centermuy bienGreat location! So easy to get into the city. Not much hot water in shower and kitchen was pretty dirty. Other than that great stayGreat flat with all the basic needs. Good location close to metro station and lots of grocery stores and restaurants near by.La permanenza in questa casa è stata parecchio sconvolgente, visto che abbiamo condiviso 60mq con altre 6 coppie. Il bagno è scomodo e assolutamente non pulito. L'host non fa rispettare la pulizia nei luoghi comuni. La sporcizia è ovunque. L'unica cosa positiva che mi sento di dire in positivo è che le lenzuola erano fortunatamente pulite e ben sistemate. In conclusione riguardo alla posizione della casa, è lontana dal centro e necessita per forza di metro per spostamenti. did not match with the images . 
The house in general was not clean, a little bit disgusting Es buen anfitrión y muy buena ubicación del piso, solo que le falta limpiezaDoes the job. You get what you pay forEasy access to city centre via metro, stops at 1:30am. No real dining area. Friendly hostLocation and value of this shared place  while we were feeling home, I recommend. Use the kitchen, clean bathroom , quick access to metroPor el precio que se paga no se puede pedir mucho. Es lo que parece.
Hubiese estado todo bien hasta ahí si no fuese porque la persiana de la habitación no se podía bajar. Todo el sol a primera hora de la mañanaSi vous êtres prêts à baisser vos attentes pour payer si peu cher, alors l'appartement de Meichan est un bon choix. Il est très près du métro et la chambre ainsi que la salle de bain sont relativement propres. Par contre, la cuisine est tellement sale que nous n'y avons rien cuisiné. Il n'y a pas de place où manger, alors nous déjeunions de pain froid dans le salon. 
Nous croyions qu'il n'y aurait pas de wifi à l'appartement (ce n'était pas indiqué sur leur annonce) et nous avons eu la bonne surprise d'en avoir. 
Notre arrivée vers minuit dû à des problèmes de transport s'est très bien déroulée. Bon accueil. 
*Ne vous fiez pas à l'apparente fraîcheur et propreté des photos.Calidad de persona, excelente anfitrión. Sin duda volvería a elegirloQuartier vivant, change des quartiers touristiques, métro et autres commodités à 5min à pied. Hôte très sympathique, nous recommandons ! Bon rapport qualité-prix !Positives: Close to local transportation: you can walk up the street (literally) & take the train straight into Madrid. Meichan was generous enough to let us check in early, which was really helpful. There was a cleaning issue, and he did take care of it right away as well. 

Negatives: The bathroom wasn’t as clean as it could have been. The kitchen was very unclean, though the bedroom seemed mostly clean. There was an issue at 12:30 am (out of Meichan’s control) where 2 guests checked in late. The doorbell kept ringing and woke my travel partner and I up. 

Overall, staying here one night is feasible. I would not recommend to families or anyone older, because there is no elevator to get up to the third floor. Meichan was a nice man but his Airbnb could use a bit of TLC!Great value for money and easy check in. Very flexible hostEl alojamiento es muy bueno. Meichan nos esperó para recibirnos, nos dio las indicaciones pertinentes y se marchó. Durante toda nuestra estancia no molestó ni nos hizo ningún problema. Nos dio total libertad y fue genial ya que no había problemas de horario en lo absoluto.Un sitio correcto para pasar unos pocos días. A 20 min de la estación sur. Meichan’s place is very close to the metro and lots of take away places, bars and restaurants. The room is a perfect size for a short stay. However, the apartment is shared with other guests and but only locks from the inside which was a cause for concern when leaving the apartment. There is also only one bathroom between 4 bedrooms and so it was sometimes difficult to get time to use it.Vous ne vivrez pas avec l'hôte (qui ne parle pas vraiment espagnol, ni anglais, ni français, ni certainement aucune autre que la sienne) dont l'appartement est juste en face sur le palier.
Votre logement sera un appartement à partager à la manière auberge de jeunesse (4 chambres sont à louer à l'intérieur).
Par conséquent les parties communes ne peuvent pas être vraiment propres (puisqu'il y a du passage et du mouvement). D'ailleurs il peut facilement y avoir de l'attente pour la salle de bain notamment (le WC n'est pas indépendant) et la cuisine si vous comptez l'utiliser (garde aux poignées de placards qui collent aux doigts).
L'appartement est globalement assez défraichi voire vétuste (murs de la chambre décrépit, volet qui ne se  ferme pas complétement, rouille sur les reposoirs de la douche, mobilier d'un autre temps...) mais pour être honnête je m'attendais à pire après avoir lu les commentaires des précédents visiteurs. La chambre quant à elle était propre mais (ATTENTION) ne se ferme pas à clés de l'extérieur (vous laissez donc vos affaires sans sécurité par rapport à vos colocataires).
De plus la chambre donnait sur un bar (qui avait l'air très sympa soit dit en passant) assez bruyant que les fenêtres ne savent étouffer (prévoir les boules quies).

comments:
El alojamiento es tal y cómo se ve en las fotos. Tienes todo lo que se necesita para hacer el desayuno. Es un piso cómodo para 3 personas como mucho, 4 creo que empezaría a ser incómodo, sobretodo a la hora de cocinar porque la cocina es pequeña y apenas caben dos personas. 
En cuanto a la localización, está cerca del metro y hay un Mercadona a no más de 10 minutos andando.If there was a super hero host category on Airbnb this would be for this host. 
The best experience I had in Airbnb so far and I don't think there is anything better out there than this. 
Great house, furniture, kitchen, balcony. Great response, the host even showed us around and help us with anything we needed. 
Nice area too not to central, not to quiet.Buena comunicacion, muy amables.
El Ático está mucho mejor que en las fotografías. Con todo tipo de detalles , estaba impecable y las camas muy cómodas. Gracias a Jairo y Cristina por todo, fue una muy buena estancia. Repetiremos seguro.Todo espectacular el lugar tal cual en las fotos hasta mejor tiene cerca de todo estación de metro a solo 7minutos abastos a solo minutos igual súper bien comunicado no tuve problema alguno solo con el ventilador de uno de los cuartos pero gracias a los anfitriones me solventaron de inmediato. RECOMENDADO 100%Esta igual  que en las fotos nada que objetar.Mucho mejor de lo que esperabamos, en zona muy muy tranquila y muy bien comunicado.
Para llegar al centro el metro muy cerca y los autobuses también.
Hemos estado super a gusto y el trato por parte de Cristina fenomenal. 
Alojamiento muy recomendableThe place was beautiful and perfect! Everything was clean, it's about 7min from the metro and close to everything. The check in was straightforward, and Jairo was really accomodating. I definitely recommend the place!We recommend the place very much!
