comments:
Javier y su hermana han sido personas amables, me han tratado con cariño.
 La habitación es grandísima, en una zona súper central. Piso limpio y luminoso, en un edificio antiguo del centro de Madrid. Experiencia totalmente recomendable al 100%. 
Conociendo mi afición por la cocina, una noche yo, Javier y su hermana estuvimos intercambiando opiniones y recetas de cocina italiana, viendo vídeos de preparación de platos típicos y saboreando cervezas.
Muchas gracias por todo! TommasoChambre + petit salon attenant avec un bureau et balcon très spacieux.
L'appartement de Javier est situé en plein centre, juste à côté de l'Opéra, et nous avons très peu utilisé le métro car le centre historique de Madrid est très accessible à pied.
Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Javier et sa soeur Maria-Angeles, c'était un plaisir de discuter avec eux !Javier and his sister were super nice and super helpful. The room does not consist of a bedroom only but also has a private living room which is awesome. Although it is a shared bathroom Javer and his sister are very concerned to protect your privacy. The place is also perfectly situated: shopping, nightlife and sightseeing in walking distance. It could not have been better!Muy céntrico, espacioso y agradablesWell, what to say: amazing host, amazing apartment, amazing location. Where shall I start? Opera is definitely the spot to be: walking distance to all cool neighborhoods and sight seeings, no matter whether you want to go to La Latina, Gran Via, Place Major...everything is within 10 minutes walking distance. The metro station is right in front of the (Website hidden by Airbnb) you can't be more central than this. The pictures do not describe the room at all. The apartment is historic, it has an amazing flair, and the room is bigger than the pictures are showing. Plenty of space. Clean. Neat. Romantic. Last but not least Javier: he is a great host, very kind, a good chef, he knows the city with all its hot spots. Staying at Javiers place you can't make any mistake. I would definitely go there another time!The room was fantastic and the location is perfect. Javier is great and always answered our messages as quickly as possible!Une chambre spacieuse et agréable, tout est propre et le verrou à l'intérieur permet de se sentir à l'aise, super emplacement ! Je n'hésiterais pas à revenir !Location perfetta, tutta Madrid raggiungibile a piedi e ogni volta attraverso percorsi diversi. Javier e sua sorella Maria sono stati ospiti gentili e premurosi, e ci hanno aiutato quando le cene fuori richiedevano prenotazioni telefoniche. Molto consigliato a coppie giovani e sportive!Really central place, super friendly host and the room is as described.Es una habitacion muy comfortable en un lugar muy centrico. Javier y si hermana son fantasticosJavier è stato un fantastico host, accogliente e gentile. La casa si trova in posto centrale e ad un passo dalle principali attrazioni. ConsigliatoThe location is truly the best ! I will stay again when I return. Javier is a good host!Como positivo digo que Javier ha sido una persona muy atenta. Ha sido un fin de semana muy bueno que he pasado con mi niño. La casa ubicada en el mejor enclave de Madrid.

Como negativo... Pues nada que lo bueno se acaba y hay que volver al curro. 
Gracias Javier y gracias a tu hermana por el paraguas.Javiers is a brilliant place to explore Madrid. We needed to order a cap when we left his 
place and he kindly helped us out. Zeer aangenaam verblijf in hartje Madrid. Javier en zijn vrouw praten geen Engels, maar dat veranderde niets aan de leuke ervaring! Zijn zoon spreekt wel vlot Engels, en heeft ons hartelijk verwelkomd Javier was a great person. During our stay with a 7 months old baby, he and his sister tried everything to make us feel comfortable. It was a great hospilatity we have received and if i come again  to spain, we definetely would love to stay  in his house. house is in a good location and we pretty much walked everywhere.La posizione è perfetta, con Javier ci siamo trovate benissimo! ConsigliatoJavier's flat is in an amazing position and that is already worth twice the cost he makes you pay. The room is amazing and it also has a little living room space with a tiny balcony, lovely.The host canceled this reservation 71 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.Location is ideal. Javier was helpful and friendly. Recommended!Merci pour l'accueil et pour le séjourJavier and his wife are wonderful people -- very friendly, gracious hosts! Javier proactively provided all details, and his wife was there to greet us during our check-in.

The room and apartment were very clean, stylish, and comfortable along with a large, extremely clean bathroom. The location is impeccable -- step outside, and you're at the Opera/Metro with the Palace in sight, Calle Arenal (shopping street) a block over, and Puerta del Sol (center) a 5-7 minute walk away. I'd highly recommend Javier and his place!Best location in the middle of the city next to opera. nice host! Spanish is recommended as the hosts don’t speak English it can be hardFantastic! Ideal place for "Madrid in 3 days". Thank you for all, Javier!Aunque los anfitriones fueron amables durante la estancia, y el piso se encuentra céntrico, la limpieza dejaba bastante que desear. La bañera estaba sucia, el dormitorio lleno de polvo. Y como aspecto más negativo el insoportable olor a tabaco en toda la casa. No lo recomiendo para nada para alguien que no sea fumador, e incluso para alguien moderadamente fumador. Era verdaderamente desagradable el intenso olor a tabaco. De hecho un día había incluso cenizas en la pila del baño. Siento tener que ser tan crítico. Pero me he pasado los días tosiendo y me he traído la ropa de la maleta incluso la que no he usado con olor a tabacoEmplacement exceptionnel !!! L’appartement se trouve juste derrière et en face du palais royal ! Un deux rue de la place major, je recommande à 100% tout se fait à pied, hôtes très accueillant ++++ , chambre propre +++, j’ai adoré.非常非常好非常非常值得住的房子,尤其是对室内设计感兴趣的朋友在这家一定可以感受到很棒的审美体验｡Fantastic home!Javier's place was excellent! His sister and him were great hosts and were very pleasant to talk to always. The space is very large and includes the bedroom and a small living space. We would totally rent the place again and is located perfectly to have a great weekend in Barcelona!Localización impecable. La habitación es agradable con una pequeña sala para relajarse, con luz natural. Javier ha sido amable y atento en todo momento.Un alojamiento genial recomendable al 100% , un trato muy buenoEen zeer gezellige kamer in het hartje van Madrid. De perfecte uitvalsbasis voor een verblijf in Madrid. Werkelijk op loopafstand van alle bezienswaardigheden, pleinen en metro. Absolute aanrader voor een zeer goede prijs. Zeer gastvrije en flexibele gastheer. Voor ons het toekomstige verblijfadres voor een voetbalweekend Madrid.Amazing place in the heart of Madrid! Both, Javier and his sister are outstanding hosts and made our stay in Madrid a wonderful experience. The metro station Ópera  is just a few feet away and the Royal Palace is literally around the corner. Excellent value for money. Always again!Meraviglioso soggiorno, Javier è un proprietario molto cordiale, affettuoso e sempre disponibile! 
La posizione della casa è incredibile! Non solo nel perfetto centro ma anche nella zona più elegante di Madrid. Gusto impeccabile anche nella scelta dell’arredamento.  Quando ritornerò a Madrid, senza alcun dubbio,  richiameró Javier :)Javier’s place is perfectly located, you can walk to majority of the top places in Madrid. Right next to the Opera station, it’s bustling with activity all times and we barely used public transport or taxi. The house and room were much bigger than we expected, the house has a vintage and rustic vibe to it and we certainly enjoyed the ambience. 

Javier is very responsive and is incredibly welcoming of his guests. Even though we didn’t speak the same language , we were able to communicate with (Hidden by Airbnb) translate and his cheerful and friendly attitude certainly made it super easy.Klimatyczna kwatera i niezwykle pomocny gospodarz! Lokalizacja w samym centrum, super punkt do zwiedzania Madrytu.Javier's apartment was the perfect location to explore the city from. All the main central attractions are right on the doorstep. The room was spotless and attached was a small room to relax with a balcony looking right out to the square below. The communication with Javier was perfect from the start and he was there to meet us when we arrived from the metro. We wouldn't hesitate to stay here again thanks to Javier's hospitality and perfect location.Muy recomendable hospedarse con Javier, sería una excelente opción de nuevo para mi.Pro:
- Perfect location, close to everything
- Super friendly hosts
- Spacious bed- and living room

Contra:
- The sheets smelled a bit of cigarettes, but, when mentioned, Javier changed them the next morning.Javier’s place is everything you’re looking for in Madrid. It’s right at the centre 30 seconds away from the Opera Metro and the Royal Palace. It’s 5 min away from Sol and Plaza Mayor, and close to so many restaurants, bars, and tapas places that you won’t be able to try them all. The place itself is immaculate, it’s in a rustic building which holds lots of character. The room has a private living room, and the washroom is right across the room which eliminates the need to walk in the entire apartment before getting there. It’s very clean and tidy, and Javier and his sister are very hospitable. I’ve stayed in other Airbnb’s during my trip in Barcelona and Valencia, and this one is by far my favourite.Javier's home is beautiful! You get a bedroom and a little sitting room to use. He's done a wonderful job with decorating it! It's so cute!! The location canNOT be beat. We loved our stay in Madrid and it's largely due to the amazing location. We were 5 minutes away from almost everything we wanted to do in Madrid. We didn't even get a chance to take a taxi or bus because we walked everywhere - max like 10-15 minutes from everywhere.Muy cómodo el lugar y muy céntricoUne grande chambre avec salon privé tout proche de la place de l'Opera et du Palais Royal : la localisation est idéale pour parcourir Madrid à pied sans prendre une seule fois le métro! Javier et son fils se sont rendus très disponibles et réactifs par messages ce qui est très appréciable. Seul bémol si vous ne supportez pas l'odeur de la cigarette, cela peut poser problème car il y a un fumoir dans l'appartement, mais Javier a fait le nécessaire pour que l'odeur se fasse moins sentir dès la deuxième nuit.The family are very nice and friendly. The room is spacey and clean and the location is great. However, it will be better if they provide clear instruction of the location cuz even locals can’t help us find the apartment and they couldn’t reply in time so we spent quite some time waiting despite that we provided our arrival time. 

Also, there is no kettle so it takes 15min to boil water every time when you need it for coffee or tea. Overall a good value but I think there could be better choice in Madrid downtown.Great location!!  Minutes by foot to Plaza Major a very great food "market", the oldest continuously operating restaurant in the world, the Palace and so much more.  Steps away from the Opera metro station (your portal to "everywhere").  Javier is a wonderful host!!!Sehr schönes Appartement ganz zentral in Palastnähe, aber recht ruhig. Javier und seine Schwester haben uns sehr nett empfangen und Tipps gegeben (mit unseren Spanisch-Brocken, Französisch und Händen und Füßen kamen wir kommunikativ zurecht). Bestens geeignet, um von dort aus die Stadt zu erkunden, haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt.Muy amable, excelente ubicación.Recomendado totalmente, la hospitalidad, limpieza, ubicación. Es ideal para realizar turismo en MadridThe place is extremely convenient , Madrid is a city never sleep, so please expect there will be noise from the streets at midnight.El lugar es excelente, centro pleno de Madrid y Javier es muy acogedor.

Muy buen lugarJavier 是一个非常善良,热情都房东,一直和我们保持紧密联系,耐心指导我们如何到他的家里｡我们感觉房间很舒适､干净､也很隐私,这么好的地点,我们到哪里都很方便,地铁就在我们楼下,我希望我的朋友来马德里也能住在他家,希望今后能再住在他的家Elegant and central. Apart from sharing kitchen and bathroom with the owner everything was great.Pasábamos unos días en la habitación de Javier y estaba perfecto! El piso es justo en el centro, estaba muy limpio y sin mucho ruido.  
Javier es un host muy agradable y la comunicación era muy fácil y rápida.
Gracias por hospedarnos!Javier y su hermana hicieron que nuestra estancia en Madrid fuera mucho más agradable. Nos sentimos muy acogidos en su casa y su amabilidad nos conectó con la parte humana de una ciudad que cada día nos gusta más. Definitivamente vamos a volver a la casa de Javier, la ubicación es espectacular y la habitación es hermosa!Alles super! Javier ist ein super Host! Wir werden nochmal vorbeikommen.Es que la verdad es que todo a sido perfecto, me he sentido realmente cómodo, la habitación muy amplia i cómoda, la cama perfecta, he podido descansar muy bien. El trato d e Javier y de su hermana, exquisitos. Muy recomendable.这是我们西班牙旅途的第一站｡一切都非常完美｡附近有非常多的景点｡从这里步行到马德里王宫只需要3分钟｡我们甚至在旅程结束才意识到,我们每天都会路过著名的太阳门广场｡不仅仅是景点,附近还有非常多很有名的餐厅,比如Alhambra,Casa de Abuelo,Chocolateria San Gines｡Javier非常注重细节,房间设计得很有艺术感｡我们忍不住在房间里拍了很多人像照片,效果都非常好｡Javier本人也非常有风度,对女性保持着礼貌的距离｡当我们使用公共区域时,他会在客厅安静地等待｡Javier很少说英语,所以我们使用谷歌翻译来交流,这并不妨碍我们感受到他的真诚和热情｡如果我们将来再次来到马德里,我们很可能还会选择Javier的家,因为这里真的太棒了｡Adresse parfaitement bien située au coeur de Madrid, tous les lieux d’intérêt sont accessibles à pied. 
La chambre est spacieuse avec un petit salon attenant très agréable. La literie est également tres confortable.Gran ubicación pero tuvimos una muy mala experiencia, nos revisaron todo nuestro equipaje mientras estuvimos paseando y nos robaron una playera.Very good host. It was a good choice to stay in Javier's apartmentBeautiful apartment in an insanely great location!! Steps to the palace and opera stop (and a 100 montaditos!). Apartment was clean and super comfortable and the communication with Javier and his sister was outstanding. Would definitely recommend!! Thank you!L’appartement de Javier est très bien situé à côté du Palais Royal, la chambre est grande et confortable et Javier est très disponible et réactif. La seule chose qui nous a dérangé était l’odeur de cigarette à l’intérieur de l’appartement... À part ça tout était ok !Everything was great. Great location, great appartment, in front of the royal palace, great people. Thank you for everything. I highly recommand this appartment.Condividere la casa non è un peso. Aononpersine aperte e disponibili, pronte ad aiutarti nel migliore dei modi. La camera è spaziosa e confortevole e si trova al centro turistico di madrid.La posizione dell’appartamento è davvero ottima! Si raggiunge la gran via in soli 5 minuti a piedi e il palazzo reale a pochi passi;
Javier è un padrone di casa gentile e disponibile. La camera è accogliente ed oltre la zona letto gode di zona living con divano, camino e balcone. Perfettamente riscaldata.Tanto Javier como su hermana han sido dos anfitriones maravillosos, siempre atentos y a la disposición de cualquier pregunta o duda. Además nos recomendó visita a Toledo, en vez de a Segovia como teníamos pensado y nos encantó!!!! La ubicacion inmejorable. Así que si volvemos a Madrid repetiríamos sin pensarlo. Ha sido una estancia de 10, nos sentíamos como en casa.Хозяева этого дома воспитанные, учтивые и жизнерадостные люди. Они не станут следить за вами и контролировать, оказанное доверие не хочется потерять. Мы действительно в этом доме чувствовали себя уютно, спокойно и счастливо! Что может быть важнее в далёком путешествии?!)))) От всего сердца рекомендую дом Хавьера для путешественников!Habitacion en el corazón de Madrid inmejorable. Super bien ubicada, una habitación grande, limpia y con una cama muy cómoda. Javier, una persona amable, acogedora desde el primer minuto. Para repetir sin duda. Gracias Javier.

comments:
Rosi is a hosting pro. Her place was clean and tastefully furnished. The location was very convenient, and although it's near a lively area, the room was quiet. Best of all, Rosi is a genuinely wonderful person, super friendly, positive, and creative. Merlino and Runa are both very cute and well-behaved. Rosi is an absolute love and her place is wonderful. I found her building very easy and it is well situated. The building is secure and has a concierge during the week days. She greeted me with a hug and made me fee immediately home. 

The place is vey homey. The room is very comfortable. Plenty of space, a desk, lots of storage. The bed was outfitted perfectly with plenty of pillows! Rosi has a map and recommendations ready for you. She had a fan ready due to the heat (much appreciated)! 

Would highly recommend while you're stay in Madrid. Rosi tiene una casa muy cómoda y una habitacion espaciosa. Nos dejó un ventilador potente para escapar del calor de Madrid en esos días. Todo perfecto.Great hostWhat a very nice stay!! I lived in Madrid for 4 years and I am quite picky in terms of location. Rosi's apartment was absolutely perfect : clean, location, amazing communication with Rosi and flexible. We loved everything about our stay and we would be more than happy to come back soon. 
Highly recommended! Rosi's place is in a fantastic location and is super comfortable.  Rosi is a sweet, kind host and her pets are precious.  I only stayed a night and it wasn't enough.  Perks... amazing shower head, elevator, metro access, and just off one of my favorite plazas in Madrid... and the adorable pups. I would absolutely return when I am back in Madrid.Rosi es una persona hermosa en todos sentidos. Yo sentía muy en casa y como si era una amiga y familiar. La casa es céntrica y cómoda, muy limpia con una terraza linda con plantas, y un ambiente de artista en el piso, gracias a Rosi y sus pinturas, es un espacio creativa y relajada y perfecto si te gusta animales.Rosi is very friendly host, i could feel she cares her guests much. Her flat is located just near a metro station and there is a bus stop just in front of it. It was so easy to get there from the airport and also for sightseeing. When i got tired after walking around tourist sites i could easily get back by direct bus from Gran Via. And i found there are lots of trendy shops and restaurants near her house and if you want to shop at  world famous brands there is a shopping street, takes less  than 10 minutes on foot. 
Anyway, it was a pleasant stay in Rosi's house. Oh! And her pets are so adorable and also friendly to meL'appartement de Rosi est très bien situé, très proche du centre ville et de quartiers très vivants (Malasana et Chueca). Nombreux bars à tapas dans l'environnement immédiat. Nous avons tout fait à pied depuis chez Rosi, mais l'appartement est également très bien situé par rapport aux transports en commun!.
L'appartement est très propre, et, malgré la situation très centrale, il y fait très calme. 
Rosi met à disposition de quoi se rafraîchir ainsi qu'un ventilateur, vraiment bienvenu au vu de la chaleur!
En gros, super hôte, et super appartement, nous y retournerons très certainement.Rosi's house was perfect for my solo trip... she was very helpful in giving tips to visit places and restaurants. Her house is centrally located. I had a wonderful time with her pets too they are too cute and friendly. Would definitely stay at her place next time I'm in Madrid.Rosi was very kind and accommodating, and very responsive when I needed to communicate with her, especially with my late check in. Her personality brings life to her home as her art is scattered throughout. The house rules are common sense, so I wouldn't worry so much about any restraints there. There are 2 cats and a dog, all of them very friendly and loving, so if you love animals, this is the place for you! Las fotos de la descripción no coinciden con el estado actual del apartamento. La cocina estaba sucia, sobre todo el microondas, que estaba lleno de grasa. Había polvo por todo el apartamento. La señora nos dijo que llevaba mucho cerrado, pero yo no tengo la culpa. No hay secadora, es una secadora de toallas. La nevera es muy pequeña y no tiene horno. No hay radiadores, solo un aparato de aire acondicionado, y hace mucho frío en el apartamento. No merece la pena ir si no tienes coche, está en medio de la nada. Nosotras pagamos 20 o 22 por noche, pero, si se hubiese podido, habríamos buscado otro sitio, o sea que pedir 50 por noche me parece un robo, sobre todo por cómo está el piso. No entiendo eso de solo querer sacar dinero, y menos con lo poco que cuida el piso, que la limpieza es algo básico. 
Hay sitios más grandes, más limpios, mejor conectados y más baratos.El alojamiento es pequeño cómo se vé en las fotos pero muy encantador y acogedor.
